2b1(rgyud): gzugs dang drug lA drug 'arol lo// 'od srung bdag
2b2(rgyud): Ta la na spyan ras gzigs dbang drug gi po byung shing
2b3(rgyud): sA la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ki dang / mya ngani 'tshang
2b4(rgyud): dang a ti mug+na ka sna tshogs mang pos legs par rgyan
3a1(rgyud): pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya stong dang / byang chub
3a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sa ya bya ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs ni
3a3(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mngar
3a4(rgyud): gyis bltas pa ra/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang
3a5(rgyud): lha'i bu rnams kyis dbang du mdzad nas chos ston par mdzad do// de ras byang chub sems
3a6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te
3b1(rgyud): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btung
3b2(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bang log su 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
3b3(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i snying po zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ bdag gis
3b4(rgyud): bskal pa dgu bcu rtsag cig gi sngon log su 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par blta bar de bzhin
3b5(rgyud): gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po las mnos nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis dbang phyug dang / 
3b6(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa
3b7(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin du sprul nas/ bdag gis rmongs pa mchis pa'i ye shes
4a1(rgyud): bkod pa la sogs te ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu thob par bgyis lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang sa
4a2(rgyud): phyogs gang du snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs der yang dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu khri nyis stong srang
4a3(rgyud): ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i slad du gnas par rig par bgyi lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang na don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po 'di spad
4a4(rgyud): pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du yang bkur bar 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das sem sa can de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
4a5(rgyud): brgya stong phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur lagaso// gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mnyan par bgyid na// bcom
4a6(rgyud): ldan 'das sdig pa spyod pa 'am/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ 
4a7(rgyud): mnar med par gzhol ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong ba de 'gyod par/ 
4b1(rgyud): gyur cing / ma 'ongs pa na sdom pa thob par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das re shig de nyid kyis zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na tshe 'di nyid la las de rnam
4b2(rgyud): bar dag pa dang / gtugs pa dang / bsal bar 'gyuraro// rims nyin gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am
4b3(rgyud): de bzhin du rim nyin bdun pa 'am/ mig nad dang / rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ so'i nod dam/ mchu'i nad dam/ l+ya'i nad dam/ dkan
4b4(rgyud): gyi nad dam/ snying nad dam/ lto nad dam/ ro rgyab dang / rked pa'i nad dam/ phan lag dang nying lag gi nad dam/ gzhang 'bru ma 'am/ 
4b5(rgyud): pho ba'i nad dam/ tshad pa 'am/ lag pa dang / rkang pa'i nad dam/ sna nad dam/ klad pa'i nad dam/ sha bkra chen po 'am
4b6(rgyud): sha gzig gu 'am/ 'dze 'am/ rkang shu 'am/ 'brum bu phra mo 'om/ lhog pa 'am/ mtshan par rdol ba 'am/ 'brum bu 'am/ brjed byed dam/ 
4b7(rgyud): byad dam/ gzhan gyis bgyis pa'i bsod pa 'am/ 'ching ba 'am/ rdeg pa 'am/ smod pa 'am/ bden pa ma lags pas skur pa 'debs pa 'am/ bcom
4b8(rgyud): ldan 'das mdor na lus kyi gdung ba 'am/ sems kyi gdung ba 'am/ rmi lam ngan pa'i las de yongs su gtugs par 'gyur na/ sems can dag pa lhag pa dad pa
5a1(rgyud): rnams kyi yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor bzhi 'am
5a2(rgyud): rigs bzhi las gang dag sgyu dang / g.yos bdag gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid/ 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par
5a3(rgyud): bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/ sems can gzhan la yang sgrogs par bgyid cing / tha na dud 'gro'i skye
5a4(rgyud): gnas su gtogs pa rnams kyi rna bung du gtad de/ rna bar bzlas brjod bgyid la rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams sems par bgyid de/ skur ba ma mchis pa dang
5a5(rgyud): gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rnam par mi ston/ sa pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ring du 'gro ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa
5a6(rgyud): ma mchis pa dang / gos pa ma mchis pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid dang ma bral ba dang / phung po lnga dang bral ba ste/ rnal 'byor 'dis sangs
5a7(rgyud): rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par bgyid na// de la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas stong zhal ston par mdzad par 'gyur zhing nong pa 'chags par 'gyur ba la sogs
5a8(rgyud): ba rgyas par sbyar ro// glegs bam du bgyis te khyim du 'chang bar bgyid dam/ rje dpon gyis skrag pas sam/ gzhan gyi ngor ras bdang
5b1(rgyud): gad tsam gyis rgyus mnyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das mkhas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mthus de dag gi rna khung du sgra dri grag
5b2(rgyud): pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na skye bu 'ga' zhig gis tsan dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gla rtsi zhig la khros sam/ yongs
5b3(rgyud): su smad de rdo la btags nas bdag nyid la byugs na tsan dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gla ci de 'di snyams du 'dis bdag la khros sam/ yongs su
5b4(rgyud): smad pas dri mnam par mi bgyi'o snyam du mi sa mas kyi/ gzhan du na de nyid dri 'da' bar bgyid la gas so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag
5b5(rgyud): gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di yang / gang su yang rung bas bzhad pad tsam gyis zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das
5b6(rgyud): g.yo dang / sgyus mchod par bgyid na yang de nyid sems can dmu rgod de dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur lags so// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur
5b7(rgyud): tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ tshul khrims kyi dri bda' bar bgyid
5b8(rgyud): lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang yang rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ba dang / dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
6a1(rgyud): pa'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can su yang rung bas don yod pa'i zhags pa ni snying po tsha
6a2(rgyud): du yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la bsrung ba bgyis te/ gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod na/ bcom ldan 'das des tshe 'di nyid la phan yon
6a3(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig thob par 'gyur te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la las kyi dbang gis
6a4(rgyud): nad mas byung na yang byung du ni bar 'gyur shing su mdangs dang ldan pa dang yid su mchi bar 'gyur ro// rtsa ba mang ba'i snying sdug pa dang dbang ba rdzas
6a5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// de'i don rnams 'ju bar 'gyur ro// de'i don grub pa yang mgun gyis mi 'phrogs te/ zhugs
6a6(rgyud): mi tshig/ chab kyi mi 'tshal/ rgyal po'i mthus dbrogs par rngo mi thog par 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi mtha' rnams rgyas par 'gyur// ser
6a7(rgyud): bas ma lags so// chab kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pa ma lags so// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
6a8(rgyud): bo thal ba dang / tshul lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhing gi phyogs mtshams dang / steng 'og tu bcing pa 'gyis na gnod pa thams cad
6b1(rgyud): nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang mdangs 'brog par rngo mi thog par 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'thad par 'gyur
6b2(rgyud): ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// de la mi ma lags pa'i
6b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// byad kyi 'jigs pa ma lags/ mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa ma lags te/ de la nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs
6b4(rgyud): ba drag po 'byur bar mi 'gyur ro// me dang / tshon dang / dug gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ro// de la yang lha rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
6b5(rgyud): par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang / snying
6b6(rgyud): rje dang // dga' ba dang // btang snyoms dang / 'bras par mi 'gyur te/ de la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig pa 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur
6b7(rgyud): lags so// gzhan yang chos brgyad 'thob par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'gum pa'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ra gzigs dbang phyug dge
6b8(rgyud): slong gi gzugasu mngon sum du zhal ston par 'gyuraro// bde bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyuraro// lta ba 'phrul bar mi 'gyuraro// lag pa mi g.yob pa dang / rkang pa mi g.yob pa
7a1(rgyud): // pa dang / bshang gci ma mchis pa dang / khri'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// dran pa shin tu nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// khas phung du 'chi ba'i dus
7a2(rgyud): bgyid par mi 'gyu ro// 'gum pa'i dus na yang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyur ro// de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon pa der skye bar 'gyur zhing dag pa'i bshes gnyen dang yang 'bral bar
7a3(rgyud): mi 'gyuraro// nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// chang dang / sha dang / rkun dong dang / ke'u dang / sgog skya dang 'dres pa dang / lhag rol dang / 'di rnams khyad par du don
7a4(rgyud): du gnyer bas spang bar bgyi'o// den yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di yang sems ca na rnams la mthu mchis pa dang / mthu ma mchis par 'tshal
7a5(rgyud): bar bgyis nas bsgrags par bgyi'o// slob dpon gyi dpe ma khyud mi 'gyi'o// 'di ltar dri ma dang bral zhing drag dog ser sna spangs pa ni drang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te/ 
7a6(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par 'gyur bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshogs kyi nang du gtog so// byang chub ces bgyi ba ni shes rab lags/ sems
7a7(rgyud): dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni/ thabs lags te/ chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad kho nas thob pa lagaso// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rje su gnang na/ 'dri
7a8(rgyud): ltar bdag gis snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gakhor bzhirna mas dang / gzhan sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi don dang sman pa dang bde smad du bsgrags par bgyi'o// 
7b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa de'i dus la bab par shes na spros
7b2(rgyud): shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rje su yi rang bar mdzad zin te/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can rnams la pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyu ro// de nas byang chub
7b3(rgyud): sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
7b4(rgyud): phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don
7b5(rgyud): du bdag la gsan du gsol/ dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// rang sangs rgyas
7b6(rgyud): dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams
7b7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tsha'o// dmas pa la sogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa
7b8(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tsha'o// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang / 
8a1(rgyud): ldan pa 'phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha'o// d+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ga tsi ra tsa ri tsu ru tsu ru/ a h+ye hi ma ha kar Ni ka/ Na ri tsi ri mi ri mi bi tsu ru tsu ru/ 
8a2(rgyud): mahAkA ru Ni kA ga/ si ri si ri tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi bai bi ri bi ri/ mahA 'ang+ga ste/ ka lo ka ga ki li ki li~M/ ku lu kra su mahA shAd+d+ha sa twa/ bad+b+ha dAd+ha/ d+hA bad+d+ha kaN kaN ki Ni ki k+ki kuT ku Nu/ pi ma
8a3(rgyud): shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ mahAs+thA ma prAg+ha/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+dza la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/ b+ha re b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ ma hA pa shu pa ti \u0f7f
8a4(rgyud): 'ang+gar d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ hAhahA/ tsi hI tsil+li/ tu tru hu hU/ oM kA ra prah+ma be 'ad+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ro d+hi mi d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tar tar/ sa ra sa rakhar bar/ tsar tsa ra/ 
8a5(rgyud): ram+b+hi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta/ sha rI rA ya/ dz+wa la dzA la/ tA pa tA ga/ b+ha ga wan/ so ma A di d+ya/ sa ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ prah+men+da ri'i de ba ga Na/ a b+ha tsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu
8a6(rgyud): ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ pu ru pu rus nad ku mA ra/ ru dra/ b+ha sa pa/ bib+hu d+ha nad/ da ba ri'i nA ya ka/ bahu bi bid+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ra d+hu ru/ ba ra thar/ g+har b+ha ra/ ya yar ya ra kha ra lar/ 
8a7(rgyud): ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra d+ha ya ka/ sa man+ta/ a wa lo ka ti/ bi lo ka ti/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru su ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa// bcom ldan 'das 'pha
8a8(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpalas gsum gyi lha rnams bdag dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang / 
8b1(rgyud): gdon thams cad las bsrungs shig/ bsrungs shig/ bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdig pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon
8b2(rgyud): las yongasu thar par mdzad pa// ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku N+ya kuM Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in+d+ra ya/ ba la bo d+hA ga/ tsa tur Ar+ya sat+ya saM pra kA sha ka/ tra ba t+sa p+pa/ da mad ma/ sa mra sa maM/ sa mas ma/ 
8b3(rgyud): mahA ta mo/ oM d+ha kA ra/ bi d+ha ma Na Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pA ra ka/ mi li mi liT Ta Ta Ta/ dzar+tha tha wa/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Ta/ e na ya tsarma kri ta ba ri ka ra/ e h+ye ti/ i shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hU tag
8b4(rgyud): Na saM b+hany+dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka/ Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha/ bi Sha ya/ d+hA sin/ mahA kA ruM NaM ka shwe ta ya dz+nyo pa bI ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ m+ba lA d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba dzA shi ra si
8b5(rgyud): kri ta ma ku Ta/ ma lA d+ha ra/ ma hAd b+hU ta/ ka ma la a laM kri ta ra d+ha rA ya/ d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi/ bi mo k+Sha A pra kaM pya/ ba hu satwa san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba karma A wa ra Na
8b6(rgyud): bi sho d+ha kasar+b+ba bud+hi ba ro mo tsa ka sar+b+ba A shwa pa ri pU ra kasar+b+ba satwa sa mA shA sa na ka ra na mosta te swA hA// bklags pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// dus gsum du bzlas brjo
8b7(rgyud): bgyis na mtshams med pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur zhing las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongasu dag par 'gyuro// mtshams gcad pa la ni a ga ru'i 'dug pa 'am/ thal ba 'am/ chab bam
8b8(rgyud): yungs kar dang / sang ldang gi phur bu la sogs pa'o// rims thams cad la ni skud pas/ nad thams cad la ni mar ram/ 'bru mar ram/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor bar bgyi 'o// 
9a1(rgyud): byang dgrol bar la mtshon gyiso// lto ba la ni srung ba'i skud pa'o// dug bsad pa la ni sa 'am chab gyi so// mig nad la ni sU dang dkar pos rna ba la gdags
9a2(rgyud): par bgyi'o// son pa la ni shing kar bi tshang shing gis so// mtshams bcad pa ni mtshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya na gyis te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la brtsi
9a3(rgyud): nas phyogs bzhi gzugs par bgyis na mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyuro// thams cad srung ba ni sdud pa 'am/ chab bam/ thal bas bya'o// gdon thams mnani tshon sna lnga'i
9a4(rgyud): skud pas so// rims thams cad la ni snang ba dkar pos so// g.yan pa dang / khyi rngo dang / ldog pa dang / mgrin pa 'gags ba thams cad la ni sbrang rtsi dang / pi pi ling bsra
9a5(rgyud): pas so// mig nad la ni dri chu dang / shing ba la sha'i chu'am/ shing mngar gyi chus so// rna ba'i nad la ni 'bru mar gyiso// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa 'gyung
9a6(rgyud): ba dang / bskur pa 'debs pa thams cad la ni/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis de khab shel bar bgyi'o// dpung dang / yul dang / rgyal srid dang / yul 'khor rnams srung ba la ni bum pa gang
9a7(rgyud): ba banag la gos gtsang ma bgos pas mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas bklags par bgyis na zhi ba chen por 'gyuraro// des yang chab kyis gtor bar bgyis te/ sems can bam
9a8(rgyud): cad la srung ba bgyis par 'gyuraro// yam gyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang / grags lta ba rnams la ni tsan dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
9b1(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis te snying kar byug par gyi'o// mtshams ma mchis pa'i las thams cad bas par bgyi ba ni rtag tu bzlas brjod kyis so// khyim srung ba la ni pad+ma'i sbyin sreg
9b2(rgyud): gis so// sems can thams cad bskyang ba dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang / gdon thams cad las srung ba ni tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis so// dza ya dang / bi dza ya dang / na ku la dang / 
9b3(rgyud): gan d+ha na gu li dang / ba ru ni dang / ce 'dra ba ru Ni dang / a b+ha ya ba ni dang / i dra ba ni dang / gan d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / tsakra dang / ma hA tsakra dang / biSh+Ta kran+ta dang / so ma ra dzi dang / su nan
9b4(rgyud): da rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ nor bu ra ba gyis nas spyi bo 'am/ dpung pa la gdags pas/ bsrel bar bgyi'o// / khyi'u rnams la ni mgul par ro// bu mo rnams la ni
9b5(rgyud): sta zur nas te/ dpal dang ldan par bgyis pa dang / bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i nor bu 'di bsres na thams cad las srung ba bgyis par 'gyuro// dug dang mes
9b6(rgyud): mi tshugs lag so// dug gis gnod pa skye bar mi 'gyu ro// skyes na yang gnod pa skyed par mi bgyid cing myur du zhi bar 'gyu ro// gdon rnams zhi bar 'gyu ro// rlung dang 'brug dang / ser ba bcad pa/ chang
9b7(rgyud): ni rgyan dang / ser ba bzlog pa la ni shing kar ri ra'i lcug mas te/ las thams cad bgyid pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po grub pa dam pa ma bsgrungs par las 'di rnams bgyid par
9b8(rgyud): 'gyur lag so// de nas sgrub par 'tshal na thang sku'i cha ga ni ras la lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshen rtsis sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa spyar ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzugs brnyan ral pa'i thor
10a1(rgyud): tshugs dang / e ra ya'i lpags pa dang / byugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dri bar bgyi ste/ ri mo mkhan gse sbyongab can 'drir stsal
10a2(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// de nas sgrub pa po sku gzugs de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog dkar po'i sil ma bkram la spos kyis bkang ba'i snod brgyad bzhag par bgyi'o// sna brgyad pa
10a3(rgyud): 'am/ drug cu rtsa bzhi pa 'am/ gzhan yang lha ba shos sha dang khrag dang ma 'dres pa bshams shing drangs la a ga ru'i bdugs pas bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// nyin zhag
10a4(rgyud): cig gam/ nyin zhag gsum du bsnyung ba bgyis nas zas da/ ra gsum 'tshal te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas gos gangams bgos na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
10a5(rgyud): dbang phyug bdag nyid mchis nas bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid// ldong ros sam/ mig sman la bzlas brjod bgyis te mi la bskul ma/ de nas mi gda' bar gyur
10a6(rgyud): nas na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob par gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyu ro// de nas 'grub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
10a7(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po
10a8(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// don yod pa'i zhags pa rdzogs s+ho// 
10b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rab 'byam thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos
10b2(rgyud): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus me g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ nyi ma'i 'ong ltar 'od zer stong 'phro zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'gyed pa'i lus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log
10b3(rgyud): su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas zhing rdzogs la zhi ba bzhin 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyi byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i mthu yid la byed pas rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten la
10b4(rgyud): phan pa dang / snying rtsa bas don thams cad grub par rig sngags la chang rnams kyis bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid grub pa/ mchog sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la
10b5(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa 'i rgyal po'i chos zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i snying po 'di ma chis te/ 'di pad+ma chen po'i dkyil 'khor de nyid
10b6(rgyud): chen po snying por 'phags pa snying por gyur ga kho na nyid grub pa pad+ma dam pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'di phyag rgya dang / gsang sngag dang / snying po rim par phye ba gsang ba dam pa rnam par
10b7(rgyud): grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang sgrub pa gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsgrags par bgyi'o// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding
10b8(rgyud): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang mi mang po'i 'khor chen po'i mdun dang / rig sngags grub pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'di yang bsgrags par bgyi'o// gang yang dbang phyug dang / 
11a1(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha dang / gshin rje dang / chu dang / lus ngan dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / rgyaskar
11a2(rgyud): dang / rib sngags 'chang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyi bdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po yang dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ dngos grub sgrub pa glags pas grub pa dang / sgom pas sgrub pa bcom
11a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi spyan slar rig sngags chen po 'chang ba'i tshogs kyi yongasu bskor ba'i mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po gsang ba dam pa bsgrags shing brjod par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das da
11a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bsod nams stong gis rlan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par spras pa/ phyag dpung pa 'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'od zer 'phro du
11a5(rgyud): ma'i phreng ba dang / spos kyi glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor bzhag nas klad pa
11a6(rgyud): byug te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs te/ ngas kyang da ltar byin gyis rlob kyi khyod
11a7(rgyud): gsang ba dam pa'i dam tshig spros shig/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdza su yi rang bzhin byin gyis brlabs pa gang gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma'i rdul
11a8(rgyud): phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi kyang byin gyis brlab shing rje su yi rang bar mdzad do// se nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
11b1(rgyud): gis phyogs bcur ltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi snying po de kho na nyid gsang ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to// oM pad+ma hasta mahA a mo g+ha pA shA sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hri da ya/ 
11b2(rgyud): ra tsa ra hUM/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po yin no// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i
11b3(rgyud): rgyal po po Ta la 'di brag dang nags tshal dang / rtswa shing du bcas pa dang / ri rab khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing lha'i gnas rnams kyang ldeg
11b4(rgyud): par gyur te/ thams cad 'dar por gyur to// klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas rnams kyang 'khrugs par gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang 'khrug par gyur
11b5(rgyud): to// chu gter rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to// de ma thag tu phyog/ sa bcu na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rna mas kyis legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad
11b6(rgyud): ces kyang bka' stsal to// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa don yod pa gsang ba'i snying po bklags pas 'grub pa bla na med pa smras pa le gso lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
11b7(rgyud): ba shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' dag pa khyod kyis gsang ba klag pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par smros shig/ spyan ras gzigs dang
11b8(rgyud): phyug gis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas gang ga klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma
12a1(rgyud): snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang ste/ spyi bo la bzhag nas legaso zhes par bgyi ba'i sgra gsungs te/ gsungs pa tsam gyi mod la mngon bskal pa brgya stong du
12a2(rgyud): bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid/ zhig par bgyi do// sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / de bzhin du gnod pa zhi bar bgyid do// sdig pa dang / sems can gdugs pa rnams
12a3(rgyud): dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba rnams 'jig par bgyid de/ 'di la the tshom mi bgyi'o// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin balnga 'tshal bar 'gyur lag so// rig
12a4(rgyud): sdug 'di yi cho ga sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ rig sdug 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas shin tu/ gos gtsang ma ba gos par bgyi'o// byams pa dang / snying rje chen pa yid la dgyis
12a5(rgyud): pas 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyu ga gi mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug
12a6(rgyud): ba dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar ma dbul bar bgyi'o// tshes brgyad dam/ tshas bco lnga la sgrub pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du thog
12a7(rgyud): mar skyil mo dkrung bcas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bkye'o// tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 'gyis te
12a8(rgyud): chab dang / yungs kyi dkar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gdon par bgyi'o// gsang sngags kyis ni dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag
12b1(rgyud): rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu don yod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod gton pa tsam gyis de'i mod la don yod
12b2(rgyud): pa'i zhab pa snyi po sa rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyu ro// bzlas brjod rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa yang g.yo bar 'gyuraro// 
12b3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyu ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa lag na thog pa'i zhag pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags
12b4(rgyud): 'chang snying dga' ba dang spyi bo'i btsug 'ab ra bar 'gyuro// 'di ni grub pa'i rtags yin no zhes grub pa 'i rtags dang lag so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ don yod pa'i
12b5(rgyud): zhag pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya gru ba par 'gyuraro// de nas dgos pa thams cad dang las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyi de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur lag so// de bzhin
12b6(rgyud): gshegs pa sa ya bye ba brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i phyag gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spyi gtsug tu 'jog par rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan
12b7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tu dri ma dang bral zhing yongasu dag pas dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus rang bzhin gyi mdun na mchis par 'gyuro// mchog
12b8(rgyud): thams cad stsol bar 'gyuraro// rnam pa thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa stsol bar 'gyuraro// ji ltar snying las skyes
13a1(rgyud): pa'i bu bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar du yongasu sbyong bar bgyid do// de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag
13a2(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dang bcas pa na/ khang pa rtsegs ma lag par brgyan pa'i sang ga'i wa
13a3(rgyud): mchog la 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer brgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i skus bzhugs shing chos ston pa blta bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkru
13a4(rgyud): te/ gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang / dang ba dang / zhes dang / 
13a5(rgyud): bla mar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gir mo'i gzugs la tso 'byor pa me tog dang / gdugs pa dang / dri dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang
13a6(rgyud): gos dang / lha ba lhu ba dang / ba dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o// tshes brgyad nas tshas bcu gsum gyi bar du zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig
13a7(rgyud): bzhin dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis
13a8(rgyud): nas ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du mchis nas nyal bar bgyi'o// mchod yon dang yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o// a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka dang / gu gul
13b1(rgyud): gyi me tog khu ba dang bcas pa gla rtsi dang lhan cig bsres nas baglang bar bgyi'o// dgug pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi te/ don yod khams gsum rnam
13b2(rgyud): bar grags/ 'dug pa'i rgyal po bla na med/ gang phyir bdug pa tsam gyis ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams
13b3(rgyud): 'dug pa'i sprin chen po 'khrigs pas rgyas par 'gyur ro// dri 'khrigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
13b4(rgyud): dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la dri chen po'i mchod pa dang / bdug pa chen po'i mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur
13b5(rgyud): zhing de dag thams cad dga' bar 'gyuraro// nga yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas gtogs pa'i sems can gang ngag gis bdug pa'i dri tshor na de dag thams cad ngan song du
13b6(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongasu gtugs par 'gyuraro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrug pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / 
13b7(rgyud): yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / gdung ba dang / mi bde ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// rlung dang / ser ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i sprin thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// 
13b8(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyuraro// byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyu ro// gdon thams cad dang / brjod
14a1(rgyud): byed thams cad dang / rims dang / bza' nyes dang / bsgoms nyes dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod bltas thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par 'gyuro// 'jig par
14a2(rgyud): 'gyur// 'gyed par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyu ro// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyar bar bgyi'o// 'di ltar tshes bcu
14a3(rgyud): bzhi'i nub mo mchis la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad dang / khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma ci 'byor pa
14a4(rgyud): dbul bar bgyi'o// snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po rtsa brgyad pa zlas brjod bgyis la dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar ma dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs de nyid mdun du nam langs kyi bla
14a5(rgyud): du mchis nas nyal bar bgyis te rmi lam du dbyig gi mdzod mthong ngam/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med khang dang bcas/ rin po che'i shing
14a6(rgyud): dang bcas/ rin po che'i ri dang bcag/ rdzing dang bcag gnas dang / khong pa brtsegs ma dang bcas/ rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ de bzhin
14a7(rgyud): gshegs pa tshe dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / 
14a8(rgyud): namakha' lding dang / mi 'am tsa dang / lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
14b1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med de yang rig sngags 'chang de la dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing leg so zhes bgyi ba yang stsol bar mdzad de/ kye skyes bu de 'khyod kyis rigs sngags 'chang gi skyes
14b2(rgyud): bu'i byed pa mang du bas pa dang / khyod kyis dag ba'i rtsa ba mang du bsnun pa dang / khyod kyis lhags par mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa byas pa dang / khyod kyis don yod
14b3(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags rnam par phye ba'i snying po sgrub pa ni grub zin te/ legaso lag so// khyod kyi rig sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas
14b4(rgyud): nyid du gyur cig khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal gyi skye ba bla ngas te tshe rjes nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyuro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
14b5(rgyud): du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes phyag g.yas pa klad pa'i spyi bor 'jo ga par 'gyur 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thams cad stsol cing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi dngos grub
14b6(rgyud): sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni dam pa sgrub pa yin no zhes bdag nyid sad nas dga' bar mthong ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing yongasu dag par 'gyu ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
14b7(rgyud): bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun du mchis par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyuro// gzugs kyi ri mo de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyu ro// yon tan brgya stong
14b8(rgyud): mang po gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// skye bo dang rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad dbang du
15a1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing mcher mchod par 'gyu ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams la don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyu ro// grub pa chen po bla na med pa yang 'thong
15a2(rgyud): par 'gyu ro// nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du phyag brgya bcing bar bgyi'o// de nas tshes bcu la thog mar dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la ci 'byor pa'i yon dang bcas pa'i chos ston
15a3(rgyud): stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid long spyod par bgyi'o// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang / lha rnams la blta bar 'tshal ba na/ de'i tshe bdug pa'i
15a4(rgyud): rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsabazlas brjod bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug par bgyi'o// bdug pas bdugs pa tsam gyi mad la zhal ston par
15a5(rgyud): 'gyur zhing dag pa 'am mi dge pa thams cad dam/ nyams pa 'am bri ba de dag thams cad gsung bar 'gyu ro// ji tsam tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du gsungs pa 'am/ 'gro
15a6(rgyud): ba'am/ 'ong ba gsung bar 'gyu ro// de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga dang / sgrub pa'i don dang / las kyi cho ga yang ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o// oM pad+ma d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha dza ya
15a7(rgyud): de tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ don yod po'i rgyal po'i snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngag so// oM pad+ma pA sha d+ha rA ya/ a mo g+ha da ra sany+tso da ya hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sem
15a8(rgyud): dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi yin pa la sogs pa bskul ba'o gsang / 
15b1(rgyud): sngags te/ bdug pa'i rgyal pos btugs nas/ chab dang / yungs kar bsres la lan nyid shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bcur gtor nas thams cad bskul bar bgyis par
15b2(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// oM trai lo kya a b+ha hA na/ a mo g+ha pA sha/ pad+ma bi lo ki ta A yan+ta/ b+hu ba ne su ra/ su ru su ru/ bi ma la hUM/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad
15b3(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis nas chu dang me tog bsres pas phyogs bcu la bgyi ste/ thams cad nas dgug pa dam pa grub pa lagaso// oM pad+ma b+hA ba dza ma hA pA shwa d+ha ra Ni maN+Da la mi/ 
15b4(rgyud): a mo g+ha pra sha yan tu b+hu ba swa/ mu ru mu ru hUMd bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / dkyil
15b5(rgyud): 'khor thams cad na gnas pa'i lha tshogs la sogs pa spyan drangs pa'i gsang sngags te/ ril ba spyi thA gas dang / cha ba dang / me tog dang / tshems shing la bdug
15b6(rgyud): pa'i rgyal pos bdugs te/ thams cad la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ thams cad spyan drang ba'i rig sngag so// oM pad+ma a mo g+ha badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na ku ru ku ru swA hA/ 
15b7(rgyud): sa'i dkyil 'khor bcings pa ste/ chab dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sa la gtor gnas dpag tshad sum brgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i sa'i
15b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuro// de thams cad bsrungs pas ni rdo rje sra ba'i semasu 'gyuro// dgra rnams kyis mi mthong ba dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / 
16a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod bsgyur ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyis mi
16a2(rgyud): mthong ste/ rnam pa thams cad du mi mthong bas/ rnam pa thams cad du mi mthong bas rdo rje srabs 'gyuraro// oM a mo g+ha pA sha pad+mo d+ha ra siSh+Tha/ san+na Ti si ri si ri hUM/ gdan gyi gsang sngag
16a3(rgyud): te yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad dazlas brjod bgyis te sa la gtor na pad+ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang gi gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyuro// de bzhi/ 
16a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i seng ge'i gdan du byin gyis brlangs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags
16a5(rgyud): 'chang gis rang gi stan la chab dang / yungs ka/ ral lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gto ra te/ rig sngags grub pa'i pad+ma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang
16a6(rgyud): sngag so// oM mahA ka ru ni ka bar+tha a mo g+ha pA sha dri D+ha badz+ra a d+hiSh+Thi ta d+hu ra~M b+hu ru ngan d+ha re swA hA/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag na khyim dang / nags tshal na/ kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug la
16a7(rgyud): khang dang / sti gnas dang / 'chags dang / phug dang / dgon pa dang / gnas gsang ba'i phyir dri chab dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod dbyis nas gtor bar bgyis te/ 
16a8(rgyud): gnasu gtogs pa thams cad gsang ba chen po bgyis par 'gyu ro// nyes par bgyid pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad 'bros
16b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ gnas gsang ba'i gsang sngagaso// oM pad+ma a mo g+ha pA sha na sa man+ta da sha su dik+Shu si mA ban d+hA ya/ tu ru tu ru hU~M/ lcags kyi phur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad lnga la tshon sAl
16b2(rgyud): skud pas dkris te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o// lnga pa ni dbus kyi gzhir gzugs par bgyi ste/ rgyang grags bdun
16b3(rgyud): 'khor bar mtshams bcing bgyis par 'gyu ro// ji srid du phur bu ma byung ba de srid du mtshams chen po bcings pa bgyis par 'gyuro// oM a mo g+ha maN+Da la ban d+hA ya sa man+ta na/ 
16b4(rgyud): pad+ma ma hA pad+me/ d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ dri chab dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjo da bgyis nas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / de bzhin
16b5(rgyud): du 'og dang / steng du yang gtor te dkyil 'kho ra chen po bcings par bgyis par 'gyu ro// bgegs dang log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za
16b6(rgyud): mchi bar 'os pa thams cad kyis mchi bar mi 'gyuro// sems can gdug pa dang / lha 'am/ klu gdug pa gang su yang rung ba de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan par 'gyuraro// 
16b7(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang / sngags ngan pa dang / sems can ngan pa dang / bgyid pa ngan pa thams cad yongasu spangs par 'gyuraro// oM a mo g+ha pa ri shud+he sho d+ha ya sa man+tan
16b8(rgyud): d+hi ri d+hi ri shung+ga satwa mahA pad+ma hUM/ 'dis pa'i rnam lnga la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha mtha' dag na btsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am / bya sbyings
17a1(rgyud): sa ma/ tshang tshing ngam/ 'chags 'am/ gnas sam/ tshal lam nags tshal lam/ bskyed mos tshal lam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ brang sa 'am/ skyabs sam/ khang pa la
17a2(rgyud): gtor na stong pa 'am/ mi stong pa 'am/ 'dam rdzang dang / mi gtsang ba dang / phyag dar gyis gang ba dang / 'byung po dang / sha dang / yi dgas la sogs te/ rigs ngan pa thams cad yongasu spang
17a3(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// gtsang ma dag par 'gyu ro// gnas gtsang mar 'gyuraro// bdag nyid la dbang bskur na/ bza' nyes dang / sgom nyes dang / gnod bltas dang / gnod sgrib kyis gnas ngan pa
17a4(rgyud): thams cad yongasu dag par 'gyuro// gtsang ma dag par 'gyuro// mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyuro// tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyuraro// bsnyen
17a5(rgyud): gnas ma bgyis pa ni bsnyen gnas bgyis par 'gyur// de la lha thams cad srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sngo ba bgyid par 'gyuraro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen
17a6(rgyud): po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / khyab la thug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan la sogs pa srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du rtag tu rdzasu
17a7(rgyud): 'brang bar 'gyu ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / mchod par 'os par 'gyuraro// tshig brtsan par 'gyuraro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyu ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa
17a8(rgyud): dang / gnod pa la sogs pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar 'gyuraro// phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas dang
17b1(rgyud): yams dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyu ro// nyin gcig bzhin du bdag nyid la dbang bskur ram/ reg par bgyis nas rig sngags dang / 
17b2(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par dbye ba dang / las chen po 'grub par 'gyu ro// don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyuraro// gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang dar mchod
17b3(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// thams cad kyis mi bzlog par 'gyu ro// nyin gcig bzhin gzhal med khang rgya chen po bkra zhing rnam par bkra ba chen po rmi lam du mthong ba dang / rnam pa thang du
17b4(rgyud): mchog rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyuraro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dzad
17b5(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur zhes mchod par 'os par 'gyu ro// rtag tu gtsang mar spyod par gtsang zhing zhing dag par 'gyuraro// rtag par dus kun tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
17b6(rgyud): dbang phyug blta 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// 'dod pa thams cad kyis mchog stsol bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med
17b7(rgyud): rmi lam du rtag tu mthong zhing shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyuraro// oM pad+me sa ra sa sha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha mahA a mo g+ha sa ma ya swA hA/ gsang sngagaso// 
17b8(rgyud): oM bi pu la pad+ma a mo g+ha pra sar pra bi sha tu/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ 'jug pa'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha a nu sha ya ma hA pad+ma ban b+hu ra hUM/ slob ma'i gsang sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha
18a1(rgyud): / badrang shig tu ra d+ha mu tiSh+Thi badz+ra narten ts+tsha/ s+thi btsug gi bcing ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shucu gcig brdzas so/ oM a mo g+ha pad+ma rnga lod
18a2(rgyud): ba b+hi ri d+hi ri hrAM/ chang bteg pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso// oM a mo g+ha bi ka Ti d+ha ri pad+ma as Ne dza la ba ni ku ru ku ru hUM/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan brgya
18a3(rgyud): brgyad bzlaso// oM pad+mo pra sa ra a mo g+ha bi ma laM b+ha ra b+ha ra swA hA/ tshab kyi rgyan gyi gsang sngags te lan nyid shu rtsa gcig bzla'o// oM a mo g+ha pad+me su pad+me/ pUr+Na kar d+hi ri d+hi ri bi ma la swA hA/ lag pa'i
18a4(rgyud): gsang sngags te/ lag pa gnyis la lan snong rtsa brgyad bzlas rjod dbyis nas dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cheg zhing me dang sbyang pa'i dmos pa thams cad
18a5(rgyud): ste sgrub pa thams cad la bsgrub par bgyi zhing las thaMd la dus thams cad du dgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha di ma le dzi hA gra sa sho d+ha ni pad+ma ka ma la dzi hA/ se bo d+ha ya d+ha ra d+ha ra su ngam
18a6(rgyud): la swA hA/ lce sbyang ba'i gsang sngags te dri chab la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 'byis te kha bshal la lce'i dri ma yongasu dag par 'gyuro// pad+ma dang ku mu da'i rang ngam dang 'dra bar
18a7(rgyud): gzhan par 'gyur/ so dang / dkan dang / mgul pa yongasasu dag par 'gyur/ oM a mo b+ha ga na d+ha btI su ru su ru/ pra d+hu ru ri bya gan+d+ha r+b+ha pra b+hA s+thA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis khar stsal
18a8(rgyud): ril bu dang tsan dan dang / nas dang / smi ka dang / ut+pal dang / gur zhum dang / khwa ci lhan cig bslang ba bgyis la phyem nang mar btogs rnaMs rim du gi gnyis tsam po'i tshad du snang rtsi dang na
18b1(rgyud): cig sbyar la gsang sngags sdong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te zangs kyi snod du sbal nas/ bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe khar stsal nas skad cig tsam zhig bsdad pa bgyis na rtag tu khanas
18b2(rgyud): ut+pa laM'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyang grags tsam du thetsom med/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang dgyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
18b3(rgyud): dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu dga' bar 'gyuro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po gnyis pa// bzlas pas bde
18b4(rgyud): bar 'grub 'gyur bas// don yod rig sngags bla na med/ rig sngags 'chang dang gtam bgyid pas// dus kun rul dri spang bar ba gyi// mkhris pa bad kan snabs dag dang // de bzhin
18b5(rgyud): kun 'jig myur du ni// kha nas lha yi dri dag 'byung // su la tshig da gasdus pa ni// de ni myur du dbang du 'gyur// lha rnams dbang du ma chis pa dang // bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang / 
18b6(rgyud): gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug me// 'jig rten skyong bas ngag dang // zla ba nyi ma nyid dag dang // thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis// 'di ni kha ni mur bgyid na/ 
18b7(rgyud): tshis ldan gyi yi ci la mchis pas tshib ni gsas par 'gyur/ rtag tu mi min dbyangs 'gyur te/ dri ma'i ston ni rnam par spangs tshigs bcang skyong gi grob pa dang / sngon paklags pan
18b8(rgyud): ma mi 'gyur/ tshums 'gyis pas na dang rgya ma kyi 'thor nas pa mtshig tsha gyi pas btug pa dag lagag dang yig dzan rnam par 'jig nod kyi
19a1(rgyud): ngo sha ba dang / brjed byed 'byung po gsang pa ga/ thams cad mod la 'byer 'gyur zhig khas dub tu yang 'grel bar 'gyur/ ri bu lan thogs na ni/ dus kun tu ni ma
19a2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ grub pa myur du thob 'gyur te// thams cad du yang tshe ring 'gyur// tshig mnyen 'jam zhing snyan par 'gyur/ ring bu 'di ni bcang bgyis na// don yod pad+ma dri ma med/ ril bu zhes
19a3(rgyud): bgyi 'grub par 'gyur// oM ma la bi ga te/ pad+ma bi ba re/ skA ra ba ra tsa re swA hA/ a mo g+ha sid+he/ sho d+ha ya hUM/ na ga bus pa'i shun pa dang / u shi ra dang / tsan dan dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / li shi
19a4(rgyud): dang / ka ko la dang / spang spos dang / rgya spos dang / gu gum dang / pra pu na da ri ka dang / e la dgas ma ka dang / u gra dang / su gan+d+hi ka 'di rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te zhing tu
19a5(rgyud): btags nas gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas char pa'i chab dang bsres pas khrus bgyis shing la tshal ba 'am/ che ba dron pos khrus bgyis pa'am/ 'tshal bas
19a6(rgyud): shin tu khrus bgyis da gtsang ma dag pas bag tsha ba ma mchis pa gton pa tsam gyis sngon gyis drag po'i las rnams dang // gdon kun 'joms pa 'grub pa dang / nad kun rnam par nyams
19a7(rgyud): ba dang / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi/ mun pa mi zang spong bar gsungs// thakrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod la ni/ dri ma kun zhi som nyi med// dpal gyis lha yi bzhin du 'bar/ bsod nams
19a8(rgyud): phung po rnam par 'phel/ gzi brjid phung po rtag tu 'bar/ zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// gtsang ma'i lus gyur pa na/ lus ni lha yi bzhin du 'gyur/ mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur/ 
19b1(rgyud): ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur// tshangs par spyod min tshangs spyod 'gyur// thub min thub pa kho nar 'gyur/ tshangs par mi spyod tshangs spyod 'gyur// mgo rtsa gnyer ma spangs pa dang / rtag tu bro nang ma
19b2(rgyud): mchis 'gyur// lus la lha yi dri rnams 'byung // pad+ma kun mud mnyen pa'i lus// sngon gyi dri ni rab spangs te// lA yi tsan dan dri dag ni// mda' rgyang gang du som nyi med// rtag tu bde bar nyal ba dang // 
19b3(rgyud): bde bar yang ni sad par 'gyur// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang / lha min gdug pa log 'dren dang // gdugs pa'i 'gegs kun mthong mi 'gyur// mi bzang dgra rnams kyis kyang min// lus
19b4(rgyud): nyid sbyangs pa bgyis na su// bzlas brjod brtson pa'i sgrub pa bgyi// legs pa'i sgrub pa'i las bgyis na// de nyid bde bar 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' kun// de bzhin
19b5(rgyud): mod la gzigs par 'gyur// lha rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan/ dkyil 'khor gnas pa myur du mchi/ ci 'dod yid la bzlas pa yi// rtag tu don yod grub par 'gyur// thog
19b6(rgyud): mar lus spangs cho ga bgyi// de nas gsang sngags legs pa ra sprad// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma lo ni di ba// driSh+Ta pa ri shud+d+ha/ su ru su ru pad+ma a kli sha b+hu ru b+ha ru sa man+ta bya ba lo ka ni swA hA// ldong ros
19b7(rgyud): gi bang rgya mtsho dbu ba sa ha dza/ ut+pa la sbreng ci lhan cig rang bu 'di bgyis la// gsang sngags sum stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mig sman 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mchog tu
19b8(rgyud): babang nas gsungs// 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin gyis/ kun pas bkrang gis gis 'di mi gnad kun/ 'jom par bgyid da g.yar lam bzang po mi// ming du mi mchi ba nyid
20a1(rgyud): mi 'gyur// ngan par snang dang ngan par blta// nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gtum po 'jog pa gtum po dang // lhag ma sbags pa sgom zhes dang // bza' nyes gnod bsgrings
20a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang // srin po dang ni sdig sbrul dag thams cad nyin dang mtshan dag tu/ mi snang bar ni the tshom med/ mig gi bzang po mthong ba dang // rmi lam bzang po mthong bar 'gyur// zla ba srid du rab
20a3(rgyud): sbyar bas// lha rdzas dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// mig yongasu sbyong ba'o// oM bud d+ha bud d+ha/ bi bud d+ha pad+ma a mo g+ha mu khi/ ba ra ba ra ba ra de swA hA// rig sngags 'dis gi wang la lan stong rtsa brgyad
20a4(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po la na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o// snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po lan
20a5(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas pa rjod bgyid pa'i tshe yang 'di blangs te/ dpral ba'i dbus thig le bgyis te/ thig le lan cig bgyis pas dpral ba'i
20a6(rgyud): d+hang na skar ma'i dbyibs lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro// gdugs pa thams cad dbang 'gyur mchi// gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag dang // srin po bgegs dang log 'dran nyid// thad 'jig
20a7(rgyud): 'gyur tha tshom med/ sems can gdugs pas gdugs sam kyang // phyir zhing bzod par mi nus pas// de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// me la phye ma langab bzhin no// rtag tu rgyal / 
20a8(rgyud): spyi bar lags ldan pa ri sa pa dang / ldan pa che dang mdun pa dzin/ dun mtshigs pas dpang du 'byug/ dge sbyong dang na bram po dag thams pa dang du
20b1(rgyud): bar 'gyu rgyal rigs dmangs rims nyid dag ste// thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur/ mchod pa nan pa'i 'os su 'gyur/ rig sngags la ni thams cad dang // gang dag dkyil 'tshor
20b2(rgyud): gnas pa ste// de dag thams cad dam tshig gi/ rje su sgrub cing skyong bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur srung ba dgyid 'gyur zhing // rtag tu grub pa bla med stsol// thig le 'di bgyi grogs med rgyu ba dang / chom
20b3(rgyud): kun dang ni chom po g.yon can dang // g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa/ kun nas bsgral bar 'gyur te som nyi med// sad+ma stag dang dom dag dang // glang chen khro bo mi
20b4(rgyud): bzang dang // wa dang gdugs bcas srog chag sa dang // so gdugs sbrul kun mgo nas za/ gang dag srogs cha gas gdug par bcas// de dag thams cad nub 'gyur te/ 
20b5(rgyud): nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// ser ba med nga tshig pa dang // char pa mi bzad mtshon chu byed// mkhas pa sa thig le 'chang ba'i lus// khyim rdib pas kyang non mi 'gyur/ 
20b6(rgyud): mkhas pa rig sngags 'chang ba'i don// dzang 'di yis bgyid par 'gyur// shin tu ma grub gsal bar yang // 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis bdag
20b7(rgyud): dran par bgyid cing don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das dam thag tu rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun na bdag mchis nas yid la bsam pa
20b8(rgyud): yong su rdzogs par bgyi'o// thams cad kyi mchog thams cad ji skad gsungs pa bzhin stsal bar bgyi'o// dgos pa zad sgrub par bgyi'o// don yod byung brjes stsal bar bgyi'o// 
21a1(rgyud): bden par dam bcas pas dam tshig rje su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub
21a2(rgyud): bar bgyid na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas rjesu gnang ba de dag thaMd bdag gis stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rig
21a3(rgyud): sngags 'chang sgrub pa dang dral bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gis ma nong so// de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga dang / chog zhib mo sgrub pas gas
21a4(rgyud): sngags dang / phyag rgya sgrub par bgyi ste dgos paded ga thams cad the tshom mchis par 'grub par 'gyuro// de nas gsang sngags bzlas te/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra pra sa ra hUM/ mchod
21a5(rgyud): phyir thogs pa'i skud pa'i gsang sngags te// gzhon mas bkal ba'i skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod gyis nas mdud pa gsum dor bar bgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha
21a6(rgyud): pra ba ra Na/ mu ru mu ri di byA ga shi kaM/ saM b+ha ba tu ta ra ta ra swA hA/ gos kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso// aM a mo g+ha bas+t+ra d+yod k+Shi pA mi bo d+hi ni pad+ma swA hA/ gos bteg pa'i
21a7(rgyud): gsang sngags te lan nyi ku rtsa gcig bzlas// yong pyod ka sa~M b+hU ta a mo g+ha ba ru NA tsa re d+hi k+ShAn cu hUM// khrus kyi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso// oM a mi ta a mo g+ha pad+ma sa
21a8(rgyud): sa ne/ badz+ra ni/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ nyi reg gi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// oM a me b+hi ra~M R+R-i ma~M ku ru ku ru swA swa/ bdag srung bste/ yungs kar dang / chab la lan nyi shu
21b1(rgyud): gcig bzlas nas rang gi lus la dbang bskuraro// oM a mo g+ha sa ma ya/ ma hA pad+me tiSh+Tha tiSh+Thi hU~M/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzla'o// oM san+na tA a mo g+ha ba pa ti ti.A rAk+Shatu
21b2(rgyud): hUM/ slob ma dang grog parjid bsrung bste// thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas dpral bar thog la bgyi'o// oM trai lo kya pad+ma a mo g+ha kra ma ne mi li mi li swA hA/ gam pa dor ba'i sna
21b3(rgyud): tu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// oM pad+me ma hA pad+me sa ra sa ra/ sa mnan pa ri paSh+Ta ya/ a mo g+ha pA she na su ru su ru swA hA/ tshon srung sna lnga la lan bdun bzlas te dkri bar bgyi'o// 
21b4(rgyud): oM bi tsi tra a mo g+ha bstan/ re ga bi shud+d+ha ya/ ki Ni ki Ni sA hA kha dan gyi gris sngags te lan bdun bzla so// oM a mo g+ha sha ra badz+ra tAn+ta tha ra thar swA hA/ mad
21b5(rgyud): gsang sngags te lan mdun bzlas// oM bi bu la a mo g+hA ma hA d+ha ra bi shud+d+he/ si ra~M sa~M ri sA hA/ rta babs kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// su dag der
21b6(rgyud): zhugs nas mtho ris kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyu ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byung bar 'gyuraro// oM nA nA bi tsi ki a mo g+ha puSh+pa/ pha la tra kIr+Na pA ra ya pa ra pa ra hU~M/ dum pa
21b7(rgyud): gang ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas/ oM a mo g+ha rat+na bi ma Na ka Ta tsa/ a dr-iSh+Ta bi pya gran d+ha dza s+pha ra as man+ta nA dz+wa la dz+wa la swa hA/ pog por gyi gsang sngags te lan
21b8(rgyud): bdun bzla'o// oM dz+wal hi/ rat+na g+ha ta/ si ri Ni tu Ti t+ya Ti sA hA/ gtor ma'i snod kyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzla so// oM da~M byA b+ha dza na/ a mo g+ha tsan a mo g+ha pad+ma ba re pU ra ya
22a1(rgyud): hUM/ kham por gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzla'o/ oM a mo g+ha saM pu ra Na dro Na gan+d+ha bi Sha swAH/ thig le'i gsang sngags de lar bdun bzlas// oMs
22a2(rgyud): ra ni sA ra ya/ a mo g+ha b+hu dzA ne mA da na hUM/ ril ba mgrin rings kyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzla so// oM rat+na di pya rat+na kum d+ha ba ti sA ga ra/ saM pU ra Ni swAhA/ dum pa'i gsang sngags te lan
22a3(rgyud): bdun bzla so// oM bi tsi tro dz+wa la n+da na raMg bi b+hak+Sha ya se sho d+ha ya tu Ti swA hA/ mtshon rtsi'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM di bya a wa lo ki ni bi bA dzA ye tu sa mnan su mar
22a4(rgyud): swAhAHlan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so sor dbye bar bgyi'o// oM na nA pra hA ra Na e mo b+ha mu drA dz+wa la~M dz+wa la swA hA// phyag mtshan bri bsnga lan bdun bzlas/ oM a ma
22a5(rgyud): g+ha rat+na su tra d+ha ra ki Ni ki Ni swA hA/ thig skud kyi gas ngasngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyim 'khor ram/ ri mo bri ba'i ras sam// gzhan gzhi ci yang rung
22a6(rgyud): ba la yang gdab par bgyi'o// oM bi pu la ba ra pra be sha ya/ oM mo g+ha pad+me hU~M/ sgo'i cha bye ba'i gsang sngags ste sgo re rer yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso// oM su b+hi b+hak+ti su me ga la dA ra bA ban ti/ 
22a7(rgyud): oM da bye bra dzA ma/ a mo b+ha pA sha na ban bA re gi re bar hU~M saM se brum nu byed bya ba dza ni/ oM mo b+ha bad+ma swA m+ba lan bdun dazlas par bgyi'o// oM bi'i d+ha rU ba n+de bak+Sha ra Na tsal tsal a mo r+tha
22a8(rgyud): tiswAhA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso// oM di bya gan+d+ha nu sa ra Ni oM maM b+ha ba li d+ha ra d+ha ra swA hA/ mchod yin gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM ban+d+ha s+pha ra Ni sa man+ta/ a mo pA pra sUr hUM/ 
22b1(rgyud): dri'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM nir ma la kA ya sho d+ha ni da bya gan+d+ha pra pu ra Ni pU ra ya hU~M/ byug pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM gan+d+ha tsUr+yA pra pU ra Ni/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ dri'i
22b2(rgyud): phye ma'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM sa ma sa man+te na/ bi ma le gan d+ho ta ta re swA hA// bskul ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM di bya gan+d+ha pra pU ra Ni sA ga ra dza la ding
22b3(rgyud): bya a d+hiSh+Thi te ka la sho d+ha ra/ pUr+Na pU ra ya dza ya sid+d+ha swA hA/ bum pa'i dri chab kyi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlaso// oM ra sa swa gra ba ti/ sar+b+ba bi d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi tes
22b4(rgyud): pU ra ya hUM/ gtor ma ro sna tshogs can gyi ga sang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso// oM dib bya b+ho dza na/ saM b+hA ra ya/ bi pu la pra b+he swA hA/ kha zas kyi gas
22b5(rgyud): sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso// oM tri shuk+ka b+ho dza na/ ba la~M bi pU la ra swa gra ba te su ra pra su ra hUM/ bas dkar gsu ma gsum gyi gtor ma 'am/ gtor ma gzhan la yang lan
22b6(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla so// oM pha la ba ti sA ra ba ti dib bya ban s+tha ti/ ta ra ta ra tu ni swA hA// 'bras bu'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas// oM dib bya ku su mod pa la nA nA pUSh+pa pra baR+Sha
22b7(rgyud): ni b+ha ba swA hA/ me tog gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM bi bi d+ha la ta puSh+Ta ba ku na dzi ta ba na swa ti a ha ra saM pUr+Na/ ku b+he swA hA/ me tog gtor ba'i gsang sngags
22b8(rgyud): te lan bdun bzla so// oM ma hA d+ha pa med b+ha pa Ta la sany+tsa dA ya// sa man+ta na hUM swA hA/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla so// oM a tha ra pa Ni dz+wa ladz+wa la/ 
23a1(rgyud): dwe ba mu khe swA hA/ me'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas/ oM bi bi d+ha ma ni kan karat+no dz+wA la pUSh+Ti ma Ni a mo g+ha ma Ni swA hA/ cha zhing brtan pa'i gas
23a2(rgyud): sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM pad+ma ka ri be ma lan kha/ eng gu li/ sa ma saM ma sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ zil mo sbyar ba'i gsung sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla so// 
23a3(rgyud): oM sarba gun pra Na ta/ shri ro ban d+ha nA ya na ma ska ro mi// mi li mi lai tA ri Ni sA hA/ phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM da sha di sha a b+hi ban d+ha na pra sa ra tun+tu/ 
23a4(rgyud): kor ba'i sa sngags te lan gang tu / so \u0f7f su dz+wal tad ni/ dratra lang sgyu bral mo'i gas snga lal nyi shA rtsa gcig brjo/ 
23a5(rgyud): byas mo g+ha bi pu la srab ma d+hu ra ni blo ba ru ten ra Na ra Na hUM/ dril du'i gsang sngags te nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad do// oM rash+mi dz+wa las man+tan a
23a6(rgyud): b+hAs ya ma hA ma Ni rat+na shi kha~M swA hA/ mar me'i gsang sngags te lanin brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o// oM d+hu ru d+hu d+has pa ha ya shrI b+ha dza ba hUM/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te bu gul gyi 'dug pa lan dargya rtsa brgyad brdza
23a7(rgyud): so// oM duSh+pas do bi bo d+hA ni/ sa ma sa ma ya ba ra swAhA/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan ni shu rtsa gcig rje'o// oM bi tsa tri ma Ni bi bu la pra bar ta ni hU~M// dgrang phreng gi bsang sngags te lan
23a8(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlaso/ oM bi tsi trar two dz+wa lo dib bya/ kusum par bu ShA ra ti swa tra me tog phreng ba'i gabang sngags te la na bdun parjo'o// so da ba byamo ci ni a mo g+ha pra ba de/ la rba da'i bya a d+hiSh+Ti
23b1(rgyud): sid+hi shud+d+ha bi lo ki te sAhA/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla so// oM a mo g+ha pad+me sa man ta shu b+ha na ta ra ta ra/ gats+tsha swa b+hA ba na ma swAhA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang
23b2(rgyud): sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso// oM dib bya sa~M pU ra ni/ na ga bi lo ki na hUM// 'khar bsil gyi gsang sngags te nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso// oM pad Ta s+pha ra ni s+pha ra ya/ a mo g+hA bi ta sa man+ta pra
23b3(rgyud): b+hi swAhA/ lhung bzed kyi gsang sngags de lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlaso// oM dur b+ha se s+pha ra bi d+h+ya a tiSh+Thi ta pra sa ra su ra su ra/ ri Shi b+hu dzi ta swAhA/ rtswa gding ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa
23b4(rgyud): gcig bzlas// oM dz+wa la du ma dz+wa la shi khi ri shrI gar b+he swAhA/ sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlaso// oM pa ng+ga naM pad+ma sa na ba ra nA ga b+hu ba ne swA hA/ 'bab chu dang / mtsho'i gsang
23b5(rgyud): sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM kha ga tsa ri Ni ga ma ga ma ya pad pra tsa ri Ni hUM/ len pa'i gsang sngags ta lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlaso// oM sarba tra a mo g+ha b+hai Shi ka ma hAts+tsha Da bi
23b6(rgyud): ma le/ a b+hiShiny+tsa tu mAn// pra ba ra pA Ni b+hA dze pad+ma d+ha dza swA hA// dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyid shu rtsa gcig bzla so// rig sngags 'chang gi gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so
23b7(rgyud): sor cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa ji lta bu bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas cho ga bsgrubs na dgos pa rgya chen po'i 'byor pa'i mthu 'di dag dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa
23b8(rgyud): dang / rin po che'i snod sna tshogs dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyu ro// lha'i me tog dang / gdug dang / ba dan sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyuro// ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi
24a1(rgyud): mchog dang / ro sna tshogs kyi mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyuraro// gtor ma bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyuro// ji tsam de bzhin gshag pa la 'os pa'i
24a2(rgyud): gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyuro// byang chub sems dpa' gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyuro// lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 
24a3(rgyud): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha'i lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams la// so so'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar
24a4(rgyud): 'gyuro// mi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba dang // kha zas kyi mchog ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de lta bas na dge sa pa'i rnams pa thams cad dgyi ba dang / de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i
24a5(rgyud): ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga dang / ga sang sngags sgrub pa rnams bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa tha~Md 'thob par 'gyu ro// gal te rig sngags
24a6(rgyud): 'chang gis yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ste don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying nge 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang / re
24a7(rgyud): thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ yongasu dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya
24a8(rgyud): dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhag pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o// rig sngags
24b1(rgyud): 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar 'gyuraro// de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub pa'i grub pa stsol bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa 'jig rten pa dang / 
24b2(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa'i grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o// shin tu rgya che zhing bag tsha ba ma mchis pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad
24b3(rgyud): par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang dpal stsal bar bgyi'o// 'di la yid gnyis dang so ma nyi bskyed par mi bgyi zhing dngos po gzhan du yang yid la mi bgyi'o// sems can
24b4(rgyud): thaMd la byams pa dang / sI rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o// bu gcig pa bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// 
24b5(rgyud): bden par smra ba dang / bden par dga' ba dang / snyan pa ra smra ba dang snying rje'i lhag par bams pas dmigs nas don yo dpa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas brjod
24b6(rgyud): kyi cho ga bgyi zhing phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang ba zlas par bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtog pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas/ 
24b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rje su dran pa sgom par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o// 'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas mngon
24b8(rgyud): sum du sgom par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la phyag bgyis te mdun du rtsa'i gding ba gting nas skyil mo bkrung bcas te mchis
25a1(rgyud): nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas pa bgyi ste/ 'di ni gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'o// de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o// bdag la don yod pa'i zha
25a2(rgyud): pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub par gyur cig/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byam pa dang / sems can dag pa lag na pad+ma can/ sems can thams cad la byams
25a3(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid can gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po lha min gsang ba pa dang / 'jig
25a4(rgyud): rten skyong dang tshangs pa dang / drag po khyab 'ju ga gzhonu sogs// gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang // drang srong tshogs dang de bzhin du// zla nyi kun bgang gzhon nu dang // de
25a5(rgyud): bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dang // phyag rgya ba cing ba tsam gyis ni// de dag myur du 'du bar 'gyur// sgrol ma bdu na ni 'du bar 'gyur// de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dang // mgrin
25a6(rgyud): sngon de bzhin gos dkar can// de bzhin pad+ma gar gyi dbang // rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid dang ni// lcags sgrogs rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang // lha mo khro gnyer mA ma ki/ dpe med pho nya mo dang ni// 
25a7(rgyud): 'jigs med dpal dang dbyangs can dang // pad+ma ko ti ut+pa la// pad+ma'i so can de bzhin du// ti sa yi ni rtse mo na// 'phrog ma 'byung po'i ma dag dang // de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu// mthu
25a8(rgyud): chen ji bzhin rigs 'dzin dbang // rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin du/ bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig dang // sum bcu gnyis nas lha dag ni// gsang sngags phyag rgya bcings tsam gyis/ de da/ 
25b1(rgyud): thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do// de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs
25b2(rgyud): shing rtag/ tu mchog stsol bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong pa dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzin pa blta 'tshal bar 'gyuro// phyag rgya bcings
25b3(rgyud): pa tsam gyis na// bram ze'i cha lugs don yod zhags// mthong bar 'gyur te som nyid med// mgrin sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang // de bzhin rgya mtsho'i glong dang ni// mgon po'i zhal ni bcu
25b4(rgyud): gcig dang // de bzhin zhal ni bzhi dag dang // mgon po 'jigs pa brgya 'phrog dang // de bzhin gzigs pa bsam mi khyab/ rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting
25b5(rgyud): 'dzin// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ ma gon pos zed ston par mdzad/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten kha mas// rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od bag med// byang chub sems dpa'i
25b6(rgyud): tshogs bskor ba// mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas zhing ni stong dag gi/ chu bo gang ga'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum bye ba
25b7(rgyud): brgya phrag stong / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs bskor mgon// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba chen po'i rnam par gzhan mthong ste// nyin
25b8(rgyud): gcig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang // chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje'i gdan// de dag rmi lam snang ba mthong 'gyur bas// de la yid gnyis som nyi the tshom med// sangs rgyas rnams kyi
26a1(rgyud): gshung ba'am mtshanas lnga// mgon po che la gdug sems nyid dang ni// byang chub sems dpa' bar chad 'phags pa la/ kha zer nyid dang dam chos smra ba dang / rgyal bas
26a2(rgyud): gsungs spongs mnar med gzhol ba dang // mi bzad dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang // bskal pa 'bum po thaMd skad cig grol// phyag rgya gsang sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis sam// thos sam mtho
26a3(rgyud): ngam ming ni bzung bas kyang / sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyid med// don yod zhags snying phyag rgya mthong ba yang // 'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag
26a4(rgyud): stong dang gang ga yi// bye ma brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// byang chub snying por gtogs pa thaMd dang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar mtshungs// don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya
26a5(rgyud): dang // gsang sngags mthong nas bsod nams phu nga chen gyis// bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur// / de'i tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de ni dpag tu med pa
26a6(rgyud): so nyi med// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur nas// gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas ni thog mar yang // yo byad sgrub pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang / rtag tu yan lag spos ni sna tshogs dang // sna
26a7(rgyud): tshogs bdug pas rab tu bdugs bgyis shing // dpung pa lag pa lha'i spos kyis byug/ gtsang ma'i sa phyogs gtsang mar ldan pa shams par// skyil mo drangasas nas ni byams sems dang / snying
26a8(rgyud): rje'i lhag bsam de nyid mnyam gzhag nas// phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // rtag tu 'jig rten dbang la phyag bgyi zhing // rtag tu bla ma mchod nas chos la
26b1(rgyud): brtson// shin tu rig pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar/ shin tu rig pas srung ba'i cho ga bgyi// shin tu bkra gis bla ma de nyid gus// bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang // sems can kun pa
26b2(rgyud): snying rje'i bdag nyid can// lhan cig rjes 'thun gyur nas de nas ni// phyag rgya 'di bcings par bgyi ste/ lag pa pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings te mthe'u chung zla ba'i
26b3(rgyud): tshul du snying kar bzhag go// phyag rgya 'di ni don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du stsol bar bgyid do// mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i
26b4(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo g+ha bi ku ra ba ti// sa man+ta a wa lo ka ya na mas+t+rai ya d+hA/ a d+hiSh+Thi ta a mo g+ha pa d+he tsa ra sany+tsar hUM hUM// de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par
26b5(rgyud): blta ba don yod pa'i rgyal po pad+ma 'bar ba ga la ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal pos na/ na tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dus gsum du gshegs
26b6(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha' dag cher g.yos par 'gyuraro// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs
26b7(rgyud): 'bum phrag rgya stong du ma dag byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thad rab tu dgyes shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen pos phyag gser gyi khri dag lta bu brkyang nas
26b8(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyuraro// grub pa dam pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa stsol bar 'gyuraro// dbang phyug dang // dbang
27a1(rgyud): phyug chen po dang tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / gshin rje dang / rga lnga dang / lus ngan dang / khyab bdag dang / kun bged gnon nu la sogs pa lha rnams srung ba dang / 
27a2(rgyud): skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyuro// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thang dang / 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang / chad pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar 'gyuro// de'i
27a3(rgyud): grub pa yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad gyid pa'i phyag rgya thad du mchog lags par grags pa lag so// don yod dam tshig mchog grags pa/ pad+ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing // mdzub
27a4(rgyud): mo gung mo rnams pad+ma lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyid la sen mo'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstan te rnam pa ra grol ba'i dkyil 'khor brtse ba'i phyag rgya
27a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod de/ oM a mo g+ha pad+me ku sha sa ma yA na/ g+h+raMh+na gr-I h+na d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA satwa hUM/ phyag rgya ba tshangs te bcings ma thag tu 'am/ gzung ba tsam
27a6(rgyud): gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thaMd kyi leg so// zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thad dgyes pa dang / mnyes pa dang / 
27a7(rgyud): rab tu dgyes pa dang / tshim pa dang / thugs dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i snying po grub pa dam pa stsol bar 'gyur zhing / yang nas yang
27a8(rgyud): du mthong ba stsol bar 'gyuraro// mchog zad stsol bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa stsol bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
27b1(rgyud): zhib mo phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig gi rje su 'jug par 'gyuraro// thams cad du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
27b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// thams cad dgos pa'i gsang sngags grub par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras
27b3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu balnga 'tshal bar 'gyuro// lag mthil pad+ma ltar bgyis la 'dzum mo gung mo rdo rje ltar bgyi zhing mthe'u chung brkyang ba'i phyag rgya ni/ pad+ma 'chang la
27b4(rgyud): bdug pa dang // me tog la sogs dri rnams dang // phreng ba byug pa phye ma dang // ba dan gos dang rgyan dang ni// gtor ma mchod yon rab tu dbul// bum pa gang ba'i dri srog dang // tshen srung sna
27b5(rgyud): lnga chen po'o// gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la/ phyag rgya 'di ni kun la mchog 'di ni dbul ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// zad du ni don yod mchog/ go bar bgyid pa'i phyag rgya
27b6(rgyud): maM/ pad+ma'i phyag gis byin gyis brlabs// gung mor nor bu dkris pa lta bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni bag tsha ba med pa'i pad+ma rin po che'i phyag rgya lag te 'di ni grub pa dam pa lag so// spyan drang ba
27b7(rgyud): gsang sngags ni// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ma hA satwa a ya hu mi ha ma N+Da le/ bi ri bau ri pad+ma b+hu dza swA hA/ dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags te// byang
27b8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thaMd dang // phyag na pad+ma gsol gdab dgug lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams dgug/ phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// phyogs bcu kun gyi
28a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang 'du/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za lha min de bzhin du// na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// lte 'phye chen po
28a2(rgyud): zhing dag ste/ de kun skad cig 'du 'gyur zhing / srung ba'i phyir ni soma'i med// lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag la/ lag pa'i mthe'u chung rnams bad+ma'i mtshams bya ste/ gung ma rnams yid
28a3(rgyud): tsam bskum pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni// grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcings dang // dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyi ba yi// srung ba'i las las bag tsha med// phyag rgya 'di ni bcing tsam dang / 
28a4(rgyud): gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis// dpag tshad bdun ni khor yug tu// mtshams bcing dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / srung ba'i las ni bgyis par 'gyuraro// oM a me
28a5(rgyud): g+ha badz+ra dr-i D+ha pad+ma ban d+ha sa man+ta na ma hA sa man+ta rak+Shan+tu mAM ts+yai ru tsu ru hUM paT// de nas don yod phyag rgya ste// grub ldan son kun smra na// don yod pa yid phyag rgya ni/ khyad par
28a6(rgyud): 'phags pa gzhan yang bstan// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sor mo rnams mnyam par gzhag ste/ srin lag kha gdeng la sor mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa ni// don yod sna tshogs rgyal po
28a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i phyag rgya chen por bsgrags// phyag rgya 'di ni las kun dang // 'jug pa'i las kun sbyar ba dang // dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs// phyag rgya 'di ni bzung tsam dang // gsang sngags
28a8(rgyud): dam pa srung bgyis na// rig sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa rnam thar pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa grub par 'gyur// oM badz+ra badz+re/ a d+hiSh+Thi ta pad+ma bi shwa rA
28b1(rgyud): pad+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ pra be sha tu s+t+rai yad+ha nu ga tan d+hi ri tA Ti swA hA// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam drug tu// g.yo bar 'gyur bar
28b2(rgyud): som nyi mad// phyag na pad+ma'i lus 'bar nas// mgu ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin gyis// rtag tu lta zhing mdun na mchis// sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang
28b3(rgyud): mtho ris sgo rnams 'byed par 'gyur// sum bcu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na// gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing // sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas sgo na// gnas pa thaMd sgo 'bya// bde chen 'jig
28b4(rgyud): rten khams ngag ni// sgo na gnas pa sgre 'bye'o// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// gnas kun tu ni 'jug par 'gyur// phyag rgya sdigs pa tha~Md 'phrog nye ba'i nyon mongs tha~Md 'joms/ 
28b5(rgyud): sngags bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gnod pa dzad 'jigs par bgyid// dmyal ba bcu drug rnams las thar// phyag rgya bkyi ngas pa tsam gyis ni// mi bzad 'jigs pa brgyad rnas
28b6(rgyud): dang // nyes byas tha~Md 'jigs par bgyid// dmyal ba'i sgo ni gcad par 'gyur// mi bzad 'jigs las bsgral bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis// mtshams med lnga ni bgyis pa dang // sdig
28b7(rgyud): ba kun las rnam par thar/ sems can kun la rtag tu sdug de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rjeg phyag rgya 'di nyid mthe bo'i rtse mo cung zad bkug la bzung ste/ gung mo pad+ma'i ral pa'i tshul du
28b8(rgyud): te/ spyi bor ral pa sa la bzhag pa ni pad+ma'i ral pa'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni den yod pa'i lag pa zhes bsgrags te/ sems can thaMd la sman pa'i slad du gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi
29a1(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha pad+mo dza le bi sho d+ha ya hU~M/ bi ri bi ri bi ma le swA hA/ phyag rgya spyi bor banag nas chab bdag gis/ dkrus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad
29a2(rgyud): du bzlas nas// phyag rgya gsang sngags dogs med pas// rtag tu bkrus pa'i mos tsam gyis// mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur// mi gtsang spyod pa gtsang ba dang // tshangs spyod ma yin tshangs spyod
29a3(rgyud): 'gyur// mi thub pas ni thub par 'gyur// bsod nams phung pos lha bzhin 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// 'jig rten kun snying rtag tu sdug/ gsang sngags bla na med pa 'grub/ grub pa don
29a4(rgyud): yod zhags pa yi// don meng de nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ lha rnams kun ni 'du 'gyur te// srung ba'i phyir ni som nyid med// ma gon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// sems pa mchog sbyin dag
29a5(rgyud): pa'o// mchog sbyin rgyun tu zad du// nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing // tshe 'phel rtag tu nad med 'gyur// de bzhin mthu/ dang rgyas par 'gyur// thams cad du ni las 'grub ste// gnod pa kun
29a6(rgyud): las rnam par grol// sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// thad du ni bkra shis mchog khrus kyi rnam pa 'di dag ni// don yod khrus kyi mchog yi no// lag gnyis bsdams la 'og tu bstan// srin lag
29a7(rgyud): gnyis yid tsam bskus pa ni pad+ma'i nor bu phyag rgya lags te/ kun nas kyang ni mnyam par gzhag phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta bu 'di/ skyil mo krung bcas mchis na susaphyag rgya 'di dag bcings
