29a8(rgyud): bgyis zhing / mnyam par bzhag nas gsang sngags bzlas// bcing ba tsam gyis mod nas ni/ skyil krung rdo rje lhun ma rnam 'gyur// kun nas go char gyur nas ni// bgags dang log 'dren tshwa
29b1(rgyud): dang // gnod sbyin srin po 'byung por bcas// lha min mkha' lding gis mi mthong // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams dag tu// de dag thams cad rgyang ring 'bros// bgegs med par ni las
29b2(rgyud): 'grub pas// bzlas pa'i las la som nyid med// oM a mo g+ha badz+ra dri D+ha pad+me shwa ra hUM// thal mo mnyam par sbyar la mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug nas mthe bong pad+ma kha phye ba ltar bgyi ste// don yod
29b3(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gsang sngags dang phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// oM pad+me shwa ra a mo g+ha ba ra da/ b+hi ri b+hi ri swA hA/ 
29b4(rgyud): 'dis thog mar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig dgyi'o// de'i 'og tu phyag brgya bcings nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid sems dpa'i bsam pa rtse gcig pas bzlas brjod
29b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// lan cig bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la du sa gsum du rgyun du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phra ga brgya stong pa d+ma'i klung bya ma dang mnyam pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / 
29b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang de la leg so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyuraro// dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// rig snga
29b7(rgyud): 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtong bar mdzad// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la mdun du man+di pA 'gyuro// 'di ltar bcings pa tsam
29b8(rgyud): gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad dang ldan par 'gyuro// de bzhin gshegs
30a1(rgyud): pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyu ro// mi 'jig pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// phyag rgya 'di
30a2(rgyud): bcings la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la yon tan dang phan yon rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcing
30a3(rgyud): nas zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi
30a4(rgyud): bstsol te/ rig sngags 'chang lag so legs/ 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi dam pa yi no zhes dpung ba g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bar bzhag nas dbugs 'byin
30a5(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ tshur shog pu gang 'dod pa'i mtsho ga slongs shig dang sbyin no// khyod rje su bzung zhing byin gyis bsla sa pas/ nga'i bu rig sngags 'chang gi thu bor gyur cig rig sngags
30a6(rgyud): 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub pas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par dbye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po la brtan par gyis shig/ snying rje chen
30a7(rgyud): sems kyis sems can thaMd la goms par gyis shig khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bded can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing khyod pad+ma'i nang du
30a8(rgyud): te skyes nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing mtshan dang dpe byas kyis rab tu brgyan pa byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe dpag tu med par 'gyuraro// 'di ltar tshig gzhan mi smra bar yin
30b1(rgyud): sdong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ phyag rgya rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings pas/ lan stong rtsa brgyad tshangs nas na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyu ro// don yod pa'i rnam
30b2(rgyud): par 'phral pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyu ro// rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongasu bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe dpag tu ma mchis
30b3(rgyud): par 'gyur// don yod rgya cher snang ba zhes bgyis pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyuraro// rdzu 'phrul gang gi mthus steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu dpung pa bskum pa las
30b4(rgyud): brkyang ba tsam gyis mtsho zhing slar ldog par 'gyu ro/ bzlas brjod brgya stong bgyis la phyag rgya brgya stong bcings na tshe 'di nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra
30b5(rgyud): bar 'gyu ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa'i don yod pa'i mig yongasasu dag pa 'thob par 'gyu ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i
30b6(rgyud): du dang / drag po dang / dbang po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gno nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan la sogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyuro// klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa snga che
30b7(rgyud): kyi bar du mthong bar 'gyuraro// ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar gyur pa de lta de lta bu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bzlas brjod sgrub pa 'bum la
30b8(rgyud): 'dum bzlas pas 'jog rten las 'das pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thaMd na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du snang ba'ang mthong bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin bcu
31a1(rgyud): pa thams cad la lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du phyir mi ldog par byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// phyag rgya bcings te sgri
31a2(rgyud): mo krung bcas nas sems can thaMd la rtse ba dang / 'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po lan gcig bzlas brjod
31a3(rgyud): bgyi'o// zlas brjod bgyis ma thag kho nar lan drug brgya bani bcur bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dran pa dang / blo gros
31a4(rgyud): dang / gzi brjid lus la 'jug par bgyid// zlas brjod bgyid pa tsam gyis mod la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par 'gyur/  mo'i sku gzugs de la yang 'od zer
31a5(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzu gas dbang phyug yongasu dag pa'i bdag nyid rmi lam du mtho nga bar 'gyuraro// mchog zeng stsol bar 'gyuraro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa
31a6(rgyud): thams cad yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thaMd yongasu gsal ba dang gtugs par 'gyuraro// nad thams cad spangs par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa rnams
31a7(rgyud): kyi dam pa thed 'grub par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa sgom par bgyi'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhag pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po gsum pa/ 
31a8(rgyud): thal mo lhan cig bsdams te sbyar la rtse mo yid tsam bkug ste khar gtad la/ srin lag gnyis phyir 'gyed cing gung mo pad+ma lta bur bgyis te sngags 'di brjod do// oM tu ru tu ru
31b1(rgyud): pad+me a mo g+ha si d+hi hUM/ phyag rgya 'di ni don yod grug las rnams grub dang ldan pa yi// 'di ni bcing ba bgyis pa yis// kun rig myur du 'grub par 'gyur// myur du ston pa stsol 'gyur te// rlud da/ 
31b2(rgyud): don yod grub pa mchog mchog kun rab tu stobs par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das te 'jig rten ga/ sgrib pa thaMd las ni rnam par grol// bsod nams phung po dag ni rtag tu 'phel// bkra shis
31b3(rgyud): sgra ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// lha rnams rtag tu srung bar 'gyur// rdo rje bcing ba shin tu bcing // rtag tu sems ni bstan por bgyi// mdzub mo dag ni yid bskums nas// snying kha dag tu rab tu brkya / 
31b4(rgyud): don yod pa'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / snying po gsungs pa dang / pad+ma'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya las dang don thams cad grub pa'i gsang sngags de dag gsungs nas de nas don yod
31b5(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ oM a mo g+ha hri da ya/ pad+ma d+ha ra d+har pad+ma d+ha ra mahA maN+Da la sr-id ya hUM/ snying po phyag rgyaladi ni bcings pa yi// pad+ma 'chang ba'i don yod snying po yi// grub
31b6(rgyud): ba de nyid yang dag som nyi med// thad du ni las rnams thaMd dag/ de ni grub par 'gyur te som nyid med// shin tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzung // shin tu gsang ba'i gsang sngags bzlas// shin tu
31b7(rgyud): bkrus pas gotsang mgo/ gtsang ma'i sems kyis 'chang bgyid cing // sems can kun la brtser gyur nas// rtag tu bla ma gus par sgom// rtag tu shin tu dang bgyi zhing // pad+ma'i phyag la dga' ba
31b8(rgyud): bgyi/ myur du las 'grub myur du ni// pad+ma'i 'chang dang sangs rgyas 'thog myur du 'jig rten dbang phyug 'thog/ myur du sems can kun phan ldan// lag pa g.yon pa tsam gyis khar pad+ma'i tshul
32a1(rgyud): du bzhag la lag bsgyur nas mdzub mo gyen du sbeng // mthe bong yid tsam pa bkug la lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ sor mo rnams pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la mthe bong yid
32a2(rgyud): tsam bkug ste/ gung mo don yod pa'i zhags pa bgyi ba ni don yod pa'i zhi ba'i cho ga chen po'i mig sems can thaMd la byams pa'i sems dang // snying rje'i bdag nyid can lags te/ gas
32a3(rgyud): sngags 'di brjod do// oM pa shu pa ti pA shwa d+ha ra sa ha sra rakli pra ti ma Na Di ta kA ya/ A ka ri Sha ni/ sany+tso da ni/ b+hu ru b+hu ru// a mo g+ha pA sha sid d+hi hU~M// phyag rgya 'dis gsang sngags lan nyi tu/ 
32a4(rgyud): rtsa gcig bzlaso// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas nas lag pa galba ba zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bdeg cing slar yang rang gi gnas bzung zhing gsang sngags
32a5(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas te/ lan bdun du yang bdeg go/ don yod rgyal po bzlas pa ni// bsam pa mchog tu dag pas pa gyi// bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la ni// den yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya / 
32a6(rgyud): byang chub thad dgug pa dang // mod la sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dag/ ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin// mod la grub pa bla med dang // mod la thad dgug par 'gyur// 
32a7(rgyud): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za lha min na mkha' lding / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rig sngags 'chang la blta ba'i phyir// thad de yi mod la 'du// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyudad dag/ de nyid
32a8(rgyud): gzigs pas gzigs par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gyi'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' 'du bar 'gyur// mgon po 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs// mchog sbyin spyi bor phyag 'jog 'gyur
32b1(rgyud): yongasu dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ rang bzhin mod la ston par mdzad// gang dag mnar med song ba dang // sems can mtshams med lnga bgyid dang / gang dag 'phags la skur 'debs dang / gang dag pas
32b2(rgyud): chos spong ba dang / phyag rgya 'di mthong 'dzin bcug dang // bcing bas mod la sdig pa kun// 'jig 'gyur mod la 'dren pa mthong // phyag rgya bcing pa tsam gyis ni// dgos pa thad 'grub par 'gyur/ 
32b3(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam dang // gsang sngags bzlog par bgyid pa dang // rig sngags 'chang ba mthong ba de// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// mngon du mthong bar blta bar bya// tshe rabs
32b4(rgyud): brgyud par bskal pa ni// brgya dang stong du bsags pa yi// sdig pa las kyi sgrib pa rnams// phyag rgya bcings sam mthong ba tsam gyis// de kun 'byung 'gyur som nyi med// thal mo lhan cig da
32b5(rgyud): du sbyar te/ mkhas pas pad+ma'i tshul du bgyis lam dzub mo nor bu bgyis te/ gung mo yod tsam zhig bkug pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ste/ lag
32b6(rgyud): baspyi bor brkyang nas spyi bor dbang bskur ba stsol ba'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM s+yA d+ha nu ga ta/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu/ sarba s+yA d+ha/ a b+hi She kaM/ pad+ma ma Ni su pad+ma/ a mo g+he sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te hU~M/ 2nga
32b7(rgyud): dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang lang bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyuro// 'phags pa spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug gis dbang bskur bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi rgya
32b8(rgyud): po chen por 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang zad 'grub par 'gyuraro// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig po'i gan su 'gyuraro// sgra
33a1(rgyud): gtsug rdo rje pad+ma cing/ rtag tu sor mo'i rtse mo brkyang / mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du daN+DI/ rang gi gdong gis khro gcer bzhin// khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// las kun sgrub par
33a2(rgyud): bgyid pa yi// wad sgrub bgyid phyag rgya ste/ kun bsgrub dam pas gsang sngags pas// 'di dran grub pa kun gyi mchog/ oM kro d+ha rA dzA d+ha mA mahA a mo g+ha ha na ha na/ sarba duSh+TAn hUM/ phyag rgya 'ang dran tsam
33a3(rgyud): gyis kyang // mthu chen po yi gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa kun ni rnams 'jig ste// ri rab kyang ni snyil bar bgyid// phyag rgya bcing bar bgyid pa yis// sdig pa thams cad 'jog par bgyid// samra
33a4(rgyud): can gdug dang gdug pa'i klu// bgegs dang log 'dren bdug pa ste// de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyurar// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// zad dbang du gyur nas
33a5(rgyud): mchis/ lha dang mi dang dge sbyong dang / bram ze rgyal rigs gang lags pa// thams cad dbang du gyur nas no// mchis par 'gyur bar som nyi med/ rgyud ni rtag tu mnyam
33a6(rgyud): gzhag la// mthe bong mnyam du bteg nas ni// gung mo yis ni gung mo nyid// yid tsam bkug nas sgreng bar bgyi// 'di ni pad+ma chen po yi// lha mo sgrol ma'i phyag rgya ste// grub pa bla na med pa yi// 
33a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi ni dam pa lags// thal mo pad+ma'i tshul du sbyar// mthe bong nyid ni brkyang bgyis la/ mthe'u chung yid tsam bkug pa ni// dkar sham chen mo'i phyag rgya ste// 'di ni kun grub bla na med// 
33a8(rgyud): rdo rje'i tshul du thal sbyar dam bcings shing // shes rab can gyis g.yas pa'i lag bsgyur la// khro gnyer bzhin ni de bzhin khro ba dang / phyag rgya chen po kun 'dod rab tu sbyin// lag pa gnyis
33b1(rgyud): kyis thal sbyar brkyang nas ni// gsang ba de brkyang gung mo bskum nasu// mthe chung brkyang nas lcags sgrog pad+ma yi// tshul du snying ka'i gnasu bzhag par bgyi// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya me// phyag rgya 'di
33b2(rgyud): ni bcings pa yis// dkyil 'khor kun nas lha dag dang // dkyil 'khor lha kun dga' bar 'gyur// thad tshogs shing 'du ba dang // kun gyis srung bgyid som nyid med// phyag rgya 'di nyid bshig nas
33b3(rgyud): lag pa ni// thal sbyar pad+ma'i tshul bzhin du byas te// snying kar bzhag pa gnod sbyin pho nya mo// 'di ni phyag rgya lag par lag par bsgrags// dang po rdo rje khu tshur legs bcings la// gung mo
33b4(rgyud): lhag ma bskums zhing mthe bong bzhag/ pad+ma'i tshul gyi bzhin dran sgrol mdun gyi// grub pa kun gyi bla med phyag rgya 'di// sdig pa thams cad 'jig cing nyon mongs kun// nad kun
33b5(rgyud): nye bar zhi bar som nyi med// don yod pa'i 'a grub pa bla na med kyis// cho ga zhib mo thaMd rab tu 'grub// la ga ba gnyis ni mnyam gzhag ste/ rdo rje'i tshul du pad+ma bcing // 
33b6(rgyud): mdzub mo bskum pa bgyis nas ni// mthe bong yang ni dgug par bgyi// 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste// cho ga zhib mo'i pad+ma lags// pad+ma'i tshul du thal mo sbyar// mdzub mos mkhyud la gung
33b7(rgyud): mo ni// lcags kyu'i tshul du spang bar bgyi// don yod zhag phyag rgya 'di// rgya mtsho'i klong gi kha lta bur/ rdo rje thas kyi gsungs// 'di ni las kun bgyid pa'o// grub pa kun gyi bla na med/ 
33b8(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di ni mdzub mo'i mthe bong gnyis// lcag sgrog lhag ma bskum nas pad+ma'i tshul// snying ka'i gnasu bzhag pa mgrin sngon gyi// 'di ni dogs med las kun phyag rgya lags/ lag
34a1(rgyud): banyis pad+ma'i khu tshur te// g.yas g.yor du ni bzhag nasu/ kun nas zhi ba'i bzhin du bzhag byams pa'i mig gnyis bgyi ba ni// zhal ni bcu gcig phyag rgya
34a2(rgyud): ste/ de bzhin kun gyis mi thub pa'o// mthe bong mnyam par mnyam gyis la// sor mo'i rtse mo bskums pa dang // mdzub mo gnyis ni pad+ma'i tshul// rig pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya las// phyag
34a3(rgyud): rgya 'di nyid dbusu ni// 'khor lo'i tshul du mdzub mo bskum// g.yon pa brkyang ba dbang chen gyi// phyag rgya 'byung po tha~Md 'joms// lcags sgrog dam du bgyis nas ni// lag pa gnyis
34a4(rgyud): po brkyang nas kyang // snying dkar bzhag pa'i phyag rgya ste// 'di ni rgyun tu gshin rje lags// lag pa gam nA pa brkyang na su// sor mo sgrib pa'i thor to dgugs// g.yas
34a5(rgyud): ba snying kar bzhag na su// mthe bong dang ni mtha chung dgug/ lhag ma rnams ni brkyang bgyis te// 'di ni chu lha'i phyag rgya ste/ klu kun dgug pa'i mchog lag so// 2
34a6(rgyud): ba gnyis ni bsdams bgyis la// sor mo phying ga log tu sbrel// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa dag snying ka'i gnasu bzhag bgyi ste// phyag rgya 'di ni lus ngan gyi// gnod sbyin zad skrag par bgyid/ 
34a7(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor yang / mthe bong mdzub mo dgug bgyis la// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nasu// mdzub mo gyen du sbyang ba ni// 'di ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste// thid du ni las sgrub pa'o// 
34a8(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid g.yas pa yi// mthe chung sor mo dgugs bgyis te// drang srong tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'di// lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa'o// lag pa gnyis ni dam bcings la// blta sdug lan
34b1(rgyud): lo'i phyag rgya ste// lha min tha~Md dgugs pa yi// khyab 'jug phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// g.yas pa bI dza bu rar bgyi// g.yon pa rtsa gsum tshul du bgyi// mthe bong mthe chung bskums
34b2(rgyud): pa ni// 'byung po thaMd skrag bgyid pa// 'di ni drag po'i phyag rgyar gsungs// g.yas pa kha tshur bcings nas// mdzub mo brkyang nas g.yon pa ni// bkur bstan khu tshur bcings
34b3(rgyud): nas bzhag// sor mo rnams ni brkyang bar bgyi// drag po rgyun tu blta bgyid pa// de bzhin lha yi sde dpon gyi// gzhon nu phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// gyen du lag pa gnyis sbrang
34b4(rgyud): nas// sor mo gsum ni brkyang 'gyis te// ma the bong mdzub mo bkug pa ni// 'od zer stong dag 'phro bgyid pa// 'di ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya lags// phyag rgya 'di nyid sor mo
34b5(rgyud): gsum// bkug nas sor mo gnyis gnyis brkyang // skar ma'i tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa// 'di ni zla ba 'i phyag rgyar gsungs// gsang sngags chen po phyag rgya 'di dag ni// 
34b6(rgyud): las dang don kun grub pa sgrub par bgyid// sdig pa thaMd spong zhing nyon mongs kun// nyams par bgyid bcing sgrib pa thad 'byung // las kun zad par bgyid cing don yod pa'i// las sgrub
34b7(rgyud): don yod 'grub pa 'grub par 'gyur// oM pad+ma d+hA ra tA ra ya pad+ma b+hu dze hU~M/ oM mahA pad+me shwe te ge hu ru hu ru swA hA/ oM b+h+ri ku Ti pad+ma ta rA ta ra hU~M/ oM pad+me pAN+Da ra bA si ni kuN+Ta kAN+Da
34b8(rgyud): swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ba ra de sid+hi sid+d+hiM tu hU~M/ oM sarba tra ga mi no a b+ha ya/ ro dri Ni hU~M/ oM a mo g+ha na tA re tA ra ya pad+me b+hu dza hUM/ oM dA ru ta ru la pad+me a mo g+ha hUM/ oM ba Na
35a1(rgyud): ba mu khe ni krin ta la duSh+TAn hUM/ oM pad+me nI la krat+te shwar d+hu ru d+hu ru/ oM so mya bdu ne pra sing shu sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+re shwa ra sI d+ha ya hUM/ oM a mo g+he
35a2(rgyud): shwa ra hUM/ oM sa ma ri ta re ta re hUM/ oM nA ga pad+ma na~M hUM/ oM yak+Sha d+hi pa ti mu ru mu ru hUM/ oM a mo g+he brah+ma ra te hUM/ oM shi ra~M ba ra de a ma~M g+ha b+hu dze hUM/ oM a mo g+ha rA dza pad+ma nA b+he/ 
35a3(rgyud): sa ra sa ra sa man+ta b+hu dze swA hA/ oM ru dra ru Di mi li mi li swA hA/ oM rib ka ti d+ha re a mo g+ha ba ti swAhA/ oM sa ha sra ki ra Na hUM ru ti swA hA/ oM so ma pra b+he hU~M/ de bzhin phyag rgya gsang ba yang
35a4(rgyud): phyag rgya tha dad gsang sngags tha dad sgru ba// gsang sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i las// rtag tu kun gyis ma dor na dzad bgyid// gtsang ma spyod pa gtsang ma
35a5(rgyud): dag/ lags bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas// dri zhim dri yis dpung pa dang // lag pa yan lag byugs nasu/ phyag rgya lan re bcings pa na// gsang sngags
35a6(rgyud): lan re bzlas par bgyi// phyag rgya dag ni bcings pa dang // gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mod la ni// brgya stong phrag ni 'bum phrag 'bum// phyag rgya dag ni bcings par 'gyur// phyag
35a7(rgyud): rgya bcings pa bgyis pa na bsod nams kyi phung bache po ldan par 'gyuro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyis lung bstan pa dang // byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// / 
35a8(rgyud): lha tha~Md kyis legs par bsrungs par 'gyu ro// 'jig rten tha~Md kyi mchod nas gcig pur 'gyuraro// 'jig rten thad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyu ro// dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i tshe
35b1(rgyud): ga'i rim par phye ba dang // dam tshigs thams cad la zhugs par 'gyuraro// tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i rig sngags grub par 'gyuraro// tshig btsan par 'gyuraro// 
35b2(rgyud): dran pa dang blo gros bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyuraro// blo gros thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu lha 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// 
35b3(rgyud): rtag tu dam pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang // gdug pa dang // rab tu bdug pa thams cad pham par bgyis par 'gyur ro// rtag tu thaMd
35b4(rgyud): tu rgyal bar 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang // 'bru nga bo dang / sha za dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ 
35b5(rgyud): 'phags pa chen po thaMd la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'a gyuro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bca sa pa thaMd dbang du gyur nas mchis par
35b6(rgyud): 'gyuro// zad gtso bo gcig pur 'gyu ro// thad du bla ma'i gnas gcig pur 'gyuro// tshe ring bar 'gyuraro// nad thaMd las thar bar 'gyuraro// skyon gyi dri ma dang / ser sna dang / phrag
35b7(rgyud): dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// leg par dran zhing lus shin tu yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// 
35b8(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing de dag tha~Md kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song shig
36a1(rgyud): ces shin tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyu ro// dmyal ba'i sgo thad bcad par 'gyuraro// ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad las yongasu grol
36a2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// 'di nas ma 'ong ba'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyuraro// skye ba na rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// thams cad du pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyu ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi
36a3(rgyud): zhing du mchi bar 'gyuraro// de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug sprul pa yi// phyag rgya'i rtags ni brjod par bgyid// khru gang kho na'i tshad dag gi/ dkyil 'khor lham gyis bri bar bgyi// gang zhig
36a4(rgyud): mthong ba'i modado tsam gyis/ dga' ba dang ni mgu bar 'gyur/ sdig pa kun las grol ba dang / de nyid dag ni 'grub 'gyuraro// rgyun tu gang gis go cha yis// rtag tu go cha bgos par
36a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ go cha'i go ni 'bar ba dang // mdzes pa rtag tu / la bar 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo legs grub ste// gsang sngags bla med thaMd 'grub/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris tsam
36a6(rgyud): gyis// gnod sbyin srin po 'byer bar 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis don kun kyang // 'jig par 'gyur te som nyi med// gnod pa kun las grol 'gyur te// nad kun las kyang de bzhin no// pha rol
36a7(rgyud): dpung ngam ring dpung ngam// mi thub pa'i dgra kun las// rtag tu legs par rgyal bar 'gyur// rtag tu gdon las srung ba dang / dus kun tu yang 'grub par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang rnams
36a8(rgyud): bde bgyi'i phyir// de nyid dam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma mtshon cha dag/ dgos pa kun gyi rjes 'thun par// gang dang gang du bkod pa
36b1(rgyud): dag/ de dang der ni phyag rgyar 'gyur// pad+ma kha bye zhes bgyi ba// pad+ma mda' mas mdzes pa dang // kun nas 'khor ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng // rnam par rtog pa med par bgyi/ phyag rgya 'di kun
36b2(rgyud): srog las byung // 'di nas thams cad 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje rtse gsum rdo rje'i mda'// dkyil 'khor pad+ma rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje'i mtshan// pad+ma rab gnas pad+ma gnyis// rtag tu pad+ma la
36b3(rgyud): par bgyid// pad+ma'i khu tshur de bzhin du// pad+ma'i mdzub mo pad+ma'i lcags kyus thal mo sbyar/ pad+ma'i lcags sgrogs pad+ma'i gzab// rtag tu pad+ma sems pa dang / nor bu pad+ma rdo rjer gsungs// don yod
36b4(rgyud): pad+ma de bzhin du// pad+ma'i ral gri pad+ma'i dril/ rtsa gsum zhes kyi gtun shing 'chang // nor bu dbyug pa me tog dbyug/ de bzhin zhags pa gtun shing dang // chu srin 'dzin
36b5(rgyud): dung 'khor lo byed// bI dza pU ra tu se'u 'bru// zla 'dzin nyi ma 'dzin pa dang / tho ba 'dzin dang tshems shing dang // me to// phur ma bgrang phreng dang / rdo rje rtsa lnga don yod zhag
36b6(rgyud): don yod grub pa de dag ste// zad pad+ma'i steng du dgod// lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bri ba// gang dang gang du dgod pa ni// lag pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu thams// 'di dag kyang ni bri bar bgyi// kun nas
36b7(rgyud): kyang ni 'bar bar bgyi// nor bu'i rgyan gyis klubs par bgyi// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i ras sam ni// ra ba 'am rtsig par bgyis pa 'am// ci yang rung ba de dag ste// de dag mthong ba tsam gyis
36b8(rgyud): sam// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la ni// rtag tu sdig pa zad spong // mnar med gnas su gtogs pa dang // mtshams mang ba ni lnga nyid de// thaMd skad cig tsam gyis 'byung // sems can dag pa dran
37a1(rgyud): bgyid na// phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur// sems dpa' sa bcur rab tu gnas// 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas/ gang la dkyil 'khor mthong ba ni// spyan ras gzigs
37a2(rgyud): dbang mchog sbyin ni// rgyun tu spyi bo lag na thogs// gang gi phyag rgya 'di mthong ba// rgyun du mchog sbyin 'jig rten dbang // rtag tu mngon gsum mthong ba yi// de dang mtshungs te khyad
37a3(rgyud): par 'phags// gsang sngags sum bcu rtsa lnga'i tshig/ rtag tu dran bgyid thams cad 'grub// de ni dus rnams kun tu yang // ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyuraro// rnam grol dkyil 'khor rab
37a4(rgyud): myur bar// myur du sangs rmas 'od 'grib 'gyur// 'od pag med kyi sras po yis// thu bor 'gyur bar som nyi med/ jig rten mgon gyi thugs zhal nas/ skyes smras
37a5(rgyud): rtag tu thu dor 'gyur/ 'dran pas 'di ni chos nyid dang // chos las skyes par lung ston 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong dang mnyam pa'i bye ma snyed kyi
37a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuraro// tshad med grang med dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po/ 
37a7(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyuraro// gang gi sug par phyag dang rgyu dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di mchis par gyur na phyag rgya 'di 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang zhing che ba mchis par bsgrag so// de la
37a8(rgyud): gsang sngags no// oM a mo g+ho mo nga lo mi lo mo lo tsA la~M hU~M/ i a shwA sa yak+Sha Na bi ga ta hU~M/ oM a b+hi ya ba re da Ni ts+tsha/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi ted+ha ra d+ha ra ts+tsha/ oM pad+ma rjid
37b1(rgyud): ya muSh+NI hU~M/ oM bi sa ra bi sa ra sarba mAg+hAn tanA dza yats+tsha/ oM badz+rim+b+ha tsa rU Nu ru NAM/ oM a ku sha a mo b+ha A kAR+Sha ya hU~M/ oM ka ba tsa la tu ru tu ru hU~M/ A~M a mo b+ha na ka li mi li hU~M/ 
37b2(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha tsin tA ma ni tu ti tu ru hUM/ oM a mo g+ha ma Ni tsa~M li tsa~M li hUM/ oM badz+ra tu Ti tsi li hU~M/ oM a mo b+ha da ya tsa ra tsa ra shu d+ha satwa ts+tsha/ oM g+ho Sha ba ti tsi Ti tsi Ti hU~M/ oM bid+yA khad ga tsin tA
37b3(rgyud): ya sha tru na hUM/ oM tri ma la pa ri shud+d+he d+hi Ti b+hi Ti hUM/ oM su ru su ru hUM/ oM ma Ni ma Ni hUM/ oM puSh+pa ba ti dza ye hUM/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta bA sha d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ oM pad+ma pA sha di shud+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+re pa she b+ha
37b4(rgyud): ba tu mu ru mu ru hUM/ oM tsin+tA ma Ni bA sha ba ra de hUM/ oM tsakra pA sha sa nI rag+hA ta ka d+hu ru d+hu ru hUM/ oM tr-i shu l+lI bA sha bi lo ka d+hA ra ya hUM/ oM na ga pA sha ban d+ha ya kaD+D+h+ya ya duSh+Ta
37b5(rgyud): na ga na b+hA sha pA ta ya hUM/ oM dza lod b+ha bad+ha rA ya hU~M/ a \u0f7fnA bi ma le bi sho d+ha ya san d+hastA ra ra shrI bar hU~M/ i shrI bo d+ha ma hU~M/ oM ba dza~M ya puMr+Na ba ra hUM/ a~M pha lod b+hi'i
37b6(rgyud): ri hU~M/ oM pUr+Na maN+Da la dza ya hUM/ oM sa ha sra ra sh+mi ki ra Na hUM/ oM sarba duSh+TAn pra ha ra shA sA ya hU~M/ oM ma na bi sho d+ha ya mA lA bi ma le hU~M/ oM puSh+pa ba ti su gan d+ha ba re hU~M/ oM pA shas
37b7(rgyud): ha sra gu Ni ti kA Na kA Na hU~M/ oM badz+rod k+She ba su tsi mu kha tsan tsi Ti b+h+rU~M/ a~M a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta p+pa sha hasta hUM/ oM sarba tra a mo g+ha sid+d+ha sasid+h+ya sA d+ha ya hU~M/ lag
37b8(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag dang // de bzhin gsang sngags phyag rgya dag/ lhan cig bzlas pa tsam dang ni// phyag rgya mthong ba kho nas kyang // sdig pa thaMd mod la 'joms// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur
38a1(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo myur du 'grug don yod zhags pa rnams grol ba'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// de la mtshon cha'i phyag rgya ni nor bu rin po che dang / me tog
38a2(rgyud): dang / pad+ma dang / ril ba spyi blug dang / nor bu'i phreng ba dang / bgrang phreng dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / dbyug tho dang / mdung zung dang / rdo rje dang / rtse gsum dang / rtsa gsum kha gdengs dang / mtshom
38a3(rgyud): sha ka ti dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum pa gnyis dang / nor bu dang / rdo rje dang / mtshon shu li dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / mtshon cha dang / be con dang / dbyug pa dang / dbang
38a4(rgyud): phyug chen po'i rtse gsum dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / sbrul dang / ljon shing dang byi ru dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra sta yu ba sbom po can dang / 
38a5(rgyud): ba dang / gtsug bud dang / nor bu sgrol ma dang / 'od dang /  da zer dang / gtun shing dang / 'phyang mo nyug pa dang / dgra sta dang / sdod zlum po dang / bum pa dang / brag dang / ri dang / 
38a6(rgyud): po dang / sbrul 'khyil pa dang / gdug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / ru sbal dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang / ri sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / 
38a7(rgyud): gsum dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ral gri dang / gri dang / pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / rtsa gsum dang / mu sun di dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / phyag rgya bzhi pa dang / mche ba bzhi dang / zlum po dang / dung
38a8(rgyud): dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rtsa gsum dang / dung dang / nor bu'i dung dang / pad+ma'i dung dang / urda dang / gos dang / seng+ge'i gdong dang / shang shang te'u dang / ka la bing ka dang / ngang pa dang / bzhad
38b1(rgyud): dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang / gdong bzhi pa dang / dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / rtsa gsum dang / bum pa gang ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / zla
38b2(rgyud): ba'i 'od dang / pad+ma bzhi dang / pad+ma gsum dang / rgya mtsho dang / me tog dang / phur ma dang / glegs bam dang / ri dgas kyi g.yang bzhi dang / rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang / rta bla dang / lhung bzed dang / 
38b3(rgyud): dang / chos gos dang / mkhar bsil dang / so mangs dang / kha khyer dang / ska rags dang / btsug phud dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / phreng ba chen po dang / gru gsum dang / kun nas rdo rje sde dang / phyag
38b4(rgyud): rgya mtshon cha 'di dag ni// 'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa bzhin// rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di// don yod zhag sa pa'i cho gar dran// ras sam gos sam rtsig pa
38b5(rgyud): 'am/ ci yang rung ba 'dri bgyid pa// dogs med lags gsal legs 'byor pas// tshon gsal kun tu pad+mar ban ga/ phyag rgya kun nas 'bar bar bgyi// wad srog
38b6(rgyud): las byung bas ni// don dang las rnams kun stsol cing // phyag rgya mod la sdig pa 'phrog// de ni mod la 'bras bu ste// 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug kun// phyag rgya 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ 
38b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang shAkya yi// rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas brlabs// de lta bas na mkhas pasu// rtag tu kun nas mtshon bcad na// sangs rgyas rnams ni dgyes 'gyur te/ sras
38b8(rgyud): kyi thu ber som nyi med// phyag rgya rim phyed dam pa 'chang ba gang // 'jig rten mgon po'i sras kyi thu bor 'gyur// don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang ba yi// rnam par grol ba'i
39a1(rgyud): snying po bla na med/ phyag rgyad ni gsang sngags dam pa dag/ 'di 'chang ba la myur du grub par 'gyur// de nas don yod pa las thod pa dang / rje su 'thun pa'i
39a2(rgyud): zhags pa'i bdun bshad par bgyi ste// de nyid grub pas ji lta bu yi// cho ga'i cho ga sgrub pa bzhin// so so so sor 'tsham pa yi// de dag kun ni rtog par bgyi// de nyid grub pa'i ji lta
39a3(rgyud): bu'i// mtshan nyid gzugs ni ci bzhin pa// de nyid bsgrub pa zhags pa ni// skud pa lnga las 'grub 'gyur te// gsang sngags 'dzin pas mod la ni// 'grub par 'gyur te sem nyi med// 
39a4(rgyud): ras skud pad+ma'i skud pa dang // arga kha che dang dag gi/ srud shun pa'i skud pa ste// skud pa 'di dag bkal nas de khro na nyid kyi cho ga dang // cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas zhags pas
39a5(rgyud): ras skud kyi rgyu las blangs te/ tshad bzhin bkal nas rtag tu bsgreng ba bgyis la legs par bkrus pa// gos gtsang ma can tshangs par spyod pas zas dkar gsum 'tsha
39a6(rgyud): nas gnas gtsang ma'i phyogasu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mdor na byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas dran par bgyi'o// de nas shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas brgyad sgril du bka
39a7(rgyud): te don yod rgyal po thal ma sbyar bas pad+ma kha phye ba thogs pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ rgyan dzad kyi klubs pa'i lus phyed sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyi'o// bgyis nas gzu
39a8(rgyud): rnam pa gsum du bgyis te/ nges pa'i gzugs dang / khro gnyer gyi bzhin dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs te/ dngul lam gser las bgyi'o// de nas zhags pa srid kyi tshad khru bcu drug pa
39b1(rgyud): zhags pa'i thor to gcig rdo rje rtsa gsum pa dang / skyu ru ra lhan cig sbrel ba gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga 'am/ chos rgyad la legs par
39b2(rgyud): bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos nas zhag cig mchi ste/ skyil me bkrungs bcas nas sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnams pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ tshig bzhan mi smra bar zhags pa la lan stong rtsa
39b3(rgyud): rgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / stan bzang po bshams nas de'i steng du zhag pa bzhag par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dbang
39b4(rgyud): bskur bar bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / drug pa dang / phye ma dang / ba dan bzang po la sogs pas mchod par bgyi'o// a ga ru dang / tsan
39b5(rgyud): dan dang / du ru ka'i gdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o/ mar ma yang dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yung kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
39b6(rgyud): bgyis te/ zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la yang ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags
39b7(rgyud): 'chang gis zhags pa de'i mdun du skyil me krung bcas te/ mkhrugs pas gdugs rtse ba'i bar du mchod pa bgyis nas bzlas brjed bgyi'o// yungs kar re re 'gyis te/ zhags pa'i
39b8(rgyud): steng du gtor zhing stong rtsa brgyad tshang gi bar du gdugs rer mchis par bgyi ste/ rngo ci thogs pas gdugs rtsa ba'i bar du bzlas brjed bgyi'o// mchod par bgyi'o// kha zas ngan pa spang
40a1(rgyud): bar brgya'o// lhag ma dang sbags pa spangs par bgyi'o// gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig
40a2(rgyud): rten pa'i grub na ni ma'i kha dog tu 'bar bar 'gyuraro// gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i grub na ni kha dog sna tshogs 'bar bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i lus de yang 'bar bar 'gyuraro// sgra
40a3(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legase leg so// khyod kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zhags pa 'di grub kyis khyod kyi byang chub kyi sems bla na med
40a4(rgyud): ba lug cig pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i khongasu gtogs pa yongasu rdzogs par gyis shig 'on te 'jig rten pa'i sgrung na ni yid
40a5(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bus bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yo ngasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// ji ltar yid la bsam shing smon ba bzhin lag pas 'phangs na gsang sngags
40a6(rgyud): kyis thams cad sgrub par bgyid de/ thaMtha~Md bkug par 'gyuro// phyogs gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de log su den yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun du zlas par bgyis te/ med
40a7(rgyud): la dasam pa dzad 'grub par 'gyuro// gal te mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa 'am/ mnar med par mchi ba zhig na yang de'i legs par 'grub par 'gyur te/ da la yid nyid dang sdom
40a8(rgyud): ni bskyed par mi 'gyil// khro gnyer gyi bzhin gyis gang du 'phangs na lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen
40b1(rgyud): po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams bkug nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchi bar 'gyur zhing ji srid mtsho'i bar du bran bzhin du mchis par 'gyuro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / 
40b2(rgyud): btsun me'i 'khor tha~Md mchis par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten thams cad kyis cher mchod par 'gyuraro// gang gi don du zhags pa 'phangs pa'i don de 'grub par 'gyuraro// khro bo'i rgyal po'i
40b3(rgyud): zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'phangs par bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa'i sems can thaMd
40b4(rgyud): zhags pas bcings par 'gyuro// gal te 'tshal na lo 'am/ lo brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du zhags pas bcings par 'gyuro// nam byam
40b5(rgyud): ba dang / snying rje sbyad nas de'i tshe don yod pa'i zhag sa pa'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na phyir bkrol bar 'gyu ro// dpung gi nang du 'phangs na dpung rnams zhag
40b6(rgyud): pas bcings por 'gyu ro// g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbusu 'phangs na mtshon dang / go mtshon dang / gzhu dang mda' dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / mu si ni da dang / 'khor
40b7(rgyud): lo dang / thag mdung dang / mtshon cha tha~Md dang / go cha dang / ya lang thaMd zhags pas bcings par 'gyuro// chab dang / yungs kar ldan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gtor na grol
40b8(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// zhags pa la gdugs gcig bzhin ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyi'o// gang gi don du bsam pa de tha~Md 'grub par 'gyur// don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// 
41a1(rgyud): 'on te mi snang ba sgrub par 'tshal na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas bcings te/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pas gong du ji skad gsungs pa
41a2(rgyud): bzhin zhags pas bzungs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyuro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjed bgyis nan mkha
41a3(rgyud): la mchi bar 'gyuro// de na yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag 'dum gyis yongasu bskor bar 'gyuraro// lo bye ba bcur 'tsho
41a4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyuro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus pha rol gyi zil gyi mi non pa thogs pa med pa ra 'gyuraro// char pa 'tshal bas mchod pa bgyis na/ 
41a5(rgyud): ji tsam gsol ba btab pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyuro// cang char ches pa dgag pa'i slad du mchod pa bgyis na char pa bkag par 'gyuraro// yams kyi nang dang / gnod
41a6(rgyud): pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa dzad dang / mi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'tshal bas rig sdigs 'chang legs par khrus bgyis pa gtsang mas gos btsang ma bgos la lag
41a7(rgyud): bas zhag pa blangs te/ gnas mthon par 'dzegs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / zhags pa bcings te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po phyogs bzhir lan bdun bzlas nas
41a8(rgyud): zhags pa 'phangs na de dag thang dran pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung zad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad rab tu ni
41b1(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// 'jig pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / mi ngas chen po dang / mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// ha cang char cha ba dang / dus
41b2(rgyud): ma lags pa'i char dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// dpag tshad brgya stong khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcings pa bgyis
41b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta da ltar tha~Md 'grub par 'gyur bas don yod rgyal po mchod par bgyi zhing bzlas brjod bgyi/ gsol bar yang bgyi'o// mchod pa
41b4(rgyud): dang / gsol ba bgyis pa tsam gyis mod la thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/ de la yid kwib dang som nyid bskyed par mi bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo las ji skad
41b5(rgyud): gsungs pa bzhin las bgyid pa/ rnams kyis cho ga da bzhin du sgrub par bgyi'o// de nas skad cig de'i med la tha~Md 'grub par 'gyuro// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / 
41b6(rgyud): dga' ba dang / btang snyoms sgoms par bgyi'o// seMn tha~Md la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// dkon mchog gsum la
41b7(rgyud): gus par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gus pa dang / bla mar yid la sgoms par bgyi'o// mi gtsang ba spyod pa gtsang bar bgyi zhing yong su dag pa'i ngang tshul can
41b8(rgyud): du sgom par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi cho ga sgrub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu byang chub dgug par bgyi'o// de nas zhags pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga sgrub pa bshad par
42a1(rgyud): bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang de kho na nyid sgrub pas phug tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog phug tu 'jug pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnasu 'jug pa dang / 
42a2(rgyud): mi 'am ci'i gan su 'jug pa dang / dri za'i gan su 'jug pa dang / lha'i gan su 'jug pa dang / na mkha' la rgyu ba dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnasu 'jug pa dang / 'og min gyi
42a3(rgyud): gnas su 'jug pa dang / klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / thang la rgyu ba dang / nyi ma'i gan su 'jug pa dang / zla ba'i gnasu 'jug pa dang / skar ma'i gnasu 'jug pa
42a4(rgyud): dang / rgyu skar gyi gan su 'jug pa dang / nagasu 'jug pa dang / ri la rgyu ba dang / 'bab chu chen por 'jug pa ste// ji lta ji ltar mi de la bsams pa de lta de ltar 'jig rten pa dang / 
42a5(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga sgrung pa tshig sa chungs dus 'grung bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyad bar mi bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang
42a6(rgyud): mar gyur pa lag par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal la/ btsang ma de kho na nyid la gus pas sangs rgyas rje su dran pa sgom par bgyi'o// byams pa'i
42a7(rgyud): sems la mnyam par gzhag nas snying rje'i bsam pa dag pa'i yid kyis tshes bcu gsum nas brtsams te/ zla nga nya ba'i bar du gsal ba shin tu bkra shis pa la dus gsum du ci 'byor
42a8(rgyud): pa'i rnam pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyis la/ rtag tu brgya rtsa brgyad pa yi/ dus gsum rgyum tu bzlas brjod bgyis/ nyin par dus gsum lan gsum ste/ mtshan ma'i dus su lan
42b1(rgyud): gsum bgyi/ 'khor lo zhags pa bla med 'di// skud pa gsum las sgrub kyi ste/ ras skung pad+ma'i skud pa dang / arga'i skud pa gsum gyur du// da ni lags par tshad bzhin du// ru ni sum bcu rtsa drug
42b2(rgyud): bgyi// 'khor lo rnam pa gsum las bgyi// rgyar ni sor bzhi'i tshad lags te// snying por bcas shing mu khyud bcas// kun nas rtsibs dang ldan pa dag gser dang dngul dang zangs las bgyi// chos
42b3(rgyud): bstan lags par brgyan pa yi// bzang po'i bstan la bzhag par bgyi// spos kyi dkyil 'khor me tog gi/ sil ma bkram nas bum pa dgod// de bzhin mchod yon snod kyang ba gam// 
42b4(rgyud): mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du chos kyi stan bsham par bgyis pa'i steng du 'khor lo'i zhags pa bzhag ste// mchod pa bgyi sa la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum du
42b5(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas tshes pa co lnga'i zla ba nyal nyin zhag cig mchis par gyur pas rig rmi ga gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzi
42b6(rgyud): dbang phyug gi ri ma'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyi zhing bdug pa rnam pa gsum po a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / gu 'gul rnams dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun na chos kyi sngam
42b7(rgyud): mchis pa la mngon du phyogs te mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ yungs dkar re ra la bzlas brjed bgyis pas zhags pa'i sdang du gter
42b8(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar zhing 'khor lo na mkha' la mchis nas 'bar zhing lding bar 'gyuro// rig sngags 'chang gi lus kyi snod dang / spyi bo nas 'od zer
43a1(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyu ro// ri mo'i gzugs las leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyuro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 'khor
43a2(rgyud): lo zhags pa'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di grub par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod pa chen po bgyis la don yod khre bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyang bzlas brjed bgyi ste/ de'i
43a3(rgyud): 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blang bar bgyi'o// lag pa g.yon pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bcing bar bgyi zhing / g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang 'khor le'i tshul la brtan
43a4(rgyud): nas blangs te/ den yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brjod nas/ phyogs bzhir 'bang bar bgyi'o// de nas phyogs bcur khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 
43a5(rgyud): de nas bdag nyid kyi lus la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du lan bdun du bskur bar bgyi'o// de nas phyag rgya'i tshul du bskorab tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang 'khor les
43a6(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i dbang skur bar 'gyuro// dam pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang
43a7(rgyud): 'gi rkang pa spyi bos blangs nas 'di skad ces kyang smra bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi ci bka' stsal ba de bgyi'o zhes ci sgo ba'i don de dang de tha~Md bgyid par 'gyuro// bran gyi rang bzhin
43a8(rgyud): gyis thad du las bgyid par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi gan su 'jug par 'tshal bas 'di ltar nub gsum du mchis par gyur pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas blang bar dgyi
43b1(rgyud): phug gi sgo gang lags pa der zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa gdab par bgyi'o// zhags pa btab pa tsam gyi mod la gnas
43b2(rgyud): kyi phug gi sgo thaMd phye bar 'gyu ro// 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa dang / phug dang / 'bab chu chen po dang / rtseg ma dang / 'bab chu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lam mi bde ba thod bas la
43b3(rgyud): ba dang / bcom pa dang bshig par 'gyuraro// gtan pa dang / sgo glags pa dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / lcags sgrog rnams du ma dum bur chad cing gyes par 'gyur// nyams par 'gyur/ 'jig
43b4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ shin tu dag pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu rgya che ba'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa rnam par 'phru la bdag mthong bar 'gyuraro// rin po che sna tshogs
43b5(rgyud): kyis bkra ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gnas/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi ljon shing gis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyuraro// me tog sna tshogs kyi
43b6(rgyud): rab shin tu dri zhim pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa'i zhags pa dang / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i tshul mngon sum du bgyis nas don yod pa'i
43b7(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te 'jug par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gan su zhugs pa tsam kho nas gnas mchog de yang rnam pa drug tu 'gul ba dang // g.yo ba dang / ldag pa dang / 'ur 'ur
43b8(rgyud): chem chem ste/ lha'i 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos snang bar 'gyuraro// de nas reg sngags 'chang 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas don yod pa rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba'i slar bud med
44a1(rgyud): kyi gzugs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan ga/ lha'i gos kyi rgyan gyis klubs pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa lnga'i gzugs chen po 'chang ba bi dza pur thogs pa
44a2(rgyud): mchi bar 'gyuraro// sman bud med kyi gzugs 'chang ba de mthong ba tsam kho nas dpag tshad gang tsam nas gzi brjid thad dang / stobs thad nye bar sgrub par bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don
44a3(rgyud): yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa mdun du bcing bar bgyi ste/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid nyams par 'gyuraro// mthu chung bar 'gyuraro// de nas bung
44a4(rgyud): med de dgos pa dang / oM zhes bgyi bas mnan pa ra bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas pa gyi ste/ kha bub tu 'brel nas chab 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chab de la rig par mi bgyi'o// den yod
44a5(rgyud): rgyal po bzlas par bgyi ste/ de nas mig tshugs kyis blta bar bgyid na rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pas bzhu par bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi'i chab 'byung ste/ byug
44a6(rgyud): par bgyi'o// kun tu byug pa tsam gyis na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te/ thog mar rlung gi phung po nas 'dzeg par 'gyuraro// mig la byug nas phyogs bcu thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gsheg+sa
44a7(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thaMd dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i gzhal med khang dang / gnas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / gang dag bzhugs shing bzhes la
44a8(rgyud): 'tsho ba dag ji ltar lag mthil na mchis pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang / gang dag bzlas pa dang / gang dag ma byin pa dang / gang dag da ltar
44b1(rgyud): byung ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams dang / gang dag ring bsrel snying po'i mchod rten chen po'i srog shing gi tshogs can dag dang / de bzhin du ji ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa de dag
44b2(rgyud): thams cad mthong bar 'gyu ro// bdag nyid la kun nas byug te/ des byugs pa tsam gyis lpags pa'i mdog lha'i gser dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// skra sngo la cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyuraro// 
44b3(rgyud): mig lha'i ud pa la sngon po mchog 'dra bar 'gyu ro// tshe lha'i bskal pa brgya stong du 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yong
44b4(rgyud): su bskor bar 'gyuraro// lha'i bu mo brgya bzhi bcu dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo gang ga'i krung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag 'bum skad kyis yongasu bskor
44b5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// ji ltar yid la bsam pa dang / yid la rnags pa tsam gyis lha'i zas kyi mchog re brgya dang ldan pa dag mdun du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// lha'i btung
44b6(rgyud): chen po bdud rtsi'i ro bro ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong mdun nas rgyug par bgyid do// dgra thaMd dang / 
44b7(rgyud): bgegs dang / log 'dren tha~Md bcom pa dang / nyams pa dang / btubs pa dang / bshags pa dang / brtsal ba dang / gyes pa dang / bye mar bgyis par 'gyu ro// yang na sman gyi bud med de'i sku
44b8(rgyud): kun bton te/ ska ragasu bgyis nas bcing bar bgyi'o// gang du bcings pa de yang rin po che sna bdun du 'gyuraro// gang du zhugs pa thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur// de la lha tha~Md gnas 'cha' bar
45a1(rgyud): 'bru po klu thams cad dang / lha ma yin thad dang / mi 'am ci thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad de'i dbang du mchis par 'gyuraro// 'kho thams cad byang chu
45a2(rgyud): kyi snying po la thug gi bar du de'i phyi bzhin rje su 'brang bar 'gyuro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gan su 'jug par 'tshal zhing slar yang ldog par 'tshal na sman gyi bud med de dang gtam mi bgyi/ 
45a3(rgyud): reg par mi 'gyi bar lag pa'i phyag rgyas gnas mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas gnas thad na gnas pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khyi'u dang bu mo thams cad phyir byung nas mdun na sdod pa
45a4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ kha cig gi lag na ni bum pa gang ba'o// kha cig ni la ga na gdug so// kha cig gi lab na ni lha'i gos thog so// kha cig ni lha'i nor bu rin po che thogs// kha cig ni dri dag go/ 
45a5(rgyud): zhwa cig ni ma tog dag go kha tsog ni phreng ba dag gi kha cig ni/ dz+nyAn dang lcab sgrub sna tshogs zags/ kha cig ni thug pa dang / go kha cib ni dri'i phye ma dag go la cig ni sbas mu
45a6(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun gyi snod bkang ba dag go kha cig ni lha'i 'bras bu sna tsheg pa dag gi kha cig ni lha'i me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man
45a7(rgyud): da rab chen po dang / many+dzu shaka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / a ti mu ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / bar shi ka dang / mthon ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang / 
45a8(rgyud): gdam pa dang / snga ma dang / mu tika dang / klu'i matog dang / kon ta dang / gan d+ha ba ra bshi ka'i me tog dag thogs// kha cig ni lha'i tsan dan go shI sha dang / sbrul gyi snying pa'i 'dug pa dang / 
45b1(rgyud): a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i bdug pa thog so// kha cig gi lag na ni rma bya'i bsil yab thog so// kha cig gi lag pa na ni ral gri'o// kha cig gi lag pa na ni mdung thu // 
45b2(rgyud): kha cig gi lag pa na ni rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung dang / gtun shing dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / gzong kha gnyis pa dag go/ kha cig ni go cha dang / ya lad bgos
45b3(rgyud): nas srung ba'i phyir kun nas 'du zhing mchi bar 'gyuraro// kha cig ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod dang / gser gyi snod dang / dngul gyi snod dag thogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog dang / 
45b4(rgyud): bser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dag gis bkang nas thog so// de dag zad rig sngags 'chang la dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gi byams pa dang / snying rje
45b5(rgyud): chen po yid la bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas yid la bgyis pas 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba yid la
45b6(rgyud): bgyi'o// mchog tu brtse ba yid la bgyid pas tshig gzhan ma smra bar dbugs dbyung bar bgyi zhing lam drang po nas 'jug par bgyi ste/ seng+ge'i khri la mngon du mchis nas don lad
45b7(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa thogs mar seng+ge'i khri'i steng du bzhag par bgyi'o// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bal po
45b8(rgyud): bzhi pa/ da'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang rang nyid mchis nas steng du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa zad la phyag bgyi zhing 'phags pa spyan gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa yang
46a1(rgyud): phyag bgyi'o// des dgra thams cad pham par bgyis par 'gyuro// gal te 'og tu phyogs nas phyag bgyis na de nas 'khor los rig sngags 'chang gi phyir rgol ba
46a2(rgyud): rnams mgo bcad par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang mchis ma thag tu gnas rnams pa drug tu g.yos nas sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyuro// ca tse'i sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyuraro// lnga'i rol mo'i
46a3(rgyud): cha byad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag 'bud par 'gyuro// na mkha'i lha rnams kyis kyang gnas med khang chen pa nas dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mes ro la dbang bskur bar bgyid
46a4(rgyud): do// dbang bskur ba tsam gyi mod la rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab par 'gyuraro// gser gyi char dang gos kyi char 'bab par 'a gyuro// gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / lha'i
46a5(rgyud): ma chog bkra ba sna tshogs kyis mar dang / lha'i rgyan gyi char 'bab par 'gyuraro// de nas lha'i bu mos rin po che sna bdun gyi snang du bdud rtsi'i bcud 'tshal ta mchis nas 'du
46a6(rgyud): bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas den yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis reg par 'gyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis reg pa tsam gyi mad
46a7(rgyud): la lnga'i lus rnam par dag pa thob nas lpags pa'i mdog gsar 'dra bar 'gyuraro// sgra lhag par sngo ba dang / mig ut+pal ldan po ltar lha'i mig yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// tshe tshad lha'i bskal pa 'du
46a8(rgyud): phrag brgya stong du 'gyuro// gal te phyir mi ldog par 'tshal na de'i bcud kyis len mchog las ji tsam 'tshal bablangs te/ lha'i cha ba tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i nang du zhugs nas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis
46b1(rgyud): pa tsam gyi mod la phug gi sgo rang 'bye bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dra bar mthong na ni 'jig rten thad kyi mchod gnas kyi gtso bo cig pur 'gyuraro// ji ltar 'phags
46b2(rgyud): baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin du rig snga 'amang 'di yang mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mas bla mar bgyi ba de lta bur 'gyuraro// gang du bcud kyis len mchog 'dis reg na 'dzam bu chu bo gser
46b3(rgyud): yongasu dag par 'gyu ro// rtsig pa 'am/ ri 'am/ ka ba 'am/ ljon shing ngam/ snod dam/ bum pa 'am/ rdza bo 'am/ gos sam/ bong ba la reg na de dag thaMd 'dzam bu'i gser yongasu dag par 'gyur ba
46b4(rgyud): nas dgos pa'i bar du 'gyu'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang klu mo 'am/ lha mo 'am/ mi 'am ci mo 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang dag sa gtsang ma bgos nas leg par khrus bgyi'o// 
46b5(rgyud): tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la 'phags pa sgra na ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyis nas nyin zhag gcig gnas par bgyi'o// 
46b6(rgyud): 'khor lo'i zhags pa chen po 'di chos kyi stan lags par rgyan pa'i stan bzang po'i steng du bzhag par bgyi zhing mchod pa chen po bgyi ste/ de nyid kyi mdun du tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong
46b7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar re re nas bzlas brjod bgyis pa zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / zhags pa de yang sbrul bzhin du yongasu 'khyil la 'khor
46b8(rgyud): mo'i gdeng ka'i tshul du mchis par 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blangs te klu gnas pa'i 'tsho 'am/ mi 'am ci gnas pa'i 'tsho'am/ lha mo gnas pa'i mtsho 'bram du gyi
47a1(rgyud): nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te gnas kyi nang du sa ga' bar bgyi'o// 'phangs ma thag khonar sngar yang dran par bsngo ste/ ji lta du'i don yid bsams
47a2(rgyud): pa'i don de zhags pas bcings nas ji ltar bsams bde bzhin du bgyi bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i ner ram/ dpag gam/ gsar ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ 
47a3(rgyud): bai DUr+ya 'am/ shang ka shi la 'am/ byi ru 'am/ sa le sbram mam/ dngul lam/ gos sam/ chas sam/ rgyan nam/ gzhan yang gzhal med khang ji lta bur 'byor pa can dag don tu
47a4(rgyud): gnyer na zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi ste/ de thams cad 'dren par bgyido// gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de dang der ji ltar yid la bsams pa de nyid shin tu
47a5(rgyud): bsal bar yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// dngos po ga/ zhan du mi 'gyur// rgyal pa'i rigs sam/ drim ze'i rigs sa ma/ rgyal rigs sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs
47a6(rgyud): sam/ rje'u rigs kyi ci dang ci bsams pa 'grub par bgyid do// skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'i ming nas brjod de zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la zhags pas bcings
47a7(rgyud): nas 'dren par 'gyuraro// tha na ri dgas dang / bya dang / seng ka dang / stag dang / glang po che dang / ma he yang 'dren par bgyid de// gang gi ming nas brjod de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du
47a8(rgyud): 'phangs na de yang zhags pas bcings nas mdun du mchis te/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin du thaMd 'grub par bgyid do// zla ba dang nyi ma dbab par 'tshal na zla ba dang /  nI/ 
47b1(rgyud): mdun du mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mngon sum du zhags pa 'phangs nas slar yang drang bar bgyi ste/ zla ba dang nyi ma zhags
47b2(rgyud): pas bcings nas drang bar 'gyu ro// nam mkha' las babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin dgos pa tha~Md sgrub par bgyi do// 'on te zla ba
47b3(rgyud): dang nyi ma'i gnasu mchi bar 'tshal na zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa lag pas blangs te don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas pa dang / rig sngags 'chang na na mkha' la phur nas nyi ma dang
47b4(rgyud): zla ba'i stan la ji srid du 'tshal bar longs spyod par 'a gyur zhing slar bde ba dang / ma snad pa dang / ma smras pa dang / legs par 'bab par 'gyuraro// nags khung du
47b5(rgyud): 'jug par 'tshal na gtsang ma legs par khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi zhing nags khrang gi skor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis
47b6(rgyud): te zhags pa 'phang par bgyi'o// lag pas zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyis nags khung gi gnas kyi gzhal med khang gi klu thaMd bcing nas thams cad rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na ma
47b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang la phyag bgyis nas rig sngags 'chang khyod gnas chen po mchog tu zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i
47b8(rgyud): rgyal ba'i snying po bzlas te/ lag pazhags pa'i phyag rgyas nags chung du 'jug par 'gyi'i// zhugs patso mo lenas nags kyi gnas rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur zhing dbus kyi nags kyi
48a1(rgyud): mtha' na rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing lha'i chab dngas zhing rnyog pa ma mchis pa shin tu gsal ba/ lha'i tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan ga ha cang mi grang pa/ ha cang mi dro ga rag
48a2(rgyud): na bde ba ro dang ldan pa/ bdud rtsi'i bcud can mchis te/ 'di ltar don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rdzing gi dbusu zhags pa 'pha
48a3(rgyud): par bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi med la bud med rin po che'i gzugs 'dra ba'i lha'i bu mo'i lus phyed byung nas lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan cing rin pa
48a4(rgyud): che sna bdun gyi bye pa gang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la dbul zhing spyi bo smad de 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rje btsun rig sngags
48a5(rgyud): 'chang khyod ma bzhengs par gnasu zhugs shig/ rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i tshig gsum brjod par dgyi ste/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi den dang / rig sngags
48a6(rgyud): 'chang nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub grub te/ bdag nyid ma dang / sring mo dang / mngag gzhugs ma zhes gar bde bar brjod la de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis brgya smra bar bgyi
48a7(rgyud): b+ha/ sring mo kho bo la 'jig rten pha rol gyi don byin cig ces 'jug par bgyi'o// de yang rig sngags 'chang khyod rang gi gnas snoms te zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur// de nas rig
48a8(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas 'jug par bgyi zhing don yong rgyal po'i snying po bzlas// de nas gnas chen po mchog rin po che sna bdun gyi gnal med 'ang
48b1(rgyud): lha'i dril bu g.yer khwa'i dra ba dang / gser dang / gos sbyangs pa dar gyi dun 'phyang rab tu sbyangs par gda' ba nas bu mo de yang nor bu rin po che chen po thogs te/ ribasngags 'chang 'jig rten pa
48b2(rgyud): rol gyi don du rin po na chen po bzhes shig ces dbul bar bgyido// dem gi sngags 'chang gis bstan pa shams pa'i steng du zhags pa lag par yengasu bskyil ba/ stan tu gting la nor bu rin po che
48b3(rgyud): chen po zhags pa'i steng du bzhag cing me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// don yong rgyal po bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas pa tsam gyi mong la zhags pa nor bu rin po che dang bcas te/ 'bang bar
48b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// nor bu rin po che chen po de las yang 'o ma'i chab 'byung bar 'gyuro// rig sngags 'arang gis 'o ma'i cha ba de las blang sa la sbyor chu lan du reg par bgyi'o// 'o ma'i chab kyis
48b5(rgyud): reg pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma dang bral zhing yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// don yod snang ba nor bu bzhal med khang kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'od zer zhes
48b6(rgyud): dbyi ba thob nas sa bcu la gnas te phyir mi ldog par 'gyu'o// bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gau ting 'dzir sgyu ma lta bur rnam par 'phrul pa thob par
48b7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing bshin tu yongasu dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang pa rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag ste/ nga'i rig
48b8(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi bu thu bo khyed kyis grol ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu dag pa 'thob bo zhes dbug 'byin par 'gyu ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong nas
49a1(rgyud): thams cad kyis legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ sems dpa' chen po lags lags// khyod ni byang chub lam du zhugs// khyod kyis sangs rgyas 'di 'theb snga/ 
49a2(rgyud): grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba'i sgrubs// 'on te rig sngags 'chang nyid don du gnyer na de'i tshe gser gyi me tog stsol bar 'gyur te blangs la bu mo nga nyid kyi spyi bor bzhags nas/ aM zhes bgyi bas mnan
49a3(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// oM nas bgyi ba'i sgra brjod nas spyi bar bzhag pa tsam gyi med la bu mo de'i mig mchog gnyis nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis blangs te nye reg 'gyid pa tsam
49a4(rgyud): gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyu ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil cing lag pa na 'khor le'i zhags pa thogs te na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyu'o/ rig sngags 'chang bye ba 'bre
49a5(rgyud): phrag bco brgyad kyi yongasu bskor bar 'gyuraro// lo drug khri zhis stong du 'gyur zhing skye ba bdun stong rje su dran par 'gyu ro// 'on te gsang sngags 'arang 'jig rten bI dngos grub kyi chag
49a6(rgyud): slong na da'i chi 'di lta bur 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi sgra 'di sdoms shig ces de'i tshe bud med des skra'i ral ba gton nas rig sngags 'chang la 'bul ba na sgra thams cad blangs te dum du gsum
49a7(rgyud): du bkum nas srang bu la nyi shu rtsa gcig bkal te/ mgo la btags pas ni ji ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin du mig 'phrul ston par 'gyuraro// 'bras bu dang me tig 'tshal ba thams cad spen par
49a8(rgyud): 'gyu ro/ bden pa ji ltar 'tshal bzhin ston par 'gyuraro// mgul du btags pas ni mi gda' bar gyur nas gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / khrul bum dang / lto 'phye chen
49b1(rgyud): po dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyu ro// dpral ba la btags pas ni lha dang klu thams cad dngang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// dpung pa g.yas pa la bdags pas ri blang
49b2(rgyud): becha bcu'i bca' stongs dang ldan par 'gyur paphas kyi dgra bo dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdugs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pas stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// dpung pa g.yon pa
49b3(rgyud): la btags pas ni rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// lag pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni gang la rag pa dbang du 'gyur zhing bdag gi nor du 'gyuro// lag pa ga lnga
49b4(rgyud): bal btags pas ni grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i sgo la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor
49b5(rgyud): dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / bud mang dang / skyes ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor da ngang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// than dud 'dre'i skye gnas
49b6(rgyud): gtobs par bya dang / gcan zan dang / ri dgas dang / gdug pa dang / gzhan yang bdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// brla g.yas pa la btags pas ni tshal lam/ 
49b7(rgyud): ser ga dang ri 'or 'am/ phag gam/ dgon pa 'am/ ngasti gnas gang du zhugs te zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la nor thams cad dang / sman dzad dang / lha thams cad rang gi gzugasu mngon nas mchis par 'gyuro// byin pa
49b8(rgyud): g.yas pa dang / rkang pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha mthar yang rdal bar 'gyur na chu klung chen po'i chab kyis byin pa nub tsam du 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ byin pa g.yon pa la
50a1(rgyud): btags pas ni nyi ma re re zhing dpag tshad brgyar phyin nas dub pa ma mchis par slar yang ldog par 'gyuro// brla g.yon pa la btags nas dur khrod chen por zhugs na dur
50a2(rgyud): khrod dzad na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas de nyid na spyod na rig sngags 'chang ngas lag pa g.yon pas bum pa gang ba bzung zhing
50a3(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pas bud med de bzung nas gnas chen po'i mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// gnas mchog de'i dbus na rdzing ma tog gis chal bar dkram pa bgyi ste/ rdzing der gnyis ka khrus dgyi zhing chab kyis
50a4(rgyud): nye rag dgyi'o// bkrus shing reg pa tsam kho nas 'khor lo rag sngags 'amang zhags pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rig sngag sa 'chang du 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bdun stong gis
50a5(rgyud): yong su bskor cing tshe bskal pa khrir 'gyuraro// sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyuraro// nags kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dpon po rgyal por 'gyuraro// gal te ma zhes
50a6(rgyud): bgyi bas don du gnyer ba ni bu gcig pa bzhin du yongasu skyong bar 'gyuraro// 'bras dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / chos dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul yongasu grub par bgyid do// sring
50a7(rgyud): mo zhes bgyi bas ni dgos pa'i yod byad zad tshang bar stobs par 'gyur zhing yan lag spong bar bgyid do// nyi ma re re zhing rgyan sa klubs pa'i lha'i bu mo khrid de mchi bar 'gyur// lha'i gzhal
50a8(rgyud): med khang 'byor pa stobs par bgyid/ lha'i khyim dang / gzhal med khang stobs par bgyid do// mngag gzugs ma zhes bgyi bas ni gang dang gang du mngags pa de dang der mchi bar 'gyur te lha'i gnas
50b1(rgyud): sam klu'i gnas sam/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas sam/ srin po'i gnas sam/ 'byung po'i gnas sam/ gzhan yang mngag gzhug pa'i sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la bsams pa bzhin du bgyid de/ 
50b2(rgyud): nags sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na gtsang ma khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi/ gnas dben pa gtsang ma'i sa phyogasu dkyil 'khor gru bzhir
50b3(rgyud): bgyis la dri sna tshogs kyis byug/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma bshams la a ge ru'i bdug pas sreg ste/ nub gsum du mchis nas 'khor lo zhags pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgyas don yod
50b4(rgyud): rgyal po'i snying po'i bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad pa gyis te lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas du ba 'byung bar 'gyur khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas par
50b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas skyes ba nag po chen po'i tshul mi sdug pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa sgra gyen du 'greng ba/ mgo 'bar ga mig dmar ba dang / mchu nga
50b6(rgyud): lce dmar gser mo dmar ge/ skra sngo ga/ dpung pa mkhrang zhing brtan pa/ gsus pa 'phyangs pa mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa/ mgo lnga pa sbrul ltar lce bsgyur ba/ stag gi sham thabs bgos pa/ 
50b7(rgyud): lag dgra sta dang / dril bu thogs pa zhig lus pad tsam byung nas phyogs bcur blta bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi ste brtan par bgyi la/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas
50b8(rgyud): nas 'khor lo'i zhags pa 'phangs te mgo bcad la khrag mang du byung ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gis khrag des lus thams cad byug par bgyi'o// thug pa tsam gyi mod la bdag nyid lus
51a1(rgyud): mched pa dang / mi shig pas rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// mig gnyis byung la rang gi mig phyis nas mig la bskus na lha'i mig tu 'gyuraro// rang smras
51a2(rgyud): byug na tshe bskal pa bcur 'gyur zhing thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtshor 'gyuro// bskal pa rgya stong gi skye ba'i skye ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// snying phyung sde 'tshal na namakha' la
51a3(rgyud): mchi'o// khrag gi snying khar thib la bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyuro// lce bcad na ral grir gyur nas dgra thams cad brlag par bgyid do// gal te thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na da'i tshe khre bo'i
51a4(rgyud): rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad zhags pa dang 'khor lo la bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'khor los zhags pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis thal mo sa la brdabs par
51a5(rgyud): ste/ lan gsum du thal mo brdabs pa dang / de'i 'og tu thang gi sgo dbye bar 'gyuraro// ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ste/ zhugs nas slar yang mchi
51a6(rgyud): zhing dgos pa gzhan thaMd bgyid pa dang / thang thams cad la gnas pa zad dbang du gyur nas gnas par 'gyuro// 'on te na mkha' la mchi 'tshal na gyen du bltas nas don yodang rgyal po
51a7(rgyud): snying po yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag nyid la byugs te/ lag pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing namahA
51a8(rgyud): go 'byed par 'gyuraro// lha'i gnasu mchi bar 'tshal na lha'i khyim du mchis nas zhags pas lha'i mgul la bcing bar bgyi zhing don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad
51b1(rgyud): bzlas ras lha bcings pa gang lags pa de'i ming nas brjed na lha dbabs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mngar ra mchis par 'gyuraro// tshangs parang byab 'jug dang dbang phrag char po rig snga
51b2(rgyud): 'chang la rig sngabs 'chang ci zhig de duga'arabang sdoms shig ces smra bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'arang gis lha'i gnas 'gro'o nas brjed par bgyi'o// gal pa gzhar bsams
51b3(rgyud): zhig mchis na mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid de// de nas lha'i gnas ras bachi ba ra lnga'i gnas lha'i rdzu 'phral gyis lag pa theg pa na mkha' la mchi dnga' rdza re dza kr-i
51b4(rgyud): bar lha'i gzhal bar 'ang man par longs spad par 'gyur zhing 'on mi 'tshal na lha'i gnas nas kAr yang 'babs par 'gyur gzhan dza ltar rang gi bre gros dang yod
51b5(rgyud): bsams pa'i dgas pazang 'greng par 'gyu tshonang zang grab bgyur pa la som 'di dang yi ba'is bskyang bar mi brgya ga' bar la'i zhabs pa sgrub pa'i mkha
51b6(rgyud): da nas rig sngags 'chang pad+ma'i zhabs pa sgrub pa 'tshal bas rdog sngags 'chang da gtsang ma lags par bkras pa gos gtsang ma bag 'a brgya'o// rab bsam mchis ma
51b7(rgyud): mchis kam na gcig mchis nas rig snga bas 'chang gos lags pa'i sgrub pa sgrub par bgyi snga bas kyi skud pa 'am pad+ma'i skud pa ban rla nga lba bar par gyi kha snang bar 'gru
51b8(rgyud): khra'i ba rtsa gcig bal ba la yang pad+ma 'gro gA ri par snga bdar gyi mdang ma bal ba ser bzhi pa'i mang pad+ma gsar gyi mngab ma da bgyi mad pa dang bai nA r+ya dang an+d+ra ni la ma
52a1(rgyud): po ma trika las bgyi zing mu tig gis bskor ba bgyi snang nas zhags pa la gdags par babya'o// chags pa'i zer la gzhag la la rla'i phyag rgya ga dgas par
52a2(rgyud): / de nas lags par brgyan pa'i chos kyi bstan bzang po bshams bum pa gang bas rgyan par 'gyel par babya'o// ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bzag pa dkyil 'khor gyi sdang du
52a3(rgyud): dri'i pad+ma bsams par bgyi zhing dkyil 'khor gyi sdang du chos kyi gdan ba khams la bum pa gang bas rgyan par brgya'o/ ma 'og gi sil ma bkram zegs par da tsan ngan dang ra ru
52a4(rgyud): 'i gdug pa dngul bar bgyi'o// mchod yon dang zhabs bsil gyi snod kyang bzhag par bgyi'o// pad+ma zhags par yang ches kyi sngam za kla ma par
52a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma dun du rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo bkrung bcas nas rin yang zhags pa'i snying po lam khri ba zlas pa zlas pa'i
52a6(rgyud): kar re ra nas de'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan khri rdzogs nas de nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya'i nub mo mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyu ba la mchod pa bgyi'o// 
52a7(rgyud): zhags pa de yang mchod par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyang bzlas//  nas dro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad
52a8(rgyud): bzlas te/ nyin mtshan dus gsum du bzlas brjed dang mched pa bgyi'o// de nas pad+ma'i zhags pa 'bar zhing kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyu// lags lag se mas
52b1(rgyud): bgyi ba'i tshig 'byin par 'gyu ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus la kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyu ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang phyag rgya'i sgrol mo krung
52b2(rgyud): gis mchis nas mig mi mdzums zhing bzhin 'dzums pas snying rje chen po yid la sgom par bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du ltas te/ don yod pa'i
52b3(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po lan sum stong bzlas par bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang bdag nyid kyi lha'i rang bzhin mdun du mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa
52b4(rgyud): brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bar bzhag nas leg so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing 'di skad ces kyang dbugs 'byin par bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang ba'i bu snying
52b5(rgyud): las skyes pa'i thu bo bzlas brjod kyi cho ga na na po dang / mchod pa'i cho ga chen po 'dis nga la mchod pa'i mchog byas pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi mchog dang grub pa'i
52b6(rgyud): mchog ste/ khyod kyi don yong rgyal po'i snying po grub cing khyod kyis pad+ma'i zhags pa chen po grub kyis ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin du mchog khyer cig khyod kyi brnags pa thad ni yongasu rdzo
52b7(rgyud): par byas khyod 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rgyu ba las ni grol/ khyod skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'tsho ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las thar na khyod dmyal ba chen po mi bzad pa bcu
52b8(rgyud): drug las ni yongasu grol/ 'jig pa chen po mi bzang pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba brgyad las ni yongasu thar/ 'di nas phyi ma'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa las
53a1(rgyud): shi 'phos te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// khyod kyis
53a2(rgyud): gang ga'i klung 'bum phrag sdong brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi snyed kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs pa chen po dang
53a3(rgyud): ldan/ rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis lhag par bya ba mang po ni byas/ khyod rig sngags 'chang chen por ni lung bstan/ dmyal ba dang sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa thaMd las ni
53a4(rgyud): grol gyis ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin mchog khyer cig/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin de'i tshe mchog thob par 'gyuraro// de nas
53a5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi pad+ma'i zhags pa de blangs te gnas pa tsang mar gus pas mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// nam dgos ba de'i zhags pa drangs par bgyid ste/ las tha
53a6(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyuraro// pad+ma ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa g.yon par gzhag la lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa bzung ste/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa
53a7(rgyud): brgyad bzlas nas/ sems can nam lha gang gi ming nas brjod de bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad tshang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdun du mchis nas 'dod pa'i mchog zad stsol bar
53a8(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang byang chub tu lung bstan pa don du gnyer bar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas legs par khrus bgyid te/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas
53b1(rgyud): nyin zhag cig mchis par gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas pad+ma'i zhags pa de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag tu dbul
53b2(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// zhags pa'i thar to ya gcig gi ni rang gi mgul tu gtags la/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lar stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshangs pa dang sangs rgyas
53b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sku gser gyi mdog can rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor phyag bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ lung ston par mdzad/ yid
53b4(rgyud): kyi brnags pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par mdzad par 'a b+hu raM/ sgrib pa dang / sdig pa tshe rabs stong du bsags pa thams cad gtugs par 'gyuraro// lhag ma ma lus par ga
53b5(rgyud): par gyur nas lus yongasu dag par 'gyu ro// dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang ser sna spangs par 'gyuro// de nas ma'o nges pa'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas lnga dang
53b6(rgyud): mi'i dpal nyams myong bar bgyis nas sems cad thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyu ro// mchod par 'os pa dang / bla ma'i gan lnga 'gyu ro// nad rnams dang bral bar 'gyu ro// skye bo thang dag
53b7(rgyud): bar 'gyu ro// 'gum pa'i dus su phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgengs par 'gyur/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad lag pa'i lam ston par mdzad par yang 'gyuraro// 25
53b8(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun na mchis nas dbugs 'byin par bgyid cing lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par bgyid// de bde bas shin tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas lus
54a1(rgyud): 'dor bar 'gyuraro// bor ba tsam gyi mod la skal ba mnyam pa bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang
54a2(rgyud): dang byad kyis spras pa'i/ lus pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ bskal brgya stong gi skye ba'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam pa
54a3(rgyud): grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par g.yar thon du bgyis nas sa bcu la gnas shing phyin ci log tu ma gyur pas phyir mi ldog
54a4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / cho 'phrul chen pos lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / gzhal ma da khang dang / gnas mchog dang / phyogs bcu'i
54a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mchi bar 'gyuraro// de na sa rig sngags 'chang bde ba can gyi 'jig na/ 
54a6(rgyud): gyi khams mthong ba'i chos kho na la lta bar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gis gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs sam/ gnas sam/ khang ba 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ 'khor gyi nyama?/ 
54a7(rgyud): sam/ 'chag sa 'am/ khang pa brtsegs ma 'am/ spyil po gtsang ma phyi bdar legs par bgyis pa'i phyogs dkyil 'khor gru bzhi dbyes pa khru gang ba tsam/ khru do pa'i dkyil
54a8(rgyud): 'khor bgyi ste/ bu bzhi lham pa/ pra kun nas cha mdzes pa/ sa dang sbyar ba'i lci bas shin tu legs par phyi bdar bgyis la rtswa sngon po gnyen po lta bu la mkhas pas dkyis
54b1(rgyud): 'khor mtha' dag gi cha dbye ba'i thig gdab par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po la pad+ma rgya chen pos dpyas pa/ mdab ma brgya pa tshon sna brgyad kyi tshon rtsis bkra bar bgyi zhing dpyas
54b2(rgyud): bar bgyis la/ snying po ni rin po che rka ti ka las bgyi'o// pad+ma'i mtha' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bskor la/ grwa bzhi nas kha khyer sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyi'o// pad+ma'i bar gyi zur zur du yang ba
54b3(rgyud): la sngon po legs par bris la/ kha khyer gyi phyi rol nor bus 'khor ba'i mtha' de ma chos bskor bar bgyi'o// lha'i chab rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis la chab la
54b4(rgyud): me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma bkod pa bya sna tshogs gnas 'cha 'a gangang pa dang / bzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur ba dang / shang shang te'u dang / ka la bing ka dang / bya'i tshogs kyis mdzes
54b5(rgyud): bar bgyis la/ nya dang / chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa bsod ku na nas rten 'cha' bar bgyid do// mtsho'i 'gram na rin po che'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / 'bras
54b6(rgyud): bu'i ljon shing sna tshogs kha khyer dang bcas par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi kha khyer gyi phyi rol na lag pa dang / thal mo'i phyag rgya bris la sgo bzhi rnamasu rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi'o// de nas dbus
