54b7(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor la pad+ma'i gdan bzang po bshams te de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob gzhag par bgyi'o// 
54b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bum pa gang bas rgyan par bgyi'o// me tog sil ma dang / dri dang byug pa yang dngul bar bgyi'o// ba dan bzang po sna tshogs kyis rgyan par bgyi'o// gtor ma dkar po dbul bar
55a1(rgyud): bgyi'o// yon chab dang zhabs pa snod dang / mar me'i phreng ba dbul bar bgyi'o// pad+ma'i zhags pa 'od dpag med kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang
55a2(rgyud): gtsang mas gos gtsang ma dgo bar bgyi'o// legs par khrus bgyis nas pa'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyis la zla ba nyal nyin zhag cig mchis par gyur pas khang kar phyog su bltas la skyil mo krung
55a3(rgyud): bcas te mchis nas lag pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nga bzlas brjod bgyi'o// byams pa dang brtsa ba'i sems kyis lhag par brtson par bgri'o// snying rje mchog tu brtsa bar gyur pas
55a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad la brtse bar bgyis na do na yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ ci tsam na thun tha ma la 'od dpag med 'bar bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor nan
55a5(rgyud): chen po de la yang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyuro// ga sngags 'chang g.yo bar gyur nas lus 'bar bar 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis skya rangs shar tsam nang bzhin pa
55a6(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag med gser spungs pa lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun
55a7(rgyud): du bzhugs nas phyag g.yas pa ga sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing yid kyi brnags pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par mdzad nas mi gda' bar gyur pa
55a8(rgyud): dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i gnyid thob nas ji ltar zhal ba tsam ma ma mig btsum pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gzhal med khang dang gnas/ 
55b1(rgyud): dang / 'jig rten dang / yul ljongs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mtha' dag dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs par mthong bar 'gyur lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston
55b2(rgyud): par mdzad pa yang mthong bar 'gyur lag so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul thams cad mthong ba
55b3(rgyud): 'gyur lag so// 'di nas ma 'ong pa'i skye ba nas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du bskal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyuraro// skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ skye ba bdun stong rje su drar pA
55b4(rgyud): 'gyuro// de sad nas zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad pa zlas brjod bgyis nas lag pa g.yas pas bzung na na mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyu ro// 'o khrir 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// zhags pa grub pa rnams
55b5(rgyud): dang / rig sngags 'dang thams cad kyi 'khor la sa bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// 'khor khri brgyad stong dang ldan par 'gyu/ ro// pad+ma'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas rig sngags
55b6(rgyud): 'chang rdo rje'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal nang shing shun dang / ras srung dang / kha che dar gyi skud pa mnyam du lhan cig bkal te/ khru nyi shu rtsa gcig gi tshad tsam du bgyis la tsan dan dkar ba las
55b7(rgyud): rdo rje sor bzhi pa'i tshang du dgyes partsa lnga pa 'byung po la sogs pa'i mgo dang / sbrul gyi ska rags bcings la klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo'i dra ba'i phreng bas dkri ba bgyis nas zhags
55b8(rgyud): ba la gdags par bgyi'o// mas rib sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par khrus bgyi'o// ba'i rna lngas nya reg bgyi'o// 'i stan bting nas ri mo'i gzug
56a1(rgyud): kyi mdun du lag pa g.yas pa zhags pa mnan nas don yod pi snying po khri bzla so// khro ba'i rgyal po'i snying po steng bzla so// de nas zhags pa de 'bar bar 'gyur ted
56a2(rgyud): bzung nas na mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyuro// rdo rje'i rig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad mdun na bzhugs
56a3(rgyud): par 'gyuro// lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzugs dang / mthu dang brtson 'grus pha rol gyi zil gyi mi non par 'gyuraro// lab na rdo rje dang 'dra bar rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyuraro// lha'i lo khri
56a4(rgyud): nyis stong du 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// las thams cad ba gyid pa rdo rje'i zhags pa dgra thams cad 'jom par bgyid pa'i zhugs pa steng ngam/ 'og gar 'phangs par yid la bsams
56a5(rgyud): pa bzhin thams cad bcings nas dgug par ba b+hid do// phyogs bcur ba langs te khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas / sa pa 'am/ bud med dam/ gzhan gang ci yang rung ba thams
56a6(rgyud): cad zhags pas bcings nas/ myur du 'gugs par bgyi ste som nyi mi bgyi'o// bal te lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ na mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci
56a7(rgyud): 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad zhags pas bcings nas myur du 'gug par bgyid de som nyi mi bgyi'o// zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
56a8(rgyud): bgyis te/ mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu'i bzhi'i mtshan mo nam phyed na zhags pa phyogs bzhir 'phangs par bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin
56b1(rgyud): dang / srin po dang / gdug pa thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis shing ji srid mtsho'i bar du dbang du gyur nas mchis te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad
56b2(rgyud): bgyis par 'gyur// bltas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pas zhags pa blangs te dur khrod
56b3(rgyud): du zhugs na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyuraro// phug gi sgor mchis nas rdo rje'i zhags pas brdabs na/ phug thams cad kyi sgo 'byed par 'gyur zhing 'khrul 'khor
56b4(rgyud): dang gtan pa thams cad dum bur chag par 'gyu ro/ lam ngan pa dang / mi ngan pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang / 'dab chu ngan pa dang / sbrul dang / dbugs gdugs pa dang / srog chags po nas dang / 
56b5(rgyud): gdug pa dang / bcas pa'i srog chagasu gtogs pa thams cwa mi gda' bar 'gyuraro// mi drang po dang / lam drang poraji ltar ra shi gnas sam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ khang pa bzhin
56b6(rgyud): du zhugs nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrubs te/ slar yang gnas nas phyir ldog par 'gyuro// rdo rje zhags pa las thams cad ba gyid pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas rig sngags 'chang
56b7(rgyud): nor bu'i zhags pasgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des nor bu btsal bar bgyi ste/ rdo rje 'am/ bai DUr+ya 'am/ shal rang byung ngam/ mar gang da 'am/ in dra ni la sor mo'i tshigs lhag tsam shin
56b8(rgyud): tu phyis pa shin tu yongasu dag par bgyis pa/ gser gyi me tog gi tshul du ma 'gyis pa/ mu tig gis dkris pa/ ge sar la phya gtsam pa ka'i me dog dza lta ba de bzhin du bgyis la/ ras bzang po'i skud pa
57a1(rgyud): tshon rtsis dbye bas la sbyar ba/ shin tu tshad la bab par bkal ga khru nyi shu rtsa gcig bsor mo bung mo 'tshad tsam gyi nor bus rgyan la zer to gni ga shesu ni nor bu 'am
57a2(rgyud): gser las bgyis pa'i lcags kyu gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par bkrus nas pa'i rnam lngasa'i rab 'gyi'o// da'i 'og
57a3(rgyud): tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du spos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa bgyis la grwa bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhag cing / pog bor gyi snod bshams nas a ga ru'i bdug pa dang / tsan
57a4(rgyud): dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'a'o dar gyi dbus su chos kyi bstan bzang po tshad dang ldan pa bsha mas la/ ba dan sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar
57a5(rgyud): bgyi'o// me tog bsil ma dang / dri dang / rol mo na byad dag dgod par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// btung ba ngan pa dang / kha zas
57a6(rgyud): ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / gnas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / sbags pa rnams yongasu spangs par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i nyi khri gcig stong bzlas nas lag pa g.yas pas
57a7(rgyud): chos kyi stan gyi steng du bzhag pa'i zhags pa la mnan no// lan nyi khri chig stong tshang ba dang / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te/ yungs kar ra ra
57a8(rgyud): nas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// bcom
57b1(rgyud): ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bco lnga'i nya la nyin zhag cig bsnyung ba bgyis
57b2(rgyud): nas mchod pa mar bgyi ste/ mchod pa'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad la re re nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig re re bzlas brjod bgyis nas dbul bar bgyi'o
57b3(rgyud): de ras skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas nyin mtshan kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas bdag par bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang
57b4(rgyud): ba dang sa cher g.yo bar 'gyuro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs las kyang 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyuro// nor bu'i zhags pa de yang 'bar bar 'gyur/ 
57b5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo yang 'bar bar 'gyuraro// 'ab ra ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa g.yas pas nor bu'i zhags pa blangs pa na sgra chen po
57b6(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyu'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang rang bzhin gyis rig sngags 'cha nga gi mdun na mchis par 'gyuro// de bzhin ga
57b7(rgyud): pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'od kyi rgyal po'i sku gsar gyi kha dog gis na mkha' la rdzu
57b8(rgyud): 'phrul gyis bzhugs nas rig sngags 'chang la legaso zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur/ phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba brkyang ba'i phyag gis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bor bzhag nas
58a1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rib sngags 'chang legaso lags// khyed kyi nga bzhin gyi nor bu chen po dor yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa grub pa
58a2(rgyud): khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa grub ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod dgar sbyar ba thams cad de/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
58a3(rgyud): gi don yong grub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i zhabs pa thegs nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'brang mi dgos par yid bzhon gyi nor bu chen po/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i grub pa'i rang bzhin
58a4(rgyud): 'dis 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par byed pa la ltos shig/ yid la ji lngar bsams pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul
58a5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs la ltos shig/ rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song shi ga/ 'o na bde ba can lta bar 'tshal lam/ ji ltar
58a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyis mched par 'tshal lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin gyis mched par 'tshal lam/ lha'i me tog dang / lha'i dri dang / phreng ba dang
58a7(rgyud): byug pa dang / phye ma dang ches gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / kha dan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang / gos kyi de bzhin gang chags pa la mchod par bgyi bar
58a8(rgyud): 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i gtsug tu dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod zhags pa'i mchog 'di lag
58b1(rgyud): pa g.yon pas mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i mchog bzung nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la gtsug te/ 'di lta bu yid la bgyis pa chen po ji lta bu'i
58b2(rgyud): bsams pa yid la bgyid pa de lta bu yang bsams nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o// yid de bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgyal chen don yod pa 'di bzlas nas
58b3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yongasu gdungs pa'i snying gis sems can
58b4(rgyud): thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyis nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhag bI ro ba zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam
58b5(rgyud): po lnga pa/ dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal
58b6(rgyud): lo/ rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dag 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par song ba dang / yang
58b7(rgyud): dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// blo gros chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phab 'tshalo// gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan na 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa tshegs dang bcas
58b8(rgyud): ba'i mchog la phyag 'tshal// bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'od dpag tu med la phyag 'tshalo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal
59a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal// tshangs pa dang / khyab
59a2(rgyud): 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i du gzugs sna tshogs mnga' ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA pad+ma tsan+d+ra ma Ni ma Ni/ a mo g+ha ma Ni
59a3(rgyud): su ma Ni mnyam Ni sarba ta thA ga ta a la~M kA ra/ mahA a mo bA ma Ni tsa ra tsangs rgyar/ ni ba tsa tsa ra shwa ra ma hA/ pad+ma b+hu dza ba rad/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA bi shwa rU pa d+ha ra/ pra bar ma hA bo d+hi sa so pang+ga d+har
59a4(rgyud): pad+d+ha a sa na pad+ma ku T+Ta mA lA d+ha ra/ pad+ma g+ha~Mr/ pang+gas rban/ ta ta nus has byungs sa sran pranA nAd b+hu \u0f7f pra bar d+ha/ mu \u0f7f d+hU'i Sh+Tas sarba d+g+ha gadza mdza la shardzas
59a5(rgyud): rash+mi pra to mar+t+titasha rI ra/ dz+war thar/ dzi tsi pra A d+har/ d+har/ ma~M Ni kan// badz+ra Tur+ya/ kha kota/ seMn dran la 'dzun gai T+TaSheHsha rtsa thab ci rba/ tsaraNA
59a6(rgyud): bod+hi satwa ba rang bra h+ma/ biSh+Nu ma he shwa ra rU pA d+ha ra/ pad+me shwa ra lo ke rashwa ra/ a nan+te shwa ra/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ka de r-i raM Shi ga Na ku mA ra/ se n+da pa ti re Sha d+ha ra/ d+he ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hAd d+hu ta
59a7(rgyud): ba d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta oM bi Sha nak+Sha sa ma ya nu sma ra b+ha ga ban/ pU ra ya ma A tA shAn+ta ra ya pA ran/ shA ya ya satwAM/ ta ra dza ya duSh+TA na bA ta ya bag+h+nAn/ mA ra ya tr-i de shaM sA le/ sa ra sa ra
59a8(rgyud): letsu tsu g+h+raM phaT phaT pha.a sa d+ha si d+ha/ ma hA tsin tA ma Ni a mo r+tha pA sha d+ha raswa d+he ya tsA tra ya/ ba~M phu la so/ ma mahA b+hu ba na da bya pra ya tsA ma hAg Ni ka/ bu d+h+ya dud+d+ha/ ba prA ba d+ha ya/ se ba d+ha/ 
59b1(rgyud): ya/ saM bo d+ha ya/ ma hA pa ku pa ti pA shA d+hA ra/ a nan+di ba kur bAn/ ri d+hI san+na rA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ ga ga ne bi pu la bi mA na/ san d+ha ri Shi ka/ na mo stu te bi pu la pu N+ya ko Sha d+ha ra/ mahA a mo
59b2(rgyud): g+ha si d+he hUM hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tuM mAM/ bi pu la kIrti ke re swA hA// b+hu ba swAhA/ b+hu ra b+hu swAhA/ a mo g+ha pi pu le swAhA/ ma hA tsin tA ma Ni sing+ge sAhA/ ma hA tsan tA ma Ni sid+d+he ba ra de swAhA/ sarba sid+d+hi ba ra de swAd/ 
59b3(rgyud): oM pi pu la shwa ra/ lo ke rashwa ra/ ma hA tsin+ta ma Ni/ ma hA a mo g+ha sid+d+he hUM phaT swA hA// don yod nor bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang gi
59b4(rgyud): lus thams cad 'bar bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa lag pas mnan na mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyuraro// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
59b5(rgyud): cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od da bag med kyang tshogs dang bcas/ 'khor dang
59b6(rgyud): bcas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// bde ba can gyi gnas mtha'
59b7(rgyud): dag te mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mthus mchod pa'i sprin chen por gnas par 'gyu ro// bde ba can na gnas pa
59b8(rgyud): de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med des rig sngags 'chang la leg so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ngas kyang sgra de dag thams cad thos
60a1(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing mchod pa'i char chen po yang mthong bar 'gyuro// gal te rig sngags 'chang na mkha' las 'beb par tshal na de'i tshe bsams pa tsam gyis 'beb
60a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// 'on te mi 'tshal na nam mkha' de nyid na nam mkha' la grub pa dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los bsgyur
60a3(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis yongasu bskor bar 'gyuraro// tshe bskal pa chen po brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis 'gyu ro// 'on te
60a4(rgyud): babs na lo khrir 'tshe bar 'gyuro// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang gus pa cher bgyis par 'gyur// 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtse ba gcig pur
60a5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// lha rnams kyang babs nas rig sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyuraro// sa mas can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du/ 
60a6(rgyud): mngon par dga' bar 'gyuro// mchod pa'i 'osu yang 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'o su 'gyuraro// thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por
60a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dang bcas pa/ rang sa
60a8(rgyud): rgyas dang // 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto bye chen po
60b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal ba 'am/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
60b2(rgyud): rnams la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongasu rdzogs par 'tshal ba 'am/ dag pa'i rtsa chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba 'am/ lha'i zas kyi mchog ro bro'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang / 
60b3(rgyud): lha'i bcud kyis len gyi mchogs gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi ngage 'dun thams cad la bstabs par 'tshal
60b4(rgyud): ba 'am/ sbyin pa mang po dang / cher po gtong bar 'tshal ba 'am/ nyin ra zhing mchod pa'i sprir bgyid par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgro
60b5(rgyud): nas ci 'byor pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la btso ma ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o// 
60b6(rgyud): dbus mo gtsug ta thal me sbyar ras zhags pa bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bgyi'o// yid bzhin nor bu chen po rgya chen don yong 'di yang mchod par
60b7(rgyud): bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// yid la bgyid pa yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang / sbyin gtong chen po dang kha zas
60b8(rgyud): dang / btung ba dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan phyung dang / rol mo dang / sil sngan
61a1(rgyud): dang / pag rdo ba dang / rin po che'i ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon zhing dang / mar me'i ljon shing dang / dpag bsams kyi lder shing yid la
61a2(rgyud): bgyi ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzungs bzlas nas ji ltar yid la bsams shing don du gcer ba bzhin phyogs bcur 'phangs na/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa dkyil 'khor mtha' dag
61a3(rgyud): tu gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi 'dakyil 'khor du mthe ba'i yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba ma mchis par ci bsams pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar
61a4(rgyud): mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'a gyu ro// de bzhin du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po ma tshang ba ma mchis pa 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du mthu man
61a5(rgyud): bo'i nor bu rgya chen don yod la mchod pa'i gzung sa bzlas shing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyuga'i snying po'i gzungs 'di yang nyin gcig bzhin du thun gsum du
61a6(rgyud): lan gsum du bzlas par bgyi'o// des na rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mnyes par bgyis pa dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / rim 'gro
61a7(rgyud): dbyi bar 'gyuraro// bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshigs chen po dang dag pa'i rtsa ba'i chen po bskyed par 'gyuraro// dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas
61a8(rgyud): ba de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags 'chang la dran pa dang / blo gros dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid bstsol bar mdzad do// nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
61b1(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu rje su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mthong bar
61b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// mthong ba'i chos la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'jig su rung ba dang / skrag pa dang / sdang ba rnams rnam par zhi bar 'gyuro// nad kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyuraro// rims kyis
61b3(rgyud): ma lags dug gri ma lags/ dug sbyar mas ma lags/ sbyor bas ma lags/ mtshon gyis ma lagasems ma lags/ chus ma lags/ lus la ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyuraro// dgras 'jig
61b4(rgyud): par mi 'gyur te/ pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pas ma lags/ pa rel gyi sde'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ pas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ lnga'i 'jigs pas ma
61b5(rgyud): lags klu'i 'jigs pas ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'a ma tsi dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro
61b6(rgyud): ma dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba dang / sbyor ba mo'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// dpag tshad gcig gi nang tshun chad gzung bar mi nus shing rgyang ring por 'bros par 'gyur te/ de la bgags
61b7(rgyud): bgyid par mi 'gyuraro// gang dag mnar med par gnas pa 'gyur ba'i sems can nam/ mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa 'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spongs pa
61b8(rgyud): 'am/ bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib phra lu yongasu dkris pa gang lags pa de yang mthong ba'i chos pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongasu gtugs par 'gyur// yongs
62a1(rgyud): su grol bar 'gyuraro// khal te tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid cing bsnang ba lan gcig bgyis te/ bzlas brjod byas na de bskal pa bye ba
62a2(rgyud): brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir ldog par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyis las kyi sgrib pa snga ma rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur zhing / bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig
62a3(rgyud): pa rnams nyams par 'gyuraro// 'khor ba'i nyes pas phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis pad+ma bzhin du gos par mi 'gyuraro// mthong ba'i chos las lnga pa
62a4(rgyud): thob par 'gyuraro// bstan pa tsam mam/ cho ga bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas 'thob par 'gyu'o// dran pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs
62a5(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rjes mchi bar 'gyur// nyin cig bzhin du lan bcu rtsa brgyad pa zlas brjod bgyis na mthong ba'i chos la kun tu bzang ba dzang
62a6(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyuro// gsang sngags dang cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad kyi rje su zhugs pa dang / dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyu ro// yang dag par bskyed
62a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdza su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang mthong ba tsam gyis mnar med par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyuraro// chung ngu na rig sngags
62a8(rgyud): 'chang dur khrod du zhugs nas gum pa'i rus pa 'am/ gum pa'i sha 'am/ bum pa'i ro rul pa 'am/ chung ngu na gum pa'i gos bor ba 'am/ rtsig pa'i ri mo la rig sngags 'chang da'i
62b1(rgyud): grib mas phog par gyur na sems can gang dang gang gis dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur pa de dang de nas mod la thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis
62b2(rgyud): sam som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi na/ gang dag ches mang du lhag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal gang rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sred pa 'am/ dge slong ma
62b3(rgyud): 'am/ dge bstan pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma dad pa'i rjesu 'brang ba 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di 'chang bar bgyid/ brjod par bgyid// klog par bgyid/ 'don par bgyid/ sems par bgyid// 
62b4(rgyud): sgom par bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ 'dri ba ra bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid na de nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ 
62b5(rgyud): mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya stong mang po 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'di nyid bcangs na mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang / 
62b6(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa drug dang rje su 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// gzungs 'di nyid re shig kun chub par bgyis nas/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad yongasu
62b7(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur na dgos pa mang pos grims par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas rig sngags 'chang don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa sgrubs nas yid la bsam te/ 
62b8(rgyud): bsams pa'i las thams cad bgyid na thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// dgos pa dang bgyi ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// ji ltar 'phags pa spyan pas gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin
63a1(rgyud): ngangan sum du mthong nas lung bstan pa bzhin du dan yod pa'i yid badzin na bu'i zhabs pa 'di de bzhin du blta bar bco ste/ 'di la yang gnyis mi 'gyi
63a2(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa mgrin par btags la lag pa g.yas pas nor bu blangs te/ lag pa g.yan pas lcags kyu grangs na mi gda' bar gyur nas ga dga' ba zer 'phru
63a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ mngon ma yang ner bu'i 'od kyi snang bas nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur// thams cad du lha'i gan su 'jug pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pa dang lha ma yin dang / nam
63a4(rgyud): nga dag sa'am ci'i gnas dang / lha phyechen pa'i gnas dung/ rnaMl gyi sug dag/  dang swAtshal dang / khang ni rnams 'byeb 'gyu bang khams
63a5(rgyud): dumi mngon par thubs nas slar rdzog pa 'gyur zhing ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi na du g+ha'i tshe lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ nin mangs pa dang
63a6(rgyud): ba'i spyan thams cad spangs par 'gyur/ 'on te rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtags par 'tshal na zla ba yang gyi nga'i chos brgyad dam bcu bani la legs par khrus bkyil
63a7(rgyud): gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi/ gtsang ma'i gnas sam phyogasu pa'i lci ba ste/ ba'i rnam lngas yongasu sbyar bar bgyi'o// gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbus dri'i dkyil 'khar
63a8(rgyud): dkyi'o// ma rtogs lam bkram zhing bum pa gang bas rgyan cing sras sna chags kyis legs pa'i 'gadug pa bzhig par bgyi'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyu gyi
63b1(rgyud): mdun du stan bzang po bshams te shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas zhags pa sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du zlum po bskyil nas gzhag par bgyi'o// dbus su nor bu bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rig
63b2(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi mchod par bgyi'o// don yodang rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcog bzlas brjod bgyis nas bro ba'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas don yid bzhin
63b3(rgyud): nor bu'i snying pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de'i 'og tu tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka'i gdug pa dbul zhing nor bu la brtag par bgyi ste zhags pa dang / de thams cad nor bu'i nang nas
63b4(rgyud): gda' bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa gda' ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' gda' ba 'am/ lha gda' ba 'am/ klu gda' ba 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lham
63b5(rgyud): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci gda' ba 'am/ 'byung po dang / lto 'phye chen po gda' ba 'am/ g.yul 'gyed pa gda' ba 'am/ tshe ring ba gda' ba 'am/ 
63b6(rgyud): nyams pa dga' ba tshe 'phes pa gda' ba 'am/ rgyal srid gda' ba 'am/ grong 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa 'am grong khyer thob pa 'am/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / 
63b7(rgyud): baiDUr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lgab lbub dang / rgyan gda' ba 'am/ nor rgyur ba smra ba 'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gte
63b8(rgyud): smra ba 'am/ 'bru smra ba 'am/ bud med 'phrog pa 'am/ las sgrub pa 'am/ gsang sngags 'grub pa 'am/ dbang du bgyi ba 'am/ ngo mtshar ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang na gda' bar 'gyur zhing
64a1(rgyud): dge ba 'am mi dag ba de dag thams cad kyang gda' bar 'gyuro// lo 'am/ lo byed dam/ gnod pa 'am/ 'tshe ba 'am/ yams sam/ mi ngas sam mi ngas mer po 'am byu
64a2(rgyud): ngas sam/ gor ram/ rta nad dam/ glang po che'i nad dam/ rang gi dpung ngam/ gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa chen po de dag thams cad me long gi dkyil 'khor la ji lta ba de bzhin du gang
64a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur lag so// gang bsams shing gang gnyer ba 'grub pa 'am/ mi 'grub pa 'am/ dab pa 'am/ mi dge ba thams cad gda' bar 'gyur te/ de la the tshom dang / yid gnyis dang / sem
64a4(rgyud): nyi mi bgyi ste/ dngos po don yod gnar du mi 'gyuro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnasu nor bu bzhag na ci tsam 'tshal bar char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyuraro// ha cang
64a5(rgyud): char ches na na mkha' la nor bu bstan na char chen po 'chad par 'gyur// nyi ma char kar nyi ma la bstan na rim babs nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur// zla
64a6(rgyud): tshes pa la bstan na rdzang babs nas 'dod dgur thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar bgyid// chu klung chen por bstan na rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// nags khung du bstan na sman gyi rdzas thams
64a7(rgyud): cad rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'gyuro// ri phug tu bstan na sman thams cad 'bab par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de blangs par bgyi'o// 'bru'i phung po la bstan na 'bru
64a8(rgyud): thams cad 'du bar 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyur// ma me'i gnas sam nag po chen po la bstan pa/ spyi ba'i gtsug tu bzhag na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis 'khor
64b1(rgyud): bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa dang las thams cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i mngon sum du bstan na yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa/ 
64b2(rgyud): blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ dbyig dang / gser dang / ner bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / 
64b3(rgyud): rgyan dang / ljab lhub dang / rgyan 'chang dang / khang pa dang / ngo mtshar du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyuraro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhugs pa
64b4(rgyud): 'phangs te/ don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs bzlas na ji ltar 'tshal ba yid la bsams pa bzhon me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / gzhal med khang gi char 'bab par 'gyuraro// rgyal
64b5(rgyud): mtshan sgreng ba'i rtse mor bzhag ste/ rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba khyim gyi steng ngam khyam su gzhag la'ang gas pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen nas kyis sems can
64b6(rgyud): thams cad la mchog tu 'artsa bar bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjed bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas don yod yid
64b7(rgyud): bzhin nor bu'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad gsang stong de bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang nas ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin du char 'bab par 'gyuraro// nor bu dang / 'bru dang / gos
64b8(rgyud): dang / lbab lbub la sogs pa ma teg dang / 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyuro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ga'i dgon pa'i 'dzag pa dang / yams dang gnod
65a1(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus pas par 'gyur/ thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs
65a2(rgyud): pa skyel par 'gyuro// 'jig pa dang / sha khon thams cad las thar bar 'gyu ro// gdug pa nas gcan zan khro bo thams cad kyi bar du yang byams pa la gnas par 'gyuraro// sems can
65a3(rgyud): thod 'thun par bgyid par 'gyu ro// yid kyi brnags pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don yod yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas rig sngags
65a4(rgyud): 'chang ral gri dang zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na ri gasngags 'chang gis lcags chen po las ral gri sor bcu drug gi tsha da du bgyis la/ lagazungs kyi nges dngul las bgyis te/ gser gyis
65a5(rgyud): 'bar bar bri'o// shing shun gyi skud pa dang / arga'i skung ba dang / kha che dar gyi skud pa lhan gcig tu khru bcu drug byung ba shin tu tshad la bab par bkum pa/ sgrub pa'i dges
65a6(rgyud): pa yongasu rdzogs pa la sum sgril du bkal bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi legs par khrus bgyis te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ zhags pa dang ral gri mnan la lag
65a7(rgyud): pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste bzung bar bgyi'o// khros pa'i khro gnyer gyi bzhin gyis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i
65a8(rgyud): gzugs kyi mdun du khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas brjod lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas ral gri 'bar bar gyur nas/ rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la
65b1(rgyud): 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// gzhan gyi mthus zil gyis non par mi 'gyuraro// lo khri brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur// 
65b2(rgyud): 'on te lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa bzung la g.yas pas ral gri bzung ste/ khros pas hUM zhes bgyi bas mnan na mi gda' bar gyur nas/ mi gda' ba dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri grub pa'i rig
65b3(rgyud): sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// tshe lo khri thub par 'gyur// 'on te rig sngags 'chang khros pas ral gri bskor na bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin
65b4(rgyud): dang / srin po gdug pa thams cad dang / 'byung gi thams cad kyi rig sngags bcang bar 'gyuraro// g.yul gyi dbus su lan cig bskor na g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshon ma thams cad 'a
65b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur// rengs par bgyis par 'gyur// thams cad logs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur// dur khrod kyi nang du bskor na dur khrod na gnas pa'i gdug pa rgyu ba thams cad kyi
65b6(rgyud): rig sngags btubs par 'gyur zhing gnas thams cad stong par 'gyur// phug go sgor bskor na 'khrul 'khor dang / sgo glegs thams cad btubs par 'gyuraro// gtan pa thams cad btubs pa
65b7(rgyud): 'gyuro// gdug pa'i mi ma yin pa bar chad bgyid pa thams cad bcom par 'gyu'o// thal bar brlag par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang dgos pa thams cad du ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid par
65b8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// ral gri sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas rig sngags 'cha' sbrul gyi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des skud pa lnga las bsgrub ste/ tshan rtsis kha bsgyur ba'i skud pa tshang
66a1(rgyud): bzhin du btubs la/ sgrub par shin tu 'os pa las sgrub par bgyi'o// de nas zas bzang po'i phye ma dang / ma d+hu'i me tog dang / ra sa'i me tog dang / ldong res dang / @
66a2(rgyud): ge sar dang / nag pus pa dang / shing arga'i 'o ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba der btsag bsal te/ dus gcig tu lhan cig mnyam du btag shing / spyi bor legs par smras te/ de la don yong rgyal po
66a3(rgyud): lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sbrul 'khyil ba mgo gsum gyi gdengs ka nas yongasu 'khyil ba gser gyis g.yogs pa/ legs par sbrel ba ni zhags pa'i mchog lag so// rig
66a4(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi legs par khrus bgyis sa/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas pa'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi tshad bzhin bgyis te dris mchod par bgyi'o// ma
66a5(rgyud): tog gi bsil ma dang bum pa gang bas rgyan bar bgyi'o// ba dan gyis kun nas rgyan par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gan su stan bzang po bshams te/ de'i
66a6(rgyud): steng du klu'i zhags pa skyil nas zhags par bgyi'o// sbrul gyi mgo'i gdengs ka dbus ma ni kha shar phyogasu ston no// dkar gsum gyis gtor ma bzhag par bgyi'o// mchod yon zhabs
66a7(rgyud): bsil dkar po'i snod dang / bdug pa rnam pa gsum paM tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka rnams sreg go// 'bras yos dang / yungs kar bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la 'phags pa
66a8(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du bzhag la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo bkrung bcas te mchis nas bzlas brjod mang du bgyi'o// thog mar
66b1(rgyud): don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas tshang ba dang khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas sbrul gyi mgo la gtor bar bgyi'o// 
66b2(rgyud): sgrub pa thams cad tshang nas ni// rgyun tu sbrul ni 'bar bar 'gyur// stan las zhags pa g.yo ba ni// sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad tsam du// stan las gyen du 'phar bar 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
66b3(rgyud): bzung nas mi gda' bar gyur nas klu'i gnasu mchis te/ klu'i mtshor mchis na klu'i gnas kyi sgo rnams 'bya bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis zhugs te don yod rgyal po bzlas nas
66b4(rgyud): sbrul gyi zhags pa lan gsum tu bskor bar bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du smra bas rig sngags 'chang
66b5(rgyud): zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyuro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyis zhags pa gzung ste bskor nas 'jug par bgyi'o// des na rig sngags 'chang gis klu'i skyon da mi
66b6(rgyud): mthong zhing nub par 'gyuraro// 'khrul 'khor dang / sgo glags dang / gtan pa thams cad btubs shing bcag par 'gyur ro// zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo mdza
66b7(rgyud): ma/ rgyan thams cad kyi klubs ma mdzes ma mchis nas rin po che'i phreng ba thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang la dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas spyi bo la bzhag ste/ bzhag
66b8(rgyud): pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo na mkha' la 'phur nas nu ma gnyis nas 'o ma zags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis zad nas btung bar bgyis ste/ tshe nyi khri thub par 'gyur ro// skra cung
67a1(rgyud): zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyu ro// klu'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyu ro// mthu dang / brtson 'grus me nges pa rel gnon par
67a2(rgyud): 'gyu ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzhag la don yang rgyal po'i snying po pang ka ra bi ra'i lcug ma la bzlas nas byab par bgyi ste/ gang dang gang gi ming nas drangs shing yid la bsams
67a3(rgyud): pas mod du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// char mi 'bab pa'i dus sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas 'then por bskor bar bgyi ste/ lan cig bskor ba tsam gyis char gyi rgyur chen po 'bab bo// char ha cang
67a4(rgyud): che ba'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bzhag nan ra ha cang che ba las 'chad par 'gyuraro// grang ba'i rlung ngam se rang 'ab dab pa'i dus su nang par sngar klu'i zhags pa phyogs
67a5(rgyud): bzhir bskor na dpag tshad 'argya khe ra khor yug tu ser ba 'ab ba bar mi 'gyur te grang ba'i rlung dang / ser drag thams cad bcings par 'gyuro// lo khyung 'khor tshang bar mtshams chen po
67a6(rgyud): bcings par 'gyuraro// nyin cig bzhin don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bsdogs la/ lag pa g.yer bas bskrad pa bgyis na nyin cig
67a7(rgyud): bzhin lha'i zhal zas dang / btung ba 'dod dgu thaMd klu'i gnas nas byung nas skye bo steng stong 'tshal ma stsol bar 'gyuraro// de'i dug thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma lags par 'gyuro// sbrul gyi zhags
67a8(rgyud): pa lag pa g.yas pas bzung la lag pa g.yom pas klu bzung nas/ dpyid dam/ ston ka 'am/ sprin chags pa'i du su zhags pa bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te/ na mkha' la 'phangs na me tog dang / 
67b1(rgyud): 'bras bu dang / lo tog gang yang rung ba bzang po shin tu smin pa dang / kha zas shin tu bzang po thaMd namakha'i ngos las sa la 'bab par 'gyuraro// gal te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po
67b2(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis na klu'i gzhal med khang dang / gos dang / lhang lhub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rgyan thams cad sa la 'bab par 'gyuraro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig las lhag par
67b3(rgyud): bskor cing khro bo'i rgyal po bzlab brjed dgying na/ de'i tshe klu 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal med khang dang bcas pa ra sa'i steng du lta bar 'gyu'o// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis rgyal po btsun mo'i
67b4(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na zhags pa ba/ zhag la yungs kar la don yod rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bsnun la/ de nas sbrul gyi zhags pa blang
67b5(rgyud): te rgyal po'i khyim gyi phyogs gang la lags pa der lhag par zhag sa pa bskor na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du/ gyur nas ji sring 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur
67b6(rgyud): g.yul 'gyed pa na khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa g.yul gyi dbusu 'phangs na sbrul gdug pa mig dgrad pa/ lce sgra ga mig me mdag ltar dmar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyi mang
67b7(rgyud): la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyuro// gzhan yang ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i don de lta bur thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyuro// sbrul gyi zhags pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// 
67b8(rgyud): de nas 'byung ba'i dang byug gi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na 'bri'i rtsid pa dang / rtsing pa chen po lhan gcig tu bkal ba dang / lcags las mdung rtsa gsum pa ser bzhi'i tshad tsam du bgyis la/ 
68a1(rgyud): danas ngan yod rgyal ba'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad pazlas brjod bgyis nas khro ba'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas teni na nag gcig mchis la lebs par thus bco
68a2(rgyud): gtsang mas gos gtsang ma mgo bar bgyi'o// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag cig gis sgrub par bgyi'o// de nas mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa blangs na 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi gzugs
68a3(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyu ro// 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po lo brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyu ro// 'byung po'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyuraro// zhags pa lag par thogs nas dur
68a4(rgyud): khrod du zhugs na dur khrod na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis te/ gnas kyi sgo zang 'bye bar 'gyur zhing khyod ni dgar zhugs shig ces ci 'tshal ba bgyid par 'gyuro// 
68a5(rgyud): ro'i mgul du btags nas phra ba'i rgyal po zlas na/ de nas ro langs nas ci dris pa de smra bar 'gyur zhing ci bsgo bde \u0f7f/ da par 'gyuraro// 'akrol na mchi bar 'gyuro// gnod sbyin gyi mgul
68a6(rgyud): du btags te// khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas la khros pas drangs nas gnod sbyin de yang bdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la rje btsun bka' stsol cig dang / thams cad bgyi'o zhes smra bar 'gyur 'og
68a7(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis khyod ji srid 'tsho'i bar du khro bo'i rgyal po mngag gzhug pa'i las bgyi shig ces smra bar bgyi ste/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas nyin gcig bzhin bsgo ba bgyis na las tha~Md 'apyid
68a8(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin mo'i mgul du btags te khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ gnod sbyin mo mchis nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang la mig mi 'dzums par lta
68b1(rgyud): zhing rig sngags ci zhig don du gnyer zhes smra bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gis kho bo la ma dang / chung ma dang / sring mes bslab par bya ba'i dgos pa gsum byos shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o// gal
68b2(rgyud): ma zhig tu bgyid na bu gcig pa bzhin du bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / ges dang / nor dang / 'bras yongasu sbyong bar bgyid do// chung ma zhig tu bgyid na/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi dbang
68b3(rgyud): phyug dang bdag por bgyid cing / de dang lhag par dga' bar brtse bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyuraro// gal te sring mo zhig tu bgyid na yid la brnag pa'i 'dod pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid
68b4(rgyud): de// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyura'o// tham sa cad rgyug cing slar ldog par 'gyuraro// nyin gcig bzhin lhab lhub dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams stsol bar bgyid do// nyin cig bzhin
68b5(rgyud): gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag rtsed mo'i don du dgug par bgyid do// rnam thos kyi mgul tu bdags te khros drangs nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyid na/ de nas rnam thos mchis
68b6(rgyud): nas can cig bzhin dong rtse'i stong stsal bar 'gyur/ gser stong stsal bar 'gyur te/ des nyin gcig bzhin sbyin pa yang stsal/ bsod nams kyang bgyi'o// nag po chen po'i mgul du btags la
68b7(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khros pas lag pa g.yas pa'i thal lcags gis bdeg par bgyi'o// ga po chen pos sgra phyung ba na rig sngags 'chang skrag par mi bgyid par
68b8(rgyud): slar yang khros pas bdeg par bgyi'o// de nas mchi ma zags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis mchi ma bzed de/ thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyu'o// de nas
69a1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang yang thal mes/ bdeg par bgyi ste/ de nas nag po chen po khrag tu skrag pa rig sngags 'chang gis byug nan mkha' la mchis nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
69a2(rgyud): por 'gyu ro// gu gul gyi 'dug pas bdugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na nag po chen po rang gis gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid cing ma mar
69a3(rgyud): tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyuro// gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba bgyid pas dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// mdung rtsa gsum pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i
69a4(rgyud): cho ga'o// de nas zhags pa dang rjesu mthun pa'i mo'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs pa'i// rnam pa
69a5(rgyud): kha dog gzugs bstan pa// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi// cho 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs bstan te// lag pastong / dang mig stong dang // mtha' yas pa yi phyag rgya bstan// rnam pa
69a6(rgyud): sna tshog pa yi gzugs// khams gsum dag tu bstan pa ni// gdul bya gdul phyir gzugs bstan to// gsang ba 'di yis gzugs bstan pa// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rig sngags
69a7(rgyud): grub pa bla med pa// de nyid zhags pa sgrub phyir ro// de bas rig 'dzin shes rab can// 'jig rten pha rol rjes 'thun pa/ sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang // de bzhin gshegs kun lta ba dang / 
69a8(rgyud): bde can lta bar 'tshal ba dang / de nyid 'jig rten 'das pa yis// 'jig dbang mgon po mthong 'tshal la// mchog tu gus pas bgyi ba yi// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyis// de nyid gus pa/ 
69b1(rgyud): dad pa dang // shin tu dang ba nyid du bgyi// grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal ba la// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs bsten te// sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur// don yod rgyal po cho ga'i mchog/ don yang
69b2(rgyud): grub pa'i 'jig rten 'das// de na yad 'bras bu dam pa po// don yod kun tu grub pa 'theb// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// don yod 'jig rten 'jig rngu mgon// 'jig rten dbang phyug
69b3(rgyud): mchog sbyin pa// don yod 'jig rten ci 'tshal ba// mchog 'tshal ba ni grub par 'gyur// don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi// cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun mi 'chang// de lta bas na kun bsgrims te// bdag
69b4(rgyud): cing yong su dag bgyis nas// ji ltar chag go/ dra la bzhin// rdzasu 'thun par ri mo'i gzugs// rtag tu mo'i gzu gas blta zhing // zhags pa'i gzugs ni snga chags dang / de bzhin du
69b5(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po dang / rib sngags rgyal po de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor lha dang me lnga dang // sbyin sreg rlung lnga chu lnga dang khra bo'i gzugs dang zhi ba dang / lha dang k+Sha yang ston pa dang // gared sbyir
69b6(rgyud): srin po'i gzugs dang ni// 'byung po lha min dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci/ lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kun tu// 'jig rten mgon pos mchog sbyin bstan// gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang // rang
69b7(rgyud): pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// gzhon nu dbang phyug lha dang ni// dbang phyug chen po nyi ma dang // zla gzugs rgyu skar tshes grangs dang // 'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// gzug su 'jig rten mgan pos brdam
69b8(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan 'tshal bas// gdul ba'i don du 'gro ba'i lam/ sems can rnams la bstan pas na// de bas soma'i nyid mi bgyi// ma chab tu dad par bgyi ba lags/ ji ltar 'thun pa'i dmas
70a1(rgyud): pa rnams/ ji ltar 'thun pa bzhin du sdug/ ji ltar 'thun parar ma'i gzugs// ji ltar 'thun pa'i zhags pasgrag ba nas ni bang du'os pa dang / gang du sems ni dpa' 'gyur ba/ khom pa
70a2(rgyud): gang gis phyag rgya dang / gang gi dkyil 'khor char 'bye ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang mgo na/ kun tu sbrel ba 'dren pa'i gtse// den yang 'bras bu stsol ba'o// den yang pa yi grub pa 'thob/ don yod
70a3(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad dang / thub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni// mchog nyid la yang reg par 'gyur/ zhags pa dang rim sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas don yod pa'i las dang dgos pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg ni
70a4(rgyud): cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ sdig pa thams cad mo da la 'phrog pa/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jigs par bgying ga dgra tham sa cad 'joms pa/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ 
70a5(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa'i mchog sdig pa thams cad 'dzag par 'gyid pa/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bcu drug las grol bar bgyid pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad rtag tu
70a6(rgyud): 'phrog pa/ mi mdza' ba rnams rab tu 'joms pa/ pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa'i mchog/ nad thams cad 'jom pa mod la 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dgon
70a7(rgyud): pa 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'joms pa lnga'i bde ba 'dren par bgyid pa'i mchog de kho na nyid kyi sangs rgyas sgrub pag/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad
70a8(rgyud): sgrub par bgyid gsems can thams cad kyi thun mong mchog sbyin shin tu rnyed par dka' ga lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur gsu thams cad dga' ba 'thob 'gyur ga/ de bzhin gshegs
70b1(rgyud): pa rnams rtag tu nyin mtshan du gzigs par som nyi ma mchis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bar 'gyur gdus kun tu shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas 'jig rten dbang phyug mchos
70b2(rgyud): sbyin rtag tu mchis par som nyi ma mchis/ pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas/ blon pa dang bcas pa srung ba'i don du thams cadadu rtag tu rdza su 'brang bar 'gyur lag so// de nas rig sngags 'chang
70b3(rgyud): shes rab dang ldan pas gtsang ma'i gan su mchis nas sbyin sreg bgyis te/ gtsang ma yi ni sa phyogs sam/ ca co ma mchis dben par ni// nai ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi'o// zhi ba
70b4(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi// don du sdig pa tham sa cad 'joms// rgyas pa rgyas pa 'thob 'gyur te// thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// dgra dang log 'dren gdug pa dang // gnod
70b5(rgyud): sbyin srin po gsang ba ba// gdug sems can rnams drad pa dang / skrag par bsdigs pa drag shul spyod// gas sngags sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg ste// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i bla na med/ 
70b6(rgyud): 'jig rten 'jig rten pha rol gyi// sbyin sreg gi ni las 'gyi'o// me lha'i lha dang klu dag dang / de bzhin rig pa 'dzin pa'ang dgug/ khung brkos de la pad+ma'i tshul// pad+ma rtag tu bri bar btso// mag ji bzhin
70b7(rgyud): khung nang gi/ pad+ma la ni ge sar bgyi// gru bzhi 'am ni zlum po ste// de lta bu ni brko bar bgyi// legs par byugs shing shin tu gnas/ shin tu sbas shing ched la dpa' chos grangs rgyu skar nyid dag dang / 
70b8(rgyud): shin tu bkris dag la bgyi// bkra shis phyag rgya chen po dang // bzang po gtor ma'i las bgyi'o// bdug pa me tog la sogs pa// bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod// thog mar me lha bkug nas ni// da nas
71a1(rgyud): sbyin sredag las rnams bgyi/ rig sngags 'amang ba gtsang gyur pa/ legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i tshig bgyi// de 'tshams kyang
71a2(rgyud): bcing bar bgyi// bdag srung gtsug gtor bcing ba dang // gzhan srung dkyil 'khor bcing pa dang // de bzhin grogs bgyid srung ba dang / rgyun tu a ka'ing shing sbar te// dri yi shing rnams nyid dag dang
71a3(rgyud): mar dang yungs kar 'bras yos dag/ nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul me tog bgyi// da nas ma yi lha dgug go oM na mo ag+ni dz+wa la ma hA dzA la/ dz+rod s+yA pra b+hA/ maN+Dal/ sar+b+ba bid A hA ti/ pra hU ti rak+ti ni
71a4(rgyud): rang tuSh+Ta dz+wa la d+hu ma shA sa/ a tsiShA su kha tr-in+ta/ ra shring ba ag+ni \u0f7fbi tu trash+ya pU ta sha na mu kha na te/ sar+b+ba de bA nAM/ sar+b+ba yak+Sha ma hA bIr+ya ma hA dza la/ ma hA bA la ni ma ri shan/ sar+b+ba da stan pra pu
71a5(rgyud): la A ka ra sha sa mu gad kash+tsa a ba pra se kA shan/ maN+Dal pU dzi to/ ma ni ta sar+b+bA tra di byA rU ba bi ShA ra ba A bA hA na sar+b+ba tra bAn/ de ba d+hu ta/ sha na hu tra/ shan ta ma sa~M bi d+ha ma kan/ 
71a6(rgyud): an d+ha kA rAn/ muk+ShA shrI ma pra aM kugan d+ha pa lA ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ agra dza/ suk+Sh+ma su tAMk+Sh+Na sh+tsa mr-i ti san dzi bi na/ br-i yo ba sh+ma buSh+pa basma bas+t+ra tsa ba smA bste ni/ se bkam/ bas+tha sany+tsa d+ha ni t+yan d+hu ma mA ku la/ 
71a7(rgyud): dza ya se/ ba ka sid+d+ha ra sa b+hA tsa ra sarba tra pra d+ha ba ri shA/ sarba tri ni ra ma ri sha No// ni t+ya s+thiSh+Ta d+ha ShA na mun tsa si dA tra sha/ b+ha ba no da ba a g+ni/ mu kha de bA ta/ a ru tsi ru dzA ba la da ka ma hA na ta/ a tha pa ra No/ 
71a8(rgyud): de bde ba na/ bi shwa ra da/ a yAn tu sA d+ha ya tad tA ta/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sa ma yan/ hu ru hu ru hUM phaT swA hA// gsang sngags 'dis ni lan bdun du// zlas nas me ni dgug par bgyi// gu gul yungs
71b1(rgyud): kar mar sbyar ba/ slar bdun sbar bas ma la dbul/ mchod yon snod rnams dbul ba yang / de bzhin spar ba'i sbar bas so// dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang / bdug pa rgya chen dbul bar bgyi// de
71b2(rgyud): bzhin 'bras bu sbar bar dbul// de nas chab kyis gsang ba bgyi// ji ltar lha rnams rim bzhin du// nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bgyi// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis su// sbyin bsreg las
71b3(rgyud): ni yang dag brtsam// dri zhim shin tu dag pa dang // bla sha u dum ba ra dang // sna ma'i me tog tsam pa dang // kar ni ka ra nyid dag dang // pad+ma ud pa la zang shing dang // de bzhin dri bda'i tsan
71b4(rgyud): ngan dang // byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang / 'on te 'bras bu'i shing mang dang / sha mi shi ba'i las lags pas// mchod yon de bzhin rtsa dag ste// de dag gis ni ma
71b5(rgyud): sbar nas// sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o// 'bras yos tsand na phye ma dang // a ga ru dang du ru sa/ kun tu ru la sogs pa da / du ru skar bcas smri ka dang // spang spos pri yang
71b6(rgyud): bu blangs te// de dag lhan cig sbyar bsres shing // mar ram mar sar lan cig rdzo// don yod rgyal po'i gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma la dbul// 'phags pa spyan ras ga
71b7(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang // nam phyed na me lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shin tu gnas pa langs nas phyogs
71b8(rgyud): bcur lta zhing kun tu brtags nas rig sngags 'chang la legaso zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyuro// rig sngags 'chang legaso leg so// bdag tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis
72a1(rgyud): skyon sreg gi cho ga grub kyis mchog glengs shig dang thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams blang bar bgyi sa/ 
72a2(rgyud): ji ltar bsrungs pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon gyi snod dag dbul ba'i las bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsrem
72a3(rgyud): pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin sreg bgyi zhing 'bras bu'i shing la sbar nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// sdong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / thab kyi
72a4(rgyud): dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed tsam phyung nas dngul gyi gnod pa kha zas kyis bkang ste/ dbus mo nub tsam du dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi
72a5(rgyud): ste blangs pa tsam gyis na mkha' la 'phur ba ra 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang gis lus la me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur// 
72a6(rgyud): na mkha'i rig sngags kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// bskal pa bcu tshun chad kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// don yod rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor la
72a7(rgyud): ton du gnas par 'gyuro// gal te snod mi len na de'i tshe yang lan ni shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg 'gyis na cher g.yo bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs
72a8(rgyud): kyi mdun du mchis na rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par bgyid de rig sngags 'chang leg so leg so// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga de bsgrubs bon gyis mchog
72b1(rgyud): slongs shig dang / sbyin no zhes de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis ci bsams pa'i mchog smras pa de'i tshe thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rngu
72b2(rgyud): skyes pa de las snod blangs te/ rang gi lag na rig sngags 'chang la stsol bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gi blangs nas zas kyi gong bu de bza' bar bgyi'o// tshal ba tsam gyi mod la nam
72b3(rgyud): mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyuraro// lus las me'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyuraro// don yod rgyal po'i rig sngags 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// 
72b4(rgyud): pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po drug pa// gang ga'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa
72b5(rgyud): gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gis yongasu bskor bar 'gyuraro// gang ga'i klung gi bye
72b6(rgyud): khri phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang don yod pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i rnams 'byung bar 'gyu'o// rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang
72b7(rgyud): ri dang / tshal dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ga dang / sbal mig dang / lo ma dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gur bcas pa kha cig ni gser gyi ma
72b8(rgyud): tog kha cig ni dngul gyi me tog kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go// gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang / ta ma la dang tsam pa ka dang / lcug ma'i ma
73a1(rgyud): de ba da ta la dang / g+han bar shi ka dang / sna ma dang / yu TI ka dang / ta ra na dang / kung phya ka'i me tog dag dang / tshal dang / nags tshal dang / bskyed mos tshal
73a2(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba dga' ba dang yid du ma chis par 'gyuraro// 
73a3(rgyud): lha'i chu klung dang / 'bab chu dang / steng ka dang / rdzing lha'i tsa ra dan gyi dri chub kyis yongasu gang ba de la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal med khang dang / lha'i pad+ma dang / ud pa
73a4(rgyud): la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos legs par rgyan pa'i mar gsar gyi bya ma legs par bdal ba'i gzhal mi du khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur// lha'i bu ma dang / mi 'am ci'i tshe
73a5(rgyud): dang / dri za'i tshogs kyis dga' bar bgyis pa/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / klu dang / rig 'dzin dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing lnga'i 'byor pa'i
73a6(rgyud): gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas na thams cad du rtsa bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par 'gyu ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa nas byang
73a7(rgyud): chub la mchis kyi bar dang / chos kyi 'khor los bskor ba nas yongasu mya ngani 'das pa'i bar du tshe tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do// de bzhin du grub pa bla na med pa chen po 'phags/ 
73a8(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur te/ da ltar zas kyi gong bu sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' lag so// phyogs
73b1(rgyud): bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig 'bregs nas mchi bar 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las mngon
73b2(rgyud): sum du chos nyan pa thos par 'gyur ro// de'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos sdong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa 'phags pa
73b3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rim par bya ba'i tshi ga zhib me
73b4(rgyud): mtha' dag rdzogs par sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / cho ga zhing mo'i rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyi la 'khor 'di kho na nyid du gnas par 'gyur lag so// klu'i
73b5(rgyud): rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya steng rnams de'i dang nga du gyur nas rtag par rgyun tu mchis par 'gyuraro// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'
73b6(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// 'og min gyi gnas kyi lha rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par rgyun
73b7(rgyud): tu yangasu bskor bar 'gyur// lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba dang / bzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin du
73b8(rgyud): gos dang / lhab ljangab dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga don yang ba sgrub pa dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dru
74a1(rgyud): pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// 'on te skal ba rung pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis la des snod de blangs pa tsam gyi mod la srid
74a2(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug 'thob par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i rabal nyam su myong bar 'gyuraro// reg pa tsam gyi mod la tshe lnga'i lo brgya khri ba ni stong thub par 'gyuraro// de la phyis kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ 
74a3(rgyud): sdig pa dang ni sgrib pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyuro// phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / bdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa thams cad nub par 'gyur// sems can dmyal ba dang / 
74a4(rgyud): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'dzi garten dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig pur
74a5(rgyud): 'gyuro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u da nga / bu mo dang / sems can thaMd lta 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur// tshig btsan zhing don yod pa 'thog/ 
74a6(rgyud): bar 'gyu ro// 'gum pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs bzhed par 'gyuro// 'phags pa spyan ras dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyuro// dran pa shin tu nye bar
74a7(rgyud): gzhag nas dus byed par 'gyuraro// dus bgyis nas skal ba mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// 
74a8(rgyud): lan 'ga' yang phyir ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/ phyis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta 'i
74b1(rgyud): phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag tu mi 'gyuraro// dpral bar thig le bgyis na thams cang du mi gda' bar 'gyuraro// me lha rtag par rgyun tu dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis rang gi
74b2(rgyud): gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// dgos pa thaMd bgyid par 'gyuro// de nas don yod bsgongs pa sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang nges 'bras
74b3(rgyud): dang sran ma mang kar bsres te bsgrabal bskongs nas ma dang / bu ram dang / sha kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi lhan cig brdzis nas/ bil ba'i tshad tsam du bgyis te/ de'i 'og tung shing kar bi ra'i me sbar nas rmang
74b4(rgyud): pa re re la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i nang du sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan ga/ sum du brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sre bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'am
74b5(rgyud): yungs kar dang / ma chog ci snyed pa dang bsres ge lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyid nas ma'i dbus su la bar bgyis// 'bras yos dang yungs kar dang dra bo'i
74b6(rgyud): po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas me'i dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam phyung nas rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i snong bas bsgongs pas kang nas rig sngags 'chang la
74b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang khyad kyis zas bsgrengs pa sgrub pa'i cho ga grub zin gyis lha'i zas bskongs pa chen po long shig ces stobs par bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'tshang gis zas bskangs pa'i snod de bang
74b8(rgyud): par bgyi'o// blangs pa tsam po nas bcud kyis len du gyur nas mamakha' la 'khur bar 'gyur/ rtswa cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyuraro// lpags pa yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang 'khor las bskur
75a1(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba drug khri brgya stong gis yongasu bskor bar 'gyu ro// me lha gnas dang gzhal med khang dang bcas// 'khor dang
75a2(rgyud): bcas pa dbang du mchis nas las thams cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// gang dang gang gis zas bsgongs pa la reg pa de yang thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyuraro// don yod zhags pa'i snying
75a3(rgyud): po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par brel ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mi mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du
75a4(rgyud): gnas pa 'di nyin ni bzhin bu lo kha stong klog gam 'chang bar bgyid na tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las brdzus te skyes nas su
75a5(rgyud): ba dran par 'gyuraro// lan 'ga' yang phyis dra na ba brjod par mi 'gyu ro// tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyuraro// mchod pa chen po'i 'os
75a6(rgyud): su 'gyuro// dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas kyi sgra thams cad 'byed par 'gyuro// bud med gang
75a7(rgyud): zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgongs pa de 'tshal na bu gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rnyed nas yun ring du 'tshe zhing yid gzungs mkhas
75a8(rgyud): ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyuraro// de nas skye ba 'bum zas stsal bar 'tshal na 'o ma'i thug pa sgrub par bgyi ste/ gnas gtsang ma bcom bsgyangs par shing
75b1(rgyud): kar bi ra'i lcags mas bkrus cing don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de nas khro bo'i rgyal po chab dang yungs kar la bzlas brjod bgyis nas btor bar bgyi'o// 
75b2(rgyud): nas zas bsgongs pa gcig snad kyi nang nas phyung nas 'o thug nang du bsdu'o// de nas bgos te thog mar dkon mchog gsum la bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa
75b3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras dbang phyug la dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / 
75b4(rgyud): dam ngas rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / spongs mo ba rnams la rab tu stsal bar bgyi'o// ji
75b5(rgyud): tsam du skye bo 'bum ci 'tshal bar kha zas 'tshal du stsal kyang snod de gang ba 'am bri bar mi mngon zhing de bas pa ra mi 'gyuraro// gang zag zas de 'tshal de dag snod kyi sdig pa dang / 
75b6(rgyud): sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// dgra thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jig pa thams cad kyis tshig
75b7(rgyud): par mi 'gyuraro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa tha~Md kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// lus mnyen cing 'jam par 'gyuraro// nga ro lha ltar mnyen zhing snyan la dga' bar bgyid pa
75b8(rgyud): dbyangasu 'gyur// nag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongasu spangs par 'gyuraro// rtag tu ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba yang dag par stobs par 'gyur// tshe rjes nas bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro/ 
76a1(rgyud): bar 'gyu ro// 'o ma'i thug pas lhung bzed bkang nas de ras mthen pa gla gab med par dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas phyogs bcu'i de
76a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhung bzang de dbul bar bgyi'o// phul ba tso gyi med la na bo gang gi bye ma 'bum phrag rgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin
76a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i zas bsgrengs pa dang / lha'i 'o thug gis lhung bzad bkang ba dang / lha'i tsan dan
76a4(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i me tog sil ma bkra ma pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin du pags bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
76a5(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dang 'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i zhal zas re brgya dang ldan pa'i mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur// 
76a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khar gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyi rog sngags 'chang yon
76a7(rgyud): bdag nga'i yon sbyong bar mdzad do// gang gi phyir yon sbyangs nas skal pa dang 'thun pa'i tshe 'di nyid dang / gzhan du dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyuraro// grub pa chen po'i gser gyis 'byer
76a8(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// mdzod dang bang mdzod mang pos rgyas par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' zad blta 'tshal bar 'gyu ro// lnga dzad kyis de la/ 
76b1(rgyud): srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyuraro// de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bani dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na rib sngags 'chang nges lags
76b2(rgyud): par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas 'o thug mar dang bsres pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// sgron shing dang arga'i shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o// sbyin srag
76b3(rgyud): lan ston rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas/ mchis par 'gyuraro// nub gsum du bgyis na
76b4(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po thams cad gnas dang 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// nub lngar bgyi dan 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang lha ma
76b5(rgyud): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma lags pa thams cad dang / mi zad 'a/ khor dang bcas par dbang du gyur nas mchi bar 'gyu ro// nub bdun
76b6(rgyud): du bgyis na rigs 'dzin thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// nub thams cad du bgyis na brgya byin la sogs te sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs zad
76b7(rgyud): dang / gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo rnams babs nas dbang du gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur 'gyed bcing mchis par 'gyur/ zla ba nya nas brtsam te mar gyi de'i tshes nyi shu gsum mam
76b8(rgyud): gnam stong gi bar du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis la/ arga'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis ma sbar nas gnam stong gis rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras pa
77a1(rgyud): dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang leg se nas bgyi ba stsol bar bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang leg se legs nga mnyes par byas kyis
77a2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang smras shig dang / mchog sbyin te gang gnyer ba bde thams cad sbyin no// gter smra ba 'am/ ner bsgyur ba smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ namakha' la 'dre ba 'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ 
77a3(rgyud): gsang sngags smra ba 'am/ cha gzhib me sgrub pa de dag thams cad sbyin mo// rgyal ba nyid ngam blon pa nyid ngam/ yul bdag nyid ngam phyug pa nyid ngam/ grong rdal 'thob pa 'am/ gas 'thob pa 'am/ kha lang dang / 
77a4(rgyud): dang / ma he dang / rnga mo dang / lug 'thob 'am/ na ra 'thob pa 'am/ 'bru 'thob pa de dag thams cad sbyin no// nam 'al 'gro ba'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa
77a5(rgyud): 'am/ ting 'dzin 'thob pa 'am/ gzungs lathob pa 'am/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib me sgrub pa 'am/ ro langs bsngangs pa/ rig 'dzin grub pa nyid dam/ ral gri'i/ 
77a6(rgyud): rig 'dzin nyid dam/ na mkha' rig 'dzin nyid dam/ phug tu 'jug pa 'am/ dur khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ nagasu 'jug pa 'am/ ri la rgyu ba de dag thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi ji
77a7(rgyud): ltar yid la bsams shing smra ba de dag thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang la bstan pa tsam gyi mod la dri med don yong lta ba zhes bgyi ba lus yongasu dag pa/ 'thob par 'gyuraro// 
77a8(rgyud): rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma'i be ba'i dbus nas brdzus te skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' dzad kyis phyag
77b1(rgyud): bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang bcas pagacho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang bcas pa 'di rdzogs te byang chub kyi snying pa la thug gi bar du khA
77b2(rgyud): don du gnas par bgyi'o// de nas la du'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sdud par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des kha zas las la tu steng rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ de nas rib sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhag
77b3(rgyud): ba'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma 'pho bar bgyi'o// de nas la tu mar dang sras te sbyin sreg bgyi'o// shin
77b4(rgyud): tu dri zhim po'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me sbar bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang me'i dbus nas khye'u zhi ga byung nas snod lnga'i la tus bkang nas dbul bar bgyid do// de nas
77b5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi yungs ka ra la lan pa/ dun bzlas te khye'u de'i lag tu gte ro// khye'u des rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang ci zhig don du gnyer/ rig sngags
77b6(rgyud): 'chang gis 'dod pa thams cad byin cig ces brjed par bgyi'o// des smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang sbed kyil tu khyer cig dang / 'dis khyod kyi dgongs pa dpag tu med pa grub par 'gyur/ 'di ni khyod
77b7(rgyud): kyi bcud kyi mchog yin no// rib sngags 'chang long shig 'di ni khyod kyi thub pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sdod gang dang blangs te khye'u la yang khyed kyis kho bo'i grags
77b8(rgyud): zhig gyis ces brjod par bgyis// khye'u yis smras pa/ dgos pa thad 'grub pa'i grogs bgyi'i// rig sngag 'chang gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe gu gul dang tsan dan lhan cig 'asres la bar
78a1(rgyud): dang yungs kar sbyangs don yang lcags kyus lan bdun bzlas te sbyin sreg bgyi'o// a cha'i shing gi ma sbar ro// sbyin sreg bgyis pa tsam gyi med la bdag bsnga
78a2(rgyud): pas mod la mchis nas dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyi'o// las thams cad bgyi'o// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyis shing bkur stir spyad par bgyi'i// 'gegs dang / log
78a3(rgyud): 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pa thaMd bzlob par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi la tu de la reg par bgyis na na mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang gi rigs
78a4(rgyud): thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang zad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba sa ya phrag gnyis dang / bye ba brab bdun
78a5(rgyud): gyis yongasu bskor bar 'gyuraro// tshe'i tshad/ lnga'i bskal ba drug drir 'gyuraro// sgo cung zad 'byir bar yang 'gyu ro// la tu lhung bzed kyi nang du sprul te/ 'bags pa sbyin ras
78a6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas don yad rgyal ba'i khro bos dbang bskur te/ de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rdu'u rigs dang / smras pa dang / bud med dang / 
78a7(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la stsal bar bgyi ste/ long spyod du stsal kyang bas par mi 'gyur gyi sngar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du lhung bzed na la tu mchis pa de srid du 'gyur// ji srid du
78a8(rgyud): skye bo 'bum 'dum mang zhing phal che bar sprul kyang gtugs par mi 'gyuraro// la tu la don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na da'i 'og tu gang du reg pa de yang gser ba sa/ 
78b1(rgyud): bor 'gyur ro// la tu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi ste klu'i gnas 'phangs na de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po mthar gtugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis
78b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ bsgo na char mi 'bab pa bsgo ba bzhin char 'ded par bgyid do// ci bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyuraro// ha cang char ches na bsgo ba bzhin ha cang char chen po 'gums pa
78b3(rgyud): bgyid do// rlung dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / ser ba thams cad sgo ba tsam gyis gcod par bgyid do// phug gi sgor la tu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas phug gi sgor bsnun
78b4(rgyud): na dug gi sgo zad 'bye bar 'gyu ro// 'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang sgo glags thams cad dum bur bca ga par 'gyu ro// gnas na gnas pa thaMd phyir byung nas rig
78b5(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te ba sgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyuraro// nags tshang tshing gi dbusu 'phangs na nags tshang tshing gi gnas kyi sgo dzad phye nas sman
78b6(rgyud): gyi rdzas thaMd rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis par 'gyuraro// la tu la lan 'dun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dur khrod chen po'i dbus 'phangs na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pa
78b7(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi sgo zad 'bya bar 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad sgren mor gyur nas dzad dbang du mchis par mchis par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i tha
78b8(rgyud): du bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyuraro// rma ma byung ba'i mi ro dri chab kyis khrus bgyis la la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod 'gyis te/ lab pa gnyis sul tu stsal la/ gos dkar pos
79a1(rgyud): ro g.yogs nas khro bo'i rgyal po yungs dkar dang chab la lan bdun bzlas nas dbang bskur na ci dris pa de dag thaMd smra bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang / lo legs pa
79a2(rgyud): dang / lo nongs pa dang / nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung dang / phas kyi dgra bo dang / mdza' ba'i 'dzob pa dang / mi ngas dang yams kyi nad de dag dzad smra bar 'gyuraro// 
79a3(rgyud): lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba smra bar 'gyur zhing / dmyal bar skye ba smra bar 'gyuraro// tshe ring ba 'am/ tshe thung ba smra bar 'gyuraro// dus ma lags pa'i 'chi ba sgra
79a4(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// gter gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur te/ nor bsgyur ba'i gtam mam/ zhing gi gtam mam/ mig 'phrul gyi gtam smra bar 'gyuraro// cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang / gas
79a5(rgyud): sngags 'grub pa dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub par smra bar 'gyuraro// mig sman 'grub pa dang / ril bugrub pa smra bar 'gyur// na mkha' la mchi ba dang / mi gad
79a6(rgyud): bar bgyi ba dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / mig mngag pa dang / dgra chad pas bcad cing dbang du bgyi ba de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyuraro// sgyu thabs smra bar 'gyu ro// nyams pa
79a7(rgyud): smra bar 'gyuraro// 'phel ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas bskal pa las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi chab
79a8(rgyud): kyis khar stsal la la tu blangs na ro 'gyel bar 'gyuraro// la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyal po'i bskor bsnun na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas
79b1(rgyud): bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// grong khyer gyi sgor bsnun na grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang / bu mo thad dbang du gyur nas mchis par
79b2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing nor chen po 'du bar 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyuro// mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyuraro// la tu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i lag par stsal na
79b3(rgyud): dpal lha mo chen mo dbang du gyur nas nor chen po stsol cing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyuraro// la tu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas phug ma'i nang du sbar
79b4(rgyud): te mtshan khung du bsrel bar bgyi ste/ ji tsam du bsrel ba de srid du mi gda' bar gyur nas gang du stsal ba dera' jug par 'jug par 'gyuraro// gang na shing gcig gam 'bab
79b5(rgyud): chu gcig pa ra la tu la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste dbang bskur nas shing gi drung du brdag na 'dod dgur bsgyur ba dbang du gyur nas mchis par
79b6(rgyud): 'gyu ro// ji ltar bsams pa'i 'dod pa thad nye bar mchis nas yongasu spyod pa dang / ji srid mtsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ma mo'i gnas
79b7(rgyud): su rag po chen po'i spyi bcug tu bzhag la khro ba'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te chab dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyis na/ de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma tha~Md dbang du
79b8(rgyud): gyur nas mngag bzhub pa las tha~Md gyid par 'gyuraro// la tu la lan nyi rtsa gcig bzlas te/ nab po chen po'i lte ba'i phyogasu bzhag na ma mo'i tshogs tha~Md rang gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis nas mchog
80a1(rgyud): thams cad tshum par 'gyur/ khas thams cad bgying par 'gyuro/ la dul lan bcwacwa brgyad 'das rjod babyi nas sa gas pa 'jam dpas kyi snang baphred kyimang du ra/ 
80a2(rgyud): te khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bgyis na ji srid du lhung bzed nas tu mchis pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas re sna chags kyi ri'i mche ga dang
80a3(rgyud): ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par bgyis par 'gyur// de bzhin gang shegs pa de dag tsha/
