80a4(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan gyis kyi dge 'dun dang bcas bdeg gi rig sngags 'chang de'i yon sbyong ba mdzad par 'gyuraro// la tu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
80a5(rgyud): bgyis te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbang skur la lcan sa kyu'i rgyal pos chab la bzlas brjod bgyis na me zab kyi mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o// de nas arga'i lam sreg shing gis ma sbar la
80a6(rgyud): la tu de mthab kyi dbusu bzhag ste/ mar dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi bsres pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyir sreg bgyis// lan brgya rtsa brgyad chang ba dang / ma lha me'i rang bzhin gzugs kyis byung
80a7(rgyud): nas rig sngags la sbas pa/ rig sngags 'chang leg so leg so// bdag tshim par bya'o// bdag dga' bar 'gyur to// rig sngags 'chang bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyis rig sngags 'chang ji ltar
80a8(rgyud): yid la bsams shing 'dod pa smros zhig dang mchog sbyin no// rig snga la rang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog brjed par bgyi'o// me lha des kyang zad stsol cing dbang du gyur nas mchis/ 
80b1(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// las thams cad grub par stsol bar 'gyur ro// me'i phung po'i dbusu zhugs na 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnams gangs bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur te chab nas byung ba bzhin no// lag
80b2(rgyud): bas me rnams tshugs par bgyid do// 'bar nga bzhin du klad pa'i spyi bor bzhag na sgra nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshig par mi bgyid do// me'i dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyu ro// 'bar bzhin du g.yar gyi nang du bsrel
80b3(rgyud): na chung zad dro ba tsam du yang mi 'gyuraro// lus la bab na ji ltar tsan dan bzhin du bsil zhing bde bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyuraro// gos kyi mtha' mar thum po bgyis na
80b4(rgyud): tshig par mi 'gyuraro// chab kyi nang du sbrul na 'gum bar mi 'gyu ro// sbyin sreg thams cad kyi cho ga so so'i gzug su mchis bar 'gyur// thad du dgos pa 'di yan grub pa stsol bar 'gyuraro// 
80b5(rgyud): dgos pa gang dang gang du bskos pa de dang der dgos pa thaMd grub pa stsol bar 'gyuro// zad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga sgrub pa thad lung 'bog par 'gyur// 
80b6(rgyud): du ba dang / rlung dang / ma 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag tshad stong du mchis shing slar yang ldeg par 'gyuraro// dgos pa thaMd nye bar ston par 'gyu ro// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyu ro// thad du
80b7(rgyud): grub pa stsol bar 'gyu ro// de nas don yod ma 'bar ba// bla med 'bar bzang sgrub 'tshal na// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang / gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas// phyogs bcu'i kho ra khor yug bi/ kun nas
80b8(rgyud): su ni gsal bar bgyid// sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'tshed pa bla na med pa 'grub// bcud kyi mchog ste dam pa lags// nor sbyar smra ba bla na med// gzhan yang 'tshed pa sna tshogs pa// sgrub pa bla na
81a1(rgyud): med pa lags// ji ltar nyin mtshan gda' bas na// nyin par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs// lan gcig dgos pa sgrub pa na// legs par las bgyis nor bu dang / rdza
81a2(rgyud): srel lags par bgyis pa la// gtsang mas bzlas pa'i las rnams dang // gtsang mas spyad pas sgrub pa dang / den yod cha dang me dang ni// me yi shing rnams brjod par bgyi// ma 'bar 'od
81a3(rgyud): dang mtshungs pa ste// de dag thad cig spungs pa'i// yam sreg cho ga bla na med// tsan dan dang ni seng ldeng dang // pa tang ka ra bi ra dang // arga sha mi sgyug ma dang / shing sha karna ka ri ka/ 'o ma'i
81a4(rgyud): shing dang byang chub shing // p+lag sha dang ni sna ma dang // gan d+ha bar shi pad+ma yi// rtsa ba dang ni le mar bcas// pad+ma dkar po ku mu dang // ud pa la me tog lo ma \u0f7f/ bi dza pu ra bil
81a5(rgyud): bang ging // sin du bai ra tsam pa ka/ dre ka'i nu ma rnge tsa// sa ha ba la tsi dra ka shing de kun ka bsdus pa yi// yam srag dashing gis las bgyis te// yungs kar mar dang ni dang ni// sbru
81a6(rgyud): 'bras yos sbyin sreg dbye// bzang po'i zangs las srang gsum dang // mtshal las gnyis gyur gang bskus kyang // srang gcig tsan dan dkar po nyid// srang bcu ldong ros srang gcig ste// de dag bsres
81a7(rgyud): ba'i rdzas rnams dang / de bzhin lung ni nyis 'gyur dag/ zhib dag ni bkang ra su// ma thab dbusu bzhug par bgyi// sbyin sreg stang ni rtsa brgyad du// shin tu mnyam gzhag lags gsal ba// gtsang ma btsa
81a8(rgyud): mar spyod pa yi// gos gtsang legs par khrus bgyis pa// dri zhim dri yis bsgos par bgyi// ra sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang / me ngag 'bras bu nyid kyang dgang // bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin sreg nyid// 
81b1(rgyud): stong brgyad ni tshang ba dang // de nas lha bshos gtor ma dang // me tog 'dug pa mchod yon snod// dbul te 'o mas mdag ma dgum// 'o mas zhig zhi bar gyi// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi bzlas
81b2(rgyud): brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis nas yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyid shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de nas zhig 'bar bar 'gyu ro// de nas rig sngags
81b3(rgyud): 'chang gis ni ga de la mchod par bgyi'o// de nas zangs kyi sgron bu 'am/ dngul gyi sgrom bur zhi ga nas nor bu blangs te/ sbom bu der bzhag par bgyi ste/ yid bzhin gyi nar bu ji lta ba bzhin du
81b4(rgyud): 'di yang don yod pa 'bar ba mthu chen pa mthu dang ldan par 'gyuraro// mtshan mo ni zla ba'i 'od bzhin du dgada' bar 'gyuraro// nyin mo ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda'
81b5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// nam 'tshod pa'i dus kyi tshe nar bu de bzhag na 'tsho ba dang / sreg pa dang / 'tshed pa zang drub par 'gyuraro// nam hom bgyid pa de'i tshe thab kyi dbus su
81b6(rgyud): bzhag ste/ sregs blugs kyi sbyin sreg bgyis na me chen po 'bar bar 'gyuro// thams cad kyi thad du dgos pa rnams sgron mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyuro// g.yul ngo chen
81b7(rgyud): bor g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus skyes pa dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis pa// gos gtsang mas bgos pa/ ya lad dang / go char bsdams pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po der
81b8(rgyud): spyi bo'i btsug tu bzhag nas gcig pu g.yul gyi dbu su zhugs na de nas skyes pa de me 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyu ro// de nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i pha rol gyi dpung rnams pham par gyur nas
82a1(rgyud): phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas 'byer bar 'gyu ro// phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pha rol gyi dpung dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur// pha rol gyi
82a2(rgyud): dgra dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// lag pas nor bu bzung nas phug gi gan su zhugs na gnas kyi sgra zad 'byer bar 'gyuraro// gnas na gnas pa zad mdun du
82a3(rgyud): mchis par 'gyuraro// klu'i gnas thad du mchis nas lag pas nor bu bzung ste/ gnas kyi nang du zhugs na chab zad kyi phyir mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// de nas klu zad mdun du mchis nas bden par
82a4(rgyud): dam bca' bar 'gyur// dbang du gyur nas dzasa? da 'tsho ba'i bar du las bgyid par 'gyur// bsgo ba bzhin bgyid pa ra 'gyuraro// me tog dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / nags tshal
82a5(rgyud): thams cad bde bar 'phel bar 'gyur/ snyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang mnyen par 'gyur// ga da dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / mi bar ba chung bar
82a6(rgyud): yang 'gyuraro// sems can gang dag gis yang lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de dag thad dang / gzhan ches mang po dag gis dgos pa mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba
82a7(rgyud): ni nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba'i chen po lags// de nas don yod snang ba rnam par lta bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste/ rang gi gzugasu blta bar
82a8(rgyud): 'tshal na de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bge 'ar bgyi'o// lus legs par 'akrus te spos chab kyis byug par bgyi'o// shing a na'i yam sreg shing gos mi sbar bar
82b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// yungs kar dang / a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar sbyar bas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas don yod lcags kyu gu gul las lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi
82b2(rgyud): sregs blugs kyi sbyin sreg bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/ mchog zad bsams pa bzhin yongasu rdzogs par bgyid// 
82b3(rgyud): ji ltar yid la bgyid cing bsams pa'i mchog stsol bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bgyid shing bsams pa'i mchog smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu 'phags
82b4(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thad stsol bar bgyid do// de nas mig sman sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang legs par bkrus te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bab hA
82b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// nub gcig bsnang ba bgyis te// des zangs kyi za ma tog 'gyis la de nas mag sman so bi ra dang yungaganyis 'gyur du bsres pas dgang bar bgyi'o// de nas stong
82b6(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis ras thab kyi dbusu bzhag par bgyi'o// de'i steng du u shi ra dang / yungs kar dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pas lan steng rtsa brgyad
82b7(rgyud): sbyin sreg bgyi'o// shing arga'i me sbar bar 'gyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas mig sman blangs la rtun gyi steng du legs par zhib tu btags la/ ldong ros dang / ga pur dang / glang
82b8(rgyud): rtsi bsres nas slar yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjed gyis la don yang lcags kyu'i rig sngags rgyal ba lan nying shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjed bgyid pa ni/ 
83a1(rgyud): thams cad du mgul ba legs par sbyar te/ de ras de na yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// don yad zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan bdun phyag
83a2(rgyud): rgya bcing ngo // de nas mig sman gyis byugs nan mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang zad kyi dben por 'gyur// / skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur// bskal pa khrir 'tsho
83a3(rgyud): bar 'gyuro// dpral bar thig le bgyis nas mi gda' bar 'gyuro// mig la bskus te tshig gzhan mi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur
83a4(rgyud): nas mchis par 'gyuraro// mchod pa phal po ches cher mchod par 'gyur// nor 'du ba grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur// sgrub pa'i dus sam bzlas brjed kyi dus su mig la bskus
83a5(rgyud): na dbegs dang / leg 'dren dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur// byis kyang bgegs byed par mi nus te/ bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur// bde ba sgrub pa'i
83a6(rgyud): mchog dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga grub par 'gyuraro// mig la byug te skye ngo mang po'i nang du zhugs na de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te nor dang 'bru dang / gos dang lhab lcab rgyan pal po cha 'grub
83a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// bud med kyang mig mi mdzums par bsdu bzhin du bdag nyid ngam/ nar dbang du 'gyur/ mig la byugs te dgon pa chen par zhugs na tshim pa dang / g.yon can dang / rkun pa dang / bcan
83a8(rgyud): zan gdugs pa dang / sbrul dang / dbyig dug dang / sbrul gyi dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ bde lag su sngar yang mchi bar 'gyuraro// 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'byed/ 
83b1(rgyud): pa thams cad la mig sman bskus na smra ba rnams kyi bla na med par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyuraro// g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du mchis na mig la byugs na thaMd las rgyal
83b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyuraro// gdugs pas zin pa thams cad la mig la bskus na gdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur// rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag
83b3(rgyud): gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / rims zhag bzhi pa thams cad la mig la bskus na rims rang thams cad las grol bar 'gyuraro// dug mi bzad pa 'tshal ba la mig la bskus na dug ma
83b4(rgyud): mchis par 'gyuraro// gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la mig la ba skus na gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong las thar par 'gyuraro// mig bro 'tshal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la byang bar 'gyuraro// 
83b5(rgyud): grang ba mar dro 'tshal ba la yang mig la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyuraro// tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon dang / brjed byed kyi sa zin pa la mig la bskus pa tsam gyis
83b6(rgyud): thar par 'gyuraro// rgyal po khros pas bsad par 'os pa gang su yang rung ba srid pa mig la bskus pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad spang ba'i thar par 'gyur// nag po chen po
83b7(rgyud): mig la bskus na rang gi gzu kyis dus su mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol cing dgos pa thams cad bgyod par 'gyuraro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis
83b8(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// dpal lha mo'i mig la bskus te mig mi 'dzums par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na dpal lha mo chen mo mchis nas dgos pa thams cad dang / 'bru
84a1(rgyud): rab tu mang po stsol bar 'gyur ro// nyal ba'i tshe mig la bskus te nyal na rmi lam bzang po mang zhing phal che ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras
84a2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs mthong ba stsol bar 'gyu ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyu ro// dran pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyuraro// mig la bskus te tshogs kyi dbus su
84a3(rgyud): zhugs na mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu blta 'tshal
84a4(rgyud): bar 'gyu ro// gi'u wang dang / ldan cig sgyur te mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyu ro// longs spyod chen po dun
84a5(rgyud): sum tshogs par yang 'gyuraro// don chen po 'grub par yang 'gyur// rgyal po btsun mo dang / blon / 'i tshogs dang / 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas
84a6(rgyud): thams cad dbang du gyur te mchis par 'gyuraro// dpal lha mo chen mo'i gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag par 'gyur zhing las bgyi ba
84a7(rgyud): mchis zhes thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi dpral ba dang mig la bskus na gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// 
84a8(rgyud): mi ro'i mig la bskus na ldang bar 'gyuraro// gsang sngags dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / gsang sngags
84b1(rgyud): thams cad bshig par 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang slar zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro// bkres pa'i mig la bskus te grong du zhugs na bza' ba dang / btung ba'i ston ma ldan
84b2(rgyud): gyis 'grub cing 'thob par 'gyuraro// bsod snyoms pa'i mig la bskus te bsod snyoms la mchis na kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang / yin pal po che 'thob par 'gyuraro// sme ba dang / 
84b3(rgyud): ling rdog dang / rab rib dang / chu bur dang / mtshan mo 'thob pa dang / g.ya' ba dang / tshag po dang / mig gi rdzi ma rngu ba dang / mig sle bo de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// mig nang
84b4(rgyud): thams cad las sos par 'gyu ro// lha'i mig dag pa mdab bzang dang / mtshungs pa mdab bzang kyi mthong ba thob nas thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / dbang
84b5(rgyud): du gyur nas nor rnyed pa dang / don grub par nga yang thob nas dbang phyug bla na med par 'gyuraro// de nan dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lbub lhub dang / rgyan dang / rgyan 'phyang
84b6(rgyud): thams cad dgug pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / don yod ma lha dgug pa'i sbyin sreg rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o// grub pa kun gyi bla na med// don kun grub pas mod la ni/ 
84b7(rgyud): mkhas rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid// dbang phyug bskal pa phun sum tshogs// mod nyid kho nar 'thob 'gyur bar// the tshom du yang mi bgyi zhing / yid gnyis nyid kyang ma lags// 
84b8(rgyud): gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos dag dang // legs par bkrus pas las sgrub po// sbyin sreg bla na med 'phel ba// 'di ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab// ka ran rtsa ba sdong bu bcas/ 
85a1(rgyud): mdab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas// arga'i shing dang blag shing gi yam sreg dag gis me sbar la// sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas/ 
85a2(rgyud): 'bras yos til dang yungs kar dang / zho dang sbrang rtswa mar dang ni// yungs mar dag dang bsres pa yi// sprin sreg steng rtsa brgyad tshang bgyi// khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis
85a3(rgyud): dbang bskur ba dang / de nas don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gu gul dang / skye tshe'i 'bras bu dang mar du sbyar bas sbyin sreg bgyi'o// 
85a4(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / de'i tshe bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gnas mal dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod
85a5(rgyud): dang khang pa 'phel ba yang 'gyuraro// gos sna tshogs dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang / rgyan 'byang dang / ma to ka dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub
85a6(rgyud): par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// dbang phyug gi 'byor pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyuro// de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig mchis
85a7(rgyud): nas mig la bskus te/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ de nas mig la mig sman gyi
85a8(rgyud): bskus nan mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis par 'gyuro// mag sman grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// skra cung zad 'khyil
85b1(rgyud): bar yang 'gyuraro// bskal ba khrir 'tshe bar 'gyuraro// mig sman 'dis mig la byugs na nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing mi gda' 'a bar 'gyuraro// 'byung po dang / gnod
85b2(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad du zhugs na thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyuraro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po
85b3(rgyud): bdun pa// mig sman 'dis mig lo byugs nas ma mo'i gnasu zhugs na// lha gtso bo de dag mig mi 'dzums par lta bar bgyid pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas
85b4(rgyud): par bgyi'o// de nas ma mo dang lha'i gtso bo thams cad mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyu ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las thams cad sgrub par
85b5(rgyud): bgyid pas mchis par 'gyuraro// ma mo'i/ tshogs thams cad kyis yongs bkur cing snying du sdug pa/ ra 'gyu ro// rtag par rgyun tu srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sgra
85b6(rgyud): ba'i phyir gnas shing rje su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// de nas gi'u zang sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ don yod rgyal po grub pa yis// rig sngags 'chang ba 'de myong zhing // lha dang / 
85b7(rgyud): lha min mchod pa dang // sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang / dbang du 'gyur ba dam pa dang / mkha' la mchi ba'i dam pa dang / mi snang shin tu rnyed dka' dang // mod la phug tu 'jug pa dang / 
85b8(rgyud): nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang / ri sul dag tu 'jug pa dang / thang dag la ni rgyu ba dang / klu gnas mtsher ni 'jug pa dang / de bzhin chu klung che bsgral dang / rdzu 'phrul grub dang skyed pa dang / de bzhin 'jis/ 
86a1(rgyud): dang sgrib kun dang // nad kun ni bar bgyid pa nyid// sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// g.yul ngor g.yul las rgyal bgyid de// rtag tu dgra kun brlab
86a2(rgyud): par bgyid// gdon rigs kun dag tshar gcod cing // rims rnams thams cad zlog par bgyid// sngon gyi sgrib pa 'jig bgyid cing // sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// dang
86a3(rgyud): phyug stsol cing skal pa stsol// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar 'gyid// 'thab pa 'thab ma rtsod pa dang / 'gyid pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid// bcing ba dang ni shing skrag dang // bong sgril lcags skrag phye mar
86a4(rgyud): glog// rgyal po gdug pa khros pa yis// bsad par 'os pa sel bar bgyid// da ltar 'di la bstan pa nas// mi bdag bu sdug bzhin smra zhing / mi bde kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'di ni kun tu sdug pa dang // gnas
86a5(rgyud): kun mchis par mchod par 'os/ lus can snying du rtag/ tu sdug/ rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa'i// rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur// dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang ni// rgyal
86a6(rgyud): rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs dang // bud med kun dang de bzhin du// smras pa khye'u bu mo yi// rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur/ gi'u wang bla na med pa po// 'di la gang dag rtag rten na
86a7(rgyud): 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ste/ mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod pa bgyid// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// nyin dang mtshan du srung ba dang / rtag tu mchog stsol phyir mchis so// gzhan yang lha na
86a8(rgyud): mang po dang / klu'i rgyal po mthu man dang / 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang / grul bum mi min lto 'phye ma// dri za lha min nyid dag dang // namakha' lding dbang mthu chen te// de dag thams cad srung ba li/ 
86b1(rgyud): ched du nyin dang mtshan dag tu/ rang dbang nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur// gi wang grub pa dam pa'o// de ltar stobs dang ldan pa lagra// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis// gtsang gyur legs par
86b2(rgyud): khrus bgyis nas// gtsang ma yi ni gos bgo ste// gi wang legs par bsgrubs na su// dmar po chen po nyid dag dang // gur gum dag dang ma'ams sbyar la// zangs kyi snod du bkang nasu// don yod
86b3(rgyud): zhags pa'i gzugs mdun du// sdang rtsa brgyad ni tshangs bzlas nas// rgya dar gyis ni kha dgum mo// de nas seng ldeng gi shing dang // arga'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me sbar la// 'bras yos dang yungs
86b4(rgyud): kur dang / gu gul dang / 'bras dang / til dang / bsres la/ no dang sbrang rdzi mar du bsres te lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan sto nga rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas me zhi zhing me mdag
86b5(rgyud): phra mo yang zhi ba dang thal ba blangs te/ snod kyi nang du stsal nas de nas slar yang lan brgya rna brgyad bzlas la/ khro bo'i rgyal ba sa dbang skur te/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang
86b6(rgyud): bskuro// de nas dpral ba'i dbusu thig le bgyis nas namakha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang chen po'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuro// rig sngags 'chang thaMd kyi dben par gyur
86b7(rgyud): zhing sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyuraro// lo dgu khri dgu stong du 'tshe bar 'gyur zhing gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed par 'gyur// dpral ba la theg le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas
86b8(rgyud): gnas thams cad du zhugs na gnas tha~Md kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyuraro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin
87a1(rgyud): po mthu dang ldan pa thams cad kyis yongasu bskor nas mchis par 'gyur// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bska ba bzhin gyid par 'gyur// mig la bsdus na ji ltar
87a2(rgyud): nyin par bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing thams cad du btar mthong bar 'gyuro// sa'i phug dang / thang bi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyu ro// thang gi gnas su zhugs nas thang gi dges pa dzad bgyi ste/ sngar
87a3(rgyud): yang mchi bar 'gyur// chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na khyim dang gzhal med khang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyuraro// rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur
87a4(rgyud): chab la gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thad du dang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur// klu'i mtsho dang gnasu ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur// lus mtha'
87a5(rgyud): dag byugs te g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs na ya lad dang go cha 'gas pa bzhin du mthong nas tha mas cad las rgyal bar 'gyur// khar bsrel te rgyal po'i
87a6(rgyud): drang du zhugs na btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyu ro// gang la tshig smras pa de dag thaMd bgyis par 'gyu ro// gang la blangs pa de dag thams cad sbar bar 'gyur
87a7(rgyud): gang la bsgo ba de thaMd bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyu ro// khar 'chos nas gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der skyes pa dang bud med dang / bu mo zad bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis
87a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur// lag pa g.yas pa byugs nasu reg pa de dbang du 'gyur// nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyib dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las bgyis pa dang / no shas 'tsho ba dang / mngag bzhug pa rnams/ 
87b1(rgyud): dbang du gyur nas bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyuraro// mdzub mo g.yas pa la bskus na ser ba dang / sprin dang / 'drug gi dus sprin la mngon sum du bstan te bsdigs na/ grang ba dang / rlung dang
87b2(rgyud): ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu ril gyis mnan par 'gyur// char ha cang ches na lag pa g.yas pa sprin la mngon sum du bstan pas ha cang char cha
87b3(rgyud): ba gcod par 'gyuraro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil la byugs nas klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i chu la thal ma lan gsum brdabs na de'i mad la klu'i rgyal pos
87b4(rgyud): char gyi rgyun chen po gtong bar 'gyuraro// gal te mo da la char ba mi 'bebs na de'i tshe lan lnga brdeg pa dang / klu de dag thams cad kyi char gyi rgyan gtong bar 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe char
87b5(rgyud): pa mi 'bebs pa de'i tshe klu thams cad las klad pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyu ro// gal te lan bdun bsnun na klu'i rgyal rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug
87b6(rgyud): bsngal 'byung bar 'gyuraro// klu'i rgyal po thaMd kyi rig sngags 'chang phung bar bgyis par 'gyuraro// gdon gyis zin pa thad kyi mig la bskus na bskus pa tsam gyi med la gdon brgyad
87b7(rgyud): stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// rims kyis thebs pa rnams kyi dpral ba la thig le bgyis na// rims zhag gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ yin bzhi pa'i
87b8(rgyud): rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// nad kyi zin pa rnams la khrus bgyis na mod la nad zad las thar par 'gyuro// ka bkra dang / mdze dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / shu ba dang / 
88a1(rgyud): 'brum bu rnams las thar par 'gyur ro// g.ya' ba dang / ldog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / shu ba mched pa dang / 'brum bu pra mo mched pa la byugs pa tsam gyis
88a2(rgyud): thar par 'gyuro// gdug pas zin pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis mig gdug par 'gyu ro// dug gis myos par bgyid pa thams cad la 'tshal ba tsam gyis thar par 'gyur ro// le ra ba dang / 
88a3(rgyud): sman dang / dmu chu dang / mchin pa na ba dang / rtsib logs na pa dang / snying na ba dang / chu sen pa dang / gnang rang dang / tshad pa dang / gcin sri ba dang / gsung pa dang / ma nu ba dang / rtug sems la bsres
88a4(rgyud): nas 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la zhi bar 'gyurazhing phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyuraro// tshegs mar gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te/ pug gi sgo dang / nye bar mchis
88a5(rgyud): nas lag pa g.yas pa yang byugs te/ mge la thal mo brdabs na phug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyuraro// bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug ste/ slar cung zad kyang bgags
88a6(rgyud): bgyis par mi 'gyuraro// gnas de na gnas pa gang lag pa de dag thaMd dbang du gyur nas mdun na mchis par 'gyuraro// dgas pa sgrub pa chen po zad 'grub par 'gyuraro// rkang pa gnyis la byug
88a7(rgyud): te/ me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na me lha rang gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis nas lag pa nas bzung ste/ rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang bdag gi gzhal med khang gi gan su zhug
88a8(rgyud): shig rig sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba zad sgrub par bgyi'o zhes smra ba na/ de'i tshe rig ka 'a rang gis bgyi ba ci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste/ thams cad bgyid par 'gyur// dpung ba
88b1(rgyud): gnyis la blugs ma glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyuraro// brla gnyis la byug na tshug pa ma mchis pa'i gyad du 'gyur// byin pa gnyis la byug na 'bab chu chen po'i pha rol tu rnal
88b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// mgrin pa la byugs nas nags khung du zhugs na nags khung gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas sman gyi rdzas zad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur te ci 'tshal
88b3(rgyud): bde blang bar bgyi'o// gi wang gi ril bu bgyis ta khar bsrel nas ri sul dang // sman gang kong du zhugs nas skad drag po lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste/ ri sul dang sman gshong gi gnas gsang
88b4(rgyud): ba'i sgo bang dag lags pa 'byar bar 'gyur zhing // de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag zad rang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing las thams cad bgyid par
88b5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de nas rtsa dang shing gal ba dang / nags tshang tshing gi sman gyi rdzas gang lags pa dag rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog
88b6(rgyud): de dag la 'dzag la/ bcud srung ba de dag kyang rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas thad dbang du 'gyuraro// ji ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba ma mchis par dgos pa thaMd babyid par 'gyuraro// snying khar
88b7(rgyud): thig la bgyis nas snying la cung zad ci bsams pa dang / yid la bsams shing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la grub par 'gyuraro// lho la thig le bgyis na kha zas dang
88b8(rgyud): btung ba'i sngon mo 'dod dgu thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ phun sum tshogs pa thaMd lhun gyis 'grub par 'gyur// rtsib log gnyis la byugs na ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer bI
89a1(rgyud): gos rnams 'thab par 'gyu ro// sgal tshigs la byugs na ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i mal dang / stan 'thob par 'gyuro// rna ba la byugs sa ma/ gnang dang gnang
89a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi gnas su byugs na ji ltar bsams pa'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub palnga 'gyur// mjug do la byugs na lha'i bzhon pa thob par 'gyuraro// nyin gcig bzhin rang par tshig gzhan me smra bar
89a3(rgyud): gi wang gi ril bu re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas nas 'tshal te/ nyi ma dang po la tshigasu bcad pa sdeng bklags na 'dzin par 'dzin par 'gyur// nyin gcig bzhin nyis 'gyur du
89a4(rgyud): bgyis nas 'dzin par 'gyu ro// zhag bdun gyi thogs pa mang por 'gyur// ga cu bzhir bgyis na mi 'am ci me lta bu'i snga dngangasu 'gyure// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyis
89a5(rgyud): na thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gru ro// ka la bing ka'i dbyangs lngar mnyen zhing snyan la rna ba'i sgra dbyangasu 'gyur// du'i ched du mar ba ldan cig stsal na bya rog/ 
89a6(rgyud): lta bu dang me sham rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyuraro// brtson rar stsal ba dang / shing smig dang / lcags glags dang / gtan pa dang / khang spel la blugs na byugs pa tsam gyis med la dul du
89a7(rgyud): dum bur chag par 'gyur// 'thar bar 'gyur// tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ chos bcwa lnga la don yang rgyal ba'i snying po lan bdun bzlas la khro bo'i rgyal bas rang la dbang bskur nas gi'u thang
89a8(rgyud): gi ril bu dang spos chab bsres pas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dzad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa zad rnam par 'dzag par 'gyur// nub gsum du khrus bgyis na gsang sngags / 
89b1(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / sgrub pa dang / grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyu ro// phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / sdig pa tha~Md kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// lan 'ga' yang
89b2(rgyud): thaMd kyi thams cad du 'jig pa mi 'byung zhing yongasu thar par 'gyuraro// phyis lan 'ga' yang sdig pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro// gi'u wang gi ril bu til mar dang bsres te kha gdong la byA Na
89b3(rgyud): nas rgyal po'i mdun du mchis na bu bzhin du bang du 'khyud nas dga' ba chen po 'thob pa dang / rgyal po khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyure/ lus thog thag tu byugs nas bas
89b4(rgyud): bar 'os pa'i lus la yang mtshon gyis phog par mi 'gyur te/ dum bu dum bur chags par 'gyuro// mda' 'phangs na lus la 'bab par mi 'gyur zhing gzhu chags par 'gyur// 
89b5(rgyud): ki'u wang gi ril bu mgul du btags nas 'brod dgon pa dang / ri dang nags tshang tshong gi skrod dka' bar zhugs na chom po dang / gal can dang / rkun po dang / gnad sbyin dang / sran
89b6(rgyud): po dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa dang / gcan zan gdugs pa dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ mi gda' bar 'gyuraro// dpung pa gas pa la bdags na
89b7(rgyud): dzad du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyur/ dzad du mchod gnas chen par yang bcu ro// thad du mthu dang 'artson 'grus chen po rdzob med pas pha rol zil gyis gnon par 'gyur// dpung pa g.yon pa
89b8(rgyud): la btags na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu ma dzad kyi nang chen du 'gyur te/ thams cad lha 'tshal bar 'gyur// mched pa'i 'os chen par 'gyur// dgos pa mang pa 'grub par 'gyur/ 
90a1(rgyud): byin pa g.yas pa la btags na dub pa ma marnyi la dpag tshad stang du mchis par 'gyuraro// gi ru wang gi ril bu khar bsres la lag pa g.yas pas yungs kar gyi don yod
90a2(rgyud): lcags kyu bzlas nas dradwa te tshogs gzhan mi smra bar gnas 'thon por 'dzegs te/ phyogs gang du bsams pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mchis pa'i phyogs dar yungs kar gyis
90a3(rgyud): gtor na med la bkug par 'gyur te/ mchis par 'gyuraro// gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam na gnas pa'i zhig na yang gdon mi 'tshal bar de zhag gsum gyi mchi bar 'gyur te yid gnyis mi bgyi'o// 
90a4(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa 'am/ lag pa g.yon pa la gi zang gi ril bu btags na gang du rag par ner dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / ner dang / mu tig dang / shang ka shi la dang / 
90a5(rgyud): dang / sa le sbrul dang / dngul dang / gos dang / ldab lbub de dag thams cad bkug nas mchi bar 'gyur te/ ci 'tsha ba de mchi bar 'gyur// bya tshang du zhugs nas tshang mang gi skar
90a6(rgyud): thal ma brdabs na 'tshed pa dang / 'tshed pa'i kha zas de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyuraro// spos 'tshong gi tshang khang du mchis na tshong khang gi yo
90a7(rgyud): byad thams cad mchi bar 'gyuraro// sras chang ga chad chang 'tshong gi sgor thal mo brdabs na chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar 'gyur// bang pa'i sgor thal mo brdabs na 'bru thams cad bkun
90a8(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du zhugs nas 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyid na bu ram gyi khu ba dang / sha kha ra'i sngags bu thams cad mchi bar 'gyur// gang du 'tshal ba dar mngags par 'gyur/ 
90b1(rgyud): phreng khyer gyi sgor mun tshab tshung na thal mo brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad gnyid bsgrags par 'gyur// dgra ba'i sgor btang na bsrang bar 'gyur// mtshon cha mkhan gyi khyim du
90b2(rgyud): 'phangs na mchen cha dang / go cha rnams rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyis par 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i sgor btab na phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / sems can gdugs pa zad bcings pa
90b3(rgyud): dang rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyis par 'gyuraro// dung la byugs nas 'thor por bus na sgra gang du grags pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang khyad dang / 
90b4(rgyud): dug sbyar ma dang / dug dang / nad las yengasu thar par 'gyu ro// grong khyer gyi sgor dus na yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / mi ngas thaMd rab tu zhi bar 'gyu ro// phyugs lha suM dus na'o/ 
90b5(rgyud): ma thams cad phrogs par 'gyuraro// gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyu ro// ra lug gi lha su bus nar lug gi 'o ma phrogs par 'gyur te/ gar 'tshal ba der mchi bar
90b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbusu bus na dzad sgren mer gyur nas gos thams cad bkug par 'gyuraro// rdza rnga la byugs te khyams mthon po'i steng du brdungs na grang ba dang / 
90b7(rgyud): rlung dang ser ba thams cad bcings pa dang bshig par 'gyur te/ tshugs par mi 'gyu ro// dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug tu ser ba bkag par 'gyur// grong khyer ram yul 'khor
90b8(rgyud): mtha' dag tu bus na nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'che ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// 
91a1(rgyud): mi ngas dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang dgas pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyid par 'gyur te/ thams cad la sbyar
91a2(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// de nas sems can thaMd dang mthun mong ba zhi ba dang / rgyas pa nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing sdig pa thaMd 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thaMd rab tu
91a3(rgyud): zhi bar bgyid ga/ mug ge'i dgon pa tha~Md rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed zad brlag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyi'o// rig
91a4(rgyud): sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bgyis te/ spos dri zhim pos lus byugs la/ gos gtsang ma bgos la spos dri zhim pos bsgos nas byams pa'i sems
91a5(rgyud): la mnyam par gzhag cing / sems can thaMd la lhag par brtsa ba dang / snying rje chen pos snying gdungs pas sbyin sreg gi las 'di bgyi ste/ arga'i shing dang / sha ma'i
91a6(rgyud): shing dang / shing 'o ma can nam ji ltar yang byang chub kyi shing ste/ de dag gi lam sreg shing gi me sbar la/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ldum bu dang / mdab ma dang / zho dang / 
91a7(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / mar du bsres par sbyin sreg bgyi'o// den yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ de nas don yod zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag
91a8(rgyud): rgyas phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing ngo // de nas sbyin sreg gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin pa'i modo kho nar dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu yams kyi nad dang / gnad pa dang / 'tsho ba dang / nad dang / 
91b1(rgyud): mu ga'i dgon pa mi bzad pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thaMd dang / mchom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun ma dang / 
91b2(rgyud): gcan zan gdug pa can dang / sbrul dang / dug mi bzad pa dang / gdugs pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// dpag tshad brgyar khor
91b3(rgyud): yug tu rims mi 'byung ste/ gnod pas ma lags/ nad kyis ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ rab tu zhi bar 'gyu ro// 'thab pa dang / 
91b4(rgyud): 'thab mo dang / rtsed pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / 'khrug pa dang / skrod pa dang / mdangs gcad pa dang // 'ching ba dang / bsngags pa rnams kyis mi tshugs te rab tu
91b5(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur// sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur// shin tu lo legs shing mdangs dga' la skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang zhing me tog dang / 'bras bu
91b6(rgyud): phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// nor dang / 'bru dang / lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyuraro// shin tu ro dang ldan pa dang / shin tu smin pa dang / yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rtswa dang / 
91b7(rgyud): gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshang tshing dang / myu gu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu bzang po yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yul de na yid du mi mchi ba'i rag pa myong
91b8(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur// yul den dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams rtag tu nad mtshon
92a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// bde bar tshor ba dang / yid la dpa' zhing mgu bar 'gyuro// byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyu ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
92a2(rgyud): dang / 'dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par srung ba'i phyir rtag tu srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang snga nga'i phyir dpab
92a3(rgyud): tshad nga rgya khe ra khor yub tu srung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde lebasu bgyid par 'gyu ro/ rgyal po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas te/ yongasu bskyong ba dang / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / 
92a4(rgyud): sbed pa bgyid par 'gyu ro// gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / srung ba dang / yongasu skyong bar 'gyuraro// dbang phrug dbang dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag par
92a5(rgyud): rgyun tu srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa ba byed par 'gyuraro// lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / 
92a6(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad kyis yul da legs par bsrungs par 'gyu ro// gzi byin stsol bar 'gyuraro// dpag tshad gcig kho raM khor yug tu sems
92a7(rgyud): can thams cad yongasu srung ba dang / yongasu skyong bar 'gyur ro// dag sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rdza'u rigs dang / dmang rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / 
92a8(rgyud): bu mo thams cad la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dong / sbed pa bgyis pa ro 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i las 'di'i mthus sems can thams cad sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnams par
92b1(rgyud): grol bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yul de la dgongs par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad
92b2(rgyud): yang dag par dgengs par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad la dbugs 'byin par ston par 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad yongasu bsrung ba'i don du nyi ma dang / zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang bcas
92b3(rgyud): pa legs par 'byor par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par rgyun tu skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byin par 'gyu ro// yod
92b4(rgyud): su srung ba dang / yid kyi brnags pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur te/ yang nas yang du blta bar 'gyuraro// de nas des sbyin sreg gi thal ba dang / dri chu skyoms bgyis te phyogs
92b5(rgyud): bzhi kun tu dbang bskur na mtshams chen po bcad pa bgyis par 'gyuraro// nad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi nad zad nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro// rims thams cad la thig le bgyis na ma
92b6(rgyud): thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// dri chab dang thal bas khrus bgyis na thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// brtson ran mchis pa 'am/ phyag sbal na mchis pa'i
92b7(rgyud): gos la bsdus pa na ral par 'gyuraro// gdug pas zir ba dang / dug gi myos pa thams cad la bskus na gdug par mi 'gyur// me dgub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzog s+ho// de nas pad+ma
92b8(rgyud): rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen
93a1(rgyud): brjod par bgyi ste/ 'di ni ma bsgrubs par las brgya stong bgyid par 'gyuro// tshes grangs rgyu skar bzang po dang / shin tu bkra shis mchog dag la/ 
93a2(rgyud): legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang mgo / byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag sems can kun la brtsa ba dang / snying rje dam pas rgyan pa dang // don yod zhags pa rig sngags cha/ 
93a3(rgyud): grub pad+ma med cho ga'i rgyal// bklags pas las rnams thams cad dag/ 'grub par bgyid de som nyi med// 'jig rten bla ma'i snying po dag de bzhin gang dag rtag brjod na// lus can rtag tu
93a4(rgyud): mchog sbyin gyis// phyag na pad+ma rtag tu 'gyur// ji ltar gang ga'i bye snyad kyi// sangs rgyas bya ba phrag stong la// bsod nams phung po khri phrag skyed// dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang
93a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid par 'gyur// bsnyung ba bgyis nas bzlas brjod gcig mkhas pa'i mis ni brjod bgyis pa// dge slong pa dang dge slong ma// dge bsnyen po mos
93a6(rgyud): de bzhin du// bde ba can du myur du mchi// sdug bsngal mi bzad myong 'gyur ba'i// nyon mongs pa las thar par 'gyur// rtag tu sangs rgyas byang sems dag/ mdzang bar 'gyur te som nyi mad// 
93a7(rgyud): da nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ bzlas brjod kyi ni las bgyis na// rig sngags 'chang ba da nya 'grub// de na yod zhags
93a8(rgyud): ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi// mdun du ba lha'i dkyil 'khor bgyi// gru bzhi kho ra khor yug tu// tshon rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis// gru ba ni lhag par thig gdab bo// ngos bzhi rnamasu ska bzhi dag/ 
93b1(rgyud): dbus nas ngos bzhir bshis su dpag/ tsan dan dkar pos bri ba ni// dkyil 'khor mchog la pad+ma dag/ mdab brgya gur gum gyis gtor cing // pad+ma'i za ba'i dkyil dag tu// ma zhem pa yi bum pa
93b2(rgyud): ni// spos chab kyis ni bkang ba yi// yungs kar ldan pa bzhag par bgyi// a ga ru yi bdug pa dbul// bum pa gang ba dgod par bgyi// me tog sna tshogs rgyan par bgyi// mchod yon snod kyang
93b3(rgyud): bani bzhag go/ rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur par// gtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi// legs bkrus rnam par dag pa dang // gso sbyong dag ni blangs pa dang / dkar gsum zas ni 'tshal nas/ 
93b4(rgyud): dus gsum du ni khrus bgyi'o// dus gsum bzlas brjed bgyi ba ni// don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag/ dus gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad// 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ mngon
93b5(rgyud): sum skyil mo krung bcas te// bzlas brjod phyag rgya bcings na su// bgrang phreng dag ri blang bar bgyi// mdzub mo dag ni mthe bo dag/ brkyang nas zhi zhing dul ba yi// yid kyis
93b6(rgyud): byams sems mnyam par bzhag/ ting 'dzin brtan pas lus snyam par// legs par bzhag ste zhi bar lta/ tshig gzhan mi sgra bzlas brjod bgyi// bzlas brjod bgyis pa
93b7(rgyud): tsam gyis mod las chen po g.yo bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te phyag bgyis na sa chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyuraro// brtan pa'i sems kyis skrag par mi bgyi'o// 
93b8(rgyud): sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa zhabs la mthong ba tsam du bris la/ ji tsam na khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun
94a1(rgyud): bzlas/ lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyi mod las chen po g.yo zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'ad zer byung nas kun tu snang
94a2(rgyud): bar 'gyu ro// rig sngags 'chang de yang cher snying dga' ba dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / shin tu rab tu dga' bas spu zing nas bgyid par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdong du lta bar bgyi ste/ 
94a3(rgyud): gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ngo g.yas pa nas legs zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur// mig bsgyur bar bgyid cing kun tu
94a4(rgyud): leg so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung rig sngags 'chang gis sgribs pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob nas lus yongasu da ga pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa
94a5(rgyud): bye ba sa ya phrag brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lta nga 'o su 'gyur// lus 'jam pa dang / shin tu gzhon pa chags
94a6(rgyud): ba dang mnyan par 'gyuraro// skra cung zad 'khyil ba dang mnyen pa dang / snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyu ro// mig yongasu dag pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ lus yongasu dag pa dang / yid yongasu dag pa dang / gnyer
94a7(rgyud): ma dang / sgra skya bo spangs par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad la lta ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyuraro// ji tsam du 'dug ce na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang
94a8(rgyud): gi gzugs ston cing dbugs 'byin par bgyid de/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur// na mkha' la mchi ba 'am/ mi ganga' bar bgyi ba'am/ lnga'i mig
94b1(rgyud): 'theb pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing lta ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob pa 'am/ gzungs rab tu 'thob pa 'am/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa'am/ btsug lag smra ba 'am/ 
94b2(rgyud): gsang sngags slu ba 'am/ thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/ gter smra ba 'am/ nor sbyar ba smra ba 'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ phug tu 'jug pa 'ang/ klu'i gnasu 'jug pa 'am/ zhing sna
94b3(rgyud): ba'am/ gnod sgron dgug pa 'am/ srin po dgug pa 'am/ ro langs bslang ba 'am/ nags khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ ril rgyu ba ram/ drong khyer du 'jug pa 'am/ sman lta ba'i phyir 'jug pa 'am/ ral rjem
94b4(rgyud): rib sngags 'tshang nyid dam/ grub pa'i rog sngags 'chang nyid dam/ 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dam/ rgyal po 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa 'am/ yul gyi bdag po nyid dam/ dpung chen po rab tu
94b5(rgyud): gzhom pa 'am/ bskrad pa 'am/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad stsol bar 'gyuro// dgos pa grub pa thad stsol bar 'gyuraro// ji ltar gang du 'tshal bar yongasu skyong bar
94b6(rgyud): 'gyur// mtshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod 'gyis na sems can thams cad la lta ba sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting 'dzin
94b7(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur/ mig sman sgrub par 'tshal bas des zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la ldong ros kyi mig sman zangs kyi snod kyi nang du stsal te/ tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis la 'phags pa
94b8(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas/ lags par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bsgos nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo dkrung bcas te/ mchi
95a1(rgyud): nas bzlas brjod pagyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshams bcing bas mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o// khro ba'i rgyal pa lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// 
95a2(rgyud): zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu po 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas la goms par bgyis nas bzlas
95a3(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis mod la zangs kyi snod 'bar ba dang / rlangs pa dang / dbu ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de blangs nas mig la byugs na na mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis
95a4(rgyud): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi
95a5(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba chen por 'gyuraro// phug gi gnas phye ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// gter byung ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// lha'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo bya
95a6(rgyud): ba mthong bar 'gyu ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyu ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung ba dang / sha za dang / gdon dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi
95a7(rgyud): mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyuraro// tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te
95a8(rgyud): mchis nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyi mdun na/ 
95b1(rgyud): mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa dang / dri med 'phags kyi lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i
95b2(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs dkod pa yang dag par lta ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob nas tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa stong du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
95b3(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gleng bar mdzad pa zos par 'gyu ro// bde ba
95b4(rgyud): can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po thams cad bsu ba'i slad du lha'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyuraro// pad+ma
95b5(rgyud): snang ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyi ba'i khang pa rtseg ma'i gzham med khang mthong bar 'gyuro// de nas rang gi lu sa rdo rje sra ba bdag nyid kyi stong po'i rang bzhin thob par 'a
95b6(rgyud): na rig sngags 'chang des spos cha ba des bum pa bkang nas lan drug khri zhis stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ byang chub sems dpa 'a 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du
95b7(rgyud): nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur bas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la lus rdo rje las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyuro// de bzhin gshegs pa thad de la gzigs par 'gyuraro// 
95b8(rgyud): tshe lha'i lo khrir 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// lha dang / klu thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad bgyid par
96a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam mam/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mod la gdon thams cad dang / brje byed thams cad babs nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bden pa 'am/ 
96a2(rgyud): mi bden pa 'am/ yang dag pa 'am/ yang dag pa ma lags pa 'am/ bskal pa dang ldan pa 'am/ bskal pa dang mi ldan pa 'am byung ba 'am/ ma byung ba 'am/ 'byer ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / 
96a3(rgyud): lo legs pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyuraro// de la sogs te las bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyu ro// bran bzhin du las thams cad rtag tu bgyid par 'gyur// yang na 'jig rten thams
96a4(rgyud): cad so sor bsgral bar 'tshal ba 'am/ thams ca da dbang du gyur nas bzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i
96a5(rgyud): 'jig rten las thar par bgyi bar 'tshal lam don yod ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting 'dzin thob par 'tshal lam/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub
96a6(rgyud): bar 'tshal lam/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pa'i cho ga zhib ma sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des gzugs brnyan so so ba bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
96a7(rgyud): byug don yod pa'i gzugasu bgyis te/ ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / ri dgas e na ya'i lpags pas rgyan pa/ phyugs bdag gi ma lugs 'tshang gargyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa/ skyil mo krung ngam
96a8(rgyud): 'greng ga drung na nor bzang dbus mo g.yas pa phab pa/ g.yon na khro bo'i rgyal po gdong gyen du lta ba khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa/ 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis
96b1(rgyud): klubs pathams cad ring bsrel dang bcas par bgyi ste/ ri'i stang gi pad+ma'i stan la mchis par bgyi'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas nyan
96b2(rgyud): zhag gcig mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis pa'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// tsha ba dang yungs kar gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// snying rje chen pas gdungs pa'i snying gis
96b3(rgyud): blta bar bgyi'o// gal ta 'di lta bu'i cho gas mi bgyid na bklags pa tsam gyi mod la yang 'grub par 'gyur na/ bzlas brjed kyi las kyi cho gas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ yang rig sngags
96b4(rgyud): 'chang gang zhig/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ba phrag brgya cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod par
96b5(rgyud): 'tshal lam/ lta bar 'tshal lam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bskyed par 'tshal lam/ sems can thams cade dge ba'i rtsa ba la rab tu bzhag par 'tshal ba 'am/ dzad
96b6(rgyud): kyi sgring pa rnam par dag par bgyi bar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des/ dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bste na pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ btsun pa la/ 
96b7(rgyud): gzhan su yang rung bas thams cad cho ga 'di bzhin bgyi te/ ngas ci 'byor pa'i gser las don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi'o// de nas kha shar phyogasu bstan te bzhag la
96b8(rgyud): gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ gru bzhi cha 'byes par li kris thig gdab par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor dbus su pad+ma'i phreng ba dgyi'o// pad+ma'i phreng ba'i dbu su ril ba spyi blugs dang
97a1(rgyud): bgrang phreng bzhag par bgyi'o// me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyi'o// spos chad kyis bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci 'byor pas legs par rgyan pa bzhi bzhag
97a2(rgyud): par bgyi'o// mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bgyi'o// pog por lnga las a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par dgyi'o// dris bsgos pa'i mar me bcu drug sbar bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa
97a3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te/ 
97a4(rgyud): mchis nas don yang zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// dro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd
97a5(rgyud): la dmigs pa yid la bgyis nas phyogs bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag dgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ R+Sha sa brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad
97a6(rgyud): bgyis pa dang / sa chen po g.yos par 'gyu ro// bdag nyid dga' bar gyur nas 'bar bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang zhal mngon sum du ston pa nye bar ston
97a7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i gseb 'bar bar gyur nas legaso zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas
97a8(rgyud): brjod bgyis na grub pa chen po'i rtags ston par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'dzeg par 'gyuro// de bzhin
97b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur// don yod zhags pa grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang bar 'gyuro// nyi ma'i rtse na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
97b2(rgyud): kyang mthong bar gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gsum bzlas
97b3(rgyud): na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs skya nga ma ba'i dusu mdun du mchis nas pad+ma dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba'i zhags pa stsol bar 'gyuraro// grub pa thams cad sgrol bar
97b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyang legs nas bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur// gang su yang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong na de ni de bzhin
97b5(rgyud): gshegs pa drug khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuraro// de lha thams cad dang / tshangs pa la sogs te dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams
97b6(rgyud): rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// mchog thams cad yongasu rdzogs nas rtag tu rjesu 'brang zhing srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang / bgyid
97b7(rgyud): bar 'gyuro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhob mo'i rgyal po// // bam po brgyad pa// des
97b8(rgyud): ci 'byor pa'i gser la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa byas la de nas zhal shar phyogasu bstan te bzhag la gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor gru
98a1(rgyud): bzhi pa legs par byas pa byas te/ li khris thib btab la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma bri/ pad+ma'i dbusu ril ba bring ka ra dang / bgrang phreng bri/ me tog sna tshogs bkram
98a2(rgyud): la/ bum pa spos nus bkang ba me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi bzhag mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bya zhing / pog phor lnga nas a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o// 
98a3(rgyud): spos sna bcu drug dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar ma bltam ta/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / ma tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang khring ba dag kyang dbul bar
98a4(rgyud): bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs ste/ skyil mo krungs bcas la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya brtsi ngas la bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po lan
98a5(rgyud): gcig bzlas la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshenapa thams cad yid la byas te/ yid kyis phyag byas la lus kyis kyang phyag byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la
98a6(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing bdag nyid snying dga' la 'bar bar sna'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad zhal nye bar ston par mdzad// 
98a7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu ral pa'i gseb 'bar zhing leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byu // brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pas ni dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma ston to// 
98a8(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i
98b1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyuro// rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags pa grub par 'gyuraro// tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zhal ston par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thad
98b2(rgyud): ston par 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe 'phags pa
98b3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs te/ pad+ma'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams cad byin par mdzad// rgyal ba
98b4(rgyud): 'ong dpag med leg so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad// gang la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bstan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa
98b5(rgyud): ba bskrun par 'gyuraro// lha thams cad dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lus ston 'dod par 'gyuraro// nang thams cad
98b6(rgyud): dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / mchog thams cad yongasu rdzo gas pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyuraro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar
98b7(rgyud): 'gyu ro// de nas dngul las 'phags pa span ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin du bas pa la tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor du tsan dan dkar po'i dri chab
98b8(rgyud): kyis bkang ba bzhag par bya zhing mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bgyi'o// me tog sna tshogs dkram zhing tsan dan dkar po'i bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
99a1(rgyud): phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// dri sna bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing / 'dug spos kyi snang bzhi bcu bzhag par bgyi'o// khri bo'i rgyal po lam 'i
99a2(rgyud): rtsa gcig bzlas brjid byas la rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma 'gos te/ den yong / pa'i zhags pa'i phyag brgya lar 'dun bcing // bzlas brjed kyi phyag rgya byas te/ skyil me krung du 'dug la lag pa
99a3(rgyud): g.yen pa'i 'dzum me brkyang ba pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bzlas brjed lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / shar phyogs nas leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra grags par 'gyur zhing bdag nyid dag
99a4(rgyud): bar sdud// rgyal po blor po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ming brjed pas dpag tshad snang ras 'ong bar 'gyur// thams cad bgyis pa ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyuraro// gang
99a5(rgyud): dade byed par 'gyur// de nyid bla mar 'gyur zhing cher mchen par 'gyur// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis wa wa brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gang shin rje dang
99a6(rgyud): dang / rlung lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur zhing bsgo ba bzhir byed par 'gyuraro// gang bsgre ba byed par 'gyur// rgyal po bzhi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gas
99a7(rgyud): bzlas pas nyi ma dang zla ba na mnga' las 'bab cing mdun na 'dug par 'gyuraro// mtshan mo'i lha dang / namakha'i lha 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing dbang du 'gyuraro// thams cad ci bgyi zhes pa'i bya ba byad
99a8(rgyud): cing 'dug par 'gyur// brgya rtsa brgyad lan bzhi 'dres pas klu thams cad dang du byas par 'gyur te/ rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po dga' ba dang / nye dga' ba la sogs pa'i bar thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur/ 
99b1(rgyud): ngas las byas pa'i 'phags pa sman da gzigs dbang phyug dang sang ba'i zhags pa ma tsan dan / ra bar gyil 'khor byas te/ mahan mar pa bkrus la 'dug smras tu snang ba'inas 'dug par byas
99b2(rgyud): nang bar rtsomar me lnga bcu rtsa gnas bsgom par bya'o// mtshad lan gyi snang ban bzhag la 'phags pa smras pa gags dbang phyug la mchad pa bya'o// chu ba'i rgyal pa las ni shu rtsa gcig rjesu dran par bya
99b3(rgyud): der yang ba'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// ras la bris pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil ma krung du 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bya'o// 
99b4(rgyud): phyogs bzhir byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o// sems can dmyal ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o// sems can dmyal ba chen po
99b5(rgyud): brgyad yid la bya zhing snying rje'i sems kyis blta bar bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya pad+ma'i tshul du bcings te/ bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / phyogs bzhi g.yo zhing sgra grags par 'gyur
99b6(rgyud): la dmyal ba ba'i sems can de dag thams cad yangasu grol bar 'gyur// dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing bcom pa dang thal bar brlag par 'gyuraro// dmyal ba'i sems can de dag bde 'grer 'gro
99b7(rgyud): ngar 'gyur/ bdag 'ad kyang byang chub kyim par thuga'i bar du dmyal ba'i sgrub bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad las yang su bral bar 'gyur/ lus kyang mtshan rang gis dran par 'gyur zhing sa bang dag ga
99b8(rgyud): mthong ba dag thams cad phyir mi ldeg par 'gyur// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod byas pas ni sa'i 'og gi sems can mun gnag pa snang ba dang bral ba de dag don med pa'i zhags pa'i snying pa
100a1(rgyud): mthus mun gnag dang bral bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyuraro// yongasu grol ba'i sems can da ngag 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gan su brdzus
100a2(rgyud): ta skye bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang 'chi ba spangs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du kun nas mthu 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur zhing tshe bskal pa
100a3(rgyud): thub par 'gyur// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du de nyid kyi zhabs kyi drung na gnas par 'gyur zhing mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba
100a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// tsan dan dkar po dang / bA rtsi dang / ga pur dang / spos kyi rigs sna chags gzhan dag phye ma zhib mor byas te/ yang legs par ba rtags la kun du ru dang / sra rtsi bog dang / gan d+ha ras
100a5(rgyud): dang / chu dang lhan cig sbyar te/ sha kha ra btab la legs par btags pa las 'phags pa spyan ras gzirigs dbang phyu gdon yod pa'i zhags pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad
100a6(rgyud): du byas te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / e ne ya'i lpags pas bzhag pa/ phyug bdag gi tshe lugs 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi gcig na pad+ma thogs
100a7(rgyud): gnyis pa zhags pa thogs/ gsum pa gsal shing thogs/ bzhi pa dbug 'byin pa/ gdan pad+ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mdom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/ gal su 'phags ma sgrol ma/ 
100a8(rgyud): g.yon du dri med 'gro bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi 'og tu ni khro bo'i rgyal po'o// gong du ni 'od dpag medo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus
100b1(rgyud): bya zhing gos sum phrugs bsgos la tshes brgyad nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// spos sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor byugs par bya zhing mtshon sna lngas bri
100b2(rgyud): bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbu su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / rig sngags kyi lha dbus mo gtsug te gyen du lta ba bri bar bya'o// gra bzhir dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang
100b3(rgyud): chu lha bri bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i cha 'byes par bya'o// dkyil 'khor khor yug tu pad+ma bri bar bya'o// grwa bzhir spos kyis bkang ba bzhag go// sgo bzhir dri dang / gtor ma dang / bum pa gang ba banago/ 
100b4(rgyud): ngaral gsum gyi gtor ma dang / mchod yon gyi snod bana'o// me tog sna tshogs dgram par byas zhing a ga ru dang / tsan dan/ gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// spos sna brgya nyi
100b5(rgyud): rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ 'phan gdugs bzang po sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras
100b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor du zhal pashar phyogasu bstan la mchod pa bya'o// ras kyi tshon skud sna lnga pa/ srid du khru bcu drug pa/ thor te gcig tu gser gyi yang mig/ thor to gcig tu mu tig gi chun
100b7(rgyud): kor btags te sbrul 'khyil ba bzhin du skyil la dkyil 'khor gyi dbu su bzhag ste/ gtsang mas gi sa mas g.yog par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo krung du
100b8(rgyud): 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan sum bcu rtsa gnyis bcing pa byas la bdag srung // dro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas la dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing pa
101a1(rgyud): yang bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzhin 'dzum gyis rgyas par byas la bzlas brjod kyi bya rgya bcings te/ mi smra bar yungs kar 'brure re nas bzlas brjod stong
101a2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad brjod nas ras kyi srang bu'i steng du gtong bar bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang ras kyi srad bu de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyuraro// leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung
101a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs legs// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa grub kyis long la dgos pa thams cad byos rashig/ khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa'i zhags
101a4(rgyud): pa pad+ma grub pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dges pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyu ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang 'bar bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten dbang phyug
101a5(rgyud): gi sku las spos kyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sras nges dpag tshang drug tsam du khyab pa'i byed// gang la dri mnam pa tsam gyis nang thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuro// sdig pa
101a6(rgyud): thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa zad dang byad dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams 'jug par 'gyur// lus thams cad dri ma med par 'gyur/ 
101a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyang rje su 'brang bar 'gyu ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i nags pa de blangs la zangs kyi gab tshe bzang ba'i nang du bcug ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras
101a8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzhag par bya'o// nam dgos pa byung ba'i tshe gtsang mas khrus legs par bya ste blangs par bya zhing dgos par bya'o// nyin re zhing dus gsum du mchod par bya'o// 
101b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang de yang na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus yongasu dag par sngon gyi rig sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan cig rtse zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// che lo stong thub par 'gyur
101b2(rgyud): te/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu bskal pa mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du pad+ma'i snying po la brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar
101b3(rgyud): 'gyuro// byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du tshe bskal pa brgya phrag stong thub par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang gang gis mthong ba tsam gyis
101b4(rgyud): mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa zad par 'gyur ro// / sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul ba
101b5(rgyud): bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyuro// rang nyi nor dang bcas/ dbyig dang bcas/ 'bru dang bcas/ dran pa
101b6(rgyud): dang bcas/ bran mo dang bcas/ ta las byed par 'gyuraro// sna ma'i me tog snying pa de bsdus la/ gla rtsi dang / khri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / gur gum dang / spang spos dang / sA ma ka dang / 
101b7(rgyud): smrig ka dang / na la da dang / bo la dang / yungs kar rnams zhig tu btags pa'i phye ma char pa'i chu dang sbyar ba'i bu ni dug med par byed pa'i mchog pad+ma zhes bya ste/ thog mar grags pa dang
101b8(rgyud): dpal du byed/ nad thams cad sel ba dang / rims nad thad nye bar sel bar byed do// brtsog shu dang / 'bras dang / me dpal dang / rkang shu dang / phol mig dang / ldog pa dang / de thad la ni ba.u
102a1(rgyud): na bde bar zhi bar 'gyu ro zhes gsung // nad de dag thams cad la khrus byas na sdig pa sel to// zhes thub pas gsung ngo // tshe sbyin par byed/ rgyal po dag yul sbyin par
102a2(rgyud): byed do// thig le byas te g.yul ngor song na thams cad las rtag tu rgyal ba dang / bud med rnams dga' ba dang / dbang du 'gyur bar byed pa'i mchog yin no// byad 'joms shing dug dang / dbyig dang
102a3(rgyud): phye ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba byas pa dag kyang de ban no// zas za ba dang khrus byed pa na thig le'i byug pa rtag tu byas na de thams cad las 'gro ba rnams bde bar thar bar 'gyuraro// nas
102a4(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug gsupo// klad pa'i nad mi bzad pa la ni byug par bya'o// mig na ba la ni mig sman gyi zur ma sa so// so na ba la ni khar muro// lho na pa la ni tshwa dron dang ngo // ba lo Dan
102a5(rgyud): ba la ni mar dang drug go// yan lag dang nying lag na ba la ni brku bar bya'o// dbang du bya ba la ni lag mthil la bsru bso// nang tshabs po che la ni sku mnye dang khrus bya'o// gnod sbyin gyis/ 
102a6(rgyud): gdon bsal ba la ni sna nas btang ba'i las bya'o// bdug pas ni gdon thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyuraro// rgyas thebs pa rnams la ni mtshogs mar thig le bya'o// snying na ba la ni chu dron
102a7(rgyud): dang lan tshwa bsres pa'o// khyim zhi bar bya ba ni 'bras yos dang gsum sbyar bas zhi ba chen por 'gyu ro// thams cad du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas so// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa rnams la ni ba lang gi
102a8(rgyud): rtsibs dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/ dri chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag bcing 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon gyi snong bzhi dang / pog por bzhag ste/ a ga ru dang / du ru kas bdug go// 
102b1(rgyud): gu lus la lan cing bu rgya gcig bzlas te 'dug par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri nab kyis mchod par byal// dra ba'i rgyal po yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas su
102b2(rgyud): bzhir gtor bar bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas na 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa rnams la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyuraro// g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur/ 
102b3(rgyud): rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyu ro// gal te brgya byin rang dang lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin la/ mi rnams kyis lta ci smos/ brgya byin
102b4(rgyud): dgug par 'dod na pad+ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ brgya byin gyi ming nas brjod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya zhing dri chab kra'adabu'o// bu gul
102b5(rgyud): dang / mar dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa ba rgyad bzlas te/ shing a rka'i me sbar la tshe chu bzhi la sbyin sreg bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dpa
102b6(rgyud): dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug ste/ bsgo ba bzhin byed cing thams cad du 'gyuraro// brgya byin gyi go 'phangs ma rtogs pa gang bsrangs pa de sbyin par byed/ de ni sems mi bzad
102b7(rgyud): do// tshangs pa rdog pas mnan te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug ste/ mchod thad sbyin par bye'o// yid la ci 'dod pa sgrub par
102b8(rgyud): byed do// khu gul la lan dgu bcu bzlas te khyab 'jug la 'dug cing / chu dang yungs kar la lam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor gtor na khyab 'jug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug
103a1(rgyud): cing las thams cad byed par 'gyu ro// gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to// hi ran n+ya ka shi bu la yang sbyin par byed cing khyab 'jug chen po'i stobs kyi shugs
103a2(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyu ro// dbang phyug chen po'i zhal mthong bar 'dod na rna ba g.yas par lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar la lam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas spre bor gtoraro// gu gul
103a3(rgyud): gyi bdug pas bdug cing arga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// de nas dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur zhing lag so zhes bya bar sgra 'byung ngo // de nas dbang phyug
103a4(rgyud): chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'du dgu par 'gyur zhing rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par byed// 
103a5(rgyud): mchog gang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// nag po chen po dgugs par 'dod pas gu gul la la/ na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te// drag dang chang dbul bar bya zhing yung
103a6(rgyud): kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas nag po chen po'i steng du gtor na zhugs par 'gyur te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad bde par 'gyur zhing gar mngags pa der 'gro bar
103a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyu ro// gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad kyi sgo bye bar 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa byed do// thams cad byams par 'gyur zhing las dzad
103a8(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro// mi smra bar mtshan mo'i dus mtshams gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas na mtshan mo'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / nyin par rgyu ba'i lha dang / 
103b1(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lha 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ las thaMd
103b2(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// thams cad rang gi gzugs kyi rtag tu mdun na nye bar gnaso// mtshan ma longs spyad par gzhal med khang thams cad sbyin par byed do// gtsang mas gos btsang ma
103b3(rgyud): bgos te/ khrus legs par byas nas bden par smra zhing byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag nas sems can thams cad la rtag tu 'artse ba dang / snying rje chen pos lhag par dmigs te bzlas
103b4(rgyud): brjod rtag tu bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa/ dge ba/ zhi ba/ rgyas pa/ drag shul spyod pa/ srung ba/ nad thams cad sel ba/ 
103b5(rgyud): byang 'jig pa/ dbang du byed pa/ sbyin sra ga gi cho ga bshad par bya'o// khyim srung bar 'dod pas an 'i yam sreg shing dang / pad+ma dang / yungs mar bsres pa las
103b6(rgyud): sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la khro bo'i rgyal po la su bzlas brjod byas na khyim chen po bsrungs par 'gyuraro// 
103b7(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'ag ba thams cad dang
103b8(rgyud): gdon thams cad dang / mu ga'i dgon pa dang / mi ngas dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i mi ngas thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang / 
104a1(rgyud): sbyang ba dang / sbang byed par 'gyuraro// dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyuro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang
104a2(rgyud): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sku ston bzhed par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul dang / yul 'khor dang / grong khyer dang / 
104a3(rgyud): yul gru dang / ri khrod dang / ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zla ba nya la me tog dkar po dang / gan d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos
104a4(rgyud): rnams yungs mar dang bsras te sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po blon po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / yul gru dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang /

104a6(rgyud): bo rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul gru stong thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang / pad+ma'i sdong po'i
104a7(rgyud): yam sreg shing rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo zad pa dang di nar brgyad brgya 'thob par 'gyu ro// me tog ku mu da dang / pad+ma sdong bu dang / rtsa ba dang / mdab mar/
