104b1(rgyud): brgyad la bsnyung ba byas te/ gtsang mas khrus legs par byas la/ gos dkar po bgos te tsan dan dang / bri yang ku'i shing dang / 'bras yos dang / mar dang / yungs kar bsres pa'i ston
104b2(rgyud): sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na nam byed kyi dus su gnod sbyin ma 'ongs nas zong lnga spang sbyin par 'gyuraro// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi bzhin zhag gcig bsnyungs pa byas te/ rgya mtshor 'dra ba
104b3(rgyud): chu klung gi 'gram du song la shing bil ba'i me sbar te/ bal ba'i me tog dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
104b4(rgyud): ba 'ong bar 'gyu ro// nam phyed na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs nas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang des blang bar bya'o// gdong du mig blta bar mi bya'o// 
104b5(rgyud): yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjed byas pa dang / rkang pa'i drung du snod bor nas btud de rig sngags 'chang 'gum mo zhes zer ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi khro bo'i rgyal po la
104b6(rgyud): lan nyid shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe nam phyed na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin ma 'ongs par 'gyur te/ dgos pa zang
104b7(rgyud): byed cing bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zla ba mar gyi nga'i tshes bcu bzhi la gang na gter yod pa der song ste/ stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la gter ma'i cho ga yang
104b8(rgyud): bzhag par bya zhing 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa la mchod pa byas la sna ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i mdab ma dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pa rnams las sbyin sreg sdang
105a1(rgyud): rtsa brgyad byas te/ chu dang / yungs kar la la nyi shu rtsa bcig bzlas brjod byas nas sa la brdangs na de'i 'og tu gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur
105a2(rgyud): tablangs la dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar bya zhing lhag ma rang gis blang bar bya'o// ba ru ra'i shing gi me spar la til dang / 'bras so ba dang / mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg
105a3(rgyud): stang rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang / nor dang 'bru dang bcas pa dang / dbyig dang gsor dang
105a4(rgyud): bcas pa dngang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas dpar 'gyu ro// yungs kar dkar po dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / pad+ma yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar
105a5(rgyud): bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thad dbang du 'gyur zhing bung med dang skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dbang du 'gyu ro// 'bras bub lan tshwa dang ldan
105a6(rgyud): pa las lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na rigs bzhi'i 'jig san dbang du 'gyuraro// a ga ti'i shing gis me sbar la sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa dang / arga'o me tig las sbyin sreg
105a7(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na nyin re zhing di na ra brgya 'thob par 'gyu ro// pa la ka'i yam sreg shing dang / 'bras yos las spyir
105a8(rgyud): sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na gser brgya phrag stong 'thob par 'gyur te/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya zhing bgo bsha' byas na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshes bco lnga zla ba nya la bsnang ba byas
105b1(rgyud): te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngag chu klung chen po'i nang rkad pa nub tsam du zhugs te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ yung kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas khros pas chu klung de
105b2(rgyud): la brdab par bya'o// de nas chu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas rin po che mang po dag sbyin par byed de blangs la/ phyed kyis dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
105b3(rgyud): phyug la yang mchod pa bya'o// tshes bco lnga zla ba nya la bsnyung ba byas te/ nam phyed na bco ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la ma dad pa byas nas a pa marga'i yam sreg shing
105b4(rgyud): dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / sra tsi pog bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la rang gi ming gis sbyin sreg stong byas na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing nad thaMd dang /

105b6(rgyud): bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyuro// 'bras yos dang / 'o ma dang mar dang / yungs kar dang / tsan dan dkar po bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na rgyas pa dang / mchog
105b7(rgyud): tu dge bar 'gyur// tshis bcu bzhi la ka ra bi ra'i me tog dang / lan tshwa sna bdun bsres pa dang / shing tsher ma can yam sreg shing yungs mar la bsres pas drag shul spyod pa bya'o// char ma
105b8(rgyud): 'bab pa'i tshe pad+ma dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas na ji srid 'dod
106a1(rgyud): pa de srid du mar gyi rgyan chen po 'bab par 'gyuraro// thal ba blangs la lam nyi shun gcig bzlas te rnam pa la gtor na haca char che bzhi bar 'gyur// phyogs bzhir
106a2(rgyud): gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyuraro// sprin la mngon du phyogs te gtor na rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// gzhan gyi sde mnan pa ni til dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg
106a3(rgyud): giso// pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa ni sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg go so// phug sgrub pa ni shing arga'i sbyin sreg giso// arga'i lo ma dang mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed
106a4(rgyud): babar 'gyuraro// nag su 'gro ba'i tshe ku mu da dang / rgya spos dang / yungs kang dang / mar bsres pas nags kyi phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed pa ra 'gyur zhing sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang bzhin
106a5(rgyud): duganas par 'gyuraro// shing pa la sha'i ma sbar te na la sham brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin dang / tshungs pa dang / khyab 'ju ga dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nyi ma 'ongs nas
106a6(rgyud): mdun na 'gyuraro// sna ma'i me tog dang / kar na kI ra'i me tog dang / ud pa la rnams mar dang bsres pa las sbyin brgya stong byas na zla ba dang / nyi ma 'ongs nas mchog sbyin zhing lus la 'od zer
106a7(rgyud): btang nas na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// a khAd thas yam sreg shing byas la shu ti dang / nyi'u shing dang / arga dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / nas dang mar bsres pa las nyi ma bdun
106a8(rgyud): gyi dus mtshams gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyuraro// gdon dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad chad pas bcad na
106b1(rgyud): 'bras so ba dang / yungs kar dang / lan tshwa'i skyon sreg bgyis te thams cad la don yod pa'i zhags pa bcing bar bya zhing khro bo'i phya rgya dang / gsang sngags lhan cig rje su dran par bya'o// sbyin
106b2(rgyud): sreg gi cho ga'o// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga'i rgyal po chen po ras kyi gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga
106b3(rgyud): byang bar 'gyur bar bshad par bya ste/ ras khru do khru bzhi lham pa kha tshar ma chad pa/ skra med pa/ thag ran bzang gshin tu dkar gshin tu sbyangs pa la ri mo mkhan mi smra ba'i dka'i thub can
106b4(rgyud): bsnyer gnas la gnas pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ zas dkar gsum za ga/ dus gsum du khrus byas pa/ lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsi'i snod sar pa bzhag ste/ ra
106b5(rgyud): sar pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzed pa 'am/ bzhugs pa 'am/ spyi 'i krung du bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste/ ral pa'i thar tshugs kyis rgyan pa/ oM na ma
106b6(rgyud): lpags pa bsnams pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bcu drug ga/ zhal zhi ga spyan phye gang dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag med bzhugs pa/ 
106b7(rgyud): zhal g.yas pa'i thor tshugs la zla tshes kyis rgyan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar ba las gyen du pad+ma'i tshul du bya'o// phyag gnyis thur du kun tu zhal gyi phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gnyis
106b8(rgyud): bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la/ mdzub mo g.yas brkyang ste/ pad+ma'i tshul du byas la ba ra na bgrang phreng 'dzin par bya'o// phyag gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gcig na rtsa
107a1(rgyud): gsum/ gnyis pa na pad+ma gsum pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i glegs bam/ bzhi pa don yod pa'i zhags pa/ zhags pa tha mal pa 'dra ba lnga pa dbugs
107a2(rgyud): 'byin pa/ drug pa na ril ba spyi blugs/ bdun pa na rin po che sna tshogs kyi bkang ba'i snod/ brgyad pa na me tog sna tshogs kyi snod thogs par bya zhing / 'od mdom gang gis rgyan pa/ sku me tog sna ma/ 
107a3(rgyud): kyi bkra bas mdzes par bya'o// raM po Ta la'i khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba ba ni zug pa/ khri 'phang stegs bu mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes
107a4(rgyud): par rgyan pa/ pad+ma'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje'i phreng bas rgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang / chu shing gi yal gas mdzes par byas pa/ g.yas logs kyi steng na nyi ma/ g.yon
107a5(rgyud): logs ma sla ga/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag lag na mai te ga sna chags mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed bar bya'o// ri bad+ma 'dra ba zhig snying bas mdzes par
107a6(rgyud): byas shing / sdong po dang ldan pa/ mchos mdzes par byas pa/ mtsho nyas gang zhing chu sngon ma ka ra dang / 'azhad dang / shang shang ti'u dang / ngur pas rgyan ga/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan pa'i
107a7(rgyud): ri de'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan dang seng ge'i khri bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas dbang phyug bya'o// g.yon du dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan par bya'o// nang gi gnasu 'phags pa
107a8(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// gal su 'phags ma sgrol ma lus btud de 'dzem pag dang bcas pa bya'o// g.yon du dri med 'gro lag ba dbugs 'byin pa dang / nor bzang pus mo btsugs pa bya'o// 
107b1(rgyud): pad+ma'i snying po'i dbus gan su khro bo'i rgyal po khros pa'i gzugs can/ lag pa bzhi pa lag na mtshon ma thogs pa te/ zhags pa dang / dbyug to dang / rtse gsum dang / pad+ma'o// pad+ma'i stan la skyil
107b2(rgyud): mo krung phyed bcas la/ lus cung zad btud pa mgo'i steng g.yas g.yon du drang song bstod rabs byed pa bya'o// de nas 'og gi g.yas g.yon du rdo rje'i mo ma chen po lag na rdo rje'i tshogs mang ba
107b3(rgyud): 'dug pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / dbang po dang / lha'i tshogs dag bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi mtsho dang / ri'i bar du brgya byin dang tshangs pa bya'o// g.yon phyogasu rgyal po chen po
107b4(rgyud): ban go cha bgos pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma lag pa 'brel bar bya'o// lha mo chen mo dpal dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / sa'i lha
107b5(rgyud): mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo bya'o// dbang phyug gi drung du khro gnyer can bya'o// dbang phyug chen po'i drung du gos dkar mo'o// ri dang po nya mo'i bar du srin mo ral pa gcig ma'o// ri'i
107b6(rgyud): yug gru bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa bya zhing ljon shing dang / lcug ma sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang mche'u mdzes pa me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan ga/ seng ge dang / stag gis gang ba dang u
107b7(rgyud): drug gu dang / grul bum dag bya'o// g.yon du gsang ba chen po lnga bya'o// 'og tu klu'i rgyal po lnga bya'o// thams cad brag gi stan dang / lag na rin po che'i me tog gi phor pa thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la
107b8(rgyud): lta bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang dbus mo btsugs te/ lag na me tog dang / pog phor thogs pa bcom ldan 'das la lta bar bya'o// steng gi bang
108a1(rgyud): rim du thub pa chen po rgyal ba 'od dpag med/ shAkya'i rgyal po dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal pa bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyi med la tsherab
108a2(rgyud): brgya stong du mnar med pa bsags pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed pa de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing sems can de dag thams cad kyang yang su bral ba
108a3(rgyud): 'gyur na sems can dag pa rnams lta ci smos/ dad pas mos pa rnams dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu che ba dang / par yon mang po dag tu shes
108a4(rgyud): bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur zhing de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur// 
108a5(rgyud): ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni 'phags pa spyan ras ga zigs dbang phyug den yong ba'i zhags pa'i snying po dang su mthong ba yino// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam
108a6(rgyud): gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing sku yang snyan par 'gyur// nyam thag pa tsam gyi mdal sku sman par 'gyur zhing mchag thams cad sbyor par 'gyur// 'anas
108a7(rgyud): ba'i zhags pa'i gzungs kyi snying po 'grub par 'gyu ro// nad kyis thabs pa dang / nad tshabs chen pos gzir ba dang / nang sna tshogs dang / sdug bsngal brgya stong gis dkrug pa de dag thams cad
108a8(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyi mod la nad thams cad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur zhing slob pa dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// tha na dud 'gro'i
108b1(rgyud): skye gnas gtogs pa dag kyang mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di 'khor mang pos mchod pa dang bkur sti chen po dang / sil snyan dkrol ba mang po dang
108b2(rgyud): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis lags par rgyan par byas te/ grong khyer chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ ljongs sam/ khyim mam/ grong du zhugs na
108b3(rgyud): ras kyi sku gzugs gzhugs pa tsam gyi mod la 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / mu ge'i dgon pa dang / mi ngas/ rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung gos 'dzi
108b4(rgyud): ba zhi bar 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ka za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skem byed dang / rje da byed dang / grib gnon zhi bar 'gyur zhing / bde
108b5(rgyud): ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' ba dang / mi mang po bde ba ma nga bar 'gyu ro// dga' ba dang / yid bde ba mang bar 'gyuraro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rje su 'gro bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ 
108b6(rgyud): 'di mthong ba tsam gyis shi 'phos nas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyu ro// bskal pa stong phrag bdun du tshe rab su tshe rab dran par 'gyur// pad+ma'i 'od dri ma med
108b7(rgyud): cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma thob pa thob par 'gyu ro// pad+ma rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis
108b8(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur// ri mo'i sku gzugs sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo'o// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sdong po'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor bshad
109a1(rgyud): par bya ste/ chu klung gi 'gram mam/ pad+ma'i mtshe'u 'am/ ud pa la'i mtshe'u 'am/ me tog gi skyes mas tshal lam/ 'bras bu kun dga' ra ba 'am/ khang bzangs gzhi dag
109a2(rgyud): cing sa gzhi yongasu sbyangs pa rtsa dang / shing bal dang / skra dang / phub ma dang / sol ba dang / phyag dar gyi phung po dang / kye mo dang / shing dang khong ba dang / gseg ma dang / zad pa'i rus gang ba dang / 
109a3(rgyud): shi ba'i ro rnams spangs pa'i sa gzhi'i phyogs na mtshe'u dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu byang phyogs nas 'bab pa dang / nye ba na chu yod cing shin tu mdzes pa/ lce phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 
109a4(rgyud): nub phyogs dang / shar phyogs gang na ljon shing gis mdzes par byas pa/ gang nyams dga' ba kha dog dang / gzi byin du ldan pa'i gnas de lta bu rnyed ras chu dang / yungs kar la bzlas te kun
109a5(rgyud): tu gto ro// sa bzhi de lta bu sbyang ba ni mchog yin no// khro bo'i rgya la pos yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor na kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad
109a6(rgyud): phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyu ro// sdang ba thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dre na thams cad kyi skad gcig kyang mi gnas par
109a7(rgyud): phyogs bzhir bya ra ta dong ngo // srog chags sdang ba dang / sdang ba'i sems dang / sdang ba'i can zan khro bo gang yin pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing lha thams cad srang bar
109a8(rgyud): 'gyu ro// gnas kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bya ste/ gru bzhi lham pa ngos re re zhing khru sum bcu rtsa gnyis gzhal bar bya ste/ cha 'byes pa gru bzhi cha mnyam zhing mdzes la sgo bani/ 
109b1(rgyud): dang / rta bab bzhir ldan pa/ 'bras kyi phye ma'i tshon sna bzhir sbyar la de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ tshon sna lnga'i thig skud kyis thig btab nas tsan dan dkar po'i phur bu btab ste/ zla ba
109b2(rgyud): yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga la tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar bzang po gdams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// dang po ni dkar pos bri'o// gnyis pa ni dmar pos so// 
109b3(rgyud): gsum pa ni ser po so// bani pa ni na mkha'i kha dog gi so// lnga pa ni mig sman gyi kha dog gis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa med par cha rnam par mdzes shing gsal
109b4(rgyud): bar bir sar pa dang / tshen dang / snang bar pas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma mdab ma stong 'khor khor yug stegs bu dang bcas pa bri zhing / bad+ma'i phreng
109b5(rgyud): tshon gyis mdzes pa bris la/ de'i dbusu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po shAkya'i rgyal po dang / 'od dpag med dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i po'i rgyal po gzhag/ 
109b6(rgyud): g.yasu mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad 'chang ba gsang sngags kyi rjesu 'brang ba bya'o// g.yon du phyag na rdo rje rnga yab dang rdo rje thogs pa bzhin khro gnyer can
109b7(rgyud): 'od 'bar bas bskor ba'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha mo sgrol ma dang / dri med 'od 'phro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen po dang / 
109b8(rgyud): gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo lag na dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'o// de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ zod pa'i phreng ba thogs pa sbrul gyi
110a1(rgyud): mchod phyir thogs pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / g.yas pa'i gung mo lha dang log 'dren la bsdigs par bya'o// g.ya
110a2(rgyud): du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i cha lugs 'chang ba ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ 'od dpag med kyi thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya'o// g.yas g.yon du dbang phyug
110a3(rgyud): rang dbang phyug chen po bya'o// de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo dang / lha mo dbyangs can ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo dang / 'bras bu dang me tog gi lha mo dang // de'i 'og tu
110a4(rgyud): khor yug tu gshin rje dang / chu lnga dang / rlung lnga la sogs pa bya'o// ral ba'i thor tshugs kyis rtun pa'i drang srong bsag par bya'o// glang rgyal po bzhi go cha bgos pa bzhag
110a5(rgyud): bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus dang bar bar du lcags kyu dang / dgras dang / rdo rje dang / dbyug ba dang / zhags ba dang / lcags ldog bya'o// phyi rol tu tshangs pa
110a6(rgyud): dang / drag po dang / lha mo u ma dang / tshangs pa'i drung du lha dbyangs ldan ma khros pa'i gzugs can no// de dag gnyis kyi bar du dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o// grwa gcig tu don yod
110a7(rgyud): ba'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs bzhag go// grwa gcig tu shi bA ba ha bzhago// de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor khra bo rta mgrin 'jig su rung ba'i mog can banas
110a8(rgyud): lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po ki li ki la zhes bya ba/ rdo rje rnam par 'dren galag na rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa thags par bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor pa nya mo pad+ma rigs mdzes ma lag
110b1(rgyud): pad+ma'i rtse mo nas 'dzin par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po zom zhes bya ba'i tshogs lag na rdo rje dang / zhags pa thogs par bya'o// de nas 'jug pa'i sgo nas gser gyi bum pa spos
110b2(rgyud): chus bkang ste/ dar las bcings la rnam pa thams cad dang / me tog gi phreng bas brgyan nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu bzhag ste/ steng du sna ma'i me tog gi gdu
110b3(rgyud): bu bzhag par bya'o// tsan dan dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyi chu dang / pog por bzhi bzhag cing / a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug go// tshon sna lnga'i ras kyi srad bu mchod phyir
110b4(rgyud): gyi srid bu tshad du byas la/ gser gyi yang mig rtsa gsum can gdags par bya zhing / thor to gcig tu me tog pad+ma'i gdub 'khor dang mu tig dang / rin po ches spras pa zlum por bsgril
110b5(rgyud): ba bum pa'i steng du bzhag la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas te/ yungs dkar la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te de la gdab par
110b6(rgyud): bya'o// tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi'i phye mas bgos la bgo bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gan su dri chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa dang / zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma bzhag par bya
110b7(rgyud): zhing / gser dngul gyi mchod yon gyi snod sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / spos chu dkar pos bkang ba brgyad bzhag par bya'o// ro dang / dri sna tshogs kyis
110b8(rgyud): bkang ba brgyad dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / gtor ma la sogs pa dbul ba sna brgyad dang / dbul ba sna drug cu rtsa bzhi pa rnams sha dang / khrag dang mun
111a1(rgyud): dang / ke'u dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / gtung ba ngan paspad+ma te gtsang mas gtsang ma sbyar bar bya'o// me tog sna tshogs kyi gcal dbum par bya zhib gdugs dang
111a2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang / lda ldi dang / ba dan gyis brgyan par bya/ pog por sum cu rtsa gnyis bzhag par bya zhing bdug spos sna tshogs mang pos bdug par bya/ spos sna brgyad dang ldan pa'i
111a3(rgyud): til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi kher yug tu pad+ma'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya zhing dus gsum du khrus byas
111a4(rgyud): la/ gos gsum bgo bar bya/ grogs gtsang ma bsgrub par bya'o// 'jug pa'i cho ga byas pa nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pas dbang bskur naya tsam gyi sangs rgyas zang
111a5(rgyud): kyis yongs gzung zhing 'jig rten mgon pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bad+ma'i rigs pad+ma 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po den med pa'i zhags pa'i snying pa
111a6(rgyud): dngos grub la mngon du phyogs par 'gyu ro// gang bsam pa thos ca de kho na bzhin byed par 'gyu ro// dam tshig thams cad la don yod par 'jug/ chos nyid thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i dkyil
111a7(rgyud): 'khor gyi chos la dam tshig grub par 'gyur// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / bde ba thams cad kyi rje su 'gro zhing lba dang / mi'i dpal thams cad myong bar 'gyu ro// zla dang / 
111a8(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs kyi bsgo skal la dbang bar 'gyuro// rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags la brten par 'gyuraro// bdeg pa dang / spyad pa dang / phur
111b1(rgyud): bus gdab pa dang / sreg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / gsang ba dang / dbang du bya bas mi tshug so// gang dag de lta bu byed pa de nyid kyi lus sam mgo la brgya phrag stong gyur du 'bab
111b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhi gzhan gyi phyir bzlas bcing 'brel bar mi nus te/ rig sngags 'chang des dgrol bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang des ri mo'i gzugs de dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par
111b3(rgyud): gzhag nas don yod pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing bar bya zhing khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o// de'i 'o// 
111b4(rgyud): tu dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams las 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyu ro// bum pa de yang 'bar la ras kyi sku gzugs de yang kha dog sna bdun du 'bar zhing shas cher 'gul
111b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ khro bo'i rig sngags 'chang snying dga' bar 'gyu ra zhing ras kyi sku gzugs las zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang leg so lag so// khyod kyis
111b6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub cing khyod kyis zhags pa 'di yang grub khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhags pa'i mchog 'di yang grub
111b7(rgyud): kyis las thams cad byos pa zhig/ de dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa mchog grub nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba de blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ rgyu skar rgyal la khrus byas pa 'am/ 
111b8(rgyud): zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes grangs shis pa la khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la/ lus thams cad dri ma med cing yong su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / dngos po lnga'i bdag nyid yongasu dag par
112a1(rgyud): 'gyur te ba lnga yong su ba dang mig sngal sungs pa dag snga lnga sang su dag pa dag rtse lnga yang su dag pa dag / rnam par shes pa snga mang su dab pa dag dbang ba
112a2(rgyud): yongasu dag pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing rtab tu sku sngon banas par yang 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal ston
112a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs par 'gyuraro// lha tham cad kyang de la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'ong bar
112a4(rgyud): 'gyur// rgyal po bzhi dpung gi 'khor dang bcas te sa'i phyogs der 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang par srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyu ro// srad med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nor
112a5(rgyud): bu bzang po dang / gsang ba pa brgya stong phrag du ma srung ba dang / bskyab ba dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur zhing ni nga dang / bde lag su 'gyur// shes bden yod pa dang / shas rab rin yang pa dang / 
112a6(rgyud): thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur zhing sbyin pa don yod pa'i sbyin par 'gyur// bsod nams kyi phung po don yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug
112a7(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyu ro// rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa la mkhas par yang 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo yang 'grub par 'gyu ro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa don yod par
112a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyuro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma sa ya snyed sa ya brgya phrag stong drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu
112b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa yang dag par gzung bar 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya bar 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyu ro// mchod rten gyi snying po dang 'dra bar phyag bya ba'i 'os
112b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor gyi mo ga zhib mo'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po dgu pa// de nas byang chub sems dpal
112b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
112b4(rgyud): de log su thal me sbyar te 'atud nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bo sa phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
112b5(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la pad+ma'i rigs la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ rig sngags chen po rir ma par phye bacho ga zhib mo don yod pa'i zhags
112b6(rgyud): pa'i snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de bdag gis yongasu bsgrag par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
112b7(rgyud): bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das la lta bzhin du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di smras so// / na ma s+t+rai yang d+hA nu gta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+ya/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa te b+h+yaHna ma tha
112b8(rgyud): t+ya ka bud+yAr+ya shrA ba ka sa~M r+tha b+h+yaHa tAMtA nu ga tA btud pan ne b+h+yaHna maHsamya kA tA nA maHna maHsa myaka pra ti pan nA nAMHna maHshwa radA ti pud+d+hA ya ma hA ma ha ye/ na maHAr+tha mai tra ya pra mu le d+ha/ 
113a1(rgyud): ma hA bo d+hi satwa Ar+ya ga Na ba re d+ha na maHAr+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ aR+tha te sa myags bud d+ha ya/ na ma rat+na tra sA ya/ na maHAr+yA ba la ki te shwa na ya/ 
113a2(rgyud): bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA ri'i Ar+ya ga Na ba re d+haHna ma swa thA Ar+yA ba la ki She shwa rA mu khe dz+nyAn+da/ a ma g+ha rA dza na nA ma hr-id yanaHta thA ga tA sa~M mu khaM b+hA dzi ta ma hA
113a3(rgyud): tAM barban+da d+h+yaM/ a hi mi dA nAM mA ban+ta yi Sh+yA mi ridz+dza tu me man+t+ra pa drAHsarba kar+yA ti/ sar+b+ba d+ha me d+h+ya ma ma sar+b+ba satwA nAny+tsa rak+Sha b+hA ba tu/ tid+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsaH/ tsi ra tsa ri tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ 
113a4(rgyud): ther dza ro/ bar thar/ rtsar tsi ra~Mpa ra ma hA kA ra~M Ni kA/ so ras ra bar bar/ tsir tsa ra~M/ mahA bang+ga ha ste/ ka le ka la/ rka ma ka~M pa~M/ ku ru ku mu/ mahA shud sta satwa/ e h+ye hi/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+hU bad+hA ba/ 
113a5(rgyud): ka Na kaN/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ka ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa le/ ngi tsa la bi tsa
113a6(rgyud): e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri d+ha ri/ d+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be ba d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha hA ha hA/ hi hI hi hI huhU
113a7(rgyud): hu hU/ oM kA ra ma hA brah+ma be Shad+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pa ra ba ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba rad/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Dita
113a8(rgyud): rI ra/ dz+wA la dz+wa la/ tA pa tA pa/ b+ha ga bAn/ so ma A da t+ya/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+man+da/ ri ShA ga na a d+h+ya rtsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ bu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nad kun/ 
113b1(rgyud): ra ruH/ mas pa biSh+Ta/ d+han dade bar 'i cwa ya kra/ ma chu ba d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ nA ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+hi / d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ thar thar/ b+ha ra bA ra/ yar ya ra/ la ral pa/ ha ha ra
113b2(rgyud): pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba / ba ra dA ya ka sa man ta/ a ba sa ka~M ta/ mo ke shwa8/ sa he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru su ru/ mu ya mu ya/ mu r+tha suny+tsa/ d+ha ga tAn/ sA r+ya ba lo ki ti shwa ra/ rat+na pa
113b3(rgyud): sar+b+ba satwAM sh+tsa/ sar+b+ba b+ha ya b+h+yaHsan+do pa sarbe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba pra he b+h+yaHsar+b+ba dz+wa ra b+h+yaHe wa ba d+ha/ ban+d+ha na/ tA Da na/ tardza na/ rA dza/ tse ra/ ta sa ra/ ag+ni/ u da ka/  gaste/ par ma tsa ka ka Na kaH/ 
113b4(rgyud): No ka~M ka~M ku N+Dakra N+ya/ tsa ra~M tsar/ in dri ya ba la d+d+hagatsa tAr Amra sa daH/ sau p+pa kA sha ka/ ta ma tam/ dam dam/ sa bsam/ sams ma/ mar+b+ba ta maHd+haShA/ 
113b5(rgyud): bi d+ha man bi d+ha ma na/ Shan+d+har mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/ mi mo mi ma~M/ Ta Tarba Ta/ Thatha zaH/ Ti Ti Ti Ta~M/ tsu nu nu nu/ e Ne ya tsar+m+maHta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye te/ A shwa ra/ ma hA
113b6(rgyud): mahA b+hu ta ga Na b+hany+dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra ba pa ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta maT/ bi bud+d+ha/ bi Sha ya ni bA si na/ mahA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta ya dzA bi ShA ta/ dan mu ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba d+hA tsa ras kr-i ta ma rbaH/ 
113b7(rgyud): ma ha b+hu ta/ ka ma la li ta ka ra ta la/ d+hA nas mA d+hi bi mok+Sha a pra kam+b+ha/ ba hu sa tA man+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka mahA kA ni ka/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma a ba raN bo sho d+ha ka sar+b+ba b+ha d+hi pra ma tsa ka/ sar+b+ba A shA pa ri pU
113b8(rgyud): ka/ sar+b+ba satwa sa mA ra shA sa ka/ na ma stu te swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying
114a1(rgyud): 'di bshad pa tsam gyis 'khor mang po ri dang nags tshal du bcas pa 'di rnam pa gru du g.yos so// 'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung bar gyur to// lha'i me tog ud pa
114a2(rgyud): la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / man da ra ba'i me tog gi char cha no pus maM nub pa tsam bab par gyur to// sil snyan dang / pheg rdog pa'i sgra dag kyang byung bar gyur to// mtho ris kyi
114a3(rgyud): lha dag gis kyang na mkha' las bcom ldan 'das la rgyan dang / lhab lha ba dag gi char phab bo// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / 
114a4(rgyud): namakha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gtsang ma de dag thams cad kyis leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po legs lags// yod bzhin gyi nor
114a5(rgyud): bu chen po don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying po mchog tu rnyed bar bka' ba 'di bshad cing / dngos grub mchog gi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di bshad pas rin po che'i
114a6(rgyud): char chen po 'bab po zhes zer ro// de nas de'i phyir dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya zhing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing zas dkar gsum za bas/ 24
114a7(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dpal lha mo bzhag ste/ mchod pa byas la yungs kar 'bru re ra la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dpal lha mo la bsnun pa byas na tshes bcu pa ni
114a8(rgyud): nas bco lnga'i bar du dpal lha mo 'ong bar 'gyuraro// mtshams med pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug su ston par 'gyuraro// sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur// 
114b1(rgyud): mtshams bcad pa dang / zhi bar bya ba la e ga ru dang / tsan dan gyi bdug spos bsregs la thal ba dang / yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu gdab par bya'o// rims thams cad la bu mo gtsang
114b2(rgyud): mas bkal ba'i srad bu la mdud pa ni shu rtsa gcig bor la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btags na rims thams cad las thar par 'gyu ro// nad thams cad la mar dang til mar las bzlas te
114b3(rgyud): rangs kyi snod du sangs rgyas la phul ba'i sna ma'i me tog snying po dang / pad+ma ze ba dang bcas pa btab ste btsos pa 'di ni grub pa yin te/ zas dang / skom dang / bsku ba dang / sna nas btang ba'i las pa
114b4(rgyud): ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas nad thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// byad bcad na mar dang sbrang rtsil lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te lus la bsku zhing tshigs dril la/ lus kyi
114b5(rgyud): dri ma byin par bya ste/ gong bu las gzugs brnyan byas la lan bdun bzlas te mtshon gyis btab nas dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / gsang sngags thams cad bcad par
114b6(rgyud): 'gyur zhing nad thams cad las thar par 'gyu ro// byad chen mo 'jig par 'gyuraro// srung ba'i skud pa la lam ni shu rtsa gcig bzlas te de bzhin du mdud pa dor ba byas na srung ba chen po
114b7(rgyud): byas par 'gyuro// 'jig pa dang / skrag pa dang / dngang ba thams cad dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyi mi tshug so// lho na pa la tshwa chu 'jam tsam la lan bdun bzlas te byin na lte
114b8(rgyud): nang 'jig par 'gyuraro// dug gsod na chu la lan bdun bzlas te phyin na dug thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi gdug par 'gyuraro// mig na ba la srang bu dkar po rna ba la btags na mi nad tha~Md 'jig
115a1(rgyud): par 'gyuro// sdang ba'i dug mi bzad pa la 'jim pa la bzlas te byug pa byas na dug med par 'gyuro// so na ba la ka ra bi ra'i so shing ngam/ sna ma'i song shing ngam/ 
115a2(rgyud): shing pa gu'i so shing la bzlas te zos na nad zhi bar 'gyur// mtshams bcad pa thams cad ni tsho 'a lnga'i srad bu byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ seng ldeng gi phur du bzhi la btag
115a3(rgyud): te phyogs bzhir btsugs na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyuraro// gdon thams cad la tshon skud sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na gdon thams cad la thar par 'gyuraro// srog
115a4(rgyud): chags kI Ta dang / lhog pa dang mgul pa 'gags pa la sbrang rtsi bi baM ling ldan par byas te byug go// mgul 'gags pa la bldag pa byas na mgul 'gags pa thams cad la thar par 'gyur/ 
115a5(rgyud): mig nad la spos chu dang / shing ba la sha'i chu dang / ba la sha'i me tog gis bkru bar bya ba 'am/ shing mngar gyi chu la lan 'du na bzlas te bkrus na mig nad thams cad las
115a6(rgyud): thar par 'gyuro// rna ba na ba la til mar dang shu ti zangs kyi snod du bcos pas rna ba bkang na rna nad las thar bar 'gyu ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag 'khrug dang / mi snyan pa thad
115a7(rgyud): la chu la lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkru ba byas na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyu ro// dpung dang / stobs dang / yul dang / yul 'khor dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad dang / 
115a8(rgyud): g.yul ngo thams cad du ba lang gi skyi bas dkyil 'khor byas la bum pa gang pa bzhi gzhag ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing 'phags pa spyan ras
115b1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo 'di mchod de bklags pa byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur te/ thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / byams
115b2(rgyud): pa'i yid du 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyuraro// zhi ba chen por 'gyu ro// chu des bdag nyid la kun tu gtor te tsan dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te snying khar thig le
115b3(rgyud): byas te/ rtag tu dran par byas na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyuraro// khyim thams cad srung na tshon sna lnga'i srad bu byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te seng ldeng gi phur bu
115b4(rgyud): bzhi la btags te/ phyogs bzhir gtsugs na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyu ro// gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na gdon thaMd las
115b5(rgyud): thar par 'gyu ro// srog chags chags ki ta dang / lu'u ta dang / me dpal rnams la pad+ma dang / na ku lI dang / shing arga'i me to ga mar dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na/ 
115b6(rgyud): khyim srung ba chen po byas par 'gyu ro// 'byung po'i gdon thams cad las bsrung bar byas par 'gyu ro// yang las thams cad la nor bu bsgrub pa'i sa rdzas 'di dag bsags la cha ma'am
115b7(rgyud): par byas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma 'gas la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas las thams cad bya'o// dza ya dang /  dzi ya dang / mA gu la dang / gan d+ha nA dang / ba ru Ni dang / in dra ba ru nI dang
115b8(rgyud): gan d+ha pri yaM gu dang / ta gar dang / tsakra dang / mahA tsakra dang / so ma rA dzi dang / su mnad rnams phye ma zhib mor byas te/ tshar ba'i chus sdus la tsan dang bur gum sbyar ba'i chus brlan te brgya rtsa brgyar
116a1(rgyud): bzlas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyi spyan sngar nor bu byas te/ yang lan ni shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas a ga ru'i bdug pas gdugs la
116a2(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du bzhag ste/ ras kyis g.yogs la grib mar bskams te blangs la yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas par bya zhing / khro bo'i rgyal
116a3(rgyud): bo lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te/ mgo bor bzung na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyu ro// rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten thams cad
116a4(rgyud): dbang du 'gyu ro// bla ma gcig pur 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyang gzi byin 'jug par 'gyuro// 'phags pa spyan ras dbang phyug kyang rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur// tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug
116a5(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing dus thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyuraro// phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba thams cad kyang rtag tu 'thun
116a6(rgyud): bar byed cing dbang du 'gyuraro// byad mi bzad pa dang / dug sbyar me dang / phye ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags dang / g.yengs byed kyis mi tshugs shing thams cad 'jigs par 'gyu ro// rtag tu
116a7(rgyud): dpal dang / gzi byin dang / bsod nams dang / bkra shis dang / dge ba'i tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyuraro// rtag tu ston pa bzhed par
116a8(rgyud): 'gyur/ thams cad du dus thams cad na rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro// skal pa bzang po thogs pa mA nga yang 'phel bar 'gyuraro// dpung pa la btags na glang po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par
116b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'gyed pa dang / dmag thams cad las rgyal ba chen por 'gyu ro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnod pa chen por 'gyuro// rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo chen po grub
116b2(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha ba'i gdon dang / brjod byed kyis mi tshugs par 'gyu'o// nam yang de la rmi lam ngan pa dang / bltas ngan pa 'byung bar mi
116b3(rgyud): 'gyu ro// byis pa rnams la mgul du btags na gdon thams cad dang / rims nad thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / btsas pa 'phrog pa thams cad kyis mi chug so// nag po
116b4(rgyud): chen po ma ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byi bzhin 'brang zhing / srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur/  du yang 'gyu
116b5(rgyud): 'gyu ro// bud med rnams la ska rags sar pa btags te khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma sar pa bgos te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod
116b6(rgyud): pa byas na skal pa bzang po mchog dang ldan par byed cing bkra mi gos pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ khyim thab dang rtag tu rje su 'thun par 'gyur/ khye'u dang bu mo yong bar 'gyur/ shes
116b7(rgyud): rab mchog tu 'gyur/ thams cad dga' bas lta bar 'gyur/ de la bud med kyi skyon yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ phyi ma la de lta bu'i bud med kyi lus mi thob par shes par bya ste/ 
116b8(rgyud): shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyur// nor bu 'di btags na thams cad du srung ba byas par 'gyur zhing dug dang mtshon dang mes mi tshug so// dug byas pa yang
117a1(rgyud): skye bar mi 'gyuraro// nor bu 'di btags pas dug med par 'gyur zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur// tshor ba bsgre bar mi 'gyur zhing bde bar zhi bar 'gyur// rlung dang sprin
117a2(rgyud): dang ser ba mnon tshu la lan bdun bzlas te na mkha' la gtor na rlung dang sprin dang ser ba thams cad mnan par 'gyuraro// bzlog par bya na bal po se'u'i lcug mas bzlog par bya'o// dran
117a3(rgyud): pa bskyed na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ nor bu chu dron las btang ba byas na bklags pa tsam
117a4(rgyud): gyis tshogasu bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur zhing thos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyuraro// rgyal srid dang / yul 'khor dang btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du byar 'dod na lus
117a5(rgyud): bsku ba byas na gang du zhugs pa der thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// dbus mo gnyis la byugs na chu klung chen po dngu sa mo nub tsam gyi pha rol tu rgol bar 'gyuraro// 
117a6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ dpag gam g.yul ngo 'am/ tshogs pa'i nang ngam/ ri khrod dang chang tshing dang / ri sul dang / dgon par phyin pa na sgreng ba byas na bde ba dang / bde legasu
117a7(rgyud): rgal bar 'gyur zhing chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan zan gtum po'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing bltar med par 'gyuraro// btson ra thams cad du song ba
117a8(rgyud): na byug pa byas nang shing sgrog dang khang sgril dang / lcags sgrog gis bcings pa thaMd chag grug su 'gyur// bdag nyid la bskus na mtshon cha mi snang bar 'gyuraro// mog gnyis la bsdus
117b1(rgyud): na gnyid logs pa'i tshe rmi lam mtshan po rmi bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar bsams shing smon pa snang bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par mdzad cing thad
117b2(rgyud): bka' stsol bar 'gyuraro// de la mig nad kyi mi tshug so// kha'i nang du bzhag na gang bslangs pa sbyin par byed cing dbang du 'gyu ro// gdon gyis zin pa la dpral bar byug pa byas
117b3(rgyud): na byugs pa tsam gyis 'bab par 'gyur te/ thams cad smra bar 'gyuraro// lag mthil du bskus na glang po che la reb na/ dbang du 'gyur zhing gar btang ba der 'gro bar 'gyu ro// dpral ba'i dbusu za
117b4(rgyud): la byas na 'jig rten thams cad kyis cher mchod par 'gyur// / med pa la byugs ra mgror sngor bzhin du bram ze thams cad dang nga du 'gyur zhing bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhir du
117b5(rgyud): 'gru'o kho ma dang sbyar te mig la bskus na mtshan mo yang nyin mo'i bzhin du sdang bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas tha~Md kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur zhing gter zadang 'byung bar
117b6(rgyud): thams cad bran bzhin byed par 'gyuraro// klu'i gnas kyi mtshor bor na klu chen pas mar gyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyuraro// char ha cang me ba'i tshe nu dang bsres te mkha' la gtor na zhi bar 'bru
117b7(rgyud): po sbyor la bltas te ser ba'i rgyun la gtor na serang 'bad par mi 'gyu ro// lag pa la bdags na gang reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyuraro// rkang pa'i rje ngang la btags te me'i nang du
117b8(rgyud): zhugs nams mi tshugs zhing tsan dan bzhin du bsil bar 'gyu ro// ral gri la byugs te g.yul ngor song na lus tha gcig tu 'bar bar gyur nas/ pha rol gyi dpung thad 'byer ba
118a1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyuraro// nad chen pos thebs pa'i rang pa tshabs po che la phye ma byin na nad tshabs chen po las thar par 'gyuraro// tshad pa dang po
118a2(rgyud): na ba la chu dron las gtang na mod la yongasu thar bar 'gyur ro// rtsi ba legs na ba la dang ba las btang na zhi bar 'gyuraro// nad thams cad la ni zhun mar dang til mar las rtswa te sku mnye dang bza'
118a3(rgyud): ba dang / datung ba'i nad dang / snar blugs pa dang / byugs pa byas na nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ phug gi sgor khor yug tu byugs la snying po lan btu
118a4(rgyud): bzlas te/ de na yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la khro bo'i rgyal po gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas ras zhugs na phug gi ske chag ste rang gi khyim du 'gyur zhing snga
118a5(rgyud): pa thams cad bzlog par 'gyuro// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad mi snang bar 'gyuraro// khar bcug ste mi smra bar snying po'i mdo brjod par byas na lan brgya phrag steng bzlas
118a6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// shing rta'i srog shing la byugs na g.yul ngo thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyuro// zong la gtor
118a7(rgyud): na rin chen pos nyo bar 'gyuraro// bu mo'i gdong bkrus na mgo yang bar 'gyur// snying khar thig le byas na thams cad du bltar med par 'gyuraro thams cad du 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa/ 
118a8(rgyud): thams cad byed bdag srung ba/ gzhan srung ba'i nor bu gang dang gang la sbyar zhing bzlas pas thams cad du bltar med par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang log 'dren rnams la til dang chu la lan 'du
118b1(rgyud): bzlas te byin na bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// byung ngan pa med par bya na ras la dkyil 'khor thum po bris la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan
118b2(rgyud): sngar mi smra bar bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ a ga ru'i 'dug pas bdug par bya zhing spos dang ldan pa'i til mar
118b3(rgyud): gyi mar me bltam pa byas na bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la byung ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyu ro// dbul ba nyams pa'i don dang / ma grub pa dang / sdig pa dang rmi lam ngan
118b4(rgyud): ba dang ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa bsal na gser ram dngul gyi bum pa spos chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ blugs na de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur
118b5(rgyud): zhing 'jig rten pa'i dpal chen po nyam su myong bar la/ gyuraro// gdon thams cad tshar bcad na til dang 'bras so pa'i sbyin sreg gis so/ nad dang gnod pa thad pas
118b6(rgyud): na chu la bzla so// dus ma yin par 'chi bzhi bar bya na dus gsum du lan gsum gsum du rtag tu bzlas pas dus ma yin par 'chi 'ani bar 'gyuraro// bcing ba dang lcags sgrog dang khong smol
118b7(rgyud): gnom na nyon re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas paso// maM rangs par bya na sang ldang gshang la/ rgyal po dbang du bya na lam po cher brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa
118b8(rgyud): dbang du 'gyuraro// chom po dang rkun po rengs par byas na rA dzA ko shA ka'i sa bon gyi sbyin sreg gi so// me reng sa bya na seng ldeng gi shing la bzlas te mer bcur nas bzlas na me rengs par
119a1(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro// chu rangs par byan ka la gi sa bon chu'i nang du btab na chu rengs par byas par 'gyuro// dug gzhil na rma bya tsA mas/ mtsham rengs par byan
119a2(rgyud): shing banam lcags kyis tshig pa'i thal ba la bzlas te gtor na mtshon cha thams cad rengs par 'gyuraro// ting 'dzin sgrub na ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas na ting 'dzir stong thob par
119a3(rgyud): 'gyuro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nag/ dge bsnyen ma des pa lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor grub bzhi pa cha shin tu mdze
119a4(rgyud): pa byas te/ tsan dan gyis mchod par bya ning gur gum dang / bla rtsi dang ga pur gyis mchod na sa me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon
119a5(rgyud): du phyogs par bzhag nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba bzhig zhag la mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang / pog por bzhi spos chu'i bum pa'i dbusu bdag par bya zhing / a ga ru'i
119a6(rgyud): 'dug pa dbul bar bya'o// bum pa'i steng du bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhag par bya/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya zhing / spos kyi mar me 'ani bltam par bya/ 
119a7(rgyud): mchod pa rgya chen po bya rgyan gyi brgyan par bya zhing dkyil 'khor byas la dkyil 'khor gyi dbu su skyil mo krung du 'dug te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad
119a8(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku ston par 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su
119b1(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyuraro// sems can brgya stong mang po gdul na ri'i rtse mor stong rtsa brgyad bzlas paso// sdang ba thams cad gzhom par 'dod pas rdo rje 'am/ mdung rtse gsum la lan stong
119b2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas mtsham ngam bya zhing khro bo'i rgyal po'i bsdig pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ khros pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gsor te/ na mkha'
119b3(rgyud): pa 'phangs na bdud la sogs pa sdang ba thams cad bcom par 'gyuraro// las thams cad grub pa dang / gsang sngags thams cad 'grub pa dang / bsam pa thams cad 'grub cing yong
119b4(rgyud): su rdzogs par 'dod pas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyi ga rgya bcings te/ stong nyi shu bzlas na grub pa chen por 'gyuraro// de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur
119b5(rgyud): ngar 'dod pas stong sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du spos chu'i bum pas dbang bskur bar bya'o// 
119b6(rgyud): de bzhin gang shegs pa'i gzugs brnyan sku bdud dang bcas pa la mig gtad de khri bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
119b7(rgyud): gi zhabs mnan te khri bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bar 'dod pas/ phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mnan te bzlas brjod lan spong byas
119b8(rgyud): nas bu gul gyi bdug pa dbul ba byas na 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyuraro// thad du khro bo'i rgyal po dran par bya zhing thams cad du don yod pa'i
120a1(rgyud): / zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba byas na/ ma sgrubs ma grags par 'gyur cing cho ga zhib mo mtha' yas 'grub par 'gyuro// snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyom
120a2(rgyud): dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / brtse ba dang / byams pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pas 'di 'grub par bstan to// go cha bgos pa grub pa mchog thams cad grub pa thod cing bsod nams kyi
120a3(rgyud): phung pos 'bar bar 'gyuraro// thog mar khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas pas rtag tu mtshams bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / yul bcing bya ste/ srung ba mchog tu dkon pa'o// de bzhin
120a4(rgyud): gshegs pa dang / rgyal po'i bdag nyid skyes pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing go cha bgos par 'gyu ro// gal te dbang bskur bar 'dod na yang rgyal ba tha~Md kyis
120a5(rgyud): dbang bskur bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pas bden pa ston par 'gyu ro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo mchog las dra za'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ 
120a6(rgyud): gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ sher rab dang byang chub kyi thabs dang ldan pas 'di 'grub par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan te// na maH
120a7(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ Ar+ya bA lo ki te shwa ra badz+ra d+ha re b+h+ya i tsa ra tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tsa ra tsi ri/ khi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad+ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ku ru ku ru/ mahA s+thA ma prA b+ha/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa
120a8(rgyud): tsa ra ti/ tsa ra shwa ra/ e h+ye hi/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+hA bad+d+ha ga ki Ni ki NaM/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA ba shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ ha hAM/ hi haM/ hu hu/ aM kA ra mahA/ 
120b1(rgyud): brazla ba 'ja ra tsa tsar/ ba la/  gling ba ta sa ha sra ti ma skri sha nI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta ba ta ga d+ha ga zhan/ sa mA d+ya/ ya ma kha ru Na/ ku rer/ bras+t+ra narba/ bi'i gaN ba badz+ra d+ha rtso bcar
120b2(rgyud): su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa na ta ku mA ra/ ru rba/ biSh+Nu bA sa ga/ d+ha nad/ de ba ra~M dzi nA ya ka ba u bi bi d+ha She 'ad+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta ba lo ka/ bi la ki te/ la ki te shwa ra/ mu la mu la/ mun tsa mun tsa
120b3(rgyud): daM d+ha baM d+ha na/ tA Da na/ tardza na/ rA dza taska ag+ni/ u da ka/ bi Sha/ rakaska pa/ ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ ba la bo da d+h+yaM ga tsa tu rAr+ya sad t+ya sam pra kA sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ sa ma sa ma/ many+dza
120b4(rgyud): tsa~M d+har d+hA/ kA ra pra ba ma na mi li mi li/ e na ya tsarma kra ta ba ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA sau na/ mahA ka ra Ni ka/ shwe ta ya dz+nyA pa dzI ba
120b5(rgyud): rat+na ma ku Ta mA pA d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba dz+nyA shi ra saM kr-i ta/ ka ra bu Ta/ d+ha na/ sa mA d+hi/ ngi mok+Sha a pra kam+b+ha/ laT bA ra maM tA pU ra ka/ ba tsu sa twA sam ha ti pa ri pA tsa ka
120b6(rgyud): sar+b+ba mA rA ri pra duny+tsa pra madz+ra ka/ sar+b+ba sid d+ha ShA pa ri pur ka/ a b+hi r+ya sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a b+hi'i kair/ b+ha bAn ta/ a ma hA rA dzA su~M phaT/ na ma stA te swAhA/ gsang snga
120b7(rgyud): kyi cho ga snga pa de lta bus las thams cad pa don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo zhes bya ba grub pa mchog las thams cad pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA
120b8(rgyud): ya na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ mahA ku ru Ni kA ya/ a mo b+ha ba ra dA/ pA ra ba hastA ya/ mahA shud+d+haHsatwA ya/ A gtsA/ b+ha ga bA ra/ pad+ma hA
121a1(rgyud): sta ba ra da ka rAM gu le/ pad+ma b+hu dze ma hA ba tsu ba ti be Sha d+ha re/ pri sA da/ shI b+h+rU~M a gats+tsha/ mahA be ga/ bi pra sha ta rash+mi/ ha sa ha sa/ a ma
121a2(rgyud): b+ha gud d+he/ ha sa ha sa/ tsa la tsa la/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha b+ha ga bA na/ a ba lo ko ti shA ra ma ma ga na d+ha puSh+pa/ sa ma mardza ni ya ma pra tIts+tsha/ tri rat+na sad t+ye na/ a mo g+ha sid d+ha
121a3(rgyud): swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa thams cad dgug pa/ a ga ru'i bdug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa so// na mo rat+na tra yA
121a4(rgyud): ya na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ mahA ka ru Ni kA ya/ sar+b+ba gan d+ha ba ti sid ta/ a ma b+ha b+hu dza/ ba ra dA ya/ sar+b+ba gan d+ha mA l+ya
121a5(rgyud): bad+hu Shi ti pra ye/ tsan+dar+d+ha shi ra si pri ye/ gan d+ha gan d+ha nu le ba na sA ma ma pri tad tsha/ ba ra ba ra ba ra dA ya swA hA/ lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// nA
121a6(rgyud): mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ ma hA pra b+ha/ su bi ma le/ brah+ma
121a7(rgyud): Shad+ha ra/ su ma ti pra ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ bi tsi tra puSh+Ta mA phyi ba b+hu Shi ti/ ha ra ha re/ ma ra ma ra/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo b+ha hri da ya pra mo da na ku ru prat+tits+tsha ma ma puSh+pa ba re swAhA/ 
121a8(rgyud): me tog la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// na ma rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba mo kau te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA pa
121b1(rgyud): s+phar s+pha ra/ b+ha ga bAn/ sa ma yai/ sar+b+ba ta thA ba NA shA~M sod+d+ha/ b+ha ga bAn/ a ba mo kA ya/ sar+b+ba satwA a ba lo ka na/ a mo g+ha ba ti pA sha ha ste/ sid d+he sid d+he/ sid+d+ha bar da sad/ 
121b2(rgyud): d+han tu te/ bud+d+ha d+harma/ se b+ha saha t+yen tu ru tu ru/ sad h+ya sa ma ya pA la ya swA hA// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bya ba'i rig sngag so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AH/ 
121b3(rgyud): a ba laM ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya mahA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+hu re d+hA re/ badz+ra d+ha ra/ pad+ma dza be/ bi ga tA ba rA de/ be ga be ga/ b+hu Tu b+hu Tu/ sar+b+ba bi dza pri ye/ 
121b4(rgyud): bud d+ha d+harma/ saM g+ha sad t+ye na/ mi li mi li swAhA/ gtor ma'i sngags te lan bdun bzlas te sbyin no// na mo rat+natra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki tI shwa rA ya/ 
121b5(rgyud): bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya/ a pra ti ha ta/ ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ b+ha ga bAn/ A ha ra a ha ra/ pad+ma sa na pad+ma b+hu dze/ k+She te ge/ sha ta sudz+ra
121b6(rgyud): bA ta ma l+ya bi b+hu Shi te/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ dz+wa la b+hud d+ha d+harma/ saM g+ha sad t+ya na swA hA// mar ma'i sngags te lan bdun baR+Sha so// na ma rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo kai te
121b7(rgyud): kA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM bai ri bi ri/ pad+ma pA Ni/ a ga mA ga mA/ a mo g+ha tad tA sid+d+hi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ga ga na rash+mi sats+tsha di ta/ 
121b8(rgyud): sar+b+ba bid+yA d+ha ra bi sho d+he ne/ a mo b+ha sid+d+he swAhA// spos chu'i dri nom pa'i bum pa la lan bdun bzlas te khrus bya'o// khrus kyi rig sngagaso// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya
122a1(rgyud): a ba mo ki ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+hu me d+h+ya me/ d+hu d+hu me/ pad+me pad+me nir b+hA se/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ 
122a2(rgyud): kan tsa na/ pra b+ha sa'i ma le/ kun+dan n+ti/ zhud rtsi shud tsi/ shu tso go tsar sa~Md+d+ha/ pad+me gab ti pra ba ra Ni swA hA// gas kyi rig sngags te/ lan 'dun bzlas pa so// na mo rat+na traSh+Ta
122a3(rgyud): ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te kA rarA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ shA me sha ma ya/ shan ti me/ ma ma swas+thA naM ku ru/ shAn to si me sar+b+ba pA pa shAn
122a4(rgyud): rashud+ha ka l+yan pa ra dze/ shA ti bi dza ye/ dza ya sid+d+he/ b+ha ga bAn/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sa ra sa ra swA hA// mal chal bsngags te nyal na rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas
122a5(rgyud): ngan pa thams cad mi mthong ngo // na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te kA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga prA kar
122a6(rgyud): Ne/ daM ba bya dza la/ dza lA ba he/ dza la se k+Sho b+ha yan nA ga dza la saM sho d+ha ni pad+ma sa re/ pad+ma bi shud+d+he/ pA Ni dza le saM tsa~M d+ha ya/ A da man d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa le le swA hA/ chu'i sngags te khrus da
122a7(rgyud): dbang bskur ba'i chu blangs la lan bdun bzlas te spya do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shA ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sar+b+ba satI ha te ka rA
122a8(rgyud): la/ a ma~M b+ha ba ra pra dA ya/ sarba sad tra mnan bA na pra dA ya/ de ba nA bA da sA dzo N+ya bi d+hi d+ha ra sa nu pra dA ya/ sa ka la b+hu ba ne/ b+hu ba na bi sho d+ha ni/ san+tarbA yi pra ra bi shud+d+he swAhA// dbum
122b1(rgyud): sngag so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te kA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sar+b+ba de bA su ra na ma s+thi te/ sa ma sa man+ta pra pU ra ne/ sa ma gan d+hA ba b+ha si te/ ga gnaH
122b2(rgyud): gud+d+he/ muk+ti pra b+he/ dza ye/ bi dza ya/ dza ya ni ra mA l+yo pa na ya ti/ puSh+pa mA l+ya gan d+ha bi ko d+ha na/ bi sho d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bi shud+d+he/ pad+ma bi sho d+ha ni swAhA// me tog nyid dor ba'i rig sngag
122b3(rgyud): so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba la ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra Ni na d+ha re/ dz+wa ra Ni ban d+he/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ shu kri bi sho d+ha na/ shu kra mA pa
122b4(rgyud): ling bi ti/ shumra thi sha d+ha ni/ shud+d+ha bi ma le swAhA/ rtsa ku sha 'am/ ras kyi srad bu 'am/ bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mdud pa nyi shu
122b5(rgyud): bcig par 'byas na khu chu 'gags par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam sAr+ya a ba mo ki te shwa rarA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ mar+tha kA ru Ni kA la/ taHthA/ 
122b6(rgyud): la le dz+wa le/ bi ma le dz+wa le/ pa d+ha si ba ra dza/ sUr+ya ba ti/ dza ya padz+nyA la d+ha ra swA hA// me'i sbyin sreg gi thal ba la lan bdun bzlas te kun tu gtor na bgegs dang log 'dren thaMd kyis
122b7(rgyud): nam yang mi tshug so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya~M/ mahA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru NaM kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dza le dza le/ dza la ba ti/ dza la pra b+ha bi na/ 
122b8(rgyud): nA ga swa ba ni/ da ba bya bI ri Ni/ mi la~M mi li swAhA/ nye reg gi rig sngag so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+yathA/ 
123a1(rgyud): ri Ni ha ri Ni/ ping ga li ping ga li/ hi ri hi ri/ b+ha ga bAn ni tsa la pra tsa la/ pri ti tiSh+Tha mA na rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma bud+d+ha/ d+harma saM b+ha sad t+ya na swA hA/ sngags bu
123a2(rgyud): 'am/ rtsa ku ka ba ting pa la lan bdun bas+t+raDaHso// stan gyi rig sngagaso// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba maN+Da la ni ba sa ni da ba tA nI/ na mo bi d+yA de ba tA ta nAM/ sar+b+ba ka la pa saud+d+ha nA/ na ma
123a3(rgyud): Ar+ya a ba lo ki shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ many+dza satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba te/ pad+ma sun d+ha ri/ ma hA bid+ya de ba ti/ tsa la tsa la/ pad+ma sun da ri/ be ga ba te/ su ru su ru
123a4(rgyud): swAhA/ nyin re zhing me tog dang / bdug ba dang / gtor ma dang / spos chus pho nya ma pad+ma'i rigs mdze sa pa dang / gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma mchad nas ba
123a5(rgyud): brjod lan bdun byas na nam yang bgegs thaMd kyi mi tshug so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHkro d+ha rA dza ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA sar+b+ba
123a6(rgyud): ya/ ma hA kA ru ka kA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba bid+ya ku la be sha s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+hA hr-i da ya pra b+hA bi ni/ sar+b+ba big+h+nAn pra sha ma ni/ A ha rA/ se ha ra/ pad+ma pi tho ba biSh+Ta/ ma Ni ka Na ka
123a7(rgyud): bi b+hU Sha te/ ka ma la b+hu dze/ ta ra ta ra/ tA rA ya ba ra ma a mo g+ha hri da ya/ dza ya tri na tre/ ba rad b+hu dze/ sma ra sma ra/ b+ha ga bAn/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ brad+ba be
123a8(rgyud): Sha d+ha ra/ bi b+hu Sha ta ta nu/ ma hA b+ha ya ha re/ a lo ka ya/ bi lo ka ya/ sar+b+ba satwA ba lo ka ni/ ba ra ba ra de swAhA// las thams cad pa'i rig sngags te khyad par du ni rig sngags 'dis
123b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi gnas na 'khong pa'i las mi rnams bsrung bar bya'o// na ma rat+na tra wA ya/ na ma ar+tha a pa ma ki te shwa rA ya/ ba d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA sarbA ga sa na kA ru Ni ga u tad+hA thA/ 
123b2(rgyud): pa ra ba ra/ ma ra ma ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ban d+ha bar d+ha sa man+ta na/ a mo g+ha pa sha ha ste/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ bud d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sad t+ye na swAhA/ thal ba la lan nyi shu gcig bzlas de don yod
123b3(rgyud): zhags par phyag rgyas yul bcing ngo // na me rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ di bA ban d+ha rau/ a mo g+ha/ a pra
123b4(rgyud): ti / mu ru mu ru/ su ru su ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sar+b+ba bab+hin bi nA sha Ni/ pad+ma sa ra bi b+hu Shi te/ bud d+he d+harma sa g+ha sad t+ye ma d+han d+ha/ a dza~M Na ba de swAhA/ spyan drangs te phyogs bcing
123b5(rgyud): bar bya'o// na ma rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yab le ki te shwa rA ya/ dza d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya / tad+ya thA hi li tsi wi/ mi l-i mi li/ si ri si ri/ ba
123b6(rgyud): ri ba ra ba ra/ pra ba ra di mA na d+ha ra/ da ra da ra/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ b+ha ga bAr/ Ar+ya ba lo ki shwa ra sh+tsa/ b+ha ga bAn/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo b+ha pad+me swAhA/ me tog ji snyed pa la lan nyi shuH
123b7(rgyud): gcig bzlas te sdom pa nas phul na slar gsheg su gas lnga'agyuraro// rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo rim par phye ba'i cho ga'o// de nas don yang ba'i zhags pa'i rgyal pa khro bo chen pa'i stong
123b8(rgyud): po'i mchog sgrub na sgrub sra ba'i ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga bzhad par bya'o// cho ga zhib grub grub po tshe// khro bo'i rgyal grub grub pa mchog// don yod pa ni grub pa'i mchog/ rig sngar
124a1(rgyud): 'di ni bshad par bya'o// don yod rgyal po dro cher gyi// snying po dam pa sgrub pa na// cho ga zhing grub grub pa che// khro bo'i rgyal po grub pa mche ga grub pa'i
124a2(rgyud): mchog sde don yod pa// rig sngags 'di ni bakhad par bya// bang brjod pa tsam gyis che ba zhib me'i mchog 'grub pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag sdong gis gzigs par 'gyur ba
124a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ba'i klung gi bya ma snang brgya sdong mthong bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa 'gyur ba bsod nams kyi phung po bla na ma
124a4(rgyud): pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba stabs dang brtson 'grus bskyed pa/ cho ga zhi'am thams cad don yod pa de kho na nyid sgrub pa 'grub pa/ dran pa tsam gyis mong
124a5(rgyud): la ni// sa bzhi yang ni g.yo 'gyur la/ su cu'i lha rnams g.yo 'gyur zhing // lhar bcas rgya mtsho lhun por baHsa/ klu rnams 'dir ni yid yed cing // gnod sbyir srin po 'a
124a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyeng tshe// rig sngags rgyal po bla med kyis// phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bcas/ dpung dang bcas shing gzhon bcas pa'i// lus skyes 'bar ba'i phreng can kun
124a7(rgyud): 'dar zhing kun tu 'dar yang yang // rgyal po chen po bzhi po yi// gnas mchog dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing // de dag thams cad 'dus gyur nas// 'jig rten dbang la skyabs 'dod zhing / bac+doMn
124a8(rgyud): mgon po bskyab tu gsol// thugs rje'i bdag nyid bskyab tu gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzibs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das
124b1(rgyud): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la grub pa don yod pa'i snying po rig sngags rgyal po'i snying po 'di gang gis
124b2(rgyud): bklags pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po myur du rab tu 'grub cing / dran pa tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzi Da dbang phyug lha'i lus kyis lus ston par 'gyur ba/ dngos
124b3(rgyud): grub dang mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba mchis te// bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i nang du bsgrags par bgyi'o// 
124b4(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma a mai tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ka tA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ e pad+me pad+me/ 
124b5(rgyud): pad+me d+ha ra/ bi b+hu Shi ta b+hu dze/ tsa ra tsa ra/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bi tsid tra mo la d+ha ra/ ma Ni ka na ka badz+ra bain+d+har+ya tsa kr-i ha sha rI ra/ ta ra ta ra/ ta rA ya/ b+ha ga ba ti bA ra Na/ d+hu rA
124b6(rgyud): d+ha ru/ a ma g+ha pA Sha ha ste/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ri d+ha ya ka/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba rang pad+ma sa na pad+ma ga wa ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka/ a b+hi Sha ka te/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ 
124b7(rgyud): ba la ba la/ ma hA de ga d+ha ra/ bi kr-i tA na ya ma/ daM byA ka na la ma hA te Sha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi pu la dza na ba rad / ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ mahA pa kud pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pra ba ra pu N+ya saM b+ha ra/ su ga ta d+h+ya na sa mA
124b8(rgyud): d+ha sa man+ta a pa mo kiH/ I shwa ra ma he rashwa ra/ duSh+TA da ma ka/ ro dra pra la da ma ka/ kro d+ha rA ba ma hA be ga d+ha ra/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA s+thA ma pra b+ha/ tsan dra sU r+ya a ti ri ka pra b+ha ma la la/ sar+b+ba ma la
125a1(rgyud): bi sho d+ha ka/ sar+b+ba ri Shi ba Na sa man+ta ti/ ma hA ma he shwa ra rU pa d+ha ra/ sa mi tA b+hi dzi nA lo kr-i ta dza Ta/ dak+Shi Na tsan dA le kr-i ta shi ra/ ma tha ma tha/ sar+b+ba yaH
125a2(rgyud): rak+Sha sa b+hA ta gan b+ha na dza ka/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ra ga na sa ma lo kr-i ti/ na k+Shad tra mA la sar+b+ba big+h+nAn bi nA shan ka ra/ pa ra mai tri tsit+ta ra hA kA ru Ni kA/ pa ra pa ra/ pa ri pUr+Na maN+Da la/ sau mya mu kha/ ShaT
125a3(rgyud): pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ru ka/ mi li mi li/ e Na ya tsarma ni ba sa na/ bya b+hA tsarme da ta ri ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba thA ga ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ tri ne tri tra shU la d+ha ra/ badz+ra dz+wa la d+ha ra/ a mo b+ha pA ka ha ste/ 
125a4(rgyud): ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra rU pa d+ha ra/ nA gan dra rU pa d+ha ra/ bi ma la bi shud+d+ha de ha/ sar+b+ba pA pa sha ma ka sar+b+ba bar Na bi she d+ha ka/ sar+b+ba ka li bi Sha na ka/ s+t+rai lo kya ba she ka ra/ sar+b+ba
125a5(rgyud): satwA bi sho d+ha ka/ ba d+hi satwa par da/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa trats+tsha te/ oM pad+ma bi b+hA Sha Tha shwAd+d+he/ d+ha ra d+hi ri/ a mo ki ya mA ma sa ma sa ma/ sar+b+ba rma me sA d+hA ya/ a maH
125a6(rgyud): bA sha hri da ya sid+d+hi/ gu h+ya na pi sau nai ba ra da hUM phaT/ na mo stu te swAhA// grub pa don yod pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bshad ma thag tu 'byung ba'i chags dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pa
125a7(rgyud): dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren de dag thams cad khas bub tu 'gyel te gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cig/ gnas kyang 'bar bar gyur pa dang / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo
125a8(rgyud): rje dga' bas pa spu langs te/ skrag par gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 
125b1(rgyud): skrag par gyur pa'i lha dang / lA ma yin dang drang sreng dpa' grong pa thams cad dang / rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / chu bran thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang dag
125b2(rgyud): chu na gnas pa thams cad dang rgya mtsho chen po'i lha dang / lha gang dag lang ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad dang / gang
125b3(rgyud): dag gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / na mkha'i lha thams cad dang 'khrugs par gyur nas na mkha' las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las dang / byang chub
125b4(rgyud): sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod pa'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / ut+pal dang / pun da rig dang
125b5(rgyud): mnad ri ka dang / mnad rab chen po'i charadang / lha'i brgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi char pus mo nub tsam raM bo po Ta lar phab ste/ lha'i sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len
125b6(rgyud): tsing ha ha zhes ca co dang gzha'i sgra bton nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sems can thams cad kyi don du rig sngags chen po 'di bshad do zhes ched
125b7(rgyud): brjod pa chen po ched du brjed do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der song ste/ 
125b8(rgyud): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mchod pa'i phyir mu tog ga dong gal brgya srung ri ba phul te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags chen po cho ga nib mo tha~Md kyi mchog bshad do// den yod pa'i rgyal ba rab lnga
126a1(rgyud): chen pa snying po 'jig rten mapon zung ba chen pas ba bang du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cho ga nab ma mtha' dgang des pa'i rnam pa 'grub pa mtshags sa
126a2(rgyud): grub par bshad du gsol// de nas de'i don du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa resangs pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo grub pa don yod pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po ras kyi sku gzug
126a3(rgyud): sgrub pa'i mchog cho ga dang yo byed du bcas pa bshad pa/ ras rngu bzhi pa kun nas cha legs par phye ga kha tshar ma bcad pa sla med pa/ ri mo mkhan gtsang ma khrus byas pas gos gtsang bgro pa la gso
126a4(rgyud): skyong dang ldan par byas pas chom ldan ma ma yin pa snod sar bar 'azhag la bri bar bya ste/ dbusu 'phags pa spyan sa gzigs dbang phyug rab pa'i thor tshugs kyis bcugs shing rgyal ba 'od dpag
126a5(rgyud): med kyis rgyan pa/ thor tshugs kyis g.ya su zla tshes kyis brgyan gari dgas e na ya'i lpags pa gyon pa/ byug bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan gang bu
126a6(rgyud): gsum spyan gsum phyag bzhi ga/ ri'i steng na pad+ma'i bdan la bzhugs pa/ zhal dbus ma zhi ba'i zhal bzhin 'dzum pa/ zhal g.yas pa 'jig su rung ba/ khro gnyer can thor tshugs 'od dpag med kyis
126a7(rgyud): rgyan pa/ dbu zla tshes kyis rgyan pa/ zhal g.yon pa 'jig su rung ba bzhin bsgyur cing mche ba gtsigs pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med dbu la zhugs pa/ phyag gcig na pad+ma thogs pa/ gnyis pa rtse gsum thogs
126a8(rgyud): ge gsum pa don yod zhags pa sku'i phyed na 'dzin pa la bcom ldan 'das zhal khro gnyer can don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag la spyan gtod par bya zhing / bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa'i
126b1(rgyud): phyag tu bya zhing 'od 'dom gang 'khor yug 'bar ba dang ldan par bya'o// g.yas phyogs na lha mo sgrol ma 'gying bag dang bcas shing lus btung bar mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la mig gtong ba bya'o// 
126b2(rgyud): g.yon du pad+ma'i rigs mdzes 'dzem bag dang bcas pa gsang sngags kyi tshul dang / rje su 'thun zhing don yod pa'i zhags pa la mig gtod pa bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i bar du gnod sbyin ma ral
126b3(rgyud): ba gcig ma bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i bar du khro gnyer can bya'o// phyogs gnyis par lha mo dkar mo lag na pad+ma thogs pa bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i 'og tu pho nya ma gsang sngags
126b4(rgyud): kyi rjesu 'brang ba bya'o// ral pa gcig ma'i 'og tu lha mo chen mo 'jig byed ma bya'o// gong du gnas gtsang ma 'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 
126b5(rgyud): khyab 'jug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// 'og tu rgyal po che na bo bzhi bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyu
126b6(rgyud): gi 'og tu 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje 'jig su rung ba gad rgyangs can khro bo don yod pa'i rgyal ba dang smra ba bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
126b7(rgyud): phyug ri bo po Ta la na gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mngon sum du mthong bar rig par bya'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// 
126b8(rgyud): bam po bcu pa// mthong ba tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad las thar bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ 
127a1(rgyud): mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yongasu thar bar 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la spong bas mthong ba tsam gyi mo
127a2(rgyud): la rnam par dag par 'gyur/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba'i mthar thug pa yang yongasu grol bar 'gyu ro// tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams brgya stong gi dge pa'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa
127a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du ston par 'gyur zhing dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ shi nas bde ba
127a4(rgyud): can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams skye bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral nas/ tshe rabs brgya stong phrag stong lnga rjesu dran pa ra 'gyuro// byang chub kyi snying po'i thar thug gi bar du skye ba 'di tha ma
127a5(rgyud): yin te/ 'di mthong ba tsam gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur na lhag par mang du byed pa lta ci smra sa te/ de ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu
127a6(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuro// gal te rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am blon po dang / btsun mo
127a7(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa 'am/ btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig gis ras kyi sku gzugs bsgrub par bya ba de'i spyan sngar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par byed cing // 'phags pa spyan gzigs dbang
127a8(rgyud): byug de la yang mchod na des na khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag brgya 'gyur du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po byas pa yin no// gang zhig khro bo don yod pa'i na
127b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te/ chus dbang bskur na des na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
127b2(rgyud): kyis bdag byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du dbang bskur bar 'gyuro snyam du de ltar shes par bya'o// gang gis don yod par grub pa'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras gci
127b3(rgyud): dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mngon sum du thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas lan gsum bzlas te/ bskor ba lan bdun byas la chu'i mchod yon dang / lha bshos dang / bdug spos dang / 
127b4(rgyud): me tog phul nas phyag 'tshalo zhes smras ma/ des khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ gzungs zad so sor lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur zhing don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
127b5(rgyud): snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyuraro/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la 'phags pa
127b6(rgyud): spyal gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal la mog gtad de/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis sbyar ba snying khar bzhag cing tshul 'dis phyag rgya re re nas lan stong phrag brgya byas par 'gyuraro// brjon
127b7(rgyud): 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i btsun ma dam pa gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras
127b8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brgya stong phrag khri bzlas brjod bya bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong khrag khrig dbang bskur bar 'dod pa dang / rnar
128a1(rgyud): grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cho ga zhing mo 'di rdzogs par lan brgya stong khri bzlas par 'dod pa dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di lan rgya stong brag lnga
128a2(rgyud): bya bar 'dod pa des ras kyi sku gzugs la brtson par bya ste/ ras kyi sku gzugs mngon du bzhag nas gnas gtsang zhing dben pa/ gnas sam 'chag sa 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam phug gam/ 
128a3(rgyud): ri'i rtse mo 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ khang par gtsang sbra dang byi dor byas te ba ser mo'i lci ba legs par mnyes la/ ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te bskus la spos sna tshogs kyi byug pas byug
128a4(rgyud): nas/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga ra tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya ste gur gum gyis khru do'i tshad tsam bris la gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis mchod par bya'o// dri chab kyi bum pa dri
128a5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ ras kyi mgu la chings kyi bcings la dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu bzhag par bya/ me tog dang bdug spos dri zhim po dang / gtor ma dang / me tog
128a6(rgyud): gi phreng ba nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhag par bya/ dri chab kyis bkang ba brgyad phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o// 'o mas bkang ba'i snod brgyad bzhag par bya/ stegs bu'i drung du 'o mas bkang
128a7(rgyud): pa'i snod bzhag par bya/ 'o thug dang / sbyar thug dang / khaN+Da la d+ya dang / 'bras chan dang / lag pan dang / du r+Nam dang / sha kha ra dang / zhun mar gyis bkang ba'i snod bzhag par bya/ a ga ru nag po
128a8(rgyud): dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / ga bur dang / kun tu ru dang / shir ba'i sa ka dang / cung bang rnams snod du bzhag nas/ a ga ru'i lam sreg shing gis sbyin bsreg bya/ me tog sna tshogs kyis
128b1(rgyud): rgyan par mar gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bsdam par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas tshes bcu bzhi nas
128b2(rgyud): bco lnga'i bar du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te dri chab kyis dbang
128b3(rgyud): bskur bar bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ de nas mi smra bar skyil mo krung du 'dug ste bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa
128b4(rgyud): brgyad bzlas pa bya/ de'i 'og tu don yod par grub ba'i rig sngags 'tshang kyi rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas na/ de nas ras kyi sku gzugs las 'od zer bdun byung nas kun tu
128b5(rgyud): snang bar byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba'i spyan du zhugs par 'gyuraro// zhugs pa tsam gyis mod la sa chen po
128b6(rgyud): g.yo bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang yang snying dga' zhing ba spu ldang bar 'gyur// mdog mdangs yongasu dag par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin pa'i phyag gi
128b7(rgyud): sor mo las lha'i chu 'dzag par 'gyur/ zhabs gnyis las 'o ma 'dzag par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag 'bar bar 'gyur/ phyag na pad+ma'i pad+ma lo ma g.yo bar 'gyur ro// rtsa
128b8(rgyud): gsum g.yo bar 'gyur zhing legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu lag so leg so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub kyis las thams cad byos shig/ 
129a1(rgyud): khyod kyi don yod grub kyi cho ga sib mo'i rgyal po chen po dam pa grungab po zhes nas/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs sten par
