129a2(rgyud): mdzad do// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par mdzad// 'di ni grung pa'i mchob bla na med pa ste/ ma bsgrubs par las byed pa'o// de nas dbong du bya bar 'dod pa na me tog pad+ma la lar brgya rtsa
129a3(rgyud): brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul te/ gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyuro// sna ma'i metog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
129a4(rgyud): la phul lo// yang lan bdun bzlas nas me tog snying po blangs te gang la byin pa dbang du 'gyuraro// gdon gyis zin pa la byin na gnod thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyuro// nad kyis
129a5(rgyud): thebs pa la byin na nad thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyuro// rgyal ba'i sgor gter na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur// mi ro bsregs pa'i sa'i
129a6(rgyud): steng du gtor na sems can de sems can dmyal ba las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ mnar med pa na gnas pa'i sems can la gtor na skad cig de la yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ rgal ba'i snga su bzhan
129a7(rgyud): narmi lam chen po mthong bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku sngon par mdzad cing yid du 'ong ba thams cad gsung bar 'gyuraro// skyes pa 'am bud med gang gi steng du gtor
129a8(rgyud): bde dbang du 'gyur zhing grib ma bzhin 'brang bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i steng du gtor na de bzhin du 'gyuraro// lha'i gzugs brnyan gyi ste du gzhag na 'gug par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par
129b1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// mig sman la sgrub par 'dod pas rab kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mig sman ldong ros la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grub pa'i rtags gsum ston par 'gyur te/ 'bar ba dang dbu
129b2(rgyud): ba 'byung ba dang / dud pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyuraro// gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad mthong bar 'gyu ro// dpral bar
129b3(rgyud): thig la byas na phug thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ sgo thams cad dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'bye bar 'gyu ro// yan lag dang nying lag la bskus na na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ spyi
129b4(rgyud): bor thig la byas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyuraro// mig la byugs na khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams rtag tu
129b5(rgyud): phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing dgos pa thad 'grub par byed// mtshan mo mig la bskus na nyin ma bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur zhing gter tha~Mng 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'du
129b6(rgyud): tu bzhag nas dor bar bya'o// rang gi lus la byug na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du go cha bgos pa'i lusu 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pas mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing las thams
129b7(rgyud): cang byed par 'gyur te/ tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyuraro// yang na bza' ba dang snying khar bsku ba byas na nag po chen po'i gzugasu 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi gzugs ston par 'gyur
129b8(rgyud): ba nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs mang po snyan par 'gyur/ zla ba dang / nyi ma ston par 'gyur/ ldong ros dang / gi'u wang dang / 
130a1(rgyud): sa ru bi rA ka dang / gur gum dang / kra ku d+ha la don yod par grub pa khri rdzas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i stong pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas// khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad
130a2(rgyud): bzlas pa byas te/ thams cad du mi smra bar bya ning 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar btags la/ ras kyi sku gzugs la mngon du phyogs te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma
130a3(rgyud): bgos la tshes bco ldan la nim nag gcig myang ba byas nas phye ma nib mo btags te/ yang don yod pa'i nags pa'i snang ba dang / je bo'i rgyal ba dang / ngan yod pa grub pa'i rig sngags kyi
130a4(rgyud): rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ 'phags pa sbyar ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag tu bzhag ste/ mchod pa chen po byas nas ras kyi sku gzugs la mtshang ba byas la rin
130a5(rgyud): zhag gcig byung ba byas te/ ras kyi sku gzu gas kyi spyan sngar sgrol ma krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ don yod pa'i nags
130a6(rgyud): pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la/ khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ de'i 'og tu mig la bskus nas don yod par grub pa'i
130a7(rgyud): gzungs bzlas par byas na bskus pa tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri ngo bo Ta la dang bcas/ gzhal med khang dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i
130a8(rgyud): bo po Ta la na gnas pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gang shegs pa 'od dpag med chos 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur/ chos bshad pa de yang thos
130b1(rgyud): par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems pa'i tshogs dang bcas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mthong ba
130b2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing chos 'chad pa'i gsung gi sgra de yang thos par 'gyuraro// 'di ltar rigs ngan gyi rig su skyes pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa gang yin pa thaMd kyang de
130b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rjes dgongs par 'gyur zhing rmi lam du ston par mdzad do// sdig pa dang sgrib
130b4(rgyud): badzang rnam par stong par 'gyur/ mchog thad sbyin par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i nags pa'i stong pa'i dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/ lha'i lo stong du 'tshe bar 'gyur zhing ldan
130b5(rgyud): bde ba nyam su myong bar 'gyur/ nad kyis thebs pa thams cad la mig sman 'dis bskus na nad thams cad ni bar 'gyur zhing rims thams cad sel bar 'gyur// dug
130b6(rgyud): thams cad la bskus pa tsam gyis dug med par 'gyuro// 'jig pa thams cad la mig la bskus na mi mthong bar 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / g.yo can dang / chom po dang / rkun pa
130b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur/ mtshon gdab pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag 'khrug la mig la bsdus na thams cad las rgyal zhing lan thabs
130b8(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// g.yul ngo thams cad du mig la bskus na g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing dpung gi mchog rgyal bar 'gyur// rgyal po'i ba brang du 'gro ba'i tshe mig la bskus na rgyal po lun
131a1(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyu ro// mi smra bar phreng khyer du song ra skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / du me grong khyer na gnas se cog thams cad dbang
131a2(rgyud): du 'gyur ro// mig g.yas pa la bskus na rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gang mig gis mthong ba de thams cad dbang du 'gyu ro// mig g.yen pa la bskus na rigs ngan thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// 
131a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ don yod grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan stang rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
131a4(rgyud): dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dang / gzungs thams cad so so'i lan stong phrag brgya brgya bzlas par 'gyur/ de bzhin
131a5(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag drug bcu'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ thams cad kyis gzung ba byas
131a6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa sdong mnyes par byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug bcu rtsa ba ni mngon du mthong ba thob par 'gyur 'jig rten pa'i don thaMng 'grub
131a7(rgyud): par 'gyur sngon gyi sgrib pas mnar med pa'i gan su 'gro ba yongasu dag par 'gyur/ nams kyang ngan sang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ tshe rabs tshe rab su skye ba dran par 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyang mchog
131a8(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyur zhing rtag tu srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyuraro// phyag g.yen pa mnan te lan steng rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na bzlas pa tsam gyi med la lha dang / klu dang / gnod
131b1(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa bkug par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur te gnaso// gang gi me dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe de na yod par grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal pa la ma bdun bzlas pa byas
131b2(rgyud): lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad kyang las thams cad byed cing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lte ba'i gan su ma ran te klu la sags pa thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs
131b3(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tshim par byed par 'gyu ro snyam du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na gang dang gang du song ba der skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal mo 'am/ dge
131b4(rgyud): sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la gang bsams pa dang / gang bcol ba dang / gang smras pa'i las de thad bsgrub par 'gyuraro// dbu nas bzung de bzlas na
131b5(rgyud): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ thams cad la dbang bsgyur cing bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyuraro// thog mar bzlas brjod stang rtsa brgyad byas
131b6(rgyud): nas bzlas pa bya'o// zhabs gnyis mnan te stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas nas 'og yan chad dbang du byas par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ mngag gzhug pa thang
131b7(rgyud): byed par 'gyu ro// pad+ma la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas pad+ma'i mtshe'ur bor na pad+ma zad mi shes pa 'byung zhing pad+ma dus thams cad par 'gyuraro// ud pa la la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas ud
131b8(rgyud): ba la'i mtshe'ur bor na/ ud pa la ldan po 'ang mi shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing nams kyang nyams par mi 'gyur te/ dus thams cad du me tog 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du snga ma'i ma ngag
132a1(rgyud): dang / gan d+ha bAR+Shi ka dang / yu thi ka dang / na ba mA'i me tob rnams kyang dus thams cad du me tog 'byung bar 'gyur zhing zad mi shes par 'gyur// 'bras
132a2(rgyud): bu dang me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ bskyed mos 'tshal lam/ nags tshal gyi nang du gtor na me tog dang / 'bras bu zad mi shes shing dus thams cad par 'gyu re// dpal chen
132a3(rgyud): mo dbug par 'dod pas spra tshol las lham dpal chen mo skyil la krung phyed du 'dug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus btud pa/ lag pa na pad+ma thogs pa/ drang rgyas pa byas
132a4(rgyud): la 'bras bu dang / me tog dgram bar bya zhing ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / tsAn dan dkar bas mchod pa byas la ras kyi skug thugs kyi spyan sngar bzhag par bya zhing sngar
132a5(rgyud): tsan dan dkar po las byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga pa zhini byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzugs la a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ 
132a6(rgyud): dpal lha mo chen mo la tsan dan dkar po'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing gnyis ka la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya/ gtor ma dkar po dang / dri cheb dbul bar 'gyi/ mchod yon stang dngul
132a7(rgyud): bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma dus gsum du khrus byas shing gas gtsang ma bgos pas mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan
132a8(rgyud): bdun byas la ci rnyed pa'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / me tog la den yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ dpal lha ma chen po'i mgo la 'dags par bya/ me tog gzhan
132b1(rgyud): gyis mchod pa bya zhing tsan dan dkar po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stang rtsa brgyad
132b2(rgyud): bzlas par bya zhing / yungs kar re re bzlas la dpal lha mo chen mo la bsnun par bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshangs pa dang / dpal lha mo chen mo 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
132b3(rgyud): dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyu ro// dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad gang yin pa thams cad gser du snang bar 'gyu ro// dpal lha chen po bkug par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tshe
132b4(rgyud): bar du 'da' bar mi 'gyur// lha'i dpal rje su spyod par 'dod na nyin re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dpal lha mo chen po la dus gsum du mchod pa bya zhing mcho/ 
132b5(rgyud): yon gyi snod kyang banag par bya/ dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya/ sbyin par bya/ longs spyad par bya/ bsod na mas kyang bya zhing dpal lha mo chen mo la dus
132b6(rgyud): gsum du mchod par bya'o// dpal lha mo chen mo rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par 'dod pas don yod pa'i rgyal po khro mar snying bo stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya zhing tsan dan
132b7(rgyud): gyi ril bu stong rtsa brgyad kyis bdug par bya/ yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad kyis bsnun par bya ste yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dpal lha mo chen mo rgyan tha~Md kyi brgyan pa/ lha'i nor
132b8(rgyud): bu dang / gser dang / mu tig gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lus snang la zhal pad+ma kha phye ba lta bu/ spyan ud pa la sngon po ltar gsal ba/ pad+ma bsnams pa/ gdan pad+ma/ nor bu dang / rin/ 
133a1(rgyud): po che dang / gser mang po'i pad+ma'i char 'bebs pa/ rin po che 'bar ba'i bum pa sdang phrag brgya thogs pa/ lha'i bu mo dang gnad sbyin gyi bu ma brgya stong ma
133a2(rgyud): po thams cad lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pas lus gsal zhing 'bar la mdzes pa mang pos yongasu bskor ba mdun na 'khod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'jigs par mi bya zhing sems dag
133a3(rgyud): bar byas la/ gsang sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra ya ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ badz+ra satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ mahA a ma g+ha ba ra hA
133a4(rgyud): ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pad+mi Ni/ pad+ma ne tra pad+h+waM ge/ badz+ra d+ha re/ pad+ma ba ti/ pad+ma pri ye/ pad+ma go rI/ pad+ma pra b+he/ pad+ma sa na pra tiSh+Thi te/ a ba lo ki ta pri ye ba ra de/ ba rA dA yi ni/ pra si ha/ pra sAH
133a5(rgyud): ya/ ku ru ku ru/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta ba ra da/ hu ru hu ru/ ba re gi ni tsa la tsa la/ pad+ma bi b+hu dzi ta/ pad+ma pri ye/ bat+ma na rI/ bi tsi tra/ tra bi mA na d+ha re/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra s+pha ra sa ma ya/ 
133a6(rgyud): Ar+ya a ba le ki te shwa ra sa me/ sat+ya a d+hiSh+To ta de bi/ a mo b+ha pA sha ba ra de hU~M/ na mo stu te swA hA// lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyis lha mo dpal chen mo phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spro bar 'dzag
133a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing / 'di skad ces kyang gsung bar 'gyuraro// rig kyi bu tshur shog/ thugs las skyes pa/ gsung las skyes pa khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pa khro bo dang bcas pa grub kyis/ don yod
133a8(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs la zhugs shig/ nga'i gnas la rang gi khyim bzhin du la su bya ba thams cad byos shig/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang rig sngag dang / 
133b1(rgyud): gsang sngags dang / gzung sngags 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba la ko te shwa rA ya/ ba d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+ha ga ba
133b2(rgyud): te/ sA tri dza ne tri/ ba rab ra/ a Shal ki ta ba de/ kI rin pra ba tu/ a pa gi a ma ga/ bi pul k+Shi d+ha kade/ pra bar b+hu re/ sa mo g+ha bI sha ha ste swA hU~M// de'i 'og tu rnam dpal chen ma'i num
133b3(rgyud): gnyis las 'a ma'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'ama'i rgyun de khas bzed de 'thungs pa tsam ma gyi med la sgra'i me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da ltar 'jam pa'i lha'i lu su 'gyur/ sgra cung zad la khyil cing
133b4(rgyud): 'khyil la mig ud pa la/ sngon po lta bu dang / tshig gsal zhing mi 'am tsa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma
133b5(rgyud): med pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mngon sum du 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo mang po 'grub par 'gyur/ tshe lo stong phrag bcu thub par 'gyur/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med byang chub
133b6(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshogs dang thabs cig tu gzhal med khang mchog na chos 'gro ba mthong bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ nor bu chen po pad+ma la lta ba zhes bya ba den
133b7(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa chen po'i 'khor los bskung bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor las bskur ba'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
133b8(rgyud): phyag gis sra su 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras gcig pur 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod skyon dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // 
134a1(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi bu'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bu gcig pur 'gyur/ thams cad du stabs dang pha rol gnan pa dang
134a2(rgyud): brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i gzungs kyi rgyal po che gzhi
134a3(rgyud): mo zab pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyi gnas dang / klu thams cad gnas dang / mi 'am ci thams cad kyi gnas dang phug dang / lung gi gnas thams cad sgo 'byed par 'gyur/ gnod
134a4(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin pa'i gnas thams cad sgo 'byed par/ thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing dbyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed cing 'a dug par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston pa
134a5(rgyud): bla ma gcig pu 'jig rten mgon po dang 'dra bar mchod pa 'i gnasu 'gyur/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa 'i gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad
134a6(rgyud): grub pa chen por 'gyur/ dpal lha mo chen ma 'khor dang bcas pa la sbyin sreg byas na rig sngags 'chang de la bu bzhin du byams pas rang nyid bsnyen bkur yongasu spyod do// 'dod pa
134a7(rgyud): thams cad dang yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi dgos pa byed par 'gyur ro// nor bu dang / 'bru dang / dbyib dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang kha shi la dang / 
134a8(rgyud): byi ru dang / sa li sbram dang / lha'i nor bu rin po che'i bar thams cad sbyin par byed do// yul ka shi ka'i gos bzang po mang po sbyin par byed cing / lha'i bza' ba dang / btung ba'i bar dang / 
134b1(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i bar du smyon par byed do// gnas thams cad du song ba na yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bu la byams pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'cha
134b2(rgyud): gi rang gi khyim yang rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can ji lta ba de bzhin du rig sngags 'chang gi gzhal med khang mchog tu 'gyur ro// rnam zas kyi bu'i gnas na 'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin rgyas par
134b3(rgyud): 'gyuro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen gos dus kun tu 'ong bar 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje 'chang yang rig sngags gi tshogs thams cad dang / gnod sbyin chen po gsang
134b4(rgyud): ba'i 'khor rnams dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / bskya nga pa dang / snga ba byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dpal lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu gnod
134b5(rgyud): sbyin bye bas yongasu bskor bas nyin mtshan du srung ba dang / sku ba pa dang / slab byed par 'gyuraro// de nas don yod pa'i rgyal mtshonor bu chen po pad+ma la lha'i dpal dri ma med pa
134b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i tshig zhib ma'i rgyal po klags pas 'grub par 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang
134b7(rgyud): ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba drag drig brgya stong drug cu rtsa ba ni'i rdul phra mo snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyu ro// rigs kyi bu
134b8(rgyud): rigs kyi blo 'om/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gos lha'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang / nor bu rin po che chen po snga bdun dang / lA'i
135a1(rgyud): gser dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tob mang po dang / lnga'i gos dang / lha'i rgyan dang / lha'i dri dang / me tog dang / ma je ga phreng dang / drug pa rnams
135a2(rgyud): ra re zhing 'phang du ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam gyi phung po byas nas de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin
135a3(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa re ri la tshul de lta dus so sar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nyin re zhing lo gcig
135a4(rgyud): gi bar du dbul bar byed/ mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i til mar rgya mtsho tsam gyis bkang ba'i bar me lham
135a5(rgyud): bar byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur/  ge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongasu bzung bar 'gyur// gal te don yod ba'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad+ma la rnam par
135a6(rgyud): lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa den yang ba'i zhags pa'i stong po 'di klog pa dang / bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byed pa 'dzini bsad nams kyi phung po de dang ldan par 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang
135a7(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gang shegs pa thams cad kyis yongasu bzung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshag pa tha~Md kyi sku ston
135a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung ston par 'gyur/ dpal lha mo chen mo de yang mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ dus kun tu de'i khyim du dpal gnas par 'gyur te/ gang na dpal/ 
135b1(rgyud): lha mo chen mo gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo dang mnyams pas phyogs de nyid du gnas par 'gyur te/ dpal lha mo de
135b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro// lha dang / klu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / 
135b3(rgyud): ba dang / rgyas pa dang / drag shul la spyod pa dang / las sna tshogs bzhan dag pas dpal lha mo chen mo las mchog tu bstan to// dpal lha mo chen mo ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chu
135b4(rgyud): yin no// dpal lha mo chen mo ni don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i grags pa rgya che na po sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i mamakha' gzhal med
135b5(rgyud): khang 'chang ba'o// don yod pa'i yon bsgrags pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o// dpal lha mo chen mo ni don yod pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od byed pa gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dang ra dpal
135b6(rgyud): lha mo chen mo mchog tu bstar to// de nas rib sngags 'chang gtsang ma khrus legs par byas la/ dri chus bsangs shing ba las byung ba lngas byug pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas kha zas gtsang
135b7(rgyud): ma bza' bar bya zhing chang dang / sha dang / ngag tsang dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u rnams dang / 'dres pa dang / 'phags pa rnams yongasu spangs par bya/ kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa dang / 
135b8(rgyud): gos ngan pa dang / dri ma can yong su spangs par bya/ sems can ngan pa dang / ston pa dang / ngan gamo can dang / bsod sbyin can dang / skye bo ngan pa can dang / khrel med pa dang / snying rje med pa dang / byams pa
136a1(rgyud): dang / bral ba dang / thub tshod can gyi skye ngan pa yongasu spangs par bya'o// gnas ngan pa dang / gnas rten nganang dang / bsgom zhes dang / bza' zhes dang / grib ma ngan pa
136a2(rgyud): yongasu spangs par ba/ gcig gi gcig 'bags pa'i kha zas ngan pa yongasu spangs par bya zhing dri dang bdug spos kyis bsangs te/ ri smra bar bzlas brjod byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dpa' ba'i
136a3(rgyud): sems dang / yid bde bar bya/ bkra shis tshang bar bya zhing snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i semasu byas nas bzlas brjod bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
136a4(rgyud): a ba ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ thaMd la du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dang la lha ro chen mo la tsan dan byi bdug sbas dngul bar bya zhing dus ji
136a5(rgyud): lta ba'i me tog dbul bar bya ste/ gsang sngabs 'di lan nyi shA rtsa gcig bzlas te thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya a ba lo ki Thi shwa rA ya/ dzo d+hi
136a6(rgyud): satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puSh+pa bo lo ki te/ gan d+ha sa re/ a mo g+ha dza la sam ba ra Ni/ pad+me sam b+hu re/ ta ra ta ra/ mu di te b+h+rUM swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ me tog
136a7(rgyud): dang/ bdug spos dang / dri dang mchod yon dbu'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas// khro bo'i
136a8(rgyud): rgyal po lan gsum bzlas la a ga ru'i bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing ji snyed pa'i me tog dbul bar bya/ spos dang ldan pa'i tshal mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing de nyid kyi zhabs drung du sgrig
136b1(rgyud): mo krung du 'dug la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bltas la/ snying po'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i bya
136b2(rgyud): rgya lan bdun 'acing ba byas na btsangs pa tsam gyi mod la sku gzugs g.yo bar 'gyur zhing sku thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ rang gi lus spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur/ tho rangs 'phag
136b3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur te yid la bsams pa thams cad bka' stsol bar 'gyur/ mchog thams cad smyon par 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i mchog zang sbyin par 'gyur
136b4(rgyud): dbugs kyang 'byin par 'gyur/ yid du 'ong ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed/ tshe 'di nyid la nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang ldan
136b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ slob pa dang sdig pa zad zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ las kyi rgol ba dang / dgra bo dzad 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi
136b6(rgyud): tshugs par 'gyur/ g.yul ngor 'jug pa'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dmag gi nang du gtor ba byas na thaMd rengs par byas pa dang / rmugs
136b7(rgyud): par byas par 'gyur// 'do'i snying po dang gsang sngag ni 'di yino// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya oM ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mag+na satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha pA
136b8(rgyud): hr-i da ya/ pad+mi na bar de/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra sa ra ta pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/ stong ba'i rig sngagaso// oM a ba lo ki te/ pad+bi keb rag ni tu ru hU~M swA hA/ zhi ba'i stong pa'i gzung sa// don yod pa'i
137a1(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i gzungs 'di rtag tu bzlas brjed byas
137a2(rgyud): namatshams med pa lnga zad par 'gyur/ lha mo dpal chen mo rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchog sbyin par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dus kun tu sku snyan par 'dzad
137a3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ de'i lus la dug thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa brgyad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs
137a4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gci ga bor la gu gul gyis bdugs te mgul tu btags na gdon
137a5(rgyud): thams cad la yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// gal te/ nag pa chen de dang / ma mo 'od te rgyas btab pa gang yin pa yang gdon thams cad las yongasu thar bar 'gyuraro// skud pa nas
137a6(rgyud): pos rims nyin gcig pa las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// gzhan dag la ni thams cad du srad bu dkar pos gsal bar bya'o// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag drug thams cad la gi'u wang
137a7(rgyud): la lan nyi shu rtsa gcib bzlas te/ thig le byas na thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyuro// snying khar thig le byas na gdod sbyir dang / srin po dang / 'byung ba dang / sha zal sogs pa tha
137a8(rgyud): mi mthong bar 'gyur// lag mthil la thig lo byas na skyes pa dang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la reg pa dbang du 'gyu ro// smin mtsham su thig le byas na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang
137b1(rgyud): bcas pa dbang du 'gyur// mgul bar byugs na rje rigs thams cad dang du 'gyur/ dadung pa gnyis la byugs na rgyas rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ dpral ba'i sgra ma ngas du thig sa byas na bras ze dzad
137b2(rgyud): dbang du 'gyuraro// lte ba'i gnasu thig le byas na dmangs rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// rkang pa'i rje ngar la byugs na dpag tshad brgyar ngal ba med par 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyuraro// rkang
137b3(rgyud): mthil la bskus na chu klung chen po'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho'i bar du rgal bar 'gyuraro// dpud pa gnyis la byugs na gyad kyis mi thub par 'gyuraro// pus mo gnyis la byugs na ma'i phung po chen
137b4(rgyud): po 'angar zhing rag tu 'bar bar zhugs na tsan dan dang srung shas tshe ji bzhin du bsil bar 'gyuraro// ba ser skya'i 'o ma dang sbyar te/ mig la bsdus na mtshan mo ldanan ma bzhin du snang bar 'gyur
137b5(rgyud): thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur zhing gal te der skal pa stong du bzhag pa zhig na yang 'byung bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin du lto la bskus na ji srod du lho chus ma gus pa de srid du kha zas dang
137b6(rgyud): btung ba mi 'dod par 'gyur// pho mtshan la bskus na khu ba 'gags pa byas par 'gyuro// ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te 'thung na lus dag cing dri ma med la gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
137b7(rgyud): bsgom mnyes dang / bza' nyes dang / brib ma ngan pa dang blta nye su mi 'gyur/ 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ rmi lam
137b8(rgyud): ngan pa dang // bltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ dug dang / dbyigs dug dang / byad zad 'jig par 'gyur// gsang sngags dang sbyor ba dang / gtor ma
138a1(rgyud): rnams 'jig par 'gyur/ 'thab pa dag rtsod pa dang // khrag thugs rnams kyi 'debs par 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur/ las kyi rgol pa dang / 
138a2(rgyud): mi mdza' ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jig pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// zhun mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar te tho rangs kyi dus mi smra bar byas nas zos na ba klags pas tshitshigasu
138a3(rgyud): bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyuro// sbyor ba zhag bdun du byas na bstan bcos thams cad la mngon sum du 'gyuraro// zhagapa nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyor ba byas na gsang sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo
138a4(rgyud): dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rims par phye ba thams cad la mngon sum du 'gyuraro// zhagapa nyi shu rtsa gcig zla ba gcig tu sbyor ba byas na thos pa ma
138a5(rgyud): mtsho bsags par 'gyu ro// sbyor ba lo gcig gi bar du byas na tshe lo stong thub par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten thams cad na bla ma gcig pur 'gyur zhing dpa' ba dang tshig btsun
138a6(rgyud): bar yang 'gyuraro// til mar dang ldan cig bskol te mgo la bskus na skra cung zad 'khyil cing lcang lo can du 'gyuraro// bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la bskus na ston ka'i zla ba nya dang mtshungs par
138a7(rgyud): 'thung zhing me rtag pad+ma dang / ku mu da lngar 'jam par 'gyur khrus thams cad la thugs na mar dang 'dra bar 'jam par 'gyur zhing gang lag shin tu gnon sha can du 'gyur/ nabal rgyu
138a8(rgyud): nan ba ji tsam 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur/ sna nas btang na klad pa'i nad do cog 'jig par 'gyur zhing snabs dang mchil ma 'byung bar mi 'gyur lha'i sbas kyi dri mnam par 'gyur zhing nam kyang / 
138b1(rgyud): yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri mnam par mi 'gyur/ gnyer ma dang / skra dkar spangs par 'gyur/ so rgal ba yang gsar du skye bar 'gyur/ lce pad+ma'i lo ma lngar 'jam par 'gyur/ mid pa'i nad dang ske
138b2(rgyud): 'gags pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ 'jam tsam du byas te snga ba bkang na sim par byed cing lha'i rna ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra thos par
138b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de lta bas na gi'u wang gi cho ga chen po bsgrub par bya'o// de nas lags par grub pa mchog tu dag pa/ dge bar 'gro ba mi garkang zhes bya ba ba shad par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di
138b4(rgyud): san nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ dro bo'i rgyal po lan 'dun po zlas nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di lan sdang
138b5(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas kha zas dkar po zos la/ mig rkang gi ril bu khar cug na ji snyed bshad pa dang / 
138b6(rgyud): bklags pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ lce pad+ma dang ku mu da'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ de las lha'i sgra dbyangs 'byung bar 'gyur/ gang la smras pa de dag
138b7(rgyud): bran po dang / bran mo bzhin du gnas par 'gyur/ gang la dri marnam pa de yang dbang du 'gyur/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gan su gyur pa yang dang du bye'o// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pa dang / 
138b8(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo dang / yi dgas dang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad dang / brjed byed dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dri nges 'byar bar 'gyur zhing phyogs pa nir dpag/ 
139a1(rgyud): tshad ngargyar byar nas thab ring po na 'dod par 'gyuro// phyir rgol ba dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad dri ngas 'byor bar 'gyur
139a2(rgyud): byams pa'i sems kyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na lag pas glang po che gnon par 'gyur ro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen por 'gyu ro// gyad kyis mi
139a3(rgyud): thub par 'gyuraro// rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra ba'i mthu stobs ston par 'gyur// mgul du btags te g.yul ngor song na gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing slar yang
139a4(rgyud): 'ong bar 'gyu'o/ spyi bor bzhag ste rgyal po'i pho drang du song na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang dron po dang / blon po chen po dang / bram ze mdun na 'don dang la
139a5(rgyud): pa dbang du 'gyur zhing spyi bo la dbang bskur bar 'gyur/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur lag pa la btags na gang la reg pa de thams cad dbang du
139a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ nor dang // 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor du dang / mu tig dang / gser la reg pa tsam gyis zas mi shes par 'gyur/ sa bon gdab pa dang / brda ba byas na zad mi shes par 'phel bA
139a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ rin po che'i lag pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ 'bru'i phung po 'phel bar 'gyur/ nyi ma re re zos na dran pa dang blo chen po 'phel bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang dral bar 'gyur/ 
139a8(rgyud): nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ rims thams cad sel bar 'gyur/ 'dras dang / mdze dang / lhog pa dang / lu'u ta dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / g.ya' ba dang / rol mog la byugs
139b1(rgyud): pa tsam gyis 'jig par 'gyur zhing rnams kyang tshugs par mi 'gyur// sbyor ba zla ba gcig tsam du byas na cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngag rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi mchog
139b2(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ dus kun tu lus la thogs na mtshon gzas pas lus la mi tshug so// chom rkun dang / g.yon can thams cad kyi glags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// thams cad thogs pa med par
139b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ til mar dang lhan gcig skol te klad pa na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / son pa dang / mig na ba dang / klad pa phyed na ba la 'jam tsam blugs pa tsam gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar
139b4(rgyud): 'gyur zhing phyin chad nad gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyuro// gdon stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad la zhun mar dang yungs ka ra bsres te bdugs mdus nas phyogs bcur 'byer zhing rnam
139b5(rgyud): kyang gnas kyis phyags der 'ong bar mi 'gyu ro/ rang ni yod la 'dod pa'i dgas pa gzhan thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur/ de nas lha thams cad 'gugs pa dang / byang chub
139b6(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad spyan 'dren pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul pa/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi grub pa'i mtha'// gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams dang / 'byung po
139b7(rgyud): gdon rnams dang / brjed byed dang / gnod sbyin mo rnams dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / skem byed thams cad 'byer bar byed pa/ sdang ba'i bdud rnams gsod pa/ nad zad rlob pa/ 
139b8(rgyud): gdugs pa'i dug rnams bzlog pa/ mche ba'i dug dang / gnas pa'i dug dang / 'gro ba'i dug thams cad la thogs pa med par grub pa/ rims tha~Md 'dzem pa khyad par du rims nyin bzhi pa
140a1(rgyud): 'joms pa/ bzhin dang bar byed pa'i tso bo/ gos bdug pa'i mchog/ gsang sngags dang thams cad dbang du byed pa'i mchog bang la rgyal po khros
140a2(rgyud): nas gshed mas mtshon gzas pa yang bdug pa 'dis 'dug na de thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / srog chags lu'u ta dang / sbrul gyis zin pa dang / srog chags go
140a3(rgyud): na se dang / gzhan yang srog chags sna tshogs dug dang bcas pa mchog tu mi bzad pa rnams dang / gal te klu 'jog pos zin na yang bdugs pa tsam gyis dug thams cad med par
140a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// nad kun 'phrog pa grub pa ste/ sdig pa thaMd 'jig byed pa/ bsod nams phung po che dang mnyam// grub pa lha rnams kun gyi mchod/ brgya byin sum cu'i lha dang ni// lnga
140a5(rgyud): min lhan cig g.yul 'gyed che// gdug pa 'ja mas bdugs pa dang / lha min de bzhin pham par 'gyur// drag po yis ni sum rtsig bsregs// khyab 'jug gis ni ba lo bcings/ miru
140a6(rgyud): thung gis sa gzhi mnan/ lha min dbang pos nyi zla dang // gza' rnams pham byas 'khrugs par 'gyur// bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyad par gyis// mi'u thung ni kun las rgyal// sgyu ma byed pa stong phrag
140a7(rgyud): brgya// rtag tu rnam par rgyal bar byed// gdug pa'i rgyal pos skya sengs rnams// rnam par pham par the tshom med// bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya// 'dren pas byams pa'i stobs kyis btul// 
140a8(rgyud): bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya// bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthu stobs kyis// sdang ba'i bdud ni yang dag zad// rgya mtsho rnam par dkrug byas pas// rgya mtshor gnas kun gcer bur 'gyur// snod gcig
140b1(rgyud): gis ni sum cha bskams// yid bzhin nor bu chud zos pas// don kun grub pa bdag nyid ches// bdug spos 'di yis gdugs byas nas// slar yang rang gi khyim 'ongs te// rtag tu rgyal mtshan
140b2(rgyud): rtsar btags nas// bdug pa 'di yis bdug byas shing // nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ni// rin chen bdun gyi char pa phab// de ltar bdug pa stobs ldan yin// las kyi don kun sgrub par byed// 
140b3(rgyud): ba yul chen po ltung ba'i klu'i mchor/ dga' bo dang nye dga' bos rgya mtsho chen po la// lhun po chen po'i ri rab kyis srubs pas// dug 'jigs pa mgrin sngon gyis dug 'thungs pas bdug
140b4(rgyud): pa'i rgyal pos bskor bas drug med par byaso// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus bdud rtsir yongasu bya'o// de ltar bdug pa'i rgyal pos dug thed 'jom par the tsom med/ 
140b5(rgyud): gling bzhi pa yi drang srong gis// des ni maN+Dal pa par byas// gtan phyed la ni longs spyad pa'i// sgra can dbang pos stu nga bar byas// 'dug pa'i rgyal po bsams pa yis// brdzun
140b6(rgyud): du smra ba de rnams rnams/ de phyir bde bar smra ba'i phyir// bdug pa 'di ni 'den pa ldan/ bden pa'i rgyal pos rab tu bsgrags// bden pa'i chos dang 'den par sla/ mtha' dgas bsdus las
140b7(rgyud): byams pa'i sems// 'jog rten kun la rtag tu byams// snying rje dang ni dga' ba nyid// bdug pa gzhan gyis bdugs pa 'di// mtshon cha thams cad 'joms par byed / bden pas byin gyi
140b8(rgyud): brlabs pa'i bdug pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyis gsungs pa/ 'jog rten dbang phyug mgon po 'jig rten pa'i rtag tu bla mar gyur pa'o// sems can thaMd la phan pa'i don du
141a1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi khyad par du dmyal ba bcu drug gi 'jig pa mi bzad pa dang / 'jig pa chen pos sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur
141a2(rgyud): ba dang / yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'dzags pa chen po cher mi zad pa/ rtag tu bkres pa dang bsgom pas nyen pa/ kye hud zhes sgra sgrogs par byed pa'i sgrub pa de la/ skabs medo// sems can thad
141a3(rgyud): rjesu brtse bas brdar par kun tu blta bar bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyi skyabasu gsungs pa ni bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o// bdug pa 'dis bdugs te/ gang gi don du ming nas smos
141a4(rgyud): pa yang / ma rungs pa 'am/ yang na byams pa yang rung te/ yid la bsams pa rnams bsgrub par bye'o// 'dis bdu ga te brjod pa tsam gyis mod la/ 'di rnams thams cad
141a5(rgyud): rtag tu 'grub par byed te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsung dge ba'o// gza' zla ba 'am/ gza' nyi ma rgyu skar nyam nga ba la gnas pa/ sgra can gyis zos pa
141a6(rgyud): rnams dang ma gang yin pa skye ba'i gnod pa dang / rgyal po 'am yang na/ bud med dam/ blon po chen po dang / blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / 'dun na 'don pa dang / rgyal rigs dang / 
141a7(rgyud): bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje rigs dang / skye bo gzhan dang 'grogs pas gnod pa dang / 'thab pa 'di dang / sdug bsngal mi zad pas nye bar 'tshe ba la bdug spos rgyal pos 'dug pas
141a8(rgyud): de'i skad cig la de dag thams cad mi 'byung // bza' ba dang btung ba shin tu zhim po thob te/ gos med pa'i skye bas gos dang rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / 
141b1(rgyud): bzhon pa dang // dri dang / nye bar bstan pa dang / lcab lhub thams cad skad cig sa byung te/ gal te yang dag par sbyar ba yin no// sams pa dang / re ba dang / yid kyi shing rta thams cad mngon par smras
141b2(rgyud): pas 'grub par bye'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gsung ste/ rtag tu 'di dag thams cad 'grub bo// yi dgas rnams kyis zas rnyed cing / lha rdzas kyi gos dang rgyan mchog rab tu 'gyuraro// bdag gi sdig pa thang
141b3(rgyud): rtag tu grol bas dmyal ba las grol te/ dmyal bas mi bzad pa thams cad las gro'o// sdug bsngal thams cad las grol te/ skye bo bde ba la rtse bar byed do// bde zhing bde 'gror 'gro la bde ba thams
141b4(rgyud): cad du thob par byed do// bdug spos 'dis bdu ga pas mchog gis dri snom par byed/ rdul dang mun pa can zad pa dug pa bsnams pas sangs par byed de/ dper ma'i ma
141b5(rgyud): bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa rnam par sangs par bye da ba bzhin no// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis sdug bsngal thams cad rna bar nyams par byed cing dmyal ba thams cad dang sdigs pa
141b6(rgyud): dang 'jigs pa thams cad las grol te/ sa bcu po thob cing / bad 'gro'i lam bzang ba bstar ba de'i phyir 'bad pa thaMd kyis bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di sbyar bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems
141b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bdug chen po'i rgyal po chen po cho ga zhib mo dang rdza su 'thun pa 'di gsung so// 'jig rten mgon pa'i spyan sngar
141b8(rgyud): mchod rten la sa'i phyogs gang du bdug pa 'dis bdug par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rtag tu byin gyi brlabs pa dang / thams cad du rgyal ba dang / de bzhin du lung bstan pa'i sa'i phyogs
142a1(rgyud): der gang ga'i bye ma bye ba khrag khrib stong phrag skad kyi sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs pa der rig sngags 'chang gis gang du bdug sbas kyi 'dug pas rdo rje 'chang rgya
142a2(rgyud): ba brgya stong phrag rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bani dpung dang bcas/ bzhon pa dang bcas pa dang / rtag tu ri gangs ldan dang / de bzhin nor bu bzang po dang / lnga rtsen dang / rang ba bzang ba dang / ke l-I
142a3(rgyud): la dang / gnod sbyin chen po yang dag shes dang / mo la zhon pa dang / sangs rgyas stobs dang / stobs po che dang sna sgra skyongs dang / na ba kru be ra dang / rab 'jom dang / dz+nya Ta ba ka dang / stobs kyi lha dang / 
142a4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chen po te 'di rnams sde dang bcas/ dpung dang bcas/ bzhon pa dang / bcas pas nyin mtshan rtag tu gnas nas de bzhin nyid du srung bar byed do// bdag gis dpal sa gsum gyi lha
142a5(rgyud): mo brtag tu mchod do// rtag tu ba bzhi gang du gdug pa rab tu 'dug par bya ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin nyid du gsang ba/ pa dang bcas pa dang / chos 'dzin pa la mkhas pa
142a6(rgyud): rnams rtag tu srung bar byed cing / de bzhin nyid du tshangs pa dang / drag po lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin nyid du khyab 'jug dang / lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis pa thams cad
142a7(rgyud): dus rtag tu yang srung bar byed do// zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / de bzhin nyid du sgra can dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / mtshan ma'i sgra rnams kyis dus rtag tu srung bar byed de/ 'jims ma
142a8(rgyud): dang / dpal mo dang / dung can ma'i lha rnams dang / dbyangs can ma dang / sa 'dzin gyi lha rnams dang / chu lha dang / ljon pa dang / nags kyi rtse mo'i lha dang / ri'i lha dang / chu klung dang / lteng kar
142b1(rgyud): lha dang / ga zhan rje dang / chu'i sgra dang / lus ngan gyi lha dang / gzhon nu'i lha dang / lha'i drang srong bdag nyid che ba dang / ljang ka'i lha dang / chu klung dang / lteng ka dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i sgra
142b2(rgyud): dang zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / de bzhin du lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed do// rtag tu rje su 'brang zhing / nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun mo 'chad par rje su 'brang ste/ sa'i phyogs gang du bdug spos
142b3(rgyud): 'dis bdug pa'i sa phyogasu rtag tu lnga'i gnas byin gyis brlab so// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / mgon po dang / bla ma dang / rnam par 'dren pa dang / 'jig rten gyi skyabs dang / mchog
142b4(rgyud): sbyin par de bzhin nyid du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa gnaso// gnas der bdug sbas gang yin pa de dag gis mchog tu bdug par bya'o// dri ma rnams pa tsam gyis/ myur du sangs
142b5(rgyud): rgyas nyid thob bo zheso// sems can kun la phan don phyir/ sdug bsngal thams cad ldog byed pa'i// rdzas kyi ming rnams bsha dpya yi/ lha dang mi rnams mnyan par gyis/ ma
142b6(rgyud): ru dang rgya spro nyid// de bzhin tsan dan ser mor bcas// prik+ka nyid dang gi haM dang / kun tu ru bcas ma he'i mig ro dang sra rtsi pog nyid dang // de bzhin gur gum na lan da// a ru ra bcas dpal bskor ba/ 
142b7(rgyud): sA ma ka dang spang spos bcas// pri ya gu bcas tu ru ska// ka ya s+tha dang ba yas+tha/ na me ru dang bla sgang bcas// ru ta a ga ru nag nyid// ga pur dang ni bla rtsi 'ad// lam ka gser shing 'bras
142b8(rgyud): bu dang // arga'i 'o ma gser 'om// sU ha'i 'o ma nyid dang ni// zod pa skal pa ldan nyid dang // so ma rA dza khyab 'jug mnan// shing dga' rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid/ nA ku lA~M dri nA ku li/ tshangs par
143a1(rgyud): dang ku mu dang / pad+ma'i chu la sbrang rtsi dang // bu ram dkar po'i khu ba dang // 'di rnams lhan cig sbyar ba yi// bdug pa'i mchog 'di bsgrub par bya/ mkhas pas
143a2(rgyud): legs par khrus byas te// gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos bsgos shing // zla ba nya 'am bcu bzhi la// bcu gsum pa'ang tshes brgyas la// rtag tu sbyar bya nyin mtshan gzung // sngags la mkhas
143a3(rgyud): pas bdug spos 'di// so sa so sor kun sbyar nas// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsang sngags dang // me tog bdug spos dri rgya chen// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yos dang // gtor ma'i las la mkhas pa dang / 
143a4(rgyud): mchod yon snod ni gang ba dang / mgo la'ang dri dang til mar gyi// mar me legs gru gnas ni// legs sbas gtsang mar gnas de sgrub// legs sngas gtsang mar gnas pa yI// slob ma
143a5(rgyud): mchog gi grogs kyis ni// don yad zhags pa'i spyan snga ru/ 'dug nas yongasu dag pa'i lus// sdom dang byams pa sems gzhag nas/ sems can kun la
143a6(rgyud): snying rje'i bdag// sangs rgyas rjesu dran sgom zhing // gsang sngags bzlas pa mchog gis shig/ de bzhin gang shegs pa thams cad la dmigs te/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung gdon
143a7(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po steng rtsa brgyad// khra bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad/ don yod 'grub pa brgya rtsa brgyad// tshig dang yi ge shin tu gsal bar bzlas nas/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nar
143a8(rgyud): bu pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa der yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzlas te/ de nas gsang sngags 'di stong phrag rgya bzlas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki
143b1(rgyud): te/ a mo g+ha hr-i da ya ya na/ tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra/ ma hA ku ru Ni kA ya/ sA d+ha ya d+hu a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya/ a mo g+ha pA sha ba ste swA hA/ de nas gsang sngags brjod par bya ste/ mnyam par gzhag la las thaMd la mkhas
143b2(rgyud): bas 'dug spos kyi mchog la bzlas pa tsam gyi med la 'dug spos kyi rgyal po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par par 'gyur// don yod du
143b3(rgyud): zhags pa sdang brgyar gnar bu chen po'i sprin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go mchog sbyin
143b4(rgyud): pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal po yin te/ thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags 'di la na bdun bzlas te bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// 
143b5(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta a bi lo ki he/ ma hA a ma b+hA dza ya dza ya swAhA/ de'i 'og tu bdag rang la bdugs na de bzhin gshegs pa thang kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ byang chub sems
143b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa bdug pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku spen par 'gyuraro// dge sbyong dang dram
143b7(rgyud): ze'i gzugs kyis de dang ldan cig smra bar byed de/ gang la smras pa dang / gang la gtam byas pa de thams cad tshe 'di la 'grub par 'gyura'o// de'i 'og tu mtshan mo rang gi gzugs sdom pa
143b8(rgyud): 'gyur zhing mchog sbyin par mdzad// de na yod pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur/ 'jig pa chen po brgyad yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa dmyal ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur

144a2(rgyud): grong khyer grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / blon po dang / blon po chen po dang / bkrabs pa dang / bram ze'i 'dun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur

144a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya la bdug pa'i sprin 'khrig pa/ lha'i spos kyis bsgos pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'dug spos chen po can
144a8(rgyud): dan sbrul gyi snying pa dang / gong shir sha dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / bdug spos mang po na mkha'i ngos khebs pas mchod par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams dang / sum cu/ 
144b1(rgyud): rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i lha brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'og min gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i bar thams cad bdug pa'i dris
144b2(rgyud): rab tu dga' bar 'gyuraro// rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad dga' bar 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom mi bya zhing yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// skad chen
144b3(rgyud): pos don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas pa byas na/ des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur
144b4(rgyud): zhing / rig sngags 'chang de la yang de bzhin gshegs bas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ dus kun tu dgongs par 'gyur// yang dang yang du gzigs pa'i phyir byon par
144b5(rgyud): 'gyur// bde ba can na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa sgra na ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob
144b6(rgyud): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thugs rab tu dgyes par 'gyur/ rig snga ma la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub stsol bar mdzad gzigs bzhad par 'gyur ro// klu
144b7(rgyud): thams cad la bdug pa tsam gyis ngan ya dbang du 'gyur zhing ha cang char ches na gcod par byed cing / char mi 'bab na char 'beb par byed do// rlung dang / ser ba dang / sprin thaMd bcad

145a1(rgyud): ser nga dang / sprin thams cad bcod par byed/ ma mo'i tshigs dang / nag po chen po la sogs pa 'gugs par 'gyur zhing dbang du gyur nas 'dug pa
145a2(rgyud): 'gyur bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe bdugs na dpung po tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur/ thams cad du bdug pa tsam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur/ zad
145a3(rgyud): dusbyar bar byas nas kun tu grub pa chen por 'gyuraro// bdug pa'i cho ga'o// 'phag pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhing mo'i rgyal po// bam po bcu gcig pa// 
145a4(rgyud): denas rig sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir thig le bya ba dang / gdong bkru ba dang / lus bsku ba byas na ya lad dang go cha bgos pa dang / 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad pa
145a5(rgyud): bgyi yis bcom ldan 'das gsan du gsol// don yod pa'i nor bu rgya chen po rdo rje'i zhags pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu gang sbyor bar byas pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa/ 
145a6(rgyud): bla na med pa/ mkhas pas mdzod spu rnam su thig le byas na tshogs kyi nang dang / skye bo mang po'i nang dang / dge 'dun gyi nang dang / de shin du rigs byed kyi tshogs bzhi'i nang du skar ma'i tshogs kyi
145a7(rgyud): nang na zla ba tshes pa bzhin du mdzes shing 'jigs pa mdo// lha rnams thams cad ya mtshan skye// drag po yi ni cod pan 'chang // 'jig rten mgon po'i g.yas kyi dnguli// dbu rgyan rtse bran zla
145a8(rgyud): tshes bzhin// gdong bkru ba ni mchog yin no// zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// smin ma rna ba dpral ba dang / pad+ma dkar sham shin tu 'jam// mig gnyis ud pal sngon po 'dra// sems can dzad
145b1(rgyud): dga' bas lta// dga' zhing rtag tu tshig btsan 'gyur// de yi mig gis gang mthong ba/ thams cad dbang du gyur par 'gyur/ skyes pa la bsku byas ni// rtag tu rig sgra blo chen zhing // rtag tu ya la gro bgos
145b2(rgyud): ba'i// 'jigs pa med pa'i lusu 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni mi bzod cing // gnod sbyin 'byung po gsang ba pas// rtag tu thub par mi 'gyu ro// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang // rtag tu sred med stob
145b3(rgyud): ldan zhing // glang chen stobs kyi stobs ldan 'gyur// lha rnams 'dar ni yid yed cing // klu rnams mtshon skrag par par byed// gal te rig sngags smra ba yi// reg na ri rab lhun po yang // g.yo bar
145b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba the tsom med// rtag tu sred med stobs ldan zhing // stobs dang gzugs dang rtsal ldan 'gyur// nor bu rgyal po bla na med// 'di ni thos pa tsam gyi su// sdig pa kun langs dral zhing
145b5(rgyud): dug rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// dpal dang ska la bzang rtag 'thob 'gyur// gang gi lag tu thogs 'gyur ba// sgrib pa kun la nges grol zhing // de bzhin 'jig rten
145b6(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur// de na de bzhin gang shegs kun gyi// zug skyes gsungs skyes srasu 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bla ma rtag tu rjes 'brang zhing // rig sngags smra ba dbugs dbyung
145b7(rgyud): phyir// de bzhin du ni srung ba dang / rtag tu mchog ni sbyin par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po thub chen gyis// bsod nams phung po chen po thob// gang zhig nor bu 'di 'chang ba de de bzhin gshegs pa gang ba'i klung
145b8(rgyud): gau bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa dang / phyi bzhin 'brang
146a1(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// dpal dang skal pa bzang po thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid yong su dag par 'gyur/ sems can zad kyis

146a4(rgyud): sdang ba bdud la sogs pa thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad las rgyal te/ pha rol tu pham par mdzad nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// 'dis rnga bo che
146a5(rgyud): la bskus te/ brdungs na chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs par 'gyu ro// gang dag sgra thos pa tsam gyis sems can thaMd kyi mams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rab tu ni bar 'gyur/

146a8(rgyud): su grol bar 'gyur/ de la dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ me'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ mtshon gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'dzi
146b1(rgyud): pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rims thaMd kyi 'dziDa rab 'byung mi 'gyur/ 'dis dung la bskus te bus na chos kyi dung chen po bus par 'gyur/ za na dung gi sgra zos pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang slar
146b2(rgyud): log par mi 'gyur/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang / nad dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa'i sdug bsngal las yongasu grol bar
146b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ 'di ni skye ba phyi ma yin te/ shi nas thams cad ris 'thun par bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang / dpa
146b4(rgyud): byad kyis rgyan pa/ rgyan thams kyis klubs pa/ pad+ma las skyil makrung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'od dpag med las mngon sum du chos kyi gta
146b5(rgyud): thos par 'gyuro// zla ba yar gyi ngo la cod 'das po bcings te nor bu chen pa 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse ma la btags na sgreng ba tsam gyis mod la chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs
146b6(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bta la tsA ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying por chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba
146b7(rgyud): bar rig par bya'o// 'di sgreng pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ gnod pa thams cad dang / mi ngas dang / mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
146b8(rgyud): chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun ma dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba 'jigs par 'gyur// rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung dang sdang ba'i sems can rab tu zhi bar 'gyur dag
147a1(rgyud): mi bzad pa dang / gcan zan gtum po dang / bya dang / sbrang bu dang /  sbrang dang / bye ba dang / sdig sbrul dang / 'bras dang / lo'u ta dang / dug dang / shu ba dang / 
147a2(rgyud): ldog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / ske bgegs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ sdang ba'i klu dang / ser ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung gi mi tshugs shing nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// bde ba
147a3(rgyud): dang / dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo mang po dang / mi mang pos yongasu gang zhing / 'byor par 'gyur/ chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 
147a4(rgyud): khri tog dang / ras dang / skom ro zhim pa dang / shin tu 'jam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ thams cad du lha'i reg pa dang bcas pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba 'byung bar 'gyur// sdang ba'i gnod
147a5(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / 'phra men ma dang / yi dwags dang / brjed byed dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skem byed dang / grib ma dang / bza' nyes dang / 
147a6(rgyud): 'go ma nyes dang / blta nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa zhi bar 'gyur zhing mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad phan tshun byams pa'i semasu 'gyur/ mchog tu yid bde ba'i gnas
147a7(rgyud): pas gnas par 'gyuraro// yon tan dang phan yon chen po de dag ni nor bu'i rgyal po chen po'i byin gyis brlabs yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
147a8(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das grub pa'i rdzas kyi
147b1(rgyud): mchog nor bu gdags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs shing lung stan pa/ dang bdag gi snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po sems can thams cad la
147b2(rgyud): phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa rjesu bsgrags par bgyi'o// gser dang / na la da dang / gi wang dang / kha bla dang / sdong ros dang / pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang / gur gum dang / na
147b3(rgyud): ga bus pa dang / tA tsa dang / ta ra ga dang / tsan dan rnam gnyis dang / smrig ka dang / kA la ka dang / ru rta dang / shu ti dang / pri yang ku dang / ha re Nu ka dang / sug smel dang / lo d+ha dang / dzA ta patra
147b4(rgyud): ka su ma na dang / sA ma ka dang / sra rtsi bog dang / shing arga'i 'o ma rnams bsogs te/ cha mnyam par byas la gser gnyis 'gyur du byas te/ rgyu skar bzang po dang / tshe
147b5(rgyud): shis shing dge ba la khrus legs par byas te/ gos gtsang ma bsgos nas nyin zhags gcig byams pa'i se mas la mnyam par gzhag ste/ phye ma zhim mor byas te/ don yod
147b6(rgyud): ba'i zhag pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i gzung stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gtor la dri chab bzang pos spangs te sbyar la/ gser dang bsris la ga pur dang / gla rtsi'i
147b7(rgyud): bdug pas bdug te/ nor bu no gnyis pa'i tshang du byas nas phug la ras skud kyis btags te gser gyis g.yogs la/ yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ wa
147b8(rgyud): rgyal ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar sgrub par byas la de nyid kyi zhabs drung du thob ma la bskam par bya ste/ phyed ngal bani
148a1(rgyud): cha gser gyis g.yogs par bya zhing phyed g.yogs par mi bya'o// gang la gser gyis g.yog pa 'di ni gang la don med pa'i zhags pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor
148a2(rgyud): bu chen po dang 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa las chen po bsgrub par byedo// gser gyis ma g.yogs pas ni 'jig rngar pa'i dgos pa thams
148a3(rgyud): cad sgrub par byedo// nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / u ta dang / 'bras dang / 'go ba'i nang dang / shrI ba dang / ldog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol ba dang / yol mig dang / sha bkra dang ma
148a4(rgyud): rang dang / klang rang dang / gzhogs byed na ba dang / mgul pa 'gag pa dang // Sha nad dang / sna nad dang / rna ba'i nad dang / so nad dang rkan na ba dang / khyen pa dang / mchun pa dang / snong na ba dang / 
148a5(rgyud): rtsib logs na nga dang / ljo na pa dang / mchin pa na ba dang rgyabar ba dang / gcin snyi ba dang / zug ze dang // 'khru ba dang / pho ba'i nad da nga/ gzhang 'drum thams cad rab tu ni bar 'gyur
148a6(rgyud): zhing / rims thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ rims nyin bzhi pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / 'khris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnam
148a7(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// lus kyi nang gi nad thams cad la chu dron dang lhan cig sbyir no// phyi rol nad thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad la byug pa tsam gyis yongasu grol bar 'gyur// thams cad
148a8(rgyud): du dgos pa thams cad la sbyar ba tsam gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ the tso mi bya'o// ser gyi g.yogs pa dpung pa la btags na thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur te/ 
148b1(rgyud): sngangs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa phyag na rdo rje dang / pad+ma 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa bla na med pa rnam pa gsum po 'di la sbyar bar byas/ 
148b2(rgyud): thig le dang / gdong pa bkru ba dang / lus bsdu 'a'o// yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid 'grub pa ste/ the tsom mi bya'o// rgyal po btsun ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang / 
148b3(rgyud): skye bo dang / blon por bcas pa rtag tu bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du dbang du 'gyuraro// nor bu spyi gtsug tu bzhag nas rig sngags bzlas na bgegs med par thod 'grub par 'gyuraro// 
148b4(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa la btags te rig sngags bzlas na/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga stong phrag brgya 'gyur du byas par 'gyur te/ lan cig bzlas pa stong phrag brgyar rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ 
148b5(rgyud): mngal bar btags te bcangs na khrus ma byas pa khrus bya sa par 'gyur/ mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur/ tshangs par/ mi sprod pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/ thub
148b6(rgyud): ba ra ma byas pa thub par byas par 'gyur/ sbyang bar ma byas pa spang ba byas par 'gyur/ tshig mi gtsan pa tshig gtsan par 'gyur/ ma grub pa grub par 'gyur/ dam tshig mi shes pa dam
148b7(rgyud): tshig shes par 'gyur byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ sbyin pa gang chung zad ci sbyin pa chung ngu yang stong phrag brgya 'gyur du sbyin pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur// pha rol tu
148b8(rgyud): byir 'a drug rdzogs par 'gyur/ nor bu 'di lag mthil g.yas pa la btags na gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyuraro// su yang brjod par mi bya ste/ de'i 'og tu de dag thaMng 'phel
149a1(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// rked pa la btags te/ chu'i nang du zhugs na chu klung chen po'i gting slebs par 'gyuraro// de nas nor bu sgrub par 'dod pas dngul shin tu yongasu

149a3(rgyud): lci ba ba lang gi gcin dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya ste/ kho ra khor yug tu pad+ma bris la/ pad+ma dbus kyi za bar dngul las byas pa'i pad+ma bzhag
149a4(rgyud): ste/ bum pa gang ba bzhi dang gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag pa ra bya zhing / me tog dgram par bya/ tshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya/ a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang du ru ka'i bdug pas
149a5(rgyud): bdug cing gtor ma dkar po bzhag par bya/ 'phan 'dugs rna ma pa sna tshogs kyi brgyan par bya/ mar gyi mar me sum bcu rtsa ba nyis bltam par bya/ 'bras bu dang me tog phreng sna
149a6(rgyud): tshogs bzhag par bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du phyon bar gzhan ste/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la nyin mtshan gcig byung ba byas la sa
149a7(rgyud): bcwo lnga nas nyi shu dgu dang gnam stong gi bar dus tshams gsum du mchod par bya zhing / pad+ma za ma tog de dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod pa byas la dkyil
149a8(rgyud): 'khor gyi shar phyogasu mngon du phyogs te 'dug la bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar dang chus dbang bskur bar bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i// 
149b1(rgyud): phyag rgya stong rtsa brgyad bya/ de bzhin du khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bya'o// ma smra bar dogs pa thams cad byas na de'i 'og tu tshes bco lnga zla ba nya'i nang par gyis dus mtsham su nor bu'i rgyal
149b2(rgyud): po pad+ma dang bcas te gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang dga' bar 'gyur/ na mkha'i dkyil nas
149b3(rgyud): laMg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po mthong bar 'gyur/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma 'bar ba de lag pa g.yas pas blang bar bya ste/ 
149b4(rgyud): blangs pa tsam gyi mod la na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ 'khor lo'i rgyal po gser gyi mdog can ldaran sdug
149b5(rgyud): pa chen po mdun na gnas par 'gyur/ sdang ba dang phyir rgol ba dang / mi 'dza' ba thams cad bzlog par byed/ 'khor bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rig
149b6(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i rnam par blta ba'i nor bu chen po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ 
149b7(rgyud): don yod pa'i dri ma med pa 'bar ba'i rtse mo rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i don yod pa'o zhags pa 'thob par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang
149b8(rgyud): bi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ nor bu chen po yongasu dag pa rdo rje la rnam par lta ba'i 'od kyi
150a1(rgyud): lus rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsi dang
150a2(rgyud): lto 'phya chen po rnams bgyi ba ci mchis shes dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ mgo bo'i spyi bor btags na nor bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis nub phyogasu song nas bde ba can gyi rab tu dbye ba
150a3(rgyud): gzhal med khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ legs par brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa

150a5(rgyud): mgul du btabs na dug gi gnas thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ thams cad du rgyal ba'i rje dpon dang / 'khor lor bsgyur ba 'i rgyal por 'gyur// phug steng phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi
150a6(rgyud): sgo 'byer bar 'gyur/ dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing lus mi snang ba gang ga'i klung bye ba stong phrag brgya snyed kyi lus mi snang ba rnams kyi mchog rje dpon dang rgyal bar 'gyur// 
150a7(rgyud): dpung pa g.yon pa la gtags na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po la sogs pa thams cad mi sdang bar byas par 'gyur/ thams cad kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang sgo bya zhing 'dug par 'gyur/

150b1(rgyud): thams cad rang gi bzugs kyi mdun na gnas par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// rkang pa'i rje bar la 'angags na rlung gi phung po dang po'i stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan par
150b2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing chung zad tsam seng ngas dpag tshad sdong phrag bcur 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur/ nyin tshan gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rdar gyi khams rlung cher po'i

150b4(rgyud): la btags na sa'i 'og gi dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur zhing / sa'o 'og phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur te/ rang ji ltar 'dod pa der 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur// khar bcug
150b5(rgyud): mchi ma re re tshig su bcad bstang longs par 'gyuraro// ming pa tsam gyis thos pa rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur/ lce'i rtse mer bzhag nas lce pad+ma dang ku mu nga ltar 'jam pa
150b6(rgyud): 'gyur zhing zos pa mang po 'dzin par 'gyur// lag pa la byugs na gang la reb pa de dran btsan du 'gyur// skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze tha

150b8(rgyud): byug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod grub kyi bum pa rab ma chog ces bgyi ba'i sgrub pa'i cho sa chen po bachis mngan yang ba'i sa
151a1(rgyud): pa'i sdong po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi mthu bstan pa/ ji lta der de ltar bcom ldan 'das bum pa chen po mthu sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di rnam par 'phrul pa/ 
151a2(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ba lags so// rig sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur lag so// de nas gser ram dngul la ma zangs sam
151a3(rgyud): kham pa'i bum pa tshad dang ldan zhing kun nas shin tu zlum pa mgo 'am/ mgrin par phyin pa'i tshad shin tu 'jam zhing / thag thug dang gang shong med pa/ dbyibs legs shing byi dor legs par byas pa/

152a7(rgyud): bum pa dang sangs rgyas la mchod pa bya'o// me smra bar dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil ma dkrung du 'dug nas lag pa g.yas bum sa pa'i steng du bzhag la khra bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ chung

152b1(rgyud): bsgoms la bzlas brjod bya'o// de'i 'og tu tshes bco lnga 'a'i thun tha ma'i nang par dbyig gi bum pa cher g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po yang grag par 'gyur te/ bum pa chen po de yang
152b2(rgyud): 'bar zhing 'od zer kha deg sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang dga' bar 'gyur/ dri ma med cing yongasu dag la dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur/ mdog yongasu dag cing me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da ltar dkar zhing
