184b6(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa/ dam tshig chen po dkyil 'khor gyi ming 'dzin pa tsam gyi kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs par 'gyu ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par yongasu 'dzin par yang 'gyuraro// 
184b7(rgyud): gang ga'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon mthong ba
184b8(rgyud): dang / mngon du chos thos pa dang / mngon du dbyangs thos pa dang / mngon du lung bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can chen po de dag gis ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu che ba dang / 
185a1(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongasu bzung bar 'gyu ro// sems can de gzungs gang yin pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / ming sna tshogs da ltar zos pa dang / yang na klog pa dang
185a2(rgyud): yang na lta ba tsam mthong ba ni de dang mnyam pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba yang de dang mnyam pa yin na// 
185a3(rgyud): dka' ba byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid du thos pa dang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'bad de stobs dang / brtson 'grus pha rol
185a4(rgyud): gnon par byed pa dang tsheskye ba dang 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang /  zlas brjod kyi cho ga byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas sgrub pa ra byed pa dang / 'bad par byed pa de ni dka' ba chen po
185a5(rgyud): la zhugs pa yin no// de dang mnyam pa yin no// dka' ba gang zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bskal pa zang
185a6(rgyud): med pa gsum du dka' ba la zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar yin no// rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma
185a7(rgyud): 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang yin pa 'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung bas gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga stobs chen po dang / 
185a8(rgyud): rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sgrub par byed pa 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga tshol ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dang / 
185b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lta ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya bcings te/ sgrub pa dang / 'di lta ste/ thos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang
185b2(rgyud): sems pa dang / dus gsum du lan gsum don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal po sa dbang bskur ba dang / gzungs 'di yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dran pa
185b3(rgyud): dang khyams pa dang / snying rje dang / byams pas snying brlan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba lhur byed pa de ni dka' bar spyod pa chen po la zhugs pa yin no// bskal pa grangs med pa gsum
185b4(rgyud): du dka' ba spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yin no// de'i tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid du so sor gnas
185b5(rgyud): pa yin no// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po bcu gsum pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bas/ 
185b6(rgyud): par 'gyuro// rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug rje su 'brang bar 'gyu ro// rtag tu phyag g.yas pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i spyi bo la 'jog par 'gyur// rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyu ro// rtag tu zhal
185b7(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyu ro// de ltar na yon tan chen po brjod pa'i gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang / cho ga 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa yin no// gzungs dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di thos pa tsam dang / rnab
185b8(rgyud): bu gang 'di'i sgra lan bdun nges par lhung na/ de 'chi 'pho ba tsam dang bsams pa tsam gyis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su skye bar 'gyur te/ 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar/ zhabs kyi drung du pad+ma la 'ardzur
186a1(rgyud): de skye bar 'gyur ro// rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par rgyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang / cho ga zhing mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / 
186a2(rgyud): phyag rgya rnams kha ton tu kun tu gnas bzhing / tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyuraro// dbang po drug yongasu dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga yang so sor thob bo// tsam la rab tu skye bar 'gyuraro// lha'i gzugs
186a3(rgyud): dang / kha dog dang / rtag dang / dbyibs yongasu dag pa de'i phyir/ stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis sems can thams cad sna tshogs 'dzin pa dang / mnyan par bgyi klag par bgyi/ kha ton du bgyi/ ser
186a4(rgyud): sna'i dri ma dang bral ba dang / phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyo/ sems can thams cad byams pa dang / snying rje la sogs pa mchog dang yang dag par ldan pas bgyi'o// gzungs dang / 
186a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di mnyan par bgyi/ blta bar bgyi/ 'jug par bgyi'o// phyi ma'i dus dang / phyi ma'i tshe ma yin par phul du byung ba'i don la brtson par bgyi'o zhes pa'o// 'jig rten las
186a6(rgyud): 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga 'di ni bla na med pa zhes bgyi'o// mang du smras ci 'tshal te/ de la 'gran sems kyis kyang mnyan par bgyi'o// zhes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
186a7(rgyud): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs 'di gsungs pa'i de ma thag tu/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis po Ta la'i ri bo 'di/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur to// me tog
186a8(rgyud): gi shing ldan pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing sngon pa gang yin pa rnams kyang / rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi khang pa brtsegs par rab tu gyur to// gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
186b1(rgyud): rnams 'bum phrab bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam par rab tu gyur to// lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 'bras bu rnam par bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams pham par byas pa'i rgyan
186b2(rgyud): rnam par bkra bas rnam par bkra zhing / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / gser gyi dril khrol ba'i bla res dbyangs pa rnams dang / lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khri yongasu bshams pa rnams kyang re re ning
186b3(rgyud): khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus na/ seng ge'i khri bshams pa brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtse dgu rab tu byung bar gyur te/ seng ge'i khri thams cad la/ phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa yang
186b4(rgyud): dag par byon te bzhug so// de bzhin gshegs pa zed kyang / phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
186b5(rgyud): gi spyi bo'i btsug tu phyag 'jog par mdzad cing / le gso zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par mdzad do// spyan ras gzigs dang nga phyug leg so legaso mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i
186b6(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam chen por rab tu snga na bas/ sems can thams cad pha rol tu 'gro bar byed pa dang / gang gis thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten las 'das pa/ so sor
186b7(rgyud): khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam tshol ba la rjesu 'gro'o// 'on kyang / bzlas pa dang / 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / 'jug pa ches mang ba'i dbang du byas pa
186b8(rgyud): sems can rnams dam tshig la rjesu 'jug par 'gyur ba de/ skye ba 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lusu rigs par bya'o// de nas po Ta la'i gnas kyi ri bo dang / nA dang shing gel ba dang / 
187a1(rgyud): sman dang / nags de rnams thams cad la mi gang tsam du mtho ba nyid dang / shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad tsam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi pad+ma
187a2(rgyud): rnams rab tu byung ste/ 'dab ma kha dog sna tshogs pa dang sdong bu bai DUr+ya dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi kha dog ltar dmar ba'i mu tig gi ze'u 'bru dang / lha rdzas kyi mu tog gi ge sar gyi khor yug tu
187a3(rgyud): bskor ba gang yin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad kyang chos la gus pas thams cad dbus gtsugs te/ gzungs 'di
187a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya mthong ba'i don du/ mu tog gi do shal brgya stong rib byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon par
187a5(rgyud): bkab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa 'di yang ches cher g.yos par gyur to// lha'i me tog gi mar chen po mang po rab tu phab
187a6(rgyud): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md mchod pa'i don dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i don dang // gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dam pa la mchod pa'i don du char rab tu phaba'o// de nas yang
187a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bzhin 'dzum zhing rdo rje bskor bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
187a8(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa
187b1(rgyud): dang / cho 'phrul ni// de bzhin bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa blta bar bgyi/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
187b2(rgyud): mthu chen po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog tu dkon par blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni phyi ma'i dus/ phyi ma'i tshe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyu ro// gang gis
187b3(rgyud): thos pa tsam gyis 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang phan yon so sor thob bo// kun tu snang bar byed par 'gyur ba 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
187b4(rgyud): dbang phyug ma gtogs par sems can thams cad kyi nang na gzhan su yang ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no// lag na rdo rje 'dzam bu'i gling
187b5(rgyud): pa'i sems can thams cad ma dang phar gyur pa 'di/ gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
187b6(rgyud): 'di sems can thams cad kyi re ba skong ba dang / skyob pa dang / skyabs pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpung gnyen byed pa nas/ ji srid bud med dang // skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo
187b7(rgyud): sems can thaMd sangs rgyas nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi bar la rab tu 'god par byed do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi stobs dang brtson 'grus
187b8(rgyud): dang pha rol gnon pas sngon sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du zhugs pa yin no// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po
188a1(rgyud): chen po thogs byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der dang ske lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
188a2(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ nor bu rin po che chen po de yang mngon par dbab par phul lo// lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pas bcal du
188a3(rgyud): bkram pa/ mchod pa'i don du rab tu bkos nas/ rang gi stan la 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa don
188a4(rgyud): yod pa dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa rab tu gsal ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa gang gis spyi bo'i gtsug
188a5(rgyud): tu gdugs kyi rnam pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa kun tu gnas par gyur te// rang pa gartsegs pa de las kyang / 'od ze rnam pa sna tshogs pa byung ngo // 'od zer sna tshogs pa'i snang ba sa
188a6(rgyud): kyang / na mkha'i mthil du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs pa bstan to// 'od zer gyi snang ba re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba/ 
188a7(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rab tu bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
188a8(rgyud): dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can chen po mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya 'di bshad pa 'di legaso legaso// 'jig rten las 'das pa shin tu/ 
188b1(rgyud): khyad par du 'phags pa'i byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa'i lam/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa'i lam/ chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'bar bar byed pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa/ 
188b2(rgyud): chos kyi drang 'bud par byed pa/ bdud bzhi'i dkyil 'khar las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus gnon par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
188b3(rgyud): rab tu rdzogs par byed pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis gnon par byed pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' pha rol gnon par byed pa/ pha rol phyin pa bcu rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'o// din
188b4(rgyud): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad sgom par byed pa'o// 'di ni lam rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi lam du 'am/ bar byed pa/ bsam pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi bsam pa
188b5(rgyud): yongasu dag pa/ ngan song du 'gro bar rgyu ba rnams kyi bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar byed pa/ 'di ni byang chub chen po'i sa bon dang / 'bras bu rab tu ston par byed pa'o// de nas bcom
188b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa 'jig rten las 'das
188b7(rgyud): pa khyad par du 'phags pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga shod cig byang chub sems/ 
188b8(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bskul ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga dang / 
189a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs gsung so// gnas bzangs gzhi dge ba dang / sa gzhi gtsang zhing ne'u sing la// ljon shing me tog 'bras bu
189a2(rgyud): khyab/ me tog khri shing 'gram dang ni// sa gzhi mnyen la dag pa dang / gang du chu bo 'bab pa dang // gzi brjid ldan zhing yid dga' ba/ sa gzhi sems ni dga' bar 'os// yid kyi shing rnga rgyas byed
189a3(rgyud): ge skabs legs par gnas pa dang / shin tu dag cing thun tshags bral// rus pa gseg ma gyo mo dang / phub ma sel ba yongasu spangs// gtsang zhing gtsang la legs dab pa'i// sa gzhi yongasu zlum pa der/ ma
189a4(rgyud): pas rgyar ni gzings tshang du// gzhal nas shin tu rnam 'byas kyi ga/ gtsang zhing mnyen la 'jam par phye/ gnas der dkyil 'khor le gas par bsgrubs// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/ 'dzi
189a5(rgyud): rten las 'das kyad 'phags par/ de bzhin gshegs kun gyis kyi na brlabs/ sa yi cha las spangasu mi mi gang tshad du brko bar bya// dmar po 'am yang na gur gum kha dog dang / sa rdul dkar po sde
189a6(rgyud): pa maM mar sar 'dra ba 'jam pa yin// sa yi khyab par dbye ba de// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bsngags/ byang chub snying po sa der tshungs/ ring bsrel bzhugs pa'i mchod rten dang / de ni mtshungs par gyur
189a7(rgyud): yin// brkos pa'i nang du mkhas pa yis/ slar yang sa de dgang par bya/ ji srid dong bu mnyam par gang / de ni dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'o// nyung dang lhag pa bsngags pa min// 'dir ni 'grub pa med par bstam/ drun
189a8(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis tshad// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig dag 'dag// yang na khru ni bcu drug dang // yang ma bru ni bco lngar bya// mnyam zhing grwa bzhir legs par byed// ba yi lci ba dag dang ni/ sa dang bsres te bsku bya ba/ 
189b1(rgyud): shin tu zhen par 'jig pa dang / 'jam zhing mnyen par bya ba yin/ de la dkyil 'khor thig gdang pa/ sna tshogs tshan gyis kun tu dbye/ sgo ba'i rnam par 'byed pa dang / rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya/ 
189b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying po ni/ rnam par phye ste gru bzhi tshad// khru gsum yang na khru bzhi ni// thig skud tshon gyis rnam par dbye// nang gi thig gi tshad dag tu// mdung rtse gsum pa dag dang ni/ nor bu rin chen
189b3(rgyud): sna tshogs bya/ bar gyi thig gi tshad dag tu/ pad+ma dang ni rdo rje dang / kun tu bri bar bya ba yon/ phyi yi thog gi tshad dag tu/ rdo rje rnam pa'i stegs bu dang / rin chen sna tshogs gzhal med khang / sgeg bu dag kyang
189b4(rgyud): bri bar bya// pad+ma'i dbus gzhal med khang / gzhal yas khang pa granas par bya/ dkyil 'khor dbus kyi pad+ma la/ rnam par snang mdzad thub pa bya/ 'a yon du 'od na dpag med pa// g.yas phyog su
189b5(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs/ shAkya'i rgyal po dag dang ni// don mo nga rgyal po 'jig rten gyi// dbang phyug mgon la mngon sum du// btud de thal mo sbyor ba ni// phyag bzhi par ni
189b6(rgyud): bya ba yin// phyag gnyis kyis ni sna tshogs pa'i// me tog rnams ni 'chang ba dang / rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bya// 'od dpag med pa'i mdun du ni// khro bo'i rgyal po phyag bzhi pa// btud
189b7(rgyud): de thal mo sbyor ba dang / lha rdzas me tog sna tshogs pa// lag pa gnyis na thogs pa dang / sna tshogs rgyan gyi brgyan par bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan// sna tshogs dar gyi
189b8(rgyud): mdzes par bya// don yang zhags pa'i phyag rgya che// pad ma'i gdan dang rnam rgyan pa// 'bar ba'i nang na yod par bya// zla bzhi dag ni byas na ni// gnyis kyi bar gyi cha bzhi ste/ dbus kyi
190a1(rgyud): gnas su 'jigapa med pa/ shar gyis gangasu gnas pa ni lha me sgrol ma rnam par rgyan// g.yas kyi gnas gnas pa ni// gos dkar mo ni rnam par rgyam nub kyi gnas na gan
190a2(rgyud): pa ni// lha mo dkar mo rnam par rgyan// byang gi gnas na gnas pa ni// lha mo pad+ma mdzes dgas rgyan// dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwa rnamasu// rgyal chen bzhi ni bzhag par bya// bar gyi gnas bzhag pa ni// ral pa gcig pa ba tu
190a3(rgyud): po shar/ nub tu pho nya bzhin sbyar ma// g.yas phyogasu ni bzhin sbyar ma// rdo rje lcags sgrogs bya ba yin// byang du srin mo khro gnyer gdong // kun kyang me dbus 'jigs pa med// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa bzhin// 
190a4(rgyud): phyi rol thig le pad+mo'i phreng // rdo rje rtse gsum bzhag pa ni/ kun tu' bar ba phreng ba bkra/ khyi rob kyi kun tu ni khri ga dang pya rgyad pa lha ni dbang phyu ga dbang phyug che// tshangs pa khyab 'jug gshin rje dang // 
190a5(rgyud): nu lha dbang po lus ngan po// dbang sgyur dga' ldan gnas dag gi/ lha nas 'og min gnas kyi bar/ lha rnams bri bar bya ba yin// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang / rtags ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 
190a6(rgyud): kun kyang pad+mo'i gdan la gnas// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang // rdo rje rtse lnga rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang ni dgra sta dang // legs mthong 'khor lo de bzhin no// mdung rtse gsum dang pan+d+ha sa// ngos la dbyug pa
190a7(rgyud): tho ba dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i phreng // 'khor lo dung dang dga' da dang / ral gri dang ni to ma rab// bum pa gang bdag dang ni// mi snang ba yi 'bag sha dang // pad+ma dang ni ud pa la// rgyal mtshan gdugs
190a8(rgyud): dang nor bu dang / dbyug pa dang ni rdo rje dang // grwa bzhir rdo rjes mtshan pa yin// nor bu rdo rje dag dang ni// dgra sta rdo rje dag dang ni// phyag rgya bzhi dang dga' ba 'khyil// bya me bum dang kun di dang / ril ba b+h+ring ga ri dang ni/ ri dgas so/ 
190b1(rgyud): na'i lpags pa la// mchod phyir thogs pa'i snam bu dang / steng du rgyu slar bcas pa yi / zla banyi ma de bzhin no// kun kyang 'bar ba'i nang du 'dug so so ma ni dbye bar bya/ mkhas pas shar gyi sgor bri ga/ 'byi
190b2(rgyud): bag mthong na 'jig su rung // lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa med// rdo rje 'chang ba 'bar ba'i nang / ke li ke la gtum po che// lho phyogs kyi ni sgo ru bzhag / nub tu rdo rje ping ga la/ mthong na 'jig su rung ba yi/ byang du
190b3(rgyud): nges par gnod mdzes bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// pad+ma'i phreng dang ud pal phreng // gla dag dang ni bla rnamasu// klu yi rgyal po bzhi rnams bri// sgo srung ba dag bri ba ni/ nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang // stobs
190b4(rgyud): kyi lha dang lngas rtsan yin// sgra yi gnas kyi bar dag tu// chu bo bzhi ni bri bya ba// gang ga dang ni si ha dang // pag shu dang ni sin du yin// phreng ba'i nang rom thog dag tu// dpal gyi lha mo bsan ti// dpe med ma dngas
190b5(rgyud): yi lha kha tog sman gyi lha ma dang / sgra dbyangs ma dang 'jig ldan ma// de bzhin me yi lha dag dang / 'phrog ma dang ni dung can ma// gtu ma mo dang ni me tog so// de dag bri bar bya ba yin/ 
190b6(rgyud): khrus byas 'dri mkhan gtsang ma yis// gtsang ma'i snod du tshon rnams ni// lhag ma min pas kun tu bri/ zas ni dkar gsum grub par bya// khyad par 'dod pas zas ngan pa// spang bar bya ba nya
190b7(rgyud): dang / tsong dang sgog kya ke'u rnams dang // 'dres pa spang bar bya ba ni// log 'dren glags tshul phyiro// khrus byas gos ni sar bgos// gtsang mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tsha/ 
190b8(rgyud): kyis// kun tu brgyan par bya ba ni// bdan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' dang ni// lha rdzas dar ni sbyang ba dang // ba dan yang ni sbyang bar bya// mtshon srung sna lnga'i srad bu yis/ kun tu/ 
191a1(rgyud): yongasu bskor byar bya// zangs las byas pa'i pad+ma'i tshad// sor bzhi mdab ma bye ba dag/ mdzes pa grwa bzhir gzugs par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor grwa
191a2(rgyud): rnamasu// pad+ma brgyad ni gzhal ba dag/ gser las byas pa bzhi bzhag cing // de bzhin dbus las byas pa bzhi// kun tu byu ru'i phreng ba dang // mu tig phreng ba de bzhin no// kun tu gser gyi srad bu dang / 
191a3(rgyud): rin chen sna tshogs bzhag par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor thig par du// gser gyi snod ni bzhi dag dang // dngul gyi snod ni bzhi bzhago// dngul gyi bum pa gang ba bzhi la dngul dang gser dang zangs las
191a4(rgyud): byas pa'i me tog gis smras pa'i mgo lcogs kyi spras pa ban ga par bya'o// gser gyi bum pa bzhi bzhag pa la mu tig dang / byu ru dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / mar gad dang / in dra nI
191a5(rgyud): la dang / dngul dang / gser dang / me tog gis smras pa'i mgo lcogs bzhag par bya'o// gla rtsi dang / ga bu dang / gur gum dang / lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas gser gyi snod bkang
191a6(rgyud): ba dang / dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / rangs kyi mu tig gis rgyan cing / rin po che sna tshogs pas spras pa bzhag par bya// cod pan gyi rgyal mtshan bani
191a7(rgyud): bzhag par bya// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bzhi bzhag par bya// tshon sna tshogs can dang / dar dmar po sbyang bar bya// dngul gyi por por bzhi bzhag ste/ tsan dan dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gur
191a8(rgyud): gum gyi bdug pa bdug par bya/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa gser gyis g.yogs pa'i nang du dri chab rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bkang ste/ rin po che bsna bdun dang ldan par bgyis la bkang la dar gyis
191b1(rgyud): bcings la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i steng du zangs las byas pa'i me tog bzhan nas snying pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma'i steng du bzhag par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil lal
191b2(rgyud): thog thab tu dri dang / phye ma dang thug pa dang / me tag dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang mchad lan gyi ma ba kyis dngus gyi ldang dang / 'angs kyi snod pa'ang ba drug bcu rtsa bani 'ams
191b3(rgyud): bya'o// lcags kyi snod bum pa gang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi bzhag par bya'o// me tog dang / mgo ljogs dang / pog por bkang pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi bzhag par bya'o// bzhag par bya ste bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug par
191b4(rgyud): bya'o// skra bzhir dri chab kyi bum pa dang gyis brgyan cing sdud pa bzhag par bya'o// sna ma'i me tog gis gdu bu'i steng bu mda' la ba dan btags pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi gtsugs te tshan sna tshogs kyis bkrang
191b5(rgyud): byas pa'i mnga' dang / nong bu'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dkyil la khor brgyan par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tus dang bsres pa'i ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor byas pacwa
191b6(rgyud): chab kyis bskus te tshon sna lnga'i srad pus thig btab la sgo bzhi rnam par phye ste/ seng gi phur bu tshad sor bcu gnyis pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gdab bo// tshon sna lnga'i srad bus dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor
191b7(rgyud): bar bya'o// bum bu dang / bum pa dang / bya ma bum drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang pa bzhag go// kham phor zlum po drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhag/ 
191b8(rgyud): gtar ma tshul sna tshogs pa drug cu rtsa ba ni sa sor bzhag/ snong tshon sna lnga pa drug cu rtsa bzhi kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs blugs pa dang / gtor ma
192a1(rgyud): dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs 'chag sayo byad thams cad tu yongasu gang ba ro rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtor ma bza'o// 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dgra ma
192a2(rgyud): phreng ba brgya ni shu rtsa gcig dkyil 'khor du sbyar bar bya ste byang phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la drug cu rtsa bzhi/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor la sum bcu rtsa gnyis gdag so// me mar gyi sdong bu bzhi bud par byas
192a3(rgyud): gtor ma brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi dang dkyil 'khor thog thag tu mar me dud par bya'o// chang dang sha dang / beg tsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang / tshong sngon dang / la spug spangs pa'i gtor ma gzhan rnam pa sna tsho
192a4(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi byi bu bzhir don yod pa'i chags pa'i mdo sde bklags par bya ste/ sgo re rer bcom ldan ngas ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par
192a5(rgyud): bya'o// chos klog pa legs par khrus byas te/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sa dkris te gtsang ma la dri rnam pa sna tshobs kyis bskos pa'i gos gtsang ma gsar pa bgos se chos kyi stan shin tu
192a6(rgyud): rgyan pa lha rdzas kyi stan la 'dug nas tshig 'jam po tshig gnyen pos bklag par bya'o// nub kyi phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor mthon po la 'de ba can gyi bkod pa bris pa 'od dpag med dang / 'phags
192a7(rgyud): paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob pa'i gzugs dris pa'i ris kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag par bya'o// shar gyi phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor gru
192a8(rgyud): bzhi mthan pa byas la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor la shAkya thub pa dang / 'ang ba sman rdo 'chang ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dra ba'i gzhugs dris paras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la
192b1(rgyud): mngon du phyogs par bzhag go// lho'i phyogs cha la ri 'dra'aba'i gnas mthon po byas la de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
192b2(rgyud): sel ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa ras la bris pa'i dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag// byang gi phyogs la khra bo'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / 
192b3(rgyud): byams pa dang / sa'i snying po bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzha'o// stegs bu'i rnam par mthon por byas pa thams cad legs par brgyan par bya'o// dar
192b4(rgyud): gyi phreng bas brgyan par bya'o// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / bum pa gang ba bzhag pa dang / dris dkyil 'khor bya ba dang / ra'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba'i ngo bo rnam pa du ma kha zas kyi
192b5(rgyud): ro dbul ba dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bsod snyom bzhag pa dang / tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du rus ka dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / bsres pa'i
192b6(rgyud): 'dug pa ras kyi sku gzugs la dbul bar bya'o// de nas rig snga gas 'chang bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / gos lan gsum pa rjes te/ dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang cho ga bya'o// chos
192b7(rgyud): brgyad nas brtsams te chos bco lnga tshang gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// khra bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags
192b8(rgyud): kyu nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / don yod pa rnam par blta ba'i zhags pa'i snying pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rnam par grol bar dkyil 'khor byang chub sem
193a1(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying po spong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// zla ba
193a2(rgyud): nyar thug gi bar du zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// tshes bco lnga'i nyin mtshan thog thag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dpag tu med par bzlas brjod bya'o// mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas kyang ngal
193a3(rgyud): ba med pa dang / lus snyoms pa dang bral bas bzlas brjod bya'o// byams pa dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i semasu bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba mtshams bcad pa dang / 
193a4(rgyud): phyogs bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan su nga ba dang dkyil 'khor bsdam pa byas nas/ de nas 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du dam tshig la gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor du gtsug
193a5(rgyud): pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi las zin nas mchod pa rtsam mo// mchod pa'i cho ga zin pa dang / de nas bzlas brjod brtsam par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ 
193a6(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro// bzlas brjod lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / dbang bskur ma thag tu ras kyi sku gzugs dang / 
193a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu 'bar zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin cing leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ba'i snying dga' zhing lus 'bar bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras
193a8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug shin tu 'bar zhing 'od 'phro ba nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer can don yod pa'i zhags pa 'tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi nang nas mngon du gshe
193b1(rgyud): te phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor kun la rnam par gzigs shing rig sngags 'chang ba leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i spyi bo la bzhag ste dkris la
193b2(rgyud): gyi mchog bshin tu brgyan cing spras pa 'di ni shin tu bzang ba yin te/ legs legs// 'di rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa de bzhin gang legs pa thed
193b3(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
193b4(rgyud): snga ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po rnams kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdud thams cad pham par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor bgegs dang / rnam par chog
193b5(rgyud): 'dren thams cad 'jom pa/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang rje'u ra gas dang / dmangs rigs dang / tha na byol song gi skye gan su gtog
193b6(rgyud): pa'i bya yang rung ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba 'i gcong rong las sgrol ba yin no// 'di ni sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thed dang / dmyal ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / nad dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 
193b7(rgyud): 'chi ba las yongasu thar par byed cing / 'jig pa med pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed pa yi no// 'di ni rnam par thar par byed pa dkyil 'khor chen po snying po dang / gsang sngagasu bcas pa rnam par
193b8(rgyud): grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thad kyis phyag byas pa 'di rig sngags 'chang ba de dang des ming brjod pa dang / gang dran pa tsam la sogs pa dang / lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / ming 'dzin
194a1(rgyud): pa yang 'khor ba'i pha rol tu brgal bar 'gyuraro// phyir mi ldog pa nyid du sa bcu 'grod nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa
194a2(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur// de gang zhe na/ gang zhig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dra ba mngon du mthong ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i gzungs 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bzlas brjod
194a3(rgyud): byed pa dang klog pa nga/ dran pa dang / 'chad pa dang / lan 'da' smyung bas mthong ba dang / zang cig dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam gyis mthong ba ning dang mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa yin no zhes
194a4(rgyud): smra'o// bdag ni sems can de la de bzhin gshes/ sa pa yin par yang 'dzin te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pas spyi bos dbang bar bgyi 'o// rig sngags
194a5(rgyud): 'chang bas zung bshig dang mchog ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar yid la re ba dang / bsam pa de thams cad rjesu gzung shing sbyin par mdzad// de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang bas yid la
194a6(rgyud): g+har bsams pa'i mchog smras na/ de thams cad sbyin par mdzad cing ngan med pa'i ye shes bkod pa rnam par gral baji ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang dang ni
194a7(rgyud): krung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa khrig khrig stong phrag bcu'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyuraro// rdzu 'phrul gyis namatha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor de'i dam tshig tu zhugs pa ni dam tshig shes pa'i rjen
194a8(rgyud): zhugs pa yin / de dag glengs bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin 'di sa ste/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par 'byung ba'i phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ba yim rung/ 
194b1(rgyud): bstan pa dang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba yin/ de ni mngal na gnas par skye ba'i tha ma ste/ phyis mangs na gnas pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sa
194b2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// de pad+mo'i nang nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// tshe rabs kun tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs pa cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal
194b3(rgyud): po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ dam tshig chen po 'di kha ton byed na phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
194b4(rgyud): thed sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar leg so zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur te/ rig kyi bu skye ba blangs pa le/ 
194b5(rgyud): par skye ba yin pas legs leg so// phyir mi ldog pa ra bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gan sa pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thaMd dang / phyogs bcu'i
194b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od zer 'bum phrag bye bas mdzes par gyur cing bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas spyi bor phyag 'jog cing dgu
194b7(rgyud): 'byin par mdzad do// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du chos 'phel ba'i gtam mngon sum du sgrags par mdzad do// tha na dkyil 'khor chen po rol mo'i sgra rnga bo che dang / rnga phran dang dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rol
194b8(rgyud): ma'i sgra gang dag grags pa la sems can gang dag gis sgra de thos nas sna ba'i bu ga tsam du song ba de thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa
195a1(rgyud): rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// tha na byol song gi skye gan su gtogs pa'i bya'i rna bar sgra zos pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// de ltar na rnam par
195a2(rgyud): 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul pa yin no// rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong
195a3(rgyud): ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u'i rigs sam/ dmangs sam/ 'ga' zhig gi rnam pa
195a4(rgyud): grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du klog pa dang / sems can gang gis sgra de zos nas sgrad byangs de dang ming zos pa rna ba'i bu gar song
195a5(rgyud): bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang sdig pa mi bzad pa las bral bar 'gyuraro// sngan gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyuro// phyir mi ldog
195a6(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis srasu rig par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi thu bo yin no// rtag par 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
195a7(rgyud): phyug grogs mdzad cing rjesu 'brang bar 'gyuro// rtag tu dbugs 'byin par mdzad par 'gyuraro// mthar byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du rtag tu rjesu srung bar mdzad// sems can gang ni
195a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de'i sa phyogasu song ste/ sa gzhi snang ba tsam mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// nyon mongs pa dzad bsregs shing sgrib pa thaMd las yongasu grol bar
195b1(rgyud): / 'gyur// de'i sa rdul rlung gis bdas te lus la phog pa gang yin pa de dang / tha na sems can ngan pa yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas par
195b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// sdig pa thams cad las yongasu grol ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs
195b3(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs phyung bar 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyis bsrungs par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongasu gzungs par 'gyu ro// dge
195b4(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de ltar na sgra thos pa tsam dang / ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyuraro// de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin bsreg
195b5(rgyud): cho ga bshang par bya ste/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad sreg cing sdug bsngal drag po las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa drag po'i rgya mtsho dang / 2
195b6(rgyud): bas las sgrol ba 'grub la/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas bla na med par dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas thaMd dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam
195b7(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i lam ston pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ston pa/ lha'i stegs sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyi mod la the tsom med par/ me lha dang / dbang
195b8(rgyud): po dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug dang gshin rje dang / nu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu rnams sbyin sreg byas pa 'di tsam gyis mod la theng 'ong bar 'gyuraro// 
196a1(rgyud): the tsom med par lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 
196a2(rgyud): sha za dang / grul bum thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de'i mod la rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa gnyis pa rtag tu 'dud par byedado// de bzhin du nyin du kun tu srung bar 'gyuraro// 
196a3(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid chen po dang / gnod sbyin dbang po chen po bcu yang phyogs bcur srung bar byed/ mi srun pa ma rungs pa sel cing dmyal ba dang / 'dzi
196a4(rgyud): ba mi bzad pa dang / dug drag po dang / seMn ma rungs pa rnams sel bar byedado// de ma thag tu bsod nams chen po'i lhun po dang / bsod nams chen po'i phung po bla na med
196a5(rgyud): pa skye bar 'gyu ro// tsan dan srang nyi shu dang / a ga ru srang lnga dang / du ru ska srang bdun dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi srang gcig gi bzhi cha re re dang / gur gum srang gcig dang / skye bag
196a6(rgyud): kun tu ra srang lnga dang / gu gul srang bdun dang / 'di rnams gcig tu bsres te/ phye mar byas la khar dkar po dang / sbrang rtsis ril bu zho re'i tshad tsam du byas la stong brgyad dang / yungs
196a7(rgyud): kar dang / 'bras yos bsres te ril bu dang / bsres nas mar gyi nang du skyugs te sbyin sreg bya'o// shing sur b+hi dang / razhing arga dang / shing sha ma'i yam shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg gi cho ga
196a8(rgyud): bya'o// gang dang gang gi tshe sgong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de dang de'i tshe sdig pa dang / sgrib pa drag po thaMd sreg par 'gyuraro// de dang de'i tshe de nad thaMd las yongasu grol bar 'gyur// de dang
196b1(rgyud): de'i tshe gtsang thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// de dang de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge slong dang bram ze dang / rgyal
196b2(rgyud): rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs la sogs pa zad kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyu ro// sdig pa thams cad dang b+hur thams cad dang / gnod pa zad dang / 
196b3(rgyud): 'khrug pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / shags 'gyed pa thams cad dang / rang gi 'khor dang / gzhan gyi 'khor gyi 'jigs pa thams cad
196b4(rgyud): dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgras 'jigs pa thaMd dang / sems can ma rungs pa thams cad dang / rkun po dang / zol pa dang / mi rgod dang / gcan zan gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu
196b5(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyuraro// sem can de dag zad 'a gas pa med par 'gyur ro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / 
196b6(rgyud): rje'u rigs dang // dmangs rigs gang dag gis de'i dri tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas
196b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// tshe rjes nas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / pad+mo'i nang nas brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// byol song gi skye gnasu gtogs pa rkang
196b8(rgyud): gnyis dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi de'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis thams cad nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las phyir ma
197a1(rgyud): ldog pa ro 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba de ji lta ji ltar sbyin sreg byed pa de lta de ltar de'i lus dri ma med cing yongasu dag par
197a2(rgyud): 'gyu ro// stong rtsa brgyad tshang na rig sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar bar 'gyu ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang po'i sku mthong bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba la
197a3(rgyud): leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rig sngags 'chang ba legaso leg so// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg
197a4(rgyud): gi cho gra yin no// 'di ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'jon pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no// 'di ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang brjed byed dang / bgegs dang log 'dren tshar
197a5(rgyud): gcod pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no// 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por song ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyin sreg chen po'i chog yin no// 'di ni byang chub kyi lam bla na med pa yin no// de nas
197a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dag g+ha bu brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag 'jog par mdzad do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dpang
197a7(rgyud): phyug gi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ga bu lcang lo cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang / mdung rtsa gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs pa/ rig sngags 'chang
197a8(rgyud): pa'i mdun na bzhugs te bka' stsa mo ga rig sngags 'chang ba khyod kyi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga chen po grub pa legaso// / 
197b1(rgyud): leg so// zung shig dang / mchog ji lta ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang pas ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog smras na de thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan
197b2(rgyud): ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag bzhag pa dang / phag bzhag ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang ba na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i
197b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba thob par 'gyuraro// phyir mi ldog pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas
197b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ming la bsnyen bkur byas nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su 'gro lnga
197b5(rgyud): 'gyuro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa chos 'chad pa byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du mngon sum du thob par 'gyur/ 
197b6(rgyud): nas hom khung bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi gnas bla na med pa ni pad+ma kha bye ba 'dra bar byas pa zlum po khru gsum pa sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa dang ldan pa byas/ 
197b7(rgyud): pad+ma'i snying po la ha~M khung zab su brko ba dang / thad ka kun du thugang ba brko bar bya'o// nang du pad+ma bcu drug pa 'bur du byas pa bzhag la/ tshen sna tshogs kyis pad pa de brgyan par bya'o// pad+ma'i phyi 'khor du
197b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la dri sna tshogs kyi gtor ba dang brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang ba bzhi dang / dngul gyi snod gang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon gyi chus bkang ba gser gyi sdong
198a1(rgyud): bzhi dang / ra sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bzhag pa ni gtor ma dkar gsum rnam pa sna tshogs dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs banag pa dang / dri dang me tog sna tshogs kyis
198a2(rgyud): gtor te/ phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs sbyangs la/ dkyil 'khor kun tu tshon sna lnga'i ba dan gyis mda' la brgyan te gzugs pa dang / sgo bzhi cha dbye ba dang / bum pa bzhag pa ni legs par rgyan cing dri chus
198a3(rgyud): yongasu bkang ba bya'o// sgo bzhir chos smra ba shin tu brgyan pa'i stan la 'dug ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o// grwa bzhir chos smra ba chos kyi sman legs par brgyan pa la 'dug
198a4(rgyud): nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklag par byas// gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi ma tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod pang bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang
198a5(rgyud): bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos dri zhim pos bsgo sa te/ gtsang mar byas la ril bu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis
198a6(rgyud): dbang bskuro// don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i 'bar ba rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying pos stong rtsa brgyad
198a7(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya ba ni mi smra ba byas pa'i sems dang / snying thag pa nas brtse ba dang / snying rje bar bya ba ni las bla na med pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sem
198a8(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ oM pad+ma ma pA ni/ tsa ra tsar pad+ma b+hu dze/ dzA sa dzA la sUta sha ne/ b+hu ru d+hu ru/ bi mo k+Sha b+hu dza/ da ha dang/ 
198b1(rgyud): sar+b+ba ma lam/ a mo g+ha pa ni ba ra de/ tsU hU ni rad ha/ pA le/ sha mngasha ma rmi/ a ko d+ha ra ni/ sa ma nu ra sh+mi ba ra de/ tu ra N+Da ru/ pra ba re/ a mo g+ha si d+hi/ oM b+hun+tu gan mo stu te swAhA/ de ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil
198b2(rgyud): 'khor 'bar ba zhags pa chen po'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa yin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas thal ba de rmad du byung ba chen po'i bya
198b3(rgyud): thams cad bya'o// thal ba des gang lus la byugs pa da ni sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyuraro// dpral bar thig le byas na de ma thag tu zhag bzhi pa'i rims las thar par 'gyu ro// zhags
198b4(rgyud): gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / mtshan ma dang / nyin par pa dang / nam phyed pa gnyin phyed pa dang / lo gcig pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / zhag/ bdun pa dang / rtags pa'i rims dang / lan 'ga'
198b5(rgyud): yang gnas shing phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyuraro// dpal tshad brgya 'das te 'bros par 'gyur/ mtshogs mar thig le byas nag/ don srung phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i las thar par 'gyur// khrod kyang
198b6(rgyud): phyogs bcur dpag tshad spong du 'bros par 'gyu ro// thal ba'i rdul bya rog gi mchu la gos pa phyogs kyi gnas gang du lhung ba der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / 
198b7(rgyud): grul bum dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren phyir gnas par mi 'gyuraro// thams cad 'dra so// phyogs kyi gnas der lhung na sngar 'ong bar mi 'gyuraro// snying khar thig le byas na/ nad thaMd las zar
198b8(rgyud): par 'gyu ro// lte ba'i gan su thig le byas na lto ba'i nang gi nad zad mod la sos par 'gyu ro// gdug pas zin pa la bskus na dug med par 'gyuraro// dug gi myos pa la byin na dug med par 'gyuro// thal bas
199a1(rgyud): khrus byas na byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / sngags dang / dug thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyura'o// ka bkra dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / shu phran mched pa dang / 'brum bu dang / 
199a2(rgyud): lhog pa dang / me dpal dang / 'brum phran rnams byung na chu dron po dang sbyar te bskus la mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bskus na mod la nad thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyuraro// sprin log su
199a3(rgyud): gtor na sad dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad mi 'bab po// chung ldang 'a'i log su gtor na rlung bsdam par 'gyuraro// phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyuraro// yul 'khor kun tu gtor nam
199a4(rgyud): trog dang / 'bras bu dang / yo togs dang / me tog gi mi shing dang / shing gi yal ga dang / ldumar dang / kun dga' ra 'ang gari dang / rbA dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal thams ca
199a5(rgyud): legs par bsrungs par 'gyuraro// yul 'khor la dpag tshad brgya tshun can kun tu mtshams chen po bcad pa byas par 'gyur// grong khyer gyi sgor bzhir gtor na der 'jug pa dang / phyir
199a6(rgyud): 'byung ba'i sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang khyol song gi skye gan su gtogs pa rkang gnyis
199a7(rgyud): pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / ri dgas dang / bya de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'gongs pa tsam gyis nad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyuraro// nad thams cad
199a8(rgyud): dang bral bar 'gyur// tshe yongasu rjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas nyid du gnas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas thob par 'gyuraro// dur khrod dam/ 
199b1(rgyud): ro bsregs pa'i steng du thal bas gtor na/ dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mod la dmyal ba nas thar te/ mngon par dga' ba 'am/ bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ khrod kyi
199b2(rgyud): ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ grong ngam/ khyim mam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ yul 'khor kun tu gtor na mtshams chen po bcad cing zhi ba chen por 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i pho brang gi
199b3(rgyud): sgor gtor na rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dgra thams cad las legs par bsrung bar 'gyuraro// skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor ba btsam gyi mod la skye bo mang po de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang
199b4(rgyud): bral bar 'gyu ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuro// gzhan yang bya ba stong phrag brgya byed pas rang 'dod pa la rang gi blos thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i
199b5(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sku gzugs ras la bris pa bshad par bya'o// dar ram ras gtsang ma legs par btags pa tshad khru do 'am/ khru gsum 'am khru bzhi pa
199b6(rgyud): de'i dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad tshang ga dbu lcang lo cod pan gyi brgyan gcod pan rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang g.yasu zla ba tshos pa can gyis rgyan pa/ phyag ban
199b7(rgyud): pa rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo dkrungs bcas te bzhugs bri ba ni ro za po Ta la lcug ma me tog can sna tshogs kyis gang garin pa che sna tshogs kyi lcug mas gang ba bya'o// de'i steng du rgyan zad kyis
199b8(rgyud): brgyan ga/ seng ge'i rdzi bya'o// seng ger khwa'i steng du pad+ma'i gdon bya'o// de'i steng du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs par bya ste/ pad+ma dang / mdung rtsa gsum dang / zhags pa rdzogs shing
200a1(rgyud): gzugs de phyag gdugs 'byin pa byang/ dacu gang mnan gzhal med 'ang chen po rdza rdzas rin pa che snru tshogs kyis smras pa/ dbus mthab dang bcas pabyag
200a2(rgyud): mtho ba'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa tshad dang 'thun par pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gong gi dbus de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
200a3(rgyud): mdzad dang / 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'od dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung bcas te/ gnal med khang gi nang na bzhugs par bya'o// 24
200a4(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'od mngom gang ba la 'khor bar de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bya/ de bzhin gang shegs pa'i nye 'khor kun tu 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs dang gam du
200a5(rgyud): rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba bya'o// de nyid kyi nye 'khor du lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi'o// gong gi dbus rdo rje 'chang ba khro gnyer can rdo rje gas ra bar bya'o// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / 
200a6(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen pa dang / lha'i dbang phyug chen pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi sdong po'i dbang po dang / 'on min gnas kyi lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi sgra'i bu dang / 'phrul
200a7(rgyud): dga'i sgra'i bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i lha'i bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / nu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / me lha dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / 
200a8(rgyud): dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / stobs lha dang / gang ba bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnas/ 
200b1(rgyud): me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs lag pa nas 'phrul pa dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs par bya/ 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// 
200b2(rgyud): bam po bcu bzhi pa/ lha rnams kyi phyi rol thog thag tu pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pas spras pa'i pad+ma'i phreng bas kun tu 'khor bar bya/ g.yas phyogasu 'a
200b3(rgyud): ma sgrol ma skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ ut+pal dang / nor bu rin po che phyag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgya na pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
200b4(rgyud): zhal du blta bar bya'o// de'i rgyab tu khro gnyer ma me tog sna tshogs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// yon du dkar mo zhes bya ba ni sgrol mo krung phyed du
200b5(rgyud): bcas te bzhugs pa/ ku mu da dang / nor bu rin po che lag na/ thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o// dkar mdo'i rgyab tu pad+ma mdzes dga'
200b6(rgyud): ma/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma dang / dkar mo'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lha mo thams cad kyang dbu yid tsam 'dud gan bza' dkar
200b7(rgyud): po gsol pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhengs pa bya'o// g.yas phyogs srin mo ral pa gcig ma gtum mo skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ phyag bzhi la bzhags pa dang / 
200b8(rgyud): sta dang / rdo rje lag na thogs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o// yon du pho nya mo zhal mche ba gcig pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi la bzhags pa dang / 
201a1(rgyud): dgra sta dang / rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pa phyag na thogs pa/ skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ 'brar ba'i nang na 'jig rten dbang phyug blta bar bya'o// 
201a2(rgyud): ri bo po Ta la'i ngos kyi gseb tu klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / klu'i bu mo klu'i gnas dang bcas pa bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs shing / gong du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten
201a3(rgyud): dbang phyug lnga 'tho bar bya'o// ra'i slad du lha mo dpe med ma dang / lha mo ba san ti dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dpa' lha mo dang / lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang / sgra dbyangs ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang / 
201a4(rgyud): dung can ma ste rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che thogs pa bya'o// gzhal med khang gi gong du mchod rten chen po brgyad phreng bar sbrengs la
201a5(rgyud): mchod rten gyi rgyan ji ltar brgyan pa de ltar brgyan par bya'o// mchod rten gyi 'og g.yas rol tu bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa la 'jig rten dbang phyug
201a6(rgyud): mngon du mchod par mdzad pa bya'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba phyag na rnga yab thog pa/ de'i 'og du drang srong dang / lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o// g.yon phyogasu
201a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor babya ste/ kun dga' bo dang rdo rje 'chang ba lag na rnga yab kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon du g.yog par bya'o// g.yas phyogasu 'phags pa spyan
201a8(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yon phyog su khro bo'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// de'i 'og/ 
201b1(rgyud): tu drang srong dang / lha'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs kyi g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyi rol thog zag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgya
201b2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad pad+mo'i gdan la tshad ji lta ba bzhin du skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi seng ge'i gdan
201b3(rgyud): gyi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang ba pus mo btsugs te/ me tog dang / pog phor dang / bgrang phreng lag na thogs te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du blta bar bya'o// 
201b4(rgyud): ri mo mkhan khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsang bar byas la ro sna tshogs pa'i zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// snod gsar pa gtsang ma'i nang nas tshan lhag ma ma yin pas hri
201b5(rgyud): bar bya'o// 'di yang kha zas mi gtsang ba snga ma/ dang / gos ngan pa mi btsang ba yangasu spang bar bya'o// tshig ngan pa dang / sems ngan pa yongasu spang bar bya'o// chang dang / sha dang / 
201b6(rgyud): beg tsang dang / sgos skya dang / ke'u dang 'dres pa yongasu spangs par bya'o// nyi ma re re zhing ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya'o// dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar bya'o// byams pa dang / snying
201b7(rgyud): rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la dang ba lhag par bya ste ras kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya'o// ga pur dang / gla rtsis bsgos pa'i tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya'o// dben ning
201b8(rgyud): 'du 'dzin yongasu spangs par bya'o// rmugs pa dang / gnyid yongasu spangs par bya'o// de ltar ri mo bri ba ni las legs par byas pa yin no// zla ba yang gyi ngo la bri bar bya'o// rgyu skar shin tu
202a1(rgyud): bkra shis pa dang / tshes grangs dang rim shin tu bkra shis pa la brtsam par bya'o// rgyu skar rgyal ni bkra shis pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 
202a2(rgyud): kyis bsngags pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ lha thams cad kyis rje su bzung ba yin no// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
202a3(rgyud): bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la la zhig don yod pa'i zhags
202a4(rgyud): pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par gzigs pa// byang chub chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ rnam par
202a5(rgyud): grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ ras kyi sku gzugs chen po mthong ba'i sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyis mod la sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur// 
202a6(rgyud): mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu spong ba dang / 'phags pa la bskur pa 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan
202a7(rgyud): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong bar byed pa rnams kyang mthong ba tsam la sogs pas sdig pa thams cad phye mar klog go// rnam par grol bar 'grol bar 'gyuraro// sdom pa chen
202a8(rgyud): po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyuraro// gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub snying po la mngon du gshegs pa dang / chos/ 
202b1(rgyud): / kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ba dang / 'dra bar rig par bya'o/ ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni gzhal med khang dang bcas pa'i ri bo po Ta la na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
202b2(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te mngon du bzhugs pa mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra ste/ 'di la the tsam mi bya'o// yid gnyid bskyed par mi bya'o// sems kyi skad cig gcig rab tu dang ba byas na/ bsod
202b3(rgyud): rnams kyi phung po chen po yongasu gzung bar 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs te mchog sbyin par
202b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cakyi yong su gzung bar 'gyur// lus dang sems yid las byung ba yong su dag par 'gyuro// dbang po thams cad yongasu dag par 'gyur/ 
202b5(rgyud): dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar 'a gyuraro// 'jig rten pa thams cad dga' ba dang / bla mar lta bar 'gyur/ tshe ring por 'gyuro// nad zeng dang bral bar 'gyu / 
202b6(rgyud): nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu bskal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyu ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// pad+ma'i nang nas brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la phyir mi ldog par
202b7(rgyud): 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med pa'i sku gzugs 'di gang gis mchod pa de ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd mchod par 'gyuraro// 'di ni mngal na gnas pa'i tha
202b8(rgyud): ma yin te/ phyis ma rig pa'i mun pa'i nang na du ltung bar mi 'gyuraro// de ltar na mi mnyam pa dang 'dra ba yin te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di ni ngas
203a1(rgyud): pa yin no// de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa brjod par bya'o// gang gis dran pa tsam gyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ 
203a2(rgyud): cad mngon sum du mthong nas 'dug pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon du mthong ba sbyin par mdzad pa
203a3(rgyud): dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mngon du srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sbed par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon
203a4(rgyud): du 'gyuraro// 'jig rten la sa 'das pa'i lusu 'a tho ba yong su dag par 'gyuraro// dus gsum du gshegs pa shing sa sa na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang
203a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa rngo cho ga/ sa mchog thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'am nga ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang / rig pa'i
203a6(rgyud): rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// oM a mo g+ha a ba lo ki te ma hA maN+Da la pad+ma sar+b+ba bod+hi satwa na ma skr-i te/ b+ha ra b+ha gas man+ta a ba lo ki te/ a mo g+ha ma hA bra hAM/ be Sha d+ha pad+ha ra d+ha ra ma hA kar+ra
203a7(rgyud): Ni ka bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ma hA bo d+ha ni kha d+ha bo d+hi/ pad+ma bi bo d+ha ni/ sar+b+ba pA pa an d+hu ka ra/ pra sha ma ni/ sar+b+ba dur ga hi/ b+hA ra ka ma hA kA ru Ni ka Sha hu bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bar+dz+dza/ 
203a8(rgyud): hu ru chu rug a mo ga gar+b+he/ tu ru tu ru a ma b+hA pA sha ha ste/ mu ru mu ru/ bi mo k+Sha b+hu dze/ k+Shi No k+She No/ sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi ra shud+d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ pa ri pU ra Ni/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya mAn/ 
203b1(rgyud): a ba la kA ya bad+ma b+hU Sho/ ma Ni ka na ka/ bi b+huShi ta/ bA hra/ da ma da ma/ dur dAn tA nan/ mahA dza d+hi satwa ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba de ba ga Na na ma smi ta/ ri ga na/ sta~M pa Na/ sha \u0f7f
203b2(rgyud): ha sa tsan+d+ra sUr+ya a ti ra~M ka/ rash+mi/ a ba b+hA si ha/ ma hA pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ pa ri ma/ shud+d+ha satwa/ a ba lo ki he/ mo ke shwa ra/ par ma/ kA ru Ni ka maN+Da le shwa ra/ su pa bud+d+ha/ ma hA pad+ma d+hA dza
203b3(rgyud): ra ma hA bid+yA d+ha re shwa ra d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA kA ru Ni ki/ ma hA di mok+Sha/ maN+Da la d+ha ra sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ gu h+ya/ mu rba sa ma ya d+ha ra/ ma hA ba la bid+ya d+ha ra/ ma hA ma Ni/ mo li d+ha ra/ a mi hA b+ha/ ma ku Ta d+ha ra d+hu ru d+ha
203b4(rgyud): rus man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he rashwa ra/ pa shad+ha re rahA ra/ pa ra pa ra kha ra ma/ ma hA me hri/ a ba lo ki ha/ saN+Da satwa saM ha rA ga/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi shA/ pa ri pU ra ka/ ma hA ba ra/ pra mo daM na
203b5(rgyud): na mo sU te swA hA// 'di ni thams cad rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
203b6(rgyud): gsang ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i mchog/ gsang ba'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thaMd yongasu sbyong ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rnam par stong ba/ de bzhin
203b7(rgyud): gshegs pa zad kyi rog su 'jug pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 
203b8(rgyud): tri ra bI ra/ ma hA maN+Da la/ bi shA rU pa Sha Ta pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pU ra ka/ sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwa/ na ma s+thi ta/ pa ra ma ba~M pu la/ bi ma k+Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA pA sha/ khi lo ki ta/ a mo g+ha pA sha dz+wa li ta/ ma hA dzA la a ba lo kiH/ 
204a1(rgyud): ma hA ma Ni/ biSh+Ta d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a bad+hA si ta/ dz+wa pa dz+wa la/ ma hA ga ma b+hi ra/ bi mo k+Sha pA sha d+ha ra/ ba la bo d+hung ga/ A kaR+Sha ka/ oM brah+ma rU pa/ ma hA a mo g+ha pA
204a2(rgyud): sha hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ sar+b+ba satwa/ bi lo ki ta/ ba ra pra / na mo stu te swA hA/ 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'o// 
204a3(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo /  mi'i 'argya \u0f7f/ bahA ka ru Ni ka/ ta ra ta ra/ 
204a4(rgyud): ta rA ya/ ma hA arna ba pA re/ ma hA b+hu dza bi lo kA ya hUM phaT swA hA// nye ba'i snying po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
204a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug thug rje chen po la phyag 'tshamo// oM a mo g+ha pa sha/ ma hA dA na pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pU ra/ hUM dar da ra/ bi bi d+ha Shi tsi tre/ sar+b+ba satwa/ u pa b+ho ga/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA dA na/ 
204a6(rgyud): pU dzA me g+ha/ pra ba ta ya/ ta ra ta ra/ ha ra ya mahA pad+ma pA Ni hUM phaT// 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zhags pa chen ba'i snying po ste/ gang gis yungs 'bru tsam yang sbyin pa byin te/ dran pa tsam
204a7(rgyud): gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mchod sbyin sbyin pa rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd la phyag 'tshal/ 
204a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug zug rje chen po la phyag 'tsha lo/ oM a mo Tu shI la/ se b+ha ra se b+ha ra/ b+har b+ha ram hA shud d+has twa/ badz+ra'i rtswa'i margya
204b1(rgyud): ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki te hUM phaT swA hA// gzungs 'di bsnyung ba byas te/ gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad bzung nas mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa cig dran par bya'o// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
204b2(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya'o// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims yongasu dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po'i sna
204b3(rgyud): mang po lus las 'byung zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyuraro// gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di dran na de ni rtag tu tshul khrims yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// dge slong gang zhig tshul drims nyam
204b4(rgyud): pas bsrung ba byas te/ 'di bzlas brjod byas pa tsa ma gyis mod la tshul khrims yong su dag par 'gyuraro// tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md la phyag 'tsha'o// 
204b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM ma hA bIr+ya/ a mo g+ha bi lo ki te/ ba ra ba ra/ dri D+ha bIr+ya/ ma hA ba la/ ba la ba la/ mahA
204b6(rgyud): bo d+h+r-i ga ba la bod+ha ni/ hUM phaT swA hA// gzungs 'di dus rtag tu yong su dag pa'i yid kyis dran par byas na dran pa tsam gyis mod la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// byang chub kyi
204b7(rgyud): snying po la thug gi bar du nam yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
204b8(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tsha'o// oM a mo b+hak+Shan ti/ sar+b+ba bod+hi k+Sha mi Nak+Sha Nak+Sha Na/ ma hA mai tri kA ru Na/ sar+b+ba satwa ba ta sa la/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba satwa k+Sha mi Na hUM phaT swAhA/ 
205a1(rgyud): / gzungs 'di sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis dmyal nga na gnas pa dang khyol song gi skye gnas gtogs
205a2(rgyud): ri dgas dang / bya gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang / gnas gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa de rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir gang zhig gzungs kyi mchog dran par byed na dmyal ba'i sems can las thar
205a3(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po gnas pa gang yin pa rnams grol bar 'gyu ro// nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas kyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md
205a4(rgyud): la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA a mo g+ha/ ka ru Nad+hA na sa mA d+hi/ 
205a5(rgyud): sar+b+ba bi mo kA/ a pra ki pya ka/ tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT swA hA// gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dmi gas nas yi rtse gcig tu byas te dran par byas na dran pa tsam gyi mod la
205a6(rgyud): de bsam gtam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang ting 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyis zhing thed du zhugs par 'gyuraro// bzlas brjod byas
205a7(rgyud): ba tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug / 
205a8(rgyud): rje chen po la phyag 'tshal/ oM a mo d+ha/ ma hA pradz+nyA a ba b+hA sa/ s+kha raH/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sa man+ta bud d+hi/ a ba lo ki ta/ b+ha ga bAn pradz+nyA/ a ba lo ki ta/ tsak+Shu She ma hA pra dz+nyA ba ra da pA Ni/ ma hA d+ha ra Ni b+h+ya hUM
205b1(rgyud): baT swA hA/ gdungs 'di dran pa tsam gyi mad pa shes rab tu pha rob tu phyin pa yang su rdzogs par gyur/ 'bas dang shes rab snga tshogs kyis dge ba chen par blo 'phel bar 'gyur/ rtag tu rgyun mings
205b2(rgyud): pa ru pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyuraro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i shes rab dang blor 'gyur// lan
205b3(rgyud): 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyu ro// sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi blo nyams par mi 'gyur// byang chub la
205b4(rgyud): thug pi bar dang / rab tu rmongs par mi 'gyuraro// na mod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi gzungs chen po yin no// kon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
205b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tsha'o// tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha bi mo k+Sha/ maN+Da la ma hAd b+hU ta bi ma le/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA da b+hU ta/ ma mi tA b+hA.a
205b6(rgyud): ku Ta/ d+ha ra hUM phaT swA hA// dkyil 'khor der yungs kar dang / dri chab dang ldan pa'i bum pa la sngags bzlas brjod byas nas chus kun tu chag chag gtab na chag chag gtab pa tsam gyis med la
205b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu dpag tshad cig gi nang du sa sbyangs te yongasu dag par 'gyur// ji ltar shel gang dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa dag pa dri ma med pa mdzes pa de 'dra ba'i sa gzhir 'gyur// shim
205b8(rgyud): dag pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu nyams dga' ba dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sa bzhir 'gyuraro// zhin tu sa gzhir dpa' bar 'gyu ro// sa phyogs de'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / 
206a1(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la
206a2(rgyud): rab tu gnas par 'gyuraro// de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyuraro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// nam bla na med pa yang dag
206a3(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ba'i bar du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs par 'gyuraro// gang dag byol song gi skye gnasu
206a4(rgyud): gtogs pa'i rigs dang bya de dag phyogs der 'gro zhing rab tu 'jug pa de dag thams cad yongasu grol bar 'gyuro// bde 'gro'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyur// gang gis de'i sa la lag
206a5(rgyud): par 'ongs te reg pa de dag thams cad nad dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rims dang bral ba da nga sgrib pa med pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyuro// de dag phyis su/ 
206a6(rgyud): la tshor ba'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// rtag tu bde bas tshim pa'i lusu 'gyuraro// sa yongasu sbyong ba'i rig sngag so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
206a7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tsha'o// tad+ya thA/ a~M a ma~M g+ha dru ma/ la ta brik+Sha/ she kha pa tra/ puSh+pa pha la kha Ti ba A ro ha/ na hi DA ga pu sha ri Na/ ud sa hrid/ s+'un+da
206a8(rgyud): rabras gni/ nga bi d+ha/ Shi tsi tra/ pa ri shwa d+ha ya/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ sa ma sa ma/ sa marten/ pa ri maN+Da la/ pa dza sa d+ha gam lam ga/ ri ma la ngi ma la ni rmal su pa ro shudaH/ pad+ma yud pa mi g+ha dzas ma ldan ci nad / 
206b1(rgyud): bane d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ ba ra ma mang shud+d+ha ya/ satwa hUM phakran maHtri b+hu ba ne hUM phaT swA hA/ 'dis tsan dan dang / pad+ma dang chu dang yungs kar la yongasu bzlas te/ ljon pa'i sdong po dang / me tog gi shing dang / 
206b2(rgyud): 'bras bu'i shing dang / sna tshogs pa'i lcug ma dang / rtsa dang / shing gal ba dang / sman dang / chu klung dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu dang / 'bab chu mdzes pa'i steng du gtor bar bya ste/ de rnams thams cad la/ 
206b3(rgyud): bdud rtsi blug par 'gyuraro// de rnams thams cad la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 'bras bur 'gyuraro// tha na lha'i rtsa dang / shing bel ba dang / sman dang nags kyi bdag por 'gyuraro// gang la reg pa tsam gyis/ 
206b4(rgyud): re ba de thams cad ser sna'i dri ma dang bral zhing / phrag dog spangs par 'gyuraro// mkhris pa dang / bad rgan dang / mchil ma dang bral zhing lus kyi phyi dang / nang gi dri ma zhim pa thams cad yang / 
206b5(rgyud): dag par 'gyuraro// gang yang lus kyi nang gi nad dang / gnod pa sna tshogs pa de thams cad yongasu bral bar 'gyur zhing / rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par 'ams pa dang / legs par yongasu dag pa dang / dri ma med
206b6(rgyud): par 'gyur// zheso// de la nus drus byas pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang / lha'i chu dang / byang chub yan lag gi chus khrus byas par 'gyuraro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad bkrus par 'gyur/ yan lag
206b7(rgyud): brgyad dang ldan pa'i nus bkrus par 'gyuraro// des so shing zos pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rje su dran pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyu ro// mya ngan thad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / zhags pa
206b8(rgyud): zed yongasu spangs pa dang / rtag tu kha nas ud pa la'i dri bro bar 'gyur// ngag 'jam zhing snyan par yang 'gyur zhing / ngag mnyen par yang 'gyuraro// dga' ba'i gtam byed par 'gyur zhing / skye bo zad yid
207a1(rgyud): dga' bar yang 'gyuraro// mi 'am ci'i dbyangasu yang 'gyuro// bstan bcos dang / rog zhing mo dang / gsang sngags dang / theg pa chen po thams cad thos pa tsam gyis kun tu 'dzin
207a2(rgyud): par byed cing // kha ton du yang gnas par byedado// me tog de la mnams pa dang / phreng nga mgul par 'ching bar byed pa gang yin pa de rnams kya byang chub yan lag gi me tog gi phreng ba bcings pa
207a3(rgyud): 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyu ro// sna tshog su dag par yang 'gyur te/ lha'i dri dang / reg pa dang / yang dag par ldan par 'gyuro// lce pad+ma'i mdab ma dang mtshan
207a4(rgyud): bar yongasu dag par 'gyur// ldan so dang mtshungs pa'i 'dog tu gyur/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la gtam sgra sa pa de rtag tu dbang du 'gyur/ shi 'angs
207a5(rgyud): skyeb rjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur// tshe rab dran par yang 'gyuraro// zhes pa'o// 'bras bu dang / me tog dang / chu dang / rags kyi
207a6(rgyud): bdag po dang / rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman yongs sbyong ba'i sngag so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
207a7(rgyud): thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tsha'o// tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha a ma le tri ma le/ bi ma le/ niR+Ya le/ di bya ba ri shud+d+ha sar+b+ba ma lo pa kaR+Shi te/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa da ra de pra ba ra pa ro rashud+d+ha/ ma hA ma Ni rat+na kA
207a8(rgyud): ya pa ri shud d+he ma Ni ma Ni sho d+ha ni ma hA a mo b+ha tsin+ta ma/ Ni shud+d+he/ hr-i da ya shud+d+he kA ya niR+Ya la ma hA ma Ni pa ri kud+d+ha/ phu ru hu ru pra ba ra pa NI mahA b+hu ba ra de tu ru ru ya hAs tra btas le/ 
207b1(rgyud): / sho d+ha ya mAM sarba su bi shud+d+ha ma le swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis/ rig sngags 'chang gi bdag nyid kyi lus yongasu sbyang bar bya ste/ tsan dan gyi chu ba dang / gur gum dang / bla rtsi'i chu dang / ga pur gyi
207b2(rgyud): chu dang / yungs kar dang /  byung lnga bsres pas/ rdza gsar pa'i bum pa bkang de/ rig sngags 'di stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya'o// sa dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing lan bdun du btab par
207b3(rgyud): bya'o// khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la khro bo'i rgyal pos/ bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o// khrus byas pa tsam dang / dbang bskur ba tsam gyis bdag rang gi phyi nang yongasu dag cing dri ma med pa
207b4(rgyud): 'gyu ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / dug dang bral bar 'gyuraro// nyon mongs pa dang nad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// / ba la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la so/ 
207b5(rgyud): pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa thaMd yongasu spangs par 'gyur zhing bar chad bya ba'i phyir rig sngags
207b6(rgyud): 'chang ba'i drung du slar 'ong nus par mi 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang bde bar sgrub pa dang / bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / nam 'tsha'i bar du bde bar gnas pa dang / dri ma thad spangs
207b7(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa zad mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong ste shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// 
207b8(rgyud): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyu ro// pad+mo'i nang nas rdzus te skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyuraro// rgyan zad
208a1(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa dang / lus mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dang / tshe rangs dran par 'gyuraro// mthar byang chub la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi ning nas sang
208a2(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur// rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton byed par 'gyur// gzhan
208a3(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i mdo sde gzhung sna tshogs rnam pa du ma kha ton byed par 'gyuraro// bskal pa stong phrag brgya tshun chad du skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// 
208a4(rgyud): a mo b+ha pad+ma/ ri ma le/ pra sa ra/ sa man+ta/ mu khe swA hA// dkyil 'khor mar phye ste thig gdang ba'i sngagaso// oM a mo b+ha bi ba~M d+hi/ rU ba bi tsi tra/ gan d+ha/ ra san d+ha ma/ pra bar/ b+hu dza swAhA/ tshon rtsi
208a5(rgyud): sngags dang / sku gzugs bzhag par nga mtshon cha'i rtags bri ba'i sngag so// oM a mo b+ha san+ta pa rim d+ha la/ pA ka ban d+ha hUM/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa
208a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsdam par bya'o// oM a mo g+ha/ sa man+ta/ da sha dig ma hA si man/ dan d+ha ya/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ hUM phaT swA hA// yungs kar dang tshu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas mtshams
208a7(rgyud): bcad pa'o// oM a mo b+ha rak+Sha Na/ bA sha ha ste/ b+ha ru d+ha ru swA hA// yungs kar dang dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bdag srung ba'o// oM a mo g+ha/ tsU Da~M min/ hu ru hu ru/ rA ba
208a8(rgyud): ba sha ban d+he hUM swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas spyi gtsug bcing ba'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha dza la bi ma le/ su ru su ru sA hA/ dzi mul lan nyid shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjon
208b1(rgyud): byas pas khrus bya ba'i sngags// oM a mo g+ha mri ta/ bin+du tsa ra tsa ra sA hA/ nye reg bya ba'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha di bya bas+t+re tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ gos kyi sngagasaso// oM a mo b+ha b+hu dza kaka ba tsa
