208b2(rgyud): de tsau ri tsi ri swA hA/ go cha'i sngags yin te yungs kar dang / gur bum gyi chus bya'o// oM a mo g+ha brah+ma b+hu dze pAr+yan te na pra sa ra swA hA// mchod phyir thogs kyi sngag so// oM a mo g+ha tsU Dam
208b3(rgyud): Ni pad+me/ a bi Shiny+tsa ya/ ma ma sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ma Ni ma Ni swA hA// dbang bskur ba'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ba sun d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra ni/ maN+De hUM/ stan gyi gsang sngagaso// oM
208b4(rgyud): a mo g+ha sa maN+Da brkyang ke b+hu bi swAhA/ skyil mo bkrung bca' ba'i sngags// oM a mo d+ha su ra d+hi/ pad+me ba ra pa ra hUM/ me tog gi sngag so// oM a maM g+ha bi bi d+ha/ gan d+ha/ pra sa raM/ 
208b5(rgyud): pUr+Na b+hU dza swA hA/ dri'i sngags/ ma~M tho thai bi bi d+ha le pa na pra ba ri bar pi ra swA hA/ thugs pa'i sngags// ma~M a mo g+ha ga gan ster nam ye b+hu ru b+hu ru ts+tsha/ 'dug pa'i sngags
208b6(rgyud): oM oM mo g+he shuk+ka sa re sar sa/ a gra d+ha ra b+hi d+ha ra hUM/ gtor ma'i sngags te thaMd du bya'o// oM a mo b+he/ pra ba ra/ nu pi mo ki ni/ ki ri ki ri hU~M/ zas dang gtor ma'i sngag so// oM bi'iH
208b7(rgyud): a mo g+ha/ pha la/ pa ra pa ra hUM/ 'bras bu'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha ad ta gan d+ha ba re hUM/ mchod yon gyi sngag so// oM a mo g+ha/ bi bi d+ha/ ma Ni b+hU Sha Na/ ba ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM rgyan dang / 
208b8(rgyud): thod dang / dang spyang dang / mda' dang / tshon sna lnga dang / thig skud kyi sngag so// oM a mo g+ha/ bi bi d+ha/ b+ha dza ne/ dza ya dza ya swA hA/ snod kyi sngags te dzad du sbyar/ oM a mo g+ha/ pra ba
209a1(rgyud): / ra b+ha ba na/ d+hU be thar thar swA hA// gtsug pa'i sngags/ oM a mo b+ha na ma skar gsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ oM dza le hUM phyag 'tshal ba dang tham ma sbyar ba'i sngags/ 
209a2(rgyud): oM a mo b+ha tsakre du ru du ru pra du ru swA hA/ ngaskor ba'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta b+ha ba ne b+ha ba b+ha ba swA hA/ spyan drang pa'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+he tsin+ta ma na~M pra kaR+Sha ye ru ru ru
209a3(rgyud): ru swA hA// gsol ba gdab pa'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha nirman+ta Na/ bi mo k+Sha maN+Da le mi li mi li swA hA/ sman gsan dbab pa'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha ma hA reshrI dz+wa la sa ha sra dz+wa la
209a4(rgyud): dz+wa la sa man+te swAhA/ mar me'i sngag so// oM a mo bA rA ga ha su bras rab s+dza bA d+hA na bis rdzi ta si sa ra sa ra hU~M phaT sAr+tha/ A ra gang sheg su gsol ba'i sngags// mau ma mo b+ha rA tsA ldanaH
209a5(rgyud): sam n+ta ma hA sa ma ye hrIHhU~M phaT Ar+tha/ dam gagi rdzas so// oM ma sam+me prA 'a / sa ras ra pras hA d+hu te kA bar+d+ha rA d+ha ma ts+tsha hU~M phaT swA hA/ gsang sdugs 'das
209a6(rgyud): du dang / mod kar dang / ran dang / rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang / gtor ma dkar po dang / tshogs chen po'i bdag po'i gtor ma sbyin pa dang / me tog dang / gdug pa sbyin pa byas na phyis bgegs byed mi nus par
209a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// 'jig rten 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// phyag rgya de nas brjod bya ste// gang gis gzung ba tsam byis ni// sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa dang / dug rnams thad
209a8(rgyud): rnam par bcom// rnam grol dkyil 'khor rigs kyi ni// dam tshig phyag rgya yang dag yin// lag gnyis pad+ma 'dar byas la/ sor mo rnams ni mnyam gzhag ste/ phung mo lcags kyu 'dra bar bya/ lag
209b1(rgyud): gnyis mnyam par bzhag pa yi// phyag rgya rnam grol dam tshig 'di// don yod zhags par byin gyis brlabs// 'jig rten 'das pa khyad par gyis/ lam gyi 'bras bu thob par byed// oM pad+ma b+hUrma
209b2(rgyud): pad+ma ri ma le swAhA// dam tshig rtse mo'i rtseng gas pas/ rdo rje pad+ma rtag tu bya/ phung mo cung bzad bskums nas ni// lag gnyis pad+mo 'dra bar bya/ gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba// 'jig rten rnams kyi dbang
209b3(rgyud): phyug dag/ mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ba yin// rnam grol phyag rgyas dgas med par/ sangs rgyas mtshungs med 'gyur ba yin// byang chub sems dpa' kun gyis ni// phyag byas pa yi phyag rgya'// 
209b4(rgyud): rnam grol dkyil 'khor rmad du byung / oM pad+me su pad+me/ bi mo k+Sha maN+Da la// pad+ma la/ pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/ rdo rje bcing bam nyam gzhag ste/ rdo rje pad+mo gung mo ni/ bskums na de bzhin gshegs
209b5(rgyud): kun gyi// rnam grol gsung ba'i phyag rgya 'di// yang da ga grol bar rab tu stan/ phyag rgya 'di ni bstan pas ni// ngan par byas pa zad 'jig/ oM a ma g+ha badz+ra pad+ma b+hu dze mi li mi li swA hA/ lag gnyis
209b6(rgyud): thal mo khang stong las// mdor na nor bu 'dra bar bcing // nor bu'i phyag rgya rdo rje 'dra// yid bzhin nor bur brjod pa yin// las ni don yod thad byed// don yod mchod pa'i char 'bebs pa shing // ngan yod par
209b7(rgyud): byin drug rdzogs// don yod sangs rgyas rnams dang ni/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yin// don yod rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang // mtshams med lnga po sbyong bar mdzad// oM a mo g+ha ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ni
209b8(rgyud): pad+ma Ni swA hA/ rdo rje pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar/ pad+ma 'bye 'dra bar rgyas// bung mo lhag kyu 'dra ba yi/ phyag rgya 'di ni mchog tu bzang // phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis// 'bras bu chen po rmad du byung / 'jig rten/ 
210a1(rgyud): / 'das pa khyang par 'phags/ dus gsum sangs rgyas mthong ba yin/ oM a mo g+ha/ badz+rem lnga phre dza le su dz+wa le/ ma hA dz+wa le swA hA/ snying kar rdo rje 'dra nyid/ rdo rje bcing ba phun sum tsha/ 
210a2(rgyud): 'dzub ma lcags kyu 'dra ba ni// bcing bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di// gzi brjid chen po dag dang ri/ stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang // thams cad grub par byed pa'i gnas// thams cad grub par rab tu sbyin// 'jig
210a3(rgyud): rten 'das pa grub pa che// sangs rgyas nyid phyir bla na med// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa grub// gsang sngags grub pa bA na me// oM a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ sid d+he/ a ba lo kA ya sid
210a4(rgyud): / ma hAbi pu le sing dzA ku ru ku ru swA hA/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam bzhag sde// gung mo bshibs te sbeng ba dang / srin lag mthe bang so sor 'gyad// gung mo yid tsam dgus bya ba/ pad+ma'i dbang phyug
210a5(rgyud): sems dpa' che// 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma ste// rtag tu rnam grol dkyil 'khor ni// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis// phyag rgya byas pa 'di yin mo// phyag rgya 'di dang don
210a6(rgyud): yod pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya de dag mthong ba ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong ba dang 'dra ba yi no// phyag rgya mchog 'di mthong ba ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang
210a7(rgyud): 'dra ba yin te/ phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyuraro// phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam gyi mthong bas mod la dam tshig thams cad shes par 'gyuraro// mthong ba dang bzung ba tsam gyi mod la 'bras bu chen
210a8(rgyud): po 'thob cing mod la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
210b1(rgyud): phyag thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM a ba lo ki ta/ ma hA kud d+ha satwa sa ra sa ra/ sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa/ kun+d+ha la/ a mi tA b+hU ma ku Ta/ d+ha ra/ dzA Ta ma ku Ta/ na pa badz+ren+na/ mar+t+ti ta tsa ra tsa ra/ se d+ha
210b2(rgyud): ra b+hA ba Ne shwa ra pad+ma b+hA dzo swA hA/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub snying po'i lam gyi 'bras bu ston pa/ rtag tu cheg zhid cu bla ma'i 'jig rten mgon
210b3(rgyud): chos kyi dkyil 'khor bskor ba yin mo/ phyag rgya bdun ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongasu bskur ba yin te/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de gang du bcings shing phyag rgya mchog bzung ba ni phyag
210b4(rgyud): rgya chen po bye ba phrag brgya bcings par 'gyu'o// rlung ra 'gyuraro// de dag thams cad mchod pa dang / bstan bkur byas pa ra 'gyuraro// snyad par 'gyur// ming 'dzin pa byas par 'gyur// phyag
210b5(rgyud): bdun po de dag ni gsang sngags sgrub pa thams cadad nga/ kun tu las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// thams cad byed pa 'i phyag rgya 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yin no// 
210b6(rgyud): zhig phyag rgya de dag bcings pa mthong zhing khrus legs par byas te/ gtsang mas sgrub par byed pa 'di ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur sngon gyi sgribs pas dmyal ba mthong bar mi 'gyur/ phyag rgya bcings pa tsam
210b7(rgyud): gyis mod la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun gyi drung du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po kun tu bzung bar 'gyuraro// pha rol tu
210b8(rgyud): phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyuraro// phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rab tu thob par 'gyuraro// mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa
211a1(rgyud): la bskur ba 'debs pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba rnams kyi ci ste phyag rgya bzung ba tsam dang / bstan pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par
211a2(rgyud): zhig par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongasu bzung bar 'gyuraro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa rnams las
211a3(rgyud): legs par bsrungs par 'gyu ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / gzhon nu rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
211a4(rgyud): srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rgyun tu rjes su 'brang ba byed par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad dga' ba mthong bar 'gyuraro// mchod rten du 'gyur ba yin par 'dod pa
211a5(rgyud): dang / lus ring bsrel gyi snying po yin par 'gyur// rdo rje ltar 'dregs pa'i lusu 'gyuraro// dug gis mi tshugs mes ma yin mtshon gyis ma yin/ nus ma yin/ dbyigs dug sa
211a6(rgyud): 'jigs pas ma yin/ seng ges ma yin/ gcan zan gtum pos ma yin/ dug mi zad pas ma yin/ rkun po dang / mi rgod kyis ma yin// khyim rdibs pas ma yin/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i
211a7(rgyud): gdon yang ma 'ong bar mi 'gyur/ nad thams cad 'jug par mi 'gyur/ lus la dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / sbod stong gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// rtag tu sdig pa can gyi rmi lam
211a8(rgyud): mthong bar mi 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba mthong bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' lta ba mthong bar mi 'gyuraro// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras garigs dbang phyug
211b1(rgyud): mthong ste/ rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'dis mthong bar 'gyed par 'gyuro// rtag tu yon tan dang bsod nams 'bar ro// 
211b2(rgyud): dpal gyi lus la shin tu 'bor ba'i lusu 'gyu ro// thams cad du 'di mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur te/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis
211b3(rgyud): mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyuraro// lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du yang dgyes par 'gyur te/ mchod par byed// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bdag la tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug
211b4(rgyud): dang / rang phyug chen po dang / ga shin rje dang / lnga dang / lus ngan pa dang / gnon nu dang / drang srang gi chags rnams kyis mchod par 'od pa chen par 'gyur/ sems can thams ca
211b5(rgyud): kyang rtag tu de mthong bar 'dod par 'gyuraro// gtu dgyes par ston pa bzhed par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang mar byas la dri sna tshogs
211b6(rgyud): kyis lus bsku ba dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug pa byas la/ tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyis lag pa gnyis bskus te/ ga pur dang / gla rtsis bskos pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar ras kyi sku
211b7(rgyud): gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil makrung bcas te 'dug nas phyag rgya 'di bcing bar
211b8(rgyud): bya'o// mchod rten ring srel can gyi drung du phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// sangs rgyas la mchad pa'i tshogs yan chab la sogs pa 'bul bar bya'o// byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems su bya'o// sems
212a1(rgyud): / can thams cad la lhag par brtse bdag da rje sems bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad ma thu gcig pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o// phags pa sgram
212a2(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bya'o// sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni bcing ba byas na phyag rgya bya ba phrag bdun bcings
212a3(rgyud): par 'gyu ro// de nas mthu brjod par bya'o// thu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rang bzhin gyi sku mngon du mthong ba yino// 
212a4(rgyud): rgyal po btsun mo'i nang du 'am/ skye bo mang po'i mang du tshogs pa dang / dge slong gi tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du 'am/ 'khor du bcad pa'i nang du 'am/ rig byed pa ni tshogs pa
212a5(rgyud): dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang khye'u dang / bu mo dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang bcas pa de dag gi nang de dgos don yang
212a6(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul 'jig rten las 'das pa med la mngon du mthong ba dang / 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ong ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'chi ba dang / skye ba dang / skyes nas yang dag par dge ba dang / mi dge
212a7(rgyud): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dge ba dang mi dge bas shi ba dang / skyes nas phyug po 'am/ dbul po 'am/ rgyal po thob pa 'am/ lha'i longs spyod dang / lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khya
212a8(rgyud): 'jug dang / rtag tu dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ba dang / klu'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gsang ba pa rnams kyis dmyal mi bzad par skye ba dang / mtshams med pa la thug gi hA
212b1(rgyud): du mthong ba dang / bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs du ma sna tshogs par skye bar mthong ba dag 'jig rten mgon po'i mthus mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten
212b2(rgyud): pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba de dag thams cad bstan par bya ste/ rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / tshor 'bab pa dang / shin tu char 'bab pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par 'bab
212b3(rgyud): ba dang / dar ba dang / rgud pa dang / 'byor pa dang / mi 'byor pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / nor dang / 'bru rnyed pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'bri ba dang / lo nyes pa mthong ba dang / 'khor ba na da ltar gyi las gang cung
212b4(rgyud): rang legs par byed pa dang / zhes pa byed pa dang / da ge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ 'bri ba 'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ skye ba legs par skye ba 'am/ ngan par skye ba dang / bu 'byung ba/ bu lo 'am bu
212b5(rgyud): mo 'am/ bu bzang po 'am/ bungan pa 'am/ bsod nam sa can nas/ bsod nams med pa mngal na gnas pa de dag bden pa nyid du mthong ste/ las kyi tshig legs par byas pas the
212b6(rgyud): tsor mi bya'o// tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin mtshan brjod par bya mi dgos kyi bzlas brjod dang / gtor ma dang / gtsang sbra dang / bkru ba gal dang / shin tu khrus bya ba dang / gos gtsang ma bcad pa
212b7(rgyud): dang / bden par smra ba dang / byams pa'i sems dang bla ma la legs par mnyan pa de brdung ba kho nar bya'o// zas dang / skam gtsang ma dang / chang dang / sha dang / bag tsong dang sgog sgra dang ke'udung / 
212b8(rgyud): 'dres par byas pa'i 'dres pa'i ras yongasu spang ba dang / shin tu 'phags pa dang / de dag ni khyab par 'dod pas yongasu spang bar byas nas sa 'di ni mod la thams cad mngon du mthong bar
213a1(rgyud): / 'gyu dka' thub snang ba la banas sems ma d+ya/ ma bus pa ma bya zhog tu yang ma byug/ rjesu bstan pa de dag ni mchog yin no/ rtsub par bya ba ma chag des/ 
213a2(rgyud): mi 'jig rten dbang phyug mngon pas bka' stsal pa yin/ dngus las ma song chu mang du sang bcu drug pa byas la 'angs las pad+ma'i gdan khru gang gi chang sdang bu dang btsas par bya'o/ 
213a3(rgyud): yang ga gang du dngum la ma/ khas las 'phags baspyanas brdzogs dbang phyugadon yod pa'i nags pa bya ste chad sor bzhi ba/ gdan pad+ma phyug 'azhi la mdung rtsi gsum pa dang / nag
213a4(rgyud): ba dang / bad+ma dang / ning bu rin pa ma thogs par bya ni 'jog sbyong lags par byas pa/ 'jam po 'od phyin pa mdu spyad par bya'o// de nas ring sngabs 'dang pas ma long gdo
213a5(rgyud): gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi skul ring sabazhag par bya'o// gapung dang / khwa rtsis skul mchad par byag// mi ling gi nye 'khor thog thag tu dngul gyi ma tog dang gas
213a6(rgyud): khyi ma tag rin pa che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba gdags par bya'o/ dbang bskur ba'i dar dgas par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long de la nyi ma re re zhing dus bsum
213a7(rgyud): du don yad pa'i zhags pa'i snang pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ ji brtsam brgyad stong tshang gi bang du bya'o// khra bo'i rgyal po dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas me lang 'bar bar 'gyur/ 
213a8(rgyud): bcig la nang mdag snga chags par 'bar bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgra gzugs de las lha rdzas kyi chu 'jug ga'od zir sna chags 'byung / de nas rab sngags
213b1(rgyud): ba'i lus 'bar zhing dga' bar 'gyu ro// don yod par dga' ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhing mo grub pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// lus shin tu dri ma
213b2(rgyud): med cing yong su dag par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa 'grub pa bstan par bya dgos pas/ 
213b3(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang bas sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyar khru bzhi 'phang du khrud pa byas pa shin tu mkhregs pa shin tu 'jam par bya'o// thig skud kyis rnam par phye ste/ tshan
213b4(rgyud): sna tshogs rnam par dbye zhing sgo bzhi rnam par phye nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnam par phye ste/ pad+ma mdab ma brgyad tshon gyis gsal bar dri ning pad+ma'i dkyil du ga sar dang
213b5(rgyud): ze ba bya'o// stegs bu gru bzhi la rin po che sna tsha/ kyis rgyan pa dang / stegs bu bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi ga/ cha bgos pa/ gtum pa/ 'jig par byed pa'i gzugs dri ba
213b6(rgyud): bya'o// stegs du'i dbus kyi gnas par bar du lha dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / lus ngan po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen
213b7(rgyud): po dang / lha dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / ral pa gcig pa dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo dang / khro gnyer ma dang / rdo rje pha nya mo rnams tshon sna tshogs kyis zhing rgyan thaMd kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna
213b8(rgyud): tshogs thogs pa bya'o// stegs bu'i phyi rol tu mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje phreng ba dang / pad+ma'i phreng ba kun tu bya'o// phreng ba'i bar dbus dang / grwa'i bar du lha mo brgyad dang / 'dzi
214a1(rgyud): byed ma dang / dpe med ma dang / ba san ti dang / dpal sna dbyangs dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dung can ma dang / bus pa ngan ti rnams d+har thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna
214a2(rgyud): tshogs dang rin po che'i sdod thogs par bya'o// phyi rol thog thag tu brang ba'i bar bar du dri sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsku zhing tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gu gyi mchod pa sna tshogs
214a3(rgyud): bya'o// ba pur dang / bla rtsis mchod cig dkyil 'khor kun tu dar sna tshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang / mda' dang / rta babs kyis brgyan par bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhi cung pang gis bkang ste
214a4(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhi gtor ma dkar gsum gyis dgang bar bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhir ma chod yon gyi chu bzhag par byas// snang brgyad ro sna tshogs kyi gta
214a5(rgyud): mas dbang bar bya'o// 'bras bu rnam pa sna mo/ bzhag par bya'o// ba ras bza' ba dang / gtor ma sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// dri sna tshogs dang / byabs pas dngul gyi snod bkang
214a6(rgyud): ste bzhag par bya'o// dngul gyi pog por brgyad/ tsan dan nas ga ru dang / dU ru ka dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / sra rtsi pog dang / srog gis gang bar bya zhing bdug spos sna tshogs pa sreg/ 
214a7(rgyud): dngul dang / zangs dang / gser gyi me tog gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du btsal du dgra mo// phyi'i dkyil 'khor du/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog bcal du dbum par bya ste/ phreng ba rnams khor yug
214a8(rgyud): tubaskor nas bzhag pa te/ de la yang me long legs par brgyan par byas nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma'i ba sar dang / ze'u 'brul shar du phyogs par bzhag par bya'o// rig sngags
214b1(rgyud): 'chang gtsang ma khrus byas gos gtsang bsgo bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / bya ba thams cad byas nas/ me long la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo dkrung du 'dug par gyur nas
214b2(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod dbul bar bya ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskuro// dbang bskur ba tsam gyi
214b3(rgyud): med la 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum dang / 'khor chen po'i dbus/ ma long gi dbus dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mthang ste/ me lang
214b4(rgyud): gi dbus de nas rig sngags 'chang de la le gso zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang na po leg so legs// bdag la don yod pa'i me long la 'beb
214b5(rgyud): pa'i de kho na nyid dam par gyur pa 'di thaMd yang dag par mthong ste/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lA kyi 'bras bu bla na med pa zhes bya ba yongasu
214b6(rgyud): dag pa nyid do// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis 'bras bu chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mtshungs pa med pa thob bo// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 'jig rten dang / 
214b7(rgyud): 'dzag rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga dang cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya drung ngo // ga sngags 'chang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga gang 'a
214b8(rgyud): ba smros shig/ de thams cad sbyin par bya'o// zhe so// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis/ mchog gang don du gnyer ba de blangs na tha~Md 'phral nyid du sbyin par byedo// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin
215a1(rgyud): pa der/ kun nas 'ongs pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rmangs rigs dang / rje rigs dang / rgyal po dang
215a2(rgyud): blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / 'dun na 'don pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor du kun 'ongs pa dang / bsod nams dang ldan pa 'am/ bsod nams dang mi ldan pa 'am/ yongasu dag pa 'am lta ba
215a3(rgyud): ngan pa 'am/ gzhan dmyal ba pa'i sems can gti mug gi mun pa la lhan pa/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos
215a4(rgyud): spong ba/ gang yin pa de rnams thams cad la 'ang / 'phags pa spyan ras de gzigs dbang phyug gi lus de la ston par byed/ thams cad du smra bar byed/ yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed/ 
215a5(rgyud): thams cad du rang gi las la dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de thams cad ston par byed do// rib sngags kyis tshim rkun dang / gdol pa dang /  rig sngags spong zhing
215a6(rgyud): nyams par byed pa dang / rig sngags sun 'byin par byed pa dang / rig sngags la ma dad cing gus pas mi nyan pa de'i mi mthong ba ni ma gtogs te/ gzhan du na rang gi las kyi 'bras bu sdug bsngal
215a7(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs nges par 'byung bar mthong ngo // de nas sems can de rnams gang 'dod pa'i don yid la byed pa 'jug ste/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil
215a8(rgyud): 'khor chen po ru/ rang rang gi 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mthong bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
215b1(rgyud): / mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang mthong ngo // po Ta la ka'i ri bo'i gzhal yas khang rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam pa
215b2(rgyud): 'phrul pa dang bcas pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal yas khang na lha dang klus yongasu bskor ba mthong ngo // gzhan ji ltar da ltar gyi dge ba dang / 
215b3(rgyud): dge ba 'am/ lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa 'am/ nad dang / 'chi ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / rang gi dmag tshogs dang / 'a rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / g.yul dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'jigs pa dang
215b4(rgyud): rgyal ba 'am/ 'pham pa 'am/ brlag pa 'am/ ma brlag pa 'am/ yams dang / char ches pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i mar ram/ char med pa 'am// rlung ngam/ sad dam/ tshad pa yang rung ste de dag thaMd
215b5(rgyud): mthong // nar dang ldan pa 'am/ nyams pa 'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ yo thog gam/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu 'phel ba yang rung ste/ de dag tham sa cad mthong // chom rkun dang / rkun po dang / dug dang / 
215b6(rgyud): mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa 'am/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa de zad mthong ba// nor chen po 'am/ nor med pa de zad mdza
215b7(rgyud): // 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mthong ngo // bu thob pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul dang / ljongs thob pa dang / bud med thob pa de thams cad mthong ste/ 'di la dogs pa dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom bskyed
215b8(rgyud): par mi bya zhing / mchog tu dad pa dang / gus pas shin tu 'bad de/ cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi
216a1(rgyud): ga rdzogs so// de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa
216a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po gsungs pa cho ga zhib mo'i nye bar spyod pa dang / bcas pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / 
216a3(rgyud): ras ris shin tu zab pa/ shin tu gting dpag dka' zhing / shin tu rgya che la/ shin tu sgrub dka' ba dang / dkyil 'khor mang po dang / phargya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / sa ris mang po yongasu bsgrags pa rnams
216a4(rgyud): nirirab rib dang bral bar mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po dugacan pa zab pa lta bu// lhun po chen po dang mtshungs pa lta bu/ smig sgra lta bu/ rdul phra rab lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
216a5(rgyud): yeng shes dang mtshungs pa lta bu 'grang ba las yang dag par 'das pa/ ma tshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ tshad med pa/ bskal pa'i drangs kyis dgrang bar bya ba med pa'i bskal pa'i tshad ma dang / 
216a6(rgyud): bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad ma dang / lha'i yul gyi tshad ma dang / klu'i yul gyi tshad ma dang / sems can gyi tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad ma dang / 
216a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan la snang ba'i tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kun tu snang ba'i tshad ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshad ma dang / bdud kyi yul gyi tshad ma rnam
216a8(rgyud): kyis thog mar dmigs pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das bar du yang dmigs pa ma lags bcom ldan 'das bar du yang dmigs pa ma lag so// tha mar yang lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
216b1(rgyud): / de ci ltar yongasu shes par bgyi/ sgrub thabs kyi tshogs bsgrub par bya ba ni du zhig lags/ gsang sngags ni du zhig phyag rgya ni du zhig/ dkyil 'khor ni du zhig/ bri bar bya ba'i phyag rgya ni du zhig/ lag par
216b2(rgyud): phyag rgya ni du zhig/ bdug pa'i sbyor ba ni du zhig/ mig sman ni du zhig/ ril bu ni du zhig/ bdug pa ni du zhig/ ras ris ni du zhig/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni du zhig/ snying po ni du zhig/ nye ba'i snying po ni du zhig/ 
216b3(rgyud): khro bo'i gsang sngags ni du zhig/ drag po ni du zhig/ zhi ba ni du zhig/ yi ge gcig pa ni du zhig/ yi ge gnyis pa ni du zhig/ yi ge gsum pa ni du zhig/ yi ge bzhi pa ni du zhig/ yo ge lnga pa ni du zhig/ yi ge drug
216b4(rgyud): pa ni du zhig/ yi ge bdun pa na du zhig/ yi ge brgyad pa ni du zhig/ yi ge dgu pa ni du zhig/ yi ge bcu pa ni du zhig lags/ sbyang bar gnas pa ci ltar lags/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo ni ci ltar/ khrus kyi cho ga ni
216b5(rgyud): ci ltar/ gos bsgo ba ni ci ltar/ phyogs bcing ba ni ci ltar/ kyi 'khor bcing ba ni ci ltar/ gtsug tor ba cing ba ni ci ltar/ bdag srung ba ni ci ltar/ gzhan srung ba ni ci ltar/ 
216b6(rgyud): grogs srung ba ni ci ltar/ slob ma srung ba ni ci ltar/ rab tu 'jug pa ni tsaM ltar/ phyag bya ba ni ci ltar/ bskor ba bya ni ci ltar/ mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil bul ba ni ci ltar/ gtor ma 'dul
216b7(rgyud): ba ni ci ltar/ me tog 'bul ba ni ci ltar/ bdug pa ni ci ltar/ dran ci ltar/ mar me na ci ltar/ nye rag ni ci ltar/ lha ba nos ni ci ltar/ thams cad du spyan sa ni ci ltar/ snyan gsan dbang ni
216b8(rgyud): ci ltar/ rmi la ma bskul ba ni ci ltar/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni ci ltar lags/ zhi ba can ni du zhig lags/ rgyas pa can ni du zhig/ mdza spyod canani du zhig/ zhags pa ni du zhig rdo rjen du rig parlan du zhing/ 
217a1(rgyud): gang sheg su gsol ba ni du zhig/ nye ngar 'pho bar byed pa'i bya ba ni du zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba dang / rgyu batshan ci 'dra ba dang / kun tu
217a2(rgyud): spyad par 'gyur ba ni ming dashes// bcom ldan 'das bdag las sgrub pa'i cho ga du zhig gau rje su 'brang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ci lhar phyi ma'i dus/ phyi ma'i chen/ sems can rnams kyi rjesu 'brang bar
217a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ dngos grung du zhig rjesu stsal bar brgya/ ci ltar sems can bla na med par 'gyur bar dgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di dag la bdag 'khrugs par gyur cing / bdag la slob pa mdo// bcom ldan 'das
217a4(rgyud): bdag gis shes par mi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba de dgang dag la gsung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tshom mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das
217a5(rgyud): kyis bdag gi the tshom bcad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas shAkya thub pas zhu ba yongasu zhus par gyur
217a6(rgyud): ba gsan nas// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di/ dri ba yongasu dris pa ni leg so leg so// lag na rdo rje khyod la yang su 'dri bar
217a7(rgyud): byed pa'i spobs pa skyes pa ni/ lag na rdo rje sos can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir don gyi ched yong su zhus pa'i phyir dang / rig sngags 'chang zed kyi mchog 'grub pa don du yang su zhus pa'i phyir dang / 
217a8(rgyud): nod rje 'di ni mchog tu rmad du byung bas te/ phyi bzhin du rjesu 'dra // lag nardo rje 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang mamus pa'o// lag nod rma na yod zhags pa'i spong ba'i cho gzhib mo'i rgyal po ched/ 
217b1(rgyud): pa'i cho ga/ rgya mtsho chen po dug can pa dang / zab par mtshungs pas te/ 'di ni gting dpag dka' ba'o// lag na rdo rje/ rgya mtsho chen po thigs pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar nus kyi/ lag na rdo rmed na yod zhags
217b2(rgyud): pa'i snying po'i tshad ni bzung bar mi nus so// lag na rdo rje/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni rdul phra rab tu gtor ba'i grangs kyi mthar thug par bya bar nus shig slar yang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tu gnas par 'dod pas rang
217b3(rgyud): gi gan su rab tu gzhag par nus kyi/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i tshad ni gzung bar mi nuso// de ltar rgya che ba/ de ltar gting dpag dka' ba/ de ltar zab pa ste/ lag na rdo rje/ 'das pa dang / 
217b4(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa dang / da lhar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyis mkhyen pa dang / gting dpag par mi nuso// don yod / gas pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i tshad 'dzin par ni
217b5(rgyud): mi nus so// lag na rdo rje sgyum lta bu dang yin pa de dang / snying po dang / ting la dzin gang yin pa de dang / zhags pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul ba 'di byang chub sems dpa'
217b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi// sems can rnams kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshag su mthong bar byed de/ sems can thaMd bskasgral ba'i ched
217b7(rgyud): dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'o// lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thad du mnyam
217b8(rgyud): par 'gro ba ste/ gang du chu dang 'o ma mnyam pas mnyam pa bzhin no// thams cad du mnyam pas byams pa dang snying rje chen po rgyas par bye'o// don yod pa'i zhags pas 'gugs par byed la sprul
218a1(rgyud): bar byed do// 'ching med pa'i thang rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'jog par byed do// dman pa dang / mchog dang / bar ma dang / rigs mthon po dang / dma' ba dang / dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / 
218a2(rgyud): gang shin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa rnams/ thams cad du mnyam par dran par byed cing ming sbas pa tsam gyis 'dzin par byed cing / sems can thams cad bla na med par byed la/ dub pa dang / ngal ba dang / yid la
218a3(rgyud): bcags par 'gyur ba mdo// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / yi dwags dang / nags
218a4(rgyud): dang ga shin rje'i gnas ji srod du/ sa 'og gi nang du son pa rnams dang / srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang / ji srid du/ 'og min gyi srid pa'i bar du/ gcig tu sems
218a5(rgyud): bskyed pas yongasu rgyug go// lha dang / klu dang bcas pa nas ji srid dud 'dra 'i skye gnas kyi bar thams cad dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams bla na med par bye'o// dpar na
218a6(rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od zer ni mun pas mdongs pa thams cad sel bar byed de/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad du mnyam par snang bar bye'o// de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
218a7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du snying rje chen pos kun tu snang bar byed cing thams cad la thams cad du mnyam par gnas te sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / nad dang / 
218a8(rgyud): mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'ching ba rnams thams cad yongasu grol bar byed// skye ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal yong su grol bar byed// mtho ngas la gnol pa la sags pa'i lam dzad du 'dod
218b1(rgyud): par bye'o// de ltar snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen pos thams cad du mnyam par rje su 'gro ste/ thams cad du mnyam par mchog tu byed cing / thams cad du mnyam par byang chub kyi lam la rab tu dgod
218b2(rgyud): par bye// thams cad du mnyam par skyabs dang dpung gnyen du 'gyur// lag na rdo rje de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni/ brtan pa dang / go cha dang sgru ba chen
218b3(rgyud): pos rig sngags 'chang tha~Md dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du zhugs pa'o// lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ thabs gcig tu 'jug pa chen po ste/ sems can thed 'jigs pa chen po'i lam las so so
218b4(rgyud): ldog par byed pa'o// bde ba nas bde bar gshegs pa'i lam du 'god pa ra byed pa'o// rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med la bsam pa rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// sems kyis yid la
218b5(rgyud): bcags par 'gyur ba medo// de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
218b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi yon tan bsngags pa chen po 'di thos nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu rangs pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bskyes nas/ ched du brjod pa ni ched du brjod par gyur
218b7(rgyud): to// e ma mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug/ e ma 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma khyod kyi ming gi yan tan bskyed pas ngan 'gro thams cad grol bar byeda'o// phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ 
218b8(rgyud): ni 'jig rten gyi bla ma mgon po// 'di ni 'jig rten gyi yang chen po// 'di ni 'dzi sgrol pa byed pa'i mgon po// thub pa nyin mo'i nyi ma'o// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de lta bur lag na rdo rje ji ltar smra/ 
219a1(rgyud): bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyar ras gzigs dbang phyug can song la/ mngon par phyag 'tshal
219a2(rgyud): nas yongasu zhus shig/ mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig gis cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du snying po dang / de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin de rnams ston par byed// don yod zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhing mo'i sgrub pa'i dngos
219a3(rgyud): brub ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur zhing lung 'bogs par bye'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes zab mo zab pa rtogs pa shing khong du chud de seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro zhing / rdo rje
219a4(rgyud): bskor bar byed bzhin pas zla ba mdzes pas dri ma med pa'i me tog gzung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'pha gas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la bder
219a5(rgyud): dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ang/ gas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas
219a6(rgyud): te/ zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog phul te/ pus mos g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces
219a7(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shin tu rmongs pa dang ldan pa/ dran pa yongasu nyams pa bla'i dpa' zhum pa ste/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags dang phyag rgya mang ba dang / ras ris kyo sgrub
219a8(rgyud): ba'i cho ga shin tu rgyas 'di dang de dag mi sheso// sngon ma ni du zhig/ bar ma ni du zhig/ tha ma ni du zhig/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni du zhig/ snying po ni du zhig/ nye ba'i snying po ni du zhig/ ji srid du yi ge bcu pa'i/ 
219b1(rgyud): bar gyi gsang sngags ni du zhig/ dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / ras ris ni du zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la skabs dbye bar gsol zhe so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
219b2(rgyud): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ phyag na rdo rje la brtse ba'i don du / zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du na mkha'i dbyings gto
219b3(rgyud): ro// gtor ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi mtsham su 'khor lo'i rnam par gan so// dpag tshad lnga rgyar khyabs bcings gzhi las gyen du 'phags pa nyid kyi ji srid 'og min gyi gnas
219b4(rgyud): kyi bar du gnas te/ bai DUr+ya sngon po chen po'i sdong bu la/ 'dzam bu mu ngo'i gser gyi dril dbyangs pa'i bden btsongs pas mdzes shing 'bar bar yongasu gyur te// 'khor lo'i rnam pa legs par
219b5(rgyud): yongasu 'khor ba ni nyi ma bye ba brgya stong phrag pas lhag pa'i kun tu snang ga legs par yong su dag pa/ yongs byang ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i gser gyi mchod stong rnam par mdzes par
219b6(rgyud): shin tu gnas pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs pas smras pa dga' bar bya ba yid kyi shing rta rab tu tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba mthong ba lha dang / lha ma yin gyi phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / 
219b7(rgyud): rjed par bya bar 'os pa dang / drang srong rnams kyi bstod par 'os pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par 'os pa ste/ thams cad du zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog gi
219b8(rgyud): gsar 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi yang su bskor nas bzhugs pa'o// dugs kun nas yong su 'khor bal/ 
220a1(rgyud): / lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang lga dang klu dang / chus byung dang / lha bu mo dang klu'i bum dag mi 'am sa'i bu mo dang / lha dang klu dag 'and sbyin dang / dri zad rgya na mcha dang / 
220a2(rgyud): 'phye chen po dang / rig sngags 'chang dang / rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pa'i gzhal med khang dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang gos dang / lhab lhub kyis brgyan cing dang
220a3(rgyud): dpyangs dang / ba dan dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod
220a4(rgyud): pa byed par gyur te/ lha rdzas sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi char ba ngang par gyur cing / lha'i dri za'i klu dbyangs yang dag par len cing rnga dang / pheg rdob rnams kyi mchod pa'i don du rol mo
220a5(rgyud): / byed par gyur to// po Ta la'i ri bor gzhal med khang 'khor gyi dkyil 'kho ra dang bcas pa ru/ tsa co'i sgra chen po sgrogs par gyur to// po Ta la kar gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za
220a6(rgyud): dang / bla ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang yin pa rnams kyang sems tshim pa thob cing / rmad du byung ba thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha
220a7(rgyud): gang yin pa rnams dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'bor gyi lha gang yin pa rnams dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyir ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yin pa rnams dang / blang
220a8(rgyud): po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang bla dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha gang yin pa de rnams thams cad mchog tu ya mtshan pa dang ldan zhing rmad du 'byung ba thob ste/ sems tshim pa skyes pa ngo mtsha rab
220b1(rgyud): / thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar byed pa bzhin du kun tu gnas par gyur to// zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / lha dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab
220b2(rgyud): 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / gzhon nu dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / rgyal
220b3(rgyud): bo chen po bzhi dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan gyi lha rnams dang / gzhon nu'i lha rnams gdugs kyi yu ba nas bzung nas/ bcom
220b4(rgyud): ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// lha'i gzhal med dang chen po lha'i rnam par sprul pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi mchod pa bya'o// gdugs kyi rnam pa'i khor yug gi nang du dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 
220b5(rgyud): 'og min gyi lha dang / lha'i gnas thams cad lnga'i bus yongasu bskor ba gang yin pa de namakha' la mchod la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos bcom ldan 'das shAkyathub pa dang / spyan ngas ba
220b6(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byado// sa'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za gang yin pa rnams dang / sa gzhi'i lha dang / chu'i lha dang / nags kyi lha dang / lo thog gi lha dang / 
220b7(rgyud): sman gyi lha gang yin pa de rnams thams cad sa'i zil gyi gzhal yas khang de sbyong bar byed par gyur te/ dri sna tshogs pa'i chus chag chag 'debs shing / dri sna tshogs pa'i phye mas byug par byed/ me tog sna
220b8(rgyud): tshogs bcal du 'grams shing / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdugs nas sa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par rgyan par gyur to// de ltar rnam par 'phrul pa'i go skabs rgya chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
221a1(rgyud): khyu mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po// yangs pa
221a2(rgyud): chen po mthong nas shin tu ya mtshan pa thob cing rmad du byung ba thob ste/ 'di ltar sems par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bstan pa ni
221a3(rgyud): shin tu ya mtsha no// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la slar yang gsol ba btab po// bcom
221a4(rgyud): ldan 'das skangs dbye bar mdzod cing// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sa/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lab na rdo rje la 'di
221a5(rgyud): skad ces smra so// lag na rdo rje dogs pa gsal ba dang / the tshom gcod pa larje su gzung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags sde pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bstan
221a6(rgyud): las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ mig mi 'dzum zhing / bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa lus 'od
221a7(rgyud): zer 'bar bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i rnam par 'phral pa dang / pad+ma btsug gtor gyi nor du'i
221a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang don yod zhags pa'i gsang ba sgyu ma lta bu'i snying pa dang / phyag rgya dang / kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rim par phye ba mchis stebacom ldan 'das de dag bdag gi/ 
221b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yongasu bsgrags par bgyi'o// sgrung pa bla zhing / daklags pas 'brung ba dam tshig mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po'i nye bar bstan par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
221b2(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pas phyag gser gyi kha dog can 'od zer sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gi yang dag par rgyan par brkyang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
221b3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag 'jog par mdzad cing / sems can dag pa chen po lagaso leg so// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug// da lha de'i dus la bab par shes na smos
221b4(rgyud): shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bskul bar ri gnas/ phyogs bcur kun tu bltas te/ de bzhin

221b6(rgyud): po gsung so// don yod pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor du/ pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang po ni/ dus gsum du gshegs shing rab tu bzhugs pa
221b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gtsug tor don yod pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
221b8(rgyud): ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thaMd la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi snying po'i dam tshig rnams la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag/ 
222a1(rgyud): par song ba rnas la phyag 'ama'o// yang dab par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshab tu tshus che nab 'phags pa nA ra dwa ti'i bus phyag 'a / 'dags pa byams pas
222a2(rgyud): sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa

222a4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can la phyag 'tsha'o// drang srong chen po 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams 'phyag 'tsha'o// de rnam sa la phyag 'tsha'o// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor

222a6(rgyud): 'khor man pa la ba shad par bgyi ga/ tad+ha thA/ oM pad+moSh+Ti Sha ba rad hUM/ tsa ra tsa ra/ dz+r-i ra tsi ri Tu ru tsu ru mar+tha ru Ni ka/ ts+yai r-i tsi ra/ bi ri bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pa ra ma ka ru Ni ka/ si ro tsi ra/ N+Dar tsi ri/ bi ri nga / dza

222a8(rgyud): prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la/ khi tsa la/ e Ta Ta e Ta Ta d+ha ra b+ha ra d+hi ri d+hi ri b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA bi ma la/ pad+moSh+NI ShA bi ra dza sA d+ha ya hUM hUM/ ai h+ya hi/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA ba shu ba ti/ bi bad+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mahA/ 
222b1(rgyud): sde 'khyams sa pa sams pa da car/ cha cad/ dza du d+ha ra ma ra s+t+rai ga/ shang par ma 'i rdzi hu Sh+Ta ShA rmA rA thA R+tha swAT hA hAhA/ a kAr bra ba 'jang d+ha rgyan d+ha d+ha / d+ha d+hA
222b2(rgyud): pad+ma dz+wa la d+ha ra ta ra ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ pad+ma pA sha d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra ra sh+mi sha ta sa ha sra/ pra ti maN+Di ha sha rI rA ya dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta ba/ b+ha ga bA na so ma A di t+ya ya ma kha ru Na/ ku

222b7(rgyud): la bo dz+nyA ga/ tsa tu rA r+ya sa t+ya/ saM pra kA sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma dam/ sa ma sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA ta man+ta ka raM ba d+ha ma na/ ShaT pA ri ma tA pa ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi liT Ta Ta Ta/ dza za dza rba/ Ti Ti Ti Ti dz+r-i dzi
222b8(rgyud): wiTu Ta~M Ta Tu dz+ra dz+ra TuT/ e ne ya tsarma kri ha pa ri kar e h+ye ne/ I sha pa ma he shwa ra lakle shwa ra/ mad+hi b+hu ta ga Na/ se b+hany+dza ka/ mahA sa dz+ha swa ra/ ku ru sa ru kha ra pa ra ka Ta ka mu ma nam Ta ba
223a1(rgyud): bi Sha ya/ ni b+ha si ma ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bI ha ra ta na maM ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta ma ku Ta ma had+b+ha taHka ma lA lo kr-i ta/ ka ra ta la/ d+hA nA sa mA d+hi/ bi myo hA
223a2(rgyud): pra kam+ba/ ba hu sa twa san+ta ti/ pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba karma a ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba bya d+hi pra mo tsa ka/ sarba A shA ba ri pU ra kar+t+ti sarba sarba/ sa ma shA sa ka/ oM par+b+r-iSh+TaM Sha pA sha hr-i da ya
223a3(rgyud): maN+Da la ra mo sta te/ swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
223a4(rgyud): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa gzhi cher g.yos par gyur te/ ri dang / nags dang / dgon par bcas pa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos par gyur to// kun na sI mthil 'di yang na
223a5(rgyud): po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi pad+ma'i gdan/ kun na ting bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad+ma'i lte ba'i gnas na/ pad+mo chen po gyen du 'phags pa/ mngab me stong pa/ rin po che sna
223a6(rgyud): bdur gyi rang bzhin/ bai DUr+ya sngon po chen po'i sdong bu dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi snying po dang / mu ti dmar po'i ze'u 'bru dang / lha'i mu tig chen po'i ge gsar dang cig tu 'bab par gyur pa 'od zang
223a7(rgyud): sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed pas te/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / gcod dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog tu snang bzhin pas 'bar zhing / rnam par gsal la lgang ngo // 
223a8(rgyud): phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam su kun tu snang bar byed// lha'i gnas dang klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin pa'i gnas dang / dri za'i gnas dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas dang / rnamakha' lding / 
223b1(rgyud): gi gnas dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kun tu snang bar bye'o// rab tu tshim par byedado// yang dag par bskul bar byedado// yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byedo// dmyal ba
223b2(rgyud): chen po bcu drug po rnams kun tu snang zhing / reg pas dmyal ba chen po de rnams kyang / pad+ma can chen por skyes par gyur to// sems can dmyal ba de rnams kun kun nas snang zhing reg pa tsam gyis de rnam
223b3(rgyud): zad yongasu grol te/ bsam pa tsam gyi mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu pad+ma las rdzus te skyes shing / lha'i lus la brgyan dang lcang lbu ba dang / bos dang / bud pas rnam par rgyan cing / skye ba nas skye ba ru skye
223b4(rgyud): dran par skyes// de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba rnams kun nas snang bas/ ri dgas dang / bya de dag thams cad kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas las yongasu grol te/ mtho ris rna rgyan dri ma med cing g.yo ba na
223b5(rgyud): par skye so// de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu kun tu sems can thad kun tu sna nga zhing reg pa de rnams thams cad sa chen po brgyad pa la ra ba tu gnas par gyur to// des kyang 'khor chen por kun
223b6(rgyud): tu 'ongs pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de rnams zang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu bkod par gyur to// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor gang
223b7(rgyud): yin pa thams cad kyang don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor chen po'i snying po gsang ba don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub so sor thob par gyur to// klu'i rgyal po'i 'khor gang yin pa de thams cad kyang / yid
223b8(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan so sor snang bar gyur to// lha'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang 'di 'bar ba'i tilas sor thob bo// gnod sbyin dang srin po gang yin pa de rnams thaMd na
224a1(rgyud): po che'i gzhal med khang du gnas par gyur to// 'byung ba'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad ga'i brjid dri ma med pa'i ringange 'dzin so sor zad par gyur te// l+h+wa ma yi
224a2(rgyud): 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad rdo rje'i go cha dang / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi ya lang bgod par gyur to// namanga' lding gi 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang rdo rje mchu rtse mo can pa'i stongs kyi
224a3(rgyud): bugs rje su thob par gyur to// mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor dang yin pa thams cad kyang lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongasu dag par gyur to// dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / bud med dang / 
224a4(rgyud): skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang yin pa de rnams thams cad skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i bsdug bsngal las yongasu grol bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ska las nyin/ 
224a5(rgyud): tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer chen po rnam par spros te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs da bang phyug gi thugs khar rje su zhugs// sgyums
224a6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs khar zhugs ma thag tu gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i
224a7(rgyud): par 'phrul pa la ltos shig/ lag na rdo sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong lag so// sems dpa' dag pa bdag gis mthong lag so// sems dpa' chen po dag pa 'di'i rnam pa
224a8(rgyud): 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa pad+ma'i dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po// pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu zab pa/ shin tu rgya che ba rmad du byung bachen / 
224b1(rgyud): dngos grub mchog sgrub par byed pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' dag rgyas par gsungs shig/ gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rmad du byung gnye bar spyod pa'i cho gdang
224b2(rgyud): bcas pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa rnam par 'joms pa'i don dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi mchog 'grub pa'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gsungs shig/ 
224b3(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras// lag na rdo rje don yod zhags
224b4(rgyud): pa'i snying pa'i mchog tu gsang ba gtsug tor thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du/ sdig pa tha mas cad nyams par byed pa sgrib pa thed rnam pa
224b5(rgyud): sbyong bar byed pa/ dri ma dang / rnyog ma thams cad sel bar byed pa/ nang thams cad rab tu ni bar byed pa/ dkra mi shes pa zad do ga par byed pa/ sdig pa dang / ma rungs pa'i son
224b6(rgyud): phyir rgol ba dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa rab zhi bar byed pa/ bgegs dang / log lnga 'dren thams cad tshar bcod par byed pa/ bdud la sogs pa'i ma ru dra pa thad 'joms par byed gdug dang mtshon cha nga/ 
224b7(rgyud): me dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / mche ba'i dug dang / seng ge dang rgyal po dang / gnod sbyin rnams ldog par byed pa/ dug dang byad sems dang / g.yeng byed dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad rnam par nyams par byed
224b8(rgyud): gdon yod zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid gces pa rmad du byung ba de 'o na nyid kyi snying po'i sgrub pa bla na med pa bklags pas grub pa 'di rje su zung zhig / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon ma no lag na rje
225a1(rgyud): / bzhin 'dzum cing / gdong khro gnyer dang bral bas rdo rje bskor bar byed bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces
225a2(rgyud): smra so// bcom ldan 'das don yod zhags pa'i snying po dam par gyur pa gsang ba pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams du zhig lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs shig/ de nas
225a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la gsol ba btab par rig nas/ phyag g.yas pas lce ni
225a4(rgyud): pad+ma'i phyag rgya'i rnam pa la reg go// reg ma thag tu phyag g.yas pa'i pad+ma la/ snying po rig sngags de yang pad+ma'i steng du 'a dug ste/ rang gi ngo bo gzhal med khang tshangs pa'i cha byad
225a5(rgyud): 'chang ba don yod pa'i gzugs spyan gsum pa/ phyag bani brgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan gnor du gser gyi cod pa na can/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ ral pa'i
225a6(rgyud): cod pan pad+ma'i gtsug gyis bud pa/ zla ba phyed pas rnam par mdzes pa/ zhags pa 'chang ga/ pad+ma'i gtsug tor 'chang ba dang / nor du'i dbyug pa 'chang ba dang rdo rje'i dbyug pa 'chang ga/ dkyil bkrung gis
225a7(rgyud): bzhug pa/ 'od zer 'bar bas yang dag par rgyan pa/ gos rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs dang / spyan nyi ma dang zla bas lhag par 'bar bas rnam par mdzes pa/ pad+ma rnams kyi steng na mdzes bzhin pa/ 
225a8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thaMd thugs mnyes par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag bya bar 'os pa/ lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'od pa klu dzad kyis rje su gzung bar 'os pa/ drang srong
225b1(rgyud): thams cad kyis dga' bar 'os pa/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis rje su 'gro bar 'os pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bla mar 'os pa mthong ste/ 
225b2(rgyud): de lta bu'i snang ba rgya chen po// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ de kho na nyid gces pa'i snying por gyur pa'i snying po nye bar bstan// de nas nan/ 
225b3(rgyud): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ snying po gsang gdon yod pa'i pad+ma dri ma med pa'i gtsug tor 'od zer 'bar ba'i ting len
225b4(rgyud): sau sor thob par gyur te// ting 'dzin sa sor thob pa gang gis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi nang du chud par gyur to// de rnams tha mas cad rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis zhabs dag gi rjes la
225b5(rgyud): rgyal bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/  na yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags 'di smras so// 
225b6(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha pA sha hri da ya pad+moSh+NI Sha ku mA ra be Sha d+ha ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ A bi sha ya/ sarba a mo g+ha ku la sa ma ya hr-i da ya/ sarba sid+d+hi a mo g+ha pa yats+tsha pad+ma/ pad+ma hUM hUM na mo sta te swA hA/ 'di ni don
225b7(rgyud): yod zhags pa'i snying po daklags pas grub pa'i sgrub thab so// oM a mo g+ha pad+moSh+TiSha shwa ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ sa man+ta ya sarba ta thA ga tA nI/ a mo g+hi pad+moSh+NI ShA sa ma ye A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ 
225b8(rgyud): marba ga rma dz+nyA pra ya tsA ma sa pa lo ki te shwa ra t+na hU~M/ ma sngang d+moSh+mi 'bru dze swA hA/ rigs kyi rgyal ba'i gsang sngags/ oM mahA tsan+da ladz+ra shwa ra bidzi d+ha nu pa/ bo kaT pad+me thAg dra la b+hi'an rdzu
226a1(rgyud): duSh+Ta dzang yo/ khA da ya/ ba~Mg+h+nAM pan+d+ha d+h+r-i ka/ tsa~M Ti/ dziHhU~M swAhA/ dra bo'i rgyal po'i rigs kyi snang pa'o// nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i las rnam sa/ oM a ma g+ha bad+mo d+hA
226a2(rgyud): pad+ma pA shakro d+ha ka mA ya karme pra be sha ya ma hA dA shrI pa ti/ ya ma/ kha ru Na/ ku ba ra/ bradz+ra be Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA tsaN+Da de ga a mo g+ha ku la sa ma ya/ pad+me hUM ts+tsha/ tra bo'i rgyal po den yod zhags pa'i ngadz+ra
226a3(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi snying po'o// de nas don yod pa'i snying po'i las rnamasu 'gyur te/ dran pa tsam gyi mod la/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pas cig tu mtshungs
226a4(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// tshe dpag med dang mnyam pa'i lusu 'gyuraro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs shing mnyam
226a5(rgyud): pa nyid du 'gyuraro// mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong // pad+ma'i phyag gi ting 'dzin rnams dang / pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi
226a6(rgyud): phyag gis 'jog rten dbang phyug dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyuro// pad+ma'i gtsug tor bcings pa nyid kyis spyi bo'i gtsug tu mngon par dbang bskur na/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dzad kyi 'ango
226a7(rgyud): par dbang bskur// pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi don yod par debang bskur ba gang yin pa de/ pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po rgyas par gyur pa thob ste/ ting 'dzin brgya stong phrag dang / bla na med pa'i dpal 'a
226a8(rgyud): po rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags rgyas par gyur pa pad+ma gtsug tor byi dkyil 'khor du/ rigs kyi rgyal po// lags par grub par 'gyur te/ thad du rigs kyi rgyal po'i dngos grub bzang po rnams 'ongad
226b1(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// ribs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog gi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin par bye'o// pad+mo'i phyag gis rje su 'jug cing / don yod pa'i
226b2(rgyud): kyi dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub te/ bklags pas grub pa 'di la the tshom medo// pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rigs kyi dngos grub dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor ram/ don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'acwo
226b3(rgyud): du/ bklags nas bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ rigs kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de thams cad du dbang phyug tu 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor rnams kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgyas byang chub
226b4(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyi rigs thun mangs pa thams cad du rgyal pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing srung phrag rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag rnams dang / gang
226b5(rgyud): ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i zhing du rgyal por 'gyuraro// rigs kyi rigs pas/ lha'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i tshogs rnams kyi dab nga phyug tu 'gyuraro// rtag tu yang gnod sbyin rnams
226b6(rgyud): dang / srin po rnams gyur pa dang / dri za rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid du thams cad du rgyal po dang / dbang phyug tu rtag tu 'gyur te the tshom medo// rnam par lding rnams
226b7(rgyud): dang mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / thams cad du ji srid byang chub la yang dag par gnas kyi bar du rigs kyi rgyal por 'gyuraro// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam dang drag po de yid
226b8(rgyud): labasam pa tsam gyi mod la/ 'phral du ri rab ltung bar byed cing / khor yug gi ri rnam par thor bar byed// rgya mtsho chen po kun nas dkrug cing / rgya mtsho chen po nye bar skye bar bye'o// kun tu gsas 'byed/ 
227a1(rgyud): klu'i gnas thams cad du/ klu'i gnas 'bar bar yang bya'o// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad kyi skad cig tsam gyis sdang du bdug par byed// gnod sbyin dang / srin
227a2(rgyud): dang 'byung po dang / gza' dang / brjed byed dang / mi bzang pa de rnams thams cad khro ba'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur// khro ba'i rgyal po'i gsang bab thams cad kyi rigs kyi
227a3(rgyud): dam tshig la gnas pa dang / dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya gnas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi lha gzhan gang yin pa rnams kyis dro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'a
227a4(rgyud): la skyab su 'gro bar byed// de rnams thams cad rje su 'brang bar 'gyur/ zhing gnas par bye// 'ga' zhig gang du 'gro ba 'am 'dug pa de la dbang po dang / skabs gsum pa'i lha dang / tshangs
227a5(rgyud): pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / na lha dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' tsha dang / gzhon nu / sde dpon dang / de bzhin du rgyal po
227a6(rgyud): chen po bzhi dus rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gi rje su 'brang bar byed// the tshom med// khros pa'i las rnams sam/ de bzhin du drag po'i las rnams thams cad kyang hUM yig tsam gyis de la dngos grub
227a7(rgyud): mthong ngo // phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang sems can ma rungs pa shin tu mi bzad pa rnams dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'jigs pa dang rnam par 'gras pa'i skye ba dang / sdig pa de rnams thad hUM mig
227a8(rgyud): gis mchog tu gzir ba tsam gyis thal bar 'jig par 'gyuraro// sdang ba dang / ngan sems pa'i sems can dang / byas pa mi bzo ba dang / byas pa la 'khon pa thaMd drag po'i hU~M yig bzlas pa tsam gyis skad cig
227b1(rgyud): la bsregs te/ dper na me yis phye ma leb bzhin no// las gzhan stong phrag rnams dang / las brgya stong phrag nyid bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub te/ dran pa tsam gyi mod la las thams cad 'grub bo// 
227b2(rgyud): de nas don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor dran pa tsam gyi bya ba thams cad ni gnyi su 'gyur te/ ji ltar gang cung zad yid la byed pas las byeda'o// dkyil 'khor ram/ gnas rnam pa gzhan thams cad du ji ltar
227b3(rgyud): yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams cad du bye'o// zheso// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal pa// bam po bco lnga pa// de nas gsang sdug
227b4(rgyud): la 'jug pa rnams kyi dgongs pa thams cad so sar 'grub par 'a gyur pa ni oM zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags pa
227b5(rgyud): ge gcig pa'o// 'jig rten mgon pa'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par bya sa nas dang po la gnas par 'gyuro// sngon gyi sdig pa bsags pa sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci
227b6(rgyud): rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtong ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// don thams cad rje su 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa zad
227b7(rgyud): dang / gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad// gsang sngags oM zhes bya ba dran nas tshe 'phos pa ni 'jig
227b8(rgyud): rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur// gsang sngags kyi yi ge gcig pa'o// oM b+hu yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gnyis pa 'thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang
228a1(rgyud): mtha' yas spyan sngar 'dug par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad rjesu sbyin par mdzad/ sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad/ sngon gyi nad kyis sas
228a2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas ri gru 'dzin du
228a3(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur// oM pad+ma gsang sngags kyi yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug
228a4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ pad+ma yang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags gang yin pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i
228a5(rgyud): cha byad can mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjesu sbyin par mdzad/ don med pa 'i zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor dkyil 'khor ston par
228a6(rgyud): mdzad// de bzhin gang shegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/ thams cad du dngos grung rje su sbyin par mdzad do// oM pad+ma hri/ gsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas
228a7(rgyud): brjod byas nas bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyur/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'drugs pa'i sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing dpung pa brkyang naka spyi bor 'jog par mdzad la rib sngags
228a8(rgyud): ba leg so// zhes bya ba rjesu sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang tshur shog khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongasu dag ste/ rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongasu dag go mi'i 'jig rten// 
228b1(rgyud): 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ phyir zhing nam yang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur 'jig rten pa dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// oM pad
228b2(rgyud): ma b+hu dze// gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas lnga pa la gnas par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma rab tu ston pa mdzad/ 
228b3(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad yo su zad par 'gyur rig sngags 'chang la leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legaso leg so// khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen pa skyes te rang sngo
228b4(rgyud): 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas rig sngags 'chang khyod tshe rjes na de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyi sa kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs par bskyod par 'gyur
228b5(rgyud): zhing nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bor 'gyur khyod kyis don mo dpa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug hor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya chen po rim par phye ba grub cing rig
228b6(rgyud): sngags 'chang byang sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad spangs kyis bya ba thams cad byis shig/ yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin de dag thams cad shin tu 'grub par 'gyuraro// oM
228b7(rgyud): ma lo ki te/ gzungs sngags yi ge drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas drug pa thob ste 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang ba mdzad par 'gyur stong gsum gyi sgang chen po'i 'dzim
228b8(rgyud): rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon sum du ston pa mdzad/ dadugs 'byin par mdzad do// de nas
229a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan rag sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dadugs 'byin par mdzad do// 
229a2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog/ las byas pa ni shin tu yongasu zad cing khyod kyi sems can dmya pa'i sgra rnams bcad khyod kyi sangs rgyas
229a3(rgyud): kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni bye/ khyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sadon dang / rigs kyi sprini khong du chud/ khyod kyi don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil
229a4(rgyud): 'khor ni grug khyod kyi thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni bye bas la jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos
229a5(rgyud): shig/ oM pad+ma dz+wa la hUM d+h+r-i ka/ yi ge bdun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting 'dzin pad+ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral bdag pa zhes bya ba thod par 'gyur la/ ting 'dzin gang thob pas
229a6(rgyud): lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyung zhing 'od zer kha dog sna tshogasu 'gyur/ sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ning thed
229a7(rgyud): kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing / gang dang gang du 'od zer rin po che 'bar ba sna tshogs dag 'bab pa las me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod
229a8(rgyud): par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i pad+ma 'od zer 'bar ba gser gyi mdog can dpung pa brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pas rig sngags 'chang/ 
229b1(rgyud): gi spyi bor 'jog cing leg so zhes bya ba yang sbyin la dadug 'byin par mdzad// rig sngags 'chang legaso lag so// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po gsang ba bzlas brjod kyi cho ga mchod pa'i
229b2(rgyud): mchog yino// 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po yang dag pa'o// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis dkyil
229b3(rgyud): 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par sprul pa grub kyis rig sngags 'chang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
229b4(rgyud): byis shig/ oM a mo g+ha ma Ni pad+d+he/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po yi ge brgyad pa 'bum bzlas rjod byas na lus shin tu yongasu dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor bu rin po che che
229b5(rgyud): bo shel ltar phyi nang shin tu yongasu dag ste/ de ltar rig sngags 'chang gi lus yongasu dag par 'gyur/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyu ngabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
229b6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus yongasu dag pa rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bo ston cing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na gnas la re/ sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin
229b7(rgyud): par mdzad de// phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ leg so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang lag so leg so// rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i bsams pa dam pa
229b8(rgyud): dga' ba la zhug so// rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'brel ba'i 'jig rten rnam par lta bar chur shog/ der khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// khyod kyi don mong
230a1(rgyud): tham nags pa dang btsun tan tu rlung ba tshul 'bang ba yang bzla kyis 'jig rten dang / 'jig chen pas 'das pa'i sgrub pa dam byang thams cad rgyas
230a2(rgyud): pad+ma lo tsa ne hu ru hUM/ gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge dgu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi tso bor 'gyur/ dngani
230a3(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dbu bcu rtsa dgu dag rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston par
230a4(rgyud): mdzad/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdza da/ leg so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legaso legs// khyod kyis ngal zhing snang
230a5(rgyud): ba'i las legs par sgrub pa byas// khyod kyi 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub pa ste/ don yod pa 'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor chog zhing mo smra
230a6(rgyud): pa dang / mdo sde lung bcas pa sgrub pa 'jig rten gyi 'dren pas brten pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad grub pa yin// oM pad+ma Sh+Ti Sha bi ma le hUM phaT// gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu
230a7(rgyud): pa 'bum dazlas brjod byas na phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur na sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i skye dgu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod la bA na pA yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
230a8(rgyud): chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te the tshom mi bya'o// gsang sngags bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa
230b1(rgyud): / 'di ni don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying po rnam par sprul pa bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'grub pa yin te/ bdag gis sngar bstan pa thams cad la lhag par zhen pa/ gtsang ma/ gtsang sbra spyod pa/ gos
230b2(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos pa/ byams pa'i sems dang snying rje skyes pa/ bden par smra ba/ bla ma la gus pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba/ bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa 'di
230b3(rgyud): ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par bstan to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
230b4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la rab tu 'dzum la lag na rdo rje skor bzhin du ma go btud nas smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi bzhi don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug
230b5(rgyud): tor dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba chen po 'di ni shin tu rnyed bar dka' ste/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po re re po 'di dag/ ni bzlas brjod tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
230b6(rgyud): pa byed par 'gyur na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod sgrub pa dang / cho ga rgyas par sgrub pa lnga smos kyang ci dgos/ nyin zhag gcig bsnyen gnas
230b7(rgyud): la gnas shing zas bslangs pa dang / 'bras bu dang / ldum bu dang / rtsa ba bza' ba zos nas rig sngags 'di bsgrubs na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i dngos grub ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar
230b8(rgyud): 'gyur/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba la gnas shing nyin zhag/ cig tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur
231a1(rgyud): ba la ni lag na rdo rje rigs kyi 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang dge sbyong mgo bregs pa/ rigs kyi
231a2(rgyud): gtso bo bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang la la skad cig thang cig yud tsam mam/ dus tshogs
231a3(rgyud): gcig gam/ dus tshogs gnyis sam/ dus tshigs gsum yongasu rdzogs par gzhan mi smra bar/ don yod ldan kha pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po khro bo'i rigs kyi gsang sngags rim par phye
231a4(rgyud): ba gzungs sngags chen po'i snying po bcu po 'di lan gcig dran na ma/ klog gam gzung ba yang dran nam/ lag na rdo rje dus tshig sa gcig tu dran pa tsam gyis kyang de'i mtsham
231a5(rgyud): med pa byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba/ bskal par gnas pa ya nga de yis thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur la/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa bsags pa rnams zad par 'gyur/ 
231a6(rgyud): lus yongasu dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur// sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma dag las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rab su tshe
231a7(rgyud): rabs dran par 'gyur/ nams kyang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad bcur 'khor los bsgyur ba mchog tu 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad
231a8(rgyud): cur 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du bdi myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyisu 'jig rten gyi khams mngon dar bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun
231b1(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyi su 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rjer rnams par gzigs par skye bar 'gyur tshe rab su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyi su nor bu dbang ba'i 'khor las
231b2(rgyud): bsgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa khri brgyad cur 'phags pa spyan ras dbang phyug gi gnas ri bru 'dzin du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'og min gyi lha rnams
231b3(rgyud): kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad bcur dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi nang du brgya byin nyid byed
231b4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyi su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu 'jug par 'gyur/ bskal pa ste/ nga phrag nyi shur 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid
231b5(rgyud): la spyod par 'gyur te nams kyang mi'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad 'ardzus te skye bar 'gyur/ thad du tshe rab dran par 'gyur te/ lag na
231b6(rgyud): rdo rje de ltar rig sngags lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje gal te gang zhig zhag gcig gam/ lan gcig bsrung ba
231b7(rgyud): la gnas te bzlas brjod dang bcas pa byed na lag na rdo rje de ni tshe 'di nyid la mi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid sgrib pa dang dral nas don yod pa chen po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'thog// 
231b8(rgyud): don yod pa bkod pa'i ting 'dzin tho'o// pad+ma gsal ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin 'tho'o// don yod pa dri ma med pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa'i
232a1(rgyud): rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob bo// pad+ma gtsug tor mthar phyin pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod pa 'bar ba'i gtsug
232a2(rgyud): gi snying po gsang ba grub pa 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
232a3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ tsho brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma dag la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags
232a4(rgyud): pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa pad+ma btsug tor gyi cho ga mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa chog zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton
232a5(rgyud): du lobs par 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying
232a6(rgyud): po gsang sngags sgrub pa'i cho ga ste/ sgrub pa'i cho ga gnyis pa'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
232a7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces spraso// bcom ldan 'das don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor don med pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bya ba'i cho ga dang sgrub pa'i chog
232a8(rgyud): bcas pa bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang kun gyi 'grub pa/ bsams pa yongasu rdzogs pa/ dngos grub bsgrub pa'i cho ga de kho na ba shadu gsal/ de nas byang
232b1(rgyud): chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpod chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras// lag mardo rje bya ba'i cho ga dang / 
232b2(rgyud): sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya yis nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje gsang sngags rtsa ba don yod pa'i zhag pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba 'di'i rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
232b3(rgyud): kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge snyen ma lan cig tsam dran pa yid la byed pa yongasu dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i
232b4(rgyud): bsam pas sems can la dmigs pa'i sems can gang yang rung ba ngan song gsum du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ yi dgra
232b5(rgyud): kyi yul rnams kyi gnas dag med de/ de ltar sems can zad sgrub pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// 2na gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis nad thams cad
232b6(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar 'gyu'o// lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ dug dang / 'brum bu dang 'bras dang / lhog pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / g.yan pa
