232b8(rgyud): dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// lan drug brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig pa dang / gdon dang / rims thams cad 'jig par 'gyu ro// lan bdun brjod pa tsam
233a1(rgyud): gyis dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi nad dang / yams kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// lag na rdo
233a2(rgyud): de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi don du nyon re zhing gzhan mi smra bar lan bdun dran par bya'o// sems can gang la la sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba shi ba dang / dge slong ba
233a3(rgyud): la la bslab pa'i sdom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral ba dang / mkhan pa dang / slob dpon la gus par ma byas pa shi ba de'i don du bye ma gtsang ma blangs la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ dur

233a5(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba 'am/ yi dwags sam/ sha zar skyes pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'i skye gnas skyes na de de'i mod la tshe brjes nas thams cad mtho su gzhol bya
233a6(rgyud): 'gyur zhing nams kyang sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar mi 'gyuraro// yang na gro ga la bris nas mchod rten gyi nang du bcug pa'i gnas der rkang pa gnyis pa 'am/ rkang pa bzhi pa gang
233a7(rgyud): dag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad grib ma phog pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing thams cad mtho risu gzhol bar 'gyur// tha na ri dwags dang / bya dang / 
233a8(rgyud): tha na ldang sgo ska dang / ne'u le dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / khyi dang / rus sbal dang / lag 'gro dang / dkyil 'khor de la grib ma bab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi las sgrib pa rnams rnam par ngas
233b1(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyuraro// dung la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnas mthon por bus na sems can gang dag dung de'i sgra thos pa
233b2(rgyud): skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ri dwags dang / bya dang / dud 'gro'i skyes gnasu gtogs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyu ro// gang dag tshul
233b3(rgyud): khrims yongasu dag pa dang / sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / gang dag bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs gsum gzungs pa dang / gang dag byang chub
233b4(rgyud): sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de dag kyang dung gi sgra thos nas sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
233b5(rgyud): chub 'thob par 'gyur la/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs nas tshe rabs dran pa 'byor// tsan dan la lan bdun bzlas brjod byasan
233b6(rgyud): dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor sa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bdugs na/ gang dag der dri marnams pa'i sems
233b7(rgyud): can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu rdzogs par 'gyu ro// chos gos la gdugs nas gang gi lus la gyon pa de'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyuraro// lus la
233b8(rgyud): bab pa tsam gyis dri ma dang / ser sna dang / skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// gos bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyis gos de gdugs nas
234a1(rgyud): rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'angar dang 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/ mchod gnas chen por 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar
234a2(rgyud): yang 'gyur// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na dge slong thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'os par 'gyur// skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na nor chen por 'phel bar 'gyur
234a3(rgyud): zhing mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyu ro// ri'i rtse mo nyi ma 'char ba'i khang bdugs nas gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mod la nyi ma 'bab par 'gyur zhing 'dod
234a4(rgyud): pa mchog kun rje su sbyin par byed do// gu gul dang bsres nas lha chen po'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bya ba byas nas mod nyid la
234a5(rgyud): lha chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang gi ma dun du 'dug nas bsam pa thams cad yongasu skor bar byed do// bo la dang tsan dan dang / gu gul bsres nas
234a6(rgyud): sred med kyi bu'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsa bas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig lus kyi yan lag la byab pa byas na sred med kyi kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na 'dug
234a7(rgyud): cing 'dod pa mchog kun rjesu byin par byed la/ dngos po sna tshogs kyang sbyin par byed// yungs kar bsres nas tshangs pa la 'dug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bcu bzhi byab pa/ 
234a8(rgyud): byas na/ tshangs pa rang gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug la mchog thams cad sbyin par byed// pad+ma'i phye ma dang bsres nas nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i tshogs la 'dug na nag po
234b1(rgyud): chen po dang / ma mo'i tshigs 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi zugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing mchog dang / bya ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// nag puSh+pa dang / sbrul gyi shun pa dang / bsres pa'i 'dug
234b2(rgyud): bklu'i mtshor bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun yungs kar la bzlas brjod nas klu'i mtshor gtor la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo lan cig brjod cing dran par byas ra klu dang klu
234b3(rgyud): mo dang / klu'i bu pho dang / klu'i bu mo thams cad gnas kun nas byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la 'dud cing gang bsgo ba de dag thams cad byed la 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing rab tu
234b4(rgyud): 'gyur// lan gsum sbyar na klu'i rgyal po rgya tsho yang 'ong / klu'i rgya po dga' bo dag nye dga' bo yang 'ong zhing thams cad bsla ba bzhin byed la dbang du gyur nas 'dun go// gnad sbyin dang / drim
234b5(rgyud): po dgug par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi nang du mi ro bsregs pa'i sol bas bdug la/ gsang sngags rtsa ba gsang mthon po sa lan bdun brjod cing dran na gnod sbyin dang
234b6(rgyud): srin po dag rgyug cing 'ong la/ rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la btud nas/ rje btsan bka' stsol gcig ces zer ba dang / de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis de bsgo ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas na
234b7(rgyud): bsgo ba thams cad la byed mngag pa'i las byed par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'du'o// thong ba sbyar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas thod pa bkang ba'i bdug pas 'dugs na 'byung po dzang
234b8(rgyud): kun nas 'ong zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur la/ las byed par 'gyur// gnod sbyin mo dbab par 'dod pas btsag gis gnod sbyin mo bris la/ ba lang gi lci ba'i dkyil 'khor byas par phyes pad+ma'i
235a1(rgyud): / ram bri zhing phye'i gtor ma lta bur byas pa bzhag la bdug pa 'dis bdug cing / gas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya// khungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod
235a2(rgyud): byas nas gdod sbyin mo la brdeg pa byas na gnod sbyin mo rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug cing / lha'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'gro la slar yang 'ong ste/ don gsang ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam
235a3(rgyud): gyis byed par 'gyur// yang nam 'am chung ma 'am/ sring mo yin no zhes smra bar bya ste/ gal te mar byas na bu la sdug pa longs spyod dang / gzhal med khang thams cad kyi nang du 'jug la rgyal po'i bu bzhin
235a4(rgyud): yongasu spong bar byed// gal te sring mor byas na rnam thos la 'gran par 'gyuro// gal te chung mar byas na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po ltar dga' ba'i longs spyod dag la rtser 'jug par byed do// lha mo dpal
235a5(rgyud): la 'dug la/ gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod bya zhing lha mo dpal gyi mgo la byugs na lha mo chen mod pal rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / nor gyi phung po chen
235a6(rgyud): 'bul bar byed de/ nam 'tsho'i bar du khyim na 'du ga cing nor chen po nyid 'phel bar 'gyuraro// rnam thos kyi bu la bdu gas na gser srang stong sbyin par byed// nor bu bzang po'i bu la
235a7(rgyud): bdugs na gser dong tshe stong sbyin par byedo// tshal gseb du bdug na tshal na gnas pa'i lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing rdzas dang / sman thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun ra
235a8(rgyud): 'dug go//  rnams la bdugs na ca dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang rdzas thams cad 'bar bar 'gyuraro// grong khyer bzhi'i sgo rnamasu bdugs mgrong khyer kun tu yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa/ 
235b1(rgyud): dang / nad 'go ba dang / nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyu ro// 'brog tu bdugs na rkun mo dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / 
235b2(rgyud): seng ge dang / stag dang sbrul dang / dred dang / dom gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing ri dwags gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// rims thams cad
235b3(rgyud): la bdugs na rims thams cad las thar par 'a gyu ro// sdig pa thams cad 'gegs pa tsan dan gyi bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga ste gsum pa'o// / de nas thig le yang dag par bshad
235b4(rgyud): par bya ste/ rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags sgrub pa ni nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing skar ma'i rnam pa lta ra 'bar ba yin te/ gzi brjid kyi rgyal po de gnyis kyis 'bar ba
235b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni bsod nams kyi phung po rnam par 'phel// lha rnams kyi nang na lnga dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pas rtag tu mchod pa'i gan su 'gyur
235b6(rgyud): zhing rig sngags 'chang gis the tsom mi bya'o// pral ba'i steng du thig le byed pa ni rtag tu mdzes pa yin te// nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba stong gis gsal shing shel ltar dag pa mdog dkar ba
235b7(rgyud): dri zhim pa dang / glang po che'i bya la dang / dpral ba dang / ba lang gi gnas lhar skyon med cing mnyam par 'thun la shin tu dul gded dpon gcig pu'i nor bur gyur cing gsang sngags 'bum
235b8(rgyud): bzlas pas legs par sgrub pa/ gser dang / gos ltar kun tu 'bar ba ni thig le yin no// smin mtshams kyi bar dpral ba na shin tu phra ba rtag tu rtag par mdzes pa ni zla ba nya ba mkha' la 'gro ba lta
236a1(rgyud): bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na gsal ba ni rgyu skar gyi rgyal po rdzab dbus na gnas pa bzhin rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na lha rnams kyi rgyal po dang po brgya d+hin lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus
236a2(rgyud): na ni 'jog rten gyi rgyal po bdugs gcig pa ltar 'bar ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi nang na gdugs gcig pa bde bar gshegs pa ltar shin tu dum ba yin la shAkya'i rigs kyi brgyud ltar sems can tham
236a3(rgyud): cad pa phan par 'dod pa de bzhin du nor bu mchog rnam par dag pa ni sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin no// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ji ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug cig pu lnga
236a4(rgyud): mchog dang / rang mchog sems can thams cad kyi don du ston pa dbyed de de ltar thig la nor bu'i mthu ni 'dod pa thams cad tu sbyin par bye'o// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang bcas
236a5(rgyud): ba dbang du byar 'gyur zhing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po dbang pa dbang du 'gyur bar rje su 'gro ba dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dod par gyur
236a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ba ni na mnga' la skar ma ltar dpral bar rtag tu dbang du gyur pa yin te/ sems can thams kyi mgo bos rkang pa'i drung du rtag tu 'dud la me yis mi 'tshig chu yis mi
236a7(rgyud): byer zhing lus la dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / phye ma'i dug dang / byad mi bzad pa dang / ngan sdig dang / sdang ba'i rnam pas mi tshugs par 'gyur te/ nor bu lta bu'i mthus de dag thams cad kyis mi tshugs par
236a8(rgyud): 'bruro// rims dang sdug bsngal ba dang / nad dang / rlung dang / klad nad chen po 'thig le byas pa lta bur mod la de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems can btson du bzung ba'am chad pas babadas
236b1(rgyud): 'am/ bcing bar 'os pa la thig le lta bu byas pas de dag thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// smin mtshams dpral bar thig le lta bu byas na de'i mod la gnod sbyin stong dang / srin po drag po'i gzu
236b2(rgyud): can gdon brgya steng rnams lus la 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing glang ba che dang / ri dwags kyi bdag po'i khru dang / chom rkun dang / shad kyi lam dang / ri'i lam dang / ri sul dang / ngam grog dang greg dang / 
236b3(rgyud): glang dang / sbrul dang / sdang 'jigs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// thig le lta bu'i mthus dgra'i sde stong snyed kyi nang na 'gyed pa las myur ba nyid du rgyal bar 'gyur/ g.yul dang / 
236b4(rgyud): 'thab mo dang / tha snyad mod nyid la zhi bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe nor bu gtsug gi spyi bor btags pa gang yin pa dang / thig le yang byas nas 'khor lo la byugs la pha rol gyi dmag tshegs
236b5(rgyud): g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na bdag nyid gcig pus dpung tshogs yan lag bzhi pa las rgyal bar 'gyur/ 'dis thams cad du zhugs pa tsam gyis pham pa byas par 'gyur
236b6(rgyud): zhing phyogs bcur 'bros la thams cad 'jigs par 'gyuraro// thig le byas ras rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang/ 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur ras
236b7(rgyud): bar 'khod do// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchod gan su 'gyu ro// dpung pa g.yas par nor bu btags la yan lag dang / yan lag dag tu thig le byas na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing
236b8(rgyud): reg pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur la/ don gang dang gang bsgrubs pa de dang de thams cad 'thob par 'gyu ro// ril bu dag ni khar bcug nas// lhan cig 'dug la smras na ni// thaMd dbang du 'ong
237a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur// rgyal po dang ni btsun mo 'am/ dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang // rgyal rigs dang ni dmangs rigs nyid// skyes pa dang ni bud med dang // khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyang
237a2(rgyud): rung / de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// kun tu mngag pa'i las rnams byed// ril bu zos pa tsam gyis ni// nad rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig/ gang gi nyon bzhi pa yi rims// gang dag
237a3(rgyud): khong skom nad kyis nyams// gang zhig rtag pa'i rims kyis btab// gang du 'thab mo 'byung ba dang // de bzhin skye bo sdang sems can// badrag la grib gnon gzhan grib gnon// skem byed
237a4(rgyud): skam pa brjod byed dang // gang zhig gdon gzhan mi bzad pa/ sdig pa'i las ni kun tu spyod// sngon gyi las ni mi bzang ba// de kun skad cig tsam gyis 'jig/ ril bus
237a5(rgyud): khrus byas tsam gyis ni// 'bras dang shu bar gyur rnams dang // lkog pa dang ni rkang shu dang // mtshan par rdol dang me pal dang // khyi rngo mdze dang rkang pa'i rang // mi bzad de rnams kun dang ni
237a6(rgyud): gang dag nor rgyas sdang bas zin// byugs pa tsam gyis mod la ni// thams cad dug med zhi bar 'gyur/ ril bu thams cad las byed pa// lha rdzas shi ba sos par byed// ril bu dag ni 'chang
237a7(rgyud): byed cing // thig le dag ni byas pa yis// thams cad du ni mchod pa 'thob// wang du ni nor dag 'du// dpal 'dod pa ni dpal 'thob cing // 'bru 'dod 'bru'i phung po 'phel// lha rnams dag
237a8(rgyud): ni dga' 'gyur zhing / klu rnams kyang ni dga' dang bcas// gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang / lnga min mkha' lding mi 'am ci// lho 'phye chen po thams cad dang / 'byung po rnams kyang dag dang bcas
237b1(rgyud): / rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas 'gyur zhing // thams cad dbang du 'gyur nas 'khod// 'khod kun bran byed ci bya zer// gang zhig ril bu de dag bsten// ril bu thig le rtag byed la// de bzhin gshegs kun
237b2(rgyud): dgongs pa mdzad// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang de nyid rig la rtag tu ni// mchog sbyin dus kun gzigs par mdzad/ bsod nams phung po sdang dag ni/ nyi ma re re bsogs par bya
237b3(rgyud): 'jig rten pa yi bde spyad cing // 'jig rten pha rol rashin tu bde// tshe rje ba ni 'phos nasu// bde ba can du mod la 'gro// gang dang gang du skye bar ni// tshe rabs rtag tu tshe rabs dram// lag na rdo rje gnod
237b4(rgyud): sbyin che// gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing // g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du// dus kun tu ni srung ba dang // skyob dang sbed dang srung bar byed// gang zhig bu ni med pa dang // bud med bu ni 'dod pa la// 
237b5(rgyud): ril bu gcig cig sbyar nas// mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sdug sa ni// mkhas pas zla ba yar gyi ngor// 'dum ni tshang par bzlas nasu// zla ba nya ste bco lnga la/ skyes pa bud med khrus bya
237b6(rgyud): zhing // yan lag yan lag zig le bya/ dkon mchog gsum ni leH/ samachad cing / bram ze dag kyang mchod spun byed// srung ba'i cho ga byas nasu gtor ma dkang gsum mang po bsham/ bdag
237b7(rgyud): nyid rgyun gyis brgyan na su// gos gtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya// byams pa'i sem la yang dag gnas// snying rje sems can sdug par byed// bsam pa dag cing nges pa dang // bla ma rtag tu gus pa
237b8(rgyud): bya// me tog sna tshogs rab dgang zhing // spos dang byugs pa sna tshogs dang // du rus tsan dan sa la ki/ lha yi bdug pas bdug bya zhing // bu ram 'o ma bdun dang ni/ ril bu leg sbyar bza' 'ar bya// 
238a1(rgyud): / gsang ba 'di mthungs mod la ni// datung dang kha zas bza' bar bya// mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // mchog sbyin mdzad par mchod par bya// bya mas mdzad de yi
238a2(rgyud): zhabs drung du// mtshan mo nyal dang nang par ni// mthong ba mchog 'di thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dang // mchog sbyin rang gzugs ston mdzad cig mchog nyi
238a3(rgyud): dam pa sbyin par mdzad// bud med de ni du bskyed cing // gzugs bzang mchog tu bstan sdug/ stobs ldan gzugs ni phun sum mtshogs// lha yi dpal gyi rje su 'gro// chos ldan mkhas
238a4(rgyud): shing gsal ba dang // tshe ring dbang phyug tshad med 'gyur// dpa' bo dgra las rgyal ba dang // sdang ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// yang dran pa'i blo bskyed par 'dod pas thos pa
238a5(rgyud): la brten nas 'dug cing // rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma zhag bdun du nyin re zhing mar dang 'o ma bskol ba der ril bu bdun bcug ste/ zan ma zos pa'i sngon rol du
238a6(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas 'ja ma tsam pa 'thungs la phyis kha zas bza' bar bya/ zhag bdun byis zos pa'i rgya mtsho chen po bsags par 'gyur te bstan
238a7(rgyud): bcos thams cad dang / chos lugs dang // 'dul ba dang / snyan dang / brda sprad pa dang / mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyi bsnyad pa'i sde dang / tshigasu bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng bzhi'i sde dang / ched du/ 
238a8(rgyud): brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / chos mngon pa dang / rtsis dang / cho ga nib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad dang / theg pa chen po thad
238b1(rgyud): kha ton tu lobs par 'gyuraro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar ba byas na stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon par 'gyur te/ glang po che khri stobasu 'gyuraro// zla ba gcig tsam
238b2(rgyud): sbyar ba byas na lo lnga brgyar 'tsho zhing gnyer ma dang / skra dkar spangs la sgra zang lo 'khyil shing 'khyil bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi mdog dkar sham lta bur 'gyur/ la gcig tu sbyar na
238b3(rgyud): lha'i sman bcud kyis len mchog la 'jug cig namakha'i steng du lha rnams dang lhan cig 'thun par 'gyur la/ brgya byin dang yang lhan cig 'gran par 'gyur/ lha rnams kyi lha mo'i tshogs
238b4(rgyud): dang / lha'i gzhal med khang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na gnas par 'gyur/ nyi ma lta bur 'od gtong rgyu la gnas pa
238b5(rgyud): bzang po rnams kyis 'gro bar byed/ gzi brjid shin tu gsal ba mi bzod cing rnam par dag par 'gyur zhes bya ba la the tshom mi bya'o// las thams cad sgrub pa'i thig le dang
238b6(rgyud): ril bu sgrub pa'i cho ga bzhi pa'o// / de nas mi snang bar bya ba dang / namakha' la 'gro ba sman gyi mchog don yod pa'i mthus grub pa bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi grub pa'i
238b7(rgyud): mchog de kho na nyid yi no// sman dngul chu dang / brah+ma kI ra dang / su bar+Na kI ra dang / shel sngo sangs dang / ku kI dang / su gan d+hi dang / ka~M kuSh+Ta sgron med dang / ud pa la bzang po dang / pad+ma kA dang / gu gul dang / 
238b8(rgyud): phe lu ba ta tra dang / gur gum dang / nA ga puSh+pa dang bcas pa dang / spang spos dang / shi ri ba'i me tog dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / bcas pa bsres nas zhig tu btags pa'i phye ma la don yod
239a1(rgyud): pa pad+ma gtsug ter gyi bsang ba'i rigs kyi rgyal po'i sngags kyis shin tu brtson par lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya zhing dra ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya stong bzlas brjod
239a2(rgyud): byas pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur la/ yi ge gcig pa la lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya/ de'i tshe gsang sngags bcu po so sor lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bya ste/ gsang sngags
239a3(rgyud): thams cad rdzogs par bzlas brjod byas nas sman don yod par rgya che ba gsal ba zhes bya ba sman gyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du ngan
239a4(rgyud): ma gring ma la bskam par bya'o// yang don yang ba'i zhag 'i gtsug tor gyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod gtsang ma'i nang du bcug la nas dgos pa byung ba da'i
239a5(rgyud): thams cad du sgrub pa'i dgos pa thams sngar sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas lus legs par khrus byas la spos chus byugs te/ gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ 
239a6(rgyud): sman gyi mchog 'di yungs mar gyis sbrus la rang gi lus la byugs par bya ste/ lan gcig bskus pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur la/ gnas gsang bar bya ba'i sgo bcad pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ 
239a7(rgyud): gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur/ don thams cad byed par 'gyur/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gtso bo rgyal por 'gyur
239a8(rgyud): zhing de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas nas las su bya ba'i dgos pa thams cad kyi rje su 'jug par 'gyuraro// klu'i gnas kyi sgra
239b1(rgyud): bcad pa thams cad na 'dug la klu 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mdun du 'khod nas bya ba thams cad la ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing las bya ba dang dgos pa thams cad byed
239b2(rgyud): par 'gyur// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'khod cing nyin mtshan du gnas la de nas klu thams cad bsgo ba bzhir byed par 'gyuraro// sman la sa~M ha dzi hr-i dang ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas mgo
239b3(rgyud): kun byugs na ji lta ba yid la byas pa dang rang gi blos 'dod pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs ston par byed// gan su gtogs pa thams cad ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin ston par byed/ gan su gtogs
239b4(rgyud): ba thams cad 'khor gyi nang na ji ltar rnam par sprul pa'i gzugs sna tshogs smon par byed/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'phel ba rnams ston par byed cing bya ba thams cad byed// spos kyi
239b5(rgyud): til mar dang sbrus nas byin pa dang / rkang pa la bskus na nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing / na mkha' la 'gro bar 'a gyur la gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur/ 
239b6(rgyud): chu'i steng du 'gro zhing nams kyang phyir sa la rkang pa 'jog par mi 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa la bskus na gang dang gang la lag pa reg pa de 'ong bar 'gyur la sus kyang mthong bar mi
239b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang bsres nas mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing / don 'dod pa gang yin pa bye'o// don gyi rdzas gang yin
239b8(rgyud): pa blangs kyang mi mtho // bud med gang dang phrad na sus kyang mi mthong la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug kyang sus kyang mi she so// khar byugs nas gang dang gang na bro gar byed pa dang / bzhad
240a1(rgyud): gang byed pa nyid kyi nang du zhugs na bya ba thams cad byed la lus ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo // bum pa la byugs nas chus bkang na chu'i rgyun snang la bum pa de ni mi
240a2(rgyud): mngon// gzhong pa chus bkang ba de'i dbusu byugs na chu de gong bar snang la bum pa de ni mi sna // bdag nyid la byugs nas bum pa chus bkang ba lag na thogs na bum pa las chu 'byung
240a3(rgyud): ba ni snang la mi de'i lus ni mi snang // mig la bskus nas skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i sgra ni thos shing rang gi lus ni mi mngon no// gan su gtogs pa
240a4(rgyud): thams cad du zhugs na rang gi lus khrus ma byas kyi bar du mi mthong ngo // su yang rung ba'i mig la bskus la lus la yang bskus na de dag thams cad mi mtho ba 'gyur zhing / 
240a5(rgyud): gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mi snang ba ra 'gyur la khrus byas pa tsam gyis phyir snang bar 'gyur// lus kun la brkus nas/ mdzod cher po'i nang du zhugs na mi
240a6(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur la gser dang / dngul dang / 2 men dang / nor bu dang / mri ta ga dang / byi ru dang / dung dang / man zhem dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / margad dang / mthon kha dang / gos dang / 
240a7(rgyud): sdud pa dang / rgyan dang / lhang lhub gang yang rung ba nyid 'dod na thams cad blangs nas song na sus kyang mi mthong la gar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyuraro// ji srid khrus ma byas pa de srid du rang mi mngon pa/ 
240a8(rgyud): khrus byas na thams cad du mthong ngo // rig sngags 'chang bud med kyi nang du 'jug par 'dod pa gtsang mar khrus bya'o// de nas sgo chu drus bya'o// de'i 'og tu btsin gyi khrus bya'o// yang bur bum gyis
240b1(rgyud): / khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ba'i rnam lngas khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ba'i til mar dang / lhan gcig bsres pa des lus bsdu bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu bud med gzhon nu'i zho dang sbyar bas mig la
240b2(rgyud): bskus la de nas ril bu gsum dpung pa g.yas pa la gdab par bya'o// de nas gos gtsang ma bgos nas gsang sngags brjod cing dran par byas la rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mi mthong
240b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ lus sus kyang mi mthong ngo // nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma gnyis sam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ nyi ma bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu khrus byas la bud med de dag gi nang
240b4(rgyud): martse zhing dga' bar byed la/ yongasu spyod par byed kyang sus kyang mi shes la 'jug cing phyir 'gro ba na sus kyang glags mi rnyed de/ ji srid du khrus ma byas pa'i bar
240b5(rgyud): du rang gis lus mi snang bar 'gyuraro// phub tu 'jug na lus kun spos kyi til mar gyis byugs la phub tu zhugs na/ phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur gyis// gnas de'i nang du zhugs
240b6(rgyud): la ji ltar ji ltar la su bya ba de lha de ltar gyis shig chu'i nang du zhugs na ji ltar khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa bzhon chus mi rlan la/ chus gos par yang mi 'gyu ro// me'i nang du zhugs na ma
240b7(rgyud): lus la me reg cing tsan ngan ltar bsil bar 'gyur// klu'i gnas mtsher zhugs nas 'khod pa rnams kyis de mi thong gi sa ma da sa bya bar 'dod pa'i las kyi rnam pa gzhan dag tu
240b8(rgyud): gyis shig/ mi snang bar bya ba ril bu'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po bcu drug pa// de nas
241a1(rgyud): / sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ las thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ de bzhin du sgrib pa thams
241a2(rgyud): cad rnam par dag pa/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ gnod sbyin thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa// sangs rgya thams cad kyi
241a3(rgyud): legs par rgyal ba sbyin pa/ dgra thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / cod pa nyid dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshon cha'i dra ba thams cad las sgrol bar byed pa/ grub pa don yod pa mchog tu
241a4(rgyud): rnyed par dka' ba rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grug phyag rgya 'pho ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa las thad
241a5(rgyud): du mchog gi dngos grub kyang 'grub te 'di la tso medo// bde ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu sbyin pa dang / dbang phyug ma yin pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / lha dang / klu zas
241a6(rgyud): cad spyan 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / bdud dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gdon mi bzad pa dang / brjed byed mi bzad pa dang / tshangs pa'i srin po rnam
241a7(rgyud): thams cad thams cad du sgrol bar byed par grub pa dang / nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dus rtag tu tshar gcod par the tsom med do// rims thams cad rtog tu rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams cad
241a8(rgyud): ldog par byed gdug thams cad gsod par byed pa/ 'phral du sregs blugs byin pa tsam gyis thams cad du rtag tu gnang chen po dang / thams cad du thams cad du mthong na dga'
241b1(rgyud): / pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar mchod par bya ba dang / thams cad du spobs dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mthong ba yang sbyin par 'gyur te/ 
241b2(rgyud): 'di la the tsom med do// byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu kun tu snang ba dang / dus thams cad kyi tshe las thams cad la shin tu dga' ba dang / skye ba nas skye bar tshig btsun par 'gyuraro// thams
241b3(rgyud): cad du bla ma la srid zhu che ba dang / thams cad du mchod par 'os pa'i bla ma'o// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas rtag tu yang srung ba dang / yongasu skyong bar byed pa dang / rgyal po chen po
241b4(rgyud): bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha nyid kyis kyang / dus rtag tu srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar byed par the tshom med de// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu stong phrag
241b5(rgyud): dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / lha'i rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyis srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / snga bar byed cing / rtag tu legs par 'khor los bsgyur bar gnas par 'gyuraro// tshangs pa dang khyab
241b6(rgyud): 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen pa dang / drag po dang / gzhon nu dang / nor bu bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha dang / gang ba bzang po dang / lnga rtsen dang / gar mkhan mchog te 'di rnams kyis rtag
241b7(rgyud): tu srung ba dang / sgrub par byed cing gnas te 'di la the tshom med do// me'i lha gzi brjid chen po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / rgyu skar gyi lha rnams kyis srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang sba bar
241b8(rgyud): byed cing / mchog tu mchod pa byed pas gnas par 'gyuraro// sbyin sreg tsam 'di ni bya ba thams cad bla na med pa'i dngos grub rnams la'o// 'bras thug po che dang / yungs kar dang / 
242a1(rgyud): gu gul dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pas sbyir sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad mchog sbyin par 'gyur te/ bya ba thams
242a2(rgyud): cang sgrub par byed par 'gyu ro// tsan dan dang / pad ma'i chu ba dnga' bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / a ga ru dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas/ sa mA'i shing gi zhi ba'i ma sbar ti stong dra
242a3(rgyud): brgyad tu sbyin bsreg pa'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du nye bar gnas te/ mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyuraro// bya ba thams cad kyi
242a4(rgyud): dngos grung du yang 'gyur// yid kyi shing rta thams cad yong su rdzogs par yang 'gyuraro// chog zhing mo thams cad kyi dngos grung du yang 'gyu ro// thams cad du don yod pa thogs pa med pa'i
242a5(rgyud): dngos grung du yang 'gyuraro// bsod nams thams cad 'gugs pa'i dngos grub du yang 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor nga/ phyag rgya rims par phye ba dang / chog zhing mo dang / sgrub pa'i
242a6(rgyud): ga thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub tu 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba la rje su zhugs par 'gyuraro// seng ldeng dang / nim pa'i shing gi yam
242a7(rgyud): shing gi 'bras sa lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / mar dang / lan tshwa dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po

242b1(rgyud): las rgyal bar 'gyuro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad las rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyuraro// tsan dan dang 'bras yos dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar sras pa'i pad+ma

242b3(rgyud): thams cad dang / bud med dang skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la srung ba dang / bslab pa'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyuraro// nad thams cad thams cad du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 
242b4(rgyud): gcan zan gtum pa thams cad dang / sbrul gdu ga pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad byams par 'gyu ro// rgyal po dang / yul 'khor dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongasu bskor
242b5(rgyud): ba thams cad shis pa dang / bde bar 'gyuraro// ma ta ma ga dang / yungs kar dang / mar dang / klu shing gi me tog pa/ 'bras yos rnams bsres pas arga'i shing gi yam shing gi
242b6(rgyud): me sbar la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na char mi 'bab par byed pa la de nas klu chen po rnams kyis tshar gyi rgyun 'byin par byed de ji srid char ba 'bab par 'dod pa'i bar du'o// 
242b7(rgyud): lo thag dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / shing gil ba dang / sman gyi rdzas dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do// legs par yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// klu'i rgyal po
242b8(rgyud): chen po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dga' ba chen por 'gyur zhing / dus dus su ji lta ba bzhin du char gyi rgyur 'byin par byed do// sa cang char ches na de nyid kyi thal bas
243a1(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na ha cang char che ba rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'bras yos dang / go la dang / yungs kar dang / gtum po'i sa bon mar dang bsres pa'i
243a2(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas na/ rlung dang ser ba thams cad bzlog par byed do// dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug du mtshams chen po bcing bar byas par 'gyuro// rlung bcing ba la yungs kar
243a3(rgyud): dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing bar byas par 'gyur te/ ji srid du be ram b+ha'i rlung gi bar du bcings par 'gyu ro// klu bcing ba
243a4(rgyud): la ni yungs kar dang / til gyis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ lo bcu gnyis su klu bcings pa byas par 'gyuraro// nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni/ yungs kar mar dang bsres
243a5(rgyud): pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nad tha mas cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// pha ro yi dmag pa tshogs lnga ga ba la ni/ ka ra bi'i shing gis me sbar te/ nim pa'i
243a6(rgyud): mdab ma dang / lan tshwa dang / phug ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad rnam par nyams par byed de/ ji srid
243a7(rgyud): 'tsho'i bar du byis 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// phyogs bcing ba la/ dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug gis so// til dang yungs kar dang 'bras yos dang / pad+ma'i mdab ma mang dang bsre bas

243b5(rgyud): btags pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyor/ rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la/ bu ram dang / mar dang / 'bras yos dang / arga'i mangs mas sbyin sre/

243b7(rgyud): byed pa'i mchog 'grub po/ rje rigs dbang du byed pa la/ mar rnam pa gsum gyis bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ rje rigs thams cad dbang bye'o// sna ma'i me tog mar gyis
243b8(rgyud): btags pa'i sbyin sreg srung drag brgyad byas ni bud med thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur// gzhon nu ma dbang du byed pa la/ chu'i me tog mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag
244a1(rgyud): brgyad byas na/ gzhon nu ma thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa la/ 'bru dang mar gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ 'jigs

244a5(rgyud): gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya da byas na/ grong rnyed par 'gyuraro// gter gdon pa la ni/ pad+ma'i chub mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na
244a6(rgyud): gter chen po so sor rnyed do// gnod sbyin spyan dreng bar 'dod pas/ gu gul dang / gtum po'i sa bon dang / sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ gnod sbyin

244b1(rgyud): can ma 'ongs te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod par bye'o// rnam pa gsum brjod par bya ste/ ma dang chung ma dang / sring mo'o// gal te ma yin na bu la zhen pas/ nor dang 'bru dang longs spyod chen po rna

245b5(rgyud): gyi snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la mig la byu ga par bya ste mi snang bar 'gyuraro// skye bo mang po'i dbusu na mkha' la nye bar gnas par byedo// hUM yig gis mthong bar bya'o// namakha'

245b7(rgyud): na/ chu bo dang / chu klung chen po'i steng nas 'gro ste rkang pa la chus gos par mi 'gyuro// me chen po 'bar ba'i nang du 'jug ste/ sreg par mi byed cing / ba spu'i khung bu gcig kyang 'byi bar mi 'gyuraro// phye mas
245b8(rgyud): phyogs bzhir na mkha' la kun tu gtor ma me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i char gyi rgyun ltung bar bye// rin pa che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang mthong bar byed/ lus mtha' dag 'byug par/ 
246a1(rgyud): bya zhing skye bo'i mig sman bsku zhing / phye mas gtor nas ljongs chen po'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/ de cung zad kyang mi mthong ngo // ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du rmongs pa chen po'i sgyu ma ston par
246a2(rgyud): byed de/ rgyal po dang / dmag sde chen po dang / drang srong gi gzugs dang / gser gyi bum pa can dang / mi'i seng ge dang / phag dang / dga' byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / rol rnyed ma phrogs pa dang / zla 'od mgo ba yong su gtong pa
246a3(rgyud): ston par bye'o// 'joms pa dang / gsod pa dang / srog 'dor ba ston par bye'o// me tog gi char ram/ 'bras bu'i char ram/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / 'bru'i char ston par byed// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam
246a4(rgyud): 'gyur rnams ston par byed de/ gzhal med khang chen po 'i rnam pa rnams bsam pa tsam gyis ston par bye'o// dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug na/ rnam par 'phrul pa rnam sna tshogs pa la sogs pa ya ma zung gzhal
246a5(rgyud): du med pa ston par bye'o// bdag nyid kyi mgo bo la bsku sa nas mgrin pa tsam gyis dri za/ til mar bsgos pa'i phye mas gtor bar bya zhing / mig sman gyis byug par bya/ phye mas lus mtha' dag la
