246a8(rgyud): ston par bye'o// rig byed bzhi pa'i nang du shing arga'i 'o mas bsgos nas byugs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum pa'i gzugasu mthong bar bye'o// lha'i gar ma khan sna tshogs pa'i gzugasu mthong bar byed// 
246b1(rgyud): / ji lta ji ltar yid la byed bzhin pa'i b+ha ra ta dang / dga' byed rnams mthong bar byed// 'khor chen po'i dbus rnam pa tshogs pa'i gang mkhan rnamasu ston par byed// rgyal ba'i pho brang du rgyal po chen po 'tsha
246b2(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i dbus/ lha'i gar mkhan sna tshogs pa rnam su mthong bar byeda'o// gling gi dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po sna tshogs pa dang / mAn d+hA ha dang / yong ldan dang / shing rta bcu pa dang / rin chen 'od/ 
246b3(rgyud): dang / drag pos 'os byin dang / mi bdag dang / mnga' bdag dang / tshong ba dang / ded dpon dang / zhi ba dang / mche bzang dang / snying rje can dang / pad+ma dkar po la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig pa'i gar mkhan rnams
246b4(rgyud): mthong ngo // rin po che'i char dang / gos kyi char dang / bud pa'i tshar dang / lbab lhub kyi char mthong bar byed// me tog gi ga zhal med khang dang / 'bras bu'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed// 
246b5(rgyud): gzhal med khang la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs ba mthong bar bye'o// de ltar na mig sman dang phye ma mthu chen po bsku ba dang sbyor bas gzhal med khang dang / gar mkhan dang gzhal med
246b6(rgyud): yang mthong bar byed/ ji srid sna sgrogs dang / 'jigs byed dang / bum pa dang gzhal med khang mthong ba dang / ha nu ma'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed pa dang / gar mkhan rmongs pa chen po'i gzhal med pa
246b7(rgyud): mthong bar bye'o// ji srid bdud 'joms pa la sogs pa dmag sde sna tshogs pa'i mchog gi gzugs kyi bar du mthong bar bye'o// stobs dang / brtson 'grus chen po mthong bar bye'o// mig sman dang phye ma'i
246b8(rgyud): sbyor ba gsum tsam gyis dngos grub ni/ bsku ba dang / bklags pa dang / yang dag par sbyar bas tshe'i dngos grub chen por 'gyuraro// sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa 'grub te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta
247a1(rgyud): bde bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba'i dngos grub tu 'gyuraro// rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyi dngos grub chen po rgya che ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du 'grub par 'gyuraro// sgrub pa'i dngos grub bla na med
247a2(rgyud): ba'i cho ga rmongs pa chen po'i cho ga'o// de nas dkyil 'khor ba shang bar bya ste/ de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dngos grub dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi
247a3(rgyud): dngos grub kyi de kho na 'di bla na med pa'o// dang por sdig pa zad par byed pa de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa
247a4(rgyud): dang sngags kyi dngos grub dang / mchog gi dngos grub dang / gzungs thob pa'i dngos grub rnams dang / sa bcu la rab tu 'jug par bya/ da ba grub pa/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrub thabs de kho na nyid mthong ba
247a5(rgyud): rmad du byung ba/ byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar byed pa/ rdo rje gdan gyi gnasu yang dag par lhag par gnas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa/ bdud 'joms shing tshar gcod pa/ 
247a6(rgyud): bgegs thams cad ltung bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi gnas mthong bar byed pa/ de nyid las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas dang mnyam pa/ sems can thams
247a7(rgyud): cad thun mong ba'o// de nas po Ta la ka'i gzhal med khang dang mnyam pa'i gnas/ don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/ skad cig la mnar med pa'i gnas dang / mtshams med pa lnga rna
247a8(rgyud): bar sbyong bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas dang mnyam pa/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi mchog byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i gnas de
247b1(rgyud): bzhin du rdo rje snying po'i dge ba 'phel ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rig sngags kyi dngos grub dang / de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs dang / de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs dang / de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs kyi
247b2(rgyud): dngos grub dang / dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo gcig pur zhugs pa dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ri rab chen po dang / mnyam pa'i gnas/ de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po lta bu/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas zad
247b3(rgyud): du son pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog rab tu sbyin pa/ dpag bsam shing dang mtshungs pa'i gnas/ yid kyi shing rta thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed pa/ re bi sum tshogs par byed pa'i gnas/ 
247b4(rgyud): thams cad du mchog sbyin pa po// 'di ni byang chub kyi sa bon gyi gnas te/ sems can thams cad cag tu sgrol bar bya da nga/ dan yod pa'i gnas gsang zhing rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa bla na med
247b5(rgyud): pa'o// bsod nams thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya da pa/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po'i gnas/ chos kyi mdzod dang
247b6(rgyud): rag tu ma nam gsangs rgyas kyi mdzod mdzad chen po spyan ris gzigs kyi mdzod la mkhas pa/ drug tu bad+ma'i mdzod de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod/ rdo rje'i mdzod/ de bzhin du ra
247b7(rgyud): bu chen po nyid kyi mdzod/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab pa/ mi g.yo ga mi 'gul gzil gyi mi gnon pa'o// bdud dang / log par 'dren pa/ bgegs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / srin pa
247b8(rgyud): kyis sdang ba'i sems kyis 'jug par mi nuso// de la mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnyed dka' zhing bla na med pa'o// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bya ste/ ba byung dang yang dag par ldan pa khru sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bya'o// 
248a1(rgyud): yang na khru brgyad par bya ste/ de phyed dang gnyis kyi bu'i tshad kyi thig skud kyis tshad rnam par phye ste gdab par bya'o// grwa bzhi mnyam par phye ba logs pa ni lags par rna
248a2(rgyud): par phye gshin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu legs par bcags pa/ bsnyen la 'jam zhing rgyan pags gzhi bai DUr+ya'i kha dog la dkyil 'khor mdzes pa thig gis char rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ 
248a3(rgyud): sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba skud pa la tshen sna lnga byin te/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por gru bzhi par rnam par dbya'o// khru gnyis kyi tshad kyi re kha lnga rnam par dbye'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor
248a4(rgyud): gyi snying por pad+ma mdab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis paM kun nas rgyas pa bri bar bya ste/ dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la/ don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor bya ste/ pad+ma phyed kha bye ba'i pad+ma'i mdab ma'i
248a5(rgyud): steng du/ pad+ma la zhal gsum par bri bar bya ste/ bde ba'i gzugs dang mtshan gyis rgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi rnam pa' bar ba'i snying po la khor yug tu yongasu bskor ba bri'o// 
248a6(rgyud): gzhogs g.yasu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs ral pa'i cod pan gyis rgyan pa/ dbu la 'od dpag med 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus cano// gzhogs g.yon du 'phag
248a7(rgyud): baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs ral pa dang rgyan bcings pa 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus dang dbu la pad+ma gtsug tor gyi khor yug tu 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o// phyi rol
248a8(rgyud): tu tsam pa ka dang bArI ka dang / ud pal sngon po'i me tog gi phreng ba bcing bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying pa'i grwa bzhi'i gnas rnamasu rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya ste/ go tsha dang ya
248b1(rgyud): lang bsgos pa drag po'i gzugs can/ 'jigs par byed pa// 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i snying po'i luso// dkyil 'khor gyi re kha sngon ma la/ rdo rje dang mdung rtse gsum pa'i re kha 'bar ba dang bcas pa
248b2(rgyud): bri bar bya'o// de la rim par phye ba/ gnyis pa la me tog gi re la bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la nor bu rin po che chen po'i skud par kha bri bar bya'o// de la bzhi pa la lag pa'i phyag rgya mtshon ma snatsha
248b3(rgyud): ba 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o// de la lnga pa la kha khyer gyi rnam pa bri bar bya ste/ tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba rnam par bkra ba'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i khor yug tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mtshon cha
248b4(rgyud): sna tshogs pa rnams bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi rnamasu gnod sbyin chen po bya ste/ drag po drag du rgod pa 'i gzugs can/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ bzhin rnam par
248b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba bum pa gang ba thogs pa/ sgra brdzes brgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa zod pa'i cod pan can/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can ri bo'i gdan la gnas par bya'o// kyis
248b6(rgyud): 'khor gyi re kha'i phyi rol tu phreng gsum 'gyur du bri bar bya'o// pad+ma dang / ud pa la ldan pa dang / tsam pa ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / wA rI ka dang / a d+hi muk+Sha ka rnams rnam par dad par
248b7(rgyud): bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis/ dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar byas nas/ shin tu rnam par phye gshin tu mkhas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan dang / rta babs bzhis
248b8(rgyud): mdzes par byas pa khor yug tu mda' dang / tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra ba'i ba dan dang / gdugs dang rgyal tshan dang / ba da na dang / bla re dang / dar dbyangs dang / khor yug du bum pa gang
249a1(rgyud): ba bcu drug dang / gtor ma'i bum pa bcu drug dang / de bzhin du bdug pa'i snod bcu drug dang / gzhong pa bcu drug tu rab tu brjod// bam por bcu drug tu bshad pa dang / dri sna
249a2(rgyud): tshogs pa'i snod dang / lhung bzed bcu drug nyid dang / mchod yon gyi snod bcu drug dang / dngul gyi snod pa ni dang / dro'i phye ma rnams bzhag cing / gtor ma'i bum pa bcu drug bzhags nas pog phor bzhi
249a3(rgyud): nang du/ tsan ngan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / 2dang / gu gul gyi bdug pas sreg cing / de bzhin du skrik+ka dang / sra rtsi dog dang / gur bum dang / gla rtsi dang / 'bo la dang / ga pur tsam dang yang dag par ldan
249a4(rgyud): pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi byug pa la di nye bar bzhag par bya'o// tsan ngan dang / gur gum dang / de bzhin du/ dzaM g+ha dang / bal+li ka'i phye ma rnams thams cad yang dag par sbyar
249a5(rgyud): ba 'dis phye mar sbyar bas bsgos pa'o// me tog sna tshogs bcal du bkram zhig ji ltar 'dod pa/ ji ltar stong pa dang / ji ltar thob pa'i me tog mdzes pa mngon par gtor bar bya'o// 
249a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu dri'i chus gang ba'i bum pa ma reg pa dang / gser dang / dngul las byung ba'i snod gsar pa nyid dang / zangs dang / sa las byung ba'i mchog dang / dri sna tshogs sbyar bas dgang bar
249a7(rgyud): bya'o// bum pa dang / bkrang shis bcing bar bya zhing / pi waM dang gos bzang po dang rgyan dang lhang lhub rnams kyis brgyan par bya'o// ring bsrel pad+ma'i steng du bzhag nas/ bum pa dang / gtsug tor gyi mtshan
249a8(rgyud): nyid dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / gdu bu byas nas bzhag par bya'o// dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po nyid kyi gsang sngags stong phrag brgyad bzla so// de nas gtor ma'i
249b1(rgyud): las la mnyam par bzhag nas sna tshogs pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dkar po dang / de bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i gzugs nyid dang / sna tshogs pa'i ro bzhag par bya'o// rnam pa sna tshog su
249b2(rgyud): phye ba'i sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang / sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i kha dog dbo nyid dang / sna tshogs pa'i yul du rgyu ba ste/ 'di ni gtor mar brjod/ 'byor ba'i gtor mar ba shad// 
249b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan gdags te/ sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen po dang / sna tshogs pa'i lo ma sngon po'i phreng ba dang / mar me'i phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang / ji ltar rnyed pa'i mang dang
249b4(rgyud): til mar gyi kun nas bkang pa brgya rtsa brgyad do// bdag dngos grub 'dod pa rnams phye dang / la phug dang / dkar dang / la du dang / sran ma mud ga'i la du dang / 'bras bu rnams de bzhin du
249b5(rgyud): log 'dren la gtor mar byin pas las thad bde blag du 'grub po// phyi'i zan dang / zho'i nyid bu dang / lo ma sngon bo nyid/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po kun nas phyogs bzhir gnas
249b6(rgyud): pa rnams la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// zho'i zan dang 'o ma yang ste 'di ni 'byung po'i gtor mar ba shad do// lo ma'i gong bu dang / phye dang / 'bras thug po che'i zan dang / de bzhin du 'khur ba zlum pa
249b7(rgyud): ste/ 'di ni phyogs bzhir yi dgas dang sha za rnams la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// 'bras thug po che dang / 'o ma'i zan ni zla ba dang / nyi ma'i tshogs kyis lhan cig pa'i lha dang rgyu skar rnams kyi
249b8(rgyud): gtor mar bya'o// rtag tu tsan dan gyi chu dang / de bzhin du me tog dang 'o ma'i zan ni mtshan mo'i lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya ste las kyi dngos grub bla na me pa'o// 'bru bdun mdzes pa chen po dang / 
250a1(rgyud): shing sdu sa mchog tu mdzes pa/ 'bras A ma du bskol ba mdzes pa dang / zhwa dang 'o ma so sor mnyam pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnam pa bdun po
250a2(rgyud): sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o sa rkurba dang / rtse mo dang / 'bras thug po che brtsos pa'i khu ba dang ldan pa 'di/ rlung lha'i gtor mar brjod de rlung gi dkyil 'khor tham
250a3(rgyud): cad dgyes par byed// zho dang / 'o ma bskol ba dang / 'bras thugs po che dang / hwags dang bcas shing / bu ram dang bcas par ldan pa/ 'khur ba zlum po dang / mar gyis gang ba'i 'khur ba 'di ni klu'i
250a4(rgyud): rgyal po rnams kyis gtor mar brjod de/ las thams cad sgrub pa'o// 'khur ba zlum po dang / ba byung lnga dang / pu shel tshe dang / ma la ya'i tsan dan dang / 'bras thug po che dang / zhabs bsi
250a5(rgyud): dang / mchod yon rnams bdud kyi dkyil 'khor la gta raM mar sbyin par bya'o// gur gum gyi chu dang / 'bras thug po che la dri bzang pos bsgos te/ chu klung gi rgyal po la
250a6(rgyud): gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// thams cad du las thams cad sgrub par byed do// rtsa dur ba'i chu dang / 'o ma dang / gtum pa'i sa bon brtsos pa dang / 'bras thug po che ni tshangs pa'i srin po nyid dang / 
250a7(rgyud): gsang ba pa rnams la gtor mar dbul bar bya ste thams cad rigs pas so// 'di ni gto lnga brjod de/ bgegs rnams kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa la bgegs rnams ji srid 'tsho'i bar
250a8(rgyud): du dga' bar 'gyur te the tsom med// de'i phyir rig sngags 'chang mkhas pas thams cad legs par bsgrub par bya'o// zho dang / 'o ma dnga'o thug dang / bu ram dang / mar dang / li khar dang ldan pa
250b1(rgyud): 'di bdag skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lnga la gtor mar sbyin par bya ste/ tshe'i dngos grub dang / de bzhin du rgyas pa dang / zhi ba dang / sdig pa thams cad ldog par byeda'o// 'di ni gtor mar brjod de rig
250b2(rgyud): sngags 'chang rnams kyi bde ba thob pa'o// bya ba gang yin pa de rnams la bdag gi gtor ma thun gsum du byas na/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi rig sngags dang / gsang sngags bde blag du
250b3(rgyud): 'grub te the tsom mdo// de'i bgegs thams cad dang / sdig pa dang sdang ba rnams nam yang bar du gcod par mi nus te/ nam yang phyis sdig pa mi 'byung // rtag tu gtor ma rgyas pa thob par
250b4(rgyud): byed cing / stobs dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / thed thogs pa med par 'gyuraro// de lta bu byed bzhin pa'i rig sngags smra ba 'i mkhas pa de bgegs rnams thams cad kyis
250b5(rgyud): de nam du yang mthong bar mi 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung pa dang / sha zas sdang bar byed pa med// nod me nga cing rgyal ba'i dpal min med la skem byed dang / 
250b6(rgyud): skem pa med la/ brjed byed dang / klu dang / gza' dang / rims med cing / thams cad kyi tshe cung zad kyang mdo// dug med cing sbyar ba'i dug nyid kyang med la byang snyems thams cad kyang
250b7(rgyud): nam yang mi yang ste/ kun nas dpag chad stong phrag tu ring du 'dres par byed// kun nas stobs nyid rgyud pa dang / de bzhin du yang dga' ba dang / de bzhin du yang stobs dang brtson phun
250b8(rgyud): dang gzi brjid 'phel bar 'gyur// thams cad du phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par byed// tshe ring du 'phel zhing lha dang / mi rnams kyi
251a1(rgyud): / mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyuraro// skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lnga gang yin pa yang dri yong su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing de rnams thams cad kyi ji srid 'tsho'i bar du stobs dang / brtson
251a2(rgyud): 'grus 'phel bar byed cing the tsom mdo// de la dgra mi 'byung zhing nam du yang phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo med de phyag rgya 'dzin pa nyid med kyang dkyil 'khor gyi mchog tu zhugs pa tsam gyi mod
251a3(rgyud): la 'am/ yang na 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam la/ de rnams kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i
251a4(rgyud): lusu 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du ba sod nams kyi phung po rab tu skye bar 'gyur te/ rab
251a5(rgyud): chen po dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung ba chen pa / 'dzin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcuH
251a6(rgyud): dgu dang / mnyam pa'i drung du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang lnga dag par ldan par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang
251a7(rgyud): sngags rnams kyi dngos grub chen po so sor rnyed do// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ ris thun mong ba'i tshogs bsdus pa'i sar bsgrod de phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// sum cu rtsa gnyis
251a8(rgyud): gyi lha'i gnas na gnas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig thams cad du srung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i cheng du yang dag par
251b1(rgyud): sgrub par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po du ma rig pa 'dzin pa byed pa'i tshogs kyi yongasu bskor zhing rtag tu rjesu 'brang ba rnams srung ba dang
251b2(rgyud): bsgrub pa dang / sba ba'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur// chubs chen po dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa dang / mdangs kyi rnam pa sa sar rnyeng par 'gyur/ dkyil 'tshar
251b3(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyis med la bskal pa bye bar rgyud nas bsags pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams dang / mnang med pa la gzhol ba de thaMd yongasu zad
251b4(rgyud): cing yongasu gtugs par 'gyuraro// thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed// don yod pa'i bya ba'i dngos grub so sor rnye do / sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa'i dri ma dang / ser sna'i
251b5(rgyud): dri ma thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten thaMd dga' ba dang bla ma chen po mtsha lnga la lnga 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'dod par yang 'gyur/ 
251b6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtag tu mchog rtsol bar byed cing bla mar 'gyur ro// 'chi 'phos te skye brje ba na bsams pa nyid kyi mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khas
251b7(rgyud): su pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ kyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi bla mar dashes par bya/ mchod par bya/ 'ang dpag med
251b8(rgyud): dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob kyi bkod pa dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// des na rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des kyang la 'khor du 'jug pa
252a1(rgyud): byas nas/ kun nas mtshams bcing ba bsang shing / srung ba'i cho ga byas la/ bdag bcing ba dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba byas ste/ de'i 'og tu kha shar
252a2(rgyud): du phyogs te/ dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/ don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug
252a3(rgyud): spos dbul bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du pad+ma'i ge sar gyi dbus tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chad pa/ pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs te/ 
252a4(rgyud): bzhengs nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs par mdzad/ rig sngags 'chang la bka' stsal pa/ rig sngags 'a chang legaso leg so// khyod kyi rig pa 'dzin pa grub bo// don yod
252a5(rgyud): ba'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rje su zung cig/ rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// 
252a6(rgyud): 'di ni rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyi mngal du gnas pa'i skye ba'i tha ma yin te / skye ba rjes nas thams cad du pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro/ skye ba nas skye ba thams cad du don yadangs
252a7(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mtha' dag kha ton du byedado// don yod zhags pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa/ kha ton du kun tu gan so// de nas rig sngags 'am
252a8(rgyud): gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dbul bar bya/ a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya// me tog ji ltar 'byor pa dngul bar
252b1(rgyud): b+ha gang shegasu gsol bar bya ste/ des 'bags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de lta bu byas nas rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la 'gro'o// don yod pa'i gtsug tor ba
252b2(rgyud): ma dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin so sor thob te/ rig pa 'dzin pa bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhis yongasu bskor bar 'gyur zhing / pad+ma'i ris kyi 'khor
252b3(rgyud): los bsgyur bar 'gyur// tshe lo bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// de nas de'i ras ris bshad par bya ste/ ngan mo
252b4(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig pas ras zla bzhi pa byas nas sam/ yang na daral bal tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par bye ste/ lha'i gzugs mchog tu mdzes pa/ phyag gnyis pa 'od
252b5(rgyud): zer gyi 'khor bar bya'o// ras ris sgrub pa ni/ dkar pa'i phyogs kyi tshes bco lnga la tshon lhags ma min pa snad gas ra bar bzhag pas ri mo mkhan gtsang ma legs par khrus
252b6(rgyud): byas pas 'drir gzhugs par bya'o// dbusu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chad pra/ pad+ma rgyas pas yongasu bskor ba bya ste/ khor lug tu 'od mngom gang gakun nas
252b7(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng ba can phyag bani gzhal gsum pa ral pa'i cad pan gyis rgyan pa zla ba tshes pas smras pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod ngan 'chang ga mdung rtsi gsum 'chang ga/ pad+ma'i mdab ma rnam par
252b8(rgyud): bkra ba'i pad+ma'i zhags pa 'chang ba/ phyag g.yon par pad+ma 'chang ga pad+ma'i steng du pad+mo gtsug tor bya'o// mdab ma phyed la bya ba'i dbus kyi bad+ma'i mdab ma la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
253a1(rgyud): dbang phyug mgul yan chad tsam cod pan 'chang ba dbu 'bar ba'i snying par yod par bri bar bya'o// phyag gcig ni dbugs 'byin pa 'chang zhing rin po che'i char
253a2(rgyud): 'bebs ga 'bar ba'i snying po can rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gos 'chang ba bya'o// pad+ma'i gdan la klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo mgo bo dgu pa klu yis
253a3(rgyud): yongasu bskor ba dang bcas pa/ thal mo 'chang zhing lus byed par bya'o// nya dang / chu srin dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu shel dang / ngang pa dang / ngur ba dang / shang shang te rus yang dag par rgyan
253a4(rgyud): pa'i kha khyer dang bcas pas smras pa'o// gnags gal su sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ thal mo sbyar bu smad de 'dzin pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can bya'o// g.yon
253a5(rgyud): du gos dkar mo gos dkar po 'chang brgyan thams cad kyi rnaM bar brgyan pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can/ thal mo smad de 'chang ba'o// gzhogs g.yasu khro gnyer
253a6(rgyud): can skyil mo krung phyed pas gzhugs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu dkar sham ma gos dkar po 'chang ba bya'o// g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya ste/ phyag brgyad pa/ drag mo drag tu rgod pa tha
253a7(rgyud): nya mo bya'o// bzhin khro gnyer can thams cad skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa thams cad pad+ma'i gdan la gzhugs pa bya'o// steng du tshangs pa dang khyab
253a8(rgyud): 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i dbang po rnams na mkha' nas bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o// 'og tu pad+ma la gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan
253b1(rgyud): dang / gzhon nu rnams khrus bya ste/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams bya ste/ drag po'i gzugs skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs te/ de rnams thams cad kyang
253b2(rgyud): pad+ma 'dzin pa'i gzugasu bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du/ pad+ma'i gdan la rig sngags 'chang pus mo
253b3(rgyud): gtsugs pa bya ste/ pog phor dang / lag na me tog gi bor ba dang / bgrang phreng 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la blta bar byed bzhin pa bya'o// de lta bu'i ras ris kyi bya ba pad+ma yangs
253b4(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang / ras ris kyil 'khor mtha' dag gi nang du gtogs par 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyi mad la sdug bsngal dang sdig pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad
253b5(rgyud): rnam par nyams par bye'o// thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// nyes par byas pa thams cad 'joms par yang 'gyu po sdig
253b6(rgyud): bdang / sgrib pa thams cad dang mtshams med pa lnga las rnam par thar bar byed// mthong ba tsam gyi mode la don yod pa'i dngos grubs sor thob bo// sems can thams
253b7(rgyud): cad kyis kun tu bskor bar bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i 'osu 'gyuraro// dgongs pa thams cad legs par grub par byed par 'gyur// bde bar byed par 'gyuraro// nor dang gzu
253b8(rgyud): byed pa dang / dkra shis dang / longs spyod dang / rigs dang / dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / spobs pa dang / bsod nams dang / skal pa bzang por byed pa dang / bdag nyid chen po'i yon dan
254a1(rgyud): / gyi bye brag 'phel ba dang / bsod nams bsags pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'phel ba dang / phun sum tshogs par byedado// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ lasu bya bar
254a2(rgyud): 'os pa'i bya ba thams cad byedo// de ltar ras ris mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yon tan gyi bye brag lhag par rtogs par 'gyuraro zheso// ras ris sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// 
254a3(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya bshad par bya ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyi don yod pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba phyag rgya chen po bla na med pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rgyas bdab pa/ sems can tham
254a4(rgyud): cad la phan par byed pa/ don yod pa'i phyag rgyu thams cad dang sgrub thabs thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa nyid dang / 
254a5(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa/ phyag rgya gzung ba tsam gyis mnar med pa yang skems par byed pa/ dmyal ba pa rnams skems par byed pa ste/ 
254a6(rgyud): gang gis bzung ba tsam la sogs pas dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar byed cing skems par byeda'o// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
254a7(rgyud): dang rgyal ba de rnams thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyu ro// phyogs bcu kun tu gzigs par 'gyur te the tsom medo// dus gsum pa rgyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
254a8(rgyud): thams cad dang / de bzhin du pad+ma'i phyag gi rtag tu mchog sbyin pa dang / rtag tu mthong bar 'dod pa dang / lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed cing dga' ba dang / 'og min gyi
254b1(rgyud): lha dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha thams cad kyis/ srung bar byed cing kun nas yongasu myong bar byed de/ thams cad la cho ga bzhin du bdag nyid kyi snying las
254b2(rgyud): skyes pa'i bu bzhin du dge ba dang / zhi ba dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus nyid dang / mdangs kyang rab tu 'jug par byed cing de bzhin du yang tshe 'phe'o// phyag rgya 'di rnams bzung bas bkra mi shis pa
254b3(rgyud): thams cad nyams par byedado// bgegs thams cad nyams par byed cing / bdud dang / log par 'dren pa dang / bdug pa'i gnod sbyin rnam par nyams par byed// gdugs pa'i
254b4(rgyud): srin pa dang / yi dwags thams cad kyang / phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pa'i skad cig de la mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'a gas shing mig 'byin par byed// brgya byin dang / tshigs dang
254b5(rgyud): bcas pa'i gdugs pa thams cad rab tu nyams par byedo// de'i phyir yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa la lag pa'i thal mo pad+ma 'dra ga pad+ma 'byung ba'i gtsug tor
254b6(rgyud): don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bsdigs mdzub yongasu dkris la/ mthe bong gi sor mo dang / gung mo'i sor mo rab tu brkyangs la lcags kyu'i rnam par bkug te/ mad med dang / mthe'u
254b7(rgyud): chung lag pa'i nang du bcug nas rtag tu snying kha'i gnasu bzhag par bya ste/ 'di ni don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi sngags dang phyag brgyar brjod// de bzung ba tsam dang / 
254b8(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags brjod pa nyid kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos te/ char 'bab par byedo// me tig gi mar dang
255a1(rgyud): lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub rnams mchod pa'i don du kun nas char 'bab po// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
255a2(rgyud): dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po stong phrag bskyed// phyag rgya de gzung ba tsam gyi skad cig de la phyag rgya gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa
255a3(rgyud): bye ba stong phrag bye ba'i grangasu bgrangs pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyuraro// phyag rgya de bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhir du thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag
255a4(rgyud): rgyas byin gyis rlobo// ri rab kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i phung por byas te/ dus gsuM du gsheg/ sa pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ so so so so la phul
255a5(rgyud): ba dang / rgyal ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po thob pa 'i grangs kyi tshogs nyid kyang phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'di 'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas
255a6(rgyud): nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzigs par the tsom medo// zheso// phyag rgya 'di nyid las g.yas pa'i mdzub mo brkyangs te/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan gcig brjod// phyag rgya 'di ni don yod
255a7(rgyud): zhags pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi stobs spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po zhes bya ste/ thams cad du las thams cad legs par thob par byed// phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam gyis kyang
255a8(rgyud): bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / spyan ras gzigs don yod pa dri ma med pa'i dngos grub du yang 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzigs pa dag pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya yang
255b1(rgyud): dag par 'dzin par 'gyuro// sdig pa dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// phyag rgya 'di bzung ba tsam dang / dang po bcings pa tsam gyis ri rab chen po ltar
255b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis/ mi 'gul zhing mi g.yo la zil gyis mi non par yang 'gyur// phyir rgol ba
255b3(rgyud): dang dgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad nas yongasu grol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu rtsa dgu'i drung du dge ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs
255b4(rgyud): chen po kun tu 'dzin par 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mngon sum du mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// phyag
255b5(rgyud): rgya'i gsang ba'i lhag par 'dre pa 'di 'ching bzhin paM de de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gang cung zad yod pa de mig gis gsal bar mthong ngo // thams cad du rab tu
255b6(rgyud): 'ching zhing 'dzin par 'gyuraro// gang yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / phyag stong gi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / nor bu'i
255b7(rgyud): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / glang po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / den yang zhags pa'i yangs pa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dang / 
255b8(rgyud): rta 'phrin gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / mgrin sngon gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / gzhan phyag rgya'i dam tshig gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang phyag rgya 'ang
256a1(rgyud): gcig pu bcings pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur la/ kun tu bcangs pa dang mchod par
256a2(rgyud): yang 'gyu ro// 'di ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gdugs cig pur gyur pa ste/ ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting
256a3(rgyud): 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bzhin du phyag rgya 'di ni sgyu ma lnga bu'i phyag rgya'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ las thams cad la phyag rgya 'di sbyar na/ gang dang gang la rab tu sbyar ba de thogs pa med
256a4(rgyud): par 'grub po// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis brkyangs la lcags kyu'i rnam pa tsam du bkug pa 'a di ni gnas pa'i phyag rgya 'di spyan drangs pa dang / bod pa dang
256a5(rgyud): yang dag par bskul ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin nyid kyang yin te/ dam tshig dang / phyag byed pa dang / 'jug pa dang / bskor ba byed pa nyid dag gdan dang / phyogs bcings pa dang / dkyil
256a6(rgyud): 'khor bcings pa dang / mtshams bcing ba zhes pa dang / gtsugs gtor bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang / khrus dang / gos bgo ba dang / nye
256a7(rgyud): reg byed pa nyid dang / sbyin sreg dang / de bzhin du sngags bzlas pa dang / gdugs pa dang / me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gtor ma 'bul ba'i las dang / de bzhin du ga
256a8(rgyud): su gsol ba nyid dang / de bzhin du 'gugs pa ste/ thams cad la phyag rgya 'di bya'o// sa bcu gnon pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags bcu la yang phyag rgya 'di bya ste snying po dang nye ba'i
256b1(rgyud): snying po 'di nyid kyang thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po nyid dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / rigs kyi gsang sngags dang / gzhan yang phyag rgya 'di dang / phyag rgya
256b2(rgyud): 'di'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po nyid kyang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / rigs kyi gsang sngags gzhan la yang gnas thams cad du sbyar bar
256b3(rgyud): bya'o// zhe so// phyag rgya'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// // phyag rgya gsum ni rnam sprul pa// phyag rgya de dag yang dag bstan// bzang po gtso bo chen po ste// mchog dang rab
256b4(rgyud): mchog cid yin mo/ phyag rgya can ma bla na med// 'jig rten 'dzin pas bstan pa yin/ snying pa de nyid gyur pa ste/ bya ga rgya dkyil chen legs par bsdubs// sangs rgyas byang ma
256b5(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di// dus gsum gtogs pa'i de ba zhin gshegs// kun gyi 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// phyag rgya dus gsum gshegs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pas phyag
256b6(rgyud): rgyar btang // de bzhin sangs rgyas chen po pa// thub pa snang mdzad kyis kyang btab// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dkyil gyi// gsang nyid kun tu bzhugs pa yin// de nas gsang sngags
256b7(rgyud): gsang ba nyid// dngos grub bla med bshad par bya/ oM a mo g+ha hri da ya/ pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a kaR+Sha ya/ sA d+ha ya b+ha ra se b+ha ra/ mahA pad+me swA hA/ bskul ba dang / spyan drang ba dang / gsheg su gsol
256b8(rgyud): ba'i sngag so// oM pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha maN+Da la hUM/ dkyil 'khor srung ba dang / phyogs bcings pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / dri chab dang / chu dang / yungs kar bsres pa la lan bdun bcwa
257a1(rgyud): / brjod byas pas bya'o// oM pad+ma shi kha re hUM/ spyi gtsugs bcing ba yin te/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas paso// oM pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a b+hu dza le hUM/ khrus bya ba'i sngags te
257a2(rgyud): yungs kar dang / tshul lan bdun bzlas brjod byas paso// oM bi ma le shud+d+he hUM/ nye reg bya ba'i sngag so// oM saMts+tsha da ya pad+me hU~M/ gos bgo ba'i sngag so// oM mi li mi li shud d+he hUM/ lus yod
257a3(rgyud): su sbyang ba'i sngags te/ ba'i rnam lnga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa so// oM pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha a d+hi Shiny+tsa A~M tA/ shud d+he hUM/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags te dri cha ba la lan
257a4(rgyud): bdun bzlas brjod byas paso// oM pad+ma ka brtse// dri D+ha ban d+ha hUM dz+wa la swA hA/ go cha'i sngags te/ la na nyi shu rtsa gci gang zlas brjed byas paso// oM badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na pad+ma hUM/ bin
257a5(rgyud): gyis brlab pa'i sngags/ oM dz+wa la pad+me d+ha ra ha ra hUM/ sa'i sngags// oM pad+ma a shra ya/ ruha tsa la tsa la hUM/ gdan gyi sdug so// oM di bya pad+mi maM me tog gi sngag so// oM pad+ma a mo g+has
257a6(rgyud): bar Ni sAhA/ bdug spos kyi sngag so// oM pad+ma gan d+ha I shwa ri hrI/ byug smos kyi sngag so// oM pad+me prakar+Ni d+ha ra Ni sa me swA hA/ 'bras yos dang me tog dram pa'i sngab sa// oM pad+ma dza le su gan d+ha ba ti hUM/ mchod yon
257a7(rgyud): dngul ba'i sngags// ming shu klab re ras yang kud d+he hUM/ lha ba gos kyi sngag so// oM su ru su ru k+She b+ha ba ti swA hA/ gtor ma'i sdig so// oM ma hA pad+ma ang shri ni sA d+ha ya hUM/ gtor ma thar bzhug pa'i sngag so// oM pha la bi shuH/ 
257a8(rgyud): dra ba hUM/ 'bras bu'i sngag so// oM pra bar buSh+pe dza ya swA hA/ phreng ba'i sngag so// oM dz+wa la dzA yas ras gri tsi hUM gtor ma bcos pa'i sngag so// oM pad+ma dI pa ya dz+wa hUM/ mar me'i sngag so// oM sa ma bad+ma b+hung rje 'as ran+d+he/ 
257b1(rgyud): / 'jug pa'i sngag so// oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha a mo b+h+ra mu ni hU~M/ phyag bya ba'i sngag so// oM tsakra maN+Da le/ sa mnu pad+me hUM/ bskor ba'i sngag so// oM sa ma n+ta pra kir tra dad+de saM b+ha ra hUM/ me tog dor ba'i sngag so// oM badz+ra
257b2(rgyud): sa ma ya uSh+NISh+Tha/ ma rdza a ma g+na saM ma la hUM/ dmachog go sngags// oM sa man+ta sA d+ha ra \u0f7f ban+de hUM phaT skyil makrung gi sngags// oM a pa ri mi ta dz+wa la pad+me hUM/ brang phreng gi sngagaso// oM she ta sa ha swa dzA
257b3(rgyud): tapad+me d+ha ra d+ha ri hUM/ bzlas brjod kyi sngag so// oM sa man+ta d+ha ri shapa d+me hUM/ rmi lam gyi sngag so// oM sa mamA rakAr cing ng+ge hUM/ srung ba'i sdug so// oM sa man+ta me ru bIn+da sI ra hU~M/ ra ba'i sngag so// oM sa ma mdza' ma la
257b4(rgyud): bar+d+hedza la dz+wa la/ ma hA pad+ma dz+wa le hUM/ me'i sngags// oM d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pras re/ d+hu sa ri man+te swA hA/ sreg thugs kyi sngagaso// oM sa ma ru a ba lo ki ta gu h+ye/ bA yu dza be pad+ma bi gi ni swA hA/ nam
257b5(rgyud): 'gro ba'i sngagaso// oM shu b+ha s+'u d+hA ra~M Ni pad+ma b+hu dz+rehUM/ mtshon cha'i sngag so// e sa man+ta A kaR+Sha Ni pra sa ra guh+ye hUM/ drang ba 'i sngag so// na maHtri b+hu ba na/ I shwa rA ya/ sa ke shwa ra ya/ ma
257b6(rgyud): shwa ra ya d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba la ki ha/ gu h+ye/ A gats+tsha b+ha ga bAn d+hi ra d+hi ri/ mahA bi ri/ ma Ni ka na badz+ra bai DUr+ya/ ma raka ta pad+ma ra ga inadra nI la mahA muk+Shi ka/ bi d+hu li ta sha ri ra/ ma hA pad+de b+hU dze/ a
257b7(rgyud): mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ ba ra dA ba ra dA ya ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha b+ha ga bAn shI g+h+raM sa ma ya/ ma nu s+pha ra/ Shi bi d+ha be Shad+ha ra ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra na mas+thita/ 
257b8(rgyud): I shwa ra/ ma he shwar/ pad+me shwa ra/ lo ki shwa ra/ me hi b+ha ga bAn/ shrIg+h+nAM sA gats+tshaHsarba bi d+hu man+ta la/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ de ri sha na swar pan/ bi bi d+ha he dza d+ha ra/ sa man+ta ra sh+mi dz+wa la gar b+ha sha rI pa/ ma hA kA ru Ne/ 
258a1(rgyud): sau ma mya mu ga pa ri pU ra Na/ tsan+d+ra maN+Da la mu kha na maHtsan+na dza Ta d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+hA/ ma ku Ta d+ha ra/ ma hA prah+ma be ba d+ha ra/ tri lo tsa na a mo g+ha ba ra da/ d+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ pad+ma bA
258a2(rgyud): shA a ba lo ki te/ shud d+ha satwa/ ba ra da ya ka/ na mo stu te swA hA// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gsheg su gsol ba'i sngagaso// rig sngags 'dis gu gul nag po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas bcwo
258a3(rgyud): byas nas 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug par bya'o// gdug pa tsam gyi mod nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis ston par mdzad cing mchog thams cad sbyin par
258a4(rgyud): mdzad// gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba des kyang bdug pa tsam gyis nges par ston par mdzad na/ dge slong tshangs par spyod pa/ bsam pa dag pa dad pa can mos pa la lha smos kyang
258a5(rgyud): ci dgos/ mod nyid la rang gi gzugs rang gi ngo tsha yong su dag pa mngon sum du ston par mdzad cig mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub sbyin par
258a6(rgyud): mdzad// drag po la bdugs na gzugs mngon sum du mdun na 'dug cing / 'dod pa dang dgos pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do// srid med kyi bu la bdugs na gzugs brnyan 'gul zhing / tshig
258a7(rgyud): 'byin la yid la bsams pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed/ rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur/ stobs dang shugs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa'i dngos grub sbyin par bye'o// ma mo'i gnas su
258a8(rgyud): nas pa chen pa la bdugs na nas pa chen pa ma mo'i chags dang bcas pa dbang gyur nas 'dug pa las dang bya ba thams cad grub par byed/ thams cad du ngas gru chen pa sgrub par byed / chags kyi/ 
258b1(rgyud): dbang phyug la bdugs ma 'gegs dang 'og 'dren thams cad bcis par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la bdugs na sdang ba dang / bdud dang / bar chad byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad
258b2(rgyud): bcing bar 'gyur zhing mi snang bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i sgor bdugs na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas dbang du 'gyur te/ nye bar gnas la 'dod pa dang bya ba thams cad bye'o//  ma shar
258b3(rgyud): ba'i tshe'i ma la mngon du phyogs nas bdug na nyi ma 'dab cing 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par bye'o/ zla ba nya la bdugs na zla ba 'bab cing dbang phyug 'byor pa men po sbyin par byed// rnam thos
258b4(rgyud): kyi bu la bdugs na nor 'phel ba chen po sbyin par bye'o// lha mo chen mo dang la la bdugs na dpal 'thab par 'gyuraro// don thams cad la bdugs pa tsam gyis 'dab cing phyugs
258b5(rgyud): bcur 'bros so// zin pa 'am ma zin pa la 'dug sa na mod la 'ong ngo // dur khror gyi mi ro la bdugs na ro langs ldang bar 'a gyuraro// thod pa la bdugs na 'bab cing gar byed glu len rgyug par
258b6(rgyud): byed cing sprod gtong byed// rdo rje la bdugs na 'baro// mdung rtse gsum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed// 'khor lo la bdugs na na mkha' la 'gro'o// zag pa la bdugs na sgril bzhin 'khril bar
258b7(rgyud): byang rdza ma dang bum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing rang nyid 'gyur bar byed pa la phan tshun 'gro bar bye'o// lhung bzed la bdugs na rang nyid 'gro bar byed// ral gri la bdugs na 'bab par byed
258b8(rgyud): cing 'bar bar byed la rang nyid 'gro bar byed// dung la bdugs nas dus na sgo gang du grags pa de dag thams cad du 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'byed pa dang / khams kyi nang dang / na
259a1(rgyud): dang 'gro ba'i nang dang / 'brug pa dang / nad thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / gdugs pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad las thar bar 'gyur
259a2(rgyud): zhing sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyuraro// rims thams cad la bdugs na/ rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// rims nyin bzhi pa la bdugs cing gsang sngags kyang rje su dran na rims nyin bzhi
259a3(rgyud): ba ku co 'don cing 'bros par 'gyuraro// klu'i mtshor bdugs na mod nyid la char gyis rgyun chen po 'bebs par bye'o// char ches na gnas mthon por bdugs na char ches pa gcod par bya'o// sprin
259a4(rgyud): la mngon du phyogs na bdugs na grang lcags dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad gcod par byed la/ lo cig gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyuraro// ri mthon po'i rtser bdugs na/ 
259a5(rgyud): phyogs thams cad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / dpag tshad stang gi bar du rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / bcings par 'gyur
259a6(rgyud): pa dpag tshad stong gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyuraro// bdag nyid la bdugs na sems can thams cad la mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur la sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ 
259a7(rgyud): bu mo la bdugs na bag mar blangs par 'gyuraro// tshong zong la bdugs na rin che bar lon par 'gyu ro// bang pa la bdugs na 'bru 'phel ba mang bar 'gyur// btung ba'i gan su bdugs na btung ba
259a8(rgyud): 'phel ba mang por 'gyu ro// gos la bdugs na gos 'thob par 'gyuraro// me tog dang 'bras bu la bdugs na gas byin pa de dag bdag nyid dam nor gyi sgo nas dbang du 'gyu ro// phreng ba la
259b1(rgyud): bdugs na gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na gang gi mgo la bcing ba de la 'bab par byed cing / ya mtshan byung ba dang 'byung ba smra'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang la bdugs na rig sngags
259b2(rgyud): chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ston par mdzad la// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad// gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs bris pa la bdugs la bsang sngag
259b3(rgyud): lan bdun dran par byas na/ gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing las byed par 'gyur la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go sbyor ba mo la bdugs na sbyor ba ma thams cad
259b4(rgyud): dang mkha'agro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bar du nye bar 'du'o// 'dod dgur sgyur ba 'i gzugs can la bdug na 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs
259b5(rgyud): can ma 'ongs nas chung mar bya'o// zhes smran ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad dang / longs spyod du bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtsi bas dga' bar
259b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / rnam thos kyi buM la 'gran par 'gyuraro// dril bu la bdugs nas sgra dkrol na 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur la/ srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur// khyim gyi nang du dkrol
259b7(rgyud): na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnod thams cad byung nas phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur/ oM T+Tas g+ha bA ga pad+ma uSh+NI la ta ra Tha
259b8(rgyud): a pa ta ra~M tu/ bA ba na~M gasma tu/ swa b+hA bA nA ma hu re hu ru/ ma hA pad+mi b+hu dze swA hA/ slar gsheg su gsol ba'i sngags te/ bdug spos gu gul dang / chu dang yungs kar dang bsres pa la
260a1(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na thams cad du slar gsheg su gsol ba'i sngags byas par 'gyuro// gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga dang sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// 
260a2(rgyud): de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sem dpa' chen po 'phags pa
260a3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod de/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo btud de thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sem
260a4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smra so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngan/ sa chen po 'jig rten du cher bstan lags so// gsang ba
260a5(rgyud): chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i snying po rig sngags 'chang
260a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang don med pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi
260a7(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po de'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa pad+ma gzhug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bgyi ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bshad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags
260a8(rgyud): 'chang gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag bkug cing g.yar drangs par 'gyur rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags sgrub cing yongs spyad pa la rim gro bgyi ba dang rab sngags 'chang sgrub padzings
260b1(rgyud): grub mchog stsal bar bgyi ba dang / bsams pa thams cad yid bzhin du yong su bslang bar bgyi ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i mngon sum du rig sngags kyi rgyal
260b2(rgyud): pabang shad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas lha mo sgrol ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha mo chen mo sgral ma rang gi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa pa'i byin gyi
260b3(rgyud): brlab kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs kyis shod cig/ de nas lham sgrol ma bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngan yod par sprul pa dri ma med pa pad+ma btsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba rig sngags
260b4(rgyud): kyi snying po smras pa/ na mas+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nI/ tA thA ga tA nAMHku rA dzA ya ad+hiSh+ThA na na ma s+thi tA nAM/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA sarba ya/ mahA
260b5(rgyud): ka ru Ni kA ya/ na maHtA rA yai/ ma hA de gaM au ny+dzar Ni hA ra Ni tA de pad+ma bi b+hu Shi ta tA ra/ ma Ni ka na ka bi tsi tri ta mA la/ dza Ta mA ku Ta na ma di ta pad+me/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pad+ma pA sh+nA b+hudza.a
260b6(rgyud): mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/ tA ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hA sid+d+hi/ ba ra de/ tu ru d+hu ru/ mahA tA ra Ni ba ra de/ sA drA ya sA dA ya/ sid+d+hi/ a me b+hA ba ra de swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha pad+mi nidz+wa re swA hA/ snying pa'o// oM ma Ni tA
260b7(rgyud): re hUM/ nye ba'i snying pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gsang sngags nar bu rin po che chen po'i snying pa// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi snying po'i zhags pa chog
260b8(rgyud): na'i ma'i rog sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa yong su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la mchog stsal ba rab tu sbal bar 'gyi ba'i slad du rjesu stsal ba lags/ bcom
261a1(rgyud): ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i yo byad dang / cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ du ru ka dang / gu gul dang smrig ka gcig tu bgyis la/ gsang sngags kyi snying po 'dis lan
261a2(rgyud): bcu rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das bdag dgug pa dang / g.yar drangs par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan
261a3(rgyud): 'das rig sngags 'di sgrub pa'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du dngos grub rje su sprul par gyi// 'gegs dang / log 'dren thams cad bzlog
261a4(rgyud): par bgyi/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad bzlog par dgyi/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / brtsod pa dang 'byed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ bsam pa thed
261a5(rgyud): yid bzhin du rdzogs par bgyi/ mchog stsal bar bgyi/ bde legs dang / dge legs srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mchis nyal ba na bdug
261a6(rgyud): spos kyi rgyal po 'dis bdag la bdugs shing / bdag gi snying po nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po gsum po de dag lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na bdugs pa tsam gyi mod dang / 
261a7(rgyud): dran pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rang gi gzugs yongasu dag pa bstan cing / mngon sum du mchis par bgyi/ mchog thams cad rje su sprul bar bgyi byung ba dang / 
261a8(rgyud): 'byung ba'i dka' mching bgyi'o// ngan pa tsam gyi mod la don yod pa pad+ma gtsug cer gyi zhags pa'i snying po 'di dran pa tsam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rig sngags 'chang de'i/ 
261b1(rgyud): mdun du mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongasu rdzogs par bgyi / sdang ba dang sdig pa thams cad dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ dngos
261b2(rgyud): grub chen po sgrub parje su stsal bar bgyi/ bkra shis kyi sgra thams cad 'byung bar bgyi/ tshig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rje su sprul bar bgyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya
261b3(rgyud): rim par phye ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjesu sprul bar bgyi/ bsod nams drang ba'i dngas grub thams cad rje su stsal bar bgyi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi sdig pa
261b4(rgyud): dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par gyi/ rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar bgyi / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rig sngags 'chang gi bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog
261b5(rgyud): par bgyi/ nang thams cad bsal bar brgya'o// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang 'gum pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la bab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rtag tu
261b6(rgyud): mngon sum du bstan cing mdun na nye bar mchis par bgyi/ sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa shin tu dran pas dus las 'da' bar bgyis pa dang / ji ltar sbrul lpags pa rjes pa bzhin lus rjes nas
261b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi skal pa dang mnyam par pad+ma las rdzus te skye la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / tshoras su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
