262a1(rgyud): yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par yang 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
262a2(rgyud): mngon sum du ston par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags par 'gyur/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad yongasu dag par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
262a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dam tshig rtogs pa dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lag so// de
262a4(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma la legs zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo chen mo legaso leg so// rig sngags kyi
262a5(rgyud): rgyal po 'di khyod kyis bshad pa mchog tu leg so// cho ga zhib mo 'di yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / rig sngags 'chang de yang yongasu srung ba'i phyir dang / yongasu bskyang ba'i phyir dang
262a6(rgyud): dngos grub rab tu sbyin pa'i phyir khyod kyis yongasu bskyang bar bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug
262a7(rgyud): chen po dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshogs kyi bdag po nag po chen po dang / rig sngags dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha du ma dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / lnga rtsen dang / gar mkhan
262a8(rgyud): mchog dang / stobs can dang / stobs po che dang / ldang sngo dang / dung can dang / de bzhin du 'jigs byed dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / dpe med ma dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / rab pa gcig mdas
262b1(rgyud): tshe tog tshegs te thams cad 'dus nas 'thun par stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pu g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu
262b2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas btung te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe rig sngags 'chang de dang / rig sngags smra ba'i/ rigs kyi bu
262b3(rgyud): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am bu gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa gtsug tor 'di
262b4(rgyud): sgrub par bgying ngam / klog par bgyid dam/ 'don tam/ tha na ming tsam yang 'dzin par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag kun nas 'thun par rtag tu rje su 'brang zhing srung bar bgyi/ yongasu
262b5(rgyud): bskyang bar bgyi// gzi brjid gzhug par gyi// dngos grub chen po'i bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad kyi mchog yong su rdzogs par bgyi/ nyes par
262b6(rgyud): dgyes pa thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongasu sbyang bar bgyi/ byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du rtag tu rje su 'brang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das/ 
262b7(rgyud): kyis 'di skad du grogs po dag legaso leg so// khyed kyis bya ba de ltar yin te rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di ngas gtams shing yongasu gtad do zhes bka' stsal to// don yod pa'i zhags pa/ 
262b8(rgyud): pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rdo rje chen po gyi mo balnga rdzogs// / rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba bstan pa bklags pas grub pa cho ga zhing mo rgyas pa mchog/ 
263a1(rgyud): tu gsang ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa yongasu rdzogaso// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom
263a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhangs gnyis la gtugs nas mig mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag la pad+ma
263a3(rgyud): yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i rigs kyi snying por gyur pa gsang ba de kho na nyid bstan pa mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po rig
263a4(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngo bo tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / sngags tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba yongasu bsgrags par bgyi/ sems can
263a5(rgyud): thams cad rdzasu gzungs pa'i slad du/ rig snga gas 'chang ba rnams kyi de kho nar gyur pa ni 'di lags te/ rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
263a6(rgyud): pad+ma yangs pa'i dam tshig don yod pa'i zhag sa pa sgrub pa'i cho ga rjesu sprul bar bgyi na bcom ldan 'das de bdag la gnang bar mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig
263a7(rgyud): kyi dam tshig byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / spyi'i dam tshig 'grub par 'gyur/ spyi'i byin gyis brlabs dang / rig
263a8(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba la rje su 'jug par 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa thams cad kyi dngos grub de kho na nyid du 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
263b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dam tshig byin gyis brlabs kyi de kho ma nyid du 'gyur lag so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
263b2(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snying rje chen
263b3(rgyud): po dang ldan pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dam tshe ga rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po
263b4(rgyud): dang phyag rgya rim par phye bachog zhib mo de'i dus la dbab par shes rang mod cig ngas byin gyis brlang nga rdza su yi rang la phyag rgya chen pos btab nas byin gyis brlabs// sngan
263b5(rgyud): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlab so// sems can thams
263b6(rgyud): cad kyi don du de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na meng ba phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig chen por byin gyis brlab so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
263b7(rgyud): dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa don yod pa mthong ba'i ting 'dzin mngon sum du byas nas
263b8(rgyud): tingange 'dzin des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad 'od zer gyis snang bar byas/ lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar
264a1(rgyud): byas/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas// 'byung po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto
264a2(rgyud): chen po gnas thams cad snang bar byas// sa'i 'og tu gtogs pa 'og na gnas pa thams cang snang bar byas/ bar snang gi gnas na mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams snang bar byas shing snang gsu
264a3(rgyud): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas g.yo ba chen por 'gyur ba dang / g.yo ba'i mthus des de dag thams cad bskul bar gyur to// bskul ba tsam gyi med nyid la/ de dag
264a4(rgyud): thams cad lhags te/ ri grub 'dzin na 'khor mang po 'dus par 'thun par lhags nas 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
264a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po 'dus bar mkhyen nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad du zhug sa shing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ 'di ltar
264a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad du rigs spyi'i dam tshig gi tshul du zhugs la rnam pa'i rdong chug sa kyis brgya ma rgyal ba 'od dpag med ther chub su thog pa tshang pa'i
264a7(rgyud): gzugs phyag bco brgyad la rang gi ngo ba zhags pa thogs pa/ thal mo sbyar gsu phyed na phyag gi yin pa brten pa mdung rtsa gsum pa bsnams pa/ ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang phreng bsnams pa/ pad ma
264a8(rgyud): bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya bsnams pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgya mtshan bsnams pa/ me tog gi phur ma dang / bi dza pur bsnams pa/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ rin po che'i char 'bengs/ 
264b1(rgyud): par mdzad pa/ thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ spyi bor phyag rgya mdzad pa/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ pad+ma yangs pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de bzhin gsheg
264b2(rgyud): pa dang / nor bu'i phyag rgya mdzod pa/ gzugs zhig spyan gsum pa/ mchod pa'i phyir thogs pa/ gdan pad+ma sku 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba/ sgrol ma bdun rjesu 'brang ba pha rol tu phyin pa bcus bskor ba/ brgya
264b3(rgyud): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lba dang / lus ngan pos bskor ba/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lnga'i bu dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang min dang / rgya mtsho dang / dpa'
264b4(rgyud): dang / nye dga' bo 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'khod nas mig mi 'dzums shing bzhin byas/ me tog sna tshogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la
264b5(rgyud): 'thor te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog shA la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / a ti muk+Shaka dang / sho kA bar+Na dang / kha bye 'khyis dang / gan d+ha bi rI ka dang / mthon pa dang / mthon kha chen po dang / ka dam pa dang / 
264b6(rgyud): mdog mdzes pa dang / sum n+ya ka dang / sku snar dang / char gsal ba dang / dri med gzi brjid dang / dri dga' dang / rab sim dang / pa lA sha dang / za ba dang / ma raN+Da ka dang / gzi brjid bsil dang / dri med
264b7(rgyud): dang / gzi yangs ldan dang / shin tu bstan dang lha dga' dang / yi dga' dang / yu thi ka dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ud pa la dang / ud pa la dmar po dang / ta ra Na gu h+ya dang / gser
264b8(rgyud): dang / dngul dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa ni mngon sum du rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa'i rgyal po 'di smraso// 
265a1(rgyud): dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gsheg pa na kyi gsang ba rigs kyi dam
265a2(rgyud): tshig la phyag 'tshalo// rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa rnab thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rigs dang / phyag rgya thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da lngar
265a3(rgyud): byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par rtogs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag
265a4(rgyud): 'tsha'o// blo gros chen po dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byam sa pa la sogs pa 'phags pa'i tshogs
265a5(rgyud): kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa de bzhin pa/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshalo// dkon mchog
265a6(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha'o// drang srong chen po de
265a7(rgyud): dag dang / 'phags pa'i tshigs kyi mchog de dag la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
265a8(rgyud): 'khor gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum du gsungs pa 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du bdag gis de bzlas kyis/ bdag gi dgos pa thams cad grub par gyur cig/ 
265b1(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad du srung bar gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bi ri bi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ ba ra ma ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ si ri si ri/ 
265b2(rgyud): tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri pi ri bi raM bai ri/ mahA pad+ma ha s+ya/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud+d+ha satwa/ e h+ye hi/ bud dz+ya bud d+ha/ d+hA ba d+hA ga ka Na ka Na / ki Ni ki NaM/ ku Nu ku Nu/ bar ma
265b3(rgyud): shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma brAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sa ny+tsa lasany+tsa la khi tsa la bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta e Ta Ta d+ha ra b+ha ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri d+hu ru b+hu ru/ a h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ 
265b4(rgyud): mahA ba shub ti/ ba 'ja badz+rar rtags ras ra cer gyi /  tra badz+ra swA hrArmAdzA N+Di tra~M ts+tsha dzuSh+TahU dzA/ ma ldang du pa 'ad+ha raTharardza oMSh+Ta rud+ha sa da ras
265b5(rgyud): sar pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ b+hA ra b+ha ra/ rash+mi sha ta/ sa ha sra pra ti/ mad+d+hi ta/ shwa rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta ga b+ha ga ban/ so ma A di d+ya/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+ma in+d+ri/ 
265b6(rgyud): ri Shi dai ba ga Na/ a b+h+ya rtsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru dra bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu d+ha nad/ ShA yu de pa ri'i rA ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha raH
265b7(rgyud): rad+ha rad+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ thar tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ pa ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma re/ pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra~M/ ba ra ba ra/ bar dA ya ka/ sa maN+Da/ a ba lo ki te/ bi lo ki taM/ 
265b8(rgyud): lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+dza muny+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag dang sems can thams cad
266a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / nad thams cad las srung du gsol srung
266a2(rgyud): du gsol// gnod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / rdeg pa dang / sdigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom kun dang / gnod byed dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon las yongasu thar bar mdzad
266a3(rgyud): pa/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni / ku NA ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in+di ya ba la bo d+hang+ga/ mA ra ka/ tsa tuR+sha ts+yais twa se pra kA shI ka/ ta ma ta ma/ da med ma/ sha ma sha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA ta mAn d+ha ka
266a4(rgyud): id+ha man/ Sha Ta pA ra mi h+ma pa ri b+hu ra/ ka mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta TaShadzadza tha/ Ti Ti Ti kri Tu Tu Tu Tu/ wi dzi dzi Ni/ dzu dzu dzu thA/ e na yaHrma kr-i ta/ pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni kam
266a5(rgyud): haM shwa ra/ mahA b+hU ta/ ga Na b+he dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra ka Ta ka Ta/ ma TA ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha/ bai Sha yi ni bA sa ni/ mahA kA ru Na~M ka shwe ta ya dz+nyA pa bI ta ya/ rat+na ma ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA tsi
266a6(rgyud): si kri ta/ dza TA ma ku Ta ma hA da b+hU ta/ ka ma la kri ta/ ka ra te kar+d+ha na sa mA d+hi/ bi mo kA/ a pra kam+b+ha/ ba hu satwa/ san+ta ti/ pa raM pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba b+hu d+hi
266a7(rgyud): pa ri mo tsa ka/ sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba satwa/ sa mA shwA sa ni ka ra na mo s+thA te swA hA/ oM brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man+ta/ dz+wa la a mo g+ha hUM/ don yod pa'i snying ngo / 
266a8(rgyud): a yi ge gcig po ni kun nas gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa/ rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i yin te/ bklags pas
266b1(rgyud): grub pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po yi ge gcig po kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
266b2(rgyud): kyi gsang ba spyi'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor smras pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing lha'i me tog gi char rab tu
266b3(rgyud): bab la/ kun nas rin po che'i char rab tu bab po// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig stong kun nas gshegs nas na mkha'i dkyil la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhug
266b4(rgyud): so// don yad pa'i rim par phye ba'i sprin lha'i rin po che sna bdun phab la 'bab pas khebs pa dang / lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog rnams dang / lha'i rgyan dang / gos sna tshogs pa'i ma
266b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs don yod pa'i rgyal po'i tshul du zhugs pa la mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir rab tu phab bo// sangs rgyas
266b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi kyang legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par mdzad de/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba mchog bstan pa leg so leg so// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin
266b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngags kyi gnas rim par phye ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / yi ge gcig pa'i rjesu zhugs pa ni
266b8(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu nyi ma gcig shar ba yin// dang 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen pom
267a1(rgyud): / 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig gis thams cad kyis rje su zhugs pa yin zhing / snying po yi re
267a2(rgyud): gcig gi rje su zhugs pa yin la phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / dam tshig gcig gis rje su zhugs pa yin no// don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
267a3(rgyud): 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bzang po 'di ni don yod pa'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas drangs shing sku gcig gi dam tshig la bkod pa yin te/ de nas don yod pa'i zhag
267a4(rgyud): ba zhes bya bar byin gyis brlabaso// snying po yi ge gcig pa'i gzungs sngags ni rtag tu bklags pas grub pa/ de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlas
267a5(rgyud): pa yi no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs zhes bya
267a6(rgyud): ba byin te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa legaso leg so// de kho na nyid bsgrub pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs spyi'i dam tshig thams cad grub pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po sgru
267a7(rgyud): pa bklags pas 'grub pa 'di ni mchog tu bzang ba yin gyis yon tan gyi phung po shod cig/ snying po yi ge gcig pa 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa bde ga/ bklags pas grub pa/ 
267a8(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sku gzugs ri mo dang bcas pa sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
267b1(rgyud): phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / 
267b2(rgyud): de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gsang ba chen po dang / rigs spyi'i sgrub pa bklags pas 'grub pa de'i yo byad dang / cho ga bshad par bgyi yis bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs du gsol/ 
267b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag mdun na nye bar mchis shing / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yong su rdzogs par bgyi/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams
267b4(rgyud): cad rjesu sprul bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug leg so leg so// de ltar khyod kyis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya zhing / rig sngag
267b5(rgyud): 'chang rnams kyis dngos grub dam pa mchog de khyod kyis ra ba tu sbyin par gyis shig/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po gsad pa'i dam tshig dang / yi ge gcig
267b6(rgyud): po rigs spyi'i rdza su zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs kyis yo byad dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga shod cig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
267b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi dbugs phyung ba dag thos nas snying shin tu dga' ste/ yo byad dang / cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon
267b8(rgyud): sum nyid du sdig pa sreg cing ma lus par zad par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba rtsa ba nas 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog smras pa/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas na su das
268a1(rgyud): su pad+ma'i 'khor lo bya/ tshon ci sna tshogs rnam par dbye// pad+ma ze ba'i dbusu ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang 'dzubs par bya/ bum pa bkang dang 'phen rnams kyis// dkyil 'tshar
268a2(rgyud): kun nas brgyan par bya// me tog sna tshogs legs par dgram/ spos dri bzang pos bsgos pa yi// mar me'i 'phreng ba kun tu dud// mchod yon chu dag gzhag par bya// gu bul dang ni sa lpa ki/ a
268a3(rgyud): ga ru dang du ru swa// bdug spos snod bzhi dag nas bdug/ rig sngags 'chang ba khrus byas nas// gos gtsang bgos te sbyang ba la/ nye bar gnas nas tshes brgyad dam// bcu bzhi 'am tshes ni bco lnga ste/ 
268a4(rgyud): zla ba yar gyi ngo la sgrub/ shar du ba bltas 'dug nasu// don yod zhags pa dus gsum du// nyi shu rtsa gcig da sa brjod bya// snying po 'ang brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// yi ge gcig po
268a5(rgyud): 'bum du ni// mtshan mo bar chad med par baR+Sha sa// skya reng shar nas 'jig rten dbang // che ba'i dbus na 'bar 'gyur zhing // 'gul 'gyur 'gub pa de yis ni// dmyal ba chen
268a6(rgyud): po bcu drug gi sgo rnams dag ni bye bar 'gyur// dmyal ba'i gnas nas shugs chen gyis// g.yo la g.yos pa tsam des ni// dmyal ba'i tsher kun rnam par 'jig/ dadumyal ba de yang rnam
268a7(rgyud): bar 'joms// sems can dmyal ba de dag ni// thar nas phyogs bcur brgyug pa yi/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun las grol// mtho ris lam du zhugs par 'gyur// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug
268a8(rgyud): bsngal thams cad dud 'gro rnams las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad mthar gtugs par yongasu zad par 'gyur// 
268b1(rgyud): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// gal te sdig pa thams cad dang par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa stan ras gzigs dang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi mdog can ston
268b2(rgyud): bar mdzad la mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// don yod pa dri ma med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur sgrib pa dang bral la/ sems can gyi rgyan rnam
268b3(rgyud): par dag pa'i bdag nyid ngo bo thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gis bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa rnams med nyid la mngon sum du smon par mdzad la
268b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi bya ga g.yas pa mdo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ bsod nams rnas kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yong
268b5(rgyud): su bzung bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa kun gyis gcig pu mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab
268b6(rgyud): 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mngon sum du ston cing nye 'khor la kun nas srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbrid pa byed par 'gyur/ dngos grub dang / dgos pa thams cad grub
268b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can du mi mthong / des sgrib pa dang / sdig pa lhag ma
268b8(rgyud): lus par shes par bya ste/ de nyid du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga sbyang ba gnyis pa byas pa dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rtsa ba dang bcas pa thams cad byung bar 'gyuraro// gal te
269a1(rgyud): bzlas brjod kyi tshig sbyang ba gsum pa byed na bzlas brjod kyi tshi ga gsum rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag g.yas pa brkyang nas rig sngags 'amang
269a2(rgyud): bteg ste mod la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'od dpog med kyi spyan sngar 'jog par mdzad la mngon sum du bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis dbugs 'byin par mdzad
269a3(rgyud): cing phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad de/ tshe dpag med par 'gyur// gal te sems can gzhan rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bum
269a4(rgyud): 'am/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba gang zhig sdig pa dang / sgrib pa zad par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang brus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos sbyang ba byas pa des dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par
269a5(rgyud): bzhag la rig sngags 'chang mog byed pas gsang sngags rjesu dran par byas nas rma bya'i skyes byab par bya'o// \u0f7fma gyis yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur te sdig pa dang / sgrib pa
269a6(rgyud): thams cad zad par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang / 'dug pa thams cad dang / na ba thams cad dang / mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te the tshom medo// sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid thob par 'gyur zhing
269a7(rgyud): tshig bzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyis bzung zhing kun nas srung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzigs bzhed
269a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ tshe ring ba dang / sgrib pa dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rab su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod/ 
269b1(rgyud): nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur te/ snying rje dang / byams pa chen po yid la bya ba rtsa gcig tu bya zhing smyung ba dang / bzlas brjod bya'o// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa zad par bya ba'i dkyil la
269b2(rgyud): chen po'i cho ga'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal pa// bam po bcu bdun pa// de nas rtag tu bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ 
269b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khar gyi tshang ji lta ba bzhin du/ legs par phye ga gru bzhi pa rgyar gzings kyi tshad kyis shin tu rnam par bye ba bya ste/ dri'i tshon ci rnam par bkra ba kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i go sar la
269b4(rgyud): brten pa'i dbus pad+ma bya'o// rdo rje'i thig skud kyis kun nas bskor ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa dgod par bya'o// nyi ma re
269b5(rgyud): re zhing me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing nyi ma re re zhing a ga ru'i bdug pa dang / khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ don yong rgyal po'i bzlas brjod dang / phyag rgya bcing bar
269b6(rgyud): bya'o// yi ge gcig pa'i snying po'i bzlas brjod thur gsum du lan gsum mam// lan bdun nam/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzla so// zas ngan pa bcu yangasu spangs par bya zhing / sems can ngar pa
269b7(rgyud): yang spangs par bya'o// sgrub thabs kyi de kha na nyid las thams cad du 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub pa// 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa brgyad pa de rnams la grol lo// dor med pa'i
269b8(rgyud): rgyal po dran pas nad thams cad rnam par nyams par byed// dug dang sbyar dug dang / byang snyems dang / gdon thams cad dang 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / skrag pa dang / rims dang / nad thams cad dang / 
270a1(rgyud): / bol mig dang / ldog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / g.yar pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / mgo bo na ba dang / mig na ba dang / rna ba na pa dang / sna ba dang / kha na pa dang / rkan nab
270a2(rgyud): ba dang / mgul na ba dang / snying na ba dang / lto na ba dang / so na ba dang / mchun pa dang / lag pa na ba dang / rtsi ba logs na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / pho bI nad dang / ma zhu ba dang / rkang pa ra ba dang / rgyab
270a3(rgyud): na ba dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad na ba dang / tshad pa dang / gzhang nad dang / gcin nad dang / gsung pa dang / 'khag pa la lan cig brjod de byas pa tsam gyis thams cad sel bar
270a4(rgyud): byed de/ myur du rab tu zhi bar byed cing skad cig de nyid la yang yang dag par gnas par bye'o// 'jig rten pa'i bya ba gzhan thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs bye ba
270a5(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i da ge ba'i rtsa ba nyi ma re re zhing bskyed par 'gyur// bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// tshig btsun par yang 'gyur/ 'dzi/ 
270a6(rgyud): rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyuraro// mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyuraro// don che zhing che ba dag 'ong bar 'gyuraro// dbang phyug dang / dpon po lhur gyis grub pa nyid du rnyed do// rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i
270a7(rgyud): 'khor dang / g.yog tu bcas pas gcig tu mchod par 'os par 'gyuraro// nyi ma re re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
270a8(rgyud): sku mthong ba so sor thob po// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par brgyan pa mthong ngo // tshes brgyad dang bco lnga la po Ta la ka'i ri bo'i gzhal med khang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
270b1(rgyud): gi gnas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs te/ 'khor chen po la chos ston par mdzad pa dang / 'od dpag med bde ba can gyi gnas na zhugs pa mthong ste ji srid byang
270b2(rgyud): chub snying po'i bar du mthong ngo // 'chi 'phos pa na bsams pa nyid kyi mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par pad+ma las
270b3(rgyud): brdzus ji skye bar 'gyuraro// sgrub pa dang bral zhing rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob pa don yod pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin sa sang thob po// ting 'dzin gang zhig zab pas sangs rgyas
270b4(rgyud): kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig pa rgya stong phrag snyed las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas/ se gal gtogs pa tsam nyid la
270b5(rgyud): slar yang 'ong ba de lta bu'i ting 'dzin so sor thob po// ting nge 'dzin gzhan khrag khrig brgya stong phrag so so ra thob cing / bzlas pa'i cho ga gcig pus las thams cad sgrub
270b6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro zhes// bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o// de nas thus kyi dkyil 'khor bshang bar bya ste/ khrus byed pa la mkhas pa gang gis dri ma thams cad sel bar byed cing rmi
270b7(rgyud): gasdig pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i de kho na nyid bsod nams dang gzi brjid rab tu 'phel bar byed pa/ nad thams cad sel bar grub pa/ 
270b8(rgyud): sdig pa dang / sdig to nyams par byed pa/ de bzhin du zad pa dang nyams pa bcom pa/ drug dang byang sems nyams pa/ nad yun ring po yang su spangs pa/ de bzhin du gcod yun ring po dang risra
271a1(rgyud): yong su spangs pa ste 'di dag khrus kyis 'grub ste/ rig sngags gang yin pa des 'grub par don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yongasu bsgrag so// bgegs kyis
271a2(rgyud): reg pa gang yin pa dang / grib gnon gyi gdon mi bzad pas reg pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshigs kyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa la yang / dgra rnams kyis
271a3(rgyud): pham pa dang / skye bo sdang ba dang / gang ga'i drug pa'i g.yul du song ba dang / rgyu skar gyis bcom pa gang yin pa dang / blo'i skye ba zad pa dang / ma ning dang / nyams pa'i ma ring dang / dbang po nyams pa
271a4(rgyud): bar gang yin pa rnams dang bu mi 'tsho ba gang yin pa rnams kyi bu 'thun par skye bar 'gyuraro// bsad cing gzhom pa tho ba pa gang yin pa dang / 'ching ba dang / bsod par song ba gang yin pa
271a5(rgyud): dang / chom rkun nam/ rkun mo'i nang ngam/ gnod sbyin nam srin pa'i nang du song ba gang yin pa dang / gcan zan gtum po'i nang du song ba gang yin pa dang / mche ba gdug
271a6(rgyud): ba dang / dug gi khrod du song bas dug 'jigs pa mi bzad pa zos pa gang yin pa dang / khyim sgrib pa dang / g.yang sa dang / byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'dzags pa rnams dang / mi mngon par sdig pa
271a7(rgyud): byed pa gang yin pa dang / mtshams med pa byed pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa la bskur pa 'debs pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba 'di rnams dkyil 'khor du khrus byas pas thams cad
271a8(rgyud): yang dag par zad par 'gro zhing / myur du thams cad rnam par nyams par byed de rtsa rnams me'i sreg pa bzhin du sngon bsags pa'i mi bzad pa'i las 'di dag thams cad rnam par 'am par
271b1(rgyud): byed do// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma dang / rtag tu mchod par 'os par 'gyuraro// tshe yun ring por gnas te/ rtag tu bde ba dang / dga' bar byedo// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nad med cing rims med
271b2(rgyud): pa nyid du gnaso// bde blag tu bya ba byed cing / de'i skye ba bdun dran par 'gyuraro// lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed cing / mthar thug rtog tu dpal 'bar bar byed do// sangs rgyas
271b3(rgyud): rnams rtag tu mthong ba dang / rtog tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par byed pa dang / rtag tu mthong bar 'dod pa yang thun mtshams drug tu mngon sum du mthong bas gnas par byed
271b4(rgyud): do// rtag tu rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang / rig sngags kyis dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ rtag tu dkyil 'khor gyi mchog gang yin pa yang sgrub par bye'o// rgyar gzings kyi chod
271b5(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/ tshon sna tshog sa pas rnam par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pas bkra ba sgo bzhi kun
271b6(rgyud): nas rnam par phye ba dang / las rnams legs par zin nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'khor lo yang dag par bri'o// pad+ma'i lte ba dang snying po nyid kyang 'bar bar bya'o// zur dang zur
271b7(rgyud): rnam su// zhags pa 'bar ba pad+ma la gnas pa bya'o// rig sngags 'dod pas khrus dang / gtor ma dkar po yang 'dir dgod par bya'o// ga ru'i bdug pa dbul zhing / dkyil 'khor gyi chog ji lta babazhin
271b8(rgyud): du dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o// las gzhan sgrub pa ni ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor mas mchod par bya zhing sna tshogs pa'i bdug spos dbul// bum pa chus bkang nas rdzas kyi
272a1(rgyud): ma rnams der gzhug cing / rin chen sna bdun bcug ste/ de la rgya dar gyi bcing la/ don yod zhags pa brgya dang / snying po nyid kyang lar brgyar bzlaso// yi ge gcig
272a2(rgyud): ba brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so// tsan dan dang / sa mI dang / si ri ShA dang / hab shang tsi'u dang / gur gum dang / yungs kar dang pad+ma ge sar rnams legs par btags ras bum pa bkang bar bya
272a3(rgyud): ste/ 'di rnams kyi khrus bya'o// nye'u shing dang / shu ti dang / bil ba ste 'di rnams kyi nyed pa dang / rtag tu sngon du byab par byas la/ de nas mkhas pas khrus bya'o// de nas srung ba'i cho ga ni don yod
272a4(rgyud): rgyal pos bya'o// de nas rtsi dur ba bting nas/ de la skyil mo krung gi 'dug ste/ bum pa chus khrus bya zhing pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang byed du gzhug go// de nas gtsang ma gos gtsang ma
272a5(rgyud): bsgos te/ gtsug tar bcing bar bya zhing sngon du bzlas pa 'bul ba dang bskor ba byas nas skr-i dang sgo ras phywa/ go bya'o// shar gyi sgo ru zhugs la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying
272a6(rgyud): por skyil krung gis 'dug la/ don yod pa'i rgyal pos lan bdun du byab par bya'o// lag tu rdo rje dang / bgrang phreng gis mngon par dbang bskur zhing / chu dang yungs kar dang phyag
272a7(rgyud): rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya'o// 'di ni khrus kyi gtso bor 'jig rten dbang phyug gis gsungaso// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i
272a8(rgyud): don gyi ched dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams la khyad par du/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / lha thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs
272b1(rgyud): pa gdon mi za bar bye'o// gang dang gang du las la nges par sbyar ba thams cad du don yod pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad du 'di la the tshom mdo// sngags kyi dngos
272b2(rgyud): grub bla na med pa ma grub pa yang grub par 'gyur te/ don yod pa'i dngos grub thob cing 'phral nyid du 'bras bu mthong ba yin// lus yong su dag cing shin tu dri ma med pa dang / legs
272b3(rgyud): par khrus byas par de brjod par bya'o// sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par byed gnad thams cad las yongasu grol bar byed pa ste/ mdor
272b4(rgyud): na thams cad du dngos grub so sor rnyed cing / dpal chen por lhag par 'gro'o// rig sngags don du gnyer ba thob ste/ rig sngags don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid
272b5(rgyud): las bu 'dod pas ni bu thob po// nor 'dod pa sa nI nor thob po// dbang phyug 'dod pas ni dbang phyug thob pa// myur du dpal 'o ni dpal thob pa// mngon par 'dod pa
272b6(rgyud): thams cad phral du yongasu rdzogs par byed// zhe so// khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i// // de nas nor bu'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ yid
272b7(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu'i sgrub pa rmad du byung 'a yad pa'i nor bu'i dngos grub dang / bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa thams cad du ltung ba'i sdug bsngal las byung ba'i 'jigs pa thams
272b8(rgyud): cad las skyob par byed pa bsod nams thob pa mngon par thar par byed pa/ mtshon cha dang / khong bsgril gcog par byed par the tsom medado// sdig pa thams cad rnam par nyam par
273a1(rgyud): byed pa/ mtshams med pa zad par byed pa/ rtag tu gsod med pa'i gnas thams cad du son par byed pa/ cag tu 'khrug pa dang / g.yul ngo las rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// 
273a2(rgyud): chom rkun gyi nang nas grol bar 'gyur zhing / rkun mo las kyang sgrol bar byedado// gcan zan gtum po seng ga dang / glang po che dang / do ma dang / gzigs dang / dred dang / khyi dang / phag dang / lce spyang rnams
273a3(rgyud): las nor bu'i rgyal po gang du gnas pa'i mod la thams cad sgrol bar byed// dug dang / sbrul thams cad dang / mche ba sdug pa dang / sbrul po na sa dang / bang sa nA b+ha dang / dug nyid dang / dug shring ga dang / 
273a4(rgyud): dug mu sta ka nyid dang / da ra da'i dug dang / lus la byas pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dug dang / dug ha la ha la dang / sdig pa la sogs pa gang yin pa dang / mthong ba'i dug gang yin pa
273a5(rgyud): dang / dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa'i dug 'jigs pa dang / 'jog po yis kyang zin pa dang / gzhan ya nga srog chags mi bzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs
273a6(rgyud): pa'i dug mi bzad pa rnams dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam dang / nor bu reg pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad 'phral du dug med par 'gyur ro// gal te gang gar 'bab pa'i dug 'thungs kyang
273a7(rgyud): 'phral du 'dzegs par byedo// na mkha' lding gis sbrul nyid dang klu bzhi no// ma yis mi 'chi go / slar yang nus 'khyer bar mi 'gyur// byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / de la rgyal po khro bar mi
273a8(rgyud): byed do// nam yang phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / 'thab mo dang / 'khrul 'khor byed pa dang / sdang ba gang yin pa de rnams med de/ tshig 'di ni mchog go// dug dang byang stems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba la
273b1(rgyud): sogs pa thams cad skad cig de la nyams par byed do// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / skem byed dang / brjed byed dang / gsang ba pa dang / gegs dang / lag 'dren rnams
273b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam dang / nor bu bzung ba nyid kyis thams cad 'bros par byed de 'di la the tsom med do// 'di thams cad kyis thun mong du nor bu'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la/ bsam
273b3(rgyud): pa gang yin pa'i bsam pa de thams cad yid la don du gnyer bar bya ba gang yin pa rnams kyang nor bu bzung ba nyid la thams cad myur du phun sum tshogs par byedado// tshe 'phel ba dang / sngags kyi
273b4(rgyud): dngos grub bla na med pa grub po// bkra shis pa dang / dam pa dang / bsod nams dang / dag pa dang / sdig pa nyams pa dang rmi lam ngan pa nyams pa dang / 'phral du rmi lam bzang por byed pa nyid dang / rtag tu
273b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / rtag tu lha rnam sa 'gugs pa nyid dang / rtag tu 'byor pa thams cad byed pa dang / rtag tu zla ba nya ba ltar 'od zer 'bar bas
273b6(rgyud): rnam par mdzes pa dang / tshogs btsun pa dang / rtag tu dga' ba dang / thams cad du mchod par bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gi rdzas kyi sbyor ba bya ste/ cha mnyam par legs par phye la gtso de'i rjesu 'dra
273b7(rgyud): bar bya'o// 'di lta ste/ rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / nA ku li dang / dri'i mu li dang / a ru ra dang / lag pa dang / dbang po lag pa dang / dri'i sgra yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / 'khor lo dang // 'khor lo chen po dang / 
273b8(rgyud): khyab 'jug gnon pa dang / so ma rA dza dang / su na nad dang / pad+ma ga sar dang / ma la ya'i tsan dan / na la da dang / gur gum dang / ba bla la dang / ud pa la ldan pa dang / klu shing gi me tog dang / tsam bka'i
274a1(rgyud): me tog dang / baT dang / bag skyes dang / spang sbas dang sa mA ka rnams mnyam par byas te phye ma zhib mar legs par btags la pu shel rtsa dang / tsan dan gyi chus smras te/ 
274a2(rgyud): zangs kyi snod du bzhag la/ khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkod te/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas snying po brgya rtsa brgyad nyid dang / yi ge gcig pa 'bum du bzlas
274a3(rgyud): pas rdzas kyi snod 'bar bar byed do// de nas nor bu mgo bo la bcings pa 'am/ lag pa la bcings la bzung bar bya ste/ mchog tu skal pa bzang po thob cing / dbang phyug gi mchog dang dpon po
274a4(rgyud): thob po// rje rigs bu med pas kyang mi dang nor 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / dgra rab tu 'joms shing / srung ba'i mchog tu rnyed par dka' bas te/ nor bu gang du gnas pa der/ 
274a5(rgyud): glog gi gnod pa med do// der byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / g.yo ba mi 'byung // nor bu'i rgyal po gang du gnas pa'i gnas 'di mchod rten du bskuro// sum cu rtsa
274a6(rgyud): gsum na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi rtag tu srung bar byed cing / rtag tu yang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lag na rdo rje stobs po ches rtag tu yang srung zhing / dus rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur te the tsom
274a7(rgyud): med do// / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ rgyar gzings kyi tshad kyi logs bzhi pa zur bzhi pa shin tu bcags pa/ legs par sbyar ba mchog tu mdzes pa bya'o// 'khor tu me tog
274a8(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi mgo phyogs kyi bkra ba bris lang kar gyi sgo rnam par phye ste dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis yongasu bskor ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la yang / 'jig
274b1(rgyud): rten dbang phyug dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du/ rdzas kyi snod bzhag par bya zhing / me tog gsal bkram par bya la/ dkyil 'khor brgyan
274b2(rgyud): par bya ste/ dri dang / yon chab dbul bar bya zhing / tsan dan gyi bdug pa sreg go// nyin mtshan du gos gtsang ma bsgo zhing bcing bar bya/ shin tu dri ma med pa'i semasu 'gyur bar bya/ 
274b3(rgyud): byams pa dang / snying rje mchog tu 'gyur bar bya zhing / de nas nor bu'i rdzas sgrub po zhes so// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// de nas ljang ros kyi mig sman gyi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad
274b4(rgyud): par bya ste/ rgyar gzings kyi ma'i mthar thug pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ dri sna tshogs dang / rnam par bkra ba'i rig sngags 'chang ni/ grwa rnams mkhas pas bri bar
274b5(rgyud): bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por/ pad+ma mdab ma phyed khabye ba'o// lag pa gnyis kyi dbus pad+ma ge sar rgyas ba 'chang ba'o// shar gyi sgo rnam par phye ba bya ste/ 
274b6(rgyud): ldeng ras dngul gyi snod du bzhag nas dkyil 'khor du bad+ma'i steng dgod par bya'o// snod kyi khor yug tu dang dmar po'i gas bzang pos g.yog par bya'o// yang na pad+ma'i mdab ma 'am/ yang na byang
274b7(rgyud): chub shing gi mdab ma 'am/ yang na shing 'dzam bu'i mdab mas g.yog par bya'o// a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa'i
274b8(rgyud): gzugs 'dzin pa pad+ma'i mdab ma'i drung du dgod par bya'o// me tog dang dris mtshos pa bya/ rig sngags 'chang gis dkar gsum zos la 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi brnyan gnas su
275a1(rgyud): 'gyur bar bya'o// yang na nyin mtshan du spang bar gnas pa bya/ zla ba yang ngo 'am/ tshes bco lnga'i nya 'am/ tshes bcu bzhi 'am/ tshes brgyad la/ gtsang mar khrus byas te/ 
275a2(rgyud): gos gtsang bsgo bar ga/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing / snying po brgya rtsa brgyad kyang bzlas par bya/ yi ge gcig pa stong phrag bcur bzlas la/ dkyil 'khor
275a3(rgyud): nye bar spras shing me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang mar me dang / gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'phang
275a4(rgyud): bar bya'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi med la/ 'phags pa spyan ras ga zigs dbang phyug gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin par byed do// ldong ros kyi snod de yang 'bar bar byed de/ 
275a5(rgyud): 'bar ba tsam gyi mod la mig bsdus na na mkha' la 'gro'o// don po da pa'i ye shes yangs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin so
275a6(rgyud): sor thob po// don yod pa'i 'khor lo kun nas rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba
275a7(rgyud): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus yongasu bskor bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du gnas kyi mnga' bdage rgyal por 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thad du
275a8(rgyud): 'gro zhing / tshe bskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyu ro/ rgyal po 'od dpag med kyi cod pan 'chang bar 'gyur// don yod pa dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul so sor thob ste rdzu 'drus
275b1(rgyud): dang gis se gol brtogs pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa zad
275b2(rgyud): kyi don yod pa'i dngos grub yangs pa'i mchod par 'gyur zhing skad cig gis slar yang 'ong bar bye'o// rang gi lus la 'od zer brgya stong phrag du ma 'bar bar bye'o// dang 'dod pa
275b3(rgyud): thams cad byed do// de nas du ba 'thul bzhin pa ni bskus na mi sdang bar 'gyur te/ mi snang ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po
275b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye na na po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas
275b5(rgyud): gnas te/ gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par byed do// gnas zad na gnas pa rnams 'bangasu gyur nas gnas te/ ci ban pa byed do// sems can thams cad kyang rje
275b6(rgyud): 'brang bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor g.yog dang bcas pas mchod pa dang bla mar bya ba'i gnas gcig pur 'gyuraro// bka' bsgo ba yang / bdag nyid dang / nor
275b7(rgyud): gyis kyang byed cing gan so// dbu ba 'byung bzhin pa bskus na/ cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi gsang ba'i
275b8(rgyud): dam tshig mngon du gyur nas gnas te/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs pa gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rnams sngon du gyur
276a1(rgyud): nas gnaso// lha dang klu dag gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad yang dag par rjesu 'drang zhing / srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / smra ba'i ched du rtag pa kho nar dus
276a2(rgyud): 'gro'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba sbyin par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i 'od zer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin so sor thob te/ sa
276a3(rgyud): sa'i steng nas sor ba'i tshod 'phags pa'i namatha' la gnaso// ldong ros la bzlas nas mgo la bsdus nas/ mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor
276a4(rgyud): dang blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / 'dun na 'don pa dang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge slong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs
276a5(rgyud): dang rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs rnams dbang du gyur nas gan so// tha na ri dwags dang / bya yang lta bar byed bzhin du dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnaso// 'dis byugs pa'i mig
276a6(rgyud): gi nad dang / gnod pa dang / sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// lus kyi gdung ba dang / sems kyi gdung ba thams cad dang / rmi len pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra
276a7(rgyud): mi shis par gyur pa thams cad rnam par nyams par bye'o// skye ba rjes nas kyang spyan lnga yongasu dag pa so sor thob bo// tshe rabs dran par yang skye bar 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa dang sgrib pa dang
276a8(rgyud): bral zhing / don yod pa legs par rab tu gnas pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i lus dag pa so sor thob po// kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi
276b1(rgyud): dam tshig so sor thob po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba so sor thob po// byang chub sems dpa'
276b2(rgyud): thams cad dang rtag tu yang 'grogs shing gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyuraro// zhes so mig sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas
276b3(rgyud): bdug pa rim par phye ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog tu rmad du byung ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i don dang / de bzhin
276b4(rgyud): nyid du 'jig rten gsum po thams cad 'gugs pa grub pa dang // lha thams cad spyan drang ba dang / dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams bsdig
276b5(rgyud): par byed pa/ gnon sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / gdon ma rungs pa de rnams thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par rje/ tshom med do// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'i
276b6(rgyud): dang sdang ba dang / de bzhin du bdud kyang rung ste/ bdug pa'i dris rnam par zhig par 'gyur zhing / yan lag dang nying lag rnam par 'thor bar byed do// rang gi dmag dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
276b7(rgyud): dang / shin tu 'dras pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / de bzhin du dgra bo nyid dang / skye bo sdang ba dang / gang du 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul nyid kyang bdug pa'i dris/ thams
276b8(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur bar the tshom mdo// gal te skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze nyid dang / de bzhin du dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge
277a1(rgyud): / slong dang / dge slong ma dang / rgyal po 'am/ rgyal phran dang / de bzhin du rgyal mo dang / btsun mo'i 'khor kyang rung ste/ legs par khrus byas/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas bdug
277a2(rgyud): spos 'dis bdug na gang gis btug pa'i dri ma nams pa dang / de lus la reg pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol lo// sgrub pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i bdag
277a3(rgyud): nyid thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom med do// mtshams med lnga'i sdig pa rnams 'phral du thas cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// zhes so// bdug pa 'di tsam gyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
277a4(rgyud): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dris kun tu 'gengs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas nas ji srid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dris kun tu 'geng so// stobs dang shug
277a5(rgyud): chen pos lha'i gnas thams cad 'gul bar byed cing bskyod bar byed do// chu rgyun gyi klu rnams 'gul bar byed cing / ri rab las gzhan pa'i ri gang yin pa 'dar yid yid
277a6(rgyud): byed do// gsang bar gnas pa rnams rnam par skrag par byed do// dmyal ba bcu drug gi 'jig pa rnams rnam par zhig par byed do// de bzhin du sa'i mthil thams cad kyang dkar bsil du
277a7(rgyud): snang bar 'gyu ro// dmyal ba'i sems can rnams shin tu sbyangs pa dang sdug bsngal mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad yongasu grol te/ bde ba can du yang 'gro'o// mtho ris thams cad du ji
277a8(rgyud): lha bzhin du gnaso// dmyal ba thams cad nyams te/ pad+ma can du rab tu 'gyuraro// nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhan rnams dang / sa 'og gi nang du song ba gang yin pa dang / 
277b1(rgyud): dgon pa dang / ri dang tshang tshong dang / dgon gdung dang / g.yang sar gnas pa'i dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad gdug pa'i dris yongasu grol lo// mi
277b2(rgyud): gtsang ba za ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / shaza gang yin rnams dang / bshad pa dang / lci ba za ba gang yin pa rnams dang / mchil ma dang / snrubs za ba gang yin pa rnams dang / 
277b3(rgyud): 'dres pa za ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad bdug pa'i dri marnams pa tsam gyis yongasu grol nas bral nyid du lha'i 'jig rten du skye'o// ma pa sna tshogs pa'i ri bro ba'i mchog dang / dri nim
277b4(rgyud): po'i kha zas rnyed par 'gyuraro// dud 'gro'i gnasu song ba'i srog chag ri dwags dang / bya rnams thams cad dris mnams pa tsam gyin da thams cad las yongasu gro'o// bdug pa mnam
277b5(rgyud): pa tsam gyi 'dis nad thams cad las yongasu grol lo// rims thams cad las yangasu grol lo// na pa thams cad las so ngas grol lo// 'bras dang / phol mig dang ldog
277b6(rgyud): dang / me dpal dang / shu ba dang / mdze dang / g.yan pa dang / mig na ba dang / mgon pa dang / gzhog phyed na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / snun pa dang / so na pa dang / kha na pa dang / sba ban dang / 'jigs pa dang
277b7(rgyud): skrag pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad bdug pa'i dri bsnams pa tsam gyi rab tu zhi bar byedo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de dang / don yod pa'i
277b8(rgyud): dril bar snying pa'i mthu yis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing rnam par grol te mi 'jigs pa'i grong du 'gro bar 'gyuraro/ ngas
278a1(rgyud): / rdzas rnams kyis rang bzhin mngags rnam par bye ba dang ldan pa bshad par bya ste/ tsan dan srang gsum dang / a ga ru srang gsum dang / du dus srang lnga dang / gur gum srang
278a2(rgyud): s+thika srang gnyis dang / na lan da srang gnyis dang / ma he'i mig srang nyi shu dang / sra rtsi pog srang bcu dang / bo la srang gsum dang / salpa kI srang brgyad dang / rgya spos srang gnyis dang / spang spos srang
278a3(rgyud): gcig dang / shA ma ka srang gcig dang / gan+d+ha pa tra srang gcig dang / pad+ma ge sar srang gcig dang / kri rI mI ma tog srang gcig dang / li kha ra dkar po srang bcu dang / dri'i sprin yang ku srang gcig dang / pu shel
278a4(rgyud): rtsi srang lnga dang / skrag ser srang gcig dang / sug smel srang gsum dang / bA la ka srang lnga dang / gur gu ma dang / gla rtsi tshor ba ste/ thams cad legs par rnam par dbye bar byas nas/ phye mar
278a5(rgyud): byas la mthar thams cad gcig tu bsdoms te/ sbrang rtsis sgra bar bya'o// chos bco lnga la/ rgyu skar dang / chos grangs kyi lha dge/ ba la/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur gyur pas
278a6(rgyud): gos gtsang ma bgos te/ legs par khrus byas par gyur pas brtul zhugs spyad pas bdug pa'i mchog sbyar bar bya'o// de nas bdul ba'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa tshad
278a7(rgyud): shin tu rnam par phye ba bya ste/ gzings kyi tshad kyi shin tu bcags pa/ 'jam zhing bsnyen pa la/ tshon rnam pa sna tshogs pas bsgo bzhi shin tu rnam par phye ba/ mdzes par bri bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil
278a8(rgyud): 'khor gyi snying por/ pad+ma'i phreng ba bri'o// dbus kyi pad+ma phyed kha bye ba'i phreng ba bri ste/ lag pa gnyis mthon nas sna tshogs pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa 'dzin par byed pa'o// de'i steng du bdug pa'i snod
278b1(rgyud): bkod nas/ me'i kha dog can gyi gos kyis g.yogs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhi rnamasu/ rlung gi rgyal po bri'o// sgo bzhir zhags pa bris nas khor yug tu lag pa'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma'i phreng
278b2(rgyud): ba las nges par 'thon pa'o// bdug spos khyil ba 'ching bar byed pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng du spras pa bya'o// ji ltar 'byor pa'i gtor ma dang me tog dbul bar bya/ mchod yon gyi snod dang / gang
278b3(rgyud): ba'i bum pa dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / skud pa dmar pos mtshams bcings pa dang / dkyil 'khor la dngul dang / gser bzhag cing / khor yug tu mar mo'i phreng ba dang / dri sna tshogs
278b4(rgyud): rgya chen po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bko/ de nas kha shar du phyogs nas/ pad+ma'i phreng ba la nye bar dgod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bdug pa'i
278b5(rgyud): rgyal po la yongasu bzlas par bya ste/ nyi ma bdun la thun gsu ma du don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlaso// don yod pa'i snying po
278b6(rgyud): yi ge gcig pa'i bzlas brjod 'bum rdzogs pa ste/ stong phrag brgya rdzogs pa na bzlas brjod kyi cho ga'o// de na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / slar yang don
278b7(rgyud): rdo pa'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya'o// de nas thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'dug pa dbul bar bya
278b8(rgyud): de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug pa dbu'o// 'di ni bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga grub par 'gyur ro// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bya ba de sgrub par 'gyuraro// gal te
279a1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar gyi 'bras bu gcig gi tshad tsam gyi bdug pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'dod pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong
279a2(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dri gcig gis rgyas par 'dod pa dang / bdug pa'i sprin 'khrigs pas kun nas g.yog par 'dod pa dang / dri sna tshogs pa'i char 'bebs par byed par
279a3(rgyud): 'dod pa des/ bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdug pa de/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par brtson par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma re re zhingab sangs rgyas
279a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzi gas dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor byas la me tog btsal du bkram par bya'o// mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil
279a5(rgyud): rang bzhag par bya/ bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdug par bya zhing / don yod pa'i rgyal po dusu gcig tu rje dpar bya ste/ phyags bcur bdug pa'i srog por dbul bar
279a6(rgyud): bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang / sems can 'byung po thams cad la byams pa bsgoms par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa thaMd drim
279a7(rgyud): med pa'i sems kyis yid la bsgom par bya/ dkyil 'khor la me tog dang bdug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil phul te yi ge gcig pa yid la brjod cing / phyag rgya yang lan gci
279a8(rgyud): bcings la phyag bya'o// zhes so// phul ba tsam gyi mod la phyogs re re zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i sangs rgyas bya ba la dris khyab par byed cing / 
279b1(rgyud): bdug pa chen po 'khrigs pas na mkha'i mthil du khyab par 'gyuro// dri sna tshogs pa'i char 'bab par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re zhing gang
279b2(rgyud): ga'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pas de bzhin gshe
279b3(rgyud): pa de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la dus du su don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par byed pa srung ba'i don dang / phyag rgya 'ching bar byed pa de srung ba'i don du/ leg so zhes bya ba
279b4(rgyud): sgra brjod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thed byams pa rgyas par byed pa de bzhid du bya'o// don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub kyang smyon par byed do// de bzhin ga
279b5(rgyud): dri rnams kyi drung du bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po nye bar sogs par byedo// de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po
279b6(rgyud): dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs par byedo// ji ltar rig sngags 'chang de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i cho ga byed byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam pa du ma de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing gi
279b7(rgyud): spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang nyi ma bdun du rab tu brtson pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / bla ma mchod do// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
279b8(rgyud): mngon sum du mthong ba stsol bar byed// de rnams thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par byed la mchog rab tu stsol bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i dngos grub rje su stsol bar 'gyuraro// phyir mi ldog
280a1(rgyud): pa la rab tu gnas par 'gyu ro// sa bcu yang dag par gnon te mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de bzhin nyid du dzaH/ 
280a2(rgyud): rten las 'das pa la 'chi 'pho ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga'i zhabs drung du pad+ma la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
280a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro bar byed pa de thams cad du yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sngags 'chang la lung ston par 'gyu ro// phyis kyang skye ba gzhan du skye bar mi
280a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lus 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca de la bsnyen bkur nas/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu song ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos
280a5(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byedado// tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'di'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par
280a6(rgyud): 'phrul pa'i khyad par so sor thob bo// 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i khyad par ro// de nas 'jig rten pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga brgya stong phrag du ma 'grub par
280a7(rgyud): byed do// ji lha ji ltar bdug pa nyid yid la byed pa de lta de ltar thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur// klu'i gan su bdugs na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i rgyal pos char
280a8(rgyud): rgyun chen po 'byin par byed// rgyal po'i sgor bdug na rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas gnaso// skye bo mang po'i dbusu bdugs na/ rigs bzhi'i
280b1(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas gnaso// bdag nyid la bdugs na/ thams cad du mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyuraro// nad thams cad la bdugs na/ nad thams cad yongasu grol bar byed
280b2(rgyud): do dug la bdug ni dug med par 'gyuro// mtshams kyi nang du bdugs na me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad ro zhim pa dang / legs par bsrungs par 'gyuraro// lo thogs la bdugs na 'khru'i
280b3(rgyud): phung po chen por 'gyuraro// khyim 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer la 'dugs na/ dug dang / sbyar dug dang / dug dang bcas pa'i srog chags thams cad nam yang mi 'gyur ro// 
280b4(rgyud): g.yul gyi dbusu bdug na cher rgyal bar 'gyu ro// bdag nyid dam/ gzhan rnams sam/ don 'thun pa rnams la bdugs na/ lam du 'gro ba na chom rkun dang / g.yon can dang / rkun
280b5(rgyud): mo dang / gsan zan gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang legs pas rang gi khyim du 'ong ngo // dpag tshad stong du 'gro yang ngal ba med cing / 
280b6(rgyud): slar yang 'ong bar byedo// dung la bdugs nas 'thon por bus nas ji srid dung gi sgra thos pa de srid du gnod pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / mtshon ma
280b7(rgyud): dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad rnam par nyams par bye'o// yams zad dang / 
280b8(rgyud): nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed// bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' bar 'os par 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba zed 'dod pa
281a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nad med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / rims med pa dang / thang chad pa med par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gan so// khang pa'i steng mthon por phyogs bzhir
281a2(rgyud): bdugs na/ rlung dang / sad dang sprin gyi ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur te/ ji srid yid la byed pa nar mar yod pa de srid du mtshams bcings par byas par 'gyuraro// 
281a3(rgyud): khyim gyi nang du bdugs na/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / bran pho dang bran mo thams cad dang / ji srid du rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa thams cad byams pa'i
281a4(rgyud): yid du 'gyur te/ dbang du gyur nas gnas// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byedado// slar yang yid gzhan du 'gyu ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ bdugs na/ dri ma nams pa'i
281a5(rgyud): mthu des/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa skyes te/ de bzhin ga/ shags pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong ba so sor thob te/ phyis kyang ngan 'gro log
281a6(rgyud): par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyuraro// 'chi 'pho ba na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sam/ mngon par dga' ba
281a7(rgyud): skyes te/ 'di la dogs pa dang / yid gnyis bskyes par mi bya zhing / the tshom bskyed pa mi bya'o// zhes som mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyim la bdugs na/ nag po chen po la sogs
281a8(rgyud): paM/ ma mo'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor gdabang du 'gyur te/ mdun du nye bar gnas par byed// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / nag po chen po'i gzugs
281b1(rgyud): brnyan gyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu bdugs na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi med la/ kha nas khrag skyug go// rig sngags 'chang gis de blangs te/ thig le byas nas na mkha' la lding bar byedado// mig la
281b2(rgyud): byugs na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ bde blag tu 'byung po'i bdag po chen por 'gyuraro// lto bar yongasu byugs na/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i dpon po'o// lus mtha' dag la byug
281b3(rgyud): na/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / sbal chen po/ nag po chen po dang mtshungs pa'i shug su 'gyur te/ de nyid kyi gzug su 'gyuraro// 'khor gyi tshogs chen por yang 'gyur// 
281b4(rgyud): tshangs pa la bdugs na/ 'dugs pa tsam gyis mod la// 'o ma 'dzeg pa blang bar bya ste/ lus la byug par bya'o// tshangs pa dang dra ba'i stobs dang shugasu 'gyur
281b5(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed// khyab 'jug la bdugs na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la lus la pA lA sha'i khe dog gi dri'i chu 'dzag te/ rig sngags 'chang
281b6(rgyud): gi lus la byugs par bya'o// sred med kyi bu'i gzugs dang / stobs dang / shugs 'chang bar 'gyur te lag na 'khor lo thogs pas na mkha' la 'gro'o// dbang phyug
281b7(rgyud): chen po la bdugs na/ dbang phyug chen po'i lus la rdul 'byung te/ rig sngags 'chang gi lus la byug par bya'o// dbang phyug chen po'i gzugasu 'gyur te/ lag na mdung
281b8(rgyud): rtse gsum dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / stsal gyis 'byung po'i bdag po chen por 'gyur te na mkha' la 'gro'o// thams cad la don yod rgyal po'i bzlas brjod lan gsuM
282a1(rgyud): rnam par sbyin par bya'o// snying po yi ge gcig pas spyi bor bzlas brjod lan bdun du bzlas brjod sbyin par bya'o// sgra tshil las byung ba'i klu mgo bo dgu pa
282a2(rgyud): sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bya ste/ gsar gyis g.yog par bya zhing dri'i dkyil 'khor bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag par bya'o// don yod pa'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlaso// 
282a3(rgyud): bdug pa 'dis bdugs pas klu ldang bar bye'o// rig sngags 'chang gis 'jigs pa med par bya ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar la bzlas te/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu bdegs na/ lding bar
282a4(rgyud): byed// gang du 'dod pa der gnas nas/ klu chen po'i mtsho dang / gnas dang / gzhal med khang rab tu 'byung // chu gang yin pa de rnams kyang / 'thung bar byed pa dang / khrus byed pa'i
282a5(rgyud): bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'a ma/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gan su song bas 'thung ba dang / khrus byed pa de rnams thams cad kyang nad rnams dang bral bar
282a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa bral ba dang / 'jigs pa tha~Md dang bral bar yang 'gyuraro// klu rnams kyang dus dusu char gyi rgyun chen po 'byin par byed cing / char 'bebs par byed do// dus du su
282a7(rgyud): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo thog rnams rdzogs par byed// ro zhim po'i ro myong bar 'gyuraro// phyir zhing log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro// phug dang khung bu'i sgo ru 'khrug 'khor gyi
282a8(rgyud): sgo glegs la bdugs na bya zhing bcog par 'gyuraro// 'khrug pa'i dusu bdugs na 'phams par 'gyuraro// lag mthil la bdugs na/ gang dang gang la red pa thams cad du dbang du byed// 
282b1(rgyud): bdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ don yod par thams cad du gzhan gyis mi thub pa nad thams cad sel bar grub
282b2(rgyud): pa thams cad du dug 'joms par byed pa/ na ba thams cad sel bar grub pa/ sdang ba thams cad ldog par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad la mi 'jigs pa/ mtshon dang / me dang / chu dang / 
282b3(rgyud): dug rab tu 'joms pa/ rtag tu srung ba dang sgrub pa dang / sba bar byed pa/ dgra rnams dang / gzhan rgyal ba ldog par byed pa/ rgyal po dang / rgyal phran nam/ btsun mo'i 'khor du song ba dang gtsog
282b4(rgyud): rtag tu dbang du byed cing thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyuraro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'khrug pa dang / g.yul rnams rtag tu rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ gang gi tshe chom
282b5(rgyud): rkun gyi nang du song ba nyid dang / don 'thun gyi nang dang / rkun mo dang / seng ge dang / ngag gi nang du song ba de'i tshe/ thams cad du sman gyi rgyal bster ro// tshe ring por 'gyur te/ 
282b6(rgyud): tu pad+ma'i phyag gi mchog sbyin par 'gyuraro// lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed do// gnod sbyin dang / sbyin po dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding nyid dang / mi 'am ci dang
282b7(rgyud): 'phye chen po nyid dang / mi ma yin bya ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad nyin dang mtshan du srung ba'i don du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur te the tshom medo// rgyal po chen po rnams
282b8(rgyud): zos sras dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas pa dang / skabs gsum pa'i lha'i dbang
283a1(rgyud): bo dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha de rnams thams cad 'thun pas rag tu srung bar byed do// sangs rgyas kyis rnam par gzigs shing / 
283a2(rgyud): rtag tu yang mthong ba stsol bar mdzad do// gang sman lag tu phyin par 'gyur ba 'di/ yang nas yang du rig sngags kyi dngos grub myur du thob po// byang sems 'pho ba med do// de la dug med cing
283a3(rgyud): sdig pa med la/ mi bzad pa'i sbyar ba dang / phye ma'i sbyor bas gnon par mi 'gyuraro// sngon gyi sgrib pa nyams par byed de/ de bzhin du yang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / mtshan ma
283a4(rgyud): ngan pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sdang ba nyid dang / de rnams thams cad myur du rnam par nyams pa ra byed do// sman gang du gnas pa'i dpag tshad 'or
283a5(rgyud): yug tu srung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du mtshams bcings par byed// bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa thams cad dang / de bzhin do// bdud dam sdang ba de rnams thams cad rab tu
283a6(rgyud): 'bros par byed do// sman gang du gnas par gdon rab tu 'phros par byed do// mkha' 'gro ma gang yin pa dang / rnal 'byor ma gang yin pa dang / skem byed dang / gza' dang brjed byed dang / grib gnon
283a7(rgyud): gang yin pa dang / mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyu ro// lha rnams der gnas par byed cing / 'khrul 'khor la sman a gad de mchog go zheso// rgyal bas dbugs
283a8(rgyud): 'byin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams cad kyi de kho na nyid stsol bar mdzad do// rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog stsol zhing / rtag pa'i mthar mthong ba stsol bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i na/ 
283b1(rgyud): ba myur du 'grub te/ sman 'chang ba la/ sman gang du gnas par gang gis kyang bklags mi rnyed do// don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa zhes bya ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu sman gyi mchog rab tu 'bad pas
283b2(rgyud): legs par bsgrub par bya ba dngos grub kyi mchog las thams cad byed pa de nyid de'i tshe shi ba yang dag par 'tshe bar byed pa/ lo rdzogs par bstan te/ sngags dang phyag rgyas gso bar
283b3(rgyud): bya'o// lo stong phrag tu rtag tu bde ba dang / dga' bar byed do// dbang phyug dang / nor thob pa dang / 'bru 'phel ba dang / bla na med pa dang / rgyal po dga' bar 'gyur te rtag tu gnaso// 'bangs dang / 
283b4(rgyud): ci bgyi dang / mchod pa chen po rnyed do// thams cad du de dag rtag tu tshig btsun pa'o// thos pas dngos grub mchog gyur pa'i rdzas kyang 'dir ni bshad bya ste/ tsan dan rgya spos ru ta dang / 
283b5(rgyud): sgrig shing tsha bA la ka/ brag skyes spangs spos snga ma kang / sug smel glas dgang na la da/ pad+ma ud pal spri yang ku/ shing kun mdab mtsha ba gsum// ni ri sha yi me
283b6(rgyud): tog dang // de bzhin pa ri pai laM ga 'di rnams cha ni mnyam par ldan// thams cad legs gzhal legs par sbyar// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang
283b7(rgyud): bskur te/ yi ge gcig pas stong phrag bcur bzlaso// 'dir sman rnams bgrang phreng gi tshad tsam du bsgongs nas grib ma yongasu bskam par bya'o// gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyi blang la leg par
283b8(rgyud): sbyor ba'i bya ba byas pa dang / dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ni/ ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dam tshig la rab tu 'jug pa la/ shar gyi sgo ru
284a1(rgyud): phyag byas na/ dkyil 'khor mchog la bskor ba bya ste/ sgo dang sgo ru phyag bya zhing / shar gyi sgo ru 'jug par bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
284a2(rgyud): dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs par pad+ma'i ge sar la bdug nas/ den yod pa'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ mngon par dang
284a3(rgyud): bskur bar bya zhing / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags legs par sgrub bo// de nas mchod pas 'jig rten mgon pa'i dngos grub mthong bar byed cing rtag tu g.yo bar byed la 'jig rten mgon po'i
284a4(rgyud): 'od zer gyi sbyin sreg rab tu grol lo// dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ gru bzhi po ko la'i tshad du cha legs par phye ba grwa bzhi dang / sgo bzhi yod pa pa/ them skas kyi rim pa can du tshon sna
284a5(rgyud): tshogs kyi skud pas thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po mdzes bar bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po pad+ma mchog 'phye ba mdab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ snying po dang / 
284a6(rgyud): ba shin tu mdzes pa/ snying po las pad+ma byung ba 'phyed bye ba dang / lag pa gnyis byung bas pad+ma'i mdab ma 'dzin pa dris par dngul gyi snod kyi nang du sman bkang ste dang gyi kha g.yog
284a7(rgyud): nas pad+ma'i mdab ma'i steng du bzhag par bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu tshangs pa'i cha byad du bzhugs/ dar gyi gcod pan bcings brgyan pa pad+ma'i steng du
284a8(rgyud): bzhugs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun tu phyag rgya'i rtags rnams gsal bar bri'o// sgo sgor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma'i steng du gzhag pa kha dog dang 'od zer 'bar ba bri'o// 
284b1(rgyud): gra grwar bum pa gang bar bri'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phan dang / bum pa gang ba dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog bsres pa mdzes pas brgyan par bya'o// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs bzhags
284b2(rgyud): par bya'o// mchod yon gyi chu dbul bar bya/ tsan dan dang / a ga ru'i bdug spos dang / spos sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ dkyil 'khor kun tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / me tog phreng ba dgod cing
284b3(rgyud): kun tu 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dbram par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgos pa 'jigs pa med pas zla ba yar gyi ngo nya la bsgru
284b4(rgyud): bar bya ste/ sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur cing byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub par bya'o// gang gis lag gis bzung ba tsam dang / reg pa tsam gyi
284b5(rgyud): mod la de dga' ba 'thob cing sdig pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyu ra/ sngon gyi sgrib pa rnams 'jigs par 'gyur/ mtshams med pa byed pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur/ mod la
284b6(rgyud): nad thams cad 'byung zhing ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ bsod nams chen po'i stobs kyi dngos grub sman gyi de kho na nyid mthong ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lung bstan cing de
284b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa/ 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis sprul pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha zad kyis bsngags pa/ 
284b8(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po thams cad kyis phyag byas pa lha thams cad kyis srung ba/ klu'i dbang po thams cad rje su 'brang ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /

285a3(rgyud): rjesu zhugs pa/ rigs spyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sman gyi mchog dbang bskur ba/ dus
285a4(rgyud): gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung bstan g.yod bzhin gyi nor bu thams cad dang 'thun pa'i mig sman gyi rdzas bkra shis pa bye ba khrag khrig gam/ lhag par gyur pa
285a5(rgyud): gzhan gang yang mdo// sman de lta bu ni rtag tu mchog gtso bo 'byi na pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra ba yin no// de'i phyir tha mas cad sman 'chang bar 'dod pas gnas
285a6(rgyud): gang yang rung bar sbyar bar bya ste/ gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa des sbyar bar bya'o// ji lta ji ltar bkra shis kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa de lta de ltar bsam pa yid la byed pa yongasu rdzog
285a7(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ sbyar ba tsam gyi mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ 'dod pa thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gi tsang mar gyur pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos
285a8(rgyud): spos chus legs par khrus byas la nyin re sman rer don yod pa'i rgyal pos bzlas brjod byas te bos na/ zos pa tsam gyi mos la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sem/ 
285b1(rgyud): dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs shing snang ba rnam par dag par 'thob par 'gyur/ nyin zhags gsum sbyar na ngag rnam
285b2(rgyud): par dag pa 'thob bo// nyin zhag lnga sbyar na dran pa rnam par dag pa 'thob po// nyin bdun du sbyar na rig sngags chen po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par dag pa 'thob po// nyin zhags bcu bzhir
285b3(rgyud): sbyar na don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig chen po 'thob bo// nyin zhags nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig
285b4(rgyud): dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi dngos grub thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de 'o/ ma nyid kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub thob bo/ 
285b5(rgyud): ba gcig gi bar du sbyar na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyu ga gi dngos grub sgyu ma lta bus brgyan pa thob cing tshe mo stong thub par 'gyur// zla ba gsum du sbyar na lus
285b6(rgyud): yongasu dag pa dang / mdog yongasu dag pa thob bo// lo gcig tshang bar sbyar na/ don yod pa'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ mig mthon ting mdog bung ba lta bu
285b7(rgyud): ska ral bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/ tshe lo bdun pa lta bu'i gzugs dang / 'thun par 'gyur la/ tshe bskal pa 'bum thub par 'gyuraro// bdar nas bdag nyid la byugs na/ gang dri ma rnams pa tsam gyi

286a1(rgyud): ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dpag tshad stong du 'braso// gal te myur du mi 'bros na ni spyi bo dum bu 'bum du 'gas shing yan lag dang / yan lag rnams zhig
286a2(rgyud): par 'gyur la/ bu dang chung mar bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur/ sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa rnams kyis mi mtshugs par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba mtshams med pa
286a3(rgyud): lnga dag 'jig par 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / ma shis pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ spos mnams pa tsam gyis
286a4(rgyud): rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang // khyim bdag dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la dbang du gyur nas 'khod do// byug
286a5(rgyud): ba tsam gyis 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lkog/ ba dang / me dpal dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / khyi rdo dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rma dang / khang
286a6(rgyud): rma yongasu sos par 'gyur/ dug thams cad dang / zos pa dang / dug myos pa dang / sbyar du drag po dang / dug sbyar ma dang / sbyar dug phye ma dang / byad rnams la bskus pa tsam dang / chu dron
286a7(rgyud): po 'thungs pa tsam gyis dug med par 'gyuraro// dri tsam gyis klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'i dug kyang med par 'gyuraro// rims nyin bzhi pas thebs pa la dpral bar bskus nas ku tso
286a8(rgyud): 'don cing 'bro so// rims thams cad dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / 'khris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las
286b1(rgyud): gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / lnga pa dang / pho ba'i nad dang / mchin pa na ba dang / lto ba na ba dang / sman dang / gcin sri ba dang / sIng na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / mgul ba na ba dang / 
286b2(rgyud): na ba dang / 'khyil zhing na ba dang / tshad pa dang / mdoms na ba dang / yan lag dang / nying lag na ba chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam gyis yongasu sos par 'gyuraro// gzhogs phyed na ba dang / mgon

292a5(rgyud): gcig tu sbrus te/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bcug la/ so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'a khor du bzhag par bya ste dkyil 'khor mchog la
292a6(rgyud): phyag dang bskor ba byas la de nas so sor dar gyi kha bcad la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por bzhag la don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
292a7(rgyud): byas dbang bskur bar bya/ dbang bskur bar byas nas kyang rig sngags 'chang gis dbang bskur bar bya/ de nas dkyil 'khor snying por ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchod bya ste// bdug spos lnga dag dul
292a8(rgyud): bya ba/ a ga ru dang tsan dan dang / s+thi ka gu gul du ru ka/ mchod yor snod ni lnga dbul zhing // gtor mo lnga ni dbang bya ste/ ro ldan sna tshogs dag gis dag / ra ldan 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i// gtor ma/ 
292b1(rgyud): cha lnga dbul bar bya// kun tu phreng ba nyi shu dang // mar me nyi shu lnga dag dang // spos kyi phye ma lnga dag dang // spos kyi cha lngar phye bas phyug/ 'phan phran nyi shu rtsa lnga gdags// tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes
292b2(rgyud): par bya// gser dang dngul gyis g.yogs pa yi// bum pa gang ba nyi shu lnga// rin po che ni lnga gzhag sgo bzhi grwa bzhir bum pa brgyad// brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid// dkyil 'khor me tog 'bras
292b3(rgyud): yos dang // yungs kar nyid kyi mngon mgram// slob dpon bla ma mchod pa ni// gos dang snod dang yon gyiso// thub pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ltar// ston pa'i 'du shes bskrad gnas su// dkyil 'khor
292b4(rgyud): slob dpon mchod byas nas// de nas dkyil 'khor gshegs par gsol// de nas las rnams bya ba ni// ji ltar yid la sna tshogs bya// don yod chen po'i gzhal med khang // rig sdug
292b5(rgyud): 'chang gis rtag tu gsapa/ de nyid dngos grub sgrub sla ga/ de bzhin nor bu sman sngag so// don 'di shin tu bkrang giso// mkhas pa mi yis bya ba yin// phra ma'i tshig kyang mi sten du// 
292b6(rgyud): brdzun ni nams kyang sgra mi bya// 'di ni grub pa'i nga nyid de// de la 'grub pa the tshom med// 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// kun nas grwa bzhi lham pa ste// grwa bzhi cha ni lags par byed//
