292b7(rgyud): la'i tshad de legs pa dang / sna tshogs tshon gyi thug skud kyis// dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab po// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying por ni// 'khor lo bzang po bri bar bya// dbus kyi lte bar pad mo yau// 'khor lo
292b8(rgyud): gsal bar bri bar bya// pad+ma'i snying po gser dang ni// dngul lam tsan dan las byas pa// 'bar ba 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs// 'khor lo kun tu rtsibs dang ni// mu khyud dag gis cha dbye'o// dkyil
293a1(rgyud): sa mas dag rgya ya nga gams pa dang gyub rgya man pa rdzu na sa bye ma pa dga' byung banasas byam
293a2(rgyud): snrums pa nga ga d+hams gas maN+Da da kham mtshagasas pa pa ma pa ca sa/ yug sems rnam sa
293a3(rgyud): parnam pa mi la gsan na pa la 'a nam nus dang sa zhang na gzhan du gapa lalabang zla ba'i rnams ma rgyam tsham
293a4(rgyud): da tham mags par bags pa dang / rba ba rna pa 'dzadas byed gr-i 'don kyis 'bar mchag min gad ma 'am byin na/ sa pa rnams legs pa yang rdzags pa
293a5(rgyud): si rdzags rje bzhin bldan pa yon/ de nas sernas par rdza byas gnas gcatsang bags pa 'jigs med pa/ na mam/ bzung snrelas byag rmas pa'i dzabasnyan
293a6(rgyud): rgyum zur rnam la gnang nas ngan 'gro bar 'byung gsams can kun la 'thun par bya/ rgyag tu dan 'dang da bdag zhus pa de nyin ci par 'argyar/ ni sngags la
293a7(rgyud): pa'i sem shes pa'i da tha pang yu sngags nga gis b+ha ba rnas byas pa kyi cheb bcing ma dan med pa rgyam pas bcom da sa
293a8(rgyud): zhin thamu brgyang bcwas da byas nag rna ma na cam tha ched da par chung na ga dang yulang kyis rgyan la ngam cad
293b1(rgyud): brjod byas nas bskus na mig bzang bar 'gyuro// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod byas nas bdag nyid dang phyogs bcur gtor ro// de bzhin du til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
293b2(rgyud): brjod byas nas sgra yan chad bsku ba dang / tshod zin par bsku ba dang / lus gang mthil yan chang bsku'o// yi ge gcig po yid la bya ba la sems byams pa nyid la gnas nas rgyal po dang / 
293b3(rgyud): btsun mi ni sgo 'am skye bo'i nang ngam// 'dus pa chen po 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs dang phrad pa 'am/ de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten mgon pa
293b4(rgyud): gzugs dang / kha dog du mthong zhing sa'i steng nas rkang pa khru gang \u0f7fma gyis spags te 'dug la/ ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba rnams kyi dad pa de lnga de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed de/ 
293b5(rgyud): rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los bsgyur ba 'am/ mi'i seng ge 'am/ 'phag ge/ sred med bur ston pa 'am/ tshangs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi da bang po 'am/ dbang phyug chen po mig gsum
293b6(rgyud): ba 'am/ gnon nu 'am/ chu lce 'am/ ga shin rje'am/ rnam thos kyi bu 'am// de bzhin du rgyal ba chen po bzhi 'ag/ nag po chen po 'am/ dga' byed dbang phyug gam/ ser sgra 'am/ gsang ba ba'am/ 
293b7(rgyud): lag na rdo rje stobs che 'am/ nor bu bzang po'i bu 'am/ gang ba bzang po 'am/ stobs kyi 'am/ gang mkhan mchog gam/ rlung lha 'am/ drang srong nyid de ji ltar gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yid la
293b8(rgyud): byas pa thaMd ston par byed do// me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa nyid 'byung bar byeda'o// de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na de sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshog su snang
294a1(rgyud): ning gzhal med khang gi rnam par gakyang rtun par byed // ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur ba yid 'byas pa der ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed do// 'khor tshogs pa 'am dpon pa 'am
294a2(rgyud): 'chags dag kyang sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags kyi mthus gzugs sna tshog su ston par byed de/ 'dzin po 'breg gi nang du phyin pa nyams zag pa 'jigs pa mi bzad pa/ chu med pa/ mngon par
294a3(rgyud): mgon pa med gtsug bsngam drag pa de lta bu'i nang du chud pa'i skye bo sdug par gyur pa/ skyabs med pa/ mgon med par gyur pa chub pa med pa/ dpung brten med par gyur pa mi de la rig sngags
294a4(rgyud): 'chang gis phye ma 'dis phyogs pazhir mtshams bcad bdug byams dkyil 'khor gyi mul du rimo bris la ril bu la dkyil 'khar gyi dbu su bzhag yungs gang la til mar gyi rgyal bas bskus
294a5(rgyud): la ngon yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjid bya/ dra ba'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas de dbang bskur nas khro ba'i d+ha l+le hUM zhes bya bas phyag rgya bcings
294a6(rgyud): la sa la bsnun cing phyogs 'dir gtar bar bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan par byas pa tsam gyis chu bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab cing rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal dang / me dzeH
294a7(rgyud): dang 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gnal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las zang khyer dang / khang ba dang 'gyur bar 'gyur khyim gyi gnas lnga sdang 'byung bar 'byung zhing 'di
294a8(rgyud): ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / mi mang bas gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/  tshang dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / rta dang glang ba'i gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur dge sbyong dang bram na/ 
294b1(rgyud): dang / tshong pa dang / khyim dang / khang pa bzang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur// / ji srid du bsam pa de srid du 'dug 'o// chu dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor na
294b2(rgyud): mi snang bar 'gyuraro// yungs kar de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des pha rol gyi dmags tshogs dang / dgra 'jigs
294b3(rgyud): shing 'joms par byed pa las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na gtor ba tsam gyi mod la 'obs bcad cing rab kha khyer gyis bskor la grong khyer kun tu skyes bu go ma
294b4(rgyud): bgos pa dag snang bar grong khyer mnan pa 'am/ gtse bar sus kyang mi nus so// mtshan mo'i dri'i til mar de nyid yungs kar la bskus te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas
294b5(rgyud): nas chang ba gang me'i nang du gtor mang ba gang phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na kun nas mar mo'i phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ ji srid dgos pa de srid du 'bar ro// gtsug lag
294b6(rgyud): ngang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ ri 'am/ phug gam/ 'chag sa'i gnas sam khyim du gtor na mar me'i phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ chu dang yungs kar gyis mi snang bar 'gyur/ grong khyer gyi nar
294b7(rgyud): yungs kar gtor na gtor ba tsam gyi mod la dgra thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi grong khyer mi snang bar 'gyu ro// gang na phyir rgol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gnas pa'i grong
294b8(rgyud): ngam/ grong khyer ram/ tshul gyi nang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gtor na 'brog dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/ wad phan tshun ngo ma shes nas 'jigs shing smra ba chen pos rab tu 'gros par
295a1(rgyud): byed do// dgra'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na mtshon ma thams cad dang / 'gyed pa'i go mthod mi snang zhing gcer bur 'gyuraro// zhal che 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na 'gyed zla ga
295a2(rgyud): bo de gcer bur 'gyur// dgra'i steng du gtor na me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa yid la ji ltar byas pa'i las 'bum snyed byed do// de nas las rgya chen po byed pa'i
295a3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa spos kyis lus bskus pa des/ yungs kar dang / til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'pha
295a4(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gtor bar bya// khro bo'i rgyal pos len bdun dbang bskur nas phyag rgya ba cas pa'i leg pas ril bu spyi bor bzhag la phye mas gdab snga
295a5(rgyud): bya/ til mar gyi rgyal pos rkang pa la byug par bya/ don yod pa'i rgyal po lan cig dran par bya ste/ yongasu sbyang ba'i las lhan cig bya ba legs par byas pas 'bags pa
295a6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis g.yo ste gar dga' bar 'gro la/ gzugs brnyan gang du 'gro ba de nyid du rang 'gro// lha'i steng du gtor na lga lha'i gnas nas 'pho zhing gar dga' bder
295a7(rgyud): 'gro'o// phye mas lha'i steng du gtor la khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes bya ba mi snang bar 'gyuraro// til mar gyi rgyal po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la bdag nyid kyis pus mo dang / 
295a8(rgyud): byin pa la bskus na na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// rkang mthil la bskus na sa'i steng na rkang pa song bzhi tsam mi reg go/ rdo'i steng du rkang pa bzhag pa dang / rkang rdzas byung ba'i steng
295b1(rgyud): du rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum pa bzhag pa'i rkub la bskus na sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad du na mkha' la 'dug go/ yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas mes sbyin sreg
295b2(rgyud): byas pa'i thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ til mar gyis sdus pa la khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur nas mig la bskus na mig gsum stan
295b3(rgyud): cing dbang phyug chen po'i gzugasu ston par bye'o// thal bas lus la byugs na tshangs pa'i gzugasu ston to// shing pa la sha dang / brna sha bsres pas lus byugs na sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang / 
295b4(rgyud): shugs dang / gzugasu ston to// til mar chen pos khar bskus la thal bas dpral bar thig la byas na gzhon nu'i gzug su ston to// yungs kar gyi 'bru kha dog sna tshogs can la til mar
295b5(rgyud): chen po byugs pas bskus pa don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ phyag rgyas brgya rtsa brgyad da bang bskur cing khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur la/ 
295b6(rgyud): de nas dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bzhag de nas las thams cad byed de na mkha' la gtor na nor bu dang rin po che'i char 'bab par ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i tshe na mkha' la ga
295b7(rgyud): name tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dus pa'i nang du na mkha' la gtor na 'bras bu dang nor gyi rgyun sna tshogs pa ston to// tshal gyi nang du gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa
295b8(rgyud): ston to// ri phug tu gtor na rdzas dang sgra sna tshogs ston to// mchod rten snying pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas gtor na yo byad tha~Md kyis yongasu gang zhing rdzogs pa gang ba bzang
296a1(rgyud): po yangs pa gnas kyi mchog ston to// grong khyer stong par gtor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs shing yong su rdzogs pa dang / yul rgyal po dang / sbas pa
296a2(rgyud): dang / bkrabs pa dang / 'dun na 'don pa dang / blon po dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag ston to// yang dag khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes pa bas gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa
296a3(rgyud): ston to// dur khrod kyi nang du gtor na shi ba'i rus pa gang dang gang la bab pa de dang de gang du sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam lha ma yin nam/ na mkha'
296a4(rgyud): lding ngam/ dri za 'am/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ bya 'am/ nya 'am/ rus sbal gyi rig su skyes pa 'am/ lha'i 'jig rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa de'i rus pa 'am/ thod pa la tshig
296a5(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur la/ gang du skyes pa de'i gtam yang smra'o// gang dang gang gi skye gnas skyes pa de thaMd sgra la thabs ji ltar bya ba de smra'o// yungs kar des kyang rus gong 'bral
296a6(rgyud): bar 'am/ shi ba'i ro 'am/ rus pa 'thor ba la bab na bab pa tsam gyos mod la sems can dmyal ba la sa yongasu thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyu ro// zong bkram
296a7(rgyud): pa'i nang du gtor na thaMd mi mngon par 'gyuraro// na mkha' la gtor na skar ma rnams mi mthong bar 'gyuraro// skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor na thams cad gcer bur 'gyuraro// 'dus pa'i nang du
296a8(rgyud): gtor na thams cad bro rdung bar byedado// dge 'dun gyi nang du gtor na dge slong zad bsam gtan 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshogs kyi gtso bo la gtor na rnal 'byor spyod par 'gyu ro// mkha' gro ma'i tshigs
296b1(rgyud): kyi nang du gtor na thams cad bong bu dang / wa dang / khyi'i gzugs can du 'gyuraro// sbyor ma'i sgor gtor na sbyar ba thams cad 'bar la ma he'i gzugs can du snang ngo // shi ba'i steng du gtor na
296b2(rgyud): bro rdung bar byed do// thod pa'i steng du gtor na bro rdung bar byed cing rgyug la phan tshun rgyug par byed do// lam gyis bzhir mdor gtor na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thang rang gi gzugs
296b3(rgyud): kyis mdun na nye bar 'khod la ji srid 'tsho'i dbang du gyur nas 'khod do// nyin gcig bzhin bdag nyid la gtor na mchod pa chen po'i gnas su 'gyur te/ gzhan yang rang bzhin gi blo rnams kyis
296b4(rgyud): las 'bum bsnyed byed do// don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sgyu ma lta bu'i cho ga la// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ 
296b5(rgyud): bam po bco brgyad pa// de nas de'i phyir 'dugs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bstan pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gang gis lha rnams myur du 'ong ba dang / phyag na rdo rje'i
296b6(rgyud): gzugs myur du ston to// rdo rje'i sku dang stobs po che// rta mgrin dang ni mgul sngon dang // de bzhin d+ha ni rgod ma'i kha// bdud rtsi'i khyil ldan gzugs pa che// log 'dren rnams ni rab 'joms dang / khro rgyal de bzhi
296b7(rgyud): 'jigs byed spyan/ ke le'i ki li'i rgyal po che// khro ba tshol pa stobs po che// de bzhin rdo rje sa 'og gzugs// rdo rje rtse mo de nyid dang / klu chen rab 'joms spyan yangs dang / sog ma med ni 'dul ba dang // de bzhin
296b8(rgyud): thigs wa khros chen dang // de bzhin mche ba gtsigs mdzad dang / rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i sgrog sku yi dbang ba stobs kyis gnon// mgon po gos sngon gyon pa dang / dbyug sngon dgra las rgyal ba dang // 'jig
297a1(rgyud): rten dbang phyug pad+ma'i lde/ phyag na pad+ma pad+ma byug// de bzhin 'jigs pa brgyad sel dang // de bzhin mchod rten 'jig rten bla// sna tshogs gzugs ste bzang po dang // sred med bu dang tshangs pa
297a2(rgyud): dang / drag po daN+Di dbang phyug dang // nag po chen po gzhon nu dang // gshin rje dang ni chu lha nyid// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // rgyu skar sgra can mjug rings dang // de bzhin bza' dang lha ma yin// na mkha' lding dang mi
297a3(rgyud): 'am ci// gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che// 'byung po dpal ldan rnam thos bu// de bzhin yul skyong mig mi bzang // 'phags skyes de nyid mthong ba dang // mi'u thung dang ni drang srong gzugs// nor
297a4(rgyud): bu bzang sras gang ba bzang // sna tshogs gzugs can ston pa dang // rgyal po dang ni ded dpon dang // tshong dpon de bzhin khyim bdag dang // bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang / dge sbyong stag
297a5(rgyud): dang seng ge dang // khyu mchog de bzhin nag kyi lha// shing lha de bzhin me tog lha/ gang ga sI ta ya mun// zla bskal ldan du sbal zha// la ga 'gro dang ni thod pa can// skal yod de bzhin
297a6(rgyud): 'bras bu dang // me tog rgya rlabs chen po dang // sna tshogs gzugs dang rnam sna tshogs// de ltar dgugs pa bstan pa dang // de ltar slar gshegs gsol ba nyid// sbyin sreg dra ba 'di nyid kyis// rgyu
297a7(rgyud): 'phrul smad byung gsang sngags grug// rdzas grub nor bu til mar grub// don yod zhags pa sgrub pa'i phyir// de nyid dngos grub rab ston pa// mchod can dgon pa gtsug lag khang / lha yi gnas dang
297a8(rgyud): de bzhin grong // grong khyer nyid dang 'bab chu'i dang // mtshe'u dang lteng ga chu bo dang // rdzing dang de bzhin char 'bab dang // 'brug sgrogs dang ni glog 'gyu dang // gzhan yang me ni 'bar ba dang // dung ba'i phug
297b1(rgyud): po bde 'gyed dang // skyes bu go mgyon pa dang // de bzhin mtshon cha sna tshogs mthong // khyu mthong grub pa mthong ba dang // de nyid rmad du byung ba ste// rdzas nyung sbyar ba nyung gyur kyang // de nyid dngos grub bla na
297b2(rgyud): med// sems can rnams la phan 'tshal nas// bcom ldan de nyid bdag gis bshad// rig sngags 'chang rnams bklags pas 'grub// dbul po rnams ni nor 'thob cing // sdang ba rnams ni byams
297b3(rgyud): bar bgyid// mu stegs gzhan rnams dad par bgyid// mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid// gdul dka' rnams ni thar bar 'tshal// dge slong rnams ni bsam gtan thob// ting 'dzin bla
297b4(rgyud): na med pa 'thog/ chos 'dod rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong // sdig pa byed rnams sdig pa 'jig mi rigs rnams zla ba thob// mtshams med lnga rnams rnam dag don// dbugs ma phyin rnams
297b5(rgyud): dbugs 'byin mchog/ ma dul ba rnams de bzhin 'dul// ma na la ba rnams sgrol ba'i gru// thar pa'i lam du 'gro bar gnas// ma grol ngan 'gro kun las grol// sdig pa kun
297b6(rgyud): las rnam par grol// lung ma bstan pa lung sngon byed// sgron dang dri ma sdig pa rnams// thams cad mod la spong bgyid de// de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// bklags pas grub pa bgyid
297b7(rgyud): ba lags// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// don gyi dngos grub bla na med// rang dang gang du sbyor ba bgyid// dgos pa tha~Md 'grub par 'gyur// yid la bsams pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'dir
297b8(rgyud): ni yid kyis rnam bsam pa/ ji ltar yid la 'dod pa dang // ji ltar ngo bo kun bsams pa// de ltar rnam 'phrul ston par bgyid// tshes grangs rgyu skar sbyar mi 'tshal// bsnyung ba bgyi ba
298a1(rgyud): mi 'tshal te/ cho ga ji bzhin dus ji bzhin/ cho ga rig sngags rgyal po bzlas// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur cing // legs par khrus bgyi gos gtsang dag/ 'gos pa
298a2(rgyud): bden par smra ba dang / bla ma la ni gus byed pa// rtag tu byams pa'i sems la gnas// sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog / sdom la gnas shing tshangs par spyod// chos ma yin pa spong byed pa// 
298a3(rgyud): gal te de nyid grub 'dod na// sha dang snyun dong dang // 'dres dang za 'phro spags pa spangs// sems can ngan pa su 'byin pa// rig sngags chu dang cho ga tu// chos rku gsang sngags rku ba dang // de bzhin rkun ma
298a4(rgyud): kun dang // ser sna rtag tu spang bar gyis// de dag la ni dngos grub med// ma rungs pa yid dam tshig nyams// yid bcugs pa ni med par byed// sdig pa'i chos ni kun tu spyod// de bzhin ga
298a5(rgyud): pa kun gyis smad// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smad// rtad tu chos kyi sdong du ma 'gyur// shi nas sems can dmyal bar ga zhol// rtag tu smad pa'i gan su 'gyur// dngul po
298a6(rgyud): lus ni bskams pa dang // mdze dang khyi rngos 'debs pa dang // sdug bsngal rkun ma chos sun 'byin// chos ku ba yi lus can ni// 'jig rten 'dir ni bder mi 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol ga la bde// 
298a7(rgyud): sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba yin// de lta bas na chen po 'dod pas ni rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi rjesu 'brang bar bya zhing rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang / pha dang ma dang bla ma dang // 
298a8(rgyud): ston pa ni skyobs pa dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen mdzad pa ston pa/ mchog sbyin ga/ dngos grub dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa na shi las thar bar byed pa/ dbang phyug sbyin pa/ nor sbyin pas 'byung
298b1(rgyud): sbyin gdang ba mchog bskyed pa de nyid 'jig rten gyi bla ma/ mgon pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po// dbang phyug mgon po// mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ gzugs sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa/ 
298b2(rgyud): dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par bgyid pa/ mgon po sdug bsngal sna tshogs las yongasu thar par bgyid pa/ nad sna tshogs sbyong bar grub pa/ rin po che sna tshogs rab tu sbyin par bgyid
298b3(rgyud): pa/ 'jig rten gyi sdig pa sna tshogs sel bar bgyid pa/ bla ma la gus pa sna tshogs bgyid pa lags te/ de lta bas na rtag tu 'bad pas dgos pa thaMd rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ rtag tu
298b4(rgyud): 'bad pas shin tu gus par bgyid pa lag so// de nas rdzas kyi sman sgrub pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ seng ge'i lce dang / snying dang / mig dang / de bzhin du nya phyis
298b5(rgyud): kyi phye ma dang / sdong ros dang / brah+ma'i 'o ma dang / gu gul dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ze ba dang // sud pa la sngon po dang / nA ga pus pa dang li shi dang / rgya spos dang / de bzhin du gau'u
298b6(rgyud): dang gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gur gum dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / sgrog ka dang / te dza ba ti ste de ltar ma mnyam par byas pa de dag tshang phye ma zhib mo byas la dngul gyi snod bkang ste dar gyi g.yogs/ 
298b7(rgyud): don yod po'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dus gsum du khri bzlas brjod bya'o// dus gsum du khro bo'i rgyal pos lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas dbang
298b8(rgyud): bskur zhing phyag rgyas kyang nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bsku ro// khro tshang nas cha lnga byas te phye me dang / til mar dang / nor bu dang / mig bsku ba dang / til mar tshos pa dang cha lnga'o// phye ma'i pad+ma mu ru ka'i
299a1(rgyud): phye ma dang sbyar la bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos ni lnga stong ngo // til mar ni ma hA ru ti ras 'grub ste sa rgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos bzhi stong ngo // nor bu ni sbrul gyi
299a2(rgyud): khrag gis spras te khri chig sdong bzlas brjod bya'o// dri bo'i rgyal pos lnga stong lnga rgya'o// mig sman ni rma bya'i mig chu dang / 'ug pa'i mig dang / klad pa dang sbyar la khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o// dra bo'i rgyal po
299a3(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad do// brah+ma te la srang nyi shu gan d+ha ra ba te srang brgyad/ yungs mar la srang bcu drug/ 'o ma la srang brgya/ ba ser mo grub pa'i 'o ma dang / ba'i lci ba dang / ba gcin srang bdun du ru ka'i mar khu srang
299a4(rgyud): gnyis te rdzas 'di rnams chu dang bsres nas pad+ma'i sdong bus dkrug cing zangs snod du btso'o// mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas// cho ga dag gis srung bar bya// cho ga bzhin du
299a5(rgyud): gtor ma sbyar/ me tog bdug spos dag gis bdug/ til mar mtsho ga ni bsgrub par bya// chung ngur me bud grub pa mchog spos kyi shing gis bud pa bzang // 'di ltar grub par shes pa dang / 
299a6(rgyud): dro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba// nyi shu gcig tu dbang bskuro// til mar de ni snod gtsang ma// zangs snod yangs na dngul snod bza / smig ma'i snod du gzhag par bya// de nas rig sngags brgyad stong dang / 
299a7(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po brgyad stong nyid// so so dag tu bzlas brjod bya// dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs pa der bzhag par bya ba ni ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bya ba de ltar byas nas bzhag cing slob dpon gyi las
299a8(rgyud): kyang bya ste/ ji ltar dkyil 'bar sgrub pa dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor bskor ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / spyi'u gtsug bcing ba dang / srung ba'i chog
299b1(rgyud): dang ni reg bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / mchod phyir thogs pa ste dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon kun gyis de dag thad bstan par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por bzhag la rig sngags 'amang
299b2(rgyud): sbyang ba'i cho ga byas las 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khra bo'i rgyal pos kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur/ phyag rgyas kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur
299b3(rgyud): / phyag rgya bcing nas rnam pa gsum 'dra bar dbang bskur ro// de nas las thad byas te yungs kar dkar po grub pa la rig sngags 'chang gis brgya stong bzlas brjod byas la pad+ma'i mchog gtso bo bcang ba/ 
299b4(rgyud): gtsang mar byas pa/ legs par bskus pa/ sbyangs pa/ phye ma zhib tu btags pa/ thal ba lta bu la brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas snod dgang / gu gul dang / tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / smrig ka
299b5(rgyud): pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod kyi nang du bkang la/  bus kyi dkyil 'bor das pa'i steng du ma sor bzhag go// de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing phyag rgyas kyang
299b6(rgyud): dbang bskur ba byas na/ gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba'i tshe bya ba theng byed do// gser ram/ yang na dngul lam/ zangs las pad+ma'i tshad du byas pa 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / snying po dang / ze ba can dang / 
299b7(rgyud): de bzhin du sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad la sdong bu sor bcu drug pa'i tshad rdo rje'i rnam pa can du bya/ skud pa dmar po'i zhag pa pad+mo tshon dmar pos bzhin pa/ gzhon nus bkal ba grub pa dang / 
299b8(rgyud): de dag la brgya stong bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas la mkhas pas gsang ba'i gnasu bzhag go// gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba de'i tshe las thaMd
300a1(rgyud): grub pa ston to// shin tu gtsang zhing gtsang bar bya ste/ u la yang mi sbyin no// sangs rgyas rnams la sku brnyas par gyur pa/ dam tshig nyams pa la bgegs 'jug par 'gyur zhing / 
300a2(rgyud): 'phral du mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rmongs pa'i dra ba de la dngos grub nams kyang shes par mi 'gyuraro// gzhan ni bla ma la gus shing / sangs rgyas chos la ston byed pa// 'phags pa'i
300a3(rgyud): tshogs la dang ba dang / byams sems snying rje bdag nyid can// de yi lag tu rab tu sbyin// bdag gi srog bzhin gtad par bya// de dag dngos grub mchog sbyin te// bklags dang mthong ba tsam
300a4(rgyud): gyis ni// ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin// rjesu 'thun pa'i las byed do// 'jig rten 'dir ni rtag tu ba de// 'jig rten pha rol bde ba yin// 'gro ba lam ni bde bar
300a5(rgyud): 'gro// gang na 'od dpag med pa bzhug sa// bde ba can rtag tu 'gro// brdzus te bskyes te pad+ma las// rgyan rtags kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tshe rabs dag ni dran
300a6(rgyud): 'gyur te// sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang rmongs pa chen po'i dam tshig ston par 'dod pa gtsang mas legs par khrus bya/ gos gtsang ma
300a7(rgyud): bgos nas nyin zhags cig bsrung ba byas pas lag na rdo rje dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon du bzhag ste/ me tog dang / bdugs spos dbul zhing / 
300a8(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs dang / phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs la mchod pa yang bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ga ru'i bdug
300b1(rgyud): blos kyis bdug lag mardo rje la gu gul gyis bdug spos kyis bdugs/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sa lba ba shos dkar po dbul/ lag na rdo rje la ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha
300b2(rgyud): bshos phul la/ nyin par don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya ste/ kha gdong khro gnyer med pa dang / dri ma dang ser sna med pas nams langs kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas pa dang / 'phags
300b3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'phar bar 'gyur la/ lag na rdo rje yang dbus mo 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ de gnyis kyi mig nas 'jig pa/ rig sngags 'chang gi blangs nas thig le byas
300b4(rgyud): na mi snang bar 'gyu ro// mig la bskus na na mkha' la 'gro'o// khar bcug na rig sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyu ro// lag na rdo
300b5(rgyud): rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'gru/ sa kyi pha rol gnon par 'gyur/ lag ni rdo rje'i rang gi gzugs kyis mdun man par 'dug cing 'dod pa tha~Md kyi mchog rjes sbyin
300b6(rgyud): par byed la/ rang gi gzugs kyis spyod par byed/ lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon pa rjesu sbyin par byed/ de ltar lag na rdo rjes 'gugs par 'gyur// 
300b7(rgyud): nyi ma 'char ba'i du su til mar chen po ran par bdag nyid la bsku/ mig sman gyis mig byug// phye mas gtor zhing bdag nyid la thig le bya/ nor bu mgo la gnag nas gu gul gyis
300b8(rgyud): 'dug bdag nyid gos ngur smrig bgos nas sangs rgyas yid la bya bsgom zhing / zhi ba dang dul ba'i yid kyis sde can gyi nang ngam dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o// de nas dge slong
301a1(rgyud): de dag gis bde ba can gyi nang du zhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs pa'i rig sngags 'chang de bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du mthong ste/ 
301a2(rgyud): mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod pa 'od mdom gang gastan pad+ma/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i mdun gyi bdar ba'i lha tshogs sna tshogs kyis gzugs mthong bar ston to// dge slong de dag gis kyang
301a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / mdog du mthong nas thad zhabs gnyis la 'dud pa byed do// rig sngags 'chang des brnyas par mi bya zhing / bdag la bstod par yang mi bya/ brnyas pa
301a4(rgyud): tsam gyis khyod kyi bsod nams yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya'o// 'phags pa'i dge 'aslong gi dge 'dun rdzub 'phru la chen pos stobs bcu dang ldan par dbu
301a5(rgyud): dbyung bar bya ste/ rgyu des na brnyas par mi bya'o// de nas grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par bya/ de nas 'dus pa'i nang du 'ju ga par bya/ de nas grong dang / tshang tshing dang / yul dang / 
301a6(rgyud): ri brag kyi nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas btsun mo'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/ yul gyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyingasu
301a7(rgyud): mthong zhing mchod pa chen po dang / rim gro sna tshogs byed par 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas yin no zhes smra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho ga 'thob po// yungs kar dang / til mar gyis rang
301a8(rgyud): gi 'khor gyi spyi bor gtor cing byugs na/ thams cad lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i gzugasu ston to// rkang pa til mar gyis
301b1(rgyud): bskus na sa'i steng nas sor brgyad tsam gyis sbags te na mkha' la 'gro ste/ ji srid du ma bkrus pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du ston to// mgon po spyan ras gzigs mthong bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags
301b2(rgyud): 'chang de nang par sngar langs nas gtsang ma khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas khang steng du 'dug la yungs kar la til mar gyis byugs nas phyogs bzhir gtor ma rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rgyal rigs
301b3(rgyud): dang / bram ze dang / btsun mo dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang / bu mo thang sgyu ma chen pos rmongs par 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang des nor bu bzhis dbu rgyan dang phreng ba byas la mgo la gdag so// 
301b4(rgyud): til mar gyis yan lag tsam la bsku bar bya/ dpral bar thig la bya/ mig sman gyis mig bsku/ phye mas bdag nyid la gdag ras bzang po yug gcig bgo/ byang chub sems dpa'i cha byad du bgyi ba/ 
301b5(rgyud): nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser skung gyis bcings na de dag theng rgyan dang / sdud pa dang / nor bu dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai n+du r+ya sna tshogs la sogs pas lus rgyan par sna // 
301b6(rgyud): lag na pad+ma thogs na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzug su sna // yid la ji ltar bsams pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i tshul dang / 'jigs pa brgyad dang / tshangs pa'i tshul dang / ming
301b7(rgyud): bzhin nor bu dang / rgod ma'i kha dang / mgul sngon dang / rta mgrin du ston to// ji ltar gzugs yid la byas pa de ltar ston te/ ji srid du thig la yod cing dbu rgyan thogs pa de srid du tshul sna tshogs
301b8(rgyud): ston par byed do// til mar dang / yungs kar dang bsres nas/ ka~M kuny+dza dang lhan cig sbrus nas lag pa g.yas na rdo rje / dpral bar dbang phyug chen po'i thig le byas nas pad+ma'i phye ma gtor la/ nor bu spyi gtsug
302a1(rgyud): tu bcing / mig sman gyi mig bsku/ gu gul gyis bdugs la shes rab can khro bo'i lha'i tshul byas na mngon sum du rdo rje 'chang gi gzugasu snang te/ de la the tshom mi bya'o// ji srid du bdag
302a2(rgyud): drus ma byas pa de srid du rdo rje'i gzugs can du snang la las sna tshogs byed cing mi dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis rdo rje 'chang nyid du sems te/ de la the tshom mi bya'o// seng ge'i khrag gis te'i
302a3(rgyud): mar dang nor bu sbrus nas lus la bskus na mi'i seng ge chen po'i gzugasu ston to// phag gi khrag gis smras nas lus la bskus na phag gi gzugs chen por ston to// til mar dang / phye ma ldan cig sdus nas
302a4(rgyud): yungs pa dang / shing pa la sha'i mdog tu byas la lus la bskus na sred med kyi bu'i gzugasu ston to// rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma dang / tol mar lhan cig sbrus la bskus na dbang phyug chen po'i
302a5(rgyud): gzugasu ston to// shing a rga'i 'o ma dang / til ma ra dang / mnyam par sbyar la lus la bskus na tshangs pa'i gzugasu ston to// glang po che'i khrag dang til mar sbyar nas lus la bskus na
302a6(rgyud): / tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugasu ston to// ra'i khrag dang sbrus nas lus la byugs na ra'i gzugasu ston to// til mar dang / thing shing dang / pad+ma'i phye ma dang / glang po ma'i khrag dang lhan cig sbyar nas
302a7(rgyud): lus la bsdus na nag po chen po gzugs mngon sum du rang gi gzugasu ston la/ gang dang gang dag la thig le byas nam mo'i tshogs kyi gzugasu ston to// sbrul gyi khrag dang / lpags pa dang / til mar gyi
302a8(rgyud): rgyal po dang lhan cig sbrus la rgal tshig su bsku zhing / dpung pa g.yon par yang bskus na klu'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugasu ston te/ ji lta ji ltar trag dang sbyar zhing ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar
302b1(rgyud): gzugs ston to// de nas gzhal med khang lta bar 'dod na yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus nas dge 'dun gyi nang du steng 'og tu gtor/ phye mas nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo kun tu bskus na dge 'dun nan
302b2(rgyud): rim su bkod pa'i dbus gzhal med 'ang chen po rgyan gyis brgyan pa ston/ dge slong rnams kyi steng du na dge slong thams cad gzugs sna tshogs yid la ji ltar byas pa bzhin rgyal po'i gzug su snga
302b3(rgyud): ba dang / gzhan dag blon po dang / gzhan dag bkrabs pa dang / gzhan dag 'dun na 'don pa dang / gzhan dag yongasu spyod pa'i gzugs su ston la/ yungs kar la bskus pas gtor na slar yang dge slong rnam
302b4(rgyud): su snang ngo // shing arga'i 'o ma yungs kar la bskus nas dge 'dun gyi dbus su dge slong rnams kyis mal stan gyi ste nga du gtor na/ ji ltar dge slong thaMd 'khod pa ltar snang // ral pa'i
302b5(rgyud): thor tshugs kyis rgyan pa la gtor na rgan po 'ang rab thogs pa sgur po ltag dgye skra dkar can nyams chung ba raM snang ngo // mal stan gyi steng du yungs kar gter ba gal te mtshan thog
302b6(rgyud): thag bzhag na gzugs gzhan du mi 'gyuraro// lug gi steng na snang yod pa la btor na de thur ma'i ga ze ba dang sbrul nag pa sdang ngo / snod kyi steng du ga/ na kham por du snang bar 'gyur/ gtung ba'i snod sbrang
302b7(rgyud): rtsis byugs pa'i steng du gtor na phyag dar gyi phung por snang ngo // grong khyer gyi sgo dang grong khyer kun tu gtor na grong kun nas mi snang bar 'gyur// grong khyer kun la yungs kar dang pad+ma'i phye ma gtor na
302b8(rgyud): skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mi snang ba thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// seng+ge'i khrag dang sbyar nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi nas kyi steng du gtor na lam gyi gzhi mdo thams cad du seng+ge'i gcu
303a1(rgyud): su ston to// sde drag cing gtum la yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa'i steng du gtor na thams cad wa'i gzugasu snang la phyogs bcur rgyag go// g.yul 'gyed sar gtor na tham
303a2(rgyud): cad gnyid log par byas par 'gyur la mtshon ma thams cad dang / go cha thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ me'i nang du gtor na mi snang ba rnams snang bar 'gyuraro// til mar dang sbyar nas me'i nang du gtor na
303a3(rgyud): rtag tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// chu'i nang du gtor na chu mi mngon par 'gyuraro// bum pa nus bkang ba la gtor na srog chags chu'i nang na gnas pa thams cad chu'i nang nas 'byung zhing zang la gnaso// tshal gyi nang du
303a4(rgyud): yungs kar gyis gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu mi snang bar gyur pa thams cad snang zhing shing skam po dang / tshal gyi ma thar me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad ston to// na mkha' la gtor
303a5(rgyud): na phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ 'dus pa'i ngan ngam skye bo mang po'i nang du me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'bab ste/ lha'i dri legs par smin pa yid dga' ba sim par byed pa 'bab po/ 
303a6(rgyud): las dang ldan pa 'am/ bzo'i gnas kyi las te/ las kyi snod thams cad la til mar gyi rgyal pos byugs la phye mas bsku/ pad+ma chen po'i phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas bsku/ yungs kar gyi phyogs bzhir gtor
303a7(rgyud): la/ de nas las kyi bzo bzang po ji lta ba bzhin ston par 'dod na las kyi snod de dang de dag nyid g.yo la las kyi bzo'i tshul bzang pos mthar phyin pa rnam pa du dag ston par byed la nyo tshong byed pa 'byung ste/ 
303a8(rgyud): gal te phyir bzlog pa ma byas na rin ji lta ji lta ba de lta de ltar nyo tshong byed do// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur la dpag tshad brgya stong tsam gyi bar du khrid na de dang de nyid du mi snang
303b1(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo la phye mas byug cing yungs kar chags par byas la/ pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gtor na 'jim pa bzhag la snod kyi ngo bo ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bya ste/ snad ngo bo
303b2(rgyud): dngul las byas pa 'am/ gser las byas pa 'am/ zangs las byas pa 'am/ lcags las byas pa 'am/ lcags lnga las byas pa rin po che bzang po sna tshogs kyis smras pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i snod bkra
303b3(rgyud): ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/ nyo tshong byed pa yang 'byung ste/ rin chen pos tshong byed do// yungs kar gyi phye ma dang / pad+ma'i phye ma lhan cig sbyar nas tshong 'dus kyi dbus su gtor na kun tu
303b4(rgyud): zong bkram pa'i snod mi snang bar byas pa thams cad snang bar byed do// zag pa'i steng du sbyor na sbrul chen po ston to// khyim dang / ra ba'i ngos dang sgo dang / shing sbyar ba dang / ka ba'i steng
303b5(rgyud): du gtor na khang pa dang ra ba dang / 'khor gyi khyams rnams sbrul du ston to// ji srid du chu dang yungs kar gyis bzla ga pa ma byas pa de srid du sprul pa rnams 'dug go// bzlog pa byas
303b6(rgyud): na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ khang bzang kyi ngos la gtor na sbrul chen por snang ngo // lha'i steng du gtor la mi sman gyis bsku/ ril bus thig le byas na lnga'i gzugs brnyan de du
303b7(rgyud): co 'don cing 'gro ste/ gar 'dod pa der 'gro'o// bzlog pa byas na phyir 'dug go// sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi zhabs la byugs la phye mas gtor na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs g.yo bar mdzad/ bzhud par
303b8(rgyud): mdzad do// 'jug par mdzad do// 'chag par mdzad do// tsan dan la bzlas brjod nas bdugs na phyir bzhug so// bum pa sbrang rtsis bskus pa rnams la gtor na g.yo bar byed do// ji tsam du phyir bzlog pa
304a1(rgyud): ma byas pa de tsam du g.yo'o// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog na phyir 'dug go// de nas rdo rje bskyod par 'dod na spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/ bu gul gyis bdug pas bdug
304a2(rgyud): de yang yungs kar dang phye ma dang bcas pa gter la don yod pa'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor las langs nas na mkha' la 'gro bar byed do// 'phar bar byed/ 'dug par
304a3(rgyud): byed/ 'bar bar byed cing / phan tshun 'gro bar byed/ mtho bar 'gro bar byed/ dma' bar 'gro bar byed/ rnam par 'gro bar byed/ 'bar ba chen pos 'bar byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid
304a4(rgyud): du na mkha' la 'gro'o// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na de nyid du snang ngo // de nas 'khor lo bskyod par 'dod nad kyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la spos sna tshogs kyis bris nas me to/ 
304a5(rgyud): sna tshogs dgram par yang bya/ bu gul gyi bdugs bas kyang bdugs nas 'khor lo lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa rjod byas la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku phye mas bsku/ lte ba'i dbus
304a6(rgyud): su thig le byas nas dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag par bya/ de la yang yungs kar dang / pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gdab par bya/ 'khor lo kun nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing se gol gyi sgra
304a7(rgyud): yang byas na 'khor lo de dkyil 'khor las las langs nas na mkha' la 'phar zhing sdang ba thams cad la 'bab par byed de/ gal te g.yul 'gyed par 'bab na/ de'i tshe dgra thams cad kyi mgo gcod
304a8(rgyud): bar byed sdang ba thams cad dang phyir rgol ba thams cad la bab na 'jig par byed/ bgegs thams cad la 'bab pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / gdon/ 
304b1(rgyud): rnams la 'bab pa dang / klu sdang ba thams cad la bab na 'jig par byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'bar ro// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go// mdung
304b2(rgyud): rtse gsum pa bskyod par 'dod na dkyil 'khor byas la thod pa bzhag par bya/ me tog dgram pa yang bya gu gul gyi bdug pas kyang bdugs la/ mdung rtse gsum pa la/ til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ 
304b3(rgyud): phye mas gdab cing thig le bya/ rtse'i rgyun gsum la pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gtor nas thod pa'i steng du bzhag par bya/ yungs kar gyi gtor zhing hU~M zhes saM gal byas na mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar bar byed
304b4(rgyud): ldang bar byed/ na mkha' la 'gro bar byed kun tu 'ab ra bar byed/ 'gro bar byed/ phyogs bcur 'bar bar byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'phar bar byed do// chu dang yungs kar
304b5(rgyud): gyi bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go/ dung la til mar gyis byugs la phye mas gtor la thig le bya/ yungs kar gyis kyang phyi nang gtor la bus na ji srid du sgra thos
304b6(rgyud): pa de srid kyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thed bro rdung bar byed/ rgyug par byed/ mchong bar byed cing phyogs bcur rab tu rgyug par byed do// g.yul ngor bus na 'gyed pa'i mi thams cad dang / mtshon
304b7(rgyud): ma thams cad dang / go ma thams cad btang nas bro rdung bar byed/ gtsar bur 'byung bar byed/ phyogs bcur rgyug par byed do// gal te dung len bdun bus na phyir rdol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs des nyon mongs
304b8(rgyud): bskyed par 'gyur/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid mchong zhing phyogs bcur rgyug go// spos chus bzlog cing khrus byas na phyir bde bar gnas par 'gyur la/ rtag tu rgyal ba dang / dpal gyi mchog
305a1(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyuraro// de nas sgyu ma de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i gsang sngags dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil
305a2(rgyud): 'khor gang du dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs shing / kun nas rgyan par yungs kar dang til mar gyi rgyal po dang / phye mar bsres pas byug pa dang / thig les kyang dbang bskur cing pad+ma chen po'i phye mas
305a3(rgyud): byugs la lag pa phyag rgya dang / hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na brjod pa tsam dang / yungs kar gyis gtor ma'i mod la gtor ma'i snod dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum pa bkang ba thams cad dang / 
305a4(rgyud): mtshon cha thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi steng nas na mkha' la sor bzhi tsam gyis spags te/ 'dug la jisri da du dkyil 'khor gyi las su bya ba thams cad rdzogs rdzogs kyi
305a5(rgyud): bar du na mkha' la 'dug go// rig sngags 'chang ba sa'i steng gi sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad kyi steng gi namakha' la 'dug go// las su bya ba thams cad zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi
305a6(rgyud): byad dri chab kyi cho gas dbang bskur na gtor ma dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum pa thams cad rang nyid 'phar bar byed la slar yang rang gi gnas su 'dug go// go cha de lta bu ni dkyil
305a7(rgyud): 'khor thams cad la bya ste/ thams cad du yan tan ston par snang la/ byas pa tsam gyis las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o zhes bshad do// de'i phyir pad+ma'i dngos grub
305a8(rgyud): bshad par bya ste/ gser ram dngul lam zangs la sa shin tu legs shing mdzes pa snying pa dang ze ba dang bcas shing sdong bu tshad dang ldan par byas la/ mdab ma phyed kha phye ba 'khor bar mdab
305b1(rgyud): ma drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa khru gang tsam gyi tshad sdong bu dang / snying po dang / ze ba'i tshad sor bzhi tsam du byas pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ pad+ma'i phye ma dang / mig sman dang / mig bsku ba dang / thig
305b2(rgyud): ler byas pa dang bcas pas kun legs par bskus la/ pad+ma'i sdong bu'i bar du nor bu rin po che bzhig nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya// khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun gyi bar du dbang
305b3(rgyud): bskur nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas til mar gyi bdag nyid la bsku bar bya/ mig bslu ba dang / thig le dang / bdug pas bdag nyid kyis
305b4(rgyud): lus la bdug par bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa la nor bu gdags/ lag pa g.yon par pad+ma bzung la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma
305b5(rgyud): mchod pa 'bum bya ste/ pad+ma 'bum 'byung bar 'gyuraro// mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas chu dang / yungs kar gyis/ btab na yang 'byung bar 'gyuro// pad+ma sprul pa gang yin pa de dag
305b6(rgyud): thams cad chu'i nang du bor na pad+ma 'gal med bskor ba ltar 'khor bar 'gyur la/ pad+ma 'bum rnams char du 'bab par 'gyuraro// pad+ma'i chu'i nang du bzhag par bya ba ni mtsho bran nam/ lteng
305b7(rgyud): ka'am/ chu bo 'am / chu bo chen po 'am/ 'obs sam/ rdzing ngam/ mtsho'i nang gang rung ba'i gnas su bzhag na gnas de dang de thams cad du pad+ma'i mtsho chen po 'byung ste/ ji srid du pad+ma ma byung
305b8(rgyud): bde srid du/ dus rtag tu pad+ma'i mtshor 'dug ste/ ston ka 'am/ dgun nam/ dpyid dam/ sos ka tsha ba'i dus su rtag tu pad+ma'i mtshor 'dug go// tshal gyi 'gram du zhugs nas yungs kar la til mar/ 
306a1(rgyud): gyis bskus pa phye ma dang sbyar nas me tog gang yang rung ba zhig lag gis bzung ste bskor la yungs kar gyis gtor ma tshal gyi mtha'i shing thams cad la matog rgyas par snang ngo // dge
306a2(rgyud): 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs pa'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ram/ skye bo'i nang du me tog ji snyed pa lag gis bskor la/ yungs kar gyis gtor na me tog mang po 'byung bar 'gyuraro// chu dang yungs
306a3(rgyud): kar gyis thams cad du bzlog par byed pa yin no// 'bras bu ji snyed pa lag gis bzung nas yungs kar gyis gter na 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyuraro// gos lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyi
306a4(rgyud): gtor sna skor ston na gos dang bla re sna tshogs ston par byed rgyan lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na/ lha'i na bzang po sna tshogs pa lag tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye bo 'dus
306a5(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi rgyan du byed la thams cad la rgyan btags par 'gyuraro// yungs kar dang / chus bzlog par bya'o// yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus phye mas bsgo/ bi'u wang dang / gur gum
306a6(rgyud): dang / shing kun dang / s+thA hA'i 'o mas kyang bsgos pa de dag gcig tu byas nas brib ma la bska mo// de nas 'bras bu gcig khar gtsug la phyogs bzhir gtor na ba nas me 'bar bar snang zhing lus las 'bar
306a7(rgyud): pa sna tshogs 'byung bar snang ste/ ji srid du yungs kar kha na yod pa'i bar du lus las 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ngo // til mar dang lhan cig bdags pa'i snying por bya skong
306a8(rgyud): bur ti la mar gyi rgyal pos bkang ste mar me 'bum sto par byed do// me thab khung bu'i nang du bcug na ji srid du ma phyung ba de srid du me 'bar bar ston to// mar me'i sdong bu'i nang du bcug lam phyung / 
306b1(rgyud): na rtag tu 'bar ro// mgal me 'bar ba'i nang du bcug na 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bum snyed du snang ngo // gtor ma'i rdza ma dang / bum pa'i nang du gtor na gtor ma'i rdza ma dang / bum pa thams cad 'bar bar sna / 
306b2(rgyud): lag ma dang / mtshon cha thams cad la byugs na cig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs la ril bu gtsang ma spyi bor bzhag na/ lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ba nas lus
306b3(rgyud): ril bsregs pa ltar snang ngo // 'o ma dang yungs kar gyi gtor na lus slar snang bar 'gyuraro// lag pa dang rkang pa la bskus la ril bu gtsang ma 'bar ba lag pa g.yas pas bzung ba 'am/ rkang pa'i
306b4(rgyud): mthe bos bzung na lag pa dang / rkang pa gcig pu 'bar ba dang / 'brel par snang ngo // 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo 'dus pa mang po 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor ram sde can gyi nang ngam/ rig byed bzhi
306b5(rgyud): nang thams cad du yan lag nyams par snang ngo // dri chab dang yungs kar gyis gtor na lus slar rdzogs par 'a/ gyuro/ mtshan mo'i rim bu bsreg pa lam gyi bani mdor bzhag
306b6(rgyud): nas yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhir gtor na mar me 'bum phrag bye ba snang ngo // kun nas phyogs bzhir chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog par bya ba yin no// tshal chen po'i mtha' dang / nang du
306b7(rgyud): gtor la shing gcig la ril bu gtsang ma bzhag na shing dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / mdab ma dang / lo ma thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ngo // ri'i rtse mor mar me bus nas ri kun tu gtor
306b8(rgyud): na ri kun nas gcig tu 'bar zhing mched par snang la sems can thams cad kun nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyuraro// rkun ma dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang ldang ba dang / 
307a1(rgyud): phyir rgol ba dang / khas kyi dgra thams cad dang / sdang sems can nas ri dwags gtum pa dang / bya la sogs pa'i bar ril gnas pa rnams de'i mtshan mo nyid phyogs bcu kun tu
307a2(rgyud): 'bros shing ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin to// spos chab kyis bzlog par 'gyuraro// gzugs brnyan gyi steng du gtor la/ gtsang ma'i ril bu 'bar bar banag na gzugs brnya ra thams cad gcig tu 'bar
307a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ spos chu dang / yungs kar gyis bzlog par 'gyur// mar me'i ril bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgor spar ste gnas gtsang mar bzhag/ dkyil 'khor gcig byas nas gtor ma'i cho ga bum pa
307a4(rgyud): bkang ba bzhag/ grong khyer kun tu yungs kar gyis gtor zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par byas na grong khyer kun nas mar me'i phreng ba lab ra ba gcig tu snang ngo // grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir dkyil
307a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga byas la shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs na gang grong khyer na/ gnas pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag thams cad dga' ba chen po rgya che bas tshim par 'gyuraro// 
307a6(rgyud): zong khyer de na gang sdang ba'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra dang / chom rkun dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang glag tshol ba gyur pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / brjed byed
307a7(rgyud): dang / mi ma yin pa gang yang rung ba grong khyer de na gnas pa de dag la long du gyur cing gdugs la ngu zhing ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing grong khyer gyi sgor byung nas phyogs bcur rab tu 'bros so// grong khyer de yang
307a8(rgyud): kun nas gnod pa med cing 'brug pa med par 'gyuraro// 'jig pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ mtshan mo 'das nas spros
307b1(rgyud): / chu dang yungs kar gyis zong khyer khyim sgor gto zhing dbang bskur na bzlog par 'gyur ro// phags pa den yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho gzhib mo'i rgyal pa/ bam po bcu gu pa/ lnga
307b2(rgyud): ros dang / thing shun gyi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / mahA trai la dang / arga'i 'o ma dang / ba dgu'i 'o ma dang / gcig tu sbyar ro// nya'i mig 'khris pa dang bcas pa dang / nag pus pa dang / pad+ma'i chu rnams kyang
307b3(rgyud): lhan cig tu phye mas zhib mor bya'o// phye ma snga ma legs par sbyar la chus ril bur byas pa dang / phye mas gzhan yang bcang ngo // phye mas 'di dang pad+ma chen po'i phye ma bcang ba lhan cig tu bsres pa'i
307b4(rgyud): phye mas lus bskus la phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te/ ril bu khar bcug la hUM zhes bya ba bsdams te brjod na de'i lus las chu 'dzag cing / de kho na bzhin du rna ba gnyis kyang lha rdzas kyi chu
307b5(rgyud): 'byung bar snang / lus las spos kyi rigs yid du 'ong ba rab tu sim par byed pa 'byung ba ni nang thams cad grub par snang ste/ rgyal ba 'i phyag bzhin no// yungs kar gyi phye ma blangs te
307b6(rgyud): na mkha' la gtor la ril bu lag pas bskor na char chen po 'bab par 'gyur// ril bu namakha' la 'phangs na mi 'bab bo// g.yul chen po 'gyed pa'i nang du phye ma de yungs kar sres te na mkha' la gtor
307b7(rgyud): la ril bu de yang khar bcug ste/ steng du lhas la hUM zhes bya ba'i sgras bos la gnam lcags chen po 'bab ste yid mi 'chad pa dang sdug bsngal bskyed par 'gyuraro// chu'i nang du zhugs te phye ma de gtor la
307b8(rgyud): yungs kar dang / ril bu chu'i nang du gdab par bya/ phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te til mar gyis lus la bskus na klu chen po'i gzugasu snang ngo // ril bu dang yungs kar me'i mdog lta bu chu dang bsres
308a1(rgyud): pa'i yungs kar na mkha' la gtor na 'brub sgra chen po 'byung zhing glog chen po gsal bar snang bar 'gyur// chu'i nang nas 'byung na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// khron pa'i nang du btab na chu lung
308a2(rgyud): nas phyogs kun tu 'bab par 'gyuraro// rdza ma 'am/ bum pa 'am/ rdza'u 'am/ ril ba b+h+ring ga ra 'am/ ril ba la phye mas byugs te/ de'i steng du yungs kar gyis gtor nas chus bkang ste khrus byas na de chu 'ang
308a3(rgyud): par snang zhing de'i snod ni mi snang bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang dgos pa mang po byed de mchog tu grub pa yin no// de nas rin chen po'i 'bru mar gyi rgyal po byas te 'bru mar gzhan dang / de bzhin du
308a4(rgyud): til las byas 'bru mar gyi rgyal po de bzhin du sbyar ro// lag pa dang rkang pa bzhag la 'dir nyam drod kyang shes par bya'o// bzhag pa thams cad nyams drod shes par bya ba ni mar
308a5(rgyud): sar bzhin du 'jam par 'gyur zhing skad cig de nyid la mtho ba dang / dma' ba ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin du ri yang 'gyuraro// snying po thur ma 'dra ba dang / zlum po 'am/ yang na lcug ma
308a6(rgyud): lta bur byas pas ka ba yang 'dud pa dang / ri yang dma' ba 'am/ yang na mthon por 'gyur bar byed do// yungs kar dang pad+ma'i chen po'i phye ma lhan cig bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos bsgos pa phyog
308a7(rgyud): bzhir kun tu gtor na ri thams cad mi snang zhing 'brog dgon pa snang bar 'gyuraro// yang ri bor snang bar 'gyuraro// yang na mis bgrod par mi nus pa'i ri'i rtse mo na seng+ge dang / stag gis gang lcung
308a8(rgyud): ma dang tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba 'am chub pa 'am/ dum bu 'am/ khong stong du snang bar 'gyu ro// ci ste rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyi pho brang ri bo po
308b1(rgyud): la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'dod na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhag bdun gyi bar du nas kyi'o thug gis zos te gtsang ma gshin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas ri'i gsab
308b2(rgyud): du zhugs la/ sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas der shing dri zhim po'i me sbar ba la yungs kar phye ma dang bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal po dang sbyar la 'bras so ba dang bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad zhag bdun
308b3(rgyud): dudus gsum du sbyin bsreg bya'o// lha ba shos dang gtor ma dkar po 'bul lo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes brgyad la nyin zhags gcig bsrung ba byas la shin tu khrus byas pa gtsang
308b4(rgyud): mas spos sna tshogs kyis lus bskus gos bzang po gtsang ma bgos te/ 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos rang gis lus la bskus phye mas byugs mig sman gyi mig bskus/ thig le byas la nor bus mgo bcing
308b5(rgyud): zhing mgul ba dang / dpung pa dang / rked par yang bcings la yungs kar dang / mtshal bsres pas ri'i phyogs bzhing gtor bar byadadra chen pa'i phye ma de yang phyogs bzhir gtor
308b6(rgyud): rang gi lag pa g.yon pa sa zhags pa dang / pad+ma bzung zhing g.yas rnam par lta ba snang ba dang / don yod pa chen pos dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya bzung ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo lan gcig
308b7(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na ji ltar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bshad pa las bstan pa de ltar ri bo po Ta la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang de yang 'phags pa spyan ras
308b8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugasu snang bar 'gyur/ dza ltar ri bi po Ta la'i gzhal med khang bzhin du ri de la yang gzhal med khang snang ba ste/ ri de la rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs snang po me tig sna
309a1(rgyud): / tshogs kyi gzhal med khang snang ngo // sA la dang / tA la dang / tA ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / a sho ka dang / a d+hi muk+ti ka dang / ba ri sha ka dang / ka dam pa dang nI la dang / pa Ta la dang / pa lA sha dang / 
309a2(rgyud): u dum ba ra dang / dong ka'i me tog sna tshogs dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / ta ra Na dang / na ba ma li ka dang / kub byaka sna tshogs snang bar 'gyuro// bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyar pa dang / ri dwags
309a3(rgyud): kyis tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang ba snang bar 'gyu ro// gang gi tshe phyir bsdu ba byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe gnas gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs la rang gi blo gros la ji ltar snang ba bzhin
309a4(rgyud): bya'o// dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar ba ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa chen po'i dkyil 'a khor gyi rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga gsang ba'o// 
309a5(rgyud): don yod pa'i sgyu ma rnam por 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ de nas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rtags mtshon phyag rgya'i de nyid ni// pad+ma rgyas dang snga
309a6(rgyud): tshogs mtshon// pad+ma ba ni phyed bye ba// phyag dag na ni rab tu 'dzin// phyag gnyis phyung zhing brkyang nas kyang // bskum pa 'am 'dzin stangs de nyid kyis// kun nas phreng ba 'bar ba'i rtags// mtshon ma phyag rgya
309a7(rgyud): bsnams pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang mdung zung dang mda' bo che dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje dang rdo rje phreng num dang / las kyi rdo rje dang 'ur gsum zhes
309a8(rgyud): bya ba dang / 'khor lo dang / dung dang / tho ba dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / dbyug tho dang / me tog gi thum po dang / bum pa gang ba dang / rin po che'i snod dang / pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i phreng zlum dang / u
309b1(rgyud): / pa la'i phreng ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang / zla ba dang / ri rab dang / me long dang / klu dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / btson dang / gshin rje'i
309b2(rgyud): ba con dang / chu srin gyi kha dang / sngags de'i phreng ba dang / mdung rtsa gsum pa'i phreng zlum dang / bsdigs pa dang / skyis pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mchog sbyin pa dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 
309b3(rgyud): glegs bam bsnams pa dang / 'khar sil dang / lhung bzed dang / gdugs dang / dbu rgyan dang / nor bu smras pa dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang / me'i thab
309b4(rgyud): khung ngo // kun nas 'bar phreng phyag rgya de// sna tshogs rmad du byung nas smras// mtshon cha sna tshogs snams pa yi// pad+ma 'dzin la rab tu gnas// ras la bris pa 'am dkyil 'khor ram// rtsig pa 'am gang
309b5(rgyud): yang rung ba la/ tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// gang du bris pa mtha nga ba de// ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar ni// phyir yang 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro// 'jig rten dbang gis rtag mchog
309b6(rgyud): sbyin// sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs// gang zhig nyes byas mi bzad pa// mtshams med lnga po byed pa nyid// mnar med pa yi gnas dang ni// dmyal ba gzhan du gzhol ba gang // phyag rgya de dag mthong tsam
309b7(rgyud): gyis// 'gro ba thams cad zad par 'gyur// skye dang 'chi las rnam par grol// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rgal bar 'gyur// de dag skye ba phyir mar ni// phyir yang mngal gyis mi gos te// yang dang yang du pad+ma las/ 
309b8(rgyud): brdzus te skye ba dag tu 'gyur// rtag tu bde ba can du 'gro// gang na 'dren pa tshe dpag med// bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar rtag tu dang / skye 'gyur the tsom mi ba zhing // don rnams bde bar 'grub 'gyur zhing / rig sngas/ 
310a1(rgyud): sna tshogs bde bar 'grub// de bar dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur zhing // rtag tu mi ldogs nas 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di dag mthong tsam gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub dang mnyam 'gyur/ dus gsum
310a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la// bla med dge rtsa bskyed par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// bsod nams phung po chen po 'thob// de nas dkyil 'khor rab bshad pa// de nyid 'grub pa'i phyag rgya sa
310a3(rgyud): 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin// sdig pa thams cad mod la sel// gang zhig mtshams med byed pa dag mi bzad mnar med gnas pa yi/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ 
310a4(rgyud): dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad nas ni// mtho ris sgo phye the tshom med// sgo phye gyur pa rnams la ni// sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ mgon po 'jig
310a5(rgyud): rten dbang phyug phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis sems can phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// phyag rgya'i dkyi la 'khor 'di mthong na shi 'phos pa'i mod la bde ba can du skye bar
310a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa tsam gyis ga/ ngan thub pa 'dren pa 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i pho brang du myur du 'jug par 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// kun nas
310a7(rgyud): cha ni mdzes par bya// gru bzhi go la'i tshad tsam la// sgo bzhi them skas bzhi yis rgyan/ shin tu legs par bslus dang ldan// 'jam zhing mnyen la mnyam pa yi// sa yi cha dang ldan pa la/ dkyil 'khor shes
310a8(rgyud): rab can gyi dbye// dkyil 'khor de nyid thig btab la// phyag rgya bri ba rnam par dbye// phyogs bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa yi// dbus na dkyil 'khor snying po yin// gru bzhi pa la kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang / 
310b1(rgyud): mdung rtsa gsum pa'i phreng ba rnam par dbye'o// gru bzhi pa'i dbus su phyag rgya don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bla na med pa dang / phyag rgya rgyan gyis rgyan pa tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bri'o// 
310b2(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi phyag rgya bri ba yang shin tu 'byin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun nas gos dang / ba dar dang / rgyal mtshan gyis rgyan la kun tu yungs kar dkar po gtor ro// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
310b3(rgyud): gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su phyogs bzhi kun tu bya ba ni ba lang gi lci ba sa dang bsres pas bzhin tu legs par byugs pa dang ldan pa la tshon rtsi'i phye mas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba chen po dang / mtshon cha
310b4(rgyud): bris la 'di'i sgo bzhi yang rnam par 'byes par bri'o// ji ltar phyag rgya dang 'thun pa'i ro sna tshogs kyis gtor ma bzhag pa rabya ste/ phyag rgya re re la yang mchod yon phul la/ dbyib mo dang / bru ba
310b5(rgyud): dang bum pa dang / kham phor dang / rje'u gtor mas bkang la bzhago// kun tu bum pa gang pa dang / bdug spos kyi ni snod dag dang // me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / gtor ma dkar po dag gis bkang / me
310b6(rgyud): tog rnam par bkram byas la// kun tu phreng bas bzhag par bya// phreng ba bzang po bzhag nas kyang // de bzhin kun tu btug spos dbul// a ga ru dang tsan dan dang / du ru ka dang / sa la ki dang / sprik+ka dang / gu gul dang / 
310b7(rgyud): sra rtsi pog dang / sgor shin dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyi bdug pa 'di dag gis bdugs la/ gtor ma dang / me tog dang / lha bshos dbul lo// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pas don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par
310b8(rgyud): byas te bskor ba phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la phyag bya zhing phyag rgya thams cad la me tog bkram zhing me tog gtor ro// gang phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di sgrub pa gang
311a1(rgyud): // dgos pa la sngar dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa la mchog tu mdzes par byas la phyi las thams cad bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang ma yis// gtsang ma yi ni gos 'gos la// ji lta
311a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin// dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya// ji ltar dkyil 'khor la bgos pa// de bzhin bu las bya'o// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bla na med// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs tsam gyis// thub pa snang
311a3(rgyud): mdzad kyis gsungs pa'i spyi'i rigs ni thams cad du// phyag rgya dkrigs dang btam rnams kyis// dam tshig kun tu shes par 'gyur/ spyi rigs kun gyi cho ga yis// dam tshig rje su zhugs de bzhin no// 
311a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang / rgyal bas lung ni bstan par 'gyur/ kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa yis// phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad// chos kyi ro ni bdud rtsi yi// gzi brjid mod la
311a5(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur/ rnam snang mdzad gsung dkyil 'a khong du// don yod dngos grub stsol ba mdzad// phyag rgya'i dkyil lakhor gang bzhugs pa/ kun tu spyi yi rigs rnams kyi/ don yod pas
311a6(rgyud): grub mchog myur thog// sangs rgyas bye ba gang ga'i klu nga gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gce/ gas pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuraro// bsod nams kyi
311a7(rgyud): phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag tshe 'di yin par khong du chud par bya'o// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las brdzus te skyes par 'gyuraro// tshe rab su tshe
311a8(rgyud): rabs dran zhing 'od zer bye ba 'bar ba'i lus dang ldan zhing tshe bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par 'gyur// yon tan thams cad dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan
311b1(rgyud): pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin thob pas sgyu ma chen po lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston par byed do// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lha'i spyi'i
311b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rje su 'jug par 'gyur// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa
311b3(rgyud): thams cad dbang du gyur nas rtag tu rjesu 'drang bar 'gyura'o/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor rnams 'byor pa gzigs nas srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang sba ba
311b4(rgyud): mdzad par 'gyur// sems can thams cad phyi ba zhin 'brang zhing mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyuraro// rgyal po bcu na mo dang / 'bor dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchad pa'i 'os chen
311b5(rgyud): por 'gyur// sems can thams cad gcig tu blo mar byed par 'gyur/ nad thams cad med par 'gyur/ slob pa tham sa cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// mtshan ma bri ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyi
311b6(rgyud): 'khor gyi mo ga'o// de nas sbyin bsreg gi cho ga'o dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnam dag gi de nyid sgrub pa'i phyir/ spyi yi rigs rnams thams cad kyi/ cho ga zhib mo bla med
311b7(rgyud): yin// gang gi sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// phyogs kun rnam par gzigs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs nas byon 'gyur zhing // byang chub sems dpa' dgongs par 'gyur// rigs rnams dngos grub
311b8(rgyud): rjes stsol cing // rtag tu srung ba mdzad par 'gyur// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// the tsom med par myur du byon// mgon po 'khor bcas gnas nyid na// rang gi gzugasu mthong bar 'gyur/ 
312a1(rgyud): // 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu stsol// rtag tu mchog ni stsol ba nyid/ nyin dang mtshan tu rtag par ni/ rnam par gzigs 'gyur the tsom med/ dkyil 'khor ba shad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bu
312a2(rgyud): bzhi shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni rgya chen po ko la'i tshad tsam la/ legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu gsal ba gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang / them skad bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'byes pa mchog tu
312a3(rgyud): mdzes pa dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang bya'o// me'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi nyid kyi rnam pa la// kun nas them skas bani ngag dang // steng du gru ni bzhi pa bya// rtag tu pad+ma'i snying po dang / 
312a4(rgyud): snying po rgyas pa'i steng du yang // kun nas mdab ma mdzes par bya// gru bzhir pad+ma'i phreng ba bya// de bzhin du gru gnyis kar rdo rje pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// gsum par mdung rtsa gsum pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// 
312a5(rgyud): bzhi par 'khor lo pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// lnga pa ra bum pa gang ba bzhag go// sna tshogs mtshon gyis rnam mdze sa pa'i// kun nas mdab ma'i myu gu bya// rin chen snod ni bkang ba dang / 
312a6(rgyud): me tog phreng dang ngang ba dang / phye mas pad+mar brtsas pa dang / de bzhin me tog rigs dag nyid// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyun pa'o// nub kyi gnas dang gru dag hU~M// bad+ma'i mdab ma ut+pal
312a7(rgyud): bum pa dur bas bkang ba bri/ rtsa ba'i bum pa dbu ma la// 'dir ni kha khyer thig kyang gdab// de nas dkyil 'khor mdzes bya ba// thig gis kun nas cha mnyam zhing // sgo bzhi mdzes par bya ba ni// tshen sna
312a8(rgyud): lnga yi skus pas gdab// me 'bar mdog can bri ba ni// kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can// grwa dang gla ni me lha bri// lus ni me mdog 'bar ba dang // lag na ma 'bar 'dzin pa dang // mtshan ma sna tshogs
312b1(rgyud): gzhan dag kyang // cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga gzhan/ kha dan mda' dang sna lnga yi/ skud pas bum pa gang dkris dang / de bzhin bdug spos snod dag gis// kun nas dkyil 'khor brgyan
312b2(rgyud): par bya// sna tshogs gzugs can rgya mo yi// sna tshogs ro yi gtor ma bzhag rdze'u dang kham por rnam gsum gyi// dkar pos bkang ba bzhag par bya// rdze'u dang dbyib mo bum pa ni// gtor mas bkang ba
312b3(rgyud): kun tu bzhag/ 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag/ kun nas me tog dgram bya zhing // phreng ba sna tshogs bzhag par bya// 'bras yos yungs kar gtor nas ni/ kun tu mar me 'bar ba dang / sna tshog
312b4(rgyud): dri dang de bzhin du// dri yi phye ma lha bshos dang // dkyil 'khor kun la bzhag par bya/ dkyil 'khor dag niHmas cad la// blugs gzang dur brtag tu bzhag/ shing ni an tsa
312b5(rgyud): dang / yungs kar 'bras no sa pa dang / zhun mar dang ni mar dkar dang / kun tu ru ka tsan dan dkar sbyin sreg cho ga gang 'a dir bzhag ste// dus gsum rtag tu rigs 'dzin gyis/ sbyin sreg brgya rtsa
312b6(rgyud): brgyad du bya// rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang ma yi// gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos la// dkar gsum gyi ni zas bza' zhing // gzhan ni bza' dang spyad mi bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub sgo nas// dkyil 'khor shes pa 'jug
312b7(rgyud): bya zhing / d+har b+ha'i stan la skyil krung du/ shar phyogs la bltas 'dug par bya/ byams pa'i sems la mnyam gzhag ste// don yong rgyal po dran bya bzhin// snga dro'i dus su sbyin sreg bya// gung la slob ma gdug
312b8(rgyud): bya zhing / spyi yi rigs kyi sreg blugs ni/ phye ma phrad du su bya'o// gang zhig dkyil 'khor du zhugs la/ sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid dang / grub pa kun tu cho ga yi/ bdag nyid dbang bskur me kun gyigyi/ sbyin sreg byed
313a1(rgyud): pa'i mchog tu gsungs// kun tu gnas ni thams cad na// rgyas pa gnas mchog rwa gcig dang // gar be de bzhin phur bu dang // mdun na 'dod pa me lha ni// sbyin sreg byed pa 'jig rten pa// mtshung
313a2(rgyud): shes ston pas lung bstan to// 'jig rten 'das pa'i las sgrub pa// rig 'dzin dbang po chen po dang / phyag na rdo rje tshang sbra dang // byab 'jug dbang phyug chen po dang / mnyam pa pas kyang lhag pa nyid// de yi sbyin sreg
313a3(rgyud): byed pa la// de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlabs// gal te zhag bdun dus gsum du// de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// me la sbyin sreg byed pa la// mod la mngon shes lnga thob ces/  skad 'jig rten 'dren pa gsum/ 
313a4(rgyud): las ni byas nas de nas mi sbyin sreg las ni brtsam par bya/ sreg thugs sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis galas rnams thams cad 'grub par 'a gyur/ lha rnams rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs kun dgyed par
313a5(rgyud): 'gyur byang chub sems dpa' byon nas ni// mod la mthong ba'i sbyin par mdzod// sdig pa thams cad sreg par 'gyur// shin tu mi ba zad sngon gyis las// blugs tsam gyi sI mod la sreg 'bar ba'i me yis phye lab
313a6(rgyud): bzhin// de la srog pa'i sdig pa ni// sreg 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// sdang ba'i phyir ni rgol nyid dang // mi bzad phas kyi dgra rnams dang // pha rol dpung gis 'jigs pa nyid// de bzhin du yang rgyal po'i dpung // de kun sbyin pa
313a7(rgyud): byas tsam gyi// mi gnang bar 'gyur the tsom med// de bzhin mi ngas gcod kun dang // nang kun rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs nyid kyang // sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin pa
313a8(rgyud): 'byung po dang // de bzhin bgegs dang log 'dren dang // sha za brjed byed yi dwags dang // de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs gdon// 'di kun sbyin byas tsam gyi// 'jig par 'gyur bar the tsom med// rtag tu 'dzin
313b1(rgyud): med la legs shing // gling dang bde bar 'gyur ba yin// rtag tu sems can thams cad ni// kun tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal po dpung dang bcas pa nyid// btsun mor bcas pa nyid kyang ni// rtag par
313b2(rgyud): kun tu gsal bar mi/ mi 'jigs sbyin par the tsom med// rtag tu nad med pa 'gyur ba dang / dga' zhing yid ni bde ba dang // lus can dag ni thams cad la// rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gnas// rtag tu me yi lha
313b3(rgyud): cing mi rgyun tu mthong bar 'dor pa yos/ me la sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/ me lnga nyid ni bzhugs gyur te// rtag tu las ni thams cad mdzad/ rgyun tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ lha ni rtag tu'ang gyur
313b4(rgyud): zhing / thams cad du ni mthong ba sted// rgyud skaraHba nyi ma dang / gshin rje dang mi nu lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po da gangadapung bcas bzhon par bcas pa yang / nyin dang mtshan du rtag par
313b5(rgyud): mi rjes 'brang srung 'gyur the tsom med// ci ste rig snga gas 'chang don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang
313b6(rgyud): ma bgo bar bya// nyin zhag gcig srung ba bya zhing / shing arga'i yam shing sreg gi me s+pha ra la pad+ma dang / zhun mar dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas nas sreg blugs lan gcig byas pas// 
313b7(rgyud): mtshams med pa lnga byed pas yang 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'dan rig sngags 'chang des byang
313b8(rgyud): chub kyi shing gi me sbar la rigs spyi'i pad+ma dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi ngas
314a1(rgyud): grub 'thob ste thams cad cho ga chen po zhib mo dang / sbyin sreg chen po'i cho gar 'gyu ro// de nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas
314a2(rgyud): la gos btsang ma bgos seng ldeng gi me sbar la/ zho dang / kun mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg brgya stong byas na dpag tshad sdong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bcing
314a3(rgyud): ba byas par 'gyuraro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra gnom par 'dod pa dang / dpung gzhigs par 'dod na de nas rig sngags 'chang gis shing kar pa ka'i mi sbar la/ sbrul gyi lpags pa rjes pa dang / 
314a4(rgyud): ke tse'i sa bon dang / lan tshwa 'bras sa lu dang / sres pa yungs kar mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad srong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra la gnam lcags chen
314a5(rgyud): bo dang rlung grang mo 'bab pas phongs pa dang / yid mi bde ba skyes par 'gyur/ dgra thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyuraro// klus chang 'bebs par 'dod na rig sngags
314a6(rgyud): 'chang des nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba byas la/ shin tu khrus byas pa gtsang mas dri sna tshogs dang / me tog phreng ba dang / yungs kar dang / sha ta pus pa zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg mtshan
314a7(rgyud): gcig ma dus gsum du byas na klu'i rgyal pos char gyis rgyun chen po 'bebs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' rab tu zhag bdun gyi bar du char 'bab par 'gyuraro// char de nyid hacang ches na thal ba na mkha' la
314a8(rgyud): gtor na ha cang ches pa 'chad par 'gyuraro// yang na me lha 'ong bar 'dod cing rang gi gzug su mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des gos gtsang ma bgos la nyin zhag gcig gnas par gyur pas
314b1(rgyud): shing sna ma'i me sbar la 'bras so ba dang / zhun mar dang / bu ram sha khar dang bcas pa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sna ma'i me tog sreg pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o// brgyad stong tshad med pa dang / me lha me'i nang nas
314b2(rgyud): lus byed phyung ste 'dug nas rig sngags 'chang la tsaM ba gyi bka' stsol cig ces zer zhing ji ltar rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga'i don du 'gyur ba de bzhin du smra'o// thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba mchog thams
314b3(rgyud): cang sbyin pa zhes bya ba bdud rtsi 'bar zhes bya ba'i ma'i 'kha'i mchog sbyin par byed do// gang bdud rtsi 'bang ba'i ma'i 'a thob pas gang du dbugs phyung ba dang / rngubs pa der me 'angar ba 'byung bar
314b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gang du phu zhes bya ba der me 'byung bar 'gyu ra/ mun gnag du dbugs phyung na ma 'bar ba snang bar 'gyuraro// tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
314b5(rgyud): dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs ston par mdzad do// sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gi nad thams cad bzhi par byed do// 'bras sa ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni rdul po dbang du byed do// phub ma dang / lan tshwa
314b6(rgyud): sbyin sreg gis ni zhe 'gras par byed do// 'bras yos dang yung kar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / kun mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni gnod sbyin 'gug so// ka ra dza
314b7(rgyud): ranga'i me tog dang / gu gul zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i spyir sreg gis ni srin mo 'gug so// de bzhin du 'dir las thams cad byed do// sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i cha
314b8(rgyud): ga bshad par bya ste/ kun tu thun mong sgrub pa'i mchog dge ba'i las kun byed pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong 'gyur zhing / bla med bsod nams chen po sogs// don yod rgyal po de nyid ni/ rnam
315a1(rgyud): pa sna tshogs gzugs dag du// 'jig rten 'dren pa snang bar bya// mthu dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa'i// 'jig rten pa'i gzugs bya ba// grub pa sna tshogs byed pa'i gnas// so so'i gzugs ba
315a2(rgyud): ba ni// ras sam yang na dar dag la// 'jigs pa med pas gzugs bya'o// don yod pa yi rgyal po ni khru gang tsam gyi tshad dam yang na tshad shin tu rnam par 'byed pad+ma'i mdog lta bu phyag brgyad pa/ dbu gsum pa
315a3(rgyud): de bzhin du/ spyan gsum pa/ zhi ba'i zhal du bri bar bya ste/ de bzhin du zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / be con dang dbugs
315a4(rgyud): byin pa dang / 'grang phreng dang / me tog zlum po 'dzin par bya'o// g.yon du ni dkar ma'o// g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma thal mo sbyar la dang yid tsam dud pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// 
315a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ dbu rgyan 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas phyogs kyi dbu zla ba chos pas rgyan pa/ ri dgas kyi lpags
315a6(rgyud): ba bsnams pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// 'od mdom gang dang ldan pa'o// nang mir pad+ma'i phreng ba'o// rim pa gnyis par rdo rje phreng ba lcags kyi dang bcas
315a7(rgyud): bar bya'o// rim pa gsum por nor bu rin po che'i phreng ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs mdzes pa'o// rim pa bzhi par mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'o// rim pa lnga par kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o// steng
315a8(rgyud): dang g.yas phyogs kyi gnas su dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// g.yon du gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / 
315b1(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu rnams bya ba ni me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab du khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ba ni khros pa/ gtum pa'i gzugs 'chang gi
315b2(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa/ 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs pa/ sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan garal pa 'chang ba 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas pa zla bas brgyan cing ral gri 'dzin pa dang / zhags
315b3(rgyud): ba 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa dang / dgra ste 'dzin par bya'o// dkar mo'i rgyad du rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbu gsum pa bya ba ni zhi ba'i zhal ngas can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dburgyan
315b4(rgyud): rgyal ba 'od dpag med can thogs pa/ pad+ma 'dzin gnor bu rin po che 'dzin par bya'o// 'og tu pho nya mo dang / dbyangs can dang / dung can ma dang / dpal mo dang / gnas ma dang / dpe med ma dang / ral pa
315b5(rgyud): gcig ma dang / lo nyam zhi ba dang / me tog gi lha dang / sa ri lha dang rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// steng dang g.yas g.yon du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs skyil mo krung bcas pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam bya'o/ 
315b6(rgyud): nyi ma dang zla ba'i lnga rgyu skar dang bcas pa bya'o//  ma'i gzugs kyi phyi rol gyi rim pa kun tu phyag rgya dang / phyag mtshan sna tshogs rdzogs par bri'o// klu brgyang bya zhing kun nas 'bar ba dang bcas par bya'o/ reg
315b7(rgyud): sngags dngos grub bla med pa'i/ ri mo'i cho ga'i gnas 'di ni/ sdig pa thams cad med la sel/ mtshams med lnga pa sbyong bar byed/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i ri mo'i gzugs grub pa
315b8(rgyud): 'di ni spyi'i rigs thams cad du 'jug pa ston pa yin no// phyi'i rigs thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du byang chub
316a1(rgyud): sems dpas kyang byin gyis brlabs pa'o// don yod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ri mo 'di ni thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
316a2(rgyud): de kho na nyid snying por gyur pa de la na nyid gsang ba 'di mthong ba tsam gyis rnam par thar pa 'thob cing lung bstan par 'gyuraro// mthong ba tsam gyi cho ga zhib mo bla na med pa thams cad 'grub bo// rnam par
316a3(rgyud): snang mdzad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par snang ba byed pa gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po 'khor bcas kyi rig sngags tsha
316a4(rgyud): ga bla med pa/ m+b+hi rin yang dag 'byung ba ni// thub pa na ma snang mdzad kyi bstan// de bzhin gshegs rigs grub pa dang / gang yang pad+ma'i rigs de bzhin/ nong rigs de nyid 'byung ba dang / rdo rje'i / 
316a5(rgyud): gang bla med pa// spyi rigs 'di nyid mthong ba ni/ rim mthang ba'i khyad par yim phyir yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing / dmyal ba phan/ 'dra'i sgo bcad de// mtho rigs kyi ni sgo yang phye/ bla na med paston pa yi/ 
316a6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ bsod nams bla na med pa yin/ ci sta don yod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags 'amang des tsan dan dkar po las 'phags pa spyan ras gni
316a7(rgyud): dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam la/ gnad kyis gnas kyi cha'i so chag shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ dbu dang / mgur dang / rked pa dang / dus mo dang / yan lag dang / zhabs kyi tshogs dang / phyag
316a8(rgyud): sor dang / phyag sor gyi tshigs dang / sen mo thams cad kyi cha'i mnyam zhing mdzes pa dang / ral pa dang / sen mo tshad shin tu mdzes shing cod pan kyirnal ba'i g.yas phyogs na zla gam zhi ba'i gzugs can spyan
316b1(rgyud): gsum pa/ phyag bzhi shin tu mdzes pa dang / dbu skra shin tu mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa g.yon pa 'od dpag can phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag
316b2(rgyud): g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa dang / dbugs 'byin cing rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// sgral ma dang / dkar mo yang 'od 'dam gang dang bcas par dgod de// mgon pa
316b3(rgyud): shin tu mdzes pa/ nor bu dang / mu tig gi rgyan gyis 'tsham su gser gyi rgyan gyis g.yogs pa'i cod pan nam/ yang na spyi gtsug tu ring bsrel bzhag par byas la/ tsan dan kar mo'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing
