316b4(rgyud): gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis mchod la dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'di'i dbus su pad+ma ge sar dang / bcas pa'i mdab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris pa la de'i dbus su 'jigs pa med pas 'jig rten
316b5(rgyud): dbang phyug dar gyi cod pan gyis bcings pa baHga la/ a ga ru dang / tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul zhing me tog dgra ma par bya// me tog gi phreng bas mchod par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang
316b6(rgyud): gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas bsrung ba byas la mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug mang na du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la mchod yon dang / 
316b7(rgyud): lha bshos phul la byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gnag ste/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa sgom mo// sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang sgom zhing / gtam gzhan mi smra bar
316b8(rgyud): shin tu yongasu sbyar bas legs par spyod cing / gzhan 'jigs pa med pas bdag srung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba bsrung ba dang / bcas pa yang byas la bzlas brjod de nyid stong / 
317a1(rgyud): / rtsa brgyad dang / phyag rgya yang stong brgyad brtsams na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar zhing g.yo ba dang / bdag kyang 'bar ba dang snying dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan
317a2(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par mdzad pa'i phyag brkyang la phyag spyi bor bzhag ste legaso leg so// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyi mchod pa dam pa dang / gsang sngags kyi cho ga chen po byas so// sgrub
317a3(rgyud): pa dam pa byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi rigs 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang / thams cad du spyi'i dngos grub
317a4(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang khyod la 'grub kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rje su bzung shing dang / rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa da ltar 'dod pa dang / mchog thams cad ji ltar yid la bsam pa de thed
317a5(rgyud): rjesu sbyin no// 'di ni khyod kyi skye ba'i 'khor ba tha ma yin te skye ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mngal du gnas pa las yongs/ su grol bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas bde bcan gyi
317a6(rgyud): 'jig rte gyi kham su pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar cu raro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyuro// mngon sum du chos nyan par 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi snying po la gnas
317a7(rgyud): kyi bar tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med bgrang du med par 'gyur ro// zhes tshigasu gsung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po gang la khro bo'i rgyal po me tog gam/ cod pan
317a8(rgyud): la mngon par gtor na/ ngas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi skur bzhugs te/ rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la 'gro zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting / 
317b1(rgyud): 'dzin 'thob bo// yangs pa chen pos rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngas grub thob par 'gyu po sku gzugs sgrub pa de kho na nyid ces pa 'di gal te rig sngags 'chang skal pa chung ba
317b2(rgyud): mnar med par gzhol ba mtshams med pa lnga byed pa de lan cig nges par sgrub pa tsam gyis mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis nges par mchis par gyi'o// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dus gsum
317b3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la sdang bas khrag dbyung bar sems bskyed pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dus gsum du gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i byin
317b4(rgyud): kyis brlabs de rig sngags 'chang sgrub marmil ma du bdag gis gzugs mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing yid la bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par bgyi'o// mchog thams
317b5(rgyud): cad rjesu stsal bar bgyi zhing sdig pa'i sgrib pa tham sa cad rnam par dag par bgyi'o// dri ma med par rnam par thar pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
317b6(rgyud): 'thob bo// sad nas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os chen po gcig pur 'gyuraro// skye bo thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba chen por 'gyuraro// sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa sgo kun
317b7(rgyud): tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i lus yongasu dag pa 'thob par 'gyur// sems can gang gis de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad snyi pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang bral zhing rton
317b8(rgyud): mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur// gangos pas kyang dad pa dang / gus pas sgrub pa rnam pa gsum dang / chog gzhan gyis kyang nges par yod la bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par bgyi rang gi gzugs
318a1(rgyud): kyis mthong ba skul bar bgyi ma mir gyur pa dad pa'i rjesu 'brang ba sdom brtson can gyi lha smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ dran pa tsam gyis bdag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing
318a2(rgyud): yid la bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par bgyi ste/ 'di la the tsom dang yid nyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'das sems can tshe gcig pu pa de la rig sngags sgrub pa'i dngos grub rjesu
318a3(rgyud): skul bar bdag gis rngo mi thog so// gang yang phyi ma'i dus na dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang ba'i sems can ser sna can/ sems gya gyu ba/ yid gnyis su mi byed pa/ ngo gnyis can/ ser sna can/ byas
318a4(rgyud): ba mi gzo ga pha rol gyi rdzas la rkam chags can// gsang sngags rku ba yi ge rku ba/ gdug pa/ phrag dog che ba/ khengs pa// gzhan gyi rdzas 'phrog pa/ mkhan po dang slob dpon phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor ston pa'i bla ma
318a5(rgyud): ma la ma gus pa/ rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di na na pa la ma gus pa nyid rkam chags can byas pa mi gzo ba nyid dag 'byung ste/ sems can de dag la brkyang bar bstan pa 'am// dngos grub
318a6(rgyud): bstan par rngo mi thog so// bdag la yang brnyas pa ra bgyid pa'i sems can de lta bu mang du 'byung ste/ bdag la yang su na par bgyid pa/ bdag la yang ma gus par bgyid pa/ kun nas man
318a7(rgyud): sems dang sdang bas khrag 'byin par bgyid pa bdag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bdag la yang 'khu bar bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / spyi'i rigs kyi dam
318a8(rgyud): tshig sun par bgyid pa'i sems can de ni smad par 'os pa zhes brjod par bgyi'o// rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dam tshig kun nas 'joms par bgyid pa'i gdol pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin
318b1(rgyud): / gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / gsang ba dang dkyil 'khor kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi byang
318b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de dag gis bdag la smad pas sems
318b3(rgyud): can de dag sdig pas gdol pa zhes bgyi ste/ dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang de dag ni smad par 'og par rig par bgyi'o// tshig pa ka' tshig pa lta bu/ rig sngags nyams pa/ log 'dren kyis rin
318b4(rgyud): ba dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis smad pa zhes bgyi'o// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das chud za na pa/ rig sngags nyams pa/ dmyal bar gzhol ba de dag ni bdag
318b5(rgyud): gis mnongs te bdag gis yongasu spangs pa ma lagaso// de lta mod kyi dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gan gas pa yong su spangs pa dus gsum du gshegs pa'i byang chub sem
318b6(rgyud): dpa' yong su spangs pa rdo rje dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad spangs pa/ thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig yongasu spangs pas ba
318b7(rgyud): dang log 'dren thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad kyis zin cing nad kyis yongasu zin par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag gis yongasu ma spangs so// de lta mod kyis rig sngags bsregs pa dkyil 'tshar
318b8(rgyud): dam tshig bsregs pa/ phyag rgya byed pa dang bcas par bsreg pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dang rigs sun par byed pa sdig pa'i dge slong mang po de dag ni des na bskal pa mang po rdul phra mo
319a1(rgyud): / bsags pa'i bskal par sdug bsngal nyamasu myong ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol gyi bde ba can med do// de lta bas na sems can rig sngags kyi ched du rig sngags rjesu sem
319a2(rgyud): dpas byams pa'i semasu bya'o// gang gi drung du phyag rgya dang gsang sngags rim pa phye ba dang / rig sngags gsang ba snyed par 'gyur ba de la gus pa chen po dang / bla mar bgyi ba chen po bskrad par bgyi/ pha dang
319a3(rgyud): ma dang 'dra ba'i sems bskyed par bgyi/ ba dang ma'i gus pa bgyi/ ston pa'i gus pa bgyi/ rang gi sha dang / khrag dang / rkang yang btang bar bgyi/ gos dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / stan dang / bgo bas
319a4(rgyud): rim gro dang / mchod pa bgyi ste/ de la ni bdag gis mchod par bgyi/ rje dpon dang bla mar bgyi'o// rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi/ dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag gi gzugs mthong ba rje su skul bar bgyi/ 
319a5(rgyud): rgyun tu rjesu 'brang bar bgyi/ bdag rgyun tu rjesu 'brang ba ni ji ltar chab kyi nang du til mar gyi thigs pa stsal ba ltar dngos grub tu na tu mchi bar bgyi / sna mtsho'i dus rlabs bzhin du
319a6(rgyud): du mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag gis zhags pa dang / lcags kyus dmyal ba thams cad drang bar bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa'i lam la so sor gzhag par bgyi/ stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid chen po
319a7(rgyud): 'jug par bgyi/ thams cad du sgrub pa dang dngos grub dang / mchog stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas tsan dan gyi gzugs 'di mthong bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs mthong ste/ 
319a8(rgyud): de mtshungs par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ bdag rang gi gzugs kyis rgyun kho nar gnas par bgyi'o// gang na cho ga 'di gnas pa de mchod rten dang bcas par mtshungs par rigs par bgyi'o// sa phyogs
319b1(rgyud): de ni ston pa bla ma bzhugs pa'i gnas su rig par bgyi'o// gang na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi'i dam tshig gnas pa 'di sangs rgyas gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o/ 
319b2(rgyud): de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba zhes rig par bgyi'o// lha thams cad kyi gnas dang dam tshig go zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thaMd kyi gnas byang chub kyi
319b3(rgyud): snying po dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par ston pa'i gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o// sa phyogs 'dir rin po che
319b4(rgyud): snga bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas bkod pas rgyan par ri gas par bgyi ste/ de la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas de'i 'og tu gnas thams cad tu gtogs pa'i
319b5(rgyud): dngos grub chen po sgyu ma chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gnas byed par 'dod pa dang / dgos pa theng byed par 'dod na rig sngag sa 'chang des dri sna tshogs la 'phags pa spyan
319b6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sor bcu drug pa shin tu mdzes pa sku shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ phyag drug pa/ de bzhin du zhal gsum po bya ste/ dang po ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can tshangs pa'i
319b7(rgyud): byad 'chang ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i ther tshugs kyis rgyan pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang gazla gam can no// zhal g.yas pa ni khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs can khro bo gzugs bsgyur ba/ 
319b8(rgyud): spyan gsum pa la ral pa'i thor tshugs kyi steng gi ral pa la 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba zla gam g.yas phyogs na gnas pa'o// g.yon pa ni zhal khro gnyer can khros pa'i lha stang su ltag
320a1(rgyud): // spyan gsum garal pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ga/ g.yas phyogs zla gam tsam n+dan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis legs par rgyan pazhags pa
320a2(rgyud): thogs pa/ pad+ma thags pa// mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ dkra snga thogs pa/ dbugs 'byin pa/ rin po che'i dbyug pa thogs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma thal mo
320a3(rgyud): sbyar cing 'dud pa'o// g.yon na dkar mo thal mo sbyar te yid tsam du 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya'o// zhabs kyi drung du rig sdug
320a4(rgyud): 'chang gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lag na me tog thogs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la kha bltas nas dbus mo bcug te 'dug par bya'o// lhag ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis tshad dang
320a5(rgyud): ma 'dres par sbyin pa dang / smin ma dang / mchu dang / sen mo'i gnas su sbyang bar bya'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po nyi shu pa/ 
320a6(rgyud): nas rdzas bshad par bya ste/ 'jigs pa med pa sa spos kyi rigs tsan dan dang / ta ga ru dang / pu shel ci dang / li shi dang / na ga buSh+pa dang / sprik+ka dang / rgya skyegs dang / kha ba Ni kha dang / spang spos dang / 
320a7(rgyud): na laM da dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang sgron shing dang / ga na da pri yang ku dang / kun tu ru dang / sha kha ra dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / du ru ka dang / til mar dang / sgra tshil dang / lhan cig sbyar ba'i
320a8(rgyud): phye ma zhib mo shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu mnyen pa/ mchog 'di gtsang ba gtsang sbra spyod pas thub pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge zhing shin tu dul ba/ rab tu zhi ba'i rnam
320b1(rgyud): par shin tu mdzes par bya'o// gsang sngags brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas/ lan gcig sgrub pa ni mchog yin te/ 'di yongasu rdzogs nas khro bo'i rgyal pos thams cad la mngon du
320b2(rgyud): gtor te/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las brtsam mo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma 'gos te/ shin tu khrus byas la dris byugs pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi
320b3(rgyud): shin tu mdzes pa la gsal ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam kyi dkyil 'khor bzang po lags par thug pa shin tu gsal ba bya'o// dri sna tshogs kyis byug pa shin tu 'jam pa la tsan dan kar po dang / gur gum gyis
320b4(rgyud): dbus su las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bya ba bri bar bya'o// 'dir pad+ma yang byas te/ mdab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa ge sar snying por bcas pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ shin tu bzang btsan
320b5(rgyud): ngan dang gur gum gyis bri bar bya ste/ deng tshon rtsi gzhan ni spyad par mi bya'o// bum pa spos chus bkang ba dang / de bzhin du dri chu dang / gtor ma thams cad dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa dang / ci yod pa'i
320b6(rgyud): gtor ma bzhag ste/ de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba'i ni gnas sam dgon pa 'am khyim mam gang du gnas par 'gyur ba der khru gang tshad dam khru do 'am khru gsum 'am lhag par yang bya'o// de bzhin du
320b7(rgyud): bdug spos dang / tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / kun tu ru'o// ba dan kha dog sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya'o// me tog phreng ba dgram bya zhing // dri dang byug pa de nyid dang // 
320b8(rgyud): kun tu mar me'i phreng ba'o// de nas dri las pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu pad+ma'i ge sar gyi steng du gzhag pa la/ rig sngags 'chang mngon du phyogs par skyil mo su
321a1(rgyud): // bcas te 'dug nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgyad stong brtsam par bya'o// brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung
321a2(rgyud): zhing sa cher g.yo bar 'gyur/ rang gi lag pa g.yas pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan las rig sngags 'chang legaso leg so// khyod kyi 'dod pa'i las thams cad grub pa'o// don yod pa chen
321a3(rgyud): po'i 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub dang / thams cad du dgos pa thub pa de kho na nyid grub bo// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mchog tu grub pa'o// khyod kyis sgrub pa'i chog rgya
321a4(rgyud): cher mchog tu grub bo// zhes sgra 'byung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dgos pa yong su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji ltar dgos par bya ste/ slob ma gzhug pa dang / dam tshig ni 'dir dgos
321a5(rgyud): pa zhes bya'o// de nas snga gus 'chang gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe dri las byas pa'i mgon po la sngar mchod pa bya ste/ de nas dgos ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'phags pa
321a6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun du bzhag la/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na dgos pa sna tshogs rmi lam du ston cing ji ltar bsam pa thams cad ston par 'gyur de de'i mdun du tsan dan dkar po las
321a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// de nas thal ba la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rang gi lus mtha' dag khyab par bsku zhing / thal ba de nyid dang / yungs kar
321a8(rgyud): gyi byug pa phyogs bzhir gtor na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs ji ltar de ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du mthong ste/ ji srid phyir bsdu ba ma byas pa de srid du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gsu/ 
321b1(rgyud): / su snang bar 'gyuraro// dri chu dang yungs kar gyi mngon du phyags par gtor na phyir bsdu ba byas par 'gyuraro// thal dris rab tu bdugs te/ du khrod kyi nang du zhugs na 'byung po'i dpung dang / 'khor dang bcas pa mdunan
321b2(rgyud): nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad mdun na nye bar gnas shing dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag dang nor gyis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed do// rang la
321b3(rgyud): byug te tshogs kyi nang ngam/ dge mdun gyi nang du zhugs na ston pa mthong ba ji lta ba de ltar rig sngags 'chang snang zhing mthong ste/ mchos pa'i 'os chen por 'gyuraro// phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur/ don dang mchod
321b4(rgyud): pa chen po 'thob par 'gyuraro// thal bas lus bskus te klu'i zhugs na klu'i rgyal ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad thams cad dbang du gyur nas ka nas te bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur zhing ji srid
321b5(rgyud): 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur// rang la byugs te rgyal po 'i pho brang du zhugs margyal po'i btsun ma dang 'bor du bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya babyed
321b6(rgyud): cing mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi bla ma ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur don chen po dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar
321b7(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur te/ ston pa 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gang dang gang la thal bas reg pa tsam gyis de dang de'i nad thaMd bral bar 'gyur/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur
321b8(rgyud): ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur/ mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyu po/ byas mi bzo ba/ gsang sngags kyi gdol gam
322a1(rgyud): gus pa bla ma mi byed pa/ rlom sems dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa bdud kyi phyogs pa/ skyes bu gti mug can/ bsogs pa la zhen pa/ khengs pa/ nga rgyal can de dag gis gang du yang dngos grub yang dag par rjesu
322a2(rgyud): mi mthong ngo // de dag yun ring bar thar pa mi rnyed pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gang yang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis smad pa/ skye ba brgyud la dngos grub
322a3(rgyud): bsregs pa/ 'jig rten 'di dang / pha rol chud bson pa dag ni ma gtogs te/ de lta mod kyi 'dir bdag gis cung zad kyang ma nongs te/ sdug bsngal mang po dang chen po'i sems can dgrol bar rngo mi thogs lag so// 
322a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal ba'i yid la ba gyi ba bskal pa bgrangs par yid la bgyis pas dgrol bar rngo mi thogs lag so// de lta smod kyi sdug bsngal mang po brgyud par nyams myong bar 'gyur/ 
322a5(rgyud): dngos grub ni byas pas 'thob ste/ byams pa dang gas nga sngags kyi go cha bgos pa/ byams pa'i ral gri thogs pa/ sem sa can thams cad la phan zhing mnyes gshin pa la de kho na nyid sgrub
322a6(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub 'di dag 'jig rten 'dren pa'i rjesu gan // mgon po 'di mthong ba tsam gyis spos kyi gzugs kyi 'jig rten mgon po mthong ba dang / 'jig rten 'dren pa rang gi gzugasu mngon sum du mthong ba
322a7(rgyud): mtshungs pa nyid khong du chud par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas bye gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam par mngon sum du mthong ba kho na dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po mthong ba mtshungs pa kho nar khong du chud par bgyi ste/ 
322a8(rgyud): 'di ltar shes par bya'o// de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'dod pa'i dge slong ngam/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po'i/ 
322b1(rgyud): / rig sngags 'chang ngam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thab par 'dod pa dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa spyan
322b2(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin mthong bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha
322b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi spyi'i dam tshig mthong bar 'dod pa na cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ snying po dang bcas bya ba dang bcas pa des myur ba dang / shin tu myur ba dang / mgyogs par 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du ma
322b4(rgyud): 'phrul rmad du byung ba gsang bstan par mthong ste/ 'di la somA nam nur bskyed par mi bya'o// the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
322b5(rgyud): dbang phyug gser gyi mdog can sor bzhi'i tshadam/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang garal pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya ste/ shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ chu byad mdzes pa/ cha shin tu rnam par
322b6(rgyud): mdzes pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ g.yas na zla ba tshes pa/ phyag g.yon pad+ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas mi 'jig pa sbyin pa/ sku'i nang ga pur dang / 
322b7(rgyud): gla rtsi dang ring srel gyis bkang ba/ g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma dngul las byas pa thal mo sbyar te yid tsam 'dud pa/ gser gyi rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang / g.yon na dngul las dkar mo thal mo sbyar te/ yid tsam 'dud ga/ 
322b8(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// steng gi g.yas phyogs na 'od dpag med skyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs pa dang / g.yan na shAkya'i rgyal po dkyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa dgod par bya'o// 'od 'dos
323a1(rgyud): / gang dang bcas pas legs par rgyan par bya zhing gnad dang gnas shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ sgra dang / dpral ba dang / smin ma dang / shangs dang / snyan dang / zhal dang / mgul dang / dpung pa dang nu
323a2(rgyud): ma dang rked pa dang / brla dang / dbus mo dang / byin pa dang / zhabs dang / phyag gi sor mo mnyam zhing thams cad du mdzes pa/ sku chu zheng gab cing mthon man ran pa// mchod phyir thags pa dkar po 'chang bar bya'o// 
323a3(rgyud): las shin tu yongasu rdzogs shing shin tu mthar phyin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs zin par rig nas rig sngags 'chang gis rgyu skar bzang po'i zla ba nya ba 'am/ tshes brgyad de// 
323a4(rgyud): bco lnga 'am/ bcu gsum ngam/ bcu ba zhi 'am/ rgyu skar bkra shis pa rgyal gyi nyi ma dang 'thun pa rnyed nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni gru bzhi la cha legs par
323a5(rgyud): phyed pa/ ko la'i tshad tsam la them skas bzhis brgyan pa/ khru gsum bar rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ chung ba dang lhag par mi bya'o// legs bar byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa/ snyi ba mnyen pa/ dbyi
323a6(rgyud): legs pa la tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye zhing dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab pa shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ sgo bzhi pa la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor don
323a7(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnasu cha rnam pa brgyad du phye la/ lho'i grwa'i gnasu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sna tshogs kyis bri'o// de nas byang gi grwar bri ba ni rdo rje'i ri
323a8(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor tshan rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o// de nas nub kyi zlar bri 'ani ni bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o// de nas shar gyi glang blang ba tshe'i rigs kyi
323b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyi rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang / shin tu gsal bar dri'o// shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor ri bo po Ta la me tog dang shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis legs par rten pa
323b2(rgyud): ri'i lha dang bcas pa bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ri rab klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos kun nas dkris pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha bri'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor ni spos kyi ngang ldang dri za'i chog
323b3(rgyud): kyi gang ba shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu mdzes pa bri'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor ri ti se lha rnams kyis/ gnas me tog sna tshogs dang khri shing dang / shing ljon pa sna tshogs mchog gis rtag tu gang ba bri'o// 
323b4(rgyud): legs par zin nas kun tu mdung rtse gsum pa'i bar phreng ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig su de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs nyid ga/ zhag gnor bu'i rig su de bzhin gshegs pa
323b5(rgyud): gzhag cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang thams cad rdo rje'i 'dzin pa gzhag na sti'i rigs grub bo// lha mo sgrol ma ni ring phaT la la gzhag go ri rab la ni gos dkar ma'o/ dpe med
323b6(rgyud): ma Ni ti se'i rtse mor ro// sgrol ma 'dun ni spos kyi ngang ljang la gzhag shang phyogs kyi sdor po nya mo bdun gyi yongasu bskor ba'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ni srin mor ral pa gcig srin mo bdun gyi yongasu so
323b7(rgyud): ba'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lu gu brgyud bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba'o// byang phyogs kyi sgong khro gnyer can mo khro gnyer can bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba'o// de nas 'jig pa med pas mgon po
323b8(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi bla ma'i gzugs gser gyi mdog can ring bsrel dang ldan pa don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gnag
324a1(rgyud): / bar bya'o// nga rgyal po chen po bzhi stobs po che go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can/ mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs pa bzhag par bya'o// gang zhig thub pa rnam par
324a2(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi sprul pa/ spyi'i rigs yang dag par 'byung gdon yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa dang bcas gdon yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par
324a3(rgyud): 'phrul pa sgrub pa'i ched du cho ga sna tshogs dran pa bya'o// sems can kun la ban 'i byid// rnam thar dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// legs par sgrub pa mthong tse dang / bklags pas dngos grub bla med 'gyur/ 
324a4(rgyud): de bas rtag tu 'bad pa yi// sgrub par byed pa ni mkhaso// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma ba gos pas dar dang ba dar sna tshogs bzang pos
324a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o//  bro ba'i mchog rgya chen pos snod sna tshogs legs par bkang ba dang / gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon 'bul zhing ro sna tshogs kyi gtor
324a6(rgyud): ma bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin 'bras bu sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i kha zas kyi gtor ma yang sgrub po me tog tshogs dkram zhing gtor ma sna tshogs kyis
324a7(rgyud): bkang ba dang / bum pa dang rdze'u dang / phor zlum dang / kham po dang / dbyib mo dag kyang dgang ngo // kun tu dri chus bsgos pa yi// rgya chen gtor ma kun tu'o// sna tshogs pa yi pog bor nas// sna tshogs
324a8(rgyud): bdug spos dbul ba ni/ a ga ru dang / tsan den dang / smig dang / du ruka dang kun tu ru dang / gu gul dang / smon shing dang / shriSh+Te ShA ka dang sa ra dang / sa dzangs dang / de bzhin du ga pur dang / zla rtsi dang / gu gum da/ 
324b1(rgyud): sha ba ra'i 'dug bdug smos 'di dag ni rab tu phul/ thams cad du sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no// sna tshogs pa yi dri dag dang / phye ma byug pa sna tshogs nyid// shes rab can gyi kun tu ni/ dkyil 'khor
324b2(rgyud): dag la bzhag par bya// lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / byi ru dang ni mu tig dang / in tra ni la dag dang ni// pad+ma ma ra gra dag kyang ngo // gser dang dngus
324b3(rgyud): gyi bum pa rin po che sna bdun can yang grwa bzhir bzhag par bya'o// 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor ro// kun nas me tog phreng ba ni/ rmang byung dkyil 'khor la
324b4(rgyud): bzhag cing / kun nas mar me'i phreng ba yang / dkyil 'khor rmad du byung la bzhag rig sngags 'chang nyid zhag cig gnas par gyur pas yang bzlas brjod rgya mer byas la tshogs srung ba
324b5(rgyud): dang phyogs bcing ba dang / kun nas dkyil 'bar bcing ba byas la kyil 'khor gyi las bya'o// de nas slob ma bzhugs par byaste/ tha ma mkhan po'am rlab dpan nas pa 'am/ 
324b6(rgyud): rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po la dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba bstan te/ mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma mthong zhing dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba mthong nas phyag bya zhing
324b7(rgyud): mchod pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dbul bar byas la bskor ba bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis thams cad la byams pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag ste/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'dug la
324b8(rgyud): mi smra bar yam mtshan du snang bar mthong gi bar ngan yad pa'i zhags pa'i snying pa bzlas bsnga byas la dkyil 'khor kun tu phra za'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur zhing lus ka dang chud
325a1(rgyud): // me tog gi dkyil 'khor kun tu lan brgya rtsa brgyad gtor ba'i mod la rtag tu phyag rgya lan bcu rtsa brgyad bcings la dkyil 'khor du me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri bul nas mgon po 'jig rten
325a2(rgyud): dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa mthong na don yong pa nyid mchod par bya'o// de nas mgon po phyag na rdo rje dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa mchod pa byed// de nas lha mo sgro ba ma dang / kun tu lha mo thams
325a3(rgyud): cad la'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo thams cad la'o// de nas ri'i rgyal po rnams la gnas pa'i ri'i lha thams cad la'o// thams cad dang sgo bsrungs la rtag tu mchod pa bya'o// de nas phyogs bzhi kun tu rig sngags pa#
325a4(rgyud): gis rtag tu mchod nas dkyil mo krungs cas te 'dug la 'jigs pa med pas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis don yod pa'i
325a5(rgyud): zhags partag tu dran par bya zhing sangs rgyas rje su dran pa sgom mo/ sa sngags brjod ma thag tu dkyil 'khong dngas gzhi g.yo zhing gang la 'bar du zhugs pa'i mod la snying dga' ba dang se
325a6(rgyud): bde ba thob po// 'od zer bya ba 'dog sna tshogs rnam par bkram pa 'byung zhing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po na don yod pa'i zhags pa 'gul bar 'gyur dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'bar bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
325a7(rgyud): cad dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha dang / lha mo thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ lha g.yo bar 'gyur zhing dkyil 'khor kun nas legaso zhes sgra grags par 'gyuraro// de nas ji
325a8(rgyud): lhar gser bkod pa de ltar dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po dang / mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang sgrol ma dang / dkar mo gser gyi
325b1(rgyud): mdog gis bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor nang na bzhes par 'gyur u gser mdog can gzugs bzang pos/ bdag nyid kyi rang gi nga ba ston pa snang bar 'gyur phyogs bcu kun tu rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur/ 
325b2(rgyud): tu rtag tu sems brtan por bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang byams pa dang bcas pa'i sems brtan por gyur pas me tog dang rol mo'i sgra dbul zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par bya'o// de nas de bzhin ga
325b3(rgyud): pas phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legaso zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad cing rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang / 
325b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba grub ste skyes bu dam po khyod bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su lung bstan gyi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi yongasu dag nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
325b5(rgyud): bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skyes bu dam pa khyod rang gi jom phyir mi ldog pa dang / don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gis 'jo rolo bsgyur bar 'gyur bar byos shig dkyil 'khor
325b6(rgyud): 'di la brten pa'i skye bo dge ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ sems can thaMd bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par lung stan gyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// ji ste sems can ngan pa rig
325b7(rgyud): sngags kyi gdol pa smad pa dag der zhugs na gzugs brnyan las khrag 'dzag cing sgra mi bzad pa 'byung ste/ mngon po 'di mi mthong sa 'di g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor 'di 'bar bar mi 'gyur
325b8(rgyud): / de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang la rmi lam du sten te de nyid kyang gzhan du mi 'gyuraro// ji ltar mngon sum du de bzhin du rmi lam du ston cing yid la bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ de lta bas
326a1(rgyud): na rig sngags 'chang legs par btag cing so sor rtag tu sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs par bya'o// sgrub pa po bden par smra ba dang / dbang po yang dag par bsdams pa/ sems can
326a2(rgyud): thams cad la byams pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba can gzhan la yang dag par smra gcig brtags pa dad pa can/ gus pa dang ldan pa nyid/ mar 'dzin gaphar 'dzin gdakon mchog gsum
326a3(rgyud): skyabasu song ba/ rtag tu bla ma la gus pa nyid kyi sems can 'di dag gzhugs par bya'o// rab tu bag yod pa dang / rtag tu gtsang zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / 'bags pa dang / 
326a4(rgyud): 'dras pa dang / gcig tu bsres pa dang / chung zad bkrus pa dang / chang dang / sha dang / sku dong dang / sgog sgra dang / ke'u dang bsres pa'i kha zas dag spang bar bya zhing / rang gi kha 'phro yang spang bar bya'o// lhag ma ni rtag tu spang bar
326a5(rgyud): bya ste/ 'di dag sgrub pa'i cho ga dran par bya'o// mag ba 'bags pas gdong la reg par mi bya/ lhung bzed dor bar mi bya'o// rtag tu lam phyed phyed du gcod pa dang / mchog tu 'begs pa 'di
326a6(rgyud): dag nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o// gtsang mas za sa gtsang ma bza' zhing lag pa'i sor mo bsdams pas kha gdong las gos pa la mi reg par 'di dag za ba nyid ni mchog tu mdzes shing blo dang
326a7(rgyud): ldan pa yin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las shin tu yong su rdzogs par byas shing dkyil 'khor gyi bye ba legs par rdzogs na de la khrag 'dzag par mi 'gyu ro// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras
326a8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang bas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa nas bzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par mdzad cing shin tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i nor bu nyid kyi mdun
326b1(rgyud): pa nas bkrol te rig sngags 'chang gi 'gul du 'dogs par mdzad do// spyi bor phyag 'jog par mdzad cing 'di la sras kyi mthu bo zhes gsung ngo // 'gul par nor bu bcings pa tsam gyi mod la de namanga'
326b2(rgyud): la 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rigs thams cad du don yod pa'i rig sngags
326b3(rgyud): 'chang gi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor chen po rtag tu mngon du 'gyur zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nyid smin mtshams na 'dug par 'gyur/ 
326b4(rgyud): rgya chen po dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ gang gi ting 'dzin rjesu thob pas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dngos grub
326b5(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston par 'gyur// phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang sgrub pa dang / dam tshig nga gsang ba thams cad kyi mthu chen po ston par 'gyur// don yod pa
326b6(rgyud): chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par 'gyur// don yod pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyis rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig mtha' yas
326b7(rgyud): ba 'thob ste/ gang dam tshig thob pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang mtshungs par shes par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig mnyam pa nyid
326b8(rgyud): ci rnam par 'phrul ba ston par 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'amang dkyil 'khor cu cha ga'i bya ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byas nas spyan ras garigs dbang phyug ring bsrel dang / 
327a1(rgyud): bcas pa des kyang sa phyogs dben pa'i gnas gtsang mar gos gtsang ma'i gdan bar shams la de yi steng du bzhag par bya'o// a ga ru'i bdug spos 'bul zhing nyin gcig bzhin du nang par snga
327a2(rgyud): gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan 'bar bar 'gyur te/ nyin gcig bzhin du
327a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzugs brnyan smra bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur/  ltar byi bzhin du de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / 
327a4(rgyud): ltar byung ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyuraro// tshe ring ba 'am// tshe yongasu zad pa de thams cad ston cing smra bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po rje ba 'a ma/ dgra 'thab pa 'am/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'thab pa 'am/ lo nyes
327a5(rgyud): ba dang mings pa dang / dgon pa dang / nad dang / na ba dang / gdon dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang tsha ba dang / ser ba dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / can
327a6(rgyud): ngan gtum po'i 'jigs pa dang / sbrul gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / 'bras bu 'phel ba dang / 'bru 'phel ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur zhing de'i thabs thams cad kyang rab tu
327a7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang la nyin gcig bzhin du khyad par du gyur pa rnam pa mang po rab tu ston par 'gyuraro// kha cig la bstan par mi bgyi ste/ sdang sems can rig sngags kyi gdol rkun ma byas pa
327a8(rgyud): mi bzo ba blang ga 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'jug 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'phrog pa/ bslab pa ni 'dod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de dag gi lag tu bstan par mi bgyin par bsgrags par mi bgyi
327b1(rgyud): skra'i rtse mo tsam du snang ba yang bstan par mi bgyi'o// cho ga zhing mo 'di ni yi ge'i 'bru gcig yang bstan par mi bgyi'o// rjesu 'jug par mi bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang dngos grub mchog thob par
327b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ mchog tu yid brtan ga rnam par thar pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba thob par 'gyuraro// gang gi drung nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rig sngags kyi dkyil 'dir chen po lag tu 'thab par 'gyur ba del
327b3(rgyud): ston pa dang / bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyid/ bdag dang 'dra bar mchod pa sna tshogs kyi gus par bgyid na bdag la gus pa dang / bla mar bgyis pa lags / mchod pa dang / brjed pa bgyis pa lagaso// de ltal
327b4(rgyud): na dad pa'i rjesu 'brang bas byams pa bsgoms pa dang / sI rje bskyed pas dngos grub chen po 'thob par 'gyur// ji ste bgyi ba 'di las 'da' bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de la bdag gis
327b5(rgyud): rtag par rgyun mi chad par dran pa dang / bdag rjod btsam gyis rang gi shin tu yongasu dag pa'i rang gi ngabos 'das mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing / yid la ra ba thams cad dang mchog
327b6(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// ji ste bdag ji ltar dam bcas pa las gzhan du bgyi na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bslus pa lag so// rig sngags kyi gdol pa rkun mar gyur pa la ni mi bgyid
327b7(rgyud): dam bcas pa bzhin du smra bar mi bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gtsang bar bgyid/ rtag tu 'dzum pa dang / rtag tu byams pa dang / snying rje sgom pa yid la bgyid na/ de la bdag gis rtag tu yon tan phun sum
327b8(rgyud): tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur bar bgyi/ de dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan par bgyid don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub rjesu stsal bar bgyi'o// sems can zad kyibs pa thams cad
328a1(rgyud): yong su rdzogs par dgyi ba la rgya mtsho'i dus brlabs lngar thams cad kun tu mchi bar 'gyi'o// ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams cad yongasu zad par bgyi ba'i slang du ba
328a2(rgyud): dga' bas kun tu mchi bar bgyi'o// sems can gang la byams pa dang / snying rje mchis pa'i sems can pha rol de rnams kyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang
328a3(rgyud): gis shin tu sdoms pas bsdam zhing rig sngags brjod par bgyi'o// yongasu gtong ba'i lag par bgyi zhing spar chungs par mi bgyi ste/ lag pa brkyang bar bgyi'o// gtong ba mang bas de bzhin gshegs
328a4(rgyud): pad ma tshig la gnas par bgyi'o// sngar legs par spyad par bgyi ste don yod pa'i rgyal po'i spyad pa dgyi zhing rtag tu yid la gyi'o// de nas bdag dang chos kyi mchog la dga' ba zhes bgyi'o// nga gi gzugs
328a5(rgyud): brnyan bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// des tra za rgyal po bshad par bya ste ngan yod rgyal pa rmang byung tshe// kun tu dngos thub thogs med cing dkyil 'khor kun la dbang bskur ba sdang badzad
328a6(rgyud): rab tu 'joms// bdud dang 'gegs ni rnam par la dzag/ gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa/ 'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros // gdon gyi gtso bo slong byed cig sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms sdang
328a7(rgyud): ba'i klu rnams rnam 'jig cing // 'jig 'phongs rnams la mi 'jigs stsol// rig 'dzin rnams la grub stsol pa/ don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub mchog/ dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ston// s+thi yi
328a8(rgyud): ris ni rab ston pa// don yod spyi yi gsang ba ni// rtag tu gzhan min snying po nyid// khro bo'i rgyal po bla med pa// de ni bdag gis rab tu bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
328b1(rgyud): / chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i rgyal pos phra bo'i gzug su gnas te sdang ba thams cad 'jig par byed par 'gyur cing lag na zhags pa thogs te khro bo 'di smras so// namaHsa rba ta thA
328b2(rgyud): gas Argya sa rba ma gau te shwa ra badz+ra d+ha re D+ha/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka tsi rtsa ra/ Shi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad+ma hathA/ ka la ka ga ku lu ku lu/ ma hA srA a bA b+ha tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra ni shwa tsa ra shA ra me h+ye hi N+Da
328b3(rgyud): bud+d+ha/ d+hA bad+hA ga ki ni ki Ni/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa ka ra ka ra ki tshi ki ri/ ma hA pa shu ba ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ swA hA hI hI hU hA/ oM ka ra brah+ma be ba rgyags ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ Sha ra ra sh+mi sha ta sa hasa?/ prang ti madz+dza ti/ sha rI
328b4(rgyud): yadz+wa la dz+wa la/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru tra biSh+Nu bA sa gad+ha nad/ ri Sha Na la ka/ ba hu ba bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra sa man+ta a ba mo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu la
328b5(rgyud): mu yi/ mum tsa mu ma sa/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha na hA Da na ta rje mnA dza \u0f7fskAr/ sag+ni u da kabi 'a sham+b+ha par maM mo tsa ka ka Na kaNaHla tsa la kho d+ha ga/ la tu nA rgyas sa t+ya si pra kA sha ka ta ma ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ 
328b6(rgyud): ma sa ma sa/ ma hA ta ma~M d+ha kA ra/ pra sha ma na/ mi li mi li/ e Ne ya/ tsarma pa ri ko ra/ e h+ye hi/ maT ma Ta/ bi rabud+d+ha bi ShA ya ni bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ shwe ta ya dzI pa bi ta/ rat+na ba ku Ta mA lA d+ha pa sarbadz+nyA shi ras
328b7(rgyud): pri ta/ ka ra pu Ta/ sa mA d+hi a pra kam pya/ dzaT pA ra mi ta/ pa ri pU ra ka/ ma hA sarba satwa sarba/ ti ba ri pA tsa ka/ sarba ma ra duSh+Ta pra mdzaka/ sarba sid+d+ha A shA pa ri pU ra ka/ a Sh+mi Shits+tsha tu mAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA bi ShaM ke rany+dza
328b8(rgyud): ga bAn/ a mo g+ha rA dza hUM phaT/ na mo stu te swAhA/ khro bo'i rgyal ba don yad zhags pa'o// oM bi kri ta daM Sh+Te/ a mo b+ha sa ma ye a bi Shits+tsha mAM/ sarba 'ad+ya a mo g+ha a b+hi Shi ker/ tsu mi li mi li swA hA/ de \u0f89\u0fa4 dza
329a1(rgyud): rgyal po'i snying po'o// de mas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa chen po'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas ririn po po Ta la rnam pa drug tu rab tu gal bar brtsams te chu
329a2(rgyud): tshogs ni 'khrug so// lha'i tshogs thams cad ni dga' bar gyur to// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang log 'dren ni 'bar bar gyur to// bdud la sogs pa sdang ba ni yang dag par rab tu zhi bar
329a3(rgyud): gyur to// ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad ni mchog tu dga' bar 'gyuraro// sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang / thams cad ni mi snang bar gyur to// na thaMd ni
329a4(rgyud): rab tu ni'o// rim thams cad las ni rnam par rdol lo// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las ni grol lo// me tog gi mar chen po rab tu bab te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par gyur to// sems
329a5(rgyud): can thams cad ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongasu grol bar gyur to// de nas dus gsum du gshegs pa 'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor la rten pa'i lha rnams
329a6(rgyud): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tshig gcig leg so zhes bya ba byin te legaso lag so// snying rje chen po can mchog tu don yod pa'i rig sngags
329a7(rgyud): 'di smras zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang / rigs spyi'i dam tshig dang / snying po dang / dro bo'i de kho na nyid gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga don yod pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor
329a8(rgyud): rab tu spros pa shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro ba'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin ga
329b1(rgyud): pa'i spyan sngar bshad do// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa shim tu mdzes pa ko la'i tshad tsam shin tu mdzes pa'i gru ba ni dang / sgo bzhi dang / themaskas bzhi dang / rta babs dang / mda'i 'khyer dang / kun na rdo rje'i rnam pa
329b2(rgyud): dag kyang bya ste/ tshon gyi sna tshogs rnam par mdzes pa'i thig skud kyis dkyil 'bor thig gdab par bya'o//  mo mkhan gtsang mas snod sar pa dang pir gtsang mas dkyil 'khor dam pa legs par bri'o// 
329b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor snying po rnam dbye ga dbusu legs pa rnam phye la/ kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dgod// dbusu 'khor lo d+ha bri ba/ shin tu lnga sdug 'khor lo dgod/ dbus deng rgyal ba bzhag
329b4(rgyud): par bya/ shAkya'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// g.ya su khro bo'i rgyal po yi// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dren pa po// g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin bzhag pa// rnga yab rdo rje lag thogs bzhag de'i 'og
329b5(rgyud): tu 'od zer dang ldan par bya ba ni lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / go cha dang / dbyug pa dang zhags pa dang / dgra sta lu gu rgyud ca na dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / glegs bam mo// 'phags pa smran
329b6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen mo dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo ral pa can dang / dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs phyag na thogs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu srin mo rab pa gcig
329b7(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba ni mche ba gcig pa 'jig su rung zhing mi sdug pa sbrul se ral khar thogs pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa na rdo rje dang / dgra sta/ g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig lha ma yin dang / lag 'dren la bsdigs
329b8(rgyud): shing khrag 'dzag po'i mgo bo'i co to nas 'dzin pa dang / khrag gi snod yongasu 'dzin pa/ glang po che'i lpags pa rlon pa'i stod g.yogs 'phyang ba dang / smad g.yogs can bya'o// mtha'i grwa pad+ma dang rdo rje/ 
330a1(rgyud): // bdag pa ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba can shin tu bzang po bzhag par bya'o// shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed mig de'i skra 'bar ba'i phreng ba can bzhag par bya'o// rtswa phyogs kyi sgor ki
330a2(rgyud): ki la zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i log 'dren de nyid rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang zhags pa phyag na thogs par bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor pad+ma chen po'i rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i po nya mo bya ba ni phyag na pad+ma thog
330a3(rgyud): par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i cho gas rdo rje dang zhags pa phyag na thogs pa'o// de nas 'jug pa'i sgor tsan dan gyi chu gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis bsgos pa'i
330a4(rgyud): chus bum pa bkang la ras dkar pos bkri sa shing rgyan pa rin po che sna bdun can rtag tu bzhag par bya'o// ji snyed pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs yongasu bshams pas kyang mchod par bya/ rnam bsdu
330a5(rgyud): tshogs pas pakyir 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o// gdug spos kyis bkang ba dang / mar me'i phreng ba dang / ma to ga dang dri dang 'byug pas mchod par bya'o// ji srid 'jug gi bar du
330a6(rgyud): slob ma rnams tshogs bsrungs la de nas don yod pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing don yod pa'i khro bos dbang bskur ba ra bya'o// dbang bskur ba tsam gyis kyang dus gsum gyi de bzhin ga
330a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis yongasu gzungs par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rje su zhugs par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i
330a8(rgyud): zhags pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dngos grub thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ dang bsam pa dang gang bcol ba de thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur// de bzhin du dam tshig thams cad rdzas zhugs lnga
330b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyu ro// sdig pa dang / gdug pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur// 
330b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ston thams cad dang ldan par 'gyuraro// lha dang lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi nas khang phug dri ma med pa dang / ma
330b3(rgyud): mkha'i rjesu rgyu ba dang / chun rgyu ba dang / nags dang / bskyed mas tshal na spyad pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i drug cha la thams cad du dbang bar 'gyuraro// gsang ba pa thams cad
330b4(rgyud): kyang 'di'i mngag gzug par 'gyuraro// gang zhig de la mi phan par 'dod pa'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dra zad nga lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phya
330b5(rgyud): chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang rig sngags 'chang la mi phan par sems pa de thams cad kyi de dag gi gnas dang lus 'di rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'bab par
330b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de nas dngul las khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam byas te// shin tu mdzes pa/ shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ zhal gsum pa ral pa'i thor tshugs bcings pa rgyan thaMd kyi brgyan pa/ 
330b7(rgyud): rnal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can / zla ba dbu la thogs pa/ zhal dang pa khro bo'i gzugs g.yon pa dang g.yas pa zhi ba'i gzugs nal cung zad 'dzum pa/ spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa/ 
330b8(rgyud): pad+ma 'dzin gzhags pa 'dzin garal gri dang mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o// gas su lha mo sgrol ma me tog 'dul ba rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/ g.yan du lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po che chen pa
331a1(rgyud): 'dul brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'dang dbus mo btsugs pa/ lag na pog por dang bzang phreng thogs te bcom
331a2(rgyud): ldan 'das la blta'olo/ gzugs brnyan de nyid kyi mdun du tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur gum gyis mchod pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po bzhag ste de'i spyan sngar bzlas brjod
331a3(rgyud): stong drag brgya bya'o// de nas gzugs brlan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur/ 'chag par 'gyur/ 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur/ legaso zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur// phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog
331a4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ yid la bsam pa dang mchog thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang de yang bdag nyid 'bar bar 'gyur/ na mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing don yod pa yangs par snang
331a5(rgyud): bdangos grub dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'bor los pa sgyur ba bcu stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad pa rnams kyis
331a6(rgyud): bo dang rgyal por 'gyuraro// tshe lha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'du macu rtsa gnyis su 'gyuraro// bskal pa'i mjug rdzogs te de nyid kyi mchi na mo mo 'das pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
331a7(rgyud): 'tshang rgya'o// ji ltar bde ba can bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhal med khang gi rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur zhing tshe yi tshad bskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
331a8(rgyud): 'bod dang / phyag rgya dang / chog zhib mo thams cad kyi chos ston par 'gyuraro/ de'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa ni de nyid kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod brgya stong bya'o// zlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'jalnga
331b1(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na/ bzhugs par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / 
331b2(rgyud): mig 'phrul dang / bzhad gad dang / phur pas gdab pa dang / sreg pa dang / 'phangs pa dang / bsad pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / sgyu ma bstan pa dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / mi snang
331b3(rgyud): ba'i cho ga slu ba dang / nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / sa gzhi smra ba dang / rgyu ba dang / na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu rgal ba dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon cha las rgal ba dang / rmongs byed dang / rmugs dang
331b4(rgyud): dang rengs byed dang / bcing ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po bskyod pa dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / shi ba gso ba dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dbab pa dang / dgugs pa dang / bden pa bstan pa dang / nad
331b5(rgyud): la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad 'a grub par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dgug pa dang / srin po dgug pa dang / klu dang lha dgug pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo
331b6(rgyud): dgug pa dang / btang ba dang / dgos pa la sogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// dran pa tsam gyi mod la dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyu ro// las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// bklags pa tsam gyis las
331b7(rgyud): dang / dngos grub dang / sgrub pa dang / thams cad ston par 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sdang ba'i sems can thaMd phyir bzlog par
331b8(rgyud): 'gyur// dran pa tsam gyis mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur te/ skal pa ngan pa dang / nor chud za ba dang / mi 'grub pa dang / sdig pa'i rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa gzhig par bya la/ 
332a1(rgyud): mchog tu grub pa yin no// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs nas bzung ste/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon bsags pa'i bsod nams dang bskal pa mngon tu 'gyur te/ tshe'i mthar thug gi bar
332a2(rgyud): du dpal chen po dang che ba nyam su myong bar 'gyuraro// zhal du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyuraro// rkad pa'i gnas nas bzung ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa
332a3(rgyud): brgyad byas na sngon gyi tshe rabs rje su dran par 'gyur/ rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag nyid dang nor gyi ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par
332a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas te/ dro ba'i rgyal ba'i dbu la bcings na nges par dbang bskur ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi
332a5(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhag sa pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po nyi shu gcig pa// de nas phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par
332a6(rgyud): 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der na mkha' las babs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po dang / bkur sti mngon du

332b1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byaso// me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang phreng ba dang khrug pa dang / gos dang rgyan dang / lngab lhun dang / sil snyan dang / 
332b2(rgyud): pheg rdab pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nas lan bdun bskor ba bya'o// ri bo Ta la'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lA ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am cing
332b3(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po de dag gis kyang mchod pa byas// dkyil 'khor gyi lha de dag la yang mchod pa bya'o// 'khor chen po de dag la yang mchod pa mchad bya'o// lhan cig lpags pa'i 'khor de dag thaMd la yang
332b4(rgyud): mchod pa dang / mngon du bstod pa dang / phyag byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje 'gying pa
332b5(rgyud): can/ brjid bag gi 'gros kyis langs nas bcom ldan 'angs gang na ba der log su thal ma sbyar gsong ste phyin nas rdo rje ga sor zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
332b6(rgyud): byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lag su thal ma sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phags
332b7(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag gyis pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo 'di shin tu zab pa/ 
332b8(rgyud): shin tu rtogs par dka' ba rgya mtsho chen po lta bur shin tu zab pa/ ri rab chen po lta bur shin tu mi g.yo zhing mi skul ba/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ shin tu bzung bar dka' ba'i phyag rgya mang po dang / 
333a1(rgyud): // gsang sngags mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ri mor sku gzugs bri ba mang po dang / sgrub pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa
333a2(rgyud): mang po dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa klags pas 'grub par 'gyur ba mang po la bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur na rdza
333a3(rgyud): ltar sgrub par rngo thogs/ ji ltar nges par gzung ba rngo thogs lags/ gsang sngags tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa tha dad pa dang / ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs tha dad dang / gtor ma
333a4(rgyud): tha dad pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / spyan drang ba dang / grasheg su gsol ba dang / dgug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus dang / bsnyung ba
333a5(rgyud): phyag rgya bcing ba dang / rab tu 'jug pa dang / bzlas pa rjod dang sbyin sreg dang / slar gshegasu gsol ba 'am/ nges par ba zung ba 'am/ dran par bgyi bar rngo thog/ bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa
333a6(rgyud): chen po sems kyi spyod pa rmugs par gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam// dge snyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am / rgyal rigs sam rje
333a7(rgyud): rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ rig sngags sam/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'dis nges par gzung bar ji ltar rngo thog rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis
333a8(rgyud): ji ltar sgrub par rngo thog/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis snying la mchog tu ya mtshan bskyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis the tsom bcad pa'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
333b1(rgyud): the tsom bcad pa'i slad du zhus pa lung bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ gnod sbyin gyi dasde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
333b2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje dngos grub kyi spyod pa gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs gsang sngags sgrub pa po sgrub pa la gang gi tshe dngos grub las dbugs phyung ba de yi tshe blo gros chen po'i chen por 'bogs par 'gyur dngos grub chen
333b3(rgyud): po'i 'grub par 'gyur bsod nams kyi phung po chen pa'i chen pa rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i chen po dang / ldan par 'gyurapha rol tu phyin pa drug gi dngos grub chen pa'i chen pa 'thob par
333b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro/ lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngos grub gang gis sgrub pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub dam pa de gang lag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsar/ 
333b5(rgyud): ga lag na rdo rje gang la yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gyi byang chub kyis sa bon gyi 'bras bu thob pa yod pa de la lag na rdo rje dngos grub dam pa mchog tu 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
333b6(rgyud): 'am/ dge slong ngam// dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam// dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang su yang rung ba bud med dang / skyes pa
333b7(rgyud): dang khye'u dang / bu mo gang gi lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam cig thob par gyur la des ring 'brel de za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste nyin cig bzhin du mchod
333b8(rgyud): pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang // khrus las sogs pa byed cing bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod pa byed na/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags
334a1(rgyud): // 'chang de dngas grub dam pa dang / mchog dang bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// gang dang ga du dgos par sbyar ba de dang der dngas grub chen po mchog tu 'gyuraro// ring bsrel lungs kar gyi 'bru tsam
334a2(rgyud): gcig la mchod pa byas pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ rgyal rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bya
334a3(rgyud): ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gad+hi klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa la skad cig gcig gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ brjed pa dang / gus pa dang / bstod pa dang / phyag byas par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung
334a4(rgyud): du dag pa'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur/ de dag gis drung du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong

334b3(rgyud): nas gnod sbyin d+ha bon chen po lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ song nas byang chub
334b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyu ga gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos
334b5(rgyud): phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzhin 'dzu ma pa dang / gdong khro gnyer med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mig 'dzum par blta zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi

334b7(rgyud): skad ces smras/ lag na rdo rje khyod mi g.yo bar mdun du 'dug te rdo rje gsor zhing nga la ci zhing blta/ ci zhig yongasu dri bar 'dod / ci zhig gsol ba 'debs par 'dod/ lag na rdo rje dang la smros shig/ lag na rdo rje khyod la skang
334b8(rgyud): phyes yongasu dris shig dang / dris pa de thams cad lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
335a1(rgyud): gcigs dang byug pa 'di skad ces smras/ bcom ldan 'das ngan yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying ba'i chog nib ma shin tu rtogs par dga' ba shin tu zab pa/ byang chung sems dpa' ma
335a2(rgyud): cang kyis phyag 'argyas gnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'bar gsang sngags mang po dang / phyag rgya mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ras kyi sku gzugs bri ba mang po yong su bsgrags pa 'di bcom ldan
335a3(rgyud): 'das dza lteng nges par gzung bar dus yos chub ji ltar shes par bgyi rgya chen po ltang zab che gang ba dang / mamus par mig so gnam pa' lhar mthar thug par ma mchis ga shin tu rnanas par dasas
335a4(rgyud): 'di ji ltar shes par bgyi gnas ni gang / 'gro ba ni gang / 'byung ba ni gang / sgrub pa'i gnas ni gang / dngos grub dam pa'i gnas ni gang / rdza ma ni gang khyim ni gang / dbus ni gang / za ma ni gang 'gas/ deng du mongs

335a6(rgyud): dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i rgyal po chen pa na rjon na ba mo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis garnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ste rje su bzung ba dngas par
335a7(rgyud): gzung bar ji ltar nus bcom ldan 'das bdag gi tho tsom chen po dang / mchag tu mtshar du gyur ba de thugs rje chen pos bdag la bka' stsal du gsol ji ltar nub na phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i
335a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / sa kyi ma 'chog mtha' dag nges par gzung bar 'gyur gzo tsam bcad pa'i slad du'o// sems dpa' chen pos dka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
335b1(rgyud): / 'phags pargyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smra so// legan rdo rje yun dza ba gcig nis spobs pa gang zhig skyes gang la yang su 'drig lagan rdo rje rnon cin
335b2(rgyud): dang bshad par bya'o// gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni kha dog gcig gagatugs gcig pa chos gcig la zhugs pa/ dbyings dang / khams dang / snying po
335b3(rgyud): gcig pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gcig pa'o// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje gang 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de
335b4(rgyud): ngag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa nyid dang / rdzu phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku tshe'i 'du byed sna tshogs pa nyid dang / sems can yongasu smid par mdzad pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang lung
335b5(rgyud): bstan pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / can thos dang nga sas rgyam kyi ge 'dun snga chags pa cid dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs / chags pa dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi su tha dad pa nyid du yangs
335b6(rgyud): bar she so// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje de bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying ma don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di
335b7(rgyud): yang gcig nyid las de zad rjesu 'grog/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub kyi gnas dang / sems can yong su smin par byed pa'i gnas/ 
335b8(rgyud): bsam pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa la ji lta ji ltar dul bar byed pa da lta de ltar dngos grub rjesu 'thob cing de lta de ltar bsam pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur// de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos bskyed par
336a1(rgyud): / 'gyur ro// de lnga de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yul la
336a2(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de lta de ltar gzungs dang ting 'dzin yang su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur// de ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin 'thob par
336a3(rgyud): 'bru po rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting 'dzin dang / nyon mongs baspong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gting 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa'i ting 'dzin dang / 
336a4(rgyud): 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting 'dzin dang / stobs bkod pa'i ting 'dzin dang / chos la rnam par blta ba'i ting 'dzin dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin dang / drim
336a5(rgyud): med pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting 'dzin dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i ting 'dzin dang / nyi ma rab tu grol ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rin po che'i snying po ting 'dzin dang / zla ba'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzim
336a6(rgyud): dang kun tu blta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sa kyi sgron ma'i ting 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi gtsug la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul la rnam par
336a7(rgyud): 'phrul pa kun tu bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chags pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin dang
336a8(rgyud): shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin tu rab tu sangs rgyas pa'i ting 'dzin dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor 'gro ba yongasu dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
336b1(rgyud): yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid la kun tu lta
336b2(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ting 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa kun tu lta ba'i ting
336b3(rgyud): 'dzin dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu don yod pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya chen po dbugs 'byin pa don yod pa rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
336b4(rgyud): dpung brgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan gyi rgya la mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgya na ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa thaMd rnam par dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang / don
336b5(rgyud): yod pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma'i lcug sakyu'i ting 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i lcags kyu'i ting 'dzin dang / kun nas 'dren pa'i lcags kyu'i ting 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer
336b6(rgyud): gyi lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i gzi brjid kyi ting 'dzin dang / rtogs pa dri ma med pa thob pa'i ting 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba rab tu gsal ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rnam pa thad yongasu
336b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gtso bo lnga bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur te/ ting 'dzin re re la yang 'khor bye ba brgyad stong phrag gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de
336b8(rgyud): thams cad rje su 'thob par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam pa 'phrul par 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang /

337a3(rgyud): 'thob pa dang / gzungs don yod 'thob pa dang / ting 'dzin don yod pa 'thob pa dang / bsod nams sogs pa don yod pa 'thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang
337a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs pa don
