341a6(rgyud): ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du bltas nas/ blo gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la ga/ tsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud
341a7(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ phag
341a8(rgyud): rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba/ gsang sngags kyi snying po gsang ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bdag gi snying po gsang ga rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang / don yod pa'i dro bo
341b1(rgyud): lcags kyu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod par 'dren pa nor bu rin po che chen po gsum mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du yongasu
341b2(rgyud): skrag par bgyi'o// gang gis dran pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga rim par phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par mngon du gnas par gyur te/ thed
341b3(rgyud): so so nyid du gan so// gsang sngags 'dis gzir bas thams cad du mngon du gnaso// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
341b4(rgyud): dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ste nga po rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu smras pa lags le/ 
341b5(rgyud): so// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / seMn thams cad kyi don chen po'i phyir sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis de yi dus la bab par shes nang spros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
341b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su mngon du phyog
341b7(rgyud): la bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i lcags kyu don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di smras dus gsum du gshegs shings son 'azhugs
341b8(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin rig sngags kyi dbang po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tsha'o// dkyil 'khor gyi
342a1(rgyud): rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa
342a2(rgyud): dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tsho'o// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa
342a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tsha'o// phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi de bzhin
342a4(rgyud): gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib ma dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'amag/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa' sems
342a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa lags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang / dkyis 'a khor thams cad kyi sku sems can zad la byams pa kun nas don
342a6(rgyud): yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal bo la phyag 'tshal// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / snang ba dang / dud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa'i sems dpa'
342a7(rgyud): chen po mchog sbyin lcangs kyu la phyag 'tsha'o// tad+ya thA/ oM A ka rA ya/ pad+ma hastA/ ma hA a mo b+ha aM ku sha~M tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ si tsa ra/ sa man+tan/ mahA pA sha a~M kung ga b+hu dza ba rang b+hu dza
342a8(rgyud): ku sha pA sha d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta mu dra/ man+ta puN+Da la/ pa Ta la d+ha ra a~M ku ka/ dA she na d+ha rA ya/ hU~M hU~M ma hA prar+tha/ beSha d+ha ra a mo b+ha rU pa/ i bung ba d+ha ra / ta ra ta ra/ ta ta ras san+t+ra rA la/ ma hA mu dza/ 
342b1(rgyud): maN+Dal/ a mo b+ha a~M ku sha ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tri lo tsan/ ba shu pa ti/ be sha d+ha ra/ shI shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ par ma ku ru Ni ka ma hA b+hu te/ shwa ra ya ma ba ru Nan ya skr-i ta/ ku mA ra trai lo kya ba rad ma hA ka sha ma ka/ 
342b2(rgyud): shA sa ka rak+Sha ka/ ma hA bi d+hA/ a mo g+ha/ maN+Da la/ pU dzi ta/ rat+na ma ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA i ku sha a k+Sha d+ha ra hUM hUM/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ sa man+ta mu tra maN+Da laM pU ra ya/ hUM hrI/ hri da ya oM ku shI/ 
342b3(rgyud): a ba lo kA ya man sA d+ha ya sadzI ra/ a daya su tra sar+b+ba/ maN+Da la/ bai Ta li/ big+h+nAn pra sA d+ha ya sa pa~M he re ha pra sarba pA pa ki lga 'am la/ mAd saH/ hu ru hu ru/ mahA ma kung madz+rar+m+ma/ 
342b4(rgyud): bud+d+ha bud+ha/ dzo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ tu pu d+ha ru/ mahA d+hi satwa a ku sha rat+na pA sha d+ha ra/ tsA n+da bi tsa~M tra/ A d+ha ra Na bi b+hu li ta/ a mi tAH/ dza~M na ma ku Ta d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pad+ma dA sha
342b5(rgyud): sha d+ha ra/ sarba bi d+ha man+t+ra mu tra maN+Da la/ pra ba ra sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya / bi shwa ru pa d+ha ra/ sa rba sra d+hu dze/ a ha sra ne was so ma mu kha pa ra mahA kA ru Ni ka satwa bta sa la/ sarba man+t+ra mu dra pra sa ha ka/ pad+ma ba rang
342b6(rgyud): sA tA na mo stu te/ a maM g+ha a ku sha/ pad+ma b+hu dza swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di smras ma thag tu ri bo po Ta la chen po dras
342b7(rgyud): dang / nags tshal dang / bskyed mos tshal du bcas pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char chen po 'bab po// ngan yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pa
342b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i tshi ga zhib mo 'di yangs sor le'ur phye bamatha
343a1(rgyud): / dadang rdzogs par na mkha' la gan so// gang gsang sngags kyi yig 'bru yang gser la bai DUR+Yas yi ger bris pa sprin gyi rim pa na snang ste/ yi ge'i phreng ba mnyam zhing gsal la zur phyin par
343a2(rgyud): bris pa thig gi phreng ba gshibs pas rgyan pa snang ngo // gang lag pa'i phyag rgya yang pad+ma'i nang nas byung ba/ phyag rgya bcing ba sna tshogs 'od zer 'bar ba na mkha' la gnaso// gang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang rin po che sna bdun
343a3(rgyud): gyi pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa'i na mkha' la gnas par gyur to// gang ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ rnam par bkra gacho ga dang / yo byad dang bcas pa rim par phye ba bris
343a4(rgyud): pa yang na mkha' la gan so// gang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba de dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs gru bzhi pa/ gru bzhi ma mnyam pa rnam par phye ba/ dkyil 'khor shin tu spras shing rgyan pa/ gzugs rnam
343a5(rgyud): ba sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i gzhal med khang yang namakha' la gnas pa'o// dkyil 'khor chen po na gnas ba'i rig sngags kyi lha pho nya dang / khro bo dang bcas pa gzhal med la
343a6(rgyud): na rje su rgyu ba dag kyang namakha'i dkyil na gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed// phyogs so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang phyogs bcu
343a7(rgyud): kun gyi namakha'i dkyil na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
343a8(rgyud): sa gzigs dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug leg so leg so// rig sngags mchog das pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mtha' dag rdzogs
343b1(rgyud): par smras pa/ gang gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mor gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba de dag thams cad don yod pa'i lcags
343b2(rgyud): kyu'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas kun nas drang so// 'khor 'di'i nang na na mkha'i dkyil na rab tu gnas pa de phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong
343b3(rgyud): ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dgye sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am bu
343b4(rgyud): mo rig sngags 'dzin pa thams cad kyi don yod/ pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di dran par byed na lan gcig
343b5(rgyud): dran pa tsam gyis kyang mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyis phyag byas pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'adz+ra
343b6(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya dang // gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhing mo de thams cad sa sor de la kha ton nyid du gnas te/ de dag thams cad rim gyis dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho bas
343b7(rgyud): ba dang / shes rab 'phel bar 'gyuraro// gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba so so la blo 'jug par 'gyuraro// nam yang blo dman par mi 'gyur zhing nam yang brjed ngas par
343b8(rgyud): mi 'gyur// de nas tha~Ms de min gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ chog chen po sbyin pa/ 
344a1(rgyud): lag na pad+ma mchog tu snying rje can khyod kyi cho ga rgya chen po smras pa legaso leg so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul
344a2(rgyud): gyi yon tan mtha' yas pa 'di mthong nas dbugs cher 'byin par gyur cing mchog tu dga' ba thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
344a3(rgyud): dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor 'di'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don med pa'i lcags kyu'i bya ba'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad// bcom ldan 'das
344a4(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying pa don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag bgyis pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
344a5(rgyud): 'di sgrub par 'tshal ba dang / gang yang rig kyi bu' ma/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ ge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am rgyal ri/ 
344a6(rgyud): sa ga/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba bu dam / skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ don la dpa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di klag par 'tshal ba dang / bstan par
344a7(rgyud): 'tshal ba dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi bar 'tshal ba dang / mtha' dag rdzogs par sgrub par 'tshal ba des sngon rol tu phyogs bcur thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogasu kha
344a8(rgyud): bsdus te mchis la gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i snying po 'di lan gsum dran par bgyi zhing / yang thal mo sbyar te phyag bgyi'o// des na dran pa tsam gyi mod la byang chub
344b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug par 'gyur te/ ri bo bo Ta la'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / lha dang / 
344b2(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / bcas pa bkug par 'gyur// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags
344b3(rgyud): pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po nyi shu gnyis pa// don yod pa'i zhabs pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis ga/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / 
344b4(rgyud): ba gsang sngags rim par bya bar cha ga zhibs dang / nub pam cho ga'i rnam pa rgya chen po mtha' da rdzogs pa 'di yang kug par 'gyub dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha 'khor dang
344b5(rgyud): bcas pa bkug par 'gyur te/ thams cad yid rab tu dga' bar gyur pas dngos thub dam pa rjesu stsol bar 'gyuraro// de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyi ste/ ji ltar shin tu
344b6(rgyud): rgya mer yid la bgyis pa de ltar sgrub par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi kha nas dran pa mnyan zhing rgya che ba dang / blo dang mdangs dri ma ma mchis pa 'jug par bgyid de/ dug
344b7(rgyud): pa tsam gyi mod la lce pad+ma'i mdab ma lta bur 'jam par 'gyur zhing / kha nas ud pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyuraro// dbyangs snyan cing mnyen pa dang / 'jam pa dang / zab pa dang / tshig rnam par dag par
344b8(rgyud): 'gyur// mi 'am ci'i dbyangs dang / sgra snyan pa dang / dbyangs mnyen pa dang / dga' bar byed pa'i dbyang su 'gyur zhing ka la bing ka'i dbyangasu 'gyuraro// ji ste dus gsum du dran par bgyid na/ 
345a1(rgyud): // gsang sngags dang / chog zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs spyi'i dngos grub rdo rdzogs
345a2(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing spyod par 'gyur// 'gegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa sdang ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / dmyal bar mchi ba'i sdig pa tha dang
345a3(rgyud): bral bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po// rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'di lan gsum dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis skad cig de nyid kyi
345a4(rgyud): mod la bdag rang dang / rang gi gnas kyi khang pad nga/ slob ma dang / bsnyen bkur dang / 'khor dang bcas pa mi da tsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur/ yongasu ma dag pa yang shin tu yong
345a5(rgyud): su dag par 'gyuraro// dri ma dang bcas pa yang shin tu dri ma ma mchis par 'gyuraro// zhes sdang dang bcas pa yang zhes snga nga dang bral bar 'gyuraro// gti mug dang bcas pa yang gti mug dang
345a6(rgyud): bral bar 'gyuraro// 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyuraro// sgrib pa dang bcas pa yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro// bgegs dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang log 'dren gyis
345a7(rgyud): yongasu zin pa yang / bgegs dang log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa dang / bral bar 'gyuraro// sems kyi sdig pa yang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyu ro// thun mongs ma yin pa yang thun mongs
345a8(rgyud): du gyur cing srung bar 'gyuraro// mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs ma mchis pa yang mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// bsnyung ba ma bgyis pa yang bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyuraro// rig sngags kyi gnas
345b1(rgyud): dang yul dang dkyil 'khor thams cad du tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod pa chen por 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gnas chen po la gnas par 'gyur// dge ba mi spyod pa yang dge ba chen po dang
345b2(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur// chos mi spyad pa yang chos spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ bsod nams mi 'gyid pa yang bsod nams kyi phung po 'phel bar 'gyur// dul ba'i spyod pa ma mchis pa ya
345b3(rgyud): dul ba'i spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags mi mthong ba dang / dam tshig ma mchis pa yang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang snga
345b4(rgyud): mthong ba dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags kyi gnas dang / 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas dang / chos mthong bar mi 'tshal ba yang byang chub dang / chos dang / dam tshig dang ldan
345b5(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyis bsam pa yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bas ma par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi sa bon gyi yul du ma gyur pa
345b6(rgyud): yang byang chub kyi sa bon dang ldan par 'gyuraro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyad pa dang mi 'bral zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par bgyi ba la mkhas par 'gyur/ tshul khrims
345b7(rgyud): dang mi 'bral zhing ting 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyuraro// sbyin pa dang yongasu gtong ba dang mi 'dral zhing / sbyin pa dang / yongasu gtong ba dang / sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
345b8(rgyud): bzod pa dang / mi 'bral zhing bzod pa chen po'i bzod pa'i rjesu spyod par 'gyu ro// brtson 'grus dang mi 'bral zhing brtson 'grus kyi stobs chen po'i go cha bstan pa bgos par 'gyur// 
346a1(rgyud): // bsam gtan dang mi 'bral zhing bsam gtan chen po 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyuraro// shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa rgya chen por 'gyur// rig sngags dang / gas
346a2(rgyud): sngags nyams pa yang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya yongasu tshang ba dang / cho ga la mkhas par 'gyuraro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba yang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po'i lam la rab tu gnas
346a3(rgyud): par 'grub par 'gyuro// 'jig rten thams cad du snying du sdug pa dang / bla mar bgyis par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / mngon du phyag bgyi bar 'gyur// tshig brdzun par 'gyu ro// sam
346a4(rgyud): pa yong su dag par yang 'gyuro// de ltar don yod pa chen po'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di dag ni thams cad du dngos grub don yod pa/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' gdage ba don yod pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags
346a5(rgyud): kyus 'dren par bgyid// dngos grub thams cad 'gugs par bgyid do// sgrub pa thams cad 'dren par bgyid do// sangs rgyas kyis chos ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngabs bcu
346a6(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / don dam pa dang / stong pa nyid 'dren
346a7(rgyud): par bgyid de don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'dis 'dren par bgyid// yangs par bgyid/ dngos grub mchog 'dren par bgyid do// de ltar mthu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / yon tan chen por brjod pas/ bsod
346a8(rgyud): nams kyi 'bras bu chen po stsol bar bgyidado// de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan zhing / kun tu sogs par bgyid pas rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
346b1(rgyud): dbang phyug gi snying po ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa lag so// de nas rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong
346b2(rgyud): ngam khri ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam// dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung gabud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am bu mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyi 'gu
346b3(rgyud): bar 'tshal ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugasu mthong bar 'tshal na des cho ga 'di bgyi'o// gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ kha'i rnam
346b4(rgyud): lnga'i chus bsang ba'i mchod phyir thogs btag sa pas ras dmar po'i skud pa'i mchod phyir thogs kha dog bzang po gnas bdun du yongasu gzung ste/ mtshogs ma dang / spyi btsug
346b5(rgyud): bcing ba dang / gnas gsum po dpung pa gnyi su ba cing ga lag ngar gnyi su bcing ba dang / de nas rkeng par bcings pa sa phyogs gtsang mar 'dug nas sam/ gnas gzhan gang yang rung ba dben
346b6(rgyud): zhing 'khrugs pa ma mchis pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi stegs gru bzhi pa shin tu rnam par mdzes pa gru bzhi'i tshad tsam la 'phang sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam kun nas drum po legs par byugs shin tu 'ja
346b7(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// de nas tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pa rnam par mdzes par thig gdab cing tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyi bri bar bgyi'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni khru gang tsam gyi tshad la gru bzhi pa rnam par phye gshin tu
346b8(rgyud): mdzes pa/ gru ba ni kun kha khyer gyi rnam pa can bgyi'o// dbusu pad+ma bgyi'o// mda' ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ bdab ma thams cad la lcags kyu bri zhing dbus kyi snying po ge sar dang bcas pa rin po che sna tshogs
347a1(rgyud): // kyis rgyan pa brgyal// 'od kyi phreng chum po chen rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes par 'gyi'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi gru bzhir lcags kyu dang zhags pa kun nas num pa sa

347a8(rgyud): pa sna tshogs pa bzhag/ snying pa'i dkyil 'khor khor khor yug tu dngul gyi snod bkang ba bzhi/ 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil ba'i snod bzhi dang / dri snod bzhi dang / dris/ 
347b1(rgyud): bkang ba'i snod bzhi dang / dngul gyi pog phor a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug spos bsreg pa bzhi bzhag go/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor khor khor yug tu sa las byas pa'i snod bkong ba dang
347b2(rgyud): gtor ma'i snod bum pa yongasu bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / bdug pa sna tshogs bsregs pa'i phog phor brgyad 'jigs pa med par bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bcu

352a1(rgyud): su sbyin par bgyi'o// mchog 'dod pa thed rje su lang shig dang / ji ltar yid la byed pa re ba de thams cad rje su sbyin par bgyi'o// khyod srung ba dang / yongasu bsrung ba'i dor du bdag

352a3(rgyud): thams cad du rje su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// thams cad du tham cad bgyid par 'gyuro// dran pa tsam la sogs pas las thams cad bgyid cing nye bar gnas par 'gyu ro// rtag tu lta zhing spyir thang
352a4(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dang / las su bgyi ba bgyid par 'gyuraro// ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ las thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du brgya
352a5(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ nam yang nyams par mi bgyid do// thams cad rje su 'brang zhing las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ ji ste 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma dgug par 'tshal na de nas rig sngag
352a6(rgyud): 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bsgos pas bzhin tu dri zhim po'i dris lus lhag par bsgos la/ gang na me tog gi shing ljon pa mchis pa der mchis la zla ba mar gyi ngo'i
352a7(rgyud): chos bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas shin tu dri zhim par dri'i zhing gi me sbar ba la pu shel tsi dang / ta kar dang spang spos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / kun mar dang
352a8(rgyud): sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa bgyi'o// gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / tsan dan gyi chus bsgom pa'i 'bras yos dang / me tog gis bkang ba'i mchod yon gyi snod bum pa sar pa brgyad sku'o// dkar gsum
352b1(rgyud): gyi gtor mas btang ba gapur gyis bsgos pa'i gtor ma'i bum pa gsum su'o// me tog shin tu dri zhim po stsal bar 'gyi zhing gA rtsi dang / tsan dan dang / da pur dang / kun tu ru'i bdug smras
352b2(rgyud): stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas las yongasu rdzogs pa dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma gzang mo de lha'i gzhal med khang du mchi zhing mdun na mchis te de mthong nas ma 'am/ sring mo 'am/ chung ma la
352b3(rgyud): las byed pa 'am/ mngag gzhug ma 'am/ pho nya ma rnams ji lta bur ji ltar tshig tu brjod pa de la smros shig dang / ji ste mar gyur na de'i tshe bu bzhin du snying nas yongasu skyong bar byed// nor dang / 'bru dang / 
352b4(rgyud): dbyig dang / gser dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lbub dang / mal chas yongasu skyong bar bgyid// ji ste sring mor gyur na de'i tshe longs spyod thams cad kyis yongasu skyong bar bgyid do// 
352b5(rgyud): ltar yid la bsam pa'i bud med dpag tshad brgya yi pha rol nas kyang bkug ste/ yongasu yongs spyod pa'i phyir yong su spyod par bgyid cing / phyir yang de nyid du gtor bar bgyid do// ji
352b6(rgyud): chung mar byung na de dang / lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dam pa yongasu longs spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mthong ste/ lha rdzas kyi bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod stsol bar bgyid// ra bro ba'i mchog
352b7(rgyud): ro brgya dang ldan pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i longs spyod stsol bar bgyid do// mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsed mos 'dod pa'i yod tan lnga'i longs spyod par bgyid do// lha rdzas kyi dri dang / me ton
352b8(rgyud): dang / phreng ba dang / byugs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyis rgyan pa'i gzhal med khang du 'gyuraro// nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / khang pa yongasu gang zhing mchis par 'gyur ro// nor/ 
353a1(rgyud): bu dang / gser dang rdo rje dang /  DUr+ya dang / gser dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / dngum sgyogs dpag tu med pa 'thong pa'i gter stsol bar bgyid do// 
353a2(rgyud): rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / phyugs dang / dran pa dang / bran mo rab tu mang po mang bar 'phel zhing mchis par 'chis par 'gyu 'o// mal cha'i longs spyod sna tshogs stsol bar bgyid do// lnga rdzas kyi
353a3(rgyud): chung ma'i longs spyod bud med gzugs sna tshogs pa'i 'khor brgya dang ldan pa nyin gcig bzhin du gnas par 'gyur// yang byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pas ji srid 'tshe'i bar du gnas par 'jun
353a4(rgyud): tshe lha'i lo stong thub par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gis bag yod par bgyid ste/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gus pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'dzin
353a5(rgyud): la mchog tu gus par brgya'o// rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' bar bgyi zhing sems can thams cad la ma/ chog tu snying rtse bar bgyi'o// gzhan du mi smra bar bgyi'o// gal te
353a6(rgyud): las byed par gyur na de'i tshe rgyal po la bgyi ba bzhin du lwa thaMd bgyid de/ shin tu yongasu rdzogs kyi bar du las la mngon bar brtson par 'gyuraro// ji ste mngag gzhug mar gyur na gnas
353a7(rgyud): gang du mngags pa de'i gnas thams cad du mchis te/ dpag tshad stong gi pha rol tu mchi zhing / skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o// thaMd du gter chen po 'byin par bgyid/ 'dren par bgyid
353a8(rgyud): dpag tshad stong gi pha rol nas bud med 'bug par bgyid cing / nor dang / 'bru dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang karta dag 'gugs par bgyid do// slar yang gtong bar bgyid do// bag yod pas bsgo
353b1(rgyud): bar bgyid ste/ bdag nyid shin tu rang po'i yul dang / gnas su 'phen par bgyid/ gnod sbyin dang / srin pa dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas 'degs par 'gyid de/ der srog gi bar changad du
353b2(rgyud): mi 'gyur bar bgyid do// dza ste pho nya mor gyur na phyogs bcu thams cad du mchi ste/ lha'i 'jig rten du mchil m+bu'i 'jig rten du mchi'o// lA ma yin gyi gnas su mchi'o// mkha' lding gi gnas su
353b3(rgyud): mchi'o// mi 'am ci'i gnas su mchi'o// lto 'phye chen po'i gnasu mchi'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnasu mchi'o// 'byung po'i gnasu mchi zhing thams cad du pho nya'i bya ba bgyis nas slar mchi'o// 
353b4(rgyud): skad gcig gis dpag tshad stong du mchi zhing slar mchi'o// skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du thams cad du phyi na nas pho nya'i bya ba bgyi do// ji srid sa'i 'og gis bar du 'jug
353b5(rgyud): cing phyir yang mchi'o// bya ba shin tu yongasu rdzogs par bgyis nas bag yod pas yang las thams cad bgyi ste/ nyin cig bzhin du mdzad yon dang / rkang pa bkru ba stsal bar
353b6(rgyud): bgyi'o// thed kyi gnas thams cad du phyin cing bya ba 'grub pa/ bla na ma mchis par 'gyur// gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des gzhan gyi ma reg pa'i shing leb sar pa
353b7(rgyud): la gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi zhing gnas dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa gtsang ma'i gnasu bzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin
353b8(rgyud): tu khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma 'gos pas 'o dang / 'bras thug po che'i chan gyi gtor ma stsal bar 'gyi'o// shing ka ra 'i ra'i me spang la/ yungs kar dang / gu bul dang / ra'i khrag dang / 
354a1(rgyud): zhun mar dang / bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / me tog dmar po stsal na gnod sbyin mo de yang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/ 
354a2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang slongs shig ces smra bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gis khyod nga yi ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed pa yin no// nga'i las thams cad byed pa yin no// nga la dbyig mang po byin cig ces
354a3(rgyud): brjod par bgyi'o// de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo de ltar leg so zhes smras nas mi snang bar 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe yungs kar dang / gu gul la yongasu bzlas nas mar gtor na de
354a4(rgyud): mchi zhing ci bgyi zhes bya ba thams cad 'gyid par 'gyur/ dbyig spang stsol bar 'gyur ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis pa ra 'gyur/ rtag tu ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyuraro// de nas lha ma
354a5(rgyud): gyi bu mo dgug par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spra tshil las lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgya na pa bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gnas 'khrug pa
354a6(rgyud): ma mchis pa dang / dben pa dang / sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnasu gzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas zhag gsum zan bcad
354a7(rgyud): bar bgyis la/ de'i mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la gu gul gyi bdug spos stsal cing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu bzlas brjod yungs kar la
354a8(rgyud): bzlas pas bu mo de la lan stong rtsa brgyad brdegs par bgyi'o// las yongasu rdzogs pa dang / de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/ gang dang gang du dgos pa de dang
354b1(rgyud): der dgas pa'i rjesu 'brang bar 'gyuraro// de las thams cad 'gyid par 'gyur thams cad du mchi bar 'gyur ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyuraro// ji ste srin po dang / srin mo 'gugs par
354b2(rgyud): 'tshal mgu gul dang / ba glang gi sha skam po dang lhan cig bsres pa la don yod pa'i lcags kyus lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas dur khrod du mtshan thog thag bdugs na drin
354b3(rgyud): po'i gnas zad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur te/ srin po dang / srin mo rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ ci sba ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang
354b4(rgyud): zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyuraro// gdugs gcig bzhin du dngul chu srang khri stsol bar bgyid// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis cha gsum du dbyi bang bgyi ste/ ma gcig ni dkon mchog
354b5(rgyud): la mchod par bgyi'o// cha gnyis ni nyin gcig bzhin du sbyin par btang/ srin mo rnams la zan dang / tshad sde na rmon pa'i gtang ma stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas srin po labang dang
354b6(rgyud): bcas pa de rnams tshim par 'gyur/ de nas 'khor bcas pa shin tu ma gyogs par 'gyur te/ shugs chen pos dgos pa zad sgrub cing nam yang gzhan du bgyid par mi 'gyur// gtor ma
354b7(rgyud): gtsang ma stsal bar bgyi'o// ji ste sha za dang / sha za mo dgug par 'tshal na ba lang gi mkhris pa dang / de'i so dang / gu gul dang / shing arga'i 'o ma sbyar te/ lam gyi bzhi mdor bdug par
354b8(rgyud): bgyi zhing / lhag ma dang 'phags pa'i gtor ma stsal na/ sha za mo de mchi zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid pa'i bran du 'gyur/ las thaMd bgyid par 'gyuro// 
355a1(rgyud): dpal tshad stang gi pha rol tu mchi zhing skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do// dus gsum du gtor ma lhag ma'i gtor ma
355a2(rgyud): du stsal bar bgyi'o// nyin cig bzhin du gser gyi dong rtse brgya rangs su 'jog par 'gyur te/ des thams cad zad par bgyis na/ phyir zhing 'phel bar 'gyuraro// ji ste rgyal po'i bcu

355a4(rgyud): mdab ma dang / rgya ma tshwa dang / lan tshwa bsres pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas nas/ phye ma'i rdza su bgyis ngal lungs kar dang / skematshe'i sa bon dang / sbrang rtsi'i sa
355a5(rgyud): bon lan gcig mnyes la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te / rgyal po'i sgo 'am/ lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ la man po che 'am/ grong khyer gyi sgor
355a6(rgyud): gtor na dang der gom pa bor ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas gnas te ci brtse ba'i bya ba bgyid do// rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug cing dbang du 'gyuraro// thad du ci bgyi ba bye ba bgyid cing /

355b8(rgyud): par 'tshal na/ shing tsher ma can gyi se sbar ba la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mngar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad snang bgyi'o// brgyad srong rdzogs na pha rol d+ha/ 
356a1(rgyud): // dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'gyuraro// g.yul 'byed pa bzlog par 'tshal na ske tshe'i sa bon dang gu gul dang b+hang ga'i sa bon dang / zhog chu dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong 'gyi

356a3(rgyud): pa 'di sbyar bar bgyi bar 'tshal te k+She ma ka dang bzhing mngar dang / tsa rong dang ni gu gul dang / mu ra yak+Sha mu ra dang b+hu te ke shi mnyam par gzhal// phub ma dang ni ba la ka khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang / sprul
356a4(rgyud): lpags dang ni yungs rnams gnyis/ b+ha ga'i sa bon pa lang mkhris// nya dang legs par sbyar bgyis te/ ra yi gcin gyis bsgos pa la// lcags kyu'i gsang sngags bzlas pa yis// bdug pa dam pa'i gtso bo 'di// rbad

356b2(rgyud): te dogs pa mi bya'o// mig gi nad ni ling tog dang skya bor gyur pa dang / rab rib dang / chu bur can dang / chu zag pa dang / tshag po dang / ha sa ra dza dang byis pa'i mchi ma dang / mig du sme ba byung ba dang / khrag dang

356b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ nas 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu bu bzhin yongasu sbyang zhing gnas pa/ dug thams cad mod la med par byed pa ni mig sman mchog yin no// bsam pa ngan cing sdang ba'i sems can dang / dgra
356b8(rgyud): dang phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang 'gyed pa dag mig sman gyis bskus pas// mthong na dbang du 'gyur te gan so// ma he gtum po dang / glang po che dang / rlung dang / sar ba dang / kha mthon po nas g.yang dultang
357a1(rgyud): // ba dang me'i phung po dang / khyim rdib pa dang / g.yang sad ltung ba rnams mig sman gyis mig bskus pas mthong na zhi bar 'gyur zhing // gzhan yang bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de 'di la dog par ma
357a2(rgyud): bya'o// yungs pa dang / skyer pa dang / na le sham dang / pi pi ling dang / shi ri ga be ra dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / rdzong ros dang / gur gus la sogs pa'i mig sman dang / rgyam tshwa dang / spang

357a7(rgyud): thams cad las rgyal ba sbyin zhing dge ba/ dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ rtag tu dug thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ rgyal ba'i sgor mdzes par 'gyur ba/ nod dang 'bru 'phel bar 'gyur gargyal po dang /

357b1(rgyud): ba dang / gnon dang sa 'i tshe 'gro bar dka' ba 'byung ba dang / nad dang rims 'joms pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par byed pa/ tshe dang nad med par byed pa 'phel ba/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu
357b2(rgyud): ma rnams mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ gang gis ril bu bcangs na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing gdon 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rnam par log 'dren gyis ma yin no// gnod sbyin dang / srin pa
357b3(rgyud): dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed ma rungs pa rnams ril bu mthong ba tsam gyis phyogs bcur bros par 'gyuraro// 'dir byis pa gsod par mi byed do// sman 'di la reg pa tsam gyis khyim da
357b4(rgyud): dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / na ba zed dang / nad la sa yongasu grol bar 'gyu ro// 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / 'brum 'phran mched pa dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang
357b5(rgyud): 'brum bu mched pa dang / sha bkra la bslus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur/ lus thad du zhugs pa'i nad la chu dron pa dang 'thus pa tsam la sogs pas yongasu byang bar 'gyur/ 'jig
357b6(rgyud): slab pa thaMd las rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa chen po las thams cad rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur// gnas theng du song ba la sbyar ba byas na thams cad 'khor bar 'gyuraro// de nas rdza su bya ba ni pu shes
357b7(rgyud): ci dang / tsan dan dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / rdo dreg dang / pad tra dang / tsha ma ka dang / shi mi dang / pad+ma pa tra dang / ud pa la dang / na la dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sug spel dang / btsod dang / 
357b8(rgyud): su ga ri dang / ra dza N+ya rnams gnyis dang / mr-i ka dang / sra rtsi bag dang / gur gum la songs pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang / de dag kun 'asres te/ zhib mor btag la khar dang / chu dang sbyang bas ril bu byas la gas rdza
358a1(rgyud): // brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te/ grib ma la skams pa da ni h+la na grub pa yin te/ thams cad rgyal bar byed cing dge ba yin no// rnga dang rnga bo che dang / dung la ri lu mchog bskus te/ ganra
358a2(rgyud): mthon par song ste/ dung gi ng+ga dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga ji srid du zos pa de srid tsam du 'jigs pa med par 'gyuraro// dug dang bcas pa ni thams cad dug med par 'gyur la/ dog pa mi bya'o// 
358a3(rgyud): nad thaMd dang / mi ngas thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / lo nyes thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// bde zhing lo legs pa nyid du 'gyuro// gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa'i seMn sdig pa
358a4(rgyud): can dmyal ba la gzhol ba dag gis sgra thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad bang ste/ bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyuraro// gos la bdugs na bdag nyid
358a5(rgyud): mchod pa chen po 'thob cing zad la dbang byed par gnas pa dang / don grub pa bla na med pa yin no// nor dang 'a bu rab tu 'phel zhing dgos pa sgrub pa bla na med pa yino// 
358a6(rgyud): thams cad mchod pa dang / rtag tu tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ rgyal po gang la khros pa las skrod cing smra bar 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi gnas chen du 'gyur zhing rtag tu nad med
358a7(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// rtag tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dpal dang ldan pa dang // gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / shi nas
358a8(rgyud): mtho risu skye bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoM ldan 'das
358b1(rgyud): bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs chen po'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 
358b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po lta ba dang / sgrub pa dang / bklags pas 'grub pa/ don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi dam tshig grub pa lagaso// 
358b3(rgyud): gang gis pad+ma rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag dang / phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / chos dang / bde bar sgrub pa mtha' dag ni rigs kyi spyi tha~Md kyi dam tshig chen
358b4(rgyud): rjesu 'jug pa 'grub par 'gyur ba lag so// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje 'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'od dag
358b5(rgyud): tu med pa'i snying po'i mchog dang po rdo rje rin po che rtse mo'i mchog dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la tha~Md du rje su zhugs shing dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba dang / thad du

358b7(rgyud): spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i dbus su bsgrags par bgyi'o// rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa tha~Md rnam par gzhig pa'i
358b8(rgyud): phyir bshad par bgyi'o// grub pa yang dag pa rjesu stsal bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
359a1(rgyud): / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dag cing shin tu yongasu dag pa yin te/ leg so les
359a2(rgyud): so// rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang / sems can thaMd dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bstan par
359a3(rgyud): bya ba shod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i grub pa dam tshig gi rjesu 'jug par byin gyis brlab so// ngas kyang de bzhin du
359a4(rgyud): de dag byin gyis brlab so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod pa'i rgyas pa'i pad+ma'i snying
359a5(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad gdon yod pa'i lcags kyu'i yang dag pa mchog grub pa/ sgrub pa das pa ni sa dang ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bya ba ni shin tu mdzes pa shin tu
359a6(rgyud): 'jam por bya'o// tshon sna lngas rnam par dbye/ ni/ grwa dang bcas par rnam par dbye bar bya'o// tshon sna tshogs kyi bri ba dang / dkyil 'khor gru bzhir thig gdab pa ni mnyam par
359a7(rgyud): thig gis dbye bar bya ste/ sgo bzhi rang dbye bar bya'o// chu zheng du khru bzhi tshad tsam du dbye bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po ni tshad zhu do par byas la tshon sna lnga'i sgal bu dang / chonas
359a8(rgyud): las dbye bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khar gyi sto la pad+ma dkar po la bye ba zlum par bya'o// bad+ma bye ba'i dbu su zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / pad+ma gnas par bya ba ni klu mgo gdengs ka 'dra ba lcags kyu dang
359b1(rgyud): / ba dang / lag pa dang bcas pas pad+ma'i lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang / 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug par bya'o// tshen sna tshogs kyis bri'o// pad+ma kha phye ba'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni lcags kyu dang / bcas pa
359b2(rgyud): skal bur bya'o// nang dang phyi'i bar du ni rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya'o// lcags kyu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gis bya'o// zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma
359b3(rgyud): med pa'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o// mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni phyag rgya phyag na thogs pa bri bar bya ste/ mtshon ma sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang
359b4(rgyud): kun la 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang / 'od zer 'di pasna tshogs bri bar bya'o// phyag gi phyag rgya'i phyi rol gyi sbal bu ni sreg bu dang 'dra bar bya'o// lhag bu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni la
359b5(rgyud): bar ljags kyu bri bar bye'o// snying po'i dkyil 'dzor gyi glar ni rgyal po chen po bzhi go bgos pas lcag rgya dang / mdung rtsi gcig pa thogs pa 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa brgyan thad kyis bdun
359b6(rgyud): bskyil mo krung phyed du bcas te/ pad+mo'i gdan la 'dug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag tu 'jig pa med pas phyag mtshan rnams zad pad+ma la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o// sgo 'di'i gan
359b7(rgyud): su pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bri ba ni shar gyi sgor lag na rdo rje lhor ral pa gcig ma nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma khyang du pho nya mo dang / rig sngags kyi lha mo bri bar bya'o/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi
359b8(rgyud): rol gyi sgal bu ni me tog gi steg bu 'dra bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni kun tu ba'i lci bas bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khod de la nas phyes pad+ma bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang na
360a1(rgyud): / dang / dang btags pa'i mda' dang / dri'i snod bkang bas rgyan cing byug pa'i chu dgang ba dang / 'dug spos snod kyis rgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa dang / dri chab dang / 
360a2(rgyud): yon gyi chab dang / 'bras bu dang / yon chab dang // dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog gis 'dzegs pa med par brgyan par bya'o// mu tig dang khyi ru dang / rin po che'icu
360a3(rgyud): rgya sngon po dang / mang gang dang / pad+ma rA ga rnams kyi de bzhin du brgyan to// dkyil 'khor kun tu dung dang / bil ba dang / rtsa dang d+ha dang / gser dang / dngul gyis brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi don du mchod
360a4(rgyud): pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha bkris pa rnams da ngasgo 'di'i gnasu dri chab kyi bum pa dang gyi rgyan te/ 'dzag par bya'o// dkyil 'bor kyi phyi rol thog thag tur sna tshogs kyi gtor ma
360a5(rgyud): gzhag kha dang / bum pa dang / bya ma bum pa dang / bum pa dang / rte gu dang / kham pong dang / bum pa gang ba rnams byas te bzhog/ pog phor dang / gtor ma bzang po sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs
360a6(rgyud): dgram par bya/ phreng ba bzang pos brgyan par bya/ tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan gdags// tshon sna lnga pa'i sras bu seng ldeng gi phur pa la btags pa gzugs par bya'o// kun tu mar me phreng ba dang / mar me'i
360a7(rgyud): sdong bu bzhi yang de bzhin no// mkhas pas dkyil 'bor gyi nang du bdug pa dbul ba ni a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du rus ka dang / s+thi ka rnams kyis bdug pa gsung dang / gla cis bsgos pa bya'o/

360b1(rgyud): su bya ba'i cho ga dang / lcags kyu'i rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ba dang / slob ma bzhug cing dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang kha'i rnam lnga la reg par bya ste/ mkhas pas phyag rgya dang / gas

360b8(rgyud): bar mi bya ste/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'di ni dpa' bo gcig tu bklags pas grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thaMd dang / byang chub sems dpa' dzad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'phags
361a1(rgyud): / pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ yang dag par 'grub cing mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no// don yod pa'i lcabs kyu'i dkyil 'jor
361a2(rgyud): dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba ni sdig pa tha~Md rnam par dag cing sgrib pa dang sdig pa thaMd dang sngon gyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa rnams sngar bsags pa rnams rnam par zhig par
361a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa'i grub pa bde ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu 'bras bu chen po bde ba dang / shi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du song ste/ pad+ma'i nang nas rgyal ba'i spyan sngar brdzus

361a5(rgyud): 'dug cing gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par 'a gyuraro// rgyal ba thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing sgriza ra phyag bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dus kun tu

362a1(rgyud): tu 'khrigs par 'gyuraro// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis leg so zhes bya ba rab tu sbyin par mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu legaso leg so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
362a2(rgyud): la mchod pa 'di ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa yin no// de dag gis me tog dang / bdug pas dkyil 'khor mchod pa ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang /

362a5(rgyud): po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / dbang phyug dang / dab nga phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams srung ba dang / sbed pa dang / 
362a6(rgyud): skyob pa'i phyir rje su 'brang ba chen por 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// de'i sa phyogs kyang mchod rten snyam du sems shing
362a7(rgyud): mchod rten ring bsrel can du 'gyuraro// sems gang dag de la blta ba'i phyir song ba'i son dag sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / du thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur// 'jigs pa dang /

362b1(rgyud): bla mar 'gyuraro// dgra thams cad las phyir rgol dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyuraro// dus ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa las yongasu thar par 'gyuraro// 'di nas shi nas
362b2(rgyud): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyuraro// tha na ri dgas dang / bya dag pa gnas te phyogasu nye bar song ba de dag sgrib pa thams cad dang / de yi sngon gyi tshe la yongasu bsags pa de
362b3(rgyud): dag lhag ma ma lus par yongasu byung bar 'gyuraro// de dag zad bde 'gro la gzhol bar 'gyuraro// ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med par mthar byang chub la thug gi bar du'o// de nas do/ 
362b4(rgyud): yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la sku gzugs bri ba'i tshe ga brjod par bya ste/ gnas thams cad du bla na med pa 'grub pa ni sdig pa thams cad mod la bsreg par byed pa dang / nyon mong
362b5(rgyud): bzad 'phrog pa bzhin du nad zad sel ga sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam bar thar pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gang
362b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen por kun tu lung bstan pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ mchog tu dkon pa/ yid la re ba thams cad 'phral du yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba/ bkra shis thams cad sgrub pa/ bsod
362b7(rgyud): rnams thams cad sogs pa/ myur du nor dang 'bru sbyin par mdzad pa/ sgrub pa yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags 'grub pa/ bzlas brjod 'grub pa/ yid la re ba tha~Md yongasu
362b8(rgyud): rdzogs par 'grub pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yong su rdzogs pa de kho na nyid rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bsod nams chen po skye bar 'gyur// nam byang chub yang dag par 'thob kyi bar du
363a1(rgyud): / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur// ngan yod pa'i lcags kyu mo 'phrul chen po'i ras kyi sku gzugs chen po mthong ba la sogs pa ni phyis ngan 'gro'i gnas
363a2(rgyud): mi 'gro zhing sdig pa'i las pa kyis mi gos pa dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song las thar
363a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / dmyal ba mi zad pa rnams las thar bar 'gyuraro// tshe rabs kun tu bde ba dang / da ltar 'di la mchog tu dkon pa'i bde ba lhun gyis grub pa thob par 'gyur// rjen
363a4(rgyud): pa yang longs spyod dang / phyug po mtshungs pa med pa mchog mod la thob par 'gyur// lha'i dpal thob par 'gyuraro// la'o// ra babang po bdog par 'gyur// rgyal po
363a5(rgyud): rnams kyis bla mar bya zhing rtag tu dus thad du mchod par 'os pa ra 'gyuraro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rig sa dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / 
363a6(rgyud): skyes pa rnams rtag tu dbang du bya ste/ 'dug cing thaMd bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dug pa ni ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa bla na med pa yin no// ras gru bzhi khyod kun khru gang
363a7(rgyud): ngam/ khru do pa la legs par brtags pa/ ras 'jam po thag ran bzang po mnyen po shin tu dag par bkrus pa gtsang mar byas pa 'am/ yang dar lug gam/ yang na mon dang
363a8(rgyud): ram/ shun phrag la zla ba yar gyi ngo ches bco lnga tshangs pa'i bar du ras kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa bri bar bya'o// snod gtsang ma sar pa'i nang du tshon lhag ma ma yin pa blu/ 
363b1(rgyud): te/ ras kyi sku gzugs gsal bar bri bar ni tshon sna tshogs kyi rnam par dbye bar bya'o// dbusu 'phags pa spyan ras dbang phyug mgon po bri ba ni skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ 
363b2(rgyud): zhal gsum pa mchog tu bzang gzhal dang po ni mdzes shing sdug gang bu ltung po dang / thor thugs kyis rgyan pa/ cod pan la 'od dpag med kyi rgyan ga dbu skra 'khyil bar bya'o// me tog gi phreng
363b3(rgyud): ba bcing bar bya'o// phreng ba'i gong du 'od dpag med bya'o// cod pan la zla ba phyed pa dang / 'od 'dom gang bya'o// kun tu lcags kyu bya'o// kun tu 'bar ba'i phreng ba bya'o// phyag bzhi la phyag g.yaman
363b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i lcags kyu/ g.yas mdung rtsi gsum pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yon gcig na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu// g.yas gcig na rdo rje lcags kyu dbugs 'byin par bya'o// gdan seng+ge
363b5(rgyud): pad+mo bya'o// g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma'o// g.ya su dkar mo ste/ tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ba rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ 
363b6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu rin po che'i shing lcags phran dang / yal ga dang / chas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi spras par bya'o// 
363b7(rgyud): na co dang / ri skyengs dang / shang shang ti'u dang / rma byaM dang / bya ka la ping ka rin pa che'i gsapa nas rgyu bang bya'o// shing gi gong skyo bo lakhang bu rtsegs pa dang pra'i gdal med khang gi nang du de bzhin
363b8(rgyud): gshegs pa gsum rgyan tha~Md kyi brgyan pa bzhugs par bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o// gal su lag na rdo rje thos pa'i gang ma 'byin pa
364a1(rgyud): // gzugs mche ba gtsigs pa/ sgra gyen du rjes pabyung lo dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje thogs shing gsor gnamakha' la lta bar bya'o slang du gshin rje dang / mum+b+ha dang / lus
364a2(rgyud): ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// gong du dbang po dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po lnga'i bu bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yas phyog su tshangs pa dang
364a3(rgyud): 'jug dang / dbang phyul chen po rnams btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'o// g.yan du dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho rnams bcom ldan 'das la mtsha
364a4(rgyud): ba byed pa'o// g.yas kyi gnas gcig tu rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du dbus mo btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing me
364a5(rgyud): rtsa sna tshogs kyi sdong bu dang pog por dang / bgrang bri nga lag na thogs par bya'o// phyogs bzhi ngos kun tu ris bskor ba 'a ri dgas kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang ba shing sna tshogs sa
364a6(rgyud): dang lcug ma can bya'o// rdzing bu chu zag pa bya'o// 'bras bu sna tshogs can gyi shing dang lcug ma bya'o// gnas so sor drang srong rnams dang / khrul gyi shing bya'o// nul de ltar don yod pa'i lcags kyuras
364a7(rgyud): la bris te gnas gtsang ma dben par bzhag la rig sngags 'chang bas 'bad pa chen pos mchod pa bya'o// a ga ru dang / du rus ka dang / tsan dan gyi gdug pa dbul bar bya'o// ci nus par don yod pa'i lcags
364a8(rgyud): kyu'i rigs pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o// nyi ma re re ras la sku gzugs bris pa mthong ba tsam gyis mod la mtshams med lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mnar med par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i
364b1(rgyud): chos spong ba rnams yong su dag cing zad par 'gyu ro// 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / nad thams cad yongasu zad pa dang / rnam par dag par 'gyuraro/ 
364b2(rgyud): rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur// sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur// gzungs grub pa chen pa so sar thob par 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la de ma thag tu 'bras bu chen pa rnyed pargya
364b3(rgyud): chen por 'gyuraro// lan 'ga' yang log par ltung bar mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd mthong ba thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dgongs par 'gyuraro// lha zed kyis rgyun tu bsrung shing
364b4(rgyud): rjesu bzung bar 'gyur// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di'i 'am gas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon tu mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig
364b5(rgyud): par bya'o// rkang zhig ras kyi sku gzugs 'di la leg par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis bya ba byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa ni phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi
364b6(rgyud): bye ma dgu bcu dgu dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mchod par 'gyur ro// de nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin pa
364b7(rgyud): pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung ba chen pa yongasu gzung bar 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba brgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur// dge bas
364b8(rgyud): yongasu dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
365a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can gyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad
365a2(rgyud): las yongasu grol bar bgyi ba'i phyir don yod pa'i lcags kyu rig sngags kyi rgyal po rim par phye ba rnams bstan pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das yang bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i
365a3(rgyud): rgyal ba dkyil 'khor te/ rig sngags 'chang thad dro bo chen po'i las grub pa mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa dang / yid la re ba thaMd yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma rung ba brtson pa med pa/ 
365a4(rgyud): brtse bsam pa med pa ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po thang dang / 'byung ba dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thaMd thag 'jug pa/ ma rungs
365a5(rgyud): pa'i 'gegs dang / log 'dren zad rab tu dul ba ra mdzad pa/ bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa dzad rab tu zhi bad da/ phung bar byed ga/ son ma rungs pa thams cad sdug par byed pa/ 
365a6(rgyud): phyir rgol ba dang / dgra zad 'ching ba dang / gcod pa dang / 'bigs pa dang / rdung ba dang / gtong ba dang / lus rnam par zhig par byed pa de ni bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag gis pad+mo rgyas pa'i dkyil 'tshor
365a7(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhing mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabasu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu brjod par bgyi ste/ dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga
365a8(rgyud): zhi'i mo zad du bsrung bar byed pa/ 'dzes par byed pa/ dam tshig 'dzin pa/ gnas dzad la rjesu sbyang ba ste/ da ni sgrub par byed pa/ sgrub pa 'grub par byed pa'i mchog de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs brtseg
365b1(rgyud): chen po'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das khra ba'i rgyal po chen po byin gyis brlabs shing rje su gnang ba mdzod cig dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu 'grub pa'i snying po dag sems can zad kyi
365b2(rgyud): bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das rjesu stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
365b3(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag rgya chen pos phyag rgyas btab ste ngas kyang byin gyis brlabs// sngon gyi de bzhin
365b4(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs kyis smras shi gsun ngas gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang zad gsang ba lag
365b5(rgyud): nardo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang ba dang / rdo rje'i snying po dzad dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
365b6(rgyud): po thad kyis yongasu bzung ba smos shig / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang phrad kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i go skabs dang / mchog grub par byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
365b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas bsgo zhing dbugs phyung ba thos nas snying dag la/ smin ma bskums/ dpral ba phyed khros par byas// gdong
365b8(rgyud): bro gnyer du byas// mche ba ni gcigs/ spyan ras gzigs kyis lus 'khor mang po'i nang du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas ngan yad pa'i zhags pa zla ba'i rnam pa 'di smras ga/ dus gsum
366a1(rgyud): / na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
366a2(rgyud): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// shA ra
366a3(rgyud): ti'i bu blo gros can la phyag 'tshalo// drang srong chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal tshab du dbang bskur ba byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thaMd la phyag 'tshalo// khams gsum bI
366a4(rgyud): bdag po nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshale// khra bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i tshogs la phyag
366a5(rgyud): 'tshalo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM
366a6(rgyud): bi kr-i ta/ ba da na ma hA kro d+ha rA sAM b+ha yau ka ra/ ma hA daMSh+Ta/ aT Ta hA sa na/ dz+wa la dzA la/ ma hA dzA la/ mA la ma hA ro tra/ rU pa pa b+ha ya ka ra na/ ha na han/ sarba duSh+Ta/ yak+Sha rAk+Sha san/ da ha dA ha/ sarba duSh+Ta/ nA bA nan/ pa tsa ba
366a7(rgyud): sarba duSh+Ta/ big+h+nAn/ bi nA ya/ kAn bA tu ya/ pA ti ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa twe mAM d+hi d+ha mahA kro d+ha rA dza/ pa Ni ka na ka badz+ra/ bair+d+han+ya/ a lang kr-i ti sha nI ra na/ badz+ra par shu pA sha hastA ya/ ma hA ped+ma a~M ku sha d+hA dzA
366a8(rgyud): ma hA pad+mi A sa nA ye/ asA pad+ma bi ka tsa gan+d+ha ya/ a mo g+ha sa pra ti ha ta/ ba la pa na kra sA ya sa ha pra/ ba~M d+ha la/ sarba d+hA ta/ b+ha ya~M ka rA ya/ sarba de ba b+ha ba ma ka me ba ud d+ha bA ga ma hA \u0f7f kr-iH
366b1(rgyud): bang snga gan ras kyi sul la/ gyung \u0f7f pa d+hA dz+wa la/ d+hun d+ha ra/ mahA na m+ba'i gca ga tsar tsar/ Natsa/ Na tsa ra na shA tsa ra/ mI shwa/ TI ni mu gahU~M hU~M la gas ngas gabras 'bras pas pam ga
366b2(rgyud): dza ha ra/ ma hA ma Ni/ te dza d+ha ra/ pad+ma hasta/ oM pad+ma a~M ku sha/ b+hu dze/ ta rA ya/ man+t+ra ma ya'i g+h+nAM/ shA sA ya duSh+TA na/ nA sha ya/ sarba pA pa ba ra Na/ hUM phaT swA hA/ pA sha hastA ya swA hA/ pad+ma d+ha ra ya sAhAs
366b3(rgyud): mA shA sa kA ya swA hA/ oM mo g+ha b+ha ra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ kro d+ha rA dza b+ha ya~M ka rA ya swA hA/ b+hA sma be Sha d+ha rA ya sAhA/ traitri lokya b+hu dzi tA ya swAhA/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku She ran maHkri tA ya swA hA/ badz+ra d+ha ra pU dzi tA ya
366b4(rgyud): sAr+tha/ badrA k+She pa me tra~M pA ma khan ti \u0f7f/ pU dze ShA yas/ de pag gakhan de rje me sA smanA pa a kar+dz+dza me sar+b+ba/ oM b+ha dbyar/ mA ra ny+dza piT+Ta ru b+h+ya ru/ sarba maN+Da las d+hi ts+tshi ta sa ma ya snga
366b5(rgyud): mu dra ma d+hits+tshiHsu dzA ya swAt+ma/ oM a mo b+ha ba pamra hA lA sa ku sha badz+re b+h+rU~M mahA padz+ra/ a sha sa d+ha ranas stu te/ ma ma g+ha ma ku shwa hU~M phaT swAhA/ zla ba'i rgyal po chen par
366b6(rgyud): gzungs 'di smras pa dang / lha'i gnas dang bcas pa dang / ri rab dang bcas pa'i rgya mtsho gnas dang bcas pa dang / gzhal med khang rnams kun tu 'gu'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
366b7(rgyud): khams rnams pa drug tu g.yos so// ma rung ba'i klu dang / sgra ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za zad dang / bdud la sogs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa dang // gdon
366b8(rgyud): ma rungs pa rnams la sbub tu 'gye'o// ma rungs pa dzad kyi khyim du kun tu tshig te 'bar gsun tu 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ 'bang ba gcig tu gyur cing bsregs pa dang / ngu zhing 'dre log su tshor badra/ 
367a1(rgyud): // po mi bzad pa chen po myong po/ lha thams cad shin tu 'khrugs shing skrag go// bdud kyi rigs rnams bred nas las btag so// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag pa thams cad kun tu
367a2(rgyud): 'khrug so// rgya mtshor gnas pa'i klu dang / rgya mtsho'i klu chen po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dag kyang kun tu 'khrugs shing shin tu skrag ste snying 'dar// gzhan yang sa'i steng na klu stong phrag
367a3(rgyud): brgya gnas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i chu'i nang gi klu gang dag dang / ri la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun tu 'khrug skrag cing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing gdung so// rgyal po chen po
367a4(rgyud): bzhi rnams gnas na 'dug na yang skrag go// nag po chen po dang / tshagasan pa'i gtso bo dang / ma mo'i tshigs kyis bskor ba de dag thaMd skab cing snying 'do'o// gnas la brtan pa'i bdud kyi gnas
367a5(rgyud): rnams 'da'o// 'bar kun tu 'bar te gnas dang bcas par sreg// de nas 'khor de'i nang gi sgra dang / klu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi steng rol nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
367a6(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir me tog sna tshogs 'thor ro// lha rdzas kyi rgyan skud pa sna tshogs dang / chos gos kyi char pa 'beb so// mchod pa'i las byed cing tsan dan gyi chu'i char pas sa la chag chag 'deb so// 
367a7(rgyud): lha rdzas kyi gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje lus
367a8(rgyud): 'bar zhing rdo rdzo gas te/ shin tu 'gyings pag tu seng+ge'i 'gras kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gal ba de 'og su sar/ 
367b1(rgyud): ste nye bar phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal nas/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med
367b2(rgyud): me tog gi rin po che sna tshogs kyi smras pa'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad+ma la phul te/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin pa che sna tshogs kyi spras pa 'di dbul la longs spyod
367b3(rgyud): ba'i phyir dang / bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du thugs rje chen pos bzhe su gsol/ gang gis bdag yun ring por phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lagaso// khro bo chen po'i yang chen po bshad cing
367b4(rgyud): gang dran pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham pas rnam pa drug tu g.yos// gang dag bdud ma rungs pa dang / gang dag klu ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 
367b5(rgyud): 'byung po dang / she za ma rungs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams khyim dang / bcas te/ lus kun tu chog cing rab tu 'bar nas kha sdug tu 'gyel cing sreg go/ 
367b6(rgyud): la thug pa dang srog bskams par 'gyur ba'i don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal ba ni dus thad du mgo'i spyi bor blang bar bgyi'o// bcang // sgo mo// mchod do// rgyas par bgyi'o// rig sngags
367b7(rgyud): 'chang gi lag na khro ba'i rgyal 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram
367b8(rgyud): dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs kyi lag na thogs pa 'am/ lus la thogs pa 'am/ lta ba 'am/ dri ba 'am/ tha na tho bo'i rgyal po nyan pa tsam de yang bcom ldan 'das
368a1(rgyud): / bdag gis khung du bskur bar brgyal// skye bos blang bar 'argyal/ srung bar brgya'o// yang su bsgrub par brgya'o// bsam pa dang / yid la re ba thams cad yang su rdzogs par bgyi'o// 
368a2(rgyud): grub pa chen po'i chen po rje su skul bar bgyi'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren ma rung ba thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rjesu 'brang zhing srung ba dang / bskya
368a3(rgyud): pa dang / bsdu bar bgyi'o// rtag tu dus thad du mthong ba rje su stsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yo byad zad kyi mi brel cing phun sum tshogs par yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// lus
368a4(rgyud): la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid bskyed cing bsod na mas dang / ye shes kyi grogs brgya'o// dgra thams cad sa sor gsal bar bgyi'o// nor dang 'bru dang / bza'
368a5(rgyud): ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / sdud pa dang / rgyan rje su stsal bar bgyi 'o// khu gcig pa 'dra bar rdzasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// dad pa dang / lu sa pas dus kun tu mchog tu mos par bgyi'o// 
368a6(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces khyod kyis khas blangs pa mchog tu
368a7(rgyud): bzang po byas pa 'di legs legaso zhes smras te/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa blangs te/ lag na rdo
368a8(rgyud): rje la rje su brtse ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis yongasu longs spyod pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor na ni gnas pa'i lha tha~Md kyis yongasu longs spyod pa'i phyir dang / lha dang / klu/ 
368b1(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gang yin pa 'dir 'dug cing dam tshig
368b2(rgyud): la gnas pa rnams yongasu longs spyod pa'i ji lta bzhin du 'dug te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gong du gtor ro// de nas phreng ba de na mkha' de la gtor ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de
368b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbu'i steng du zla ba yid du 'ong ga dri ma med pa'i me tog de khang bu brtsegs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa/ 'od 'tsheng ga ka ba bzhi dang sgo
368b4(rgyud): bzhi legs par rnam par 'byes pa gru bzhi lham pa/ chu zheng shin tu rgya che gshin tu nang yangs pa/ me tog ka da l+ya dag gis mdzes pa/ gzhal med khang sna tshogs su gyur te gan so// 
368b5(rgyud): de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dbu'i steng zad kar de bzhin du zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog rin po che sna tshogs spras pa'i bang bu brtsegs pa'i gnas
368b6(rgyud): med khang du shin tu gnaso// de lag na rdo rje dbu'i steng gi zad kar yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa me tog khang bu brtsegs par shin tu gnaso// de 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
368b7(rgyud): phyug gi steng thog zag tu yang / zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ me tog ka ta l+yaM/ sa mdzes par byas
368b8(rgyud): gnaso// khang bu brtsegs pa'i nye 'khor kun gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab/ 
369a1(rgyud): 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams lag na rnga yab thogs nas g.yob cing 'dug/ de dag kyang 'khor 'dus pa chen po mang pos yongasu bskor cing mdun du byas// dkyil
369a2(rgyud): 'khor gyi rig pa'i rgyal ba'i lha de dag zad kyang na mkha' la zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa'i phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa
369a3(rgyud): nang na 'khod pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba sba ba bzhin dang / na mkha' la zla ba nya ba na rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyi yongasu sba ba bzhin du sba bar gnaso// me tog de dag gi nang na lha rdzas kyi zla ba yid du 'ong
369a4(rgyud): 'dri ma med pa'i matod sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / puN Da ri ka dang / man dang ba dang / bahA man da ra ba da da/ me rtag ra tsa dang / ma hA ra tsa dang / me rtag pa
369a5(rgyud): dang / tA la ka dang / me tog ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / me tog ya d+hi mu ka ta dang / me tog a sha ka dang / me tod pa ta la dang / me tog nI la dang / mA hA nA la dang / me tog gan d+ha
369a6(rgyud): b+haR+Sha ka dang / me tog su ma na dang / ta ra Na dang / ku ya ka'i me tog gi char gyi rgyun phab bo// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa'i phyir dang / lha rdzas kyi chos
369a7(rgyud): gos sdud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi char 'bab cing phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd la mchod do// de ltar na cho 'phrul che ba'i che ba dag snang ngo // rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga pa dag kyang ma
369a8(rgyud): brdungs par rnamakha' la sgra byung ba// 'phags pa don yad pa'i zhags pa'i snying ba'i cho ga nib ma'i rgyal pa// bam pa nyid shu bzhi pa// de nas de bzhin pa shegs pa bcos/ 
369b1(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po mchog du dkon
369b2(rgyud): pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras te/ rig sngags 'chang zad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir ma rungs pa bde 'joms pa sdig pa thams cad sreg pa bshad pa legs leg so// 'di ni
369b3(rgyud): phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// yid la re ba zad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan
369b4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba'i sbyin par 'gyur/ gnas thad gtogs pa'i grub pa chen po rab tu ston par 'gyur/ rig sngag sa 'chang ba rnams kyis yangs shing rgya che ba'i
369b5(rgyud): chen po thad byed par 'gyur/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'di ni 'ja karten las 'das pa gcig po mchog 'grub par 'gyur/ te/ las sgrub pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i
369b6(rgyud): phyir ro// de nas khros pa'i gang rgyangs spyi gtsugs 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon po gnod sbyin chen pa stong phrag brgya'i bdag po spobs po che ga dpung che ba brtan
369b7(rgyud): zhing pha rol gnon pa chen po gang gi lag mthil gcig gis ri'i rgyal po lhun po chen po 'gul bar byed pa/ lha'i gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas te/ rgya mtsho chen po na gnas
369b8(rgyud): te/ 'khor bye ba phal po che dang ldan pa/ drag po gzi brjig drag po stobs che ga pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par byed pa de bstan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de sogasu/ 
370a1(rgyud): song ste nye bar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
370a2(rgyud): btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs rig sngags
370a3(rgyud): kyi rgyal po shin tu mi bzad pa'i gsang sngags bshad pas ni bcom ldan 'das gzhal med khang dang bcas pa bsreg so// gnod sbyin du ma stong phral bye ba khrag khrig 'khor dang bcas pa
370a4(rgyud): 'bang ba gcig tu gyur te bsreg so// bcom ldan 'das bdag rten ga te tshig cing zhu bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis dza ltar sgrub par bgyi bdag la skyob pa sral
370a5(rgyud): dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni srog rnam par zhig pa'o// dus kyi zhags pas bcing so// bcom ldan 'das bdag la phan gdag su gsol/ bde bar
370a6(rgyud): gshegs pa bdag la bsgrub du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la
370a7(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khyod ma 'jigs par khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjesu song shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
370a8(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la skyab su nye bar song shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dir khyad kyi skyab dang / dpung
370b1(rgyud): gnyen dang / skyob pa dang / rten du 'gyur te/ gang gis 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i gnod sbyin stong phrag brgya'i srog dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba yin no// kye gnod sbyin chen po myur ba myur
370b2(rgyud): bar song ste skyabasu 'gro bar byabyos pashig/ de nas khros pa'i gang rgyangs can gtsug phud 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba rtogs nas byang chub
370b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba de log su song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
370b4(rgyud): phyug la ngu zhing rgyal nas lag pa brkyang te/ zhabs la btud nas 'chi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag skyab du gsol/ thugs rje chen po bdag la skyab tu gsol/ bdag la srog
370b5(rgyud): stsal bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsreg shing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyi na du ma stong phrag brgya bye ba 'khor dang bcas
370b6(rgyud): bsrog dang bral bar 'gyur// shes pa ni gtor/ stobs dang brtson 'grus spros par byed pa ni nyams na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lu su zhig gso bar gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
370b7(rgyud): gzigs dbang gis khros pa'i gang rgyangs spyi gtsugs 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen lo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyon cig ji srid ston
370b8(rgyud): gyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig// gnod sbyin gyi bdag pa khyod kyi 'dzam+bu'i gling gi seMn mang po sa rnam par brtse bar byas// khyod kyi bud med dang / skyed pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po ni zos ma khyod/ 
371a1(rgyud): // kyis 'phags pa'i spyan mang ba nyams par byas khyod kyis rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo mang po'i bar chad ni byas/ grub pa rnams ni med par byas/ ma grub pa
371a2(rgyud): rnams kyang med par byas/ skal pa can mang po ni med par byas/ skal ba med pa ni yod par byas/ mi 'tshe ba dang srog dang longs spyad kyi bde ba ni med par byas/ 'tshe ba dang / srog rnam par
371a3(rgyud): 'jig pa ni 'phel bar byas/ khyod kyi legs par bshad pa ni yongasu bor/ khyod kyi nyes par bshad pa dang / ser sna ni mang du byas/ rig sngags 'chang zad dang / sems can thams cad la khyod
371a4(rgyud): nag po dang / rnam par 'jig pa rab tu gnas/ khyod kyis ngan sems / ni 'phel khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni nub par byas/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma khyod shin tu mi
371a5(rgyud): bsdig pa can yin/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gnas dang bcas/ du da dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i nang na khyod cig pu ngan sems can bar chad byed par skyes pa yin te/ 
371a6(rgyud): rgyu des na gnas skabs 'di 'dra ba thob pa yin pas kye gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dam tshig dang / bslabs pa dang / sdom pa khas blang ba dang / dge ba'i chos byos shig 'on tang kho bo khyod
371a7(rgyud): kyis skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar byas khyod sdug bsngal bas nyams thag pa dang / bcings pa mi bzad pa dang / me 'bar ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las ngas yongasu thar par bya'o// 
371a8(rgyud): mtho ris kyi lam du 'jug par bya'o// de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub sems dpa' sems
371b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di
371b2(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dang slan chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi bka' lung bzhin bgyis te dam tshig la
371b3(rgyud): gnas par bgyi'o// chos kyi rjesu sems dpa' dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyab su mchis pa la gnas par brgyal// phra ba'i rgyal po 'di dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal ba lcags kyu'i
371b4(rgyud): gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi rtsa ma dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yongasu sbyang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gdung
371b5(rgyud): ring sngags kyi rgyal po 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don par 8/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga kun spyod pa de la ni bdag gnod rgyu na brgya stong du ma rnams kyis 'og dang / bla dang / 
371b6(rgyud): ba ni kun tu bsod nam su dmigs te/ srung ba dang / sba ba dang / bsgrub par bgyi'o// yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// lus la stobs dang / spro ba dang / gzi byin mang du skyed par bgyi'o// de'i yul phyog su
371b7(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'tshang 'dru dang / ma leg pa dang / lo nyes dang / mi ngas dang / rims dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nyams thag par byed pa'i gdon dang bcas

372a1(rgyud): bsal bar bgyi'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa byung ba thaMd so sor

372a7(rgyud): 'dren thaMd dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin chad pas gnod pa so sor 'dzub par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
372a8(rgyud): khros pa'i gang rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bang ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po leg so legaso// khyod kyi de bzhin du bya bar rig so// sani thams cad
372b1(rgyud): rjes bzung ba chen pos 'azungs par bya'o// rib sngags 'chang ba la bdag nyid kyis srung ba dang / bcang bar bya'o// de ni po sbyin gyi sde dpan chen po de rgyangs gsum pa la gnas shing dkyil 'khor chen
372b2(rgyud): po'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob pa'i tshig 'dzin pa la gnas par gyur to// rigs tha~Md kyi dam tshig dang ldan par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya

372b5(rgyud): lnga ji ltar myur ba myur bar las sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / rdzi ltar dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar bsam pa dang / yid la rab 'byo ra bar 'gyur ba dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu rba
372b6(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs kyi byin gyis rlobs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom
372b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gagang lung stsal pa rtogs nas nye bar bshad pa'i chob smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngabs 'chang ba/ rig kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang yin pa 'am/

373a1(rgyud): // bco lnga la 'bras chan dang / 'o ma za zhing nang par sngar langs la 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil ma krung bcas te 'dug nas mi smra bar gaN+DI brdungs

373a3(rgyud): nas bzlas brjod gcig dang / dran pa gcig gis thams cad du 'grub par byas na thad du bya ba thams cad mchog tu 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba las byed par 'dod cing / don yod pa'i zhag

373a5(rgyud): 'ong bar mi nus te/ rgyang ring po na 'du'o/ 'di lan cig dran pa tsam gyis bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dang / sgrub pa bde bar 'grub cing dgos pa sgrub pa zad grub pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa

373a7(rgyud): tu g.yang sar gyur te/ su yang 'ong mi nu so// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / bcas pas gnas der
373a8(rgyud): 'ong bar mi nus na/ mi ma yin pa phal pa dang / bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te gnas mdo// rig sngags 'chang ba 'jigs pa med par yang dgos pa zad thub pa sgrub par byed pa/ 
373b1(rgyud): bgegs med par thams cad du sgrub pa 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang las thams cad bya bar 'dod cing gdon bsal bar 'dod na/ gu gul dang / yungs kar la lan gcig bzlas brjod

373b3(rgyud): cig tu byas na mod la gdon thams cad 'jig par 'gyuraro// ji ste nag po chen po rang nyid dam/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ sgra gcan nam/ 'jigs byed kyang 'jig par byed na/ gdon gzhan 'ong bar lhag

373b5(rgyud): par byas mamod la 'byung po dang don 'bros par 'gyuraro/ na pa da dang / an da ri dra ka ba tsa dang / bu gul dang / has dang / ba la ka/ dang / ma tul dang / pad+ma dang / kuSh+ma rnams gnyis dang /
