374a1(rgyud): ngu zhing phyogs phyog su 'dros so// sa ni g.yos so// klu gang dag rgya mtshan gnas pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / gsang ba dang / tshangs dzA
374a2(rgyud): srin po dang / bgegs dang / gdon mi bzad pa gzhan ma rungs pa de dag zad dri tshor ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ dog par mi bya'o// lus rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ bcom ste rus pa lhag
374a3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ 'chi bdag gi zhags pa'i khar 'gro bar 'gyur/ des rnam par zhig par 'gyur ba de la dog par mi bya'o// dug dang bcas pa ni mod la dug med par 'gyu ro/ klu 'jogs po dang / nor rgyas kyis
374a4(rgyud): gal te zin pa 'am/ sbrul gyis zin pa la bdug pa dang khrugs pa tsam gyis thad du dug med par 'gyuraro// gang dag 'jig rten na dug sna tshogs mi bzad pa yod la la bdug pa'i dri tsam dang bskus pa
374a5(rgyud): dang / ril bu tsam gyis mod la dug thams cad med par 'gyur te/ thebam mi bya'o// 'bras dang / bol mig dang / lu ta dang / shub dang / sha bkra dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / 'bru
374a6(rgyud): bu dang / ldog pa rnam pa mang po dang / nad mched pa dang / lba ba'i phreng ba dang / khang 'bras dang / rkub na ba dang / sman dang / 'khru ba dang / rtsib log na ba dang / snying ka na ba dang / gre ba 'gags pa dang / rna ba na
374a7(rgyud): dang / son pa dang / mig na ba dang / mag bon pa dang / gzhogs phyed na pa ril bus bskus pa tsam dang / chu dron 'thungs pa tsam dang / 'dug pa tsam dang / bsnams pa tsam gyis thed de thag tu zhi bar
374a8(rgyud): 'gyur te/ thad la ril bu dam pa lan gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ byin na thams cad du dgos pa thams cad byed pa na bla na med pa yin no// shin tu char che ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin/ 
374b1(rgyud): pa'i char dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo'i tshogs dang / mtsha'i klung de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyu ro// char dusu 'bebs// ma tog dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog yang par 'gyur/ 
374b2(rgyud): phyis ser ba mi 'babs po// sad dang / rlung dang than pa mi 'byung ngo // phun sum tshogs pa thams cad grub par byed cing bkra shis pa thams cad grub par byed// rims drag pa ma rungs pa kun tu 'jug
374b3(rgyud): pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang / 'das pa mi bzad pa drag po'i rims dang / rims drag po'i 'jigs pa chen po dang / me 'bar ba shin tu che ba dang / zhag bzhi pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang / grang ba'i
374b4(rgyud): rims sdug bsngal chen po dang / rims gang dag 'chi ba'i zhags pa 'bar ga 'khrugs pa drag po mi bzad pa dang / zlos pa'i rims pa 'i gso dka' ba dang / nyin gcig pa'i rims dang / 
374b5(rgyud): nyin gnyis pa'i rims dang / nyin gsum pa'i rims dang / de bzhin du rlung las gyur dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / mchil ma las gyur pa'i rims dang
374b6(rgyud): rims snying pa dang / zug zeng dang / gzhang 'brum dang / gcin snyi ba mi bzad pa dang / rims thams cad la bdugs pa tsam gyis the tsom med par rnam par 'jigs par 'gyuraro// na mkha' lding gi
374b7(rgyud): gdon dang / gang dag mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / mi ma yin gyi gdon dang / gang dag gzhan ma'i gdon zed bdug pas bdug pa des mod la zed rnam par bral bar 'gyur/ 
374b8(rgyud): lcags kyu'i gsang sngags dam pa lan gcig dran par byas ni skem byed dang / bskams pa dang / brjed byed dang / gnon ra za yag sh+lA dang / bdag nyid ngan par byung ba dang / grib gnon dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa gang
375a1(rgyud): du skye bo zhe sdang ba rnams 'byung ba dang / gang du gnod pa dang / 'jug pa dang / nyon mongs pa mang po rnams la yid du 'ong ba bdug pa tsam gyis zed las de thar bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po khros pa
375a2(rgyud): dang / gang zhig rkun po dang / mo rgod kyi nang du song ngam/ gcong rong bgrod dka' ba'i nang du song ngam/ dog pa mi bzad pa'i nang du chud pa la lcags kyu lan gcig dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na
375a3(rgyud): thams cad du rtag tu bde bar 'gro ba dang / gang dang gang du 'gro ba na bde bar 'gyur// de'i lus la mes mi tshugs/ chu chen pos khyer bar mi 'gyur// lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran pa dang / bdug pa
375a4(rgyud): mchog gis 'dugs na thed du pha rol tu phyin pa dang / khad legs pa shin tu rgyas par 'gyuraro// de'i lus la mtshan gyi mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ gsang sngags mchog tu drag pos ma yin/ 
375a5(rgyud): de la byad mi tshugs/ nad kyi ma yin/ nyon mongs pa drag pos ma yino// gsang sngags dran pa tsam dang / bdug pas bdag bdug pa ni thad du 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar
375a6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ 'di la dog pa mi bya'o// rba dang phyir rgol 'i mi son ma rungs pa mi bzad pa rnams dang / 'thab mo 'gyed cing g.yul 'gyed pa na bdag nyid 'dug pas bdug cing rig sngags lan
375a7(rgyud): gcig dran par byas nas thad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam la dgas par mi bya'o// gang zhig rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig bgags kyis zin te nyams pa dang / blo zhan cing
375a8(rgyud): le lo can la bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bya zhing gsang sngags lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na des mchog tu dkon pa 'grub par 'gyuraro// bskal pa med pa bdag nyid 'dug pa dang / ril bu mchog gis
375b1(rgyud): bkru ba dang / mig bsku ba dang / mchog thi le byas na thams cad du skal ba can dang / dga' ba dang / dbang phyug mtshungs pa med par 'gyu ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel zhing rgyal po dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ khrod du
375b2(rgyud): stobs thogs pa med par 'gyuraro// thams cad du mchog grub pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpan chen po bzhis srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / smra bar bya ba'i
375b3(rgyud): phyir nyin mtshan du rje su 'brang zhing gnas par 'gyuraro// srung ba'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung 'khor dang bcas pa rig sngags kyi rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur// di bzed kyi tshim par thob pa
375b4(rgyud): 'gyu ro// gnas gcig nas ril bu bdun blangs pa las khro bo'i lcags kyu lan nyid shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba nas/ dge sbyong
375b5(rgyud): dang bram ze bkren pa sdug phongs pa'i bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'i don du ril bu gcig gis khrus byag gcig gis bdag bdug/ gcig gis gos bdug gci
375b6(rgyud): ni ba'i rnam lnga dang / sbyar te btung bar bya/ gcig ni margar spyi bor bzhag// gcig ni dpung pa g.yas par gdags/ rim bu/ gcig rked par btag na thaMd du 'byor pa 'thob par 'gyur cing
375b7(rgyud): thams cad du mchog bla na med par 'grub par 'gyur// bsam pa 'grub 'gyur/ rgud pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur// rma dang / nyams chung ba dang / de bzhin du chags grugs dang / bsheg
375b8(rgyud): kyis zin pa dang / gdon raT lag shas zin pa de dag zad rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyuraro// dogs par mi bya'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ sngon bsags pa'i
376a1(rgyud): / sgrib pa thams cad mod la rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ gsang sngags stonas pa dang / gsang sngags dran cing dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdug par byas pas dogs par
376a2(rgyud): mi bya'o// mnar med pa dang / mi bzad pa'i sdig pa dang / dug dang sems can ma rungs pa dang / las ngan pa dang / phung ba rnams thams cad mod la med par 'gyuraro// mes phye ma leb bzhin rtag
376a3(rgyud): tu myur du sreg par 'gyu ro// gsang sngags lan gcig dran par bya zhing 'dug pa 'dris 'dug na dus ma yin par 'chi ba zad zhig par 'gyur// thams cad du sbyar ba la dog par mi bya'o// 
376a4(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad kyi khro bo'i lcags kyu sbyi ba tsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i 'dug pa'i rgyal pos khyim dang / sgo chen por nam langs ka dang / mun bsros khar 'dug
376a5(rgyud): cing gsong sngags lan gcig dran par byas na/ khyim gyi nang der gang dag mi snang bar 'dug par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung ba dang / sha za dang / 
376a6(rgyud): brjed byed dang / grib ma gnon ma rungs pa dang / mi ma yin pa thaMd snang bzhin du phyir 'byung zhing dus te/ kyi hud zer ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyuraro// khyim gang yin pa 'gul ba dang / khyim dang rta babs
376a7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing dmyal ba'i srung ma mi bzad pa thad phyogs bslad par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen
376a8(rgyud): po dang klu mthu bo che tha~Md bdug pa'i dri bla na med pas skrag par 'gyuraro// bsam pa ngan pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bang ba dang / lus bsregs pa dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
376b1(rgyud): 'khrul ba dang / bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthus 'jigs pa mi bzad pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab ma dang / brtsod pa dang / 'thab cing 'gyed pa thams cad
376b2(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyuraro// bde zhing legs par rgyal ba 'grub pa dang / thams cad du dpal thob par 'gyuraro// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
376b3(rgyud): srin po dang / klu rnams kyis srung ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rje su 'brang bar 'gyur// de bzhin du rjesu skyong ba dang / dus thams cad bla na med pa'i gzi byin skyed par byed// khro bo'i lcags kyu bla
376b4(rgyud): na med pa grub pa'i thig le brjod par bya'o// thig le skar ma lta bu ni// lha'i nyi ma bzhin du dpa'// nyi ma bya ba'i 'od dang mchu ngas// bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis 'bar/ 
376b5(rgyud): mun wad sgron men 'od bzhin du// mun pa'i nang na sdang bar 'gru ratshogs kyi dkyil na mdzes pa ni/ ma'i tshogs ldan zla bab zhin/ bsod nams bya ba stong phrag dang / dpag
376b6(rgyud): med gzhal du med pa yis// lus 'di dge brgyan par 'gyur// na mkha' la rin chen mchod sdong ltar// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan// ra'i bu bston pa byas na ni// lus ni yod
376b7(rgyud): nams tshogs kyis bskyed// gang zhig lus ni 'bar ba dang // shin tu bzang po kho nar 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po dus rtag tu// phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad// rtag tu mchog ni sbyin pa dang / 
376b8(rgyud): kun tu blo med grub par 'gyur// cho ga zhing mo grub pa dang // gsang sngags 'grub cing phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor 'gyul cing dkyil 'khor gyi/ rim par phye ba 'grub 'gyur te/ kun tu 'grub pa bla
377a1(rgyud): // na med// ki'u wang dang / gur gum dang / ru rta cha snyams te sbyar la khro bo'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tshangs par spyod pa mnyam par bzhag
377a2(rgyud): pa/ khrus legs par byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos shing gtsang mas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe chu gtsang ma dang zhib tu btags la rgyab shug gi 'bru
377a3(rgyud): tsam byas te grib ma la bskams pa la/ gang gis tshe dgos pa rtsom pa de'i tshe// khro bo'i rgyal po'i lcags kyu la lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te smin mtsham su thi le bya'o// smin mtsham su
377a4(rgyud): thig le bzang po de bzhin shegs pa tha~Md kyi byin gyis brlab kyi byin gyis brlabs pa mtshan nyid bzhin du thig le byas te/ byin gyis brlabs pa byas pa'i mod de bzhin ga
377a5(rgyud): ba tha~Md kyi gtsug gtor gyi mtshan nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le dang / mnyam par mtshungs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// thad du mtsha da par bya ba dang / rtag tu bla ma la gus pas dam tshig
377a6(rgyud): mnyams pa dang / rgyal po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang / btsun mo'i nang du song na zad dga' bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur// sems can kun gus pa dang / dka' ba ji ltar
377a7(rgyud): 'jig rten pa la bya ba bzhin byed/ rang dang 'bru dang / lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur// lha zad kyis mchod par 'gyur/ dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten
377a8(rgyud): skyong ba grags chen dang / klu rnams kyis rtag tu mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyuraro// nod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
377b1(rgyud): kyis rtag tu mchod pa chen por 'gyur// dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe 'phel bar 'gyuraro// nad med pa dang / rims nad med pa dang / sdig pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sgrib pa thaMd las/ 
377b2(rgyud): rnam par grol ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang / sdig pa dang / dgra tha~Md rab tu 'joms pa dang / dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar sbyin par 'gyur// dgra dang / phyir tshul
377b3(rgyud): ba rnams las gnas thams cad du rtag tu kun tu rgyal ba chen po sbyin par 'gyuraro// thig le de lta bu byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu lan gcig dran par byas la yungs kar la lan gcig bzlas brjod/ 
377b4(rgyud): byas te phug gi sgor gtor na phug thaMd sgo gdangs par 'gyu'o// ji ltar dga' bar 'jug par 'gyuraro// lan gsum zhugs kyi bar du sgo / na 'jug pa'i gnasu khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ab shig
377b5(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i tshe lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgya na ba bzang zhing mdzes pa blta bar 'os pa/ mchog tu mdo' sngur cing 'breg pa dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis bzhin tu dpa'
377b6(rgyud): zhing 'bar gangazhin 'dzum pa/ lus ngo tsha ldang byed pa/ 'gros 'gying 'og tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rgyu ba yid tsam btud nas gser gyi rin po ches bkang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la 'bul bar byed
377b7(rgyud): do// rig sngags 'chang bas cang mi smra bar bya'o// rin po che'i snod kyang blang bar mi bya'o// gsang sngags 'ba' shig dran par bya zhing / yungs kar gyi brdeg na gzhon nu ma la brdeg par bya'o// ji ste mi sdug pa
377b8(rgyud): 'byin cing bzhin bsgyur ba khro ba'i gzugs mchu 'phyang ga mche ba gcig pa/ sla ral pa ser ba gyen du brdzes la ral pacod pan gyi brgyan par ston na rig sngags 'chang bas skrag par mi bya'o// 
378a1(rgyud): / tra ba'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig dran par bya'o// yang yungs kar gyis mdo'i spyi bor brdeg cing khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/ de'i tshe des la 'gyel te/ 'dre ldog cing kye rig sngag
378a2(rgyud): 'chang thugs rje can khyod rig sngags 'chang khyab 'jug gi gzugs can gum bum mo zhes sgra 'byin to// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas rje su brtags te gal te/  chu ngaru bar 'byung na/ rig sngags
378a3(rgyud): 'chang bas de blangs la rkang pa dang byin pa bskus na rlung gi phung po bdun pa'i rlung la zhon te namakhal 'gro bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang
378a4(rgyud): ba'i 'khor brgya phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgus byar 'gyuraro// skad cig tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' sang zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyuraro// gal te reg na ni skyes
378a5(rgyud): nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra zhing sgra yid tsam 'dril zhing 'dril ga rnam gdu bu dri ma med cing spen to// 'phyang ba dang / 'khrig ma gdu bus brgyan pa/ lus pad+ma 'dra zhing
378a6(rgyud): dkar sham du 'gyuraro// tshe bskal pa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur// 
378a7(rgyud): gnas thams cad du dpon por 'gyur// gal te thig le byas te mi snang bar gyur na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po tha~Md kyi khyim sgo phye ste 'dug par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
378a8(rgyud): 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes dbang du 'gyur zhing bka' bzhin du 'jug/ mngags pa'i dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur// khyim thad du re rer yang
378b1(rgyud): dpon po dang / dga' bzhin byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyuro// gal te mchog mar thig le byas na brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris bdag po'i lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris
378b2(rgyud): kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa tha~Md kyi mchod par 'gyur te rig sngags 'chang ba la bya ba thams cad kyi bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang / lhan cig tu rtsa
378b3(rgyud): dga' kun tu spyod par 'gyuraro// tshe lha'i lo stong legs par thub par 'gyuraro// lte ba'i gan su thig le byas te klu mtshor zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas chung
378b4(rgyud): ma dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma 'am/ thams cad du mdun na 'dug cing 'di skad ces smras te/ rig sngags 'chang ba bka' stsal cig dang / las bgyi ba dang / dgos pa zad bgyi zhing nam 'tsho'i
378b5(rgyud): bar du nye bar gnas par bgyi'o// yo byad thaMd kyis ma~M brel bar sgrub par bgyi'o// klu'i lha'i longs spyod mchog tu mangs spyad pas brtse bar bgyi'o// lha'i lo stong gi bar du rje su gnas par
378b6(rgyud): bgyi'o// nor thed rjesu stsal bar brgya'o// rin po che sna tshogs gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / in dra nI la dang / 
378b7(rgyud): ma ra ka ta dang / pad+ma ra ka dang / baiDUR+Ya dang / shin tu bzang po rnamasu sbal bar 'gyi'o// lha rdzas kyi bza' ba mchog dang / lha rdzas kyi nor gyi phung pos bang mdzod rnams rab tu dgang bar gyis/ 
378b8(rgyud): shin tu char ches pa bcad par bgyi'o// char dkon pa na char dba' bar brgya'o// dus ma yin pa'i char bcad par brgya'o// ngasu char dbab pa dang / dus char pa'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyi'o// lha rdzas/ 
379a1(rgyud): / kyi me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// nam 'tsho'i bar du gnas te bsnyen bkur brgya'o// rig sngags 'chang rkang pa skyibs blang ba
379a2(rgyud): byar/ rig sngags 'chang ba de'i tshe tshig dang / bsam pa rjesu bsnang bar bgyi'o// dpung pa gnyis kyi bar du thig le byas na glang po che stong gi stobs yod par 'gyur te/ phyir rgol dang / gra za
379a3(rgyud): kyi stobs kyi mithub par 'gyur// 'thab cing dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad kyi nang du pha rol gnon pa'i stobs thogs pa med par rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyuraro// lha ma yin kun las
379a4(rgyud): kyang rgyal bar 'gyuraro// lha thams cad du 'di la srung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i phyir rtag tu na 'bring du 'brang bar 'gyur// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / dngogs 'byin pa dang / 
379a5(rgyud): mtshang 'dru ba dang / g.yul 'byed pa thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur// lto bar thig le byas te/ phra ba'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags lan cig dran par byas la yid la ji
379a6(rgyud): lngar bsams pa ji bzhin byas na ci 'dod pa'i kha zas thob par 'gyur te/ 'khor nyi shu dang bcas pas ji ltar 'dzang pa thob par 'gyur/ sker thig le byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu
379a7(rgyud): nore lan cig bzlas brjod byed cing rgyal ba'i pho brang du song na ji tsam 'dod pa'i gos dang / sdud pa dang / rgyan thob par 'gyur// rtag tu rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas
379a8(rgyud): bas mchod par 'os pa'i mchog tu 'gyuraro// dbang byud chen po 'i chen pa thob par grub par 'gyur/ lag mthil du thig la byas te lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na gang la rag pa/ 
379b1(rgyud): de dbang du 'gyuraro// deng 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin zhing bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'bru ro// lag pa g.yas pa la bskus la lan gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ grong khyer gyi sgo la brdabs mthong
379b2(rgyud): khyer na gnad sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ mdun na gnas shing de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyuraro// grong de na skye bo gang dag gnas pa bud med dang / skyes pa dang / 
379b3(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo de thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ mdun na gnas shing ji srid grong khyer der 'dug par 'od pas de srid du thams cad ci bya ba thams cad byed cing gnas pa dang mdun na 'dug par
379b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// lag pa g.yon pa la bskus te rgyal po'i sgo la brdabs na ji srid 'dug par 'dod na de srid du thams cad dbang du gyur pa sbyin par 'gyuraro// lag pa g.yas pa la bskus
379b5(rgyud): zhing lan gcig bzlas brjod bya ste/ phug gigs ba'i sgra la brdab pa byas na gsang ba'i khyim thams cad sgo phye ster drug cing khyim na gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ 
379b6(rgyud): 'dug go// rkang pa gnyis la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan gcig dran par byas te dur khrod du song na dur khrod na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung ba dang / sha za thams cad mdun
379b7(rgyud): na gnas shing dbang du 'gyur ba dang / khyim byi sgo thams cad phye ba dang / thams cad bya bo ci yod pa byed par 'gyuro// brla gnyis la bskus te nags tshal gyi nang du zhugs na zhugs pa tsam
379b8(rgyud): byib khyim na gnas pa thams cad mdun na gnas shing khyim gyi rna thams cad bye ste 'dug par 'gyur// sman gyi rdzas thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing 'al ba'i sman dang / rtswa dang mtha
380a1(rgyud): / rdzogs kyi nags tshal gyi rang ni ba thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa zang ba bzhin du mdun na 'dug par 'gyur// dpal lha mo chen mo'i nub ma'i bar du bsku zhing dris pa
380a2(rgyud): gsang sngags lan gcig bzlos brjod byas shing gu gul la bzlas brjod byas te 'dug pa dbul zhing mig mi 'dzums par bltas na dpal lha mo chen mo bka' stsol cing mchog thams cad
380a3(rgyud): sbyin par byed do// naru shin tu mang ba rnyed pa smin par mdzad do// dpal lha mo chen mo rtag tu khyim na gnas par 'gyur// yo byad rnams thams cad kyis sangs sbyong bar 'gyur ro// nam 'chi
380a4(rgyud): bar du bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// mi'i 'o ma dang // lhan gcig tu bdang la lan gcig bzlas brjod byas te mig la bskus na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyuraro// mtshan mo yang nyin
380a5(rgyud): bar bzhin mthong bar 'gyur// mchu'i mthor to/ pa thig le bya zhing lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na gang la smra ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa de thams cad thob
380a6(rgyud): bar 'gyu ro// tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyuraro// kha nas ud pa la'i dri mnam par 'gyu ro// gdon la thig le byas na zin pa dang / ma zin pa 'bab par 'gyu ro// gdon thams cad la thig
380a7(rgyud): khe byas zhing lan gcig gsang sngags dran par byas na mod la tshangs pa'i srin po la sogs pa'i bar du thams cad du zhing 'bros par 'gyur// thig le tsam dang dran pa tsam gyis thaMd las
380a8(rgyud): yongasu thar par 'gyuraro// 'jig pa thams cad la thig le byas na yongasu zar par 'gyuraro// phrag pa gnyis la thig le bya zhing khro ba lan gcig dran par byas na phrag pa gnyis 'bar bar 'gyud/ 
380b1(rgyud): mtshal dang sbyar te dri chab dang bsres nas lag pa dang rkang pa la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas nas phu zhes byas na me 'bar bar 'gyur te ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du 'bar ba 'byung
380b2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// mchu la bsku zhing bzlas brjod byas na dbugs rgyu ba rnams me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur// lus mtha' dag bsdu zhing gsang sngags mang du bzlas brjod byas na lus mtha' dag 'aH
380b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// chu dang / nyungs kar gyis bskrad nas bum pa dang / bum pa la zhi ba'i thig le byas te/ dri nus steng du gtong ba dang bcas pa byas na phyir yang gnas par 'gyur// ras gri dang / 
380b4(rgyud): btun shing dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / rdo rje dang / zo ba dang / mda' jom dang / gdung la sku zhing rje su dran par byas na skad cig du zad
380b5(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyuraro// lhung bzed la bskus na 'bar bar 'gyuraro// mgo la bskus na skra 'bar bar 'gyur// dung la bskus te gnas rma thun po ro bus na sgo thos pa tsam gyis
380b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi khro ba thams cad dang // sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// ngan pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// sprin mgasu bus na rlung sprin dang / seng ba
380b7(rgyud): thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir bus na byung dang gnod pa thams cad dang / mo nyes dang / nad ma rungs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / 
380b8(rgyud): mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// 'thung ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin bu dang / sha ba dang / yi dgas dang / skem byed dang / gril gnon gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung
381a1(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / byad dang / sbrad gtong dang / dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu thar
381a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// rgyal po'i sgor bus na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa thams cad dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yong 'byung bar
381a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// ba lang gi 'chi ba dang / phyugs 'chi ba dang / mi 'chi ba dang / rta 'chi ba dang / glang po che 'chi ba dang / rnga mo 'chi ba dang / b+hur dang / pho nyes dang / nad dang / mig nad dang / nad thams cad kyi 'jigs pa chen po
381a4(rgyud): 'byung ba la khang pa'i steng du skad drag po lan gcig dung bud cing bzlas brjod byas na bus pa tsam gyis mod la thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// char mi 'bab pa'i tshe klu'i gnas 'tsho 'gram du dus
381a5(rgyud): na mod la klu'i rgyal po rnams char pa'i rgyun gtong bar 'gyu/ ra ches pa'i tshe sprin log su bus na shin tu mar che ba zhi bar 'gyu ro// lan 'ga' yang mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi
381a6(rgyud): shis pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ mtshams chen pa bcad na ri mthon po'i khar bus te/ ji tsam du sgra thos pa de tsam du tshun chad mtshams che na po bcad pa byas par 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khong mtshams
381a7(rgyud): bcad na bskor zhing bus na dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bcad par byas par 'gyur// de nas khra bo'i rgyal po'i sbyin sreg ni cho ga sgrub pa bla na med pa thams cad bya ba la sems can thams cad zhi bar bya ba
381a8(rgyud): lanas dang nyungs kang mang dang bsres la shing arga'i ma bus te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis dpag chad kyi nang kun tu zhi ba tshon par 'gyur/ lams kyi nad kyi gnod pa da/ 
381b1(rgyud): dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad kun tu zhi ba chen po'i las byas par 'gyur// rgyas pa byas na/ 
381b2(rgyud): yungs kar dang / 'bras sa lu dang / khar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres te / sbyin sreg bya ba ni lan bdun sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyuraro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na/ 
381b3(rgyud): dpag tshad brgya tshun chad rgyas pa chen por 'gyur// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya stong kun tu rgyas pa chen par 'gyur// shing dri mi zhim pa'i ma bus te/ 'bras kyi phub ma dang / lan tshwa dang / 
381b4(rgyud): yungs kar mar dang bsres ted shing tsher ma can gyi yam sregs ni nga gi me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun nam/ nyid shu rtsa gcig gsakha cu rtsa brgyad byas na yid la ji ltar sems shing 'ad
381b5(rgyud): pa thams cad du mngon spyod kyi las rnams byed par 'gyuraro// gsang sdug sa grub par byed na 'bras yos dang / nyungs kar dang / zho dang / snang rtsi rnam sa mar dang sbyar te/ shing arga'i yam sreg shing gi me
381b6(rgyud): sdang de sbyin sreg lan bdun byas na rang gi rnga bo'i gsang sngags sgrib pa 'grub par 'gyuraro// lan bcu bzhi byas na don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub par 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg byas
381b7(rgyud): nadon yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'grub par 'gyur// lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi spyi grub par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
381b8(rgyud): pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang /  rje rigs rnams// gzhan yang khra ba chen pa stong phrag ba rgya mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur/ til dang / 'bras so pa dang / na dang / sdang rtsi dang ya
382a1(rgyud): // rnams sbyar te/ chang pa bdun sbyin sreg byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha thams cad lnga'i tshigs dang bcas pa yang dang
382a2(rgyud): zhing rig sngags 'chang ba la bsnyen bkur byed cing dbang du 'gyur// nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa la 'dud par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dbang du byas
382a3(rgyud): na 'bras sa lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang // zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang bsred te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyuro// klu
382a4(rgyud): char 'bebs par byas na 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / nA ga puSh+pa dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na klu rnams char pa'i rgyun chen
382a5(rgyud): 'bebs par 'gyur // ji tsa ma 'dod par chad pa'i rgyun gtong zhing 'bebs// shin tu nang che ba bcad na de nyid kyi thal ba namakha' la gtong na shin tu chad che ba bcad par 'gyur/ 
382a6(rgyud): pha rol gyi g.yul bzlog par 'dod na ske tshe'i 'bru dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsreg bya'o// thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed cing 'tshang 'dru ba zad
382a7(rgyud): la sI yang ku'i me tog dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mang dang sbyar te/ lan nyid su rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur// 'thab brtsod dang 'gyed pa rnams kyi smra ba'i lan thabs
382a8(rgyud): par 'gyur// nad thams cad zhi bar bya ba la sran ku lan tha dad na dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mang dang sbyar te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// bud med dbang du byas na/ 
382b1(rgyud): / sum na'i me tog gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin srab byas na bud med thams cad mchog tu dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yon zhing thams cad du mchog grub par 'gyur/ de nas sdig pa thams cad rnams par spyad
382b2(rgyud): bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang ba de 'bras sa lu dang / til dang / yungs kang dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na sdig pa dang sgrib pa tha~Md rnam
382b3(rgyud): par dag par 'gyur// 'on to khro ba'i rgyal po sgrub par 'dod na seng ldeng gi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / bu gul rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du khro bo'i gsang sngags grub pa chen tha
382b4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur zhing dri bo'i gsang sngags thams cad spyan drangs par 'gyur// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam pa nyi shu lnga pardze gas+ho// de nas hUM
382b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba dran pas zla bo'i rgyal po gshegs pa ra 'gyur// las 'grub pa ston pa dang / mthong ba sbyin pa dang / 'ad dpa'i mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin par 'gyuraro// 'on te 'phags
382b6(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / khro bo'i rgyal po spyan drang bar 'dod na/ shing su ra bis me sbar la/ 'bras yos dang / pad+ma dang ud pa la dang / yungs kar dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang
382b7(rgyud): sbyar to nga rgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// ga sngags 'chang bas khrus legs par bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po'i
382b8(rgyud): sku mdun na bzhugs shing rig sngags 'chang ba dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// mchog gang 'dod cing gsol ba'i mchog de thaMng sbyin par mdzad// phyag g.yas pa mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jogs par
383a1(rgyud): // mdzad do// gal te bskal pa chung ba zhes ste mngon du zhal mi mthong na de'i tshe rmi lam du bstan te thams cad bka' stsol cing ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog sbyin te/ gsang sngags grub pa chen po dang / 
383a2(rgyud): cho ga zhing mo grub pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba grub par sbyin no// dam tshig grub pa chen po rab tu ston to// dbang phyug thob par byas na/ 'bras so bstA ra sa dang // zho dang sbrang rtsi
383a3(rgyud): rnams mar dang snang te sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyugs sor thob par 'gyur/ khrong thob par byas na/ tan tu li ya kha dang zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan bergya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas
383a4(rgyud): na grong thob par 'gyuraro// yul gyi bdag por bya na 'a bras sa lu dang ras bal sa bon rnams dang bsres te brgya rtsa brgya da sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyuraro// mi snang bar byas na/ ske tshe
383a5(rgyud): dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o// mkha' la 'gro bar byas na shA ta bad tri ka'i me tog gi sbyin sreg bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong bar bya na/ shi li dang tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / du ru ka rnams kyil
383a6(rgyud): dang sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang ba mthong bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba legaso legs zhes gsungs
383a7(rgyud): ning dbugs 'byin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis mgo'i spyi bor phyag 'jog cing mchog grub pa chen po sgrol bar mdzad do// thams cad du mchod pa 'os par chen por
383a8(rgyud): 'gyur// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su bskal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyuraro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten kun gyi bla mar 'gyuraro// dgra thams cad gzhom par 'dod na lpa/ 
383b1(rgyud): ma grugs pas sbyin sreg bya'o// ter bsgul na de nas doran yod pa chen po'i spyan brjod par bya ste/ jo bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma'i dngos grub bla na med pa/ bklags pas grub pa so sor
383b2(rgyud): bstan pa'i dngos grub bla med pa/ grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa lhur len pa bde bskyed pa la mkhas pa rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid/ de bzhin
383b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kha na nyid mchog tu gsang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ ngog su zhugs pa rnams kyi rab tu sgrub pa/ dad pa'i rje su 'brang
383b4(rgyud): rnams rnam par sel gdon gyi stegs mchog tu grub pa/ mal cha dang gtan med pa rnams kyi gos sems can thams cad kyi mchod par bya ba chen po// thams cad lus las thed legs
383b5(rgyud): par grub pa/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad la phrog pa/ bdug pa thams cad 'joms pa rgyal po mnyes pa ra byed pa/ rnam par thar pa dang dul ba'i grong khyer nyid de/ dge
383b6(rgyud): bsnyen rnams kyi mchog tu skyid pa/ dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i yon tan rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa grub pa rnams gtsang ma gtsang
383b7(rgyud): spar spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ bza' ba mchog shin tu gsang ba dang / 'ag yod cing 'den par smra ba/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu dad pa/ bla ma la gus pa/ rtag par rgyun tu
383b8(rgyud): byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa/ sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba'i yid can/ 'byung po thed la brtse ba'i sems dang byams pas bla
384a1(rgyud): / bla na med pa'i sgrub pa 'di bya'o// bslab pa dang sdom pa blangs pa/ don yod pa chen pa'i sgyu ma bla na med pa ni 'da'/ gi wang dang s+thi ka dang / pu shel rtse dang / tsan dan dang ldong ras dang / 
384a2(rgyud): shing kun dang / spang spos dang / na la da dang / ru ta dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin du 'bras dgang te 'di rnams thams cad ma mnyam ste/ phye mar byas nas thams cad zhib mor btags la/ ga pur
384a3(rgyud): dang / gla rtsis dgos te/ sdigs ma 'di dag tsha ba'i til mar gyis brtsos gnye'u shing dang / ba'i lci ba dang / me tog brgya pa dang / puSh+ka ra dang / b+han+na pri yang gu dang / rgya spos dang / sa mu sta dang / pra puH
384a4(rgyud): rI ka dang / shing mngar rnams chu bre bdun gang bar spyi na par bya ste drug chu lhag mar lus pa dang / snyigs ma bre gang dang 'o mra'i snyigs ma bor te/ til mar srang gnyis la rtag tu brtso bar bya'o// 
384a5(rgyud): legs par grub pa'i gsang sngags bzlas badz+ra da byas la gtong ma dang / dkyil 'khor du me tog dang / dri bza/ nga bo'i 'dug pa dang / til mar brtse ba'i cho ga bzhin du rab tu
384a6(rgyud): sbyar ba dang las grub pa khyad par du bskyed cing babs pa'i til mar byas pa srung ba'i cho ga bya ste/ gnod gtsang ma bkang nas slar yang gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod byas nas
384a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i gnasu bzhag par bya'o// de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug ste/ rig sngags 'chang khrus legs par byas pa/ dris bsgos pa'i til mar rtag tu lus la rgyags pa 'dis/ lus dem
384a8(rgyud): sdang zhing dngos po med par ston par byed do// ngag thos la reg par mi byed do// gang gis lus khrus ma byas kyi bar de srid du bdag nyid mi snang ste lus mi mthong ngo // dpral bar thig le byas nas/ lan
384b1(rgyud): / l-ig dang nying lag rnams la reg te/ gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na na mkha' la 'gyur te/ skad cig la dka' bar byed pa dang / lha dang bcas pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mkha' la spyod pa
384b2(rgyud): rnams kyis lhan gcig tu til mar mgo la byugs pas mdog sngo ba dang sgra cung zad li zhing 'khyil bar 'gyuraro// tig+ta mar grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mnga' bdag
384b3(rgyud): tu 'gyur// reg pa tsam gyis tshe bskal pa dz+ra thub par 'gyur// lus pad+ma dkar sham lta bur 'gyuraro// lus rdo rje ltar bsun pa dang / gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye te 'dug go// gang du 'dod par 'jug par
384b4(rgyud): byed do// dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i dusu rig sngags la chang la thig le byas nas lag du rdo rje dang nor bu byas na/ na mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ mod la dkyil 'khor grub pa ston par byed do// 
384b5(rgyud): til mar gyis rkang pa la byugs na/ na mkha' la' nga bang byed// lus la byugs na/ mi snang bar ston par byed do// mtshal dang til mar lhan cig sbyar te/ yan lag dang / nying lag la
384b6(rgyud): thig le byad na/ lus 'bar ba'i snying po mthong bar byed do// 'di dag rig sngags 'chang gi rnam 'phrul so sor bstan pa'o// yungs kar la bzlas te/ lan cig bskus sam/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
384b7(rgyud): gtar na/ dkyil 'khor g.yo bar 'gyur te/ 'khor lo bzhin du bskor bar byed do// gtor ma'i snod gang ba rnams dang / bum pa rnams sor mo brgyad kyi tshad du na mkha' la phags te/ 'du'o// rang nyid sa
384b8(rgyud): gal gyi sgras yongasu 'don byed na/ slar yang snad na mkha' la 'phags te/ 'dug pa rang rang gi gnas par 'gyur// 'di rnams dkyil 'khor dgos pa bla na med pa'i dngos grub bo// de nas seng+ge'i khrag dang / 
385a1(rgyud): // til mar lhan cig sbyar te/ bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs na/ mi yi seng+ge chen pa'i gzugasu mthong bar 'gyur te/ ji srid lus khrus ma byas pa de srid du mi'i seng+ger kun tu gnas
385a2(rgyud): so// gzhan yang ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du// na mkha' la 'phags te 'dug pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / me 'bar ba ston par byed// phag gi khrag dang sbyar na phag gi gzug su ston par byed
385a3(rgyud): shugs dang stobs chen por ston par byed// glang po che'i khrag dang sbyang bas tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugasu ston par byed do// rta'i khrag dang sngon po lhan cig sbyar ba lus la n+ya
385a4(rgyud): pa tsam gyis rta mgrin gyis gzugasu snyan par byed/ de ji srid khrus ma byas pa de srid du mthong bar byed do// ba lang gi mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na khyu mchog chen po la zhon
385a5(rgyud): bar mthong bar 'gyur// nya'i mkhris pa dang lhan cig spyan na klu'i rgyal po nu bdag chen po'i gzugasu maHnga bar 'gyuraro// sbrul dmar po'i khrag dang bsres nas sbyar na sdug
385a6(rgyud): chen po gzugasu mthong bar 'gyur// ra'i khrag dang bsros pas/  mtshan po'i gzug su mthong bar 'gyur// pad ma'i lo ma dang / phye ma dang / rtsa ba dang / bcas pa dang // mdab ma dang / me ga
385a7(rgyud): dang sdong bu dang bcas pa til mar gyi lhan cig sbyar bas yungs kang la bskus te lus la byugs la til mar gyi thig le byas// mkhas pas yan lag dang nying lag la byug pa byas na/ rgyal/ 
385a8(rgyud): po chen po'i cha lug su mthong bang 'gyur te/ mi mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas yongasu bskor bas dgos pa sna tshogs dang / rgyal ba'i dgos pa rnams byed par 'gyur// yid la bsam
385b1(rgyud): ba'i dgas pa thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyug/ sdang ras kyi mig sman dang lhan cig bsres nas mig la byugs na/ labar chen pa'i dbusu spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gi rngug sus
385b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas te yungs kang de na mkha' la gtor na/ 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char 'bab par mthong bar 'gyuraro// pad+ma'i snying pos sbyar na/ pad+ma chen po'i mar 'byung bar 'gyur
385b3(rgyud): ud pa la sngon po'i khu bas sbyor na/ ut+pa la sngon po chen po'i char 'byung ba mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar me tog gi khu bas sbyar ba de lta de ltar me tog gi char chen po 'byung bar
385b4(rgyud): 'gyur// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyib su mthong bar 'dod pa de lha de ltar lha'i nyim mang snying pa dang lhan cig sbyar nas/ de lta
385b5(rgyud): de ltar de dang de nyid kyi gzugasu mthang bar 'a gyuraro// gzhal yas khang yang mthong bar 'gyur// lag pa sa nor bu gcig blangs te/ yid la rje su dran par byas na/ 
385b6(rgyud): ba sna tshogs pa du ma'i bdag nyid du mthong bar 'gyur// gos dang rgyan sna tshogs pa rnams bston par byed do// lag pas snod la gzung na/ snod sna tshogs pa bton par byed do// 
385b7(rgyud): lag pas bum pa la bzung na/ bum pa brgya stong phrag ston par bye'o// rkang pa'i mthil la bskus na/ gang du rdo ba la rkang pa gzhag pa de dang de nyid du rkang pa'i rjes 'jog par byed de/ 
385b8(rgyud): mar gsar la nye bar 'jog pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ mar gsar mnyen pa bzhin du rdo ba yang 'dra bar 'gyur// gtud shin la byugs na/ rtags 'byung bar 'gyur// ma mo'i dkyil 'tsha
386a1(rgyud): // gyi gnas su zhugs na/ ma mo'i lha rnams kyi sa so tha dad pa'i rdul gzung te til mar dang lhan cig sbyar nas sa sa'i gdang la byug na/ lha de dang de lta bu'i gzugasu stan
386a2(rgyud): par byed do// gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i blos las bya'o// de nas blo 'phel bar byed pa ni/ til mar dang / 'o ma lhan cig zos na blo dang dran pa chen po phel
386a3(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// nub gsum gyi sbyor bas tshigasu bcad pa stong klog par byed cing 'dzin par byedado// zhag 'dun gyi sbyor bas blo gros rgya mtsho chen po lta bu 'phel bar byed cing sogs par byed do// zhag
386a4(rgyud): bcu bzhi'i sbyor bas tshe lha'i lo stong du 'gyuraro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sbyor bas/ bcud len sgrub pa'i dngos grub la byung bar 'gyur te/ gnyer ma dang / skra dkar spangs pa dang / skra chung
386a5(rgyud): zad 'khyil bar 'gyur// lus 'jam zhing mnyen ba dang / pad+ma'i kha dog dang 'dra bar 'gyur// skyes nas la du len pa dang 'dra bar gzugs dang lang mtsho dang ldan par 'gyur
386a6(rgyud): glang po che stong phrag bcu'i stobasu 'gyur// zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi sbyor bas glang po che sa srung gi stob su 'gyur// zhag sum cu so lnga'i sbyor bas na mkha' lding chen po'i stobasu 'gyur// ga
386a7(rgyud): bzhi bcurtsa gnyis kyi sbyar bas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang 'dra bar brtson 'grus dang stobs chen por 'gyur// zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i sbyar bas ri rab lhun pa chen po'i
386a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos yongasu bskor ba/ mi g.yo zhing mi sgul/ reg par bya ba ma yin zhing mi mthong ba/ mi ma yin pa rnams kun tu/ 
386b1(rgyud): spyod pa/ lha rnams thams cad kyi phyag byas shing / phyag bya ba'i 'osu gyur pa/ drang srong rnams kyi stod pa'i 'osu gyur pa// gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyi phyag bya ba'i 'osu gyur pa/ de bzhin
386b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rab tu bsngags pa'i 'osu gyur pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i dbang po
386b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig grub pa/ lnga'i dbang po rnams kyi lhan cig 'gran pa'i 'osu gyur pa/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi mngon du smra ba'i 'asu gyur
386b4(rgyud): klu'i dbang po thams cad kyi nye bar smod par bya ba ste/ de ltar don yod pa'i lcags rgyur khro bo'i rnam pa nga 'phrul pa zhes bya ba til mar gyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul
386b5(rgyud): pa yon tan chen po rmad du byung ba brgya stong phra ga gis gang pa'o// til mar gyi rgyal po'i rig sngags 'chang 'dis/ til mar gyi rgyal po ral gri la byugs na byugs pa tsam
386b6(rgyud): gyis ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ ral gri'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje la byugs na rdo rje
386b7(rgyud): 'bang bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba na mkha' la 'gro zhing / rdo rje rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// 'khor lo la byugs na 'khor lo 'bar
386b8(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyu ro// blta na sdug pa'i 'khor mo'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar mod la 'gyuraro// dgra tha~Md rab tu 'jom so// mdung rtsa
387a1(rgyud): / pa la byugs na 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khang las bsgyung bar 'gyur te/ na mkha' la gnas par byed do// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa
387a2(rgyud): dbang phyug chen pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / me dpal dang / shu ba dang / mdze dang / rkang shu dang / rtsa'i rma dang / mgul ba la 'gags pa dang / 
387a3(rgyud): rna ba'i rtsa nad dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang rmu chu dang / sman dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa nyid la yang / mkhas pas chu dron mo 'thungs pa tsam dang / byugs
387a4(rgyud): pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sel lo// la mar gyis nad thams cad sel ba de bzhin du/ rtsibs logs na ba dang / tshad pa dang / snying na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / 
387a5(rgyud): bshang ba 'khyim pa dang / pho ba'i nad nyes pa de rnams thams cad 'thungs pa tsam gyis rnam bar 'jig par the tshom medo// nyams pa dang / zad pa dang / 
387a6(rgyud): de bzhin du rgyal po'i dpal bcom pa dang / gsos spyad ngan pa rnams bskus pa tsam mam zos pa tsam gyis stobs dang ldan par 'gyuraro// lus rnams rgyas pa dang / mgu ba
387a7(rgyud): dang spro ba chen por 'gyuraro// gdon rnam pa sna tshogs par gsung ba dang / brjed byed mi bzad pa la yang reg pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par the tsom medo/ khyad
387a8(rgyud): mi bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / dug dang / sbyar dug nyid kyang reg pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par 'gyuraro// brtan pa dang / g.yo ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / mche ba 'am/ sbrul
387b1(rgyud): go Nas dang / sdig pa yang rung / srin bu dang / phye ma leb gdug pa 'am/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang / 'jog po 'am/ sbrul gyis mthong ba'i dug gam/ dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin
387b2(rgyud): pa dang / reg pa'i dug gang yin pa dang / hA lA ha lA'i dug gang yin pa dang / gzhan da ra da'i dug gang yin pa dang / rtsa ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / sdong bu'i dug dang / 
387b3(rgyud): 'dab ma'i dug dang / me tog gi dug dang / mdangs kyi gang yin pa dang / gzhan dug rnam pa sna tshogs pa de rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// tin mar la rig pa tsam
387b4(rgyud): gyis las mchog dang / lam gol bar song ba rnams dang rgyal po'i sgo drung du song ba yang rung / bsad par 'as par gyur gyur pa gang yin pa dang / babade par gyur pa dang yin pa
387b5(rgyud): dang / 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'byed pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang dgra'i gzeb dang / pha rol gyi dmag chog sa kyi 'jigs pa nyid dang / mi mdza' ba dang / phyir rlom pa gang yin pa
387b6(rgyud): yang til mar 'di mngon par sbyar bas skad cig de la thams cad 'jom so// rgyal po khros pa gang yin pa 'dzum bzhin du bka' stsal to// g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du 'am/ phan tshun mtha' bzhin pa zad
387b7(rgyud): la ti la mar rgyal po bla na med pas rtag tu rgyal ba gter ro// mkhas pas mig la byugs na/ mi thub cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// gzhan gyis kyang dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ 
387b8(rgyud): dngos grub gnas thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas khro bo'i lcags kyu bla na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad sel gsod la gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed gnad thams cad rab tu zhi bar
388a1(rgyud): / byed pa/ sod pa thams cad du grub pa bla na med pa nad thams cad zhi gde kho na nyid zla ba lcags kyu bla na med pa'i ras ris kyi sku gzugs brjod par bya ste/ sa ris kyi sku gzugs bla mamed
388a2(rgyud): pa 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po thob pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / rig pa'i gnas thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin
388a3(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mthong ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang // zhes bya
388a4(rgyud): ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi spyan sngar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang karas ris kyi sku gzugs gang yin pa
388a5(rgyud): 'di mthong ba tsam gyis mod la/ mthas klas pa tsam dang 'di mtshungs par 'gyur te/ 'di dang mtshungs pa'i bsod na mas kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuraro// de bzhin pa
388a6(rgyud): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis dgos par 'gyuraro/ ras gru bzhi pa gru bzhir cha mnyam pa/ shin tu thags bzang ba/ shin tu gsar gshin tu 'jam pa mcho
388a7(rgyud): tu mdzes pa/ khru gnyis pa'i tshad 'a tshar ma bcad pa/ sgra dang bral ba 'am/ yang na dang gtsang ma gru bzhi shin tu rnam par 'byes pa la/  mo khan gtsang ma sbyang bar gnas pas/ lhag ma ma yin pa
388a8(rgyud): tshon snod gsang bar bzhag la/ tshon sna tshogs rnam par 'phyes pas// 'phags pa dan yad zhugs pa'i khro bo lcags kyu bri bar bya'o// pags paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bzhi gzhas dang po ni na
388b1(rgyud): / zhig spyan gsum ga ras pa'i cod pan gyis rgyan ga/ 'od dpag med cod pan du 'chang ba/ zla bas nye bar mdzes pa/ phyag bzhi pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ g.yas pa'i zhal drag po'i gzugs can
388b2(rgyud): 'jigs par byed pa/ choms kyis ma mchu mnan pa/ dbu skra 'khyil gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis rtun pa/ g.yon pa drag po chen po mche ba gtsugs ga/ zhal rnam par 'gyur gdabu skra
388b3(rgyud): 'khyil zhing gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa kun tu bcings pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ drag tu bzhad pa'o// zhi ba'i zhal ral pa'i cod pan gyi rgyan pa'i steng du/ sku phyed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'bar ba'i
388b4(rgyud): snying bar chud pa bya ste/ sku ud pa la sngon pa'i la dog can dbu sgra dmar ba cung zad 'khyil ga/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan tsas rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis kyi gcin
388b5(rgyud): ba na / zhalan pas khra ba chen pa drag pa drug tu nad pa gzugs can dan yad pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// g.yas pa dbugs 'byin pa'i rin pa ma chen pa'i chang 'thengs pa phyag thams cad 'ang
388b6(rgyud): rnying pa 'od ze 'a dag snga chags pa byaste/ bang+gA'i bdan la skyil ma krung gis 'azhugs pa bya'o// rgya mtsho'i rnying par nga rabal gnas gcu'i rgyal pa dga' 'a dang rtse dga' bas kris pa bya 2
388b7(rgyud): du shini dang / nang bu na pa ma sna tshogs kyi dadris pa rdza dang / ud pa la dang krimu dang / ng+ga ga bas la du 'am gang ba dang / bshad dang rung ba dang / gang shang ta bus rgyab ba rgya'o// 
389a1(rgyud): log su lha mo sgrol ma/ dadu cung zad dud gathal mo sbyar ba 'chang ga rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o// dkar sham chen mo thal mo sbyar ba te bcung zad dud pa/ rgya
389a2(rgyud): thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o// srin mo chen mo ral pa gcig ma khrag 'dzag pa'i thod pa dang / drag mo drag tu rgod pa bya ste/ 'bar ba'i snying por khro bo lcags kyu la lta bzhin
389a3(rgyud): galag pa bzhi pa/ lag na rab bri dang / dpra sta dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bya'o// g.yan phyog su gnad sbyin gyi dbang po bya ste/ zhal khro gnyer can drag po// 
389a4(rgyud): dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ 'jigs par byed pa/ 'ang ra ba'i snying por dbus mo g.yas pa gtsugs pa/ ral gri dang / dgra sta thogs pa/ phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis rnam
389a5(rgyud): par brgyan pa/ rje lo'i rgyal po lcags kyu la nges par lta bzhin pa/ khor khor yug tu 'od 'dom gang pa/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba bya'o// lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i char khang yug ni steng du yas
389a6(rgyud): ba dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan pa bya ste/ me to sna tshogs kyi phung ma thogs te/ mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o// phra ba'i rgyal ba don yang lcags kyu'i rgyab tu/ rin pa
389a7(rgyud): me sna bdun las chung ba'i shing ldan pa bya ste/ yal ba dang / mdab ma dang / lo ma rnams bkra bar bya'o// rje bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs drung du/ rig sngags 'chang bya te/ dbus mo gtsugs pa me tog sna tshogs thon
389a8(rgyud): shing lag na 'brang phreng 'dzin pa/ khra ba'i rgyal po la steng du blta bzhin pa bya'o// zhabs gnyis pa'i drung gi gan du pho nya mo bya ste/ nur mig can drag ma/ mas na ras dri thogs pa rnam par 'gyur ba byag tham
389b1(rgyud): / margya brgyan thams cad kyimi rnam par btsun pa byang/ ras ris kyi su gzugs kyi bya ba yang su mthar phyin nas / byin gyis brlabs nanang lag tu gsang ba'i gan su bzhag par byag/ de'i drung du gtsangams
389b2(rgyud): zas mi bza' bar/ de'i spyan sngar khro bo lcags kyu brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ ma nyon nan dun pa na ma pon dang / zhabs bsil ji ltar rnyed pa dngul bar bya'o// ras ris kyi sku gzugs sgrub pa'i cho ga 'dis sgrub pa'i
389b3(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa gzhan yang bya'o// de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma re rer ras ris kyi mdun du/ gtsang mas zas mi bar/ de'i spyan sngar me tog dang / bdug spos phul nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas
389b4(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas las thams cad dang dgos pa tha bya'o// 'di ni de kha na nyid kyi dngos grub klags pas 'grub pa ste/ gi sngag sa 'chang gis gsang ba mchog gi wa bslab par bya'o//  nas sku sa
389b5(rgyud): mang ba tsam la sogs pas mtshams med pa lnga dang kha nang med pa la gzhal pa dang / dam pa'i chos spang ba rnam pa/ 'di mthong btsam gyis thams cad mang su dag par lul rjen
389b6(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa bsags pa dang bcas pa dang / bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// nad dang 'dzag pa thams cad
389b7(rgyud): yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro/ sdig pa thams cad dang / dgra zed dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi 'dza' ba rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// ras ris kyi sku gzugs shin tu chung ba byed pa gang yin pa de yang phan
389b8(rgyud): bar byed par 'gyur te/ mi tshig gas / 'dug pa dang / dri 'a gzugs pa 'ag kyil labar dang / sa pagyid pa'ang / drub kyi bum pa gang can da pa'am / rdul sel bar byed pa ma pang rung ste/ ga sngags
390a1(rgyud): / de'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bad+ma'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu cu
390a2(rgyud): rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyuraro// bsod nams kyi phung po yangs chen po yongasu 'dzin par 'gyuraro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par yang
390a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyangs shing bskal pa'i mthar thug par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gzigs 'dod par 'gyuraro// skye ba brjes nas kyang / 'jig

390a5(rgyud): 'khor// don yod zhags pa'i snying po/ dan yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs 'di yang mtha' dag yong su rdzogs par kha \u0f7f na du gnas par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi gsang 'a
390a6(rgyud): rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba rnams dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon sum du 'gyu ro// 
390a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sang+yas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyuraro// yan tan thaMd kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par yang
390a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud par yang 'gyur// bsad nams kyi tshogs chen pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten zad kyi tha mar yang 'gyur/ tshig brtsan par yang
390b1(rgyud): / 'gyuraro// 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyuraro// thams cad du mchod par 'os par yang 'gyur// rig sngags thams cad grub par 'gyur// yid la bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhing
390b2(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad grub par yang 'gyuraro// thams cad du thogs pa med par mkhas pa'i rdo ru 'gyuraro// de nas khro bo'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor/ cho ga zhib mo tha~Md kyi dkyil 'khor dang / gsang ba'i
390b3(rgyud): phyag rgya bla na med pa bshad par bgyi'o// 'khor yug tu them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ sa dang ba byung bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/ gzings kyi rgya dang tshad mnyam gshin tu tshad la
390b4(rgyud): bab cing legs par rnam par 'byed pa/ leg par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa/ 'jam shing mnyen pa dang ldan pa'o// tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor mchog
390b5(rgyud): gi thig btab la// sna tshogs tshon rtsis rnam par dbye/ rna bzhi shin tu rnam 'byes pa// 'khor yug them skas bzhi dang ldan// b+ha' bzhi yis rgyan pa ste/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor snying por
390b6(rgyud): yang // shin tu rnam 'byed tshad la bag khru yi tshad du bya'o// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pa yi/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor dbu su yang // mkhas pas shin tu rnam 'byes pa'i// pad+ma mdab ma bcu gnyis
390b7(rgyud): bya/ lcags kyu phyogs dang rtse gsum dang / ge sar pad+ma'i 'khor yug tu/ snying por gyur pa'i dbu mchog la// khro bo zhags pa yang bya'o// drag po'i gzugs can 'jig par byed// ral gri dang ni dgra
390b8(rgyud): sta'i phyag/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis rgyan cig/ rgyan rnam kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lus byed pa dang / zhags pas kun nas dkris pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa namakha' la phyir phyogs pa/ pad+ma dang bcas/ 
391a1(rgyud): // pa byas pa la/ gla grwar 'bar ba'i gdong bya'o// mdung rtse gsum dang pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa/ drag po'i zhal 'jigs par byed pa chen po mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ zhal 'jig su rung ba 'bar ba
391a2(rgyud): snying por chud pa'o// nang gi ri mo la/ lcags sgrog dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i gdong bri bar bya ste/ 'bar ba'i snying po dang bcas pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i tshon rtsis bya'o// ri mo gnyis pa'i nang du pad+ma kha phyed bye
391a3(rgyud): ba ge sar 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bya'o// ri mo gsum pa'i nang du 'khor lo'i rngam pa'o// mu khyud kyi phyi rol tu lag pa'i phyab rgya yang bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa'o// ral gri dang zhags pa
391a4(rgyud): dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / tsa ba la dang / mdung rtse ba nyis dang / dung dang / tir+ya dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang // tho ba dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / nor bu dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / 
391a5(rgyud): mnga' bo che dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / rtse lnga dang / parba/ sbru la dang / rdo rje zur gsum dang / pad+ma dang / rtse gsum dag kha dog snam kas 'bar ba khang yug tu yongasu bskor 'bri bar bya'o// kha khyer
391a6(rgyud): gyis rnam pas brgyan pa la kha khyer bri phyi rol dkyil 'khor gyi gan su mtshan ma sna tshogs bri bar bya ste/ rigs chen po bzhi thun mongs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// shar gyi gnasu// de bzhin
391a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang bri bar bya'o// lho ru pad+ma langs pa'i mtshan ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// nub kyi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du/ nor bu'i rigs kyi mtshan ma ni phyag rgya rnam
391a8(rgyud): kyang bri bar bya'o// byang du rdo rje'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang dag par dring// dkar gyi sgo ru/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dro ba'i rgyal po sgo ru bri bar bya'o// b+ha ru pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'jo/ 
391b1(rgyud): tsa zla ba rnams// nub tun dacu rigs rgya zla zal/ byang du rdo rje'i rigs kyi khra ba bri bar phyes khro ba thams cad kyi gzugs 'bar ba'i snying po// rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par 'argyan pa/ lag pa bzhi pa mtshan mas
391b2(rgyud): sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bya'o//  rab la gnas pa/ skyil so grangs phyed pa lus bcung zad bskum pa bya'o// phyi'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor du/ nor bu dang / rdo rje dang / me tog dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dag ga
391b3(rgyud): yug tu kha khyer 'bar bas/ dkyil 'khor gyi khong yug tu brgyan pa'o// lhab lhub dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / tshon sna lda ba'i skud pas kun nas dkyil 'khor la yang dag par brgyan pa'o// 
391b4(rgyud): ra dra ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i gtor mas gang ba'i snad ci 'byor pa dang / gtor ma'i las kyi tsho gas 'byor pa dang / rjesu la thun par bzhag par bya'o// bum pa gang ba dang / bag por dang / bum
391b5(rgyud): bu dang / bum pa dang / gto ma dkar pos bkang bad nga/ 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang / me tog kun nas gcal du dkram// 'bras yos dang / yungs
391b6(rgyud): kar byis gtong khar bya'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grang/ mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil gyi snod dang / rin po che sna bdun rab tu dgram mo// dri'i chus kang ba'i bum pa dang / legs par rgyan pa'i bum
391b7(rgyud): ba byas nas/ mkhas pas dang bzang po bcings te/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya'o// sgra bzhir dri chab kyi bum pa dang byis bcings pa bzhag par bya'o// mkhas pas sgra dang / sgo ru ni bu ram dang / 
391b8(rgyud): sha ka ra dang / sbrang rtsi'i ro dang / gtong ma bzhag par bya'o// mdung rtse gsum la/ zho dang / 'o ma dang / zan dang / mchog gi bza' ba mnyams pas/ shin tu mdzes pa'i gtor ma bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du
392a1(rgyud): // 'khur ba dang / 'khur ba zlum pa nyid dang / snum 'khur dang / khe Ti ma ka dang / sa rA'i la du dang / mud pa'i la du dang / hwags dang / kha A ba rang po rnams bzhag par bya'o// gtor ma'i
392a2(rgyud): las la khor yug tu me tog bzang ba dgram zhing / phreng bas brgyan par bya'o// 'bru'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa bzhag par bya'o// 'bras bu'i ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / na'u so sngo bsangs dang / 
392a3(rgyud): ma mdzes pa bkram ste/ bzhag par bya'o// 'khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / de bzhin du a ba ru dang / tsAn dang d+h+ri kra dang / tu ru ng+ka dang / dpal gyis dkris pa dang / lu gul dang / kun tu ru dang sbrang rtsi dang / hwags
392a4(rgyud): sbyar ba'i 'dug pa ste/ 'dug pu 'di dag dbul bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor yug tu bdug pa 'thul ba'i pog por bzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bdug pa dbul bar
392a5(rgyud): bya'o// phyogs bcings pa dang / dkyil 'khor/ bcing ba bya ste/ gtsug tor cing zhing / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'jug par bya'o// ga sngags
392a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / phyag bya zhing / bskor ba nyid dang / dam tshig kyang sbyin par bya'o// rtag tu gsang ba'i las byas ste/ de kho na bzhin du gsang sngags bzlas pa yang bya'o// dkyil 'khor
392a7(rgyud): gyi cho ga tshad ma las/ dgos pa 'di dag thams cad byas nas/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis las thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa'o// rgyal ba rig bzhi'i yongasu bskor ba'i dkyil
392a8(rgyud): 'khor du zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'gro ba bzang por skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin du bde ba can du/ 'ad dpag med kyi spyad sngar pad+ma las 'jus te skye bar the tsom med do// lha'i gzugs shin tu mdzes
392b1(rgyud): / brgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsam mi bya'o// 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub bla na med pa dang / chog
392b2(rgyud): zhib mo'i dngos grub dang / phyag rgya'i dngos grub dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dngos grub bla na med pa dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad sel ba dang / mod la 'dug pa thams cad 'jig pa dang / dgra thams cad bzlog
392b3(rgyud): ba dang / mad la nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / thad du dngos grub bla na med pa gang yin pa grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dang rtag tu dang
392b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de rtag tu rdzasu 'brang bar 'gyur// rtag tu rgyal po dang blon por bcas pa rnams kyis dus rgyun tu sngan med pa/ mchod pa'i gnasu 'gyur// gzhan yang ljongs zed blta zhing
392b5(rgyud): mchod pas rjesu 'brang bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin nyid du yang / dge sbyong rnams dang / bram ze rnams dang / rgyal rigs da nga/ rje rigs dang / dmags rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med
392b6(rgyud): dang khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur// rtag tu chog bcan pa dang / rtag tu lha rnams kyis mngon par bsrung ba dang / skabs gsum gyi dbang po dang / rdo rje 'chang ba nyid dang / rdo rje
392b7(rgyud): rnying ba bdag nyid chen po dang / mangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen pa dang / gzhon nu dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / murtsa nyid dang / de bzhin du rgyal pa chen po nga
392b8(rgyud): rnams rtag tu rdzasu 'brang bar 'gyur// khra bo'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing mthong ba la yang dus rtag tu srung ba dang / rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o// yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyuraro//  tu
393a1(rgyud): smra ba nyung zhing mkhas pa dang / thams cad du dngos grub thob par 'gyuro// dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / 'jug pa la dga' bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
393a2(rgyud): cad kyis kyang dgyes pa dang bcas pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyu ro// sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas zad
393a3(rgyud): kyi thugs las skyes pa'i sras ji lta ba bzhin no// 'di ni de rnams kyi mngal gyi gan su skye ba'i tha ma yin no// rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom mi bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu 'gro
393a4(rgyud): dang / rtag tu rgyal ba rnams kyi de kho na nyid mthong ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon sum du chos nyan par the tsom med do// 'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi
393a5(rgyud): byang chub tu rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyuraro// dgos pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / khro bo lcags kyu'i las brgya phrag stong rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i zlos bya'o// thams cad du phan
393a6(rgyud): gcig bzlas brjod byas la/ thams cad du las thams cad bya'o// bklags pas 'grub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
393a7(rgyud): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ bzhin 'dzum pas khro chen po lcags kyu'i gzungs kyi kun tu snang bzhin pas 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying po lus las phyung ngo // gang gis stong gsu
393a8(rgyud): kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar bya'o// 'od zer gyi snang ba gang gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham su rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa'i snying po rab tu 'angs
393b1(rgyud): bar 'dod pa'i don dang / lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi chang 'beb pa'i don dang / lha'i dri dang 'thun par gsal ba'i dri dang / rjesu 'thun pa'i dri rnam par bkra ba'i char rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jag
393b2(rgyud): baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phab po/ rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis lha'i lugs pa zhing rgya che ga dri 'phro bas rnam par mdzes pa'i 'bral ba'i mu su tig dang mnyam zhing mtshungs gadza ti'i 'bras bu
393b3(rgyud): dra ba rnam par mdzes pa'i 'bral ba'i lha'i chus pang su dbang bskur te/ zinapa pa rnam pa' dang mnyam pa bcu ba'i mig 'bras las byung ba'i chu skang sa slar las rab tu lhung badzigag/ de lta bu'i 'bral bar
393b4(rgyud): thig le 'bar ba nyi ma dang / smig rgyu rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od zeras la lhung te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du lhung ngo // pad+ma'i mdab ma rgya stong phrag 'bye ba ltar rab tu 'dzums
393b5(rgyud): pas rnam par mdzes pa/ pad+ma'i ze 'bru ltar mnye nab byung bar gyur to// bai DUr+ya'i sdong bu nyi sa brgya stong phrag pas sgra ga ba'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer snang bas 'brang bzhin pa/ 
393b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la mi gang gi tshad lta bur gnas par gyur to// de nas rigs pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po chen po rdo rje 'chang gis/ chu'i thigs pa mdab ma mnyam pa/ bai DUr+ya mchog tu mdzes shing 'bar ba pad+ma kha byed
393b7(rgyud): de mthong nas/ thugs po tshar dang / ya mtshan skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tsha
393b8(rgyud): te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po shin tu ngo mtshar ba mthong lag so// rmad du byung ba cho 'phrul chen po mthong lag so// sems dpa' chen po bdag gis/ ltad mo'i mchog mthong lag so// sems
394a1(rgyud): / dpa' dag pa chen po khyod kyis bdag gi lhas mo'i the tsom med par mdzod cig ces so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod
394a2(rgyud): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso// lag na rdo rje bdag la don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhabs kyi lcags kyu zhes bya ba/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po// rig sngags kyi
394a3(rgyud): rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang lha rnams yod de/ de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor chen po'i dbu su/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yongasu bsgrag
394a4(rgyud): par bgyi'o// de'i mthu dang rig sngags kyi rgyal pa 'i mthu spobs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di mthadza // 'i mthus pad+ma 'di byung ngo // rig sngags kyi
394a5(rgyud): rgyam pa 'di dag gi dpral ba nas phyung bas cho 'bru la zi nab par 'phrul pa rgya che zhing che'u dang yang dag par ldan pa ra gyur to// de nas sbyin gyi sde dpan chen pa lag na rdo rjes byang
394a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhabs gnyis la man 'os phyag byas nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mchod pa byas nas
394a7(rgyud): song ngo // bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug te/ byis pa'i cha byad bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsil yab g.yab par byed bzhin du
394a8(rgyud): 'dun go de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs par 'as thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang phyug la 'di skadapas da
394b1(rgyud): ma thasams dpa can pa dan mad pa pad+ma dri ma med pa mu skyes kyi zhabs par rung ba zhes bya gang na mang pa'i 'anas par snang ba dag kyi rgyal bar la 'bar chen pa dang phyab rgya nga
394b2(rgyud): rnams smras shig dang gis smras pa sam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dmatshig gas ba'i dkyis 'chang rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'di rnam par
394b3(rgyud): 'byas pas 'gyur/ khasgribs pa med par dkyil 'bar mthong ba kun tu gnas par byed/ cha ga nam ma thams cad dang / gsang sngags dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya rnams rjesu 'thun par byags te bam
394b4(rgyud): bar byed/ kyil mdzad kyi dam tshig ni de yon nyid dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i lha thams cad mdun na nye bar gnas par byed de// sgrub pa'i dadzin nyid kyi dngos grub mthong bar 'gyur/ ga
394b5(rgyud): sngags dmang phyis kyang rnam pa gzhan du mi 'byum/ las thams cad sprub pa'i tshig rnams la legs par sgrub pa'i cho dang yang 'gyur// rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gis rjesu 'brang zhing khyi
394b6(rgyud): bzhin phyi bzhin lhan gcig rje su 'brang bar 'gyur// zhes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas/ 
394b7(rgyud): sems can thams cad la rje su brtse ba'i don du/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog gi sgrub pa bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor chen po'i dbus/ bzhin 'dzum zhing
394b8(rgyud): mig mi 'dzums pas rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smraso// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab 'byams thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs
395a1(rgyud): // pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang gsang sngags rab 'byam rgya mtsho rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / rig sngas
395a2(rgyud): 'chang gi dbang por bzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// dkyi
395a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi gsang ba thams cad dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i sgrub pa thub pa rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
395a4(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i bdag nyid chen po'i rnam pa ra 'phrul pa grub pa rnams dang phyag rgya thams ca
395a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM bi ma le/ bi ma le gar+b+he/ bi ma la am+bu dzapad+me sUr+ya brtsa se/ sa ha sra rasmi ki ra Ne ma hA rasmi dzA la a ba b+hA Shi te/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sany+tsar pad+mo da ri pad+ma gan+d+ha/ 
395a6(rgyud): pad+ma b+hu dze/ su bi ma la am+bu dza bi ma le ma Ni ka na ka badz+ra bai DUr+ya in+da ni la ma ra ka ta/ pad+ma rA ga bi bi d+ha ma hA ma ni rat+na laM kr-i ta sha rI re d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra/ ba ra ba ra pa ra shu pA sha d+ha gas ras
395a7(rgyud): ra sa man+ta bai ro tsa na/ sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ku la sa ma ya pa ri b+hu ra Ni/ ba ra ba ra/ badz+ra dz+wa la mA lA gan+d+he/ badz+re badz+re badz+ra a d+hiSh+Thi ta pad+me hUM hUM/ ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ni tsin+d+ra ma Ni ba sha d+ha ra hu
395a8(rgyud): ru pad+ma pad+ma gau re pad+ma pA ni ba ra de/ a mo g+ha pad+me/ oM pad+mi ni pad+ma ni pad+ma ma ni badz+ra d+ha rA/ sarba ta thA ga ta ku la sA nA mya sa ma ya a d+hiSh+NI te/ ma hA bi pu ya b+hu dze b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra d+hu ru b+hu ru d+hu ri Ni d+hi
395b1(rgyud): b+hi ri/ sa man+ta a ba mo ki taShid+yA rA dze pra sa ra pra sa ra san+ta bi ma le/ sarba bad+d+hi yaN+Da la de btA na maskr-i te/ ta ra ta ra/ t+tA ra ya tA rA ga/ sa man+ta pa ri pUN+Di sarba bo d+hi satwa a b+hi Shi tsa ni sarba ta thA ga ta a mo b+ha
395b2(rgyud): a b+hi Shi D+hi a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya maM sarba bid+d+hi maN+Da la ku la sa ma ya a d+hi Shi kau/ sarba ta thA ba ta pA Ni bA ra de/ pad+ma go rai pad+ma prA b+h+r-i/ pad+ma bi ka tsam+bu dza gar+b+he hUM hUM badz+ra badz+re/ badz+ra pad+me ta thA ga ta/ ku la a d+hi
395b3(rgyud): te/ a me b+ha ba ra de/ sanA sA pa ri pu ru Ni sarba pA pa duHSha pra sha sa Ni a ma b+ha hri dA ya bid+d+hi sA d+ha ya bi ma le hUM phaT/ oM ba ra de pad+ma b+hu dzi na mo stu ta pad+ma su te swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
395b4(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa dri ma med pa pad+mo'i chu skyes kyi pad+ma'i lcags kyu don yod zhags pa'i snying po rig sngang sa kyi rgyal po gzungs chen pa kun nas rnam par snang ba
395b5(rgyud): byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi rigs kyi dam chi ga gi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa'i de ma thag gi 'og tu pad+ma ra 'bru dang bcas pa'i zhesar gsal bar rnam par
395b6(rgyud): byed ste/ dper na grong khyer gyi phyog gcig gi sgo bye nas rgyal mo byung ba bzhin du/ lha'i gzugs blta na sdug pa 'od mtha' yas pa phyag bzhi pa rgyan gyi rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag na pad+ma don yod zhags pa
395b7(rgyud): jo ba'i phyag dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan chen po'i phyag dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag spyan gsum pa zla ba'i cod pan 'chang bzhi gzhi zhing 'dzum pa'i zhal/ sku la 'od zer
395b8(rgyud): sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying po pad+ma dang / seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ pad+ma kha bye ba'i snying por bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgos bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
396a1(rgyud): // bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ ma gangs phyag 'tshal zhi thal mo sbyang ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug te/ mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing 'khod do// 
396a2(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gang shegs dang shAtu thub bas/ ngan yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i lcags kyu rig sngags kyi rgyal po bud med kyi bzugs 'dzin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
396a3(rgyud): sems can dag pa chen po khyod ci'i phyir mig 'dzum par blta// mchog ci don tu gnyer bzhin du 'khod ceso// rig sngags kyi rgyal mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
396a4(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / dam tshig gsang ba'i rje su 'jug par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rig sngags kyi rgyal ba
396a5(rgyud): nyon cig khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis tham sa cad du/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i gsang bar lung bstan cing / khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rna bar snang mdzad
396a6(rgyud): kyis dkyil 'bor thams cad kyi mchog tu lung bstan no// ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan/ 
396a7(rgyud): tur+N+Na dang / kar sham dang // sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma dang / lha mo chen mo ki lI ki lA dang / rdo rje pho nya ma dang / dri med ma byed ma dang / pad+ma'i spyan ma dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma dang / rdo rje
396a8(rgyud): khro gnyer can dang / lha mo pad+ma rab snang ma dang / pad+ma spyod byed ma dang / rigs kyi rgyal mo chen mo don yod pa'i phyag dang / longs spyod ldan ma dang // dpal mo dang / 'jigs ma dang / dpe med ma dang / dbyangs can/ 
396b1(rgyud): ma dang / ral gcig ma spyan stong ma/ phyag stong pa/ dbu stong ga/ don yod pa'i pad+ma dang / rin chen lha mo dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid dang / rig pa'i dbang phyug nyid dang / lha mo che rno phyag rgya'i
396b2(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang / hu hra bzlas pa'i sbyin sreg dang / zhi ba'i las dang / lha mo rigs mdzes ma dang / rig sngags 'chang chen mo rdo rje mdzes nyid dang / phyag na 'khor lo grub pa
396b3(rgyud): dang / de bzhin du ral gri bzang po'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang // khro bo nyid dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dang / dus kyi mtshan mo dang / zhal rnam par 'gyur ma dang / mche ba gtsigs ma dang / ser skya ma nyid dang / rang gsal ma dang / 
396b4(rgyud): phyag na rin chen ma nyid dang / sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang / de bzhin du rdzas yongasu 'dzin pa'i lha mo dang / mchad yon dang / zhab sa bsil dang / gtor ma nyid kyi lha dang / a kr-i Ni dang / me tog dang / 
396b5(rgyud): 'dug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byugs pa'i lha dang / thams cad du rjesu song ba'i lha mo khyod dang / gsang sngags thams cad la dang nga bsgyur ma dang / bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i rig sngags
396b6(rgyud): kyi rgyal po'i mchog sgrol bar byed pa dang / bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad 'dzin pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i mchog ma dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dbang mo dang / rig kyi gsang sngags dang / de bzhin
396b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mchen po nges par sbyin pa 'jig rten dbang phyug skyes pa nyid du dpral ba'i smin ma'i bar du lha'i chu'i dngul las nges par skyes shing byung gaskar ba'i
396b8(rgyud): rnam pa dang / mtshungs pa / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can du gyur pa'o// zhes las sna tshogs dang / dbyangs can gang yin pa 'di 'chang bar byed// zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa dang du blangs nas
397a1(rgyud): / gsung so// rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub mnyam par skyob pa thob pa dang de bzhin du cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / 
397a2(rgyud): don yod pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par byed// don yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang / bklags pas grub pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan dang / thams cad du rigs spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i dngos grub
397a3(rgyud): kyi phyir dang / spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig nyid kyang 'di dran pa tsam gyis thams cad thob par byed// dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang lha de dag thams cad kyang dran pa tsam gyi
397a4(rgyud): rje su 'brang bar 'gyur bar the tshom medo// rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang / lha rnams dam tshig la kun tu gnas pa ra byed do// de lta bas na/ 'bad pa thams cad kyis zung cig/ de
397a5(rgyud): bzhin du thub pa rnam par mdzad dang / shAkya'i rgyal bas rig sngags kyi rgyal por lung bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyis ming kun tu gzigs shing thams cad du
397a6(rgyud): rjesu 'gro ba ste/ de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs pad+ma zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa/ rdo rje'i dngos grub dngos grub chen po pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ de bzhin gshegs
397a7(rgyud): ba'i rig kyi dngos grub sgrub pa grub pa/ dkyil 'khor chen pa'i rigs dang nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub sgrub pa grub pa/ dan med pa'i snying pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du
397a8(rgyud): mchog gi dngos grug mchog gi dang po rdo rje'i rig su bstan pa/ rdo rje rtsem chen po'i lha dang / de bzhin du rdo rjes 'og dngos grub kyi phyir rdo rje phreng ba rim par phye ba'i grang dang / rdo rje mnu'i mchog gi
397b1(rgyud): dngos grub rnams la spyan ras gzigs pad+ma dang / pad+ma mdzes pa dang / de bzhin du 'am/ ming smos pa tsam gyis mod la rjesu 'brang zhing 'ong bar byed do// de bzhin du rdo rje dbang po dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / lag mardo
397b2(rgyud): rje dang dbang phyug chen po rnams rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na/ rtag tu shes pas rig sngags smra ba dang / ming gang gi mchog 'dzin pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu rnam par gzigs par
397b3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis rtag tu lung bston par 'gyur bar the tsom med de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal
397b4(rgyud): 'di lung bstan ma thag tu sa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yo sa so// g.yos rab tu g.yos// mgul rab tu mgul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem che ma rab tu chem chem mo lnga
