438b5(rgyud): 'tshe ba dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'brug pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs ba thams cad so sor phyir bzlog par bgyi/ bde ba la yang dag
438b6(rgyud): par reg pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba sgrub par bgyi/ srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi/ don med pa yang so sor bzlog par bgyi/ don la yang yang dag par sbyar bgyi/ don thams cad
438b7(rgyud): rjesu brtsal bar bgyi/ rtag tu mchog 'artsal bar brgya'o// bcom ldan 'das shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyag mo ga zhib ma'i ya byang du dgongs pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag
438b8(rgyud): nardo rje sngon du 'gro bas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha de rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / na mkha' lding dang / 
439a1(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phyed rnams la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ legaso leg so drang srong chen po// de lta bu byed pa de rnams yongasu bskyab par bya// 
439a2(rgyud): bsrung bar bya/ dngos grub kyang sbyin par bya'o// ngas cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di yongasu srung ba'i ched dang / 
439a3(rgyud): sems can de rnams thams cad yongasu srung ba'i ched dang / sems can thams cad srung ba'i ched dang / yongasu bskyang ba'i ched du grogs po rnams la rjesu gtad do// 'di yang srung
439a4(rgyud): bar bya'o// zheso// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par bye chem
439a5(rgyud): cho ga spros shig/ don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi gsang ba dang // rig sngags 'a chang thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub 'di/ 
439a6(rgyud): thams cad du thun mong ba'i snying po grub pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i
439a7(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po don yod nor bu mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho go dang / ras ris rnams gsungs pa/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya'o// ngan med
439a8(rgyud): pa mchod pa'i nang bu'i snying po bla na med pa ni/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ kun nas shin tu rnam par phye ba/ sa dang byung gis legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa la/ tshon sna tshogs pas/ 
439b1(rgyud): / bkra ba'i srad bus char gzhal cing bcad la dkyil 'khor bla na med pa'i dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por bdag gi khru'i tshad kyis kun nas khru bzhi pa sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba bya'o// thams
439b2(rgyud): cad du gsang ba thun mongs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang bad+ma byA ste/ pad+ma stong phrag gi shin tu mdzes pa lnga lnga'o// pad+ma dkar po bla na med pa la ze 'bru
439b3(rgyud): dang / ge sar gyi tshad la bab pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i ge sar dang / ze 'bru bkra ba'i dra ba'i snying po lus dang lag tu 'chang zhing / lag pa'i phyag rgya g.yon pa dang g.yas pas bya'o// 
439b4(rgyud): dang sbyangs dang 'khyil pas smra ba/ zung zur du dpag bsam gyi shing shin tu tshang la bab pa cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byed du gzhugo// snying po'i 'khor gyi re ba yang cho ga ni/ 
439b5(rgyud): lta ba bzhin du shin tu tshad dang ldan par bya'o// me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa bya zhing de nas me tog bar du re kha bya'o// rgyan sna tshogs kyi rnam par brgyan pa/ gos sna tshog
439b6(rgyud): ba mdzes pa'o// sna tshogs pa'i rkyen gyi phyi rol tu pad+ma dang / ud pa la sngon po'i phreng ba'i ri mo'o// ud pa la sngon po'i phyi rol tu nor bu rin po che sna tshogs pas rnam par bkra ba'i ri mo
439b7(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng bas mdzes pa'o// me tog sna ma dang tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag la sngags kyi nor bu'i ri mo yang bya'o// de'i phyi rol gyi 'khor yug tu snam bu'i rnam pa bya'o// ri ro la sna tshogs
439b8(rgyud): pa'i ljon shing dang lcags ma bkram pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes pa'o// khor yug tu chu 'bab pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di bri zhing / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khor
440a1(rgyud): phug tu 'ang dri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bla ma med pa/ phyag rgya sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / bum pa dang mchod pa'i rin pa che'i snod sna tshogs pa dang / gang 'di
440a2(rgyud): bum pa sna tshogs pa dri'o// mtshan ma dang / phyag rgya dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa'i yal ga dang / pad+ma dang / ud pa la 'chang ba dang / gos dang rgyan sna tshogs pa thogs pa bya'o// phyi'i
440a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi khar yug tu/ me tog sna tshogs pa/ ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / mAn dA ra ba dang / a ti mu ku ka dang / wAR+Shi ka dang / tsa ma pa ka dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / sna ma dang / 
440a4(rgyud): sgyu nar dang / yU thi ka dang / ka dam pa'i me tog gi phreng bas mdzes pa ra bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gan su rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bya ste/ rin po che'i phyug ma sna tshog
440a5(rgyud): pa dang / bum pa gang ba thogs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi snying por ba dan gyi brgyan par bya'o// gang ba'i bum pa yongasu bsogs pa dang / me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs
440a6(rgyud): ba dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang / bza' 'i kha zas ro dro ba'i mchog bzhag par bya/ sna tshogs pa'i bdug pas bdug la/ bdug pa'i srog phor yongasu bsham
440a7(rgyud): par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo 'ang bya/ legs par khrus byas shing // dri bzang po'i dris bsgos te/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'dug pas bdug la/ 
440a8(rgyud): byung lngas nye reg bya ste/ don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya'o// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
440b1(rgyud): ba rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa yid la bya/ mchod pa'i sprin chen po yid la bya zhing bzla ste/ phyogs bcu kun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi nang du gtog pa'i sas
440b2(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis
440b3(rgyud): ji ltar dkyil 'khor du yongasu bsags shing rnam pa sna tshog su gzhal du med pas ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu bsags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re yang / dkyil 'khor chen po gzhal
440b4(rgyud): du med pa brgya stong phrag yang su bsags pas ma ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i sprin chen pa byed do/ tshogs pa'i gos dang / sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang / b+had lhub dang / 
440b5(rgyud): lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyisna tshogs pa dang / lha rgyas kyi 'dug spos sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bral bu dang / me tog snga sogs pa dang / rab tu pa'i kha zas kyi mtshan
440b6(rgyud): ra bri ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / smon ma'i shing sna tshogs pa brgya stong phrag rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'bar gyi dkyil 'khor bcas pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po byeng pa// 
440b7(rgyud): phan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi ral ma'i sgra rnams kyi mchod pa'i sprin byed do// de lta bu'i chos rnams phyags bcu rnam su sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa re ra ma ma pa
440b8(rgyud): pa'i sprin chen pos dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs rnams mchod par 'gyur te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad du lhun tu
441a1(rgyud): tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen po gzhal du med pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par byed do// gang yang dkyil 'khor chen po deng rje su sugs
441a2(rgyud): ba'i sems can dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang yin pa de rnams thams cad
441a3(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de la mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / lhan cig 'gro ba 'am/ tha na thos pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad phyir
441a4(rgyud): mi ldog par 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// sbyin pa chen po yongasu gtong ba yongasu gtang bar 'gyuraro// bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
441a5(rgyud): bskyed par 'gyur// sems can re re'i yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma phrag dgu ba cu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa de'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams
441a6(rgyud): kyi phung po bskyed par 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor mtha dbu gyi mod dang / rje su yi rang ba tsam gyi mod la/ 'phral nyid du mtsha mas med pa lnga'i sdig pa yongasu zad par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad las
441a7(rgyud): yongasu grol bar yang 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyuraro// 'chi 'pho zhing skye ba rje ba'i du su son te 'chi ba'i mthar thug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu
441a8(rgyud): rtsa gnyis mngon sum du ston zhing snang bar 'gyuraro// lam nye bar ston par byed cing dbugs 'byin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa rnamasu skal ba mnyam pa nyid kyi skye bar byed da// 
441b1(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyi rgyan par pad+ma la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa tsam gyi mod la/ skye ba thams cad rjesu dran par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya dang / 
441b2(rgyud): gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang // don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas par byed do// ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang
441b3(rgyud): chub la mthar thug gi bar du thams cad rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bcings te gnas par byed do zhes so// 'di ni skye ba tha mar 'gyur te/ mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di/ 
441b4(rgyud): za na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i ri dag sa dang bya de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing pha rog tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ mir gyur pa
441b5(rgyud): rnams kyi lta ci smos so// da ltar yon tan dang phan yon chen po'i mchod pa chen po dang / dkyil 'khor gyi tshe ga'o// don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi rnam
441b6(rgyud): bar 'phrul pa dang / phan yon gyi moga'i sgrub zab so// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i ras ris bshad par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ sdig pa tha
441b7(rgyud): cad sel ba phral du nad thams cad zlog par byed pa/ dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas mchog thams cad sbyin pa bshad par bya'o// ras sam gos gzhan nam/ rgya dar kun nas khru bzhi pa la
441b8(rgyud): btsang mas gtsang ma'i gnasu/ ri mo mtshan gtsang ma nyid kyis khrus byos gos gtsang ma bsgos te dri sna tshogs pas bdugs la/ tshon sna tshogs pa rnam par bkrang shing // lhag pa
442a1(rgyud): ma yin pa snod gsar par bzhag pas/ ras ris bla na med pa bri bar bya'o// dbusu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bya ste/ gzhal yas khang gi khang pa
442a2(rgyud): brtsegs par seng ge'i khril pad ma'i rdzing bung ku'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la me tog 'thor bar byed bzhin pa'o// g.yon du 'phags
442a3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bya ste/ don yod zhags pa'i skyil krung byed pas bzhugs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ tshangs pa'i chu byad 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad
442a4(rgyud): kyis rnam par brgyan pa// 'od dpag med kyi cod pan phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ mdung rtse gsum 'dzin pa da nga / pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / zhags pa 'dzin
442a5(rgyud): pa dang / nor bu rin po che 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das la nye ba ra 'dud par byed bzhin pa'o// g.ya su rig pa'i rgyal po bya ste/ phyag bzhi pa 'phags ma sgrol ma'i na byad 'chang
442a6(rgyud): ba 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gos 'dzin pa pad+ma dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri 'chang zhing / nor bu rin po me chen po
442a7(rgyud): rgyal mtshan thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la nye bar 'dud par byed pa/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu lha mo sgrol ma bya ste/ 
442a8(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba smad pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu gos dkar mo bya ste brgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ sgron ma dpral bar g.yo zhing/ 
442b1(rgyud): / bcom ldan 'das la zur mig gis blta bar byed pa bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i rgyab tu 'phags pa dpal mdzes pa bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das
442b2(rgyud): la blta bar byed bzhin pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi phur ma 'chang bar byed pa'o// thams cad la pad+ma'i gdan bya ste/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o// gos dkar po'i rgyab tu/ 
442b3(rgyud): khro bo chen po lcags kyu bya'o// dkar po'i gzhog su don yod pa'i lcags kyu bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i 'og tu ral pa gcig ma bya ste/ phyag brgyad pa/ zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ ral pa
442b4(rgyud): gyen du brdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa ste/ ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri dang / mdung rtse gsum dang // rdo rje dang / 
442b5(rgyud): pad+ma 'chang ba bya zhing / bsdigs mdzub byed par bya'o// steng du phyogs pa/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar byed bzhin pa'o// 'ang pa
442b6(rgyud): brtsegs pa'i steng du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun bya ste/ 'od dpag med kyang dbusu bya'o// lhas mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o// phyag g.yon dang g.yas su rdo rje 'dzin pa/ 
442b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la zas gsar pa 'dren par byed bzhin pa'o// gzhogs g.yas dang g.yon du khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang ba bya'o// 'og gi gzhogs g.yas su rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// 
442b8(rgyud): gzhogs g.yon du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngam po dang / gzhon nu rnams rang rang gi mtshon cha 'dzin pa bya ste/ thams cad glu len bzhin pa bya'o// bcom ldan
443a1(rgyud): 'das 'og phyogs kyi rdzing bu'i g.yas log su rig sngags 'chang pus mo gtsugs pa bya ste/ bdug pa'i srog phor dang / me tog 'dzin cing bzang phreng
443a2(rgyud): thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar byed bzhin pa bya'o// ras ris kyi kho ra khor yug tu ri bo br-i bya ste/ sna tshogs me tog gi mgo phyogs bkram zhing // rin po che'i ldan
443a3(rgyud): sna tshogs pas rgyan pa/ chu 'bab cing rjesu spyod pa/ ri dgas dang / byas yang dag par brgyan par bya'o// sna tshogs pa'i ri'i lha dang / shang shang te'us kun tu khyab pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs
443a4(rgyud): ba'i gdengs ka dang mtshungs pa gan su gnas pa bya'o// de nas yongasu sbyar ba byas pa zin pa dang / ras ris la tshon sna tshogs pas bkra bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang
443a5(rgyud): gtsang mas gos gtsang sa bgo bar bya'o// legs par khrus byas ste/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ smra ba bcad la don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / 
443a6(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgya da du bzlas so// de'i tshe ras ris 'bar bar 'gyur // 'od rA ra kha dog sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed de/ phyogs bcu kun tu
443a7(rgyud): snang bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang dga' zhing 'dod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi don yod zhags pa'i snying po dang / don yod zhags pa lcags kyu dang / rig pa'i
443a8(rgyud): rgyal po'i snying 'di'i dngos grub tu shes par bya'o// de nas las thams cad byed byed du gzhug cing 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
443b1(rgyud): / 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am// dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blun po 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ khyim bdag gam/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
443b2(rgyud): ba'am bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang ras ris chen po 'di mthong nas/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rnam par sbyangs shing thun chags
443b3(rgyud): su 'gyuraro// mnar med pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang sgrib pa rnams 'phral du yongs su grol lo// bsod nams kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyuraro// rig pa'i rgyal po
443b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dod pa thams cad dang yid kyi shing rta dang / 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / rig sa thun mongs pa la 'jug pa'i thams cad du thun mongs
443b5(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig dang / de kho na nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa dang / thams cad du dngos grub byed pa'i gnas/ rdo rje'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor mchog byung
443b6(rgyud): chub kyi snying po nye bar bskrod par byed pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyir mi ldog par 'jug par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
443b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor/ gnas thams cad tu son pa'i dngos grub// cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug byed pa/ phyag rgya thams cad 'gugs pa byed pa'i
443b8(rgyud): phyag rgya dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu 'jug par byed pa bshad par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi gnas yongs su rtags te/ sa'i cha mdzes par/ 
444a1(rgyud): gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ gnas nyid dam/ ri phug gam// tshang tshing ngam/ rgyal po'i gnas ma lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ gzhan
444a2(rgyud): yang brang sa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ skyed mod tshal lam/ nags 'dab nyid dang / kun dga' ra ba 'am/ chu klung ngam/ steng ka 'am/ 'bab chu'i dngo 'am/ mtsho
444a3(rgyud): phran nam/ 'tshe'u dag dang / rdzing bu rnam par bkra ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshon nam// ne'u sing sngon po 'am// me tog skye ba'i gnas sam// thams cad rjesu 'thun
444a4(rgyud): par brtag par bya'o// gnas gtsang mar ma nyams pa'i mod la/ dkyil 'khor der dgod par bya ste/ sa dang / ba byung dang yang dag par ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya'o// khor
444a5(rgyud): yug tu khru bzhi pa/ legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa/ bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog tu bya'o// dkyil 'khor la tshon sna tshogs pa mdzes par phye ba'i thig gdab te/ 
444a6(rgyud): mnyam par phye nas zung bzhi pa logs bzhi pa sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gi thig gang ba po/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang / dkyil
444a7(rgyud): 'khor khru'i tshad la re kha lnga byas pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mdzes pas thig gdab po// pad+ma'i ri mo dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / rdo rje'i ri mo gsum pa dag go// ud pa
444a8(rgyud): la bzhi pa 'am/ nong bu rin zo che chen po ni snga par bshad do// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu 'bar ba'i phreng ba byed du gzhug/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnasu// pad+ma dkar / 
444b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa/ ge sar dang / ze'u 'bru dang / bcas pa'i pad+ma bya ste/ de la rig pa'i lha mo gzugs ji ltar mdzes pa dgod par bya'o// ji ltar ras ris 'di la
444b2(rgyud): gzugs pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba de lta bu dris nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mdzes pa dang / zhi ba dang / khro gnyer can dang / drag po sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'chang ba
444b3(rgyud): mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du'o// rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ gos sna tshogs pa 'chang ba/ skyes pa lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs
444b4(rgyud): dang / bud med lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs 'ji na pa bsres pa rtag tu bris nas/ pad+ma'i gdan gyis rgyan cing // thams cad pad+ma 'chang ba byed du gzhug go/ snying po'i
444b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi gru bzhi ru rgyal po chen po bzhi byed du gzhugs te/ go cha dang ya lad bsgos pa/ drag po'i gzugs 'jigs par byed pa'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bya ste/ 
444b6(rgyud): khor yug tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya thams cad la pad+ma'i gdan 'chang ba'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas rnamasu dkyil 'khor gyi lha bya'o// gang ga dang / shI tA dang / 'jigs ma dang // dpe
444b7(rgyud): med pa dang / nor bu zang po dang / ki lI ki la dang / gtsigs zhal ma ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'di rnams bri bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi khor yug tu ri bo'i phreng ba dag la ma
444b8(rgyud): tog dang / ljon shing sna tshogs pas lcug mas khyab cing // tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par 'byes pa bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs par mthar phyin pa dang // de nas/ 
445a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la kho ra khor yug tu tshon sna lngas mdzes pa'i ba dan brgya dang // sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mdzes pa dang / rnam par bkra ba'i bum pa gang
445a2(rgyud): ba dang / gtor ma dang / dril bu mdzes pa dang / gang ba'i bum pa dang / bum bu dang / dri sna tshogs kyi chus yongasu gang ba dang / ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bzhag nas/ bam por
445a3(rgyud): dang ril ba gang ba dang / dri sna tshogs kyi byug pa dang / bdug pa sna tshogs pa bzhag nas/ 'bras bu sna tshogs mdzes pa bzhag ste/ khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba
445a4(rgyud): dang / gser dang / dngul las byung ba'i snod dris gang ba rnams bzhag go/ thams cad ji ltar 'byor pa bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gzhal du med pa las dman pa nyid du mi bya'i lhag
445a5(rgyud): ba nyid du byed du gzhug/ dkyil 'khor gyi las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa dang / stobs dang brtson 'a grus kyis bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gi gtsang bar
445a6(rgyud): gyung nas/ legs par khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgo sa nas/ srung ba'i cho gas phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyi 'khor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / srung ba chen
445a7(rgyud): yang byed du gzhug/ de nas gsang sngags kyi las dang / phyag rgya'i las bla na med par bya'o// de nas sems can gzhug par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gang 'dod par bcug nas
445a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya sbyin du gzhug go// phyag bya ba dang bskor ba la thams cad bcug nas// snyan gsan dbab pa dang spyan drang bar bya/ las kyi tsho gas gtor ma sbyin
445b1(rgyud): par bya/ me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bya/ bzlas pa'i las rnams dang / las thams cad mdor bsdus pa byas nas gsheg su gsol ba 'dir bya'o// dkyi 'khor na gnas
445b2(rgyud): pa'i lha rnams la gtor ma'i las kyi cho ga dang / de bzhin du me tog dang bdug pa phul ba nas dkyil 'khor na gnas pa rnams gshegasu gsolo// gang gi tshe gsang sngags
445b3(rgyud): rnams dang / cho ga zhib mo chen po'i gzungs rab tu 'jug pa nas sa'i mthil du ras ris 'bar ba'i mod la 'od zer 'byin par byed de/ dkyil 'khor mthong zhing rig sngags 'chang yang
445b4(rgyud): bar snang la gnaso// de'i skad cig la ting 'dzin thob te/ kyil 'khor tu zhugs pa'i mod la/ cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad rtag tu myur du 'byung
445b5(rgyud): la rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyuraro// rig pa'i rgyal po'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub brjod do// 
445b6(rgyud): ji ltar yid la byed pa thams cad myur du 'dzin to// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thob te 'di la the tshom med do// sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa gang yin pa de rnams/ 
445b7(rgyud): thams cad phyir mi ldog pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// sem/ 
445b8(rgyud): can gang dkyil 'khor de mthong nas sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa rnams dang / mnar med par gzhol ba de thams cad rnam par nyams
446a1(rgyud): bar byed cing 'di blag tu sangs rgyas nyid du 'dral// / de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i cho ga zhing mo chen po dang / dro bo lcags kyu dang / 
446a2(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'thun mong ba'i phyag rgya dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa// 'byung po
446a3(rgyud): thams cad skrag par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad 'bros par byed pa/ bgegs thams cad rnam par skrag par byed pa/ 'dod pa'i ris rnams sreg par
446a4(rgyud): byed pa// gdug pa'i klu rnams 'khrug par byed pa/ sa'i mthil g.yo bar byed pa// lha'i me tog dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzes pa dang / lha'i gos dang lhab lhub kyi char 'bebs pa/ 
446a5(rgyud): zla byed pa/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par bskul bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snyan gsan 'bebs par
446a6(rgyud): byed pa gsum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas na gnas pa 'i lha thams cad spyan 'dren par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po dang
446a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ bde ba thams cad dang phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par byed pa/ bla na med pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa/ rdzas kyi 'khor bskor
446a8(rgyud): bar byed pa/ chos kyi sgron me 'bar bar byed pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud par byed pa/ phyag rgya dang chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa/ cho ga zhi mo dang gsang sngags bla na med pa thams cad grub pa// 
446b1(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ phyag rgya dang / mchog thams cad sbyin par byed pa// gsang sngags thams cad 'chang ba/ gzungs rnams kyi byed par grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
446b2(rgyud): kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa/ gang gis rnam par snang mdzad dang / thub pa brgyad pa'i dam tshig gi gnas thams cad la gnas pa/ sdig pa thams
446b3(rgyud): cad nyams par byed pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams sreg par byed pa/ rtag tu 'khor ba las 'don par byed pa/ bdud dang ma rungs pa
446b4(rgyud): rnams las sgrol ba po/ rtag tu chos kyi zam ste/ gas mchog rga ba dang / skyes pa dang / 'chi ba las zol ba dbyed/ srid pa mi bzad pa ston par nus pa/ tshul khrims dang / 
446b5(rgyud): gtong ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ting 'dzin rnams kyi dri zhim po sbyin zhing sru nga bar byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang su rdzogs par byed pa/ 
446b6(rgyud): sbyin po'i rin po che'i phung po chen po rtag tu sbyin pa// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha thams cad la mchod par byed pa/ bsam pa thams cad yang su rdzogs par byed pa
446b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag byin gyis rlob pa/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par byed pa/ gzugs sna tshogs dang / rdzu 'phrul snga
446b8(rgyud): tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya rab tu ston par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying
447a1(rgyud): 'di la gnas par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad dang / gdon dang nad thams cad rtag tu rnam par
447a2(rgyud): 'jig par byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ sgrub par byed pa'o// 'jigs pa rnams thams cad dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa
447a3(rgyud): brgyad po rnams kyis 'jigs pa med pa'o// dug dang byad snyems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad nyams par byed par the tshom med pa zhes bya ba bshad par bya'o// lag pa gnyis bzlog
447a4(rgyud): nas lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo'i song mo dang / bsdigs mdzub nyid bskums sor mo gsum rkyang la snying kha'i gan su 'azhag par bya ste/ 'di ni ngan yod pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi
447a5(rgyud): nor bu dang mnyam par mchog sbyin pa ste/ phyag/ rgyabargya stong phrag bye ba gnyis tsam du bcings par 'gyuraro// zhan yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dang / 
447a6(rgyud): pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya yin pa dang / nor bu 'i rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pas te/ phyag rgya so so so so
447a7(rgyud): 'di rnams thams cad phya rgyu bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams su 'gyur// bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu byed do// phyag rgya 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog sbyin pa po 'jig rten dbang
447a8(rgyud): thun gnanapa ran yang po'i snying ba'o// shin tu gsang ba'i las thams cad du dan yang pa'o// dus gsum pa 'i bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tsa bla na med pa dang / rigs
447b1(rgyud): thun mongs pa'i gsang ba dang / dam tshig thams cad du mthong ba'o// phyag rgya 'di'i da ltar ba'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / yid kyi shing rta yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// mchog
447b2(rgyud): thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis/ gung mo'i sor mos mthe bong gi sor mo bcums la bsdig mdzub kyis sdig par bya/ ming med dang / mthe chung dag gcig tu
447b3(rgyud): brkyang la/ sen mos sen mo mnyam par bzhag nas/ snying kha'i gnasu bzhag ste/ khro bo'i blta ba dang mtshungs par bzhag pas hUM yig gis btsir bar bya'o// 'di ni khro bo lcags
447b4(rgyud): kyu'i phyag rgya dro bo thams cad kyi mchog dang bcu bar brjod par bya ste/ rigs bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams kyi thun mong ba'i phyag rgya thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur
447b5(rgyud): ro// phya rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis dra bo'i phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig su brjod pa nga / de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs gang yin pa dang / rdo'i rigs su
447b6(rgyud): brjod pa gang yin pa dang / khro bo'i rdo rje drag pos 'jigs par byed do// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni thams cad du khra bo'i rgyal por brjod par bya ste/ nor bu'i rigs gang yin pa'i tshwa
447b7(rgyud): rnams kyi phyag rgya gdug pa rnams 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o// thams cad tu phyag rgya'i gtso bo zhes bya ba/ dra ba'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o// de bzhin phra bo'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'di 'chi
447b8(rgyud): bzhin pa/ ri rab lhun po brgya stong phrag dang / rgya mtsho yang bskams par byed do// ri rang ldan pa'i ri ni rdul phra rab ji lta bar rnam par 'thor bar byed do// rgya mtsho thams cad/ 
448a1(rgyud): kyang bskams par byed do// ri dang ribo yang nyams par byed do// lha ma yin ma rungs pa rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang ba sgra gcan
448a2(rgyud): dang / de'i gnas kyi klu ma rungs pa rnams sreg par byed do// de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gdon ma rungs pa dang / bgegs byed pa'i
448a3(rgyud): lha ma rungs pa gang yin pa dang / bdud kyi rigs rnams gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur la/ phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis de lha rnams thams cad rtag tu nyams par byed cing / 
448a4(rgyud): skad cig de la 'jigs par byed do// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i sems can 'jigs par byed pa de rnams theng
448a5(rgyud): skyabasu 'gro bar byed do// phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed do// thams cad 'gru ba don
448a6(rgyud): yod cing dge ba thams cad 'grub par byed do// phyag rgya 'di nyid las bsdigs gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par bskums la/ gung mo yid tsam bskums te/ ming med dang / mthe bong / 
448a7(rgyud): sor mo'i sen mos sen mo mnyam par gzhag ste/ mthe'u chung nas brkyang nas snying pa'i shin su bzhag pa 'di ni rig pa'i phyag rgya chen po don yod pa'i phyag rgya med du byung ba chen
448a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rigs thun mong ba'i phyag rgya rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi bla na med pa 'jig rten gyi khams mgon pos snyan par brjod cing lung bstanas
448b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa/ de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi rgaca bo zhes brjod pa dang / de
448b2(rgyud): bzhin du nor bu'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang / rigs pa'i rgyal po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du na rtsa po ste/ gang gis phyag rgya 'di 'ching bar
448b3(rgyud): dang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag gi phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bcings par 'gyuraro// sdig pa dang / nyon mongs pa mi bzad pa dang / gdug pa thams cad rnam par
448b4(rgyud): nyams par byed do// bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong phrag bskyed par 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun nas bskyed par 'gyuraro// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam
448b5(rgyud): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs par byed cing dgongs par byed de the tsom med do// nga chub sems dpa' thams cad du mchog sbyin
448b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// lha rnams kyis rtag par rgyun tu bsrung bar byed do// phyag rgya 'dri'i phan yon sngar brjod pas gzhal du med cing grangs med la tshad med par rab tu bsgrags shing the tsom
448b7(rgyud): med do// phyag rgya 'di mthong ba dang / bcings pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu bskyed do// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil tu gcig brkyangs la/ dpung pa btums
448b8(rgyud): te/ ming med dang / mthe bong ni sor mo 'dud la mthe chung btum par bya'o// ming maud kyi mthar reg la/ gung mo btum la bsdigs mdzub rab tu brkyangs
449a1(rgyud): te/ snying kha'i gan su 'di g.yo ba tsam mo// me tog gam/ dri dang 'dug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos sam/ rgyan dang / spud pa rnams kyang
449a2(rgyud): lag pa g.yon du bzung nas dbul bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha rnams dang / de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po rnams dang
449a3(rgyud): de bzhin du dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyi de rnams thams cad mchod par 'gyuraro// lha rdzas kyi mchod pa bla na med pa dang / mchog dang / rab mchog dang / rgya nom pa'i mchod pa
449a4(rgyud): 'di rnams byed de/ ro sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams dang / ro brgya'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa bdud rtsi bcud kyi len gyi mchod pa'i
449a5(rgyud): 'di rnams byedado// bya nas bcu rnams kun na ba che lnga bdun gyi char 'gyur// gsar dang dngus kyis gabla mamed pa dang / rin pa che rnam pa sna chags rnam
449a6(rgyud): par bkra ga nyis dang gzi brjid mtshungs pas 'bar bar byed do// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis don yod pa mchod pa'i norang bu zhes bya ba 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste/ rtag
449a7(rgyud): tu phyag rgya'i gsang ba dang / gsang sngags rnams yid kyis bsams pas de rnams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// dpag bsam gyi shing dang mnyam zhing mtshungs par
449a8(rgyud): ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin du mchod pa thams cad byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag stong rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyang re re'i dus gsum/ 
449b1(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag rgya 'di'i mthus bla na med pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par byed do// de'i phyir phyag rgya 'di rtag tu byed pa ni bar/ 
449b2(rgyud): tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bzung bzhin pa na mchod pa bla na med pa dang / tshog su chung ngus mchod pa chung ngu yang tshad med par
449b3(rgyud): ra tu 'acur// sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa byed do// riras lhun pa byed 'argya stong phrag rnams dang rin pa che sna
449b4(rgyud): bdun gyis phung pos stong gsum gyi stong che na po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkang te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba de bzhin du phyag rgya 'dzin
449b5(rgyud): bzhin pasade bzhin gshegs par ra de lta bu'i mchod pa'i cho ga byed de// de lta bu'i/ phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ 'dren pa
449b6(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs para'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las bsdigs mdzub gung mo la reg pa na dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang / nas
449b7(rgyud): cing ba dang / spyan zang bdang / dam tshig la 'jug pa dang / bskang ba byed pa dang / me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / de bzhinadu
449b8(rgyud): dang bar me dang // phreng ba dang / byug pa dang // gtor ma 'bul bar byed pa dang / de bzhin du khrus dang / nye reg nyid dang / gos bsgo ba dang // gtsug tor
450a1(rgyud): bcing ba dang / srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang // de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang / bzlas bzhin pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang / 
450a2(rgyud): skyil mo krung bcing ba dang / sbyin sreg gi las dang / gzhan spyan drang ba nyid dang // gsang sngags spyan drang ba nyid dang / dngos grub sgrub pa nyid dang / thams cad nas
450a3(rgyud): thams cad du bya ba thams cad phyag rgya 'dis byed de/ gnas thams cad du song ba dang / gnas grub pa dang / bya ba thams cad legs par bsngags pa
450a4(rgyud): dang thams cad du mchog gi phyag rgya don yod pa'i/ las rab tu grub pa dang / yon tan thams cad dang bskyed pa dang / thams cad du rigs
450a5(rgyud): thun mongs pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ don yod pa sgrub pa po'i phyag rgya don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par byed pa'o// don yod pa'i las zhes bya
450a6(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya 'di don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po lnga po 'di rnams rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid mthong ba dang // don yod pa thos
450a7(rgyud): ba nyid dang / don yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i de kho na nyid dang // don yod par sdig pa nyams pa dang // sgrib pa
450a8(rgyud): thams cad zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod par sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / don yod par sangs rgyas kyi/ 
450b1(rgyud): zhi yong dang / don yod par 'phel ba phyed pa'i byab co dang / don yod pa dngos grub kyi sbyin pa gyed pa mchog tu gyur ba'o// snying po dang / phyan rgya 'di 'dzin/ 
450b2(rgyud): rten dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du bsgrags pa'o// rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis khyad par du/ nyin mtshan du dang / thun mtsham su yang
450b3(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di 'ching na/ bkra shis pa'i mchog/ bsod nams dang // dag pa dang / sdig pa nyams pa dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub dam par gyur pa'i mcho/ 
450b4(rgyud): sbyin par byed do// 'di ni thar pa mchog gi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu dge ba'o// phyag rgya'i gsang sngags rnam su 'gyur te/ oM a mo nAM ku
450b5(rgyud): dz+ha l-i hUM/ oM a ma sh+tsa kro d+ha N+ye dz+dza/ maM dza/ radza'ad me dza pa? d+b+h+yAM/ oM a ma b+ha bi biHmo \u0f7f tsitam Ni thag ma d+hA/ 
450b6(rgyud): me g+ha sarba thA sA d+ha ya shi be hUM/ phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i sngagaso// de nas dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa'i gsang sngags thams cad du sgrub pa'i thabs kyi
450b7(rgyud): de kho na nyid kyi gnas thams cad la 'jug par byed pa bshad par byas/ oM a mo g+ha maN+Dale hU~M/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o// oM sa~M man+ta shu d+hi bri
450b8(rgyud): rjes ng+ge/ sa yang su sbyang ba'i snganas// oM ma ma
451a1(rgyud): sho d+ha ni hUM/ dkyil 'bor yongasu sbyong ba'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha pri thi bI sa ras+pha le hUM/ sa dang babyung gi sngag so// oM a mo g+ha
451a2(rgyud): dza la/ shra ba Ni hUM/ chu'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha a mr-i ta ba re swA hA// dbang bskur ba'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha bi b+hat+ta ba na ba re hUM/ thig rnam
451a3(rgyud): bar dbye ba'i sngagaso// oM nA nA rat+na ba re dz+wa la hUM/ tshon rtsi'i ri mo'i sngag so// oM dz+wa la bi ma le a mo b+ha shud+d+he hUM/ khrus kyi sngag so// oM sid+d+hi
451a4(rgyud): dza le a mo g+ha bud+d+he hUM/ nye reg gi sngagaso// oM a mo b+ha bste ts+tsha da hUM/ gos bsgo ba'i sngag so// oM a mo b+ha ma Ni hUM/ gtsug tor bcing ba'i sngag so// 
451a5(rgyud): oM a mo d+ha rak+Sha Na ba rang hUM/ bdag srung ba'i sngag so// oM satwa rak+ShA Ni a mo g+hA didz+dzi hUM/ thams cad srung zhing bde ba'i tshad du srung ba'i sngag so// 
451a6(rgyud): oM a mo b+ha pra bi sha b+hu bi ne hUM/ nas su 'jug pa'i stag so// oM na mo a ma~M d+hi bi tits+tshaphyag byed pa'i sngan so// oM a ma~M b+ha rigr-i d+d+he/ 
451a7(rgyud): bskor ba'i sngag so// oM sa ma ya sid+d+hi a mo g+ha ba ti hUM/ dam tshig gi sngag so// oM a mo g+ha buSh+pe pra ba tsa gan+di ni dza ya~M swAhA/ me tog dang / dri dang
451a8(rgyud): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / 'dug pa'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha sa ra saM pU ra Ni ra sa ra sa gra ba ti hUM/ thams cad du gtor ma'i sngagaso// oM a mo// 
451b1(rgyud): g+hAh+Na Ti AhA/ mar me'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha ba ti tsi ra bi tsi ras d+ha ra bA hA// thams cad du gnas pa dang / gnas thams cad du song ba na rig pa'i rgyal pos
451b2(rgyud): bya'o// thams cad du las thams cad byed pa rig pa'i gsang sngags sbyar bar bya'o// gshegs su gsol ba nyid kyang sngags 'dis bya'o// las shin tu rgyas pa
451b3(rgyud): gzhan thams cad ni rig pa'i rgyal pos bya'o// legs par byas pa'i las dang / bya ba rnams dang / bya ba thams sgrub par byed pa gzhan rnams dang ni/ don
451b4(rgyud): yod pa'i ljags kyu dang / blo'i lpags kyu dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags chen bo dang / dpa' bo gcig pa'i gsang sngags 'di rnams dang
451b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi las rnams bya'o// rtsa ba'i rig pa 'di nyid kyis las thams cad bya'i/ de las phyi rol tu gyur pa'i rig pa gzhan
451b6(rgyud): ni med do// rig pa 'di ni bklags pas grub pa'o// de nas de la yangs shing rgya che ba'i brtson pa bya ste/ 'byor pa ji lta ba dang / tshad ji lta ba dang
451b7(rgyud): de ltar gsal ba rnams/ 'byor pa dang bcas shing yong su rdzogs pa dang / shin tu gsal bar bya ba rnams bya'o// gtsang ma gcing mas khrus byas te rgas
451b8(rgyud): ngam bsgo bar bya/ dad pa dang / gus pa dang / mchog tu dang ba bskyed par bya/ bden par smra bar bya/ bden par phyi rol tu 'byung bar bya// bden
452a1(rgyud): bden par spro ba dang / brtson pas 'byung bar bya/ lkog tu smra ba dang / phra ma dang ser sna med par 'gyur bar bya/ lag yangs par
452a2(rgyud): bya/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam dang / bklags pas grub pa'i rig pa'i da sgrub par byed par 'gyur bar bya/ sems can thams cad la
452a3(rgyud): brtse ba mchog tu bya/ bri bar bya 'drir gzhug par bya/ bklag par bya/ kha ton du bya/ mchod par bya/ ri mor bya/ kun chub par bya
452a4(rgyud): cho ga zhim mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di gsungs pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par rmad du byung ba 'di
452a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig thun mong gi gsang ba dkyil 'khor rim
452a6(rgyud): par phye ba thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga zhim mo 'di/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
452a7(rgyud): gsung so// de nas yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi gang yin pa rnams kyang // 
452a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'pha po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'bor chen po dang bcas pa ga la ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du/ 
452b1(rgyud): / gyur pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar song ste/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
452b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis gzung bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu/ cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po yang / khrug
452b3(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po cho ga zhib mo 'di yongasu srung ba'i don dang / mi nub cing rgyas par 'gyuraro// cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ji lta rnyed pa de bzhin bris pa 'di yong su rdzog so// 
452b4(rgyud): 'di ni sngon gyi la tsA'i mkhas pa bzhi tsam gyis bgos nas bsgyur ba la/ bar skabs par skab su chad cing 'jug ma tshang ba las/ bla ma dus kyi 'khor lo ba chen po chos grags dpal
452b5(rgyud): bzang po'i phyag nas rgya dpe byung zhing / chang pa sob pa dang / 'jug bsgyur cig ces bkas bskul ba la brten nas/ bam po bcu nga'i nang du/ las kyi don kun sgrub par byed ces
452b6(rgyud): ba nas/ gsang sngags bzlas pa mchog gyis shig ces pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu gnyis pa'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang don khyad par can gyi chang du zhes pa nas/ rig sngags
452b7(rgyud): 'chang gi lus 'bar bar 'gyur te/ zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu gsum pa'i nang du/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshe ka 'di thos pa tsam dang zhes pa nas/ mi gang chang du bsko bar bya zhes pa'i bar dang / 'am po
452b8(rgyud): bcu bzhi nang du/ pad+ma dang / chu dang yungs kar la yongasu bzlas te zhes pa nas/ ras dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing / lan bdun du zhes pa'i bar dang / ram po bcu bzhi pa dang / 'tsho lnga'i mtsham su
